analyzed: vācaspatimiśra viracitāyām nyāyavārttikatātparya ṭīkāyām
prathama adhyāyasya prathama āhnikam

original: viśvavyāpī viśvaśaktiḥ pinākī viśveśāno viśvakṛd viśvamūrttiḥ /

analyzed: viśva jñātā viśva saṃhāra kārī viśva ārādhyaḥ rādhayatu īhitam naḥ
dharma vijñāna vairāgya aiśvarya śāline
nidhaye vāc viśuddhīnām akṣapādāya tāyine
grantha vyākhyā chalena eva nirasta akhila dūṣaṇā
nyāyavārttikatātparya ṭīkā asmābhiḥ vidhāsyate
icchāmi kim api puṇyam dustara kuni bandha paṅka magnānām
uddyota kara gavīnām atijaratīnām samuddharaṇāt
pramāṇa prameya saṃśaya prayojana dṛṣṭānta siddhānta avayava tarka nirṇaya vāda jalpa vitaṇḍā hetvābhāsa chula jāti nigrahasthānānām tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ
atha bhagavatā akṣapādena niḥśreyasa hetau śāstre praṇīte
vyutpādite ca bhagavatā pakṣila svāminā

original: kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ vārttikārambha iti śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtrākāroktāśāstraprayojanānuvādapūrvakaṃ vārttikārambhaprayojanaṃ darśayati-yadakṣapāda  #
analyzed: kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham vārttika ārambhaḥ iti śaṅkām nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtra ākāra ukta aśāstra prayojana anuvāda pūrvakam vārttika ārambha prayojanam darśayati yat akṣapāda
iti
yadi api bhāṣyakṛtā kṛta vyutpādanam etat
tathā api dignāga prabhṛtibhiḥ arvācīnaiḥ kṛhetu santamasa samutthāpanena ācchaditam śāstram

original: na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti uddyotakareṇa svanibandhoddyotena tadapanīyata iti
analyzed: na tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam iti uddyota kareṇa sva nibandha uddyotena tat apanīyate iti
prayojanavān ārambhaḥ iti

original: sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaśca prayojanavacchāstravyutpādanena svanibandhasya prayojanavattāṃ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgaṃ darśayitum,
analyzed: sūtra ukta prayojana anuvādaḥ ca prayojanavat śāstra vyutpādanena sva nibandhasya prayojanavat tām prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgam darśayitum
vyutpādana mātrasya ca kākadanta parīkṣā grantha sādhāraṇyena prekṣāvat pravṛtti anaṅga tvāt

original: atra caikaviśatiprabhedabhinnasya duḥkhasyātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ, tasmai /
analyzed: atra ca ekaviśati prabheda bhinnasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ tasmai
kasya jagataḥ

original: paramakārūṇiko hi bhagavān muniḥ jagadeva duḥkhapaṅkamagnāmuddidhīrṣuḥ śāstraṃ praṇītavān /
analyzed: parama kārūṇikaḥ hi bhagavān muniḥ jagat eva duḥkha paṅka magnām uddidhīrṣuḥ śāstram praṇītavān
tatra yadi kaścid na pravarteta
kim āyātam śāstrasya
na ca anadhikṛta puruṣa vyutpādanena asya tapaḥ nidheḥ kaścid asti doṣaḥ
tathā ca viśvāmitrāḥ triśaṅkum yājayāmāsa
viśaṣṭhaḥ ca dhama yoni jām akṣamālām upayeme

original: tapaḥprabhāva eva hi tāddaśasteṣāṃ yata evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyanta iti /
analyzed: tapaḥ prabhāvaḥ eva hi tāddaśaḥ teṣām yatas evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmānaḥ vilīyante iti
na ca asmad ādīnām manda tapasām ayam prasaṅgaḥ

original: na hi gajānāmudaryaṃ tejo vaṭakāṣṭhamaśitaṃ pacatītyasmadādīnāmapyudaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: na hi gajānām udaryam tejaḥ vaṭa kāṣṭham aśitam pacati iti asmad ādīnām api udaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam
ku tārkikaiḥ dignāga prabhutibhiḥ āhitam ajñānam ku tārkika ajñānam iti

original: avigītaśiṣṭācāraparamparaprāptaḥ paramaśiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛto 'pīṣṭadevatānamaskāro na śāstre niveśitaḥ /
analyzed: avigīta śiṣṭa ācāra parampara prāptaḥ parama śiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛtaḥ u pi iṣṭadevatā namaskāraḥ na śāstre niveśitaḥ
na khalu anyat api maṅgalyam śāstre niveśitam
prasiddhatara tayā tu maṅgalya antara vat śiṣyāḥ avagabhiṣyanti iti sarvam avadātam

original: tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathamasūtramanūdya tasya tātparyamāha--pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānānniḥ- śreyasādhigama ityetacchāstrasyādisūtram /
analyzed: tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathama sūtram anūdya tasya tātparyam āha pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānāt niḥ śreyasa adhigamaḥ iti etat śāstrasya ādi sūtram
tasya śāstrasya abhisaṃbandha vākyam

original: ādigrahaṇena kramaprāptasyaiva prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktam na dvitīyāderiti darśitam /
analyzed: ādi grahaṇena krama prāptasya eva prathamam vyākhyānam yuktam na dvitīya ādeḥ iti darśitam
abhimataḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhisaṃbandhaḥ
śāstra niḥśreyasayoḥ hetu hetumat bhāvaḥ
tasya idam sūtrā vākyam ā abhisaṃbandha vākyam

original: pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānādityatra hi jñāyate 'neneti jñānamiti vyutpatyā tatvajñānaṃ śāstramucyate /
analyzed: pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatva jñānāt iti atra hi jñāyate nena iti jñānam iti vyutpatyā tatva jñānam śāstram ucyate
pañcamyā ca tasya hetu tvam

original: na hi viṣaghnamantravat svarūpamātreṇa tadavivakṣitārthaṃ niḥśreyasaheturiti padārthatatvāvagamakaraṇatayā śāstramapadiśati,
analyzed: na hi viṣa ghna mantra vat sva rūpa mātreṇa tat avivakṣita artham niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti padārtha tatva avagama karaṇatayā śāstram apadiśati
na tu svarūpeṇa

original: tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇāditatvāvagamo 'vāntaravyāpāra itayuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇa ādita tva avagamaḥ vā antara vyāpāraḥ ita yuktam bhavati
tathā ca pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatvam
pratipādakam ca śāstram iti śāstra pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatvayoḥ jñāpya jñāpaka bhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatva jñāna niḥśreyasayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ ca
saṃbandhaḥ sūcitaḥ bhavati
tat idam abhigheya saṃbandha prayojana pratipādana artha tvam prathama sūtrasya

original: patpadārthatattvajñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ pratyupayogaḥ tathāgre nivedayiṣyate /
analyzed: ca yathā niḥśreyasa adhigamam pratyupayogaḥ tathā agre nivedayiṣyate
viniścita āpta bhāvaḥ ca muneḥ āpta tvena tad vākyāt prayojana ādi
āpta tva aviniścaye tu artha saṃśayāt
na khalu kṛṣi ādau api viriścita sasya ādi adhigamānām pravṛttiḥ
antara avagraha ādi pratibandhena phala anutpādasya api nyāya prāpta tvena tad abhidhānam anarthakam iti sāmpratam
viśeṣa smṛti anapekṣasya saṃśayasya anutpādāt
vākyāt tu viśeṣa smṛtiḥ iti na ānarthakyam
tat evam prathama sūtra tātparyam uktvā bhāṣyasya ādi vākya tātparyam āha pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipattau iti evamādi tasya anusandhāna vākyam

original: tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya /
analyzed: tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasa adhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya

original: kutaścinnimittād vighaṭanaśaṅkāyām anu sūtraghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanaṃ ghaṭanam anusandhānam,
analyzed: kutaścid nimittāt vighaṭana śaṅkāyām anu sūtra ghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanam ghaṭanam anusandhānam
tasya vākyam anusandhāna vākyam iti
evam kila atra śaṅkyate yat aśakya anuṣṭhāna upāya upadeśakam tat anarthakam
yathā jva hara takṣaka cūḍā ranta alaṅkāra upadeśakam vacanam
tādṛśam ceda śāstram iti

original: tathā hi prameyādīnāṃ tāvatpadārthānāṃ tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇatattvajñānādhīnam /
analyzed: tathā hi prameya ādīnām tāvat padārthānām tattva jñānam pramāṇa tattva jñāna adhīnam

original: na hi pramāṇaṃ tattvenānavadhāritaṃ bodhakatvamātraṇa svagocarāvadhāraṇāyālaṃ tāvanmātrasya tadābhāsasādhāraṇyāt,
analyzed: na hi pramāṇam tattvena anavadhāritam bodhaka tva mātraṇa sva gocara avadhāraṇāya alam tāvanmātrasya tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇyāt
api tu bodha ka tva eka artha samavetena avyabhicāri tvena
tat eva hi pramāṇyam
tat ca aśakya avadhāraṇam
tad anavadhāraṇāt ca prameya ādayaḥ duravadhāraṇāḥ

original: tathā hi vijñānasca tāvatprāmāṇyaṃ svato vā niścīyate, parato vā?
analyzed: tathā hi vijñānaḥ ca tāvat prāmāṇyam svatas vā niścīyate paratas vā
na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ
na khalu vijñānam āna ātma saṃvedanam ātmānam api gṛhṇīyāt
prāk ava tat prāmāṇaṇyam
na api vijñāna antaram
tat vijñānam iti ava gṛhṇīyāt
na punar asya avyabhicāri tvā īm

original: jñānatvamātraṃ ca tadābhāsasādhāraṇamiti na svataḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: jñāna tva mātram ca tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇam iti na svatas prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam
etena sva saṃvedana naye avyabhicāra grahaṇam pratyuktam
na api paratas
param hi tad gocaram vā jñānam abhyupeyeta
artha kriyā nirbhāsam vā jñānam
tad gocara nāntarīyaka artha antara darśanam vā

original: tacca sarvaṃ svato 'navadhāritaprāmāṇyamākulaṃ sat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartakaṃ jñānamanākulayet?
analyzed: tat ca sarvam svatas nava dhārita prāmāṇyam ākulam sat katham pūrvam pravartakam jñānam an ākulayet

original: svato vāsya prāmāṇye kimaparāddhaṃ pravatākajñānena yena tasminnapi tanna syāt /
analyzed: svatas vā asya prāmāṇye kim aparāddham pravatāka jñānena yena tasmin api tat na syāt

original: na ca prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate svataḥ ityāveditam /
analyzed: na ca prāmāṇyam jñāyate svatas iti āveditam

original: yadā ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyamaktena krameṇa duradhigamaṃ tadā kaiva kathendriyādīnāmavyabhicārisaṃvedanakāryavyaṅgyapramāṇabhāvānām?
analyzed: yadā ca saṃvedana prāmāṇyam aktena krameṇa duradhigamam tadā kā eva kathā indriya ādīnām avyabhicāri saṃvedana kārya vyaṅgya pramāṇa bhāvānām

original: tadeva dṛṣṭārthāḥ pramāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahārā bhavantu sandehādapi yathātathā,
analyzed: tat eva dṛṣṭa arthāḥ pramāṇabhṛtām vyavahārāḥ bhavantu sandehāt api yathā tathā
adṛṣṭa arthāḥ tu bahu vitta vyāyā āyāsa sādhyāḥ vaidikāḥ vyavahārāḥ datta jalā
jalayaḥ prasaktāḥ

original: tasmāt pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñāpanadvāreṇa na śāstraṃ niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñāpana dvāreṇa na śāstram niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyate iti
sā iyam āśaṅkā prāmāṇya jñāna upāya kathanena ādi vākyena bhāṣyakṛtā nirākṛtā
tathā hi pramāṇam arthavat iti nitya yoge matup
nitya tā ca avyabhicāri tā
tena artha avyabhicāri iti arthaḥ
iyam eva ca artha avyabhicāri tā pramāṇasya yat deśa kāla nara avasthā antara avisaṃvādaḥ rtha svarūpa prakārayoḥ tad upadarśitayoḥ
atra hetuḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyāt samartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt
yadi punar etat arthavat na abhaviṣyat
na samartha pravṛttim akariśyat
yathā pramāṇa ābhāsaḥ iti vyatirekī hetuḥ
anvaya vyatirekī vā
anumānasya svatas pramāṇa tayā anvayasya api saṃbhavāt
pravṛtti janaka tvam tu pramāṇasya na sākṣāt
kim tu artha pratipatti janana dvāreṇa iti āha pramāṇataḥ rtha gratipattau iti
sarvasya ca asya upapattim vārttika vyākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyāmaḥ
syāt etat
bhavantu pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ śakya jñānāḥ

original: śāstreṇa tu te nābhidhīyanta iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasyetvata āha--śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvāt /
analyzed: śāstreṇa tu te na abhidhīyante iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasya iti atas āha śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvāt
yadi api śreyaḥ duḥkha nivṛttim ātyantikīm vakṣyati

original: tathāpi sopāyaiva sā atra śreyaḥśabdena vivakṣitā,
analyzed: tathā api sa upāyā eva sā atra śreyaḥ śabdena vivakṣitā
tanmātrasya śāstra aviṣaya tvāt
tat ayam arthaḥ

original: śāstraṃ tāvadetat puruṣaśreyaḥ sahopāyenābhidhatta ityanubhavasiddha sadaśakyānuṣṭhānatayāpavaditavyam /
analyzed: śāstram tāvat etat puruṣa śreyaḥ saha upāyena abhidhatte iti anubhava siddha sat aśakya anuṣṭhāna tayā apavaditavyam

original: sā cedaśakyānuṣṭhānatāpanītā pramāṇata ityādinā saṃhitaṃ niḥśreyasena saha śāstramiti /
analyzed: sā ced aśakya anuṣṭhāna tā apanītā pramāṇataḥ ityādinā saṃhitam niḥśreyasena saha śāstram iti

original: śāstrasyetyādi grahaṇakavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti--śāstraṃ punarityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyantena /
analyzed: śāstrasya ityādi grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇoti śāstram punar ityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇa iti antena
pramāṇa ādi vācaka pada grahaṇena tad lakṣaṇāni ca tad parīkṣāśva upalakṣayati
tathā ca pañca adhyāyī śāstram iti aṅktam iti avirodhaḥ
pañca adhyācī iti anena vyūhaḥ samūhinām ucita ānupūrvī
upalakṣaka pada svarūpam āha padam
ema smṛti samārūḍhāḥ varṇāḥ eka artha pratipādana avacchinnāḥ samūhaḥ
evam svārtha smṛti avāntara vyāpārāṇām sūtra padānām nānā padārtha viśiṣṭa eka padārtha rūpa vākya artha pratyāyana kārya avacchinnānām samūhaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: evaṃ ca kvacit kenacidarthenaikena sūtravākyānāmekavākyatvaṃ samūhaḥ prakaraṇam /
analyzed: evam ca kvacid kenacid arthena ekena sūtra vākyānām eka vākya tvam samūhaḥ prakaraṇam
prakaraṇānām api kayācid sva artha saṃgatyā samūhaḥ āhnikam
evam tatra tatra veditavyam
etāḥ ca prakaraṇa āhnika adhyāya artha saṃgatīḥ tatra tatra leśataḥ darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tadevaṃ śāstrasvarūpaṃ darṃśayitvā nāntareṇa tadarthakathanaṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvamasrū sidhyitīti tadarthaṃ kathayati-- tatpadārthā
analyzed: tat evam śāstra svarūpam darṃśayitvā na antareṇa tad artha kathanam sidhi iti tad artham kathayati tad padārthā

original: nanu pramāṇādīnāṃ pratinaramānantyena durjñānatvamiti tadavasthamevānarthakyaṃ śāstrasya prasaktamityata āha -- ṣoḍaśātmānaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa ādīnām prati naram ānantyena durjñāna tvam iti tad avastham eva ānarthakyam śāstrasya prasaktam iti atas āha ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ

original: ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇādīnāṃ pramāṇatvādisāmānyaviśeṣa iti yāvat /
analyzed: ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇa ādīnām pramāṇa tva ādi sāmānya viśeṣaḥ iti yāvat
etat uktam bhavati

original: āntargaṇikabhedādānantye 'pi svasāmānyaviśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītā na durjñānā iti yato 'sya padārthāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ,
analyzed: āntargaṇika bhedāt ānantye pi sva sāmānya viśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ na durjñānāḥ iti yatas padārthāḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ
tat tasmāt śāstram puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhatte
syāt etat
pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ prāmāṇikāḥ aprāmāṇikāḥ vā
a prāmāṇika tve kalpanā mātra nirmitāḥ katham niḥśreyasāya kalpante
na ye ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ kalpanāḥ kośasya ananta prasara tvāt

original: prāmāṇikatve vā pramāṇādeva tatsiddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyamityata āha--pratyakṣeti /
analyzed: prāmāṇika tve vā pramāṇāt eva tad siddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyam iti atas āha pratyakṣa iti
pratyakṣa anumāna adhigata grahaṇena aprāmāṇika tvam niṣiddham
atas eva vastu tattvam iti
pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ na upamāna viṣayāḥ iti na upamānam upanyastam

original: yadyapi prameyamātmādyapavargāntalakṣaṇamāgamikaṃ tathāpyāgamasyāptapraṇetṛkatayā tatrāpi mūlabhūtamanumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vāstīti pratyakṣānumāne  #
analyzed: yadi api prameyam ātma ādi apavarga anta lakṣaṇam āgamikam tathā api āgamasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā tatra api mūla bhūtam anumānam pratyakṣam vā asti iti pratyakṣa anumāne
eva darśite

original: nanūktaṃ prāmāṇikatve śāstravaiyarthyamityata āha-- tasya viṣaya iti /
analyzed: nanu uktam prāmāṇika tve śāstra vaiyarthyam iti atas āha tasya viṣayaḥ iti

original: vyavaharamāṇā api pramāṇairlaukikā vainayikabuddhivirahiṇo naitān padārthān viviñcate /
analyzed: vyavaharamāṇāḥ api pramāṇaiḥ laukikāḥ vainayika buddhi virahiṇaḥ na etān padārthān viviñcate

original: aviviktāścete na niḥśreyasāya kalpanta iti anadhigatetyaṅktam /
analyzed: aviviktāḥ ca ite na niḥśreyasāya kalpante iti
ādhyātmikī śaktiḥ śuśrūṣā ādiḥ
puruṣa tyuktam

original: tatra vivakṣitaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ grahītuṃ saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣaprakārān darśayati--puruṣaḥ punariti /
analyzed: tatra vivakṣitam puruṣa viśeṣam grahītum saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣa prakārān darśayati puruṣaḥ punar iti
heyam darśayati tatra iti
upādeyān āha itare iti
apekṣā jijñāsā
sā sandigdhasya tāvat asti viṣayasya

original: vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇāṃ purato jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ viṣyamāṇasya vigalite 'haṅkāre sandigdhasya sa/
analyzed: vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇām puratas jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām viṣyamāṇasya vigalite haṅkāre sandigdhasya sa
jāta jijñāsasya sa apekṣasya sataḥ

original: apratipannasyāpi kenacit prakāreṇa sandehamāpādya sāpekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā /
analyzed: apratipannasya api kenacid prakāreṇa sandeham āpādya sāpekṣīkṛtasya pratipādya tā
tat idam ukta kitare sāpekṣāḥ santaḥ pratipādyāḥ iti

original: asandigdho 'pi tattvapratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyata iti /
analyzed: asandigdhaḥ pi tattva pratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyate iti
tat kim sāpekṣam ā adhikṛtya śāstram pravṛttam

original: tathā ca pramātaṇāṃ na pramāṇāntare pravṛttiḥ syādityata āha-- te yadeti /
analyzed: tathā ca pramātaṇām na pramāṇa antare pravṛttiḥ syāt iti atas āha te yadā iti
kañcid viṣayam jijñāsavaḥ yedandriya ādi apekṣante
tadā pratyakṣeṇa pratipādyāḥ
evam uttaram api yojyam
ayam abhisandhiḥ
na dṛṣṭa prayojana upayogi vastu vijñāsā iha apekṣā abhimatā
kim tu niḥśreyasa upayogi padārtha jijñāsā
sā ca asmin eva śāstre pravṛtti hetuḥ na anyatra
tat idam uktam yadā punar iti
tu jijñāsavaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: ihābhimataṃ śreyo nirdhārayituṃ śreyomātrapramārān āha--śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśca /
analyzed: iha abhimatam śreyaḥ nirdhārayitum śreyaḥ mātra pramārān āha śreyaḥ punar sukham ahita nivṛttiḥ ca
tatra api avāntara prakārān āha tat śreyaḥ bhidyamānam dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate
tat āha dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena

original: na vyāsajya kiṃ tu pratyekamityāha-- dṛṣṭaṃ sukha strakcandanavanitādibhogajanma /
analyzed: na vyāsajya kim tu pratyekam iti āha dṛṣṭam
adṛṣṭam sukham svarga ādi

original: evaṃ ca duḥkhanivṛttirapi śreyo dṛṣṭāmadṛṣṭaṃ ceti yojanīyaṃ cakāralopāt /
analyzed: evam ca duḥkha nivṛttiḥ api śreyaḥ dṛṣṭām adṛṣṭam ca iti yojanīyam cakāra lopāt
ahita nivṛtteḥ śreyasaḥ ātyantika anātyantika tvena dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭasya bhedam āha ahita nivṛttiḥ api iti
abhimatam śreyaḥ nirdhārayati ātyantikī iti
punar iti nirdhāraṇam avadyotayati
ātyantika tvam nirvṛtteḥ nivṛttasya punar anutpādaḥ
sa ca kārya kāraṇa tad anuṣaṅgi nivṛttyā lakṣyate
na hi akāraṇam kāryam jāyate
tat idam uktam ekaviṃśati prabhada bhindu ḥkha hāni eti
gauṇa mukhya bhedena ca ekaviṃśateḥ śarīra dīnām duḥkha tva prakārān āha evaviṃśati iti
ṣaṣṭham indriyam manaḥ
tasya viṣayaḥ icchā dveṣa prayatnāḥ

original: yadyapi viṣayaḥ śarīramapi tathāpyanyathāsya duḥkhahetubhāva ityāha śarīramiti śarīrāvacchinna ātmapradeśo duḥkhāyatanamiti śarīraṃ duḥkhāyatanamuktam
analyzed: yadi api viṣayaḥ śarīram api tathā api anyathā asya duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ iti āha śarīram iti śarīra avacchinnaḥ ātma pradeśaḥ duḥkha āyatanam iti śarīram duḥkha āyatanam uktam
indriya viṣaya buddha dīnām duḥkha tva upacāre kāraṇam āha aindriyāṇi iti
tatra indriyāṇi tāvat gandha ādi viṣaya bodhanāt
viṣayāḥ bodhya tvāt
buddhayaḥ tu sākṣāt duḥkha sādhanāni iti duḥkha tvena upacaryante
duḥkha tva upacāra bījam āha sukham iti

original: sādhanapāratantyaṃ kṣayitvaṃ kāma iti duḥkhahetavaḥ sakalasukhānasaṅginaḥ,
analyzed: sādhana pāratantyam kṣayi tvam kāmaḥ iti duḥkha hetavaḥ sakala sukha anasaṅginaḥ
tasmāt sukham api duḥkha anuṣaṅgi
ukta prakāra duḥkha hāna sādhanam āhatasya hāniḥ iti
saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāna pariśodhita parama nyāya mārgaḥ khalu heya upādeya bhūta dvādaśavidha prameya tattva paribhāvana bhavā
prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila pravṛtti hetu doṣa anuṣaṅgo pravartamānaḥ na śarīra indriya ādi hetum apūrva dharma adharma pracayam ātanoti
anādi bhava paramparā upattam ca dharma adharma pracayam anantam api aniyata vipāka samayam api

original: prasaṃkhyānaparipākaprabhāvāt paritastattadupabhogabhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tatttphalopabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti /
analyzed: prasaṃkhyāna paripāka prabhāvāt paritas tad tad upabhoga bhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tad t phala upabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti
acintya sāmarthya atiśayaḥ hi samādhiḥ
yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ

original: ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte agastya ica samudraṃ pibati,
analyzed: kaḥ hi yoga prabhāvāt ṛte agastyaḥ i ca samudram pibati
saḥ iva ca daṇḍaka araṇyam sṛjati
yogabhāṣye
iti
sā iyam ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ
tat idam uktam śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvāt iti
syāt etat
kevalasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ puyaṣa pravṛtti aṅgam

original: iyaṃ tu duḥkhavat sukhasyāpyātyantikī nivṛttiriti kathaṃ śreyaḥ,
analyzed: iyam tu duḥkha vat sukhasya api ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ iti katham śreyaḥ

original: kathaṃ ca prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgamityata āha--puruṣā rāgādimanta iti /
analyzed: katham ca prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgam iti atas āha puruṣāḥ rāga ādimantaḥ iti
yadi api rāga ādimatā puthagjanānām etat na pravṛtti aṅgam

original: te hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamapyannaṃ madhuratayā āpātaramaṇīyaṃ viṣaviṅgattu mārayatu mā va mīmaradupayu/
analyzed: te hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam api annam madhura tayā āpāta ramaṇīyam mārayatu mā mīmarat upayu
tāvat āpāta sukham

original: ko hi hastagataṃ pādagataṃ karotīti vicintyopabhu/jate /
analyzed: kaḥ hi hasta gatam pāda gatam karoti iti vicintya upabhujate
vivekinaḥ tu āyatim ālocayantaḥ svargam api kupita phaṇi phaṇā maṇḍala chāya pratimaḥ iti apajahati
tena mā bhūt etat rāga ādimatām pravṛtti aṅgam
vivekinām tu bhaviṣyati
avivekinām api ca apratipanna vipratipannānām viveka ādhāna upayaḥ pūrvam āveditaḥ
śāstra pravṛtti aṅga mātram eva ca iha vivekaḥ vairāgyam abhimatam iti
pravṛtteḥ dvaividhyam aikarūpyam dvairūpyam ca
puruṣa bhedaḥ rāga vairāgyābhyām
prāptavyasya sarvasya sukhasya duḥkha saṃbhedena aniṣṭa pakṣa nikṣepāt aniṣṭa pratiṣedha arthā eva pravṛttiḥ vivekinām eka rūpā eva
avivekinām tu pravṛttiḥ dvi rūpā iti uktam

original: tadanena prapañcena pramāṇato 'rthapratipattavityādivākyasya tātparyamabhidhāya tadavayavaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyāditi vivarītuṃ bhūmimāracayati--pravṛtterapīti
analyzed: tat anena prapañcena pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipattau ityādi vākyasya tātparyam abhidhāya tad avayavam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti vivarītum bhūmim āracayati pravṛtteḥ api iti
dṛṣṭam pravṛtti sāmarthyam hetuḥ iti rāga ādimat pravṛtti sāmarthyam upanyastam
na tu vīta rāgānām

original: na hi tatpravṛtterniḥ- śreyasādhgimalakṣaṇaphalasaṃbandho dṛṣṭo niḥśreyasasyālaukikatvāt /
analyzed: na hi tad pravṛtteḥ niḥ śreyasa adhgima lakṣaṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ niḥśreyasasya alaukika tvāt
pramāṇasya arthavat anarthaka tvāt iti ayuktam

original: pramāṇamanarthakamiti hi vipratiṣiddhamityata āha-- pramāṇaṃ tāvaditi /
analyzed: pramāṇam anarthakam iti hi vipratiṣiddham iti atas āha pramāṇam tāvat iti
na hi apramāṇam apramāṇam iti gṛhītam pravṛttyai kalpate
kim tarhi pramāṇam iti

original: na cāpramāṇe pramāṇābhimāno vinā pramāṇādisādharmyāditi tatsādharmyaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ punariti /
analyzed: na ca apramāṇe pramāṇa abhimānaḥ vinā pramāṇa ādi sādharmyāt iti tat sādharmyam pṛcchati kim punar iti
tat vivṛṇa iti pramāṇena api iti
rajata vijñānam api purovarti śukla bhāsvaram sat dravyam paricchinatti
śuktikā jñānam api

original: kevalamekasminnava viṣaye rajatasamāropāpavādābhyāṃ buddhacorvādhakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kevalam ekasmin nava viṣaye rajata samāropa apavādābhyām buddha coḥ vādhaka bhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tat evam ubhayatas pravṛttiḥ samarthāt pramāṇāt eva
na apramāṇāt artha vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti āha saḥ yam pramātā iti
tatas ca siddhaḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ anarthavat vaca tirekaḥ iti abhisandhiḥ

original: tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiranarthavadvacatirekasaṃpannapramāṇasyārthavattve heturityāha--tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtterhetoḥ punaḥ pramāṇasyārthavattvamarthāvyabhicāritvam
analyzed: tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ anarthavat vacati reka saṃpanna pramāṇasya arthavat tve hetuḥ iti āha tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ hetoḥ punar pramāṇasya arthavat tvam artha avyabhicāri tvam
asamarthā tu anantarā api na saṃbadhyate yogayatā avirahāt
saṃprati ādi vākyam ākṣeptum anuvadati pramāṇataḥ iti
ākṣipati paraspara iti
samādhattena iti
ākṣepa vākyam vibhajate yadi pramāṇataḥ iti
na tāvat artha pratipattiḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ api tu tad viniścayaḥ
na ca tanmātram

original: api tu tadarthajātīyasya śreyohetutāmasakṛdupalabhya saṃpratyupalabhyamānasyārthasya tajjātīyatayā śreyohetubhāvānumānasahito viniścayaḥ pravṛttihetuḥ
analyzed: api tu tad artha jātīyasya śreyaḥ hetu tām asakṛt upalabhya saṃpratyupalabhyamānasya arthasya tad jātīya tayā śreyaḥ hetu bhāva anumāna sahitaḥ viniścayaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ
sā iyam śreyaḥ sādhana tā anumāna sahitā pramāṇataḥ ṛtha pratipattiḥ viniścatiḥ samartha pravṛtti nimittam uktā
na ca artha vinaścayaḥ prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa

original: prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca śreyohetutānumānanimittavyāptigrahaṇaṃ ca na samarthāṃ pravṛttiṃ vinā,
analyzed: prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam ca śreyaḥ hetu tā anumāna nimitta vyāpti grahaṇam ca na samarthām pravṛttim vinā

original: na ca samarthā pravṛttistābhyāṃ vivaneti parasparāśrayatā /
analyzed: na ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ tābhyām vivanā iti paraspara āśraya tā
tat idam uktam

original: cadi pūrvaṃ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattiḥ rviniścitirapekṣitopayatānumānasahitā pravṛttisamārthyamantareṇa kimiti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣitopāya  #
analyzed: pūrvam pramāṇataḥ ṛtha pratipattiḥ ṛ vi niścitiḥ apekṣita upayata anumāna sahitā pravṛtti samārthyam antareṇa kim iti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣita upāya
eva iti ca toyam eva iti ca iti
samādhānam vibhajate etat ca na evam iti
yat tāvat uktam
pramāṇasya duravadhāraṇa tvāt artha viniścaya abhāvāt na pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti
tatra brūmaḥ satyam
na svatas prāmāṇyam śakya avadhāraṇam
paratas tu dṛṣṭa artheṣu anabhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu pravṛtti sāmathyat iva tat gamyate
artha pratīti adhīnā tu pravṛttiḥ na artha avadhāraṇa adhīnā
artha sandehāt api prekṣāvatām pravṛtteḥ

original: no khalūpāyatāvinaścayenāpi pravartamānā na anāgataphale sandihate /
analyzed: no khalu upāya tā vinaścayena api pravartamānāḥ na anāgata phale sandihate

original: tadamī saṃdihānā api pravartamānāḥ pravṛttisamārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvaṃ viniścatya
analyzed: tat amī saṃdihānāḥ api pravartamānāḥ pravṛtti samārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvam viniścatya
tad jātīyasya anyasya abhyāsa daśa pannasya pravṛtti samārthyāt prāk eva tad jātīya tvena liṅgena
artha viniścayena pravartante
evam ca dṛṣṭa artha mantra āyurveda prāmāṇyam pravṛtti sāmarthyena avadhārya tad jātīyasya āpta uktasya adṛṣṭa arthasya
vedasya vinā api pravṛtti sāmarthyam prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam āpta ukta tvena nivedayiṣyate
na ca phala jñānam parīkṣyate prekṣāvat hiḥ

original: tasya yādṛśatādṛśasyāpīṣṭatvādiṣṭalakṣaṇatvācca phalasya tatsādhanatvaṃ te parīkṣante /
analyzed: tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭa tvāt iṣṭa lakṣaṇa tvāt ca phalasya tad sādhana tvam te parīkṣante
tathā hi toya jñānam
pipāsoḥ tatra pravṛttiḥ
pravṛttasya tad āptiḥ
āptasya pānam
pānena ca udanya upaśāntiḥ iti etāvatā eva pramātā kṛtī bhavati
na punar udanya upaśamam api parīkṣate
tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭatvāt iti kecid
vayam tu brūmaḥ
phala jñānam api abhyāsa daśā āpanna tayā tad jātīya tvena liṅgena avadhṛta avyabhicāram eva
evam tat pūrvam tat pūrvataram tat pūrvatamam iti

original: na ca saṃpratitanasya phalajñānasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāyedānīmeva pūrvasya phalajñānasya tajjātīyatvena pramāṇyāvadhāraṇe satyanavastheti /
analyzed: na ca saṃpratitanasya phala jñānasya prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya idānīm eva pūrvasya phala jñānasya tad jātīya tvena pramāṇya avadhāraṇe sati anavasthā iti
vācyam
pūrvatara sādharmyeṇa pūrvam eva pūrvasya avadhṛta prāmāṇya tvāt
evam pūrvatama sādharmyeṇa pūrvatarasya
evam tad pūrva sādharmyeṇa pūrvatamasya iti anādi tayā eva atra parihāraḥ

original: eteṣu ca madhye yatphalajñānaṃ svapnādyupabhogatulyatayā śaṅkitavyabhicāraṃ tadanabhyāsadaśāpannam /
analyzed: eteṣu ca madhye yat phala jñānam svapna ādi upabhoga tulya tayā śaṅkita vyabhicāram tat anabhyāsa daśā āpannam
atas pravṛtti sāmarthyam tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya iti artha pratipatti pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ anādi tvam uktam

original: anumānasya tu pravṛttisāmarthyaliṅgajanmano 'nyasya vā nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamanumeyāvyabhicāriliṅgasamutthatvāt
analyzed: anumānasya tu pravṛtti sāmarthya liṅga janmanaḥ nyasya vā nirasta samasta vyabhicāra śaṅkasya svatas eva prāmāṇyam anumeya avyabhicāri liṅga samuttha tvāt

original: na hi liṅgākāra jñānaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā,
analyzed: na hi liṅga ākāra jñānam liṅgam vinā

original: na ca liṅgaṃ liṅginaṃ vineti svata eva gṛhītāvyabhicāliṅgasamutthaṃ niṣkampamupapadyate jñānam /
analyzed: na ca liṅgam liṅginam vinā iti svatas eva gṛhīta avyabhicā liṅga samuttham niṣkampam upapadyate jñānam
pratyakṣa jñānam tu arthāt utpadyamānam api na gṛhīta avyabhicārāt
api tu sattā mātreṇa avasthitāt

original: na ca kāraṇāntarāṇyapīndriyādīni asyārthena gṛhītāvyabhicārāṇi na cārthenāvyabhicārāṇi /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇa antarāṇi api indriya ādīni asya arthena gṛhīta avyabhicārāṇi na ca arthena avyabhicārāṇi
śābdam tu jñānu na arthāt utpadyate
tad abhāve pi sati śabde bhāvāt
nā api liṅgasya iva śabdasya artha avyabhicāraḥ

original: kiṃ tu saṅketagrahaṇamātrāt padārthapratyāyanena vākyārthamadhigamayati śabdaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu saṅketa grahaṇa mātrāt padārtha pratyāyanena vākya artham adhigamayati śabdaḥ
tasmāt pratyakṣa śābda vijñānayoḥ na svatas vyabhicāra grahaḥ iti
pravṛtti sāmarthyam tad jātīya tvam vā liṅgam artha avyabhicārāya anusaraṇīyam

original: jñānagatatajjātīyatvaliṅgagrāhiṇaśca jñānasya mānasapratyakṣasya tādṛśasyādṛṣṭavyabhicāratayā parito nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svataḥ  #
analyzed: jñāna gata tad jātīya tva liṅga grāhiṇaḥ ca jñānasya mānasa pratyakṣasya tādṛśasya adṛṣṭa vyabhicāra tayā paritas nirasta samasta vibhrama āśaṅkasya svatas
prāmāṇyam iti na anavasthā
ā etena upamānam vyākhyātam
saṃvedanasya ca artha avarubhicāri tā kathanena tad kāraṇānām indriya ādīnām api pramāṇa tvam aktam veditavyam
na hi avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvāt anyat eṣām prāmāṇyam
na ca artha vyabhicāriṇām indriya ādīnām katham artha avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvam iti sāṃpratam
kāraṇa sva bhā niyoga paryanuyogayoḥ aśakya tvāt
tasmāt artha sandehāt anabhyāsa daśā āpannāt pramāṇa tā rtha pratipattau pravṛtti samārthi asaṃbhavāt
pravṛtti samārthya jñānasya ca abhyāsa daśā āpannasya tad jātīya tvena prāmāṇya anumānāt anabhyāsa daśā āpannasya
tu pravṛtti sāmarthya antara jñānena prāmāṇya anumānāt anādi tvāt na artha pratipravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ
paraspara āśraya tvam asti iti
arthasya apekṣita upāya tā anumāna pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ paraspara apekṣa tvam avaśiṣyate
tatra api anādi tā parihāraḥ

original: utpannamātrakasya hi bālakasya stanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāgbhavīyastajjātīyāpekṣitānubhavajanitaḥ saṃskāra āvirasti /
analyzed: utpanna mātrakasya hi bālakasya stanam dṛṣṭvā prāc bhavīyaḥ tad jātīya apekṣita anubhava janitaḥ saṃskāraḥ āvis asti
tatas ca smaraṇam
tatas upekṣita upāya tā anumānam
tatas pravṛttiḥ
tatas tasyāḥ sāmarthyam

original: evaṃ pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmanītyanāditayā na bījāṅkuravat parasparāpekṣiteti /
analyzed: evam pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmani iti anādi tayā na bīja aṅkura vat paraspara apekṣitā iti
artha pratipattiḥ iti
artha pratipattiḥ śva arthasya apekṣita upāya tā pratipattiḥ ca iti arthaḥ
tasmāt sarvam avadātam

original: tadanenoktena krameṇa pramāṇato 'rthapratipatāvityasya śāstrānusandhānavākyatva tātparyaṃ ca samāhitam /
analyzed: tat anena uktena krameṇa pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipatau iti asya śāstra anusandhāna vākya tva tātparyam ca samāhitam
idānīm asya eva tātparya antaram āha pramāṇa pravṛtyoḥ vā iti
tatra idam amāśāṅkyate muniḥ hi pratyakṣa saṃśaya ādi vyutpādana dvāreṇa sākṣāt ca anena śāstreṇa anvīkṣikpā
heya upādeya bhāva avasthita dvādaśavidha prameya vyutpādakam nyāyam anumāna para nāmānam niḥśreyasa siddhaye
vyutpādayāṃbabhūva
na ca nyāyataḥ pramāṇāt prameya tattva niścaya mātrāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ
api tu ādi anta varjjam daśānām prameyāṇām duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam
ātmanaḥ ca yāthātmya bhāvanam ityādibhyaḥ pravṛttibhyaḥ ātma tattva sākṣātkāra vairāgya paripāka krameṇa apūrvayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ anutpādena utpannayoḥ vā upabhogāt
prakṣayeṇa iti

original: tathā ca niḥśreyasaṃ pratyantaraṅgatvāt pramāṇānnyāyāt pravṛttireva balīyasī, na nyāyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca niḥśreyasam prati antaraṅga tvāt pramāṇāt nyāyāt pravṛttiḥ eva balīyasī na nyāyaḥ

original: tasmāt pravṛttireva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇaṃ niḥśreyasaheturapi pravṛtterantaraṅgatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt pravṛttiḥ eva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇam niḥśreyasa hetuḥ api pravṛtteḥ antaraṅga tvāt

original: tatredabhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇato 'rthapratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyaṃ phalenābhisaṃbandho,
analyzed: tatra idam upatiṣṭhate pramāṇataḥ ṛtha pratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyam phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ
na tu satya artha pratipattau
tasmāt arthavat prayojanavat pramāṇam api pravṛttivat eva
etat uktam bhavati
yathā antaraṅga tayā pravṛttiḥ balīyasī evam mūla kāraṇa tayā pramāṇam api
na hi apramāṇāt pravṛttiḥ phalena abhisaṃbadhyate
tasmāt tulyam ubhayam api

original: tathāpi pramāṇavyutpādanena pravṛttirapi vyutpāditā bhavatīti pramāṇasya vyutpādanamakāri śāstreṇa,
analyzed: tathā api pramāṇa vyutpādanena pravṛttiḥ api vyutpāditā bhavati iti pramāṇasya vyutpādanam akāri śāstreṇa
na tu pravṛtteḥ
sāmānya abhidhānam ca parama nyāya param
tasya eva prakṛta tvāt iti
prāmāṇya jñāna upāya pratipādana para tayā anusandhāna vakya tvam asya pūrvam uktam
saṃprati para paryanuyoga mukhena asya anusandhāna vākya tvu pratipādayati loka vṛtta iti

original: yathā hi pramāṇapratipattyupāyaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka evaṃ praṣṭāvyo jāyate,
analyzed: yathā hi pramāṇa pratipatti upāyam pratyācakṣāṇakaḥ evam praṣṭāvyaḥ jāyate
kim bhavān pramāṇena pramāṇa jñāna upāyam pratyācaṣṭe
a pramāṇena vā iti
yadi brūyāt pramāṇena iti
sa prativaktavyaḥ
pramāṇa jñāna upāyam avidvān katham bhavān evam āha iti
apramāṇena iti ced anujñayā vartitavyam
atha pramāṇena agṛhīta prāmāṇyena iti vā
manasayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ
tasmāt an icchatā api tvayā loka vṛttam anusaraṇīyam

original: anyathā nāsi laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syā iti /
analyzed: anyathā na asi laukikaḥ na parīkṣakaḥ iti unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāḥ iti
tat idam loka vṛttam ākṣeptāram bodhayitum anena bhāṣyeṇa anūdyate pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipatau

original: pravṛttisāmarthyāvat pramāṇa yato 'taḥ sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇenāvagatārthavattvenārthamavadhārya
analyzed: sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇena avagata arthavattvena artham avadhārya
pravartamānaḥ phalam upalabhate iti loka vṛttam
tat pramāṇataḥ ityādinā vākyena kāraṇa pradarśana dvāreṇa anūdyate
asya eva bhāṣyasya tātparya antaram vaktu bhūmim āracayati heya hānā iti

original: artho 'rthaśabdaḥ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattāvityatra sthitaḥ padaṃ vāyakaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
analyzed: arthaḥ rtha śabdaḥ pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipattau iti atra sthitaḥ padam vāyakam yeṣām tāni tathā
etat vāttika granthasya etādṛśam vyākhyānam
bhāṣya gatasya tu anyathā bhaviṣyati
upāyaḥ śāstram iti
śāstra śabdaḥ tad artha paraḥ
arthasya api śabda vat śāstra śarīra tvāt

original: atra ca heyahānādhigantavyapadaiḥ pramāṇaprameyayorūpādānād gobalīvardanyāyena saṃśayādiṣu nigrahasthānānteṣu śāstrapadaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: atra ca heya hāna adhigantavya padaiḥ pramāṇa prameyayoḥ upādānāt gobalīvardanyāyena saṃśaya ādiṣu nigrahasthāna anteṣu śāstra padam pravartate
tena upāya padena saṃśaya ādayaḥ nigrahasthāna antaḥ eva uktāḥ iti
grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇa iti heyam iti
tātparyam āha etasmin ca iti
cena pramāṇa pramā pramātṛ prameya rūpam caturvarga antaram api sūcayati

original: tatra heyādicaturvarge cāryamāṇatayārthapadasūcite pramāṇādicaturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānyapradarśanārthamidaṃ bhāṣyam /
analyzed: tatra heya ādi catur varge cāryamāṇa tayā artha pada sūcite pramāṇa ādi catur varge ca pramāṇasya prādhānya pradarśana artham idam bhāṣyam
yadi api caturvarga dvaya tattva avagamaḥ niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ
tathā api pramāṇam eva pradhānam
tad mūla tvāt itara siddheḥ
tat idam uktam
arthavat iti
atiśāyane matup
pramātṛ ādi apekṣayā heya ādi epakṣayā ca atiśayena prayojanavat pramāṇam
kasmāt pramāṇataḥ ṛtha pratipattau satyām pravṛttasya pramātuḥ tad itara pratilambhāt
pramāyāḥ ca tad kārya tvāt
tat idam uktam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti

original: tadetasmāt prādhānyād vivakṣābhedena trivargadvayāt prāguddeśaḥ pramāṇasyeti /
analyzed: tat etasmāt prādhānyāt vivakṣā bhedena trivarga dvayāt prāk uddeśaḥ pramāṇasya iti

original: etena yadāhureke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ tat prameyasyaiva,
analyzed: etena yat āhuḥ eke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyam tat prameyasya eva
atha uṣāya tvāt tat saṃśaya ādīnām
teṣām pramāṇa upāya tvāt
kasmāt ca pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ prāthamyam pramāṇasya iti
tat nirastam bhavati
pramāṇa upāyānām api saṃśaya ādīnām pramāṇa adhīna tvāt iti
nanu avagatam
artha pada tayā heya ādi catur vargaḥ darśitaḥ itiḥ

original: pramāṇādicaturvargastu kathaṃ pradarśita iti pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
analyzed: pramāṇa ādi catur vargaḥ tu katham pradarśitaḥ iti pṛcchati katham punar iti
uttaram iti

original: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate--tadidaṃ vākyāmavayavaśa upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate 'vayavaśa iti /
analyzed: tat evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum upakramate itat idam vākyām avayavaśas upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate vayavaśas iti

original: tatrāsyāvayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇata iti vivṛṇoti--tatreti /
analyzed: tatra asya avayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇataḥ iti vivṛṇoti tatra iti
vibhajate pramāṇataḥ iti iyam nimitta pañcamī

original: nimittapañcamī cet kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitamityata āha-- asyeti /
analyzed: nimitta pañcamī ced kasmāt pramāṇāt iti na abhihitam iti atas āha asya iti
pramāṇataḥ iti evaṃrūpasya abhidhānam vacana vyāpti artham vibhakti vyāpti artham ca iti
vacana vyāpti artham iti mṛśyāmahe
na tu vibhakti vyāpti artham iti
pañcamī vyatirekeṇa taseḥ abhāvāt iti āha katham punar iti
pariharati labhyate iti
vyāpteḥ prayojanam pṛcchati kim siddham bhavati iti
uttaraṃvacana vyāptyā saṃplavaḥ vyavasthā ca
tat ubhayam vibhajate pramāṇena iti

original: yatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānāṃ tatraikaikasyāpyasti pratipattisādhanatvaṃ pramāṇasyeti kathayituṃ saṃplavāvasare 'pi pramāṇenetyaṅktam
analyzed: yatra dvayoḥ bahūnām vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānām tatra ekaikasya api asti pratipatti sādhana tvam pramāṇasya iti kathayitum saṃplava avasare pi pramāṇena iti aṅktam
atas eva vyavasthāyām eva kāraḥ pramāṇena eva iti
vibhakti vyāpteḥ
gamyate iti anuṣajyate
tat vibhajate pramāṇāt artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti hetu tvam gamyate
pramāṇena artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti karaṇa rūpaḥ rthaḥ gamyate iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyata ityata āha--pramāṇeneti /
analyzed: kasmāt punar karaṇa arthaḥ gamyate iti atas āha pramāṇena iti
artham artha adhigati sādhayati iti sādhakatama tvāt

original: atra ca karaṇabhāvanāntarīyakasya hetubhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānaṃ pramāṇaphalayostādātmyapratiṣedhārtham,
analyzed: atra ca karaṇa bhāva nāntarīyakasya hetu bhāvasya pañcamyāḥ abhidhānam pramāṇa phalayoḥ tādātmya pratiṣedha artham
bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt hetu phala bhāvasya
na khalu paraśuḥ eva chidā iti

original: pramāṇaprātipadikalabdhakaraṇatvānuvādaśca pramākārakāntarebhyo 'bhyarhitatvenāsya vyutpādyatvaṃ ca prāthamyaṃ ca yuktamiti darśayituṃ saṃplavamākṣipati--saṃplaveti
analyzed: pramāṇa prātipadika labdha karaṇa tva anuvādaḥ ca pramā kāraka antarebhyaḥ bhyarhita tvena asya vyutpādya tvam ca prāthamyam ca yuktam iti darśayitum saṃplavam ākṣipati saṃplava iti
samādhattena iti
ākṣepu vibhajate syāt matiḥ iti

original: viśiṣṭo bhinno viṣayo yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ bhinnaḥ viṣayaḥ yeṣām tāni tathā
bahuvacanam āntargaṇika bheda abhiprāyam
artha sāmarthya samuttham hi pratyakṣam artha gocaram
saḥ eva arthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ yaḥ jñāna pratibhāsam ātmanaḥ nvaya vyatirekau anukārayati
na ca sāmānyam nirasta samasta arthakriyā sāmarthyam evam bhavitum arhati
sva lakṣaṇam tu syāta
tat eva hi paramārtha sat
artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ
etat eva asya svam asādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam yat deśataḥ nanugamena adeśa ātmakasya paramāṇu tvam
kālataḥ ca kṣaṇika tvam
tasmāt sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam pratyakṣam
na ca sva lakṣaṇam anumānasya api gocaraḥ
tat hi gṛhīta pratibandha liṅga hetukam
tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ śakya grahaḥ iti sāmānya dharmau āśrayate
na ca sāmānyam ekam aneka deśa kāla avasthā saṃsargi bhavitum arhati

original: tadidamanādivāsanodbhūtavikalpadhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhyatvamanumānagācaro 'bhyupeyam /
analyzed: tat idam anādi vāsanā udbhūta vikalpa dhiṣṭhānam vikalpa ākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhya tvam anumāna gācaraḥ bhyupeyam
tat ca bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyāt ca bāhya sādṛśyat ca niyata pratibhāsa tvāt ca anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham
yat khalu bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇam
tad anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham eva yathā amūrta tvam

original: tad vijñānādau bhāve śaśaviṣāṇādau cābhāve sādhāraṇam /
analyzed: tat vijñāna ādau bhāve śaśaviṣāṇa ādau ca abhāve sādhāraṇam

original: bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaśca vikalpagocaro 'sti ghaṭo nāsti ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇaḥ ca vikalpa gocaraḥ sti ghaṭaḥ na asti ghaṭaḥ iti

original: yadi punarasādhāraṇo bhāvo bhaved astiśabdo na prayujyeta,
analyzed: yadi punar asādhāraṇaḥ bhāvaḥ bhavet astiśabdaḥ na prayujyeta
punarukta tvāt
na asti iti api na vaktavyam virodhāt
evam abhāva asādhāraṇye vācyam

original: na cālīkasya sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇaḥ paramārthasattā svalakṣaṇena sādṛśyaṃ manyate 'nyavyāvṛteḥ /
analyzed: na ca alīkasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ paramārtha sattā sva lakṣaṇena sādṛśyam manyate

original: na ca gauriti niyatau buddhivyapadeśau vināścādivyāvṛttim /
analyzed: na ca gauḥ iti niyatau buddhi vyapadeśau

original: tasmāt sāmānyamanyavyāvṛttirūpamabāhyaṃ bāhyabhedāgrahād bāhyatvenāvagāhyamānamanumānaṃ bāhyo pravartayati /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmānyam anya vyāvṛtti rūpam abāhyam bāhya bheda agrahāt bāhya tvena avagāhyamānam anumānam pravartayati

original: pāramparyeṇa ca bāhyapratibandhād bāhyaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakaṃ sad bhrāntamapi pramātrāśayavaśāt pramāṇam /
analyzed: pāramparyeṇa ca bāhya pratibandhāt bāhyam prāpayat saṃvādakam sat bhrāntam api pramātṛ āśaya vaśāt pramāṇam
tat asya na sva lakṣaṇam gocaraḥ
pratyakṣam apita na sāmānya gocaram iti āveditam
na ca ābhyām anyat pramāṇam asti
pramāṇasya sataḥ tra eva antarbhāvāt
anantarbhāve vā pramāṇa tva anupapattaḥ

original: na ca sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmanyadasti prameyāntaraṃ yatraite tat saṃploṣyete ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: na ca sāmānya viśeṣābhyām anyat asti prameya antaram yatra ete tat saṃploṣyete iti arthaḥ
samādhāna vākyam vivṛṇoti etat ca na iti

original: yathā caitat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate /
analyzed: yathā ca etat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate
sa ca vakra koṭara ādiḥ antyaḥ ca
vyavasthā saṅkara udāharaṇāni āha aindriya vat iti
saṃplavam amṛṣyamāṇaḥ āha adhigata tvāt iti
samādhattena anyathā iti
ākṣepam vivṛṇoti yadi iti
syāt etat

original: nāsti vaiyarthyamadhigatīnāmāśutaravināśitayā tadgocarādhigatyantarotpādaṃ prati pramāṇāntarasyārthavattvādityata āha--adhigataṃ cārthamadhigamayatā  #
analyzed: na asti vaiyarthyam adhigatīnām āśutara vināśi tayā tad gocara adhigati antara utpādam prati pramāṇa antarasya arthavat tvāt iti atas āha adhigatam ca artham adhigamayatā
pramāṇena iti
yadi api adhigatayaḥ āśutara vināśinyaḥ
tathā api ekatara pramāṇa janita artha adhiga libdha janmanaḥ saṃskārāt eva sthāyinaḥ tad artha smṛti santati saṃbhāvāt adhigam artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena
piṣṭam piṣṭam syāt iti
samādhi vākyam vivarītum anuvadati na anyathā iti
vivṛṇoti na brūmaḥ iti
ayam abhisandhi
na hi pramāṇa kāraṇāni prekṣāvantiḥ
yena evam ālocayeyuḥ janitam eva pramāṇam anyam enā asmāsu
vayam iha udāsmahe iti

original: nāpi svakāraṇabalalabdhajanmāni pramāṇāni dirśito 'yamartho 'nyatamena cāsmāsu pramāṇena,
analyzed: nā api sva kāraṇa bala labdha janmāni pramāṇāni dirśitaḥ yam arthaḥ nyatamena ca asmāsu pramāṇena
kṛtam asmābhiḥ iti virantum arhanti
pramātuḥ cetana tvāt ayam ana yogaḥ iti ced na
priyatamasya vastunaḥ nena bhūyaḥ bhūyaḥ pramitsita tvāt
a pramitsitasya api ca durjana vacana ādeḥ prameyasya anena pramīyamāṇa tvāt
tasmāt na pramātṛ abhisandhānāt pramāṇasya pravṛttiḥ apravṛttiḥ vā arthe
kim tu
anyathā agni dāha ādi duḥkhasya apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: cattu pramāṇaṃ pramitsādhīnapravṛtti tadyadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kimāyātaṃ pramāṇasya?
analyzed: pramāṇam pramitsā adhīna pravṛtti tat yadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kim āyātam pramāṇasya

original: na hi toyamapi pipāsunā na pīyata iti tasya pipāsopaśamanaśaktirapīti /
analyzed: na hi toyam api pipāsunā na pīyate iti tasya pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ api iti
tasmāt pratyutpanna kāraṇa sāmagrī janitā buddhiḥ pramā
tad janakāni ca pramāṇāni samāna viṣayāṇi api

original: sa eva cānena sāmagrībhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇetyādinā /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca anena sāmagrī bhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇa ityādinā
yadi api sākṣātkāra asākṣātkāra ādiḥ api prakāra bhedaḥ sti
tathā api asau prakṛta anupayogāt na uktaḥ

original: yadi ca dravyaṃ tvacā gṛhītamiti kṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā,
analyzed: yadi ca dravyam tvacā gṛhītam iti kṛtam cakṣuṣā
cakṣuṣā vā gṛhītam iti kṛtam tvacā iti ucyeta
na rūpa vijñānam vā sparśa vijñānam vā upajāyeta
tad artham cakṣuḥ vā tvac vāmī upetavyam

original: tathā ca saṃplavavaiyarthye 'pi vyavasthāyāṃ na vaiyarthyamityāha--viṣayāntara iti /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃplava vaiyarthye vyavasthāyām na vaiyarthyam iti āha viṣaya antare iti
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
vibhakti artham nirūpya prātipadika artha nirūpaṇam avatārayati pramāṇa iti
atra ca avadhāryate nena iti avadhāraṇam vicāraḥ iti
vicāraṇāya bhāva bhavitārau pṛcchati kim punar iti
kecid āhuḥ anadhigata artha gantṛ pramāṇam iti
viṣaya sārūpyam sa ākārasya vijñānasya iti ante
vijñānasya eva an ākārasya ātmānām aprakāśana sāmarthyam iti apare
upalabdhi sādhanam iti vṛddhāḥ
tasmāt viprapitteḥ saṃśayāt praśrnaḥ
bhāva praśrna vyākhyānena bhavitṛśnaḥ
uttaram upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam
na ca saṃśaya viparyāsa rūpa upalabdhi kāraṇayoḥ prasagḍaḥ
arthavat iti adhikārat
tayoḥ śvepa darśita artha vyabhicāreṇa anarthavat tvāt
no khalu vikalpayamānam vastu asti
arthakriyāsu vā upayujyate
syāt etat
smṛti hetoḥ api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ
na hi asau na upalabdhi hetuḥ
na ca artha sahakāri pramāṇam iti saṃskārasya artha sahakāri tā virahāt aprāmāṇyam iti sāṃpratam
nadī pūrasya pipīlika aṇḍa saṃcaraṇasya ca atīta anāgata varṣa liṅgasya
śabdasya atīta anāgata gocarasya artha sahakāri tā virahiṇaḥ ca pramāṇa tva prasaṅgāt

original: jñāpakatvena kāryatvena vā kathañcidarthasaṃbandhe saṃskārasyāpi tat samānamiti tasyāpi smṛtirūpopalabdhihetoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prasaktam /
analyzed: jñāpaka tvena kārya tvena vā kathañcid artha saṃbandhe saṃskārasya api tat samānam iti tasya api smṛti rūpa upalabdhi hetoḥ prāmāṇyam prasaktam
mā evam pramāṇa śabdena tasya apāsta tvāt

original: pramāsādhanaṃ hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā /
analyzed: pramā sādhanam hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā
loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ hi śabda artha sabandhaḥ
lokaḥ ca saṃskāra mātra janmanaḥ smṛteḥ anyām upalabdhim artha avyabhicāriṇīm pramām ācaṣṭe

original: tasmāt taddhetuḥ pramāṇamiti na smṛtihetau prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad hetuḥ pramāṇam iti na smṛti hetau prasaṅgaḥ

original: anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ca dhārāvāhikavijñānānāmadhigatārthagocarāṇāṃ lokaprasiddhapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pramāṇyaṃ vihantīti nādriyamahe /
analyzed: anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca dhārāvāhika vijñānānām adhigata artha gocarāṇām loka prasiddha pramāṇa bhāvānām pramāṇyam vihanti iti na ādriyamahe
na ca kāla bhedena anadhiga gocara tvam dhārāvāhikānām iti yuktam
parama sūkṣmāṇām kāla kalā bhedānām piśita locanaiḥ asmādṛśaiḥ an ākalanāt

original: na cādyenaiva vijñānenopadarśitatvādarthasya pravartitatvāt puruṣasya prāptitvāccottateṣām,
analyzed: na ca ādyena eva vijñānena upadarśita tvāt arthasya pravartita tvāt puruṣasya prāpti tvāt ca uttateṣām
a prāmāṇyam ameva vijñānānām iti
na hi vijñānasya artha prāpaṇam pravartanāt anyat
na ca pravartanam api artha pradarśanāt anyat
tasmāt artha pradarśana mātra vyāpāram eva jñānam pravartakam prāpakam ca

original: pradarśana ca pūrvavaduttareṣāṃ vijñānāmabhinnamiti kathaṃ pūrvameva vijñānaṃ pramāṇa nottarāṇyapi?
analyzed: ca pūrvavat uttareṣām vijñānām abhinnam iti katham pūrvam eva vijñānam na uttarāṇi api
puruṣa apekṣayā tu prāmāṇye candra tārakā ādi vijñānasya puruṣa an apekṣitasya aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ

original: na cātidavīstayā tadarthasya heyatayā tadapi puruṣasyāpekṣitam,
analyzed: na ca ati davīḥ tayā tad arthasya heya tayā tat api puruṣasya apekṣitam
tasya upekṣaṇīya artha viṣaya tvāt
na ca upekṣaṇīyam api anupādeya tvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate

original: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
analyzed: upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātma anātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti
upalabdhi mātra sya tvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate

original: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
analyzed: upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātma anātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti
upalabdhi mātrasya artha avyabhicāriṇaḥ smṛteḥ anyasya pramā śabdena abhidhānāt
hetu grahaṇena sārūpya śaktyoḥ phalāt abhinnayoḥ apākaraṇāt hetu hetumat bhāvasya tādātmaye nupapatteḥ iti
upalabdhi hetu tve ca pramāṇa tvam
bhavitṛ vyākhyānena bhāvaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
tat evam jñānam ajñānam vā upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti sthitam
tat etat ativyāpaka tvena ākṣipati samāna tvāt iti
samādhatte ayam viśeṣaḥ iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: sarvaḥ karttā karaṇagocaravyāpāro na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate /
analyzed: sarvaḥ karttā karaṇa gocara vyāpāraḥ na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate
karaṇam ca dvidhā siddham a siddham ca

original: tatra siddhaṃ paraśvādi dārūdvaidhībhāvāyodyamyodyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinattītyucyate /
analyzed: tatra siddham paraśu ādi dārū dvaidhībhāvāya udyamya udyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū chinatti iti ucyate
na tu sākṣāt kartṛ vyāpāra gocaraḥ dārū dvaidhībhāvaḥ

original: kiṃ tu sparśavadvegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasyodyamananipātanalakṣaṇastu kartṛvyāpāraḥ paraśugocara eva /
analyzed: kim tu sparśavat vegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasya udyamana nipātana lakṣaṇaḥ tu kartṛ vyāpāraḥ paraśu gocaraḥ eva

original: evaṃ svargakāmo 'pi kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate,
analyzed: evam svarga kāmaḥ api kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate
kim tu tat karaṇam yāgam asiddham sādhayati
svargaḥ tu yāga vyāpārāt eva apūrva abhidhānāt cetanā āśrayāt deśa kāla avasthā bheda āsādita pariṇati viśeṣāt sākṣāt utpadyate
tadvat iha api pramātā siddham indriya ādi

original: asiddhaṃ ca tatsannikarṣādi vyāpārayannutpādayan vā karaṇa eva caritārthaḥ /
analyzed: asiddham ca tad sannikarṣa ādi vyāpārayan utpādayan vā karaṇe eva caritārthaḥ

original: karaṇaṃ tvindriyādi tatsannikarṣādi vā nānyatra cāritārthamiti sākṣādupalabdhāveva phale vyāpriyate /
analyzed: karaṇam tu indriya ādi tad sannikarṣa ādi vā na anyatra cāritārtham iti sākṣāt upalabdhau eva phale vyāpriyate
prameyasya tu pratyakṣāt anyatra upalabdhi hetu bhāvaḥ eva tāvat na asti
tatra api indriya saṃbandha mātre upayujyate prameyam

original: indriyameva tu tattatsannikarṣādi vā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ /
analyzed: indriyam eva tu tat tat sannikarṣa ādi vā sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ

original: tataḥ siddhametat na pramātā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ kartṛtvāt /
analyzed: tatas siddham etat na pramātā sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ kartṛ tvāt

original: yo yaḥ kartā sa sarvo na sākṣāt phalahetuḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ kartā sa sarvaḥ na sākṣāt phala hetuḥ
yathā vraścana yajamāna ādiḥ
tathā ca ayam
tasmāt tathā

original: tathā pratyakṣaṃ prameyaṃ na sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ,
analyzed: tathā pratyakṣam prameyam na sākṣāt pramā hetuḥ
prameya tvāt

original: yad yat prameyaṃ vattat sarvaṃ na pramāheturanumeyādivat /
analyzed: yat yat prameyam vat tat sarvam na pramā hetuḥ anumeya ādi vat
tathā ca etat
tasmāt tathā iti

original: tadidaṃ pramātṛprameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārthatvamacaritārthatvaṃ ca pramāṇasya,
analyzed: tat idam pramātṛ prameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārtha tvam acaritārtha tvam ca pramāṇasya
tasmāt tat eva phala hetuḥ

original: pramātṛprameye tu phaloddeśena pravṛtte iti taddhetū kathañciditi /
analyzed: pramātṛ prameye tu phala uddeśena pravṛtte iti tad hetū kathañcid iti
codayati a karaṇa iti
na akaraṇaḥ kartā pramāṇam api vyāptum arhati iti arthaḥ
pariharati na
indriya artha iti

original: yadā jñānaṃ pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasyotvattāvityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yadā jñānam pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasya utpattau iti arthaḥ
punar codayati yadi tarhāti
pariharati tasmin api iti
codayati yadi pramātṛ prameyābhyām sadbhyām pramāṇam iti
pramāṇam antareṇa pramāyāḥ abhāvāt pramātṛ prameyayoḥ asiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
pṛcchati katham iti
uttaram pramāṇam iti iti
artha svarūpa mātram eva kārakam kasmāt na bhavati
tat ca kriyā saṃbaddhasya purastāt api asti iti atas
āha na ca dravya mātram iti

original: astu tarhi tadīyo 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ kārakam,
analyzed: astu tarhi tadīyaḥ vāntara vyāpāraḥ pradhāna kriyāyām sādhyāyām kārakam

original: tasyāpi pradhānakriyāyāṃ nimittatvādityata āha--na ca kriyāmātramiti /
analyzed: tasya api pradhāna kriyāyām nimitta tvāt iti atas āha na ca kriyā mātram iti
na hi sva rūpeṇa devadattaḥ vraścanaḥ
nā api tadīyaḥ vyāpāraḥ udyamana nipātana ādiḥ loṣṭha ādi āśrarūḥ

original: kva tarhi kārakaśabdaḥ pravartata ityata āha--kārakaśabdo hīti /
analyzed: kva tarhi kāraka śabdaḥ pravartate iti atas āha kāraka śabdaḥ hi iti
pradhāna kriyā sādhane hetau avāntara kriyā viśeṣa yukte kāraka śabdaḥ pravartate

original: dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhānavyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇagocara udyamananipātanādiḥ avāntaravyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhāna vyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇa gocaraḥ udyamana nipātana ādiḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ
karmaṇaḥ ca dārūṇaḥ sparśavat vegavat tīkṣṇatara kuṭhāra sayogaḥ eva avāntaravyāpātaḥ
tena hi dārū sva avayava parispanda labdha janmanaḥ vayava vibhāgāt dvaidhībhāvam anubhavati

original: tasmādavāntarapradhānavyāpārasaṃpannaṃ kārakamiti sāmānyataḥ prasādhya prakṛte yojayati--pramātṛprameyaśabdau ceti /
analyzed: tasmāt avāntara pradhāna vyāpāra saṃpannam kārakam iti sāmānyatas prasādhya prakṛte yojayati pramātṛ prameya śabdau ca iti
kriyām pradhāna kriyām iti arthaḥ
pariharati na
pācaka ādi śabda vat iti
loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ khalu ayam śabda artha saṃbandhaḥ
lokaḥ ca atīta anāgata vartamāna kriyā saṃbandha mātra vivakṣayā kāraka śabdān prayuṅkte
pācakam ānaya pakṣyati iti ca
pācakaḥ yam apākṣīt iti ca
pācakaḥ yam pacati iti ca tulya vat traikālya viṣaya prayoga darśanam

original: tat kasya hetorapacatyapi pākasaṃbandhaṃ pratyasti svarūpśaktirdevadattādāviti?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ a pacati api pāka saṃbandham prati asti sva rūpa śaktiḥ devadatta ādau iti

original: dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇāṃ kāryopajananaṃ prati svarūpaṃ ca sahakārigrāmasamavadhānaṃ ca /
analyzed: dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇām kārya upajananam prati sva rūpam ca sahakāri grāma samavadhānam ca
tatra asati api sahakāri grāma samavadhāne kāraka śabdānām pravṛtteḥ

original: satyapi ca svarūpe trekālyavyāpini trekālyayogikāryāsaṃbhave 'pravṛtteḥ traikālyayogikāryopahitamaryādameva svarūpaṃ kārakaśabdānāṃ pravṛtau  #
analyzed: sati api ca sva rūpe trekālya vyāpini trekālya yogi kārya asaṃbhave pravṛtteḥ traikālya yogi kārya upahita maryādam eva sva rūpam kāraka śabdānām pravṛtau
nimittam iti

original: asatyapi pratyutpannapramāhetupramāṇasaṃbandhe pramātṛprameyaśabdayoḥ pravṛttiriti upapannaṃ pramātṛprameyābhyāṃ pramāṇa janyata iti /
analyzed: asati api pratyutpanna pramā hetu pramāṇa saṃbandhe pramātṛ prameya śabdayoḥ pravṛttiḥ iti upapannam pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇa janyate iti
tat pramāṇam upalabdhi sādhanam sākṣāt
na pramātṛ prameye iti siddham
sati api ca upalabdhi sādhana tve pramātṛ prameyayoḥ ūpabdhi hetuḥ iti atra aprasaṅga

original: sādhākatamāsādhakatamayoḥ sādhakatame kāryasaṃpratyayāt sātiśayatvenodbhūtattvāt tasyetyāha--sādhakatamatvād veti /
analyzed: sādhākatama asādhakatamayoḥ sādhakatame kārya saṃpratyayāt sātiśaya tvena udbhūta ttvāt tasya iti āha sādhakatama tvāt vā iti
sādhakatama artham pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti

original: uttaram--pramāṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvattā bhāvābhāvavattā sādhakatamārthaḥ /
analyzed: uttaram pramāṇasya bhāva abhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvat tā bhāva abhāvavat tā sādhakatama arthaḥ

original: na tu pramātṛprameyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānamapyasti pramāyā anvayavyatirekayorityata āha--na pramātarīti /
analyzed: na tu pramātṛ prameya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam api asti pramāyāḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ iti atas āha na pramātari iti
pramātṛ prameyābhyām saha pramā utpādasya anya yoga vyavacchedena saṃbandhaḥ
pramāṇena tu saṃbandhaḥ pramā utpādasya ayoga anya yoga vyavacchedābhyām iti atiśayaḥ pramāṇasya

original: pramātṛprameye hi pramāṇopakṣīṇavṛttinī na pramāyāṃ vyāpriyete /
analyzed: pramātṛ prameye hi pramāṇa upakṣīṇa vṛttinī na pramāyām vyāpriyete
tena antarāya saṃbhavan na avaśyam pramātṛ prameya vyāpāre sati pramā bhavati

original: pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavatyeveti kalpāntaramāha- yadvān vā pramimīte so 'tiśayaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavati eva iti kalpa antaram āha yadvān vā pramimīte saḥ u tiśayaḥ

original: pramimīta iti svatantraṃ kartāraṃ daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇād vyavacchettum /
analyzed: pramimīte iti svatantram kartāram daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇāt vyavacchettum
yadvā an eva iti ca sa avadhāraṇām
tatra yadvān iti kartṛ antaram vyavacchinatti
na hi kartā kartṛmān
kim tu pramāṇavān
svatantraḥ hi āśrayaḥ paratantreṇa āśrīyate
kartṛ adhīnam hi karaṇam iti āveditam

original: pramātā prameyavānapi kvacid bhavet tattantratvāt prameyasya /
analyzed: pramātā prameyavān api kvacid bhavet tad tantra tvāt prameyasya
na tu prameyavān eva
anumāna ādiṣu prameyasya atīta tva ādinā tadvat tā vihāt
na tu liṅga ādi jñānavān na kadācid iti avadhāraṇa phalam
saḥ yam viśeṣaḥ pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇasya
asya eva ca viśeṣasya atiśaya tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati pramāṇe sati iti
kalpa antarakā āha sa tārva iti
pūrveṇa bhāva pradhānā atiśayaḥ yādṛśasya darśitaḥ
tādṛśasya eva iha vyatireka pradhāna u tiśayaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ
akartṛ tvam ahetu tvam iti arthaḥ
kalpa antaram āha saṃyoga vat carama bhāvitā vā
sa itikartavya tākam hi vyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam
na tu cakṣuḥ ādi svarūpam
karaṇa ādi śabda pravṛtti nimitta mātram tu svarūpam syāt iti pūrvam āveditam

original: tacca siddhamasiddha vā pramātṛprameyavyāpārasya paścādeva tathātvena saṃpadyata iti caramabhāvītyucyate /
analyzed: tat ca siddham asiddha vā pramātṛ prameya vyāpārasya paścāt eva tathātvena saṃpadyate iti carama bhāvi iti ucyate
saḥ yamasya carama bhāvita atiśayaḥ

original: tathā tantūnāṃ paṭe janayitavye 'ntyāḥ saṃyogabhedā yadanantaraṃ paṭa utpadyata eveti /
analyzed: tathā tantūnām paṭe janayitavye ntyāḥ saṃyoga bhedāḥ yat anantaram paṭaḥ utpadyate eva iti
kalpa antaram āha prapipatteḥ ānantarya vā
yatas eva pramāṇam carama bhāvi

original: ata eva tadanantaraṃ pratipatteḥ pramāyā bhāvāt /
analyzed: atas eva tad anantaram pratipatteḥ pramāyāḥ bhāvāt
pratipatteḥ ānarnyam eva pramāṇasya atiśayaḥ
sa ca iti
caḥ va dhāraṇe
idam api lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā uktam
kalpa antaram āha asādhāraṇa kāraṇatā vā
catastraḥ khalu imāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramiyaḥ bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa bhājaḥ nubhūyante
na ca pramātā tad bheda hetuḥ
sya sādhāraṇyāt

original: na ca prameyamekasyāpi prameyasya saṃplave sarvapratipattisādhāraṇyāt /
analyzed: na ca prameyam ekasya api prameyasya saṃplave sarva pratipatti sādhāraṇyāt

original: pramāṇāni tu yathāyathaṃ catasṛṣvapi pramitiṣvasādhāraṇānīti bhinnabuddhivyapadeśanibandhanāni /
analyzed: pramāṇāni tu yathāyatham catasṛṣu api pramitiṣu asādhāraṇāni iti bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa nibandhanāni
tat idam asādhāraṇyam atiśayaḥ
aśeṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pramātā atra vivakṣitaḥ
kalpa antaram āha pramā kāraṇa iti
pramāyāḥ asamavāyi kāraṇa khalu ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ
sa ca sarva pramāsaḥ dhāraṇaḥ

original: nāsau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyo viśeṣṭum,
analyzed: na asau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyaḥ viśeṣṭum
tayoḥ api tadvat eva sādhāraṇyāt
asādhāraṇam tu pramāṇam yathāyatham ātma manaḥ saṃyogam avacchinatti

original: eve sukhādiprameyāṇāmapi mana evāsādhāraṇaṃ vyavacchedaṅka draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: sukha ādi prameyāṇām api manaḥ eva asādhāraṇam draṣṭavyam
saḥ yamasya atiśayaḥ
atiśaya atiśayinoḥ abheda vivakṣayā atiśaya śabda vācyam iti uktam
krama prāptam artha grahaṇam tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe artha grahaṇam iti

original: kasmāt punarniṣidhyate pramāṇaviṣayā pratipattirityata āha--yato na pramāṇaviṣayeti /
analyzed: kasmāt punar niṣidhyate pramāṇa viṣayā pratipattiḥ iti atas āha yatas na pramāṇa viṣayā iti
itikartavyatā anuṣṭhānam tasmin
arthyataḥ iti arthaḥ
toya kaṇṭaka ādiḥ
tasya
tat ca sukha duḥkha sādhanatvam
sukha sādhanam khalu upādeya tvena duḥkha sādhanam ca heya tvena ārthye
tātparya antaram āha aupekṣaṇīya iti
upekṣaṇīya viṣaye pramāṇe pravṛtti sāmarthyam na asti iti tat pratiṣadhyate
na ca tat apramāṇam iti
tasya api dṛṣṭa pramāṇa sādharmyeṇa liṅgena prāmāṇya anumānāt iti
codayati pramāṇa āgahaṇam iti

original: samarthapravṛttijanikā hi pratipattirnāpramāṇādbhāvatītyarthādeva pramāṇāditi gamyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: samartha pravṛtti janikā hi pratipattiḥ na apramāṇāt bhāvati iti arthāt eva pramāṇāt iti gamyate iti arthaḥ
pariharati na pramāṇa viśeṣa jñāpana artha tvāt
ayam abhisandhiḥ
pravṛtti sāmarthyena hi kāryeṇa pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumātavyam
na ca etat sākṣāt pramāṇasya kāryam
kim tu artha pratipatteḥ
tad anantaram hi samarthā pratipattiḥ ūpajāyate

original: arthapratipattistu pramāṇakāryeti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇakāryā satī pramāṇasyārthavattvamanumāpayati /
analyzed: artha pratipattiḥ tu pramāṇa kāryā iti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇa kāryā satī pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumāpayati
tasmāt artha gamyam api pramāṇam artha pratipatti karaṇa tvena dyotanīyam

original: anyathā pramāṇamarthavadarthapratipatteḥ masarthapravṛttijanakatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatam?
analyzed: anyathā pramāṇam arthavat artha pratipatteḥ masartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt iti kim kena saṃgatam
tasya jñāpanam

original: sa evārtho yasya pramāṇagrahaṇasya tat tathoktam /
analyzed: saḥ eva arthaḥ yasya pramāṇa grahaṇasya tat tathā uktam
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam

original: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--pramāṇakāryāyā arthaprapitteḥ pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ na tadābhāsakāryāyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt etat uktam bhavati pramāṇa kāryāyāḥ artha prapitteḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam na tad ābhāsa kāryāyāḥ
tasmāt pramāṇasya arthavat tvam gamyate iti

original: tadidamuktam--tad yeha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ pratipādayati pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat idam uktam tat yā iha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛtti sāmarthyam pratipādayati pramāṇam
ayam arthaḥ
pramāṇa kartṛ

original: pravṛttisamārthyaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ prāpnuvattat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇakāryārthapratipattiriti /
analyzed: pravṛtti samārthyam pratipadyamānam prāpnuvat tat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇa kārya artha pratipattiḥ iti

original: idamapi pramāṇagrahaṇasya prayojanamityāha-- na ca pramāṇagrahaṇamiti /
analyzed: idam api pramāṇa grahaṇasya prayojanam iti āha na ca pramāṇa grahaṇam iti
eka deśi vyākhyānam upanyasyati sukha iti
na kevalam sukha duḥkha hetu tvāt arthyamāna tvāt jñāyamāna tvāt ca
dūṣayati na iti

original: sarvasya sukhaduḥkhataddhetutvena heyapakṣanikṣepāt upādeyānāṃ pramāṇaśāstrāpavargāṇānāmabhāvaprasaṅgād vyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya sukha duḥkha tad hetu tvena heya pakṣa nikṣepāt upādeyānām pramāṇa śāstra apavarga āṇānām abhāva prasaṅgāt vyāghātaḥ
avivakṣita tvāt ca iti
caśabda samuccitam aśakya hāna tvam hetu antaram ādarśayati na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam iti
sukha daḥkha tad hetavaḥ hi heyāḥ sane hāna upāyam apekṣante
na ca pramāṇa ādeḥ anyaḥ tad upāyaḥ saṃbhavati
na ca pramāṇa ādiḥ sva ucchedāya paryāptaḥ
na ca asmāt apavargaḥ na adhigamyate
tasmāt na śakyam pramāṇa ādinā pramāṇa dihānam iti

original: na caitanniḥśreyasahetuṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tadanuvartino vā bhāṣyakārasya vivikṣitamityāha--na ca pramāṇādihānaṃ vivakṣitam /
analyzed: na ca etat niḥśreyasa hetum śāstram praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tad anuvartinaḥ vā bhāṣyakārasya vivikṣitam iti āha na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam vivakṣitam
tasmāt asmad vacā ākhyānam eva śobhanam iti āha kim tu iti
pravṛtti sāmarthya ādhāna yogya vamam adhikāraḥ
tasmāt sukha duḥkha tad hetu rūpa artha pratipattiḥ eva hi samarthām pravṛttim ādhatte
na tu artha mātrā pratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ vyāghātāśakyahānāvivakṣitatvairarthapadena na sarvasaṃgraho 'śakyatvādapi na sarvasaṃgraha ityāha--na saṃvida iti /
analyzed: na kevalam vyāghāta aśakya hāna avivakṣita tvaiḥ artha padena na śakya tvāt api na sarva saṃgrahaḥ iti āha na saṃvidaḥ iti

original: sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā na saṃvido grahaṇaṃ saṃgrahaḥ sarvamadhyapatitāyā api /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha tad hetu tayā na saṃvidaḥ grahaṇam saṃgrahaḥ sarva madhya pati tāyāḥ api
kutas anadhikārāt
sukha duḥkha tad hetu yogyatā virahāt
na api arthyamāna tvena saṃgrahaḥ iti āha akarma tvāt ca

original: na tāvat sarvā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvidgocarā manoyonayaḥ,
analyzed: na tāvat sarvāḥ eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvid gocarāḥ manaḥ yonayaḥ
saṃvedyāḥ bhavitum arhanti
eka nīla viṣaya saṃvid paramparā mātraḥ eva puruṣa āyuṣa sahasra paryavasānāt
viṣaya antara saṃcāra abhāva prasaṅgāt ca
tasmāt anavasthā bhayāt ante kasyāścid saṃvidaḥ saṃvedya tayā phala mātra tvam abhyupeyam
tathā ca sā na arthyate

original: na ca sukhaduḥkhe tatreturiti na sarvasaṃgrahaḥ saṃvido 'saṃgrahādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sukha duḥkhe tatra ituḥ iti na sarva saṃgrahaḥ saṃvidaḥ saṃgrahāt iti arthaḥ

original: tadevamādivākya vyākhyāya bhāṣyavākyāntaramavatārya tatraikaderśivyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati--so 'yaṃ pramāṇārtha iti /
analyzed: tat evam ādi vākya vyākhyāya bhāṣya vākya antaram avatārya tatra ekaderśi vyākhyānam dūṣayitum upanyasyati saḥ yam pramāṇa arthaḥ iti
dūṣayatinā ubhayasya api parisaṃkhyāta tvāt
arthaḥ tu sukham ityādinā bhāṣya granthena
kārya kāraṇābhyām ubhaya tvam

original: prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāditivanna pratijñārthena saṅgacchate ityāha--prāṇabhṛdbhedasya  #
analyzed: prāṇabhṛt bhedasya aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt iti ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti vat na pratijñā arthena saṅgacchate iti āha prāṇabhṛt bhedasya
ca iti
tat etat ekadeśi mata dūṣaṇam asmin vyākhyāne na asti iti āha na artha śabdasya iti
candra nādi viṣayam pramāṇam sukha prayojanam eva

original: kaṇṭakādiviṣayaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ duḥkhotpādaprayojanamevetyetadubhayaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ niyantumaśakyamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭaka ādi viṣayam ca pramāṇam duḥkha utpāda prayojanam eva iti etat ubhayam parisaṃkhyātum niyantum aśakyam iti arthaḥ
evam kila atra śaṅkyate
sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ vastūnām svābhāvikaḥ bhavet na vā

original: svābhāvikatve nīla iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukha iti karabhavanmanuṣyāṇāmapi kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: svābhāvika tve nīlaḥ iva sarvān prati arthaḥ sukhaḥ iti kara bhavat manuṣyāṇām api kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt
evam kuṅkumam sukham syāt
candanam ca sukham bhavet

original: evaṃ tṛṣṇaja ivāpāṃ suhitasyāpaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran /
analyzed: evam tṛṣṇajaḥ iva apām su hitasya āpaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran
asvābhāvika tve tu anādi vāsanā vaicitrya labdha janma puruṣa dharma kalpanā anupātinaḥ sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ na pramāṇa prayojanam bhavitum arhanti iti
tatra idam upatiṣṭhate saḥ yam pramāṇa arthaḥ iti

original: nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇabhaṅgādhikāre tathā sthemabhājāmapi vastunāmakramāṇāmapi kramavatsahakārikāraṇasamavadhānavaśādupajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ kramavanto  #
analyzed: nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇabhaṅga adhikāre tathā sthema bhājām api vastunām akramāṇām api kramavat sahakāri kāraṇa samavadhāna vaśāt upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ kramavantaḥ
dharmāḥ bhavanti iti tat iha api

original: yadyapi na jātyā sukhaduḥkhahetubhāvo bhāvanāṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yadi api na jātyā sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ bhāvanām bhavati
tathā api jāti deśa kāla avasthā puruṣa bheda sahakāri samavadhānāt upapatsyate sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ vyavasthayā iti bhāvaḥ
tat siddham etat
pramāṇa arthaḥ niyataḥ
aniyata prāṇabhṛt bheda hetuka tvāt
yat yat aniyata kāraṇakam kāryam tat tu asarvam aniyatam eva
yathā aniyata kāla megha udaya nibandhanam varṣam
tathā ca ayam
tasmāt aniyataḥ iti

original: kasmāt punaḥ pramātrādicaturvarge pramāṇasyaivārthavattvamucceta na pramātrādīnāmapītyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
analyzed: kasmāt punar pramātṛ ādi catur varge pramāṇasya eva arthavat tvam ucceta na pramātṛ ādīnām api iti āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham

original: bhāṣyamanuvadanneva vyācaṣṭe-- arthavati ca samarthe samyagarthe 'rthāvyabhicāriṇīti yāvat /
analyzed: bhāṣyam anuvadan eva vyācaṣṭe arthavati ca samarthe samyak arthe rtha avyabhicāriṇi iti yāvat
pramāṇe rthavanti bhavan simarthāni samyak arthāni pramātṛ ādīni

original: arthasya tu samyaktvamidameva yad yādṛśaḥ pramāṇenopadarśistasya tathātvaṃ na punaranyathābhāva iti /
analyzed: arthasya tu samyaktvam idam eva yat yādṛśaḥ pramāṇena upadarśiḥ tasya tathātvam na punar anyathābhāvaḥ iti
yadā tu ādi bhāṣya vākye rtha śabdaḥ prayojana vacanaḥ

original: tadaivaṃ vyākhyānam-- arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yataḥ samarthaṃ śaktaṃ pramāṇa pratipattyādikrameṇa pūrvoktena prayojanaṃ prati,
analyzed: tadā evam vyākhyānam arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yatas samartham śaktam pramāṇa pratipatti ādi krameṇa pūrva uktena prayojanam prati

original: ataḥ samarthe pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti,
analyzed: atas samarthe pramāṇe pramātṛ ādīni arthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti

original: yatastānyapi pramāṇavadeva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanaṃ pratīti,
analyzed: yatas tāni api pramāṇa vat eva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanam prati iti
atra ha itas anyatama apāye iti
tasya artham vyācaṣṭe anyatama tva arthaḥ iti
nanu anyatama śabdaḥ bahuṣu a nirdhānita viśeṣam ekam āha
na tu sādhakatamam iti atas āha pramāraṇāt iti
sādhāraṇa śabdaḥ hi pramaraṇāt viśeṣe vartate

original: tad yathā śivikāvahanapakrame puruṣamānayeti puruṣaśabdo viṣṭau /
analyzed: tat yathā śivikā vahana apakrame puruṣam ānaya iti puruṣa śabdaḥ viṣṭau

original: tadvadihāpi pramātrādiparihāṇyā pramāṇasyārthavattvābhidhānaniyamaprakrama iti pramātrādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣo vācya iti tatraivānyatamaśabdo  #
analyzed: tadvat iha api pramātṛ ādi parihāṇyā pramāṇasya arthavat tva abhidhāna niyama prakramaḥ iti pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ vācyaḥ iti tatra eva anyatama śabdaḥ
vartate
yadi api artha pratipatti artha avyabhicāra dvāreṇa pramāṇasya avyabhicāraḥ gamyate dṛṣṭe viṣaye

original: tathāpyadṛṣṭe viṣaye na tajjanitaprapittayavyabhicāreṇāvyabhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyo vijñātum,
analyzed: tathā api adṛṣṭe viṣaye na tad janita prapittaya vyabhicāreṇa avyabhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyaḥ vijñātum
pratīya vyabhicārasya pramāṇa avyabhicāra grahaṇam anreṇa aśakya jñāna vat
tasmāt dṛṣṭa arthasya mantra āyurvedasya pravṛtti sāmarthya avadhṛta artha avyabhicārasya sādharmyāt āpta praṇī tvāt agnihotra ādi vākyānām
pramāṇānām avyabhicāra grahaṇa puraḥsaram eva trivargasya avyabhicāra grahaṇam
na punar atra trivargasya avyabhicāraḥ śakyaḥ nyatas paricchettum

original: adṛṣṭārthaviṣayasya ca caturvargasyehārthavattvena prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭārthe sandehādapi vyavahāra siddheḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa artha viṣayasya ca catur vargasya iha arthavat tvena prayojanam dṛṣṭa arthe sandehāt api vyavahāra siddheḥ
tat idam caturvarge pramāṇasya prādhānyam iti
catur varga vibhāga pare bhāṣye pramātā prathamam darśitaḥ
tatas tasya lakṣaṇam āha pramātā svatantraḥ iti
svātantryam pṛcchati kim punar svātantryam
yasya abhisaṃbandhāt su antraḥ iti
bhāṣyakṛtā pramātā upalakṣitaḥ na lakṣitaḥ

original: na khalvīpsājihāsayorvā pravṛttau vā svāntryaṃ pramātṛtvam,
analyzed: na khalu īpsā jihāsayoḥ vā pravṛttau vā svāntryam pramātṛ tvam
api tu pramāyārm

original: ipsādisvātantryeṇa tu taduttarakālabhāvinā pramāyāṃ svātantryaṃ parvakālābhāvyupalakṣim /
analyzed: ipsā ādi svātantryeṇa tu tad uttara kāla bhāvinā pramāyām svātantryam parva kāla abhāvi upalakṣim
tena tad carim anuvartamānaḥ vārtika kṛt upalakṣaṇa antaram kartṛ tva uttara kāla bhāvya aha kāraka phala upabhoktṛ tvam

original: na hi sarvaḥ kartā samastakārakajanyaṃ svargādi vaudanādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvikpācakādiṣu ca vyabhicāradarśanāt /
analyzed: na hi sarvaḥ kartā samasta kāraka janyam svarga ādi vā odana ādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvij pācaka ādiṣu ca vyabhicāra darśanāt

original: kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛtvottarakālabhāvinī phalopabhoktṛtā kartṛvanāntarīyakatayā dupalakṣayati,
analyzed: kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛ tva uttara kāla bhāvinī phala upabhoktṛ tā kartṛ vanāntarīyaka tayā dupalakṣayati
yajamānasya rājñaḥ ca praiṣa ādinā tad tad vayāpāre kartṛ tvāt
yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ

original: tadabhisandhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ va yuktaṃ tasarvaṃ pacyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhisandhi pūrvakam preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam yuktam paci arthaḥ
iti
svātantrya lakṣaṇam āha tad samavāyaḥ vā

original: kārakābhidhānena sannidhāpitāṃ kriyaṃ taditi sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati /
analyzed: kāraka abhidhānena sannidhāpitām kriyam tat iti sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati

original: yasya hi vyāpāraṃ prādhānyena dhāturākhyātapratyayo vābhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā /
analyzed: yasya hi vyāpāram prādhānyena dhātuḥ ākhyāta pratyayaḥ vā abhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā
tathā hi taṇḍula ādayaḥ kartāraḥ
pacanti iti atra devadatta ādayaḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ
ekatra taṇḍula ādeḥ vyāpāraḥ paratra devadatta ādeḥ iti
prādhānyena ca aśeṣa kāraka nivarttya tvam pradhāna kriyāyāḥ
avāntara vyāpāra bhede pi pradhāna kriyā uddeśena samasta kāraka pravṛtteḥ iti
puruṣaḥ iti prakṛta kriyā apekṣam
pramāyāḥ puruṣa āśraya tvāt iti
lakṣaṇa antaram āha tad prayoktṛ tvam itara aprayojyatā vā
tasya cetanasya sarva kārakāṇi prati prayoktṛ tvam
taiḥ ca kārakaiḥ aprayojya tā vā

original: acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛtvaṃ na svābhāvikamiti bhāvaḥ parisamāptipadārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tattvaparisamāptiriti /
analyzed: acetanasya tu kartṛ tvam na svābhāvikam iti bhāvaḥ parisamāpti padārtham vyācaṣṭe tattva parisamāptiḥ iti
tattvam hi pramāṇa vyāpya tvam pramāṇa vyāpāra viṣaya tvam
tat ca hāna upādāna upekṣābhiḥ paryavasyati

original: paryavasānaṃ parisamāptiḥ viniyojyeti vaktavye yogyatāgrahaṇamīpsite 'pi dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścit pratibandhāt puruṣeṇānupātte mā bhūt tattvāparisamāptiriti
analyzed: paryavasānam parisamāptiḥ viniyojyā iti vaktavye yogyatā grahaṇam īpsite dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścid pratibandhāt puruṣeṇa an upātte mā bhūt tattva aparisamāptiḥ iti

original: yadyapi hi tat puruṣeṇānupāttaṃ tathāpyupādānayogyatāpradarśanādasti tattvaparisamāptiriti /
analyzed: yadi api hi tat puruṣeṇa anupāttam tathā api upādāna yogya tā pradarśanāt asti tattva parisamāptiḥ iti

original: tatpratiṣedhaśca ityatra tacchabdena hānopādānalakṣaṇaṃ viniyogaṃ parāmṛśati //
analyzed: tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti atra tad śabdena hāna upādāna lakṣaṇam viniyogam parāmṛśati
kim punar tattvam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuḥ tattu pratyaya prakṛteḥ tadaḥ rtham pṛcchati kim punar iti
uttaramsadasatī tat
praśnam vibhajate tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti atra iti
uttaram vibhajate asat asati itat
atha kasmāt prakṛti puruṣau vā
pañca skandhāḥ vā
param brahma advaitam vā
jīvajīva strava ādayaḥ vā sapta

original: pṛthivyāpastejovayuriti vā catvāri bhūtānītyādīti na tado vācyāni bhavantītyata āha-- pramāṇaviṣayatvenādhikārāt /
analyzed: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vayuḥ iti vā catvāri bhūtāni ityādi iti na tadaḥ vācyāni bhavanti iti atas āha pramāṇa viṣaya tvena adhikārāt

original: sūtrabhāṣyavākyatadvivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇaviṣayaścādhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyādisiddhāntabhedānupātino 'rthāḥ pramāṇaviṣayāḥ /
analyzed: sūtra bhāṣya vākya tad vivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇa viṣayaḥ ca adhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyā ādi siddhānta bheda anupātinaḥ rthāḥ pramāṇa viṣayāḥ
yathā ca etat tathā atra eva nivedayiṣyate
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
prakṛti artham vyākhyāya prati ārtham vyācaṣṭe itad bhāvaḥ iti
sat asatoḥ yathāsaṃkhyam vidhāyaka prakāṇa viṣaya tā sataḥ bhāvaḥ
tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca asataḥ bhāvaḥ
tat iti vidhāyaka pramāṇa viṣayatām parāmṛśati
tad pratiṣadhena ca pratiṣadhakam pramāṇam upasthāpitam
tena pratiṣedhaka pramāṇa viṣaya tvam eva tad pratiṣedhaḥ iti anena uktam bhavati
etat vibhajata itayoḥ khalu iti
śaṅkate pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt iti
sarva sāmarthya viraheṇa tu asat sataḥ vyāvartate
yadi ca asat api pramāṇa viṣayaḥ
tarhi na asamartham
tathā ca sat asatoḥ abhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti na
an aikāntāt
na vayam asāmarthyena asataḥ bhedam ācakṣmahe yena evam upālabhyemahi iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkāḥ vibhajate tatra bhavet iti
nirākaraṇam vibhajate etat ca na iti
gavādi cetanam
acetanam ghaṭa ādi iti

original: yadi sadasatī samarthe kutastarhi tayormeda ityata āha--svatantreti /
analyzed: yadi sat asatī samarthe kutas tarhi tayoḥ medaḥ iti atas āha svatantra iti
asat upalabdhiḥ eva sat upalabdheḥ anyā anupalabdhiḥ
nanu saṃyoga vibhāga ādiṣu satsu api tara tantra upalabdhi karaṇa tva matiḥ tara
teṣām saṃyujyamāna vibhajyamāna ādi adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt ityaḥ āha pratiṣedha mukhena pratipadyate pratīyate
satām keṣāñcid pāratantrye pi na niṣedhya niṣedha adhikāraṇa pāratantryam iti arthaḥ

original: saṃprati sadupalambhakasya pramāṇasyāsadūpalambhakatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣyakāreṇa pradīpo dṛṣṭānta upanyastaḥ /
analyzed: saṃprati sat upalambhakasya pramāṇasya asat upalambhaka tvam pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣyakāreṇa pradīpaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanyastaḥ
sa tu sādhyasamaḥ
tasya api pramāṇa sāmagrī niveśa diti śaṅkyamānā u tyanta loka prasiddha tayā asya dṛṣṭānta tvam samarthayate pradīpa vat iti

original: gopālāṅganā api hi kimatrāsti steno 'smaddhanaṃ vā apavarake na veti sandihānā pradīpamupādāya samantādavalokyāpavarakamastīhāsmaddhanaṃ nāsti  #
analyzed: gopāla aṅganā api hi kim atra asti stena u smad dhanam vā apavarake na vā iti sandihānā pradīpam upādāya samantāt avalokya apavarakam asti iha asmad dhanam na asti
stenaḥ iti samam eva niścinvanti
na tu stena abhāva niścayāya upāya ntaram upādadate

original: tenāgāpālāḍnamā ca paṇḍitarūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: ca paṇḍita rūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tat idam uktam na hi asat pratipattau upāya antaram āsthīyate lokena

original: anāśrayaṇe hetumāha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭādike 'rthe svatantre nānena samānajātīyaṃ tulyopalambhayogyataṃ dṛśyāntaramasti /
analyzed: anāśrayaṇe hetum āha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭa ādike rthe svatantre na anena samāna jātīyam tulya upalambha yogyatam dṛśya antaram asti
nīla pītau hi paraspara abhāvavantau
tena nalī niṣedhe na avaśyam pīta vidhiḥ
bhāva abhāvau tu paraspara abhāva ātmānau
no khalu abhāva abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid anyaḥ bhāva rūpāt
na api bhāva abhāvaḥ nyaḥ bhāvāt
tat evam pradīpa upāyasya pratipattuḥ pratīti kramam uktvā parīkṣakāṇām upapatti kramam āha yadi abhaviṣyat iti
yadi kaścid āśaṅketa dṛśyatām abhāvaḥ
pradīpena bhāvaḥ pi bhaviṣyati iti
tatra eṣa parīkṣakāṇām tarkaḥ upatiṣṭhate yadi abhaviṣayat iti

original: tadevaṃ laukikaparīkṣakasaṃmataṃ dṛṣṭāntamupapādya dārṣṭāntike yojayati--eve pramāṇenāpi indriyādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti /
analyzed: tat evam laukika parīkṣaka saṃmatam dṛṣṭāntam upapādya dārṣṭāntike yojayati eve pramāṇena api indriya ādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti
pūrvavat vyākhyeyam
upasaṃharati tat evam iti
sarvam ca etat upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate
nanu yadi sat asatī pramāṇa viṣayau

original: kasmāt sadbhedā ivāsadbhedā api sūtrakṛtā nocyanta ityata āha--tatra teṣu sadasadbhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇāsadbhedā na prakāśanta iti nocyante
analyzed: kasmāt sat bhedāḥ iva asat bhedāḥ api sūtrakṛtā na ucyante iti atas āha tatra teṣu sat asat bhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇa asat bhedāḥ na prakāśante iti nā ucyante

original: niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikāraṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvādasadbhedānāṃ bhāvabhedatantraṃ pramāśanamiti bhāvabhedakathanenaivābhāvabhedā api gamyanta iti noktā  #
analyzed: niṣedhya niṣedha adhi kāraṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt asat bhedānām bhāva bheda tantram pramā aśanam iti bhāva bheda kathanena eva abhāva bhedāḥ api gamyante iti nā uktā
iti arthaḥ

original: atha vā kathitā eva yeṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasopayogi,
analyzed: atha vā kathitāḥ eva yeṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa upayogi

original: yaṃ tu na tathā na teṣāṃ prapañcaḥ anupayuktabhāvaprapañca iva vaktavya ityāha--caturvargānantarbhāvād vā bhāvaprapañcavad abhāvaprapañca iti
analyzed: yam tu na tathā na teṣām prapañcaḥ anupayukta bhāva prapañcaḥ iva vaktavyaḥ iti āha caturvarga anantarbhāvāt vā bhāva prapañca vat abhāva prapañcaḥ iti
niḥśreyasa anupayogini bhāva prapañce yathā caturvarga anantarbhāvaḥ
evam abhāva prapañce pi iti

original: atha niḥśreyasopayogābhāvaḥ kuto 'vagantavya ityata āha--bhāvopadeśādevābhāva upadiṣṭo bhavatīti /
analyzed: atha niḥśreyasa upayoga abhāvaḥ kutas vagantavyaḥ iti atas āha bhāva upadeśāt eva abhāvaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti
dvividham pramāṇam bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ ca
yathā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva jñānam yatas dvitīya sūtra samutyānam
prameyeṣu ca apavargaḥ eva mūrdha abhiṣiktaḥ
eve prayojana ādiṣu api iti tatra tatra ūhanīyam iti
upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhati--sacca khalu ṣoḍaśadhāvyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti /
analyzed: tat evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum bhāṣyam paṭhati sat ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate iti
atra prathame kalpe caśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe
khalu śabdaḥ spaṣṭa arthe
tat eva ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekhyate na asat
tasya sat adhīna prakāśa tvāt iti

original: dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce,
analyzed: dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce
khaluḥ avadhāraṇe
sati ṣoḍaśa adhā eva upadekṣyamāṇe sat api upadekṣyate iti arthaḥ
prakṛti artham vyācaṣṭe vyūhaḥ iti

original: sūtrasya saprapañca tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyācikhyāsunā bhāṣyakāreṇa tāsāṃ
