analyzed: sūtrasya sa prapañca tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyācikhyāsunā bhāṣyakāreṇa tāsām

original: khalvāsāṃ sadvidhānāmiti bhāṣyeṇa sūtramavatārya paṭhitaṃ tadasya vārtikakṛt tātparyamāha--ta
analyzed: khalu āsām sadvidhānām iti bhāṣyeṇa sūtram avatārya paṭhitam tat asya vārtika kṛt tātparyam āhata
ete sat bhedāḥ iti sūtram

original: ta ete pramāṇādayaḥ sadbhedā niḥśreyasopayogino na gaṅgāvālukādayaḥ /
analyzed: te ete pramāṇa ādayaḥ sat bhedāḥ niḥśreyasa upayoginaḥ na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ
tasmāt sat supramāṇa ādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa eva udiyeṣṭāḥ lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca
na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ niḥśreyasa anupayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
dvandva svarūpam āha sarva pada iti
dvandva parigrahe tātparyam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati sarve eva iti

original: bahuvrīhikarmadhārayayorasaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe nigrahasthānasyāntyapadārthasya prādhānye vivakṣitārthahānaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bahuvrīhi karmadhārayayoḥ asaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhī samāsa parigrahe nigrahasthānasya antya padārthasya prādhānye vivakṣita artha hāna prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ
nirdeśe bhāṣyasya tātparyam āha yathāvacanam iti

original: anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāhetubhāvaḥ pramāṇānāmiti hi bahuvacanaprayojanam /
analyzed: anyonya nirapekṣāṇām pratyekam pramā hetu bhāvaḥ pramāṇānām iti hi bahuvacana prayojanam

original: prameyeṣu tu yadyapi prameyatā vāstavī pratyekamasti tathāpyapavargahetubhāvena prameyatā samudāye samāpyate,
analyzed: prameyeṣu tu yadi api prameya tā vāstavī pratyekam asti tathā api apavarga hetu bhāvena prameya tā samudāye samāpyate
na tu pratyekam

original: ātmādīnāmanyamatasyāpyatattvajñāne saṃsārānanivṛtteriti yadeva hi nirdeśa vacanabhedasya prayojanam,
analyzed: ātma ādīnām anya matasya api atattva jñāne yat eva hi vacana bhedasya prayojanam
tat eva ca uddeśe pi
tayoḥ eka vākya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: pramāṇādīnāmiti vibhaktyarthavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhitvā pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
analyzed: pramāṇa ādīnām iti vibhakti artha vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam paṭhitvā pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti
uttaramkārakāṇām iti
tat vibhajate yatra iti
yad uddeśena sarva kāraka pravṛttiḥ

original: kārakagrahaṇena ca tannāntarīyakatayā pradhānakriyāpyānīteti vivaraṇe sāpi darśitā /
analyzed: kāraka grahaṇena ca tad nāntarīyaka tayā pradhāna kriyā api ānītā iti vivaraṇe sā api darśitā

original: yadyapi svasvāmibhāvādāvapi saṃbandhe 'ntargataḥ kriyākārakasaṃbandho 'sti saṃbandhamātrasya kriyāgarbhatvāt tannāntarīyakatvācca kārakasya,
analyzed: yadi api sva svāmi bhāva ādau api saṃbandhe ntargataḥ kriyā kāraka saṃbandhaḥ sti saṃbandha mātrasya kriyā garbha tvāt tad nāntarīyaka tvāt ca kārakasya
tathā api asau na vivakṣyate
saṃbandha mātram eva tu vivakṣyate iti arthaḥ
tatra codayati tattvasya iti
ṣaṣṭhī ca anarthikā avyatireke tad anupapatteḥ iti api draṣṭavyam
tatra aniyama vādī ekadeśī pariharati na
ubhayathā api iti
bhāvasya bhavitṛ adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt
bhāva nirūpaṇam eva bhavitṛ nirūpaṇam ākṣipati
abhede pi iti

original: iṣusthityā yathā tadbhāvapratiṣedha iṣobhāvo dharmo gatiḥ,
analyzed: iṣu sthityā yathā tad bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ iṣaḥ bhāvaḥ dharmaḥ gatiḥ
tasya pratiṣadhaḥ sthitiḥ
tiṣṭhate grati nivṛtti artha tvāt

original: evamatrāpi na pramāṇaprameyādimātramacyate tattvagrahaṇenāpi tvarthāntaraṃ teṣveva yat yat samāropitaṃ rūpamanyathātvamiti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate
analyzed: evam atrā api na pramāṇa prameya ādi mātram acyate tattva grahaṇena api tu artha antaram teṣu eva yat yat samāropitam rūpam anyathātvam iti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate
gatimat iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ
yathā dvi ekayoḥ dvivacana ekavacane
iti dvitva ekatvayoḥ iti
tu dvi ekeṣu iti syāt

original: tena gati mattvamarthāntaramiṣornabhavatītyasminnarthe iṣoḥ sthitiriti prayujyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena gati mattvam artha antaram iṣoḥ na bhavati iti asmin arthe iṣoḥ sthitiḥ iti prayujyate iti arthaḥ
tat etat ekadeśi matam artha antara tva niyama vādī dūṣayati tat na iti

original: pramāṇadibhyo 'narthāntarasya tattvasya ca iṣoranarthāntarasya gatyabhāvasya cāsiddheḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ nartha antarasya tattvasya ca iṣoḥ anartha antarasya gati abhāvasya ca asiddheḥ
yathā ca bhāva atiriktaḥ bhāvaḥ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅga adhikāre nivedayiṣyate
pramāṇa ādi atiriktam ca tattvam anantaram eva darśayiṣyati iti
tattvasya jñānam ityādi bhāṣyam
ubhayam pṛcchati kim punar iti
tattva praśnasya uttram tattvam iti
nimitta tvam śaktiḥ pramāṇa ādīnām

original: sā ca dvayī svrūpalakṣaṇā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇā ca,
analyzed: sā ca dvayī svrūpa lakṣaṇā sahakāri sākalya lakṣaṇā ca
atīndriyasya sāmarthyasya naiyānikaiḥ anabhyupeta tvāt

original: śakteśca bhāvatvena bhavitṛnirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvād bhaviturapi nirūpaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktam //
analyzed: śakteḥ ca bhāva tvena bhavitṛ nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt bhavituḥ api nirūpaṇam bhavati iti uktam
abhimatam niḥśreyasam grahītum niḥśreyasa dvaividhyam āha niḥśreyasam puras iti

original: takrijñadṛṣṭaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ grahītuṃ dṛṣṭamatiprasaṅgāpādanena dūṣayati--eve ca kṛtveti /
analyzed: niḥśreyasam grahītum dṛṣṭam ati prasaṅga āpādanena dūṣayati eve ca kṛtvā iti
sūtrakāra abhimatam niḥśreyasam āha param tu iti
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadyapi niḥśreyasapadamabhimatamātravāci pramāṇāditattvajñānasya ca dṛṣṭamapi niḥśreyasaṃ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yadi api niḥśreyasa padam abhimata mātra vāci pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānasya ca dṛṣṭam api niḥśreyasam saṃbhavati
tasya eva tatas sākṣāt utpatteḥ
tathā api ātma ādi vācaka prameya pada samabhivyāhārāt adṛṣṭam eva niḥśreyasam abhipreta sūtrakārasya
tatra ca pramāṇam ādi tattva jñānasya api pārarmyeṇa hetu bhāvaḥ sti eva iti
codayati dṛṣṭam iti
dṛṣṭe darśanam eva pramāṇam
adṛṣṭam tu niḥśreyasam aprāmāṇikam darśana abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
pariharati na
na asti arthasya tathābhāvāt
arthaḥ ātma ādiḥ

original: tasya āgamānumānasahakāriṇā kāraṇābhāvena kāryābhāvānumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasya āgama anumāna sahakāriṇā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva anumānam eva atra arthe pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ

original: ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārthatattvajñānamātrameva paraniḥśreyasaheturiti, yathāhuḥ---
analyzed: ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārtha tattva jñāna mātram eva para niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti yathā āhuḥ
ekaḥ bhāvaḥ tattvataḥ yena dṛṣṭāḥ
sarve bhāvāḥ tattvataḥ tena dṛṣṭāḥ
iti tān pratyāha yadi punar iti

original: na hi bhāvānāṃ tattvamanyadataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayīkṛtād rūpāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bhāvānām tattvam anyat atas pratyakṣa viṣayīkṛtāt rūpāt iti bhāvaḥ
mokṣamāṇāḥ iti

original: sani muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā iti guṇābhyāsalopau /
analyzed: sani mucaḥ karmakasya guṇaḥ vā iti guṇa abhyāsa lopau
na kevalam vastu vṛttiḥ
sūtrakārasya api saṃmatam et iti atas āha pṛthak upadeśāt ca prameyasya pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ
yadi ca yat kiñcid prameya tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasasya parasya prāptiḥ

original: kimarthamātmādasūtreṇa dvādaśaiva prameyāṇi nādhikāni na nyūnāni cetyavadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa?

original: tasmāt tadeva sākṣādupayoti niḥśreyase na padārthamātramityāha--prameyāvadhāraṇārthāyāṃ cotrarasūtraprikriyāyāmakuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt /

eka deśa viṣaya tve yatra eva na darśi tā tena eva anaikāntika tvam āśaṅkyeta

original: tathā ca tatra tatraikadeśe pratyekaṃ vyāptipradarśanamaśakyam, ānanyāt /
analyzed: tathā ca tatra tatra eka deśe pratyekam vyāpti pradarśanam aśakyam ānanyāt
tasmāt sarva upasaṃhāreṇa eva tad upadarśanam
tat iha kṛtaka tvam autsargika sāmānya viṣaya vyāpti smaraṇa sadhrīcīnam pakṣa dharma tā vaśāt

original: viśeṣe tejovayavini sādhayitumanuṣṇatonmukhaṃ yanna sādhayet tat kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāpahṛtaviṣayatvāt,
analyzed: viśeṣe tejaḥ vayavini sādhayitum anuṣṇa tā unmukham yat na sādhayet tat kim pratyakṣeṇa apahṛta viṣaya tvāt
āhosvit anaikāntika tvāt
na tāvat an aikānki tvam
prāk eva sāmānyatas na aupādhika saṃbandhasya avadhāraṇāt

original: uṣṇe tejovayavini kṛtakatvasya darśanād anaikāntikamapakṣadharmo vā kṛtakatvamiti cet-na,
analyzed: uṣṇe tejaḥ vayavini kṛtaka tvasya darśanāt anaikāntikam apakṣa dharmaḥ vā kṛtaka tvam iti ced na
anumānena sāmānyatas vadhṛta vyāptinā tasya anauṣṇya asādhanāt

original: pratyakṣeṇa tejo 'vayavina auṣṇyagraheṇa tatra kṛtakatvasya hetorvṛttāvutpannamapi vyāptivijñānaṃ bādhyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa tejaḥ vayavinaḥ auṣṇya graheṇa tatra kṛtaka tvasya hetoḥ vṛttau utpannam api vyāpti vijñānam bādhyate
tatas ca an aikānki tvāt apravṛttiḥ anumānasya iti ced na
anumāna pravṛtti viṣaye sādhya dharmiṇi hetoḥ vyabhicāra an udbhāvanāt

original: anyathā tadgatasādhyadharmasandehe tatropalabhyamānaḥ sādhanadharmaḥ sandigdhabyatirekivādanaikāntikaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā tad gata sādhya dharma sandehe tatra upalabhyamānaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sandigdha byatireki vāt anaikāntikaḥ syāt
sandigdha sādhya dharme dṛṣṭānte iva sādhana dharmaḥ
tathā ca anumāna mātram ucchidyeta
pratyakṣeṇa sādhya dharma viparyadarśanāt
tejaḥ vayavinaḥ
tathā ca anaikāntika tvam
tat idam uktam yasmin viṣaye tejasaḥ etat prayuktam
sa pratyakṣeṇa apahṛtaḥ iti

original: evaṃ cānumāne dūṣite kṛtamapakṣadharmatvavyabhicārābhyāṃ tadupajīvibhyāmiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca anumāne dūṣite kṛtam apakṣa dharma tva vyabhicārābhyām tad upajīvibhyām iti bhāvaḥ

original: yat punaḥ dignāgena pratyakṣaviruddhamanumānamudāhṛtaṃ tadupanyasyati- apare punariti /
analyzed: yat punar dignāgena pratyakṣa viruddham anumānam udāhṛtam tat upanyasyati apare punar iti

original: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭādivaditi bruvāṇaḥ śabdasvarūpamevāpalapati /
analyzed: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti bruvāṇaḥ śabda svarūpam eva apalapati
na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat asti śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam
na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam
na ca agṛhyamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sat vyavahāra gocaraḥ
tasmāt evaṃvādinaḥ bhiprāya vyāptam asattvam śabdasya
tathā ca pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
dūṣayitaiḥ tu iti
sa viśeṣaṇe hi vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṃkrāmataḥ iti utsargaḥ
kvacid punar viśiṣṭa vidhānam api bhavati ananyagati tvāt
tat yathā
lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti

original: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sati vibhave na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt
iti

original: tadvadihāpi aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti śrutivākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇatvaviśeṣaṇopasaṃkānto niṣedho na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: tadvat iha api aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti śruti vākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇa tva viśeṣaṇa upasaṃkāntaḥ niṣedhaḥ na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate
nā api śabda niṣedhaḥ vādi abhiprāya vyāptaḥ

original: vacanārthāvirodhino 'rthasyārthagamyatvānna tadvirodhinaḥ śrāvaṇatvaniṣedhasya cādhikāraṇa śabda iti na śabdābhāve tanniṣedho 'vakalpate /
analyzed: vacana artha avirodhinaḥ rthasya artha gamya tvāt na tad virodhinaḥ śrāvaṇa tva niṣedhasya ca adhi kāraṇa śabdaḥ iti na śabda abhāve tad niṣedhaḥ
na ca abhāvaḥ tucchaḥ iti tṛtīyaḥ upapādayiṣyate
na ca śrāvaṇa tvam pratyakṣa gocaraḥ
tat hi śabda śrotrayoḥ saṃbandha
kṛt taddhita samāseṣu saṃbandha abhidhānam tu a talbhyām
iti kātyāyanīya vacanāt
na ca pratyakṣa apratyakṣa vṛtti
saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ
tasmāt śrāvaṇa tvam apratyakṣam iti na atra pratyakṣa virodhaḥ
tat idam uktam indriya vṛttīnām anīndriya tvāt iti
vṛttiḥ svārthe saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
āgama viruddham udāharati śuci iti
manu ādibhiḥ nara asthi sparśa pratiṣedhāt
sparśe ca prāyaśvitta upadeśāt aśuci tvam nara śiraḥ kapāla ādīnām iti
kāpālikaḥ ākṣipati katham iti
na asmākam vedaḥ tad mūlāḥ vā smṛtayaḥ pramāṇam iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: uttaram- śuci naraśiraḥ- kapālamiti bruvatā śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇānapekṣeṇānumānamātrasahāyenātra vastuni vayā śucirūpo 'rtho vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: uttaram śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti bruvatā śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa anapekṣeṇa anumāna mātra sahāyena atra vastuni vayā śuci rūpaḥ rthaḥ vaktavyaḥ
kim uktam bhavati śuci iti
yadi ucyeta spraṣṭuḥ pratyavāya abhāvaḥ
siddhāntī pṛcchati sa kasya iti vācyam
yadi ātmanaḥ iti brūyāt kāpālikaḥ
avigītā hi vyavahāra paramparā asmākam kāpālikānām nara śiraḥ kapālaka sparśa tad avasthita anna pāna upayoga lakṣaṇā
dākṣiṇātyānām iva ahnena evuka ādi lakṣaṇā kriyā śreyaskarī
tasmāt asmākam apratyavāya karayā śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti arthaḥ
tatra sa upahāsam uttaram āha tad āgama anuṣṭhāna tātparya avasthānāt kāpālikasya evam etat
śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa lakṣaṇa āgama vihitam artham ācaratām tad nisiddham ca pariharatām
dākṣiṇātyānām āhnena evuka ādi anuṣṭhānam anādi adya yāvat anuvartamānam avigītam āmnāya mūla tām anumāpayati
ātmānaḥ śreyaḥ hetu bhāvena
na khalu āgama anapekṣaḥ sahasreṇa api anumānaiḥ imam artham avagantum arhati

original: kāpalikānāṃ tvāgamavihitamakurvatāṃ kurvatāṃ ca tanniṣiddhamarthaṃ prayatnenānādirapi vyavahāraḥ śākyamallakādīnāmiva na vedānumānamūlamiti  #
analyzed: kāpalikānām tu āgama vihitam akurvatām kurvatām ca tad niṣiddham artham prayatnena anādiḥ api vyavahāraḥ śākya mallaka ādīnām iva na veda anumāna mūlam iti
bhāvaḥ
atha trayī vidām nara śiraḥ kapālam apratyavāya hetuḥ iti brūyāt
tadā trayyāḥ vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena prāmāṇya upagamāt āgama virodhaḥ
tadīya sparśasya trayyām niṣedhena pratyavāya hetu va niścayāt

original: api cāgamānapekṣo 'numānena śaucaṃ naraśiraḥkapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyo jāyate-- śuci naraśiraḥkapālamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
analyzed: api ca āgama anapekṣaḥ numānena śaucam nara śiraḥ kapālam vyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyaḥ jāyate śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti kaḥ rthaḥ

original: nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate sa evārthaḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate saḥ eva arthaḥ

original: tat kiṃ pṛcchacata ityata āha--viśeṣavidhānaṃ ca śeṣapratiṣedhaparaṃ loke dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: tat kim iti atas āha viśeṣa vidhānam ca śeṣa pratiṣedha param loke dṛṣṭam

original: yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyatīti ukte na vāmeneti gamyate /
analyzed: yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyati iti ukte na vāmena iti gamyate
tat iha yadi śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam
kim anyat aśuci iti vaktavyam
na hi nara uccāra ādīnām aśuci tve pramāṇam anyat asti āgamāt

original: āgamapramāṇyaṃ ca na manyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: āgama pramāṇyam ca na manyase iti bhāvaḥ

original: atha trayīvidveṣād anumānapakṣāpātinā tvayā sarvameva naraviṭkapālādi śaucapakṣe nikṣipyata ityāha--atha sarvameva śuci /
analyzed: atha trayī vidveṣāt anumāna pakṣa āpātinā tvayā sarvam eva nara viṣ kapāla ādi śauca pakṣe nikṣipyate iti āha atha sarvam eva śuci
pariharati dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti
kṛtaḥ sarvasya pakṣīkṛta tvāt
codayati atha anumāna viruddhṛ kasmāt anumānam na bhavati iti

original: na khalu pramāṇatvena pratyakṣāgamābhyāmanumānasya kaścid viśeṣo yena tau bādhakāvanumānasya nānumānamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu pramāṇa tvena pratyakṣa āgamābhyām anumānasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ yena tau bādhakau anumānasya na anumānam iti bhāvaḥ
pariharati ekasmin anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāvāt

original: ayamabhisandhiḥ---yat tāvadanumānaṃ pūrvapravṛttaṃ tena bādhitaviṣayaṃ tabdalabhāvi paścattanamanumāna na svakāryāya paryāptam,
analyzed: ayam abhisandhiḥ yat tāvat anumānam pūrva pravṛttam tena bādhita viṣayam tad dala bhāvi paścattanam anumāna na sva kāryāya paryāptam
yathā uktam aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iyasya anumānasya anumāna virodhaḥ iti
labdha svarūpam hi vastu kvacid kiścid niṣidhye

original: na tu jñānākārālīke bahiriti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate /
analyzed: na tu jñāna ākāra alīke bahis iti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate

original: tadiha śrāvaṇatvaṃ śabdasya niṣedhatāpūrvaṃ śravaṇamindriyamatīndriya tadgrāhrātvaṃ ca vastunī anumātavye śabdopalambhalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa /
analyzed: tat iha śrāvaṇa tvam śabdasya ca vastunī anumātavye śabda upalambha lakṣaṇena kāryeṇa

original: tathā caitenaivānumānenāpahṛtaviṣayamaśrāvaṇatvānumānaṃ caramamanvayavyatirekasaṃpannamapi na svocitaṃ kāryā janayati /
analyzed: tathā ca etena eva anumānena apahṛta viṣayam aśrāvaṇa tva anumānam caramam anvaya vyatireka saṃpannam api na svocitam kāryāḥ janayati
tanu bhuvana ādīnām na kartā īśvaraḥ śarīri tvāt mukta satma vat prayojana abhāvāt iti ādyā api īśvara dharmi grāhi mūla anamānena apahṛta viṣaya tayā nyāya ābhāsam
veditavyam
tasmāt paraspara anapekṣa samāna kāla pravṛtti samartha anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāva abhiprāyam etat uktam

original: na hyanayoranyatarad bādhyaṃ bādhaka vā saṃbhavati,
analyzed: na hi anayoḥ anyatarat bādhyam vā saṃbhavati

original: kiṃ tu mithaḥ satpratipakṣatayā na pramāṃ kurutaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu mithas sat pratipakṣa tayā na pramām kurutaḥ
kasmāt punar na samāveśaḥ numānayoḥ

original: asamāveśe vā kutaḥ satpratipakṣatetyata āha--na hyanvayavyatirekasampanne iti /
analyzed: a samāveśe vā kutas sat pratipakṣa tā iti atas āha na hi anvaya vyatireka sampanne iti
iha anvaya vyatireka grahaṇena samāna balayoḥ anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharma tva asat pratipakṣa tvāni upalakṣitāni

original: etaiḥ sampannayoryadi samāveśa ekasmin viṣaye bhavet,
analyzed: etaiḥ sampannayoḥ yadi samāveśaḥ ekasmin viṣaye bhavet

original: tata ekatarasya bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvaṃ vā gamyetāpi /
analyzed: tatas ekatarasya bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam vā gamyeta api
na tu etat asti
a sa prapipakṣa tā sampatteḥ abhāvāt iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt na anumāna virudvam anumānam tulya balam
api tu sat pratipakṣam iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣam api anumeya viruddha sādhanāt anumānasya pratipakṣaḥ iti sat pratipakṣa tayā anvaya vyatireka ādi sampannasya anumānasya

original: na pratyakṣeṇa tadviruddhārthopasaṃhāriṇā samāveśa iti na bādhyabādhakabhāva iyabhiprāyeṇa
analyzed: na pratyakṣeṇa tad viruddha artha upasaṃhāriṇā samāveśaḥ iti na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ iyabhiprāyeṇa
codayati pratyakṣa virodhi api iti
pariharati na na iti

original: tulyabalau hi mithaḥ pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbalottamabalau /
analyzed: tulya balau hi mithas pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbala uttama balau

original: na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣo hariṇaśāvakasya,
analyzed: na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣaḥ hariṇa śāvakasya
kim tu samara kaṇḍū nighna viṣāṇa koṭi samullikhita gaṇḍa śailasya vipina māhiṣasya
tasmāt

original: pūrvabhāvi pratyakṣamananyathāsiddhaṃ sadasatpratipakṣamanumānaṃ samānaviṣayasamāveśād bādhata iti yuktamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: pūrva bhāvi pratyakṣam ananyathāsiddham sat asat pratipakṣam anumānam samāna viṣaya samāveśāt bādhate iti yuktam iti arthaḥ
codayati atha upamāna viruddham anumānam kasmāt na bhavati

original: gosadṛśo gavaya ityāraṇyakasya vākyaṃ śrutvā yadā nāgarako vanaṃ gato gosadṛśaṃ piṇḍamupalabhe,
analyzed: go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti āraṇyakasya vākyam śrutvā yadā nāgarakaḥ vanam gataḥ go sadṛśam piṇḍam upalabhe

original: tadāsya vākyārthānubhavāhitasaṃskāraprabodhajanitasmṛtyapekṣa gosādṛśyajñānamupamānaṃ puro 'vasthitasya piṇḍasya gavayaśabdavācyatvajñāne pramāṇam
analyzed: tadā asya go sādṛśya jñānam upamānam puras vasthitasya piṇḍasya gavaya śabda vācya tva jñāne pramāṇam
tatra yadi kaścid

original: pramāṇayet naiṣa piṇḍo gavayaśabdavācyo gopiṇḍasādṛśyād gopiṇḍāntaravaditi,
analyzed: pramāṇayet na eṣa piṇḍaḥ gavaya śabda vācyaḥ go piṇḍa sādṛśyāt go piṇḍa antara vat iti
tat idam anamānam upamānena bādhita viṣayam astu iti arthaḥ
saṃpratipattiḥ uttaram na upamāna viruddham na bhavati iti anuṣajyate
asti ced kasmāt na uktam iti atas
āha pūrva pramāṇa virodha anuvidhānāt na uktam iti śeṣaḥ
tat darśayati upamāna virodhaḥ iti
sva phala dvārā śabdam pramāṇam darśayati upamāna virodhaḥ iti
sva phala dvārā śābdam pramāṇam darśayati āgama iti
sva phala dvārā eva pratyakṣam pramāṇa darśayati sārūpya jñānam iti
upasaṃharati pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ virodhāt virodha abhidhānāt uktam tat upamāna viruddham anumānam iti
bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra vāda jalpau iti

original: prayojanasvarūpopayogābhidhānānantaraṃ dṛṣṭāntapade vyākhyātavye tadullaṅghanena vādajalpayoḥ ko 'vasara ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prayojana svarūpa upayoga abhidhāna anantaram dṛṣṭānta pade vyākhyātavye tad ullaṅghanena vāda jalpayoḥ kaḥ vasaraḥ iti arthaḥ
avasaram āha tena anena iti
prayojana vyākhyāna aṅgam eva idam na vāda jalpa vyākhyā aṅgam iti asti avasaraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tatra śabda artham vyācaṣṭe tasmin nyāya ābhāse iti

original: vādajalpakathayorhi na dvayorvādiprativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ,
analyzed: vāda jalpa kathayoḥ hi na dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ
vastuni viruddha dharma dvaya samāveśa amāvāt
tasmāt dvayoḥ ekasya nyāyaḥ

original: ekasya tu nyāyābhāsa iti vādajalpābhyāṃ vivicyate /
analyzed: ekasya tu nyāya ābhāsaḥ iti vāda jalpābhyām vivicyate
nyāya ābhāsaḥ iti tu sannidhānāt uktam
sannihita artha tvāt sarvanāmnaḥ iti
vitaṇḍā tu
sa prayojanāḥ niṣprayojanāḥ vā iti
tuśabdaḥ prasiddha prayojanābhyām vāda jalpābhyām vyavacchinatti
pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnā hi vitaṇḍā ucyate
tatra sthāpanā hīna tvāt pratipakṣa hīnā iti pratīyate
na khalu sthāpana abhāve sthāpya saṃbhavaḥ

original: tathā vitaṇḍacate vyāhanyate 'nayā pratipakṣasādhanamiti vyutpattyā parapakṣopaghātena pāriśeṣyāt svapakṣasiddhirasyāḥ prayojanaṃ pratīyate
analyzed: tathā vyāhanyate nayā pratipakṣa sādhanam iti vyutpattyā para pakṣa upaghātena pāriśeṣyāt sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asyāḥ prayojanam pratīyate
tat evam sandigdha prayojanā satī vitaṇḍā parīkṣyate
prayojanavatī na vā iti

original: tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tato na sarvā vidyāḥ,
analyzed: tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tatas na sarvāḥ vidyāḥ
sarvāṇi karmāṇi

original: tanmukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ,
analyzed: tad mukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ

original: vitaṇḍāyā eva karmarūpāyā vidyārūpāyā vā niṣprayojanātvāt /
analyzed: vitaṇḍāyāḥ eva karma rūpāyāḥ vidyā rūpāyāḥ vā niṣprayojanā tvāt
atha prayojanavatī
tatas upapannā prayojana vyāptiḥ
kim tāvat prāptam
tatra kecid bruvate niṣprayojanā vitaṇḍā iti
sthāpanā hīna tayā tāvat pakṣaḥ na asti
avayava vyutpattyā api para sādhanā vidhātaḥ pratīyate
na ca tāvat mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asti

original: na hi parvatanitambavartiti dhūme asiddhatvādinā dūṣite vahnestatrābhāvo niścīyate /
analyzed: na hi dhūme asiddha tva ādinā dūṣite vahneḥ tatra abhāvaḥ niścīyate

mā vā saitsīt

original: sa tu svapakṣaseddhacaiva prayojanena pratipakṣasādhanamāhantīti bhāvaḥ /

original: atha na pratipadyata ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭa--atha pakṣamapīti /

original: nāstiko hi sadasadubhayānubhayarūpatayā na vicāraṃ sahanta iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati /

original: eṣa sādhanavādī jñāpayati--ahaṃ vaitaṇḍiko jāne anena pañcāvayavena sādhānāvākyenedaṃ sādhyaṃ jñāpyata iti caturvargaḥ /

original: dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayati--atha na pratipadyata iti /

original: nāpi yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ,

atas tasya pṛthak upadeśaḥ

original: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ ca śābdasyāpi jñānasya nimittaṃ prathamaśrāviṇaḥ śabdādarthajñānābhāvāt /

aparam api pṛthak upādāna prayojanam āha nāstikasya iti

tat vibhajate idam iti iti
idam iti hi dharmi viṣayam siddhāntam darśayati

abhyupagama vyavasthitiḥ anabhyupagamāt vyavacchinatti
na tu puruṣa viśeṣe vyavasthāpayati iti bhāvaḥ

original: asyāpi prameyāntargratasyāpi sataḥ pṛthagupādānaprayojanamāha--tasya prameya iti /

avayavāḥ iva avayavāḥ

original: yathā somena yajeta godohanena paśukāmasya yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti /

original: na ca tadaviditaṃ sattāmātreṇa cakṣurādivad viśeṣyaṃ pratipādayatītyata uktam--pratyaya iti /

api tu smṛti

original: na hi kramavadvarṇasamudāyaḥ padaṃ śravaṇendriyānubhavagocaraḥ saṃbhavati,

original: hanta daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpā bhavantītyevamādīnāmapi vākyārthabodhakatvaṃ syādityata āha--pratisandhīyamānaḥ /

original: na ca daśadāḍimādivākyādiṣu tadastīti na tato vākyārthāvabodha ityarthaḥ /

original: tadevamekasmṛtisamāroheṇa emārthāvacchedena ca padānāṃ samūho vākyam /

tasya bhāgāḥ eka deśāḥ iti
yāvatī ityādi bhāṣyam avatārayati te kiyantaḥ

pṛcchatikā iti
na hi samāpteḥ niṣpatteḥ anyā siddhiḥ asti iti abhiprāyaḥ
uttarampada arthasya iti
dharmiṇaḥ vāstavam iti arthaḥ
samāpti pṛcchatikā iti
uttaram viśeṣa iti
vāstavaḥ dharmaḥ siddhiḥ

original: tadgocarastu viniścayaḥ puruṣadharmo niṣpattiriti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad gocaraḥ tu viniścayaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ niṣpattiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kiyadbhiḥ kimabhidhānaiśca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyata ityāśaṅkya bhāṣyakṛtoktam--tasya pañceti /
analyzed: kiyadbhiḥ kimabhidhānaiḥ ca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyate iti āśaṅkya bhāṣyakṛtā uktam tasya pañca iti
tat vyācaṣṭe samākhyā iti
bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra āgamaḥ iti
na hi agama vat pratijñā vacanam niścāyakam
hetu vacana ādi vaiyarthyāt
niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt iti
samādhatte āgama adhigatasya iti
ātma ādi prameya pratipādana uddeśena hi śāstram etat pravṛttam
tad nāntarīyaka tayā nyāyam vyutpādayat tam eva vyutpādayet
yaḥ ātma ādeḥ prameyasya sākṣāt niścāyakaḥ
tad pratipādaka āgama pramāṇya niścāyakaḥ vā
tasya ca nyāya viśeṣasya ādyaḥ vayavaḥ pratijñā
āgama artha viṣayā sākṣāt
tad viṣaya āgama pramāṇya pratipādakasya ca paramparayā
tasmāt āgamaḥ pratijñā

original: āgamopacārasya ca prayojanamidaṃ yadarthasaṃvādenāgamenānugṛhyate nyāyaḥ saprayojanaśca bhavati,
analyzed: āgama upacārasya ca prayojanam idam yat artha saṃvādena āgamena anugṛhyate nyāyaḥ sa prayojanaḥ ca bhavati
āgama artha jñānasya niḥśreyasa hetu bhāvena nirūḍha tvāt

original: tasmād yadyapi na nyāyamātravartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt yadi api na nyāya mātra vartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ
tathā api prakṛta nyāya abhiprāyeṇa etat draṣṭavyam

original: tathā cāgamārthasaṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpitaviṣayatvamapi parākṛtaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: tathā ca āgama artha saṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpita viṣaya tvam api parākṛtam veditavyam
yat āhuḥ eke sarvaḥ yam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena eva dharma dharmi bhāvena
na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti
tathā anumānasya hetu vacanasya anumāna tva upacāreṇa bhāṣyakāreṇa uktam hetuḥ anumānam iti
tat khalu anumāna pratipādakam vacanam viṣaya tayā anumānena anugrahītavyam
na ca liṅga darśana mātram anumeya pratipatti hetuḥ
api tu saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri
na ca hetu vacana mātrāt sahakāri tā avagamyate
tasmāt na liṅga vacanam anumāna pratipādakam iti katham anumāna tva upacāraḥ iti atas āha evam

original: liṅgadarśanamātre dṛśyamāne liṅgarūpe saṃbandhasmaraṇarahite hetūpacārāt anumānatvopacārat
analyzed: liṅga darśana mātre dṛśyamāne liṅga rūpe saṃbandha smaraṇa rahite hetu upacārāt anumāna tva upacārat
hetuḥ anumānam iti uktam bhavaṣya kṛtā
tat eva vibhajate yat tu dvitīyam liṅga daśanam
saṃbandha grahaṇa samaye liṅga darśanam prathamam
tad apekṣayā sādhya dharmiṇi liṅga darśanam dvitīyam
tad saṃbandha smṛti vyakti hetu bhāvāt smaryate naya iti smṛtiḥ saṃskāraḥ
tasya vyaktiḥ kārya abhimukhīkaraṇam
tatra hetu bhāvāt
kvacid pāṭhaḥ saṃbandha smṛti hetu vyakti hetu bhāvāt iti
sa tu sugamaḥ eva
atas hetuḥ iti ucyate
etat uktam bhavati

original: yat tad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ śuddhamapyāpātataḥ saṃbandhasmṛtihetubhāvāt saṃbandhasmṛti sahakāryeva /
analyzed: yat tat dvitīyam liṅga darśanam śuddham api āpātataḥ saṃbandha smṛti hetu bhāvāt saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri eva
tathā ca anumānam

original: evaṃ ca tatpratipādakasya vacasa upapanno 'numānatvopacāra iti siddham /
analyzed: evam ca tad pratipādakasya vacasaḥ upapannaḥ numāna tva upacāraḥ iti siddham

original: evaṃ ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tadvacanasya buddhivikālpitaliṅgaviṣayatvaṃ parāstaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: evam ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tad vacanasya buddhi vikā alpita liṅga viṣaya tvam parāstam veditavyam
evam anyeṣu api avayaveṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu etat eva prayojanam yojanīyam iti
udāharaṇam pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam
tat vyācaṣṭa smṛti viṣayasya iti

original: yatra pratyakṣaviṣaye pūrvaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā tasya smṛtiriti smṛtiviṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punarūpadarśanāt avipratipattyā punaḥ smaraṇāt tatsmārakaṃ  #
analyzed: yatra pratyakṣa viṣaye pūrvam vyāptiḥ gṛhītā tasya smṛtiḥ iti smṛti viṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punar ūpa darśanāt avipratipattyā punar smaraṇāt tad smārakam
vacanam udāharaṇam pratyakṣam
kaḥ punar ūpamāna arthaḥ iti
pratyakṣam iva pratyakṣam iti atra ivakāre tatra upamā arthaḥ kaḥ iti arthaḥ
etat eva vibhajate yasmāt iti
upamānam upanayaḥ iti bhāṣyam
tat vyācaṣṭe yathā tathā iti upamāna ekadeśaḥ iti

original: upanayo hi tathā caitaditi pravartamāna udāharaṇasthaṃ yathāśabdārthamapekṣata iti yathā tatheti pravartata iti /
analyzed: upanayaḥ hi tathā ca etat iti pravartamānaḥ udāharaṇa stham yathāśabda artham apekṣate iti yathā tathā iti pravartate iti

original: kiṃ punarūpamānaṃ yasyāyamekadeśa ityata āha--upamānaṃ khalu tathā gaustathā gavaya ityupadeśopayoge /
analyzed: kim punar ūpamānam yasya ayam eka deśaḥ iti atas āha aupamānam khalu tathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti upadeśa upayoge
upayogaḥ tad artha viṣayaḥ nubhavaḥ

original: tasmin sati paśvād vanaṃ gato nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇādṛṣṭapūrvaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyati /
analyzed: tasmin sati paśvāt vanam gataḥ nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇa a dṛṣṭa pūrvam piṇḍam paśyati
smarati ca upadeśa artham

original: piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva paśyati /
analyzed: piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyam pratyakṣeṇa eva paśyati

original: tadevaṃbhūtaṃ sārūpyajñānaṃ gavayaśabdavācyo 'yaṃ piṇḍa iti pratītiheturūpamānam /
analyzed: tat evaṃbhūtam sārūpya jñānam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ yam piṇḍaḥ iti pratīti hetu rūpa mānam
tat etasya upamānasya upadeśa artha smaraṇa gavaya piṇḍa go sārūpya apratyakṣa rūpasya eka deśe sarūpye yaḥ yathā tathābhāvaḥ saḥ upanaye pi asti iti etāvatā upamāna tva upacāra
upanayaḥ iti arthaḥ
saḥ yam sarva pramāṇa viniveśena paramaḥ nyāyaḥ stūyate
nigamana vyākhyāna bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati kaḥ punar iti

original: na khalvavayavānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu avayavānām pramāṇānām vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram eka vākyā iti
adhyāropaḥ pratisandhānam
sāmarthyam pṛcchati kim punati iti
uttaram itaretara iti
sāmarthyam hi padānām dharmaḥ

original: iha tu vibhajyamānānāmavayavānāṃ nanmūlānāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvameva dharmaḥ samārthyam /
analyzed: iha tu vibhajyamānānām avayavānām na mūlānām ca pramāṇānām sākāṅkṣa tvam eva dharmaḥ samārthyam

original: tadatra samastarūpasampannaliṅgapratipādanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ cāstīti siddhamekavākyatvamavayavānāmiti /
analyzed: tat atra samasta rūpa sampanna liṅga pratipādanam ekam prayojanam vibhajyamāna sākāṅkṣa tvam ca asti iti siddham eka vākya tvam avayavānām iti
nigamana padam vyutpādayati nigamyante iti

original: so 'yamiti bhāṣyamanubhāṣya pṛcchati--kaḥ punaḥ paramaśabdasyārtha iti /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar parama śabdasya arthaḥ iti
uttaram vipratipapanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam paścā avayava vākyasya parama tvam iti
etat eva vyatireka mukhena pratipādayati ekaikaśas iti

original: yadyapi loke pratyakṣādīnāmekaikaśo 'pi vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ tatra tatropalabhyate,
analyzed: yadi api loke pratyakṣa ādīnām ekaikaśas vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam tatra tatra upalabhyate
tathā api yat etat veda prāmāṇyam ātma ādi pratipādanam ca niḥśreyasa upayoti
na tat pañcāvaya vākya uda tad śāstra upadiṣṭa upakaraṇāt vinā sidhyati iti anena abhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam
avayavānām pṛthak abhidhānam ākṣeptum vikalpayati kim punar avayavāḥ iti
vikalpa prayojanam pṛcchati kim ca atas
uttaram yadi pramāṇa antaram iti
samādhatte na pramāṇa antaram iti
prayojana antaram āha te ete iti

original: yata eva vādādipravṛttihetavo 'ta eva tattvavyavasthāyāścāśrayā bhavantīti /
analyzed: yatas eva vāda ādi pravṛtti hetavaḥ te eva tattva vyavasthāyāḥ ca āśrayāḥ bhavanti iti
pṛcchatikaḥ iti
na hi kuṇḍam iva vadarāṇi tattva vyavasthā avayavān āśrayati iti arthaḥ
uttaram viśeṣa pratipādaka tvam
viśeṣaḥ
viśiṣyate iti vyutpattyā
tad pratipādaka tvam avayavānām tattva vyavasthā āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ
krama prāpta tarka pada vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣate tarkaḥ na pramāṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ
pramāṇa padena hi catvāri pramāṇāni
na ca eteṣu anyatamaḥ tarkaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: astu tarhi pramāṇapadasaṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇāntaramasaṃgṛhītaṃ pramāṇapadena prameyapadenevāsaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ prameyā ityata  #
analyzed: astu tarhi pramāṇa pada saṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇa antaram asaṃgṛhītam pramāṇa padena prameya padena iva asaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśaya ādayaḥ prameyāḥ iti atas
āhana pramāṇa antaram
bhāṣyam anubhāṣya hetum āha aparicchedaka tvāt aniścāyaka tvāt
tat eva vyatireka mukhena darśayati pramāṇam iti
syāt etat
aparicchedaka tvam asiddham tarka jñānasya saṃśaya ādi vat guṇa tvena ātma liṅga tvāt
anyathā tu akiñcitkara vāt upādāna vaiyarthyam iti atas āha pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāgāt tu iti

original: na hi vayaṃ guṇatvenotpattimattvena vā rūpeṇāniścāyakatvaṃ tarkasyācakṣmahe,
analyzed: na hi vayam guṇa tvena utpattimat tvena vā rūpeṇa aniścāyaka tvam tarkasya ācakṣmahe
kim tu pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāga hetu tayā
na ca evam asya akiñcitkara tvam iti arthaḥ
pṛcchatikaḥ punar iti
uttaram yuktā a yuktā iti
idam yuktam idam ayuktam iti
itikāreṇa yukta ayukta viṣayam tarka jñānam parāmṛśati
tat anena tarkasya svarūpam darśitam
tasya tatra yuktam bhavati
saṃbhavati tat anujānāti na tu avadhārayati tarkaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati pramāṇaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāya pravṛttaṃ karaṇatayā itikartavyatāmapekṣate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati pramāṇam tattva avadhāraṇāya pravṛttam karaṇa tayā itikartavya tām apekṣate

original: tarkaśca pramāṇaviṣayayuktāyuktavicārātmā pramāṇaṃ yukte tattve pravartamānamanujānan pramāṇamanugṛhṇarati /
analyzed: tarkaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣaya yukta ayukta vicāra ātmā pramāṇam yukte tattve pravartamānam anujānan pramāṇam anugṛhṇarati
tad anugṛhītam pramāṇam tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam

original: na ca pramāṇaviṣaye cet tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtamasya pramāṇānujñayā,
analyzed: na ca pramāṇa viṣaye ced tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtam asya pramāṇa anujñayā
nanu ayam eva niścāyakaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti sāmpratam
tasya prasaṅga tayā pāratantryeṇa svayam asādhana tvāt

original: asti hi prasaṅgo na prasaṅgo hetuḥ /
analyzed: asti hi prasaṅgaḥ na prasaṅgaḥ hetuḥ

original: tathā hi pratyakṣameva tāvad bhūtale pravartamānaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā ghaṭābhāve 'pi pravartamānaṃ yadyatrābhaviṣyad ghaṭo bhūtalamivādrakṣyata,
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat bhū tale pravartamānam tad viśeṣaṇa tayā ghaṭa abhāve pi pravartamānam yat yatra abhaviṣyat ghaṭaḥ bhū talam iva adrakṣyata
tena saha tulya darśana yogya tvāt
na ca dṛśyate

original: tasmānnāstīti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaṃ ghaṭābhāviśiṣṭe bhūtale pravartate kevalamevedaṃ bhūtalaṃ neha ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: tasmāt na asti iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānam ghaṭa abhā viśiṣṭe bhū tale pravartate kevalam eva idam bhū talam na iha ghaṭaḥ iti

original: evaṃ svargakāmo yajeta iti śabdo 'pi pravartamānaḥ paramāptasya bhagavatar iśvarasya
analyzed: evam svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śabdaḥ pi pravartamānaḥ parama āptasya iśvarasya

original: niyogo nāsvargaphalāyāṃ yāgabhāvanāyāmavakalpata iti samānapadenopatto 'pi duḥkhatayā
analyzed: niyogaḥ na a svarga phalāyām yāga bhāvanāyām avakalpate iti duḥkha tayā
dhātvarthaḥ sādhyaḥ iti na yuktam

original: bhinnapadopatto 'pi puruṣaviśeṣaṇamapi svarga eva bhāvanāphalaṃ yukta iti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: puruṣa viśeṣaṇam api svargaḥ eva bhāvanā phalam yuktaḥ iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānaḥ pravartate

original: na ca yadyabhaviṣyad ghaṭa iti vā yadyabhaviṣyad dhātvarthaḥ sāghya iti vā kriyātipattirasti,
analyzed: na ca yadi abhaviṣyat ghaṭaḥ iti vā yadi abhaviṣyat dhātvarthaḥ sāghyaḥ iti vā kriyā atipattiḥ asti
yad āśraya aniṣṭa prasaṅgena ayukta tvam itarathā tu yukta tvam
tat tarkeṇa niśvīyate
tasmāt na pramāṇam

original: niśvayāya tu pravṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadviṣayavivecanenānugṛhṇan itikartavyātvenopayujyate /
analyzed: niśvayāya tu pravṛttam pramāṇam tad viṣaya vivecanena anugṛhṇan itikartavyā tvena upayujyate
yarthā uktam
mīmāṃsā saṃjñakaḥ tarkaḥ sarva veda samudbhāvaḥ
saḥ taḥ vedaḥ
pūjita vicāra vacanaḥ hi mīmāṃsā śabdaḥ
ayukta pratiṣedhena yukta abhyanujñānam tarkaḥ
pramāṇa itikartavya tā tvena ca pramāṇāt vedāt bhedaḥ uktaḥ
saḥ taḥ veda iti aṅga āḍi ganoḥ abheda vivakṣayā
itikartavya tā tvam ca asya sākṣat darśitam
dharme pramīyamāṇe hi vedena karaṇa ātmanā
itikartavya tā bhāgam mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati
iti sarvam avadātam
tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣye karma iti
karma kāraṇakam apūrvam dharma adharmau iti yāvat
kārye kāraṇa tva upacārāt
etad upapādanāya pṛcchati katham punati iti
nikāya viśiṣṭābhiḥ apūrvābhiḥ śarīra indriya buddhi vedanābhiḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ janma
tasya katham karma nimitta tā iti arthaḥ
atra pramāṇam anumānam āha bhadavat tvāt
vicitra tvāt iti arthaḥ
pṛcchatikaḥ punar iti
bhedam āha sugatiḥ iti
pramāṇam uktvā tasya itikartavya tā bhūtam tarkam avatārayati saḥ yam bhedaḥ iti

original: yadyekaṃ nimittaṃ syād vaicitryaṃ na bhavet /
analyzed: yadi ekam nimittam syāt vaicitryam na bhavet
na hi abhinnāt kārya vaicitryam upapadyate
tasya ākasmika tva prasaṅgāt
atas uktam anekam iti
nanu anekam yāga ādi brahmahatyā ādi kriyā rūpam kāraṇam astam kṛtam apūrvaiḥ iti atas uktam avasthitam

original: yāgādikā tu kriyā āśutaravināśinī na cirabhāvine svargāya kalpata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yāga ādikā tu kriyā āśutara vināśinī na cira bhāvine svargāya kalpate iti arthaḥ

original: avasthitaṃ ced yāgādyāhitamapūrvaṃ dharmo 'stīti sadaiva sukhinā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: avasthitam ced yāga ādi āhitam apūrvam dharmaḥ sti iti sadā eva sukhinā bhavitavyam

original: evamadharmo 'stīti sadaiva duḥkhī syāditi sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kādācitkatvaṃ vyāhanyeta /
analyzed: evam adharmaḥ asti iti sadā eva duḥkhī syāt iti sukha duḥkhayoḥ kādācitka tvam vyāhanyeta
na hi avasthitāt kāraṇāt anavasthitam kāryam iti atas uktam anityam
na hi avasthānam nitya tām brūmaḥ

original: kiṃ tu tāvadanena sthātavyaṃ na yāvadantyasukhaduḥkhasaṃvijñānaṃ janayati,
analyzed: kim tu tāvat anena sthātavyam na yāvat antya sukha duḥkha saṃvijñānam janayati
atha naśyati iti
nanu bhinnāni santu apūrvāṇi
tathā api sarvāṇi sarva ātma samaveta ati
yathā avayavī sva avayaveṣu
tathā ca sarva sādhāraṇyāt na ukta vaicitrya utpādaḥ iti atas uktam eka dravyam

original: ekadravyaṃ cedastu tarhi sarvasādhāraṇe pṛthivyādau yatra kvacit /
analyzed: eka dravyam ced astu tarhi sarva sādhāraṇe pṛthivī ādau yatra kvacid
tathā api vaivitrya anupapattiḥ iti atas uktam pratyātma niyatam

original: atha pṛthivyādyeva kāraṇa janmavaicitrye kasmānna bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati--kiṃ kāraṇamiti kasmāt kāraṇādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atha pṛthivī ādi eva kāraṇa janma vaicitrye kasmāt na bhavati iti āśayavān pṛcchati kim kāraṇam iti kasmāt kāraṇāt iti arthaḥ
uttaram pṛthivī āpadīnām iti
mā bhūt pṛthivī ādi
pṛthivī ādi gatam kiñcid bhaviṣyati iti atas āha pṛthivī ādi gatasya iti
bhāṣya ukta prameya tve tarkasya hetum āha aupalabdhi viṣaya tvāt iti
tarka anantaram nirṇayaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tarka hetuka tvāt
tasya svarūpam āha nirṇayaḥ tattva jñānam iti
yadi evam indriya āpāta janma pratyakṣa jñānam api tattva jñānam iti nirṇayaḥ syāt iti atas āha pramāṇa nām iti
anena pañca avayava vākyam upalakṣayati
tatra sa tarkāṇām pramāṇānām samāvāyāt

original: paramārthatastu tarkapūrvakastattvaviniścayo nirṇaya iti pratyakṣādīnāmapi tarkasahāyānāṃ nirṇayaphalatvamiti /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu tarka pūrvakaḥ tattva viniścayaḥ nirṇayaḥ iti pratyakṣa ādīnām api tarka sahāyānām nirṇaya phala tvam iti
syāt etat

original: dhūmādigocareṇa nirṇayena vahnyādāvanumīyamāne pramāṇabheva nirṇayo na phalamityāśayavān pṛcchati--kadā punatiti /
analyzed: dhūma ādi gocareṇa nirṇayena vahni ādau anumīyamāne pramāṇa bhā iva nirṇayaḥ na phalam iti āśayavān pṛcchati kadā punati iti
vidita abhiprāyasya uttaram yadā iti
saṃkalayya tarka nirṇaya vyutpādanasya prayojanam āha tau etau iti
tra lokaḥ loka śabdena ucyate
tad itarasya tarka asaṃbhavāt
buddhvā iti parīkṣya nirṇayam kṛtvā iti arthaḥ
śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam
nirṇaya anantaram vāda vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam vādaḥ khalu iti
tad anubhāṣya upapattim āha vādaḥ iti
nānā pravaktāraḥ yasmin sa tathā

original: ekasyāpi śāstrakartuḥ pūrvapakṣottarapakṣasādhanadūṣaṇapratipādako vacanasamūho vādaḥ syāditi nānāpravaktṛka ityuktam /
analyzed: ekasya api śāstra kartuḥ pūrvapakṣa uttarapakṣa sādhana dūṣaṇa pratipādakaḥ vacana samūhaḥ vādaḥ syāt iti nānā pravaktṛkaḥ iti uktam

original: siddhāntabhedānavidhānena hi dvāvapi svasiddhāntānurūpaṃ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ cāhaturityarthaḥ /
analyzed: siddhānta bhedān avidhānena hi dvau api sva siddhānta anurūpam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca āhatuḥ iti arthaḥ
pratyadhikaraṇa ityādi bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ācaṣṭe pratyadhikaraṇam asya sādhanam
adhikriyate iti adhikaraṇam sādhyam
tat adhikṛtya sādhana pravṛtteḥ

original: pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanaṃ yasmin vāde sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: sādhanam yasmin vāde sa tathā uktaḥ
asya eva artham niṣkarṣṭum pṛcchati kim uktam bhavati
niṣkarṣati ubhābhyām vādi prativādibhyām sva sva sādhye sādhanam vaktavyam

original: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkatvena tulyatve 'pi vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇasādhanatvena bhadeḥ siddho bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca nānā pravaktṛka tvena tulya tve pi vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇa sādhana tvena bhadeḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīna tayā prati adhi kāraṇa sādhana tva abhāvāt
tathā api jalpāt abhedaḥ vādasya

original: asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇasādhanavatvaṃ ca nānāpravaktṛkatvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇa sādhanava tvam ca nānā pravaktṛka tvam ca iti
atas āha anyatarasmin adhikaraṇe nirṇayaḥ iti
vāde hi tāvat brūte
na yāvat anyatarasmin pakṣe nirṇayaḥ jātaḥ
tattva bubhutsoḥ vādinoḥ vāde adhikārāt
jalpe tu puruṣa śakti parīkṣā lakṣaṇe pratibhā ādinā api parājya upapatteḥ na avaśyam tattva nirṇayaḥ
tasmāt anyatara nirṇaya avasāna tvena jalpāt bhedaḥ vādasya iti siddham
yathā ca etat
tathā upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate iti āha tat ca iti
tasya svarūpam pṛcchati saḥ yam iti
uttaram vākyā iti
codayati nanu ca iti
vākya samūhaḥ ca jñānam ca iti vipratiṣiddham etat iti arthaḥ
pariharati na iti
sādhana upālambha grahaṇasya śabda viṣaya tvāt avidodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
yugapad eva jalpa vitaṇḍe vyācaṣṭe itad viśeṣau iti
viśiṣyete bhidyate iti viśeṣau
tasmāt vādāt viśeṣau bhinnau
bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar viśeṣaḥ
yad yogāt viśiṣṭe vādāt jalpa vitaṇḍe iti arthaḥ
uttaram aṅga ādhikyam aṅga hāniḥ ca yathāsaṃkhyam
tat eva darśayati chala iti
tat kim idānī saṃśaya ādibhiḥ iva atyanta vairūpyam vādena jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ

original: netyāha--etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathāmārgabheda iti etāvāneva viśeṣo na sarvathā,
analyzed: na iti āha etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathā mārga bhedaḥ iti etāvān eva viśeṣaḥ na sarvathā
kathā tvena saṃśaya ādi vyāvṛttena sāmānya viśeṣeṇa trayāṇām api abhedāt iti arthaḥ
aparam api bheda hetum āha viṣaya bhedāt ca iti
tat vibhajate īśiṣya ādi iti
tyanta viparyastaḥ durjñāna avalepa durvidagdhaḥ iti yāvat
na tu evaṃbhūtaḥ śiṣya ādiḥ viparyastaḥ pi anavalipta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
krama prāptānām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam āha anyatama iti

original: pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅgarūpeṣvanyatamaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayaṃ vānuvidadhānā ahetavo hetuvadābhāsānta iti hetvābhāsā uktāḥ /
analyzed: pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅga rūpeṣu anyatamam liṅgam dharmam ekam dvayam trayam vā anuvidadhānāḥ ahetavaḥ hetuvat ābhāsa antaḥ iti hetvābhāsāḥ uktāḥ
nigrahasthānebhyaḥ iti bhāṣyam avatārayitum āhate ca nigrahasthānam iti
avatārayati nigrahasthāna iti
avatārya dūṣayitum ekadeśi matena vyācaṣṭe yasmāt kila ete iti
kila śabdaḥ yama rucau
tat etat eka deśi vyākhyānam dūṣayati na
ubhayathā api asaṃbandhāt
kim ye ye nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiśyante
te sarve vāde codyante

original: atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti?
analyzed: atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthuk upadiśyante iti
ubhayathā api anaikāntika tvāt na avinābhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat etat vibhajate na vāde codanīya tvam iti
kasmāt ubhayathā api avinābhāva abhāvaḥ iti atas āha yadi tāvat iti

original: tasmāt nāyamavinābhūto heturvāde codanīyatvaṃ vā pṛthagupadeśo vā bhāṣyakāreṇokta ityupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
analyzed: tasmāt na ayam avinābhūtaḥ hetuḥ vāde codanīya tvam vā pṛthak upadeśaḥ vā bhāṣyakāreṇa uktaḥ iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
vāde codanīya tvāt iti upalakṣaṇam
pṛthak upadeśāt iti ca draṣṭavyam

original: tadevamekadeśimataṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--etadeva tu nyāyyāmiti /
analyzed: tat evam ekadeśi matam dūṣayitvā sva matena bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe etat eva tu nyāyyām iti

original: nigrahasthānebhyo hetvābhāsānāṃ pṛthagupadeśe prayojanaṃ yad bhāṣyākṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate /
analyzed: nigrahasthānebhyaḥ hetvābhāsānām pṛthak upadeśe prayojanam yat bhāṣya akṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate

original: sāmānyopadeśena viśeṣa upadiṣṭe viśeṣopadeśaḥ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
analyzed: sāmānya upadeśena viśeṣe upadiṣṭe viśeṣa upadeśaḥ prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati

original: yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ceti kaṭhabhojane viśeṣo gamyate,
analyzed: yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ca iti kaṭha bhojane viśeṣaḥ gamyate

original: tadvadihāpi nigrahasthānopadeśenaiva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣāṃ viśeṣeṇābhidhānaṃ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
analyzed: tadvat iha api nigrahasthāna upadeśena eva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣām viśeṣeṇa abhidhānam prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati

original: etāvāneva sūtrakṛto vyāpāro yat sūtraṇaṃ nāma /
analyzed: etāvān eva sūtrakṛtaḥ vyāpāraḥ yat sūtraṇam nāma

original: tatra nigrahasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ svarūpaṃ vādasya ca tattvanirṇayāvasānatvamālocya
analyzed: tatra nigrahasthāna viśeṣāṇām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam vādasya ca tattva nirṇaya avasāna tvam ālocya

original: vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigrahasthānatvena hetvābhāsā nāpratibhādaya iti prayojanaṃ
analyzed: vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti nigrahasthāna tvena hetvābhāsāḥ na apratibhā ādayaḥ iti prayojanam
varṇayāñcakāra bhāṣyakāraḥ
syāt etat
bhavantu vāde codanīyāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
mā ca bhuvan apratibhā ādayaḥ
kim evam api iti āha vidyā prasthāna prameda jñāpana artha tvāt
vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ vidyāḥ paramparayā niḥśreyasa upayogāt
tāsām prasthānam vyāpāraḥ
tasya bhedaḥ
tad jñāpana artha tvāt
atas eva jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti āha
codayati atha kasmāt iti

original: yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tato nigrahasthānatvena codyeran,
analyzed: yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tatas nigrahasthāna tvena codyeran

original: na tu teṣāmasti prayogo 'pramāṇatvāt pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhatvācca vādasya /
analyzed: na tu teṣām asti prayogo pramāṇa tvāt pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha tvāt ca vādasya
tasmāt nigrahasthāna mātra tvam hetvābhāsānām
tathā ca na pṛthak upadeśaḥ
nigrahasthāna upadeśena eva labdha tvāt iti arthaḥ
pariharati pramāṇa sāmānyāt iti
na khalu hetu ābhāsan tad duddhyā prayu
jāte vādi prativādinau
api tu hetu buddhyā

original: tathā cāsti teṣāṃ vāde prayoga iti vāde nigrahasthānatvena hevābhāsāścādyantām,
analyzed: tathā ca asti teṣām vāde prayogaḥ iti vāde nigrahasthāna tvena hevābhāsāḥ ca ādyantām
na apratibhā ādīni iti arthavān pṛthak upadeśaḥ
tat etat vikalpya ākṣipativāde kānicid iti
samādhattena
lakṣaṇa paratantra tvāt artha tathābhāvasya iti brūmaḥ
lakṣyate iti lakṣaṇam

original: samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ vādasya ca nigrahasthānānāṃ ca /
analyzed: samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam rūpam vādasya ca nigrahasthānānām ca
tad adhīnaḥ hi teṣām tathābhāvaḥ vyavasthā

original: kānicideva nigrahasthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇīti sāmānyato 'bhidhāya tadeva lakṣaṇaparatantratvamabhimate viśeṣe yojayati--vādasyeti /
analyzed: kānicid eva nigrahasthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇi iti sāmānyatas bhidhāya tat eva lakṣaṇa paratantra tvam abhimate viśeṣe yojayati vādasya iti
uktam ākṣipati pramāṇa pratirūpaka tvāt iti
niścitau hi vādam kurūtaḥ
niścayaḥ ca pramāṇa phalam iti pramāṇasya avakāśaḥ iti arthaḥ
uttaram bhrānteḥ iti

original: na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇamūlo 'pramāṇamūlasyāpi tasya darśanāt,
analyzed: na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇa mūlaḥ pramāṇa mūlasya api tasya darśanāt
anyathā viparyāsāt apravṛtti prasaṅgāt
vādinoḥ ca abhrānta tve vastunaḥ viruddha dharma dvaya samāliṅgita tvam ekadā syāt iti bhāvaḥ
pṛcchatikaḥ punar śiṣya iti

original: upāsyopāsakayoḥ parasparaṃ na dhvaṃsanaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: upāsya upāsakayoḥ parasparam na dhvaṃsanam saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram vivakṣita artha apratipādaka tvam eva na khalīkāraḥ iti

original: hetvābhāsānāṃ ca pṛthakkaraṇaṃ na vāde tanmātrāvadhāraṇārtham,
analyzed: hetvābhāsānām ca pṛthakkaraṇam na vāde tanmātra avadhāraṇa artham

original: api tu yasminnanuddhāvite 'pi nigrahasthāne tattvapratipattivyāghāto bhavati,
analyzed: api tu yasmin an uddhāvite nigrahasthāne tattva pratipatti vyāghātaḥ bhavati
tasya sarvasya saṃgraha artham

original: evaṃ ca nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntā api saṃgṛjītā bhavanti /
analyzed: evam ca nyūna adhika apasiddhāntāḥ api saṃgṛjītāḥ bhavanti
tatra pṛcchati nyūna adhika iti
uttaram pramāṇā iti
jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya upapādayati jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti

original: sāhaṅkāro vijigīṣurapratibhādibhirapi nigrahasthānaistiraskṛto galitāhaṅkārastattvabubhutsutāṃ nītaḥ paścād vādena vyutpādyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: sa ahaṅkāraḥ vijigīṣuḥ apratibhā ādibhiḥ api nigrahasthānaiḥ tiraskṛtaḥ galita ahaṅkāraḥ tattva bubhutsu tām nītaḥ paścāt vādena vyutpādyate iti arthaḥ
chala jāti nigrahasthānānām pṛthak upadeśa prayojana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣate chala iti
upalakṣaṇa artham iti bhāṣya avayavam vyācaṣṭe
parijñāna artham eva kevalam
piḥ ajñānasya phalam uktam sva vākye parivarjanam aprayogaḥ
para vākye ca udbhāvanam iti
codayati chala jāti nigrahasthānāni iti

original: atra hi jāteḥ svavākye parivarjanamuktvā punaḥ svayaṃ prayogo na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: atra hi jāteḥ sva vākye parivarjanam uktvā punar svayam prayogaḥ na yuktaḥ
kasmāt vyāghātāt
etat vibhajate su vākye iti
pariharati na vyāghātaḥ
kutas praśna apākaraṇa artha tvāt

original: tad vibhajate--svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kimuktaṃ bhavati?
analyzed: tat vibhajate svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kim uktam bhavati

original: pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyāṃ vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiranena prativādinā prayukteti /
analyzed: pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyām vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiḥ anena prativādinā prayuktā iti
te prāśnikāḥ enam paryanuyu

original: jīran he vādin kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyāṃ jātiṣu katamā jātiriti?
analyzed: jīran he vādin katham kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyām jātiṣu katamā jātiḥ iti
saḥ yam prāśnikānām praśnaḥ
tad apākaraṇa artham svayam sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti arthaḥ
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt ete iti
sūtrakāreṇa śāstrasya ātyantika duḥkha uparama rūpa niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ prayojanam uktam
bhāṣyakāraḥ tu na asti eva tat prekṣāvatām prayojanam
catra ānvīkṣikī na nimittam bhavati iti āha sā iyam ānvīkṣikī iti
tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe sā iyam ānvīkṣikī

original: yadyapītarā vidyāḥ pramāṇikamevārthamabhiniviśante tathāpyetadvidyāpratipādyameva pramāṇādyupajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra,
analyzed: yadi api itarāḥ vidyāḥ pramāṇikam eva artham abhiniviśante tathā api etad vidyā pratipādyam eva pramāṇa ādi upajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve
na tu pramāṇa ādi api vyutpādayanti

original: yathā pratyakṣādyupajīvya pravartamānamanumānaṃ na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeva gocarayati /
analyzed: yathā pratyakṣa ādi upajīvya pravartamānam anumānam na pratyakṣa ādi viṣayam api tadānīm eva gocarayati
tat anena vidyā upakaraṇa grahaṇena vyāpāraḥ ānvīkṣikyā darśitaḥ

original: saṃprati vidyānāṃ yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāmāgrihotrakṛṣyādīni tatrāpyānvīkṣikyupāya ityāha--upāyaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ vidyāvyutpādyānām,
analyzed: saṃprati vidyānām yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāma agrihotra kṛṣi ādīni tatra api ānvīkṣikī upāyaḥ iti āha aupāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām vidyā vyutpādyānām
na tu hālika mṛgayu ādi karmaṇām api
na hi vidyā padebhyaḥ yāvat mātrā gatiḥ
tāvat mātreṇa prekṣavatām paritoṣaḥ
mā bhūt
ādityaḥ vai yūpaḥ
ityādibhyaḥ āditya ādīnā yūpa ādi tā

original: tasmāt saṃśayaparīkṣāpramāṇaviniveśa dvāreṇa tadarthatattvamavadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃśaya parīkṣā pramāṇa viniveśa dvāreṇa tad artha tattvam avadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā
evam daṇḍanīti vārtayoḥ anugantavyam

original: tasmādānvīkṣikīpariśodhitapramāṇapramāśitaṃ sāmādi itarā vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayamiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ānvīkṣikī pariśodhita pramāṇa pramāśitam sāma ādi itarāḥ vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayam iti śeṣaḥ

original: api ca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmabhimatānabhimatopāyatāprajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvā vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā /
analyzed: api ca dravya guṇa karmaṇām abhimata anabhimata upāya tā prajñāpanena sarvāḥ vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā
tatra kim aviśeṣeṇa sādhya sādhana itikartavya tāsu pravartayantu
āhosvit sādhana itikartavya tā mātre
tatra yadi pravartanā gocaraḥ
tadā śyena ādi sādhyāyāḥ hiṃsāyāḥ vihita tvena na anarthavatvam

original: atha sādhyāṃśaṃ rāgataḥ prāptamanūdya sādhanetikartavyate eva vidharayete,
analyzed: atha sādhya aṃśam rāgataḥ prāptam anūdya sādhana iti kartavya te eva vidharayete

original: tataḥ śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā avihitatvena na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhādanarthatvam /
analyzed: tatas śyena ādi sādhyāyāḥ hiṃsāyāḥ avihita tvena na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhāt anartha tvam
tat iha sādhya aṃśe pravartanam ānvīkṣikī gamyam
evam anuṣṭhāna gatāḥ prayojaka tva aprayojaka tva ādayaḥ ānvīkṣikī gamyāḥ
evam vārttā ādiṣu api iti

original: tadevamānvīkṣikīmāśrayante sarvavidyā ityāha--āśrayaḥ sarvadharmāṇām sarvāsāṃ vidyānāṃ puruṣapravartanā dharmāḥ,
analyzed: tat evam ānvīkṣikīm āśrayante sarva vidyāḥ iti āha āśrayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām sarvāsām vidyānām puruṣa pravartanāḥ dharmāḥ
teṣām āśrayaḥ
vārtikakāraḥ tu dharma dvāreṇa vidyānām eva śrayaḥ iti vyācaṣṭe sarva vidyā upakāraka tvāt āśrayaḥ

original: sa ca vidyāntarasādhāraṇa iti vidyāntarādhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkaraprasaṅga ityata āha--tadidaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamaśca yathāvidyaṃ  #

iha tu pramāṇa ādi yadi api sādhāraṇam

original: na ca prayojanasaṃbandhanirṇayaḥ parīkṣāṃ vineti tatparīkṣārthaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtram /

original: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanābhidhānaṃ granthakṛtāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ samīcīnamasamīcīnaṃ ca,

original: tatrotsūtreṇa prayojanābhisaṃbandhapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamityādi /

ānvīkṣikī ca saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāpanam pramāṇa tattva jñāpanāya upādatte
pramāṇa tattva jñāpanam ca heya upādeya bheda vyavasthita prameya tattva parijñāpanāya
tatra api ādi anta varjita daśa varga jñāpanam ādi antayoḥ eva ātma apavargayoḥ ūpādeyayoḥ tattva jñānasya upakaroti
na ca ayam ānvīkṣikī vidyā avaghṛta prameya tattvaḥ pi parituṣyati
pūrvavat eva ātma ādi gata viparyaya vāsanā anuvṛtteḥ
no khalu diṅmūḍhaḥ sahasreṇa api anumāṇaiḥ viparyaya saṃskāram apanayati
tattva asākṣātkāraḥ tu viparyaya saṃskārāḥ nivartayati
tad janitā ca vāsanā viparyaya vāsanām iti loka siddham
tasmāt ātma ādi sākṣātkāravatīm caturthau pratītim aśeṣa tad gocara vāsanā viparyāsa śamanīm arthayamānena ādara nairantararyābhyām
dhyāna cintā ādi śabda vācyā tṛtīyā pratītiḥ sākṣātkāra phalā dīrgha kālam upāsanīyā

original: atha pariniṣpannadhyānopāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīṃ pratipadya caturthau pratītiṃ nirmuktasakalakleśajālaḥ

acintyaḥ hi samādhi prabhāvaḥ iti uktam

original: na cācintyatvād vinaivopabhogena karmāśayān prakṣayiṣyatīti yuktam,
