tatra api sārūpya saṃbhavāt
tathā hi bahi nirgacchat ati accha nayana raśmi saṃpṛkta pitta gatam pītimānam āśraya rahitam

original: śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditasitimānamanubhavan pītagaṇasya ca tadasaṃbandhamananubhavaṃstadasaṃbandhāgraheṇa pītacīravilvādisāmānādhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt  #
analyzed: śaṅkham ca doṣa ācchādita siti mānam anubhavan pītagaṇasya ca tad asaṃbandham an anubhavan tad asaṃbandha agraheṇa pīta cīra vilva ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt  /
śaṅkha pīta iti viparyasyati
evam tvac indriya upanītam guḍa dravyam ananubhūyamāna mādhuryam anubhavan rasanā agra vartinaḥ ca
pittasya asvabhāva jāta tiktasya tikta tvam anubhavan tad āśrayam ca pittam ananubhavan asaṃbandha agraha sārūpyāt
tikta nimba sāmānādhikaraṇyena tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti vapiḥ yasyati
ati śīghra tayā ca eṣa kramaḥ na lakṣyate

original: na ca brūmo yatra sārūpyaṃ tatra bhrama iti,
analyzed: na ca brūmaḥ yatra sārūpyam tatra bhramaḥ iti
yena ati prasaktiḥ codyeta

original: api tu yatra bhramastatrāvaśyaṃ kathañcit sārūpyamiti /
analyzed: api tu yatra bhramaḥ tatra avaśyam kathañcid sārūpyam iti
evam dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra ādiṣu api kiñcid kathañcid sārūpyam ūhanīyam
na ca sa dasatoḥ atyanta vilakṣaṇayoḥ sārūpyam asti
tat katham ātmani nāstitā āropaḥ iti ākṣepaḥ
samādhattena
pramāṇa gamya tā upapatte
ākṣepam vibhajatena hi sat asatī iti
samādhānam vibhajata tat ca na evam iti
yadi sat asatoḥ samāna tvam na asti
tarhi bhedaḥ

original: tathā ca kasya kutrāropa ityata āha--kriyāguṇeti /
analyzed: tathā ca kasya kutra āropaḥ iti atas āha kriyā guṇa iti

original: so 'yamasaddharmān kriyāguṇarahitatvādīn satyātmani samāropya asattayā viparyasyati--nāstyātmeti,
analyzed: saḥ yam asat dharmān kriyā guṇa rahita tva ādīn sati ātmani samāropya asat tayā viparyasyati na asti ātmā iti
natvā ātmānam sarvatas bhyarhitatamam paśyan tatra asau snihyati
snehāt ca tad upakārāya ghaṭate
evam tat paripanthinam dveṣṭi
dveṣāt ca tad apakārāya dyaṭate
tatas ca karma āśayam ācinoti
tatas janma
tatas ca duḥkham iti
evam ātmanaḥ tādṛśasya mā bhūt tattva ajñānam

original: astu nāstitāsamāropa eva tāvad yato na pravartate /
analyzed: astu nāstitā samāropaḥ eva tāvat yatas na pravartate
yathā āhuḥ

original: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ /
analyzed: sukhī bhaveyam duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajam sattva darśanam
pravā atra ucyate
yadi api rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ nairātmya darśanam
tathā api na asti karma
na asti karma phalam iti dṛṣṭeḥ paramam nidānam
evam pretyabhāva abhāva jñānasya ca
tathā ca duḥkha hetoḥ heya vargasya abhāvāt na tat hānāyānena ghaṭitavyam
na heyam hātum arhati
saḥ yam vṛścika bhiyā palāyamānaḥ āśīviṣa mukheni patitaḥ
sā icam āstika tvāya ātma astitā upāsanīyā
abhyarhita tā ca ātmanaḥ tyanta duḥkha nivṛttau upapadyate
ayam eva ca asya upakāraḥ yat ātyantika duḥkha śamanam
sūkhādhāne tu asya tad anuṣaṅgi duḥkhādhānāt apakāra prasaṅgāt

original: na hi jātu kaściccetanaḥ sukhamāpsyāmīti madhuviṣasampṛktamannamupabhuṅkte /
analyzed: na hi jātu kaścid cetanaḥ sukham āpsyāmi iti madhu viṣa sampṛktam annam upabhuṅkte
tasmāt nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ prayatnena ucchettavyā prekṣāvatā iti siddham
aparam api saṃsāra hetu mithyādarśanam āha evam anātmani iti
pṛcchati ki punar iti
uttaram ahaṅkāra iti
viśeṣam āha aicchā ādi iti
punar pṛcchati katham punar iti
uttaram śarīrā iti
upasaṃharati evam iti
sāmānya dharmaḥ haṅkāra āspada tvam
viśeṣa dharmaḥ icchā ādi ādhāra tā

original: tāṃ khalvayaṃ śarīrādiṣvāropya eta evāhamiti śarīrādiṣvātmabhāvamāropayati //
analyzed: tām khalu ayam śarīra ādiṣu āropya ete eva aham iti śarīra ādiṣu ātma bhāvam āropayati
evam siddham kṛtvā viparyayam sarvam uktam

original: saṃprati sandihāno viparyayasvarūpaṃ pṛcchati--kaḥ punarayaṃ viparyayaḥ?
analyzed: saṃprati sandihānaḥ viparyaya svarūpam pṛcchati kaḥ punar ayam viparyayaḥ
parīkṣakāṇām vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ
kecid sva ākāra bāhya tva viṣayam jñānam viparyayaḥ iti ācakṣate
anye sāt viṣayam jñānam
anye tu anirvacanīyam eva jñānam
apare tu agrahaṇam
anyathākhyāti tu vṛddhāḥ
pratyayaḥ

original: idamatrākūtam--na tāvat svākāraṃ rajatādi bāhyatayā ālambante vibhramāḥ /
analyzed: idam atra ākūtam na tāvat sva ākāram rajata ādi bāhya tayā ālambante vibhramāḥ
tathā hi jñāna ākāra tvam rajata ādeḥ anubhavāt vyavasthāpyet
anumānāt vā
rajata pratyayaḥ vā
bādhaka patyayaḥ vā
na tāvat rajata pratyayaḥ
sa hi idam anahaṅkāra ākāra āspadam rajatam ādarśayati
na ca antaram
aham iti hi tadā syāt
pratipattuḥ pratyayāt a vyatirekāt

original: bhrāntaṃ hi jñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatā ālambate /
analyzed: bhrāntam hi jñānam sva ākāram eva bāhya tā ālambate
tathā ca anahaṅkāra āspadam asya viṣayaḥ
jñāna ākāra tā punar asya bādhaka jñāna pravedanīyā iti ced

original: hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālikapakṣapātaṃ parityajyālocayatvāyuṣmān ki purovartidravyākāratāmātraṃ pratiṣedhati rajatasya,
analyzed: hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālika pakṣapātam parityajya ālocayatu āyuṣmān ki purovarti dravya ākāra tā mātram pratiṣedhati rajatasya
āhosvit jñāna ākāra tām api asya ādarśayati bādhaka pratyayaḥ

original: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra jñāna ākāra tā upadarśana vyāpāram bādhaka pratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ
purovarti tva niṣedhāt arthāt jñāna ākāra tā siddhiḥ iti ced
tad niṣedhaḥ vaṇij vīthi ādau upalabdhasya rajatasya vyāvasthāpane hetuḥ
āntara tvam tu asya anupalabdha caram kutastyam
na ca anumānam atra prabhavati iti

original: santu tarhi bādhakapratyayānurodhād asatprakāśanaśīlā eva mithyāpratyayāḥ /
analyzed: santu tarhi bādhaka pratyaya anurodhāt asat prakāśana śīlāḥ eva mithyā pratyayāḥ

original: tathā hi bādhakaṃ vijñānaṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti rajatajñānagocarasyāsattvaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: tathā hi bādhakam vijñānam na idam rajatam iti rajata jñāna gocarasya asattvam gṛhṇāti
na ca asataḥ viṣaya bhāvaḥ na upapadyate

original: na hi viṣayatvaṃ nāma kāraṇatvaṃ yenāsati na syāt,
analyzed: na hi viṣaya tvam nāma kāraṇa tvam yena asati na syāt
kim tu sva kāraṇa dhīnaḥ sāmarthya atiśayaḥ
sa tādṛśaḥ jñānasya
yena santam iva asantam api gocarayati
na ca viṣaya sāmarthyam atra upayujyate
jñānasya sāmarthyāt eva tad bhāva siddheḥ
atas eva asat prakāśana sāmarthyam eva mithyājñānānām avidyā tvam anirvacanīyam kecid āsthiṣata
atra idam ālocanīyam kim etat mithyājñānam asat sat ātmanā gṛhṇāti iti asat viṣayam upeyate

original: āhosvit sadeva sadantarātmanā gahṇāti sataśca sadantarātmatvena asattvādasadviṣayamucyate?
analyzed: āhosvit sat eva sat antarātmanā sataḥ ca sat antarātma tvena asat tvāt asat viṣayam ucyate
na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ

original: rajatātmanā cet asadālambeta na satī śuktikām,
analyzed: rajata ātmanā ced asat ālambeta na satī śuktikām

original: kathaṃ punarasau rajātartho śuktau pravartate na punā rajatābhāve /
analyzed: katham punar asau śuktau pravartate na rajata abhāve

original: kaskāccedamiti purovarti dravyamaṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajatatvaṃ niṣedhati nedaṃ rajatamiti,
analyzed: kaskāt ca idam iti purovarti dravyam aṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajata tvam niṣedhati na idam rajatam iti

original: yadi tatra na prasañjitaṃ rajatatvaṃ pūrvavijñānena?
analyzed: yadi tatra na prasañjitam rajata tvam pūrva vijñānena

original: atha śuktireva rajatātmanā asatīti tadākāratayā tāmālambamānaṃ mithyājñānamasadālambanamucyate?
analyzed: atha śuktiḥ eva rajata ātmanā asatī iti tad ākāra tayā tām ālambamānam mithyājñānam asat ālambanam ucyate
tatra anujñayā vartāmahe
na khalu anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ sat antaram sat antarātmanā sat abhyupagacchanti
tathā sati anyathā iti eva na syāt
yathā āhuḥ anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ
tasmāt yat anyathā santam anyathā pratipadyate
tat nirālambanam jñānam abhāva ālambana ca tat
ślaḥ vā nirālambana vāde iti
na ca rajata ātmanā purovartinaḥ dravyasya anirvacanīya tā
mithyājñāna samaye sattvena bādhaka samaye ca asattvena nirvacanīya tvāt
na ca evaṃbhūtasya asataḥ prathā nā upapadyate
tasya sat asadbhyām upākhyeya tvāt

original: yaḥpunaḥ advaitavādinā prapajco vaināśikānāṃ vā sāmānyādirno bahiḥ ki tvalīkam /
analyzed: yaḥ punar advaita vādinā vaināśikānām vā sāmānya ādiḥ no bahis ki tu alīkam

original: tadviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ mithyājñānamityapi na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: tad viṣayam ca jñānam mithyājñānam iti api na saṃbhavati
tasya sarva upākhyā rahitasya kenacid sārūpya abhāvāt
tad kāraṇaka tvāt ca bhrānteḥ
kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvasya sulabha tvāt

original: tasmāt prapañcaśca sāmānyādi ca vastusatī nāmamīcīnavijñānagocarau /
analyzed: tasmāt prapañcaḥ ca sāmānya ādi ca vastu satī nāma amīcīna vijñāna gocarau
tad dādhakam ca upariṣṭāt apākariṣyate
tasmāt na a nivacanīya khyātiḥ api
syāt etata
anyat anyathā prakāśate iti saṃvid viruddham
na tāvat sadbhāva mātreṇa ālambana tvam

original: tanmātrasya sarvapratyayasādhāraṇyena sarve 'rthāḥ savarpratyayaviṣayā iti savarsarvajñatāpattiḥ /
analyzed: tanmātrasya sarva pratyaya sādhāraṇyena sarve rthāḥ savar pratyaya viṣayāḥ iti savar sarvajña tā āpattiḥ
na ca kāraṇa tvena ālambana tvam
rūpa ādi vijñānānām rūpa ādi vat cakṣuḥ ādi api kāraṇam iti cakṣuḥ ādi ālambana tva prasaṅgāt
atīta anāgata viṣaya tvam ca vijñānasya na syāt
atīta anāgatayoḥ asattvena akāraṇa tvāt
tasmāt pratibhāsamānam ālambanam
tathā ca rajata pratibhāsaḥ śuktikā ālambanam iti durghaṭam

original: api ca cakṣurādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajananasāmarthyamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānaṃ bhavitumarhati?
analyzed: api ca cakṣuḥ ādīnām samīcīna jñāna upajanana sāmarthyam iti katham ebhyaḥ mithyājñānam bhavitum arhati

original: na hi śyāmākabījaṃ parikarmasahasreṇāpi kalamāṅkurāya kalpate /
analyzed: na hi śyāmāka bījam parikarma sahasreṇa api kalama aṅkurāya kalpate

original: doṣasahāyā locanādayo mithyāpratyayamādadhata iti cet--na doṣā hi kāraṇānāṃ sāmarthya nighnanti,
analyzed: doṣa sahāyāḥ locana ādayaḥ mithyāpratyayam ādadhate iti ced na doṣāḥ hi kāraṇānām sāmarthya nighnanti
na punar kārya antara upajanana sāmarthyam ādadhati

original: na khalu bhṛṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ nyagrodhadhānāyai kalpate,
analyzed: na khalu bhṛṣṭam kuṭaja bījam nyagrodha dhānāyai kalpate
kim tu na karoti kuṭaja dhānām

original: api ca svagocare vyabhicāre vijñānānāṃ sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: api ca sva gocare vyabhicāre vijñānānām sarvatra anāśvāsa prasaṅgaḥ
tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānam samīcīnam āstheyam

original: tathā hi rajatamidamiti dve jñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
analyzed: tathā hi rajatam idam iti dve jñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe
tatra idam iti purovarti dravya mātra grahaṇam
doṣa vaśāt tad gatasya śuktikā tva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt

original: tāvanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛti janayati /
analyzed: tāvanmātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajate smṛti janayati

original: sā ca gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśāt gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa grahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhīta tā aṃśa pramoṣeṇa grahaṇa mātram avatiṣṭhate

original: tathā ca rajatasmṛteḥ purovartimātragrahaṇasya va mithaḥ svarūpataśca viṣayataśca
analyzed: tathā ca rajata smṛteḥ purovarti mātra grahaṇasya mithas svarūpataḥ ca viṣayataḥ ca

original: bhedāgrahaṇāt sannihitarajataviṣayavijñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe
analyzed: bheda agrahaṇāt sannihita rajata viṣaya vijñāna sārūpyeṇa idam rajatam iti bhinne api grahaṇa smaraṇe
abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ
kvacid punargrahaṇe eva mithas gṛhīta prabhede
yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti

original: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kāyasyevātisvacchasya pītattvaṃ ca gṛhyate /
analyzed: atra hi viniryat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya kāyasya iva ati svacchasya pīta tvam ca gṛhyate
pittam tu gṛhyate
śaṅkhaḥ pi doṣa vaśāt guṇa rahitaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate
tat anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ a saṃsarga agrahāt sārūpyāt pīta cira bilva phala pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca
bheda agraha prasañjita abheda vyavahāra bādhānāt ca na idam rajatam iti viveka pratyayasya bādhaka ttvam api upapadyate

original: tadupapattau ca bhrāntatvamapi lokaprasiddhaṃ siddhra bhavati /
analyzed: tad upapattau ca bhrānta tvam api loka prasiddham bhavati

original: tasmād yathārthāḥ sarve 'pi bhramāḥ pratyayatvāt paṭapratyayatvayavaditi prāptam //
analyzed: tasmāt yathārthāḥ sarve bhramāḥ pratyaya tvāt paṭa pratyaya tvaya vat iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate--asti tāvad rajatārthino rajatamiti jñāne sati purovartidravyapravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam
analyzed: evam prāpte bhidhīyate asti tāvat rajata arthinaḥ rajatam iti jñāne sati purovarti dravya pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca iti sarvajanīnam
tat kim grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ tad gocarayoḥ ca bheda agrahāt bhavatu
āhosvit abheda grahāt
na tāvat cetanaḥ jñānāt pravartate
api tu jñānāt

original: purovartivastugrahaṇarajatajñānādagṛhītabhedaṃ svarūpato viṣayato vā rajatārthinaṃ purovartidravye pravartayatīti cet?
analyzed: purovarti vastu grahaṇa rajata jñānāt agṛhīta bhedam svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ vā rajata arthinam purovarti dravye pravartayati iti ced

original: hanta bhoḥ kimetāvatā purovartivastugocaraṃ jñānaṃ rajatagocaraṃ bhavati,
analyzed: hanta bhoḥ kim etāvatā purovarti vastu gocaram jñānam rajata gocaram bhavati
āhosvit tanmātra gocaram eva
yadi rajata gocaram purovarti rajata tayā agṛhṇāt
katham na anyathā khyātiḥ
atha tanmātra gocaram
kaḥ bheda agrahasya upayogaḥ

original: na hi vṛkṣamātradarśanaṃ niścayena śiṃśapārthinaṃ pravartayati,
analyzed: na hi vṛkṣa mātra darśanam niścayena śiṃśapā arthinam pravartayati
na hi tatra śiṃśapā jñānam asti
asti tu iha rajata vijñānam
agṛhīta bhedam idam iti jñānena iti ced

original: nanu rajatavijñānaṃ purovartini dravye na vartate,
analyzed: nanu rajata vijñānam purovartini dravye na vartate

original: purovartijñānaṃ ca na rajata iti tatra purovartidravyamātrārtho purovartini pravarteta na rajatārtho /
analyzed: purovarti jñānam ca na rajate iti tatra purovarti dravya mātra arthaḥ purovartini pravarteta na rajata arthaḥ

original: evaṃ rajatārtho yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena purovartina dravye /
analyzed: evam rajata arthaḥ yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena dravye
na hi tatra tena rajata tvam avagatam iti
atha idam rajatam iti dve jñāne
bheda agrahāt idam rajatam iti eka jñāna sadṛśe
tena tad ucitam vyavahāram pravartayataḥ
yadi evam tat rajatam
iyam śuktiḥ iti bheda avabhāsi vijñāna vyavahāram api kasmāt na pravartayataḥ
yathā eva hi bheda agrahāt abhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam
evam abheda agrahāt bhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam api

original: so 'yamubhayato bhedābhedagrahasārūpyāt pravṛttinivṛttibhyāṃ yugapadākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāveśitaḥ prajñāśālibhirativyākhyayā
analyzed: saḥ yam ubhayatas bheda abheda graha sārūpyāt pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām yugapad ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭām daśām āveśitaḥ prajñā śālibhiḥ ati vyākhyayā
syāt etat
viparyaya jñāna utpāde pi śukti rajatayoḥ bheda agrahe sya vyāpāraḥ āstheyaḥ
anyathā gṛhīta bhedānām api viparyaya utpāda prasaṅgāt

original: tathā ca śakyaṃ tatrāpi vaktum--yathā bhedagrahād viparyayajñānotpāda evamabhedāgrahāt kasmānna samīcīnajñānotpāda iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śakyam tatra api vaktum yathā bheda grahāt viparyaya jñāna utpādaḥ evam abheda agrahāt kasmāt na samīcīna jñāna utpādaḥ iti
tatra yaḥ tava parihāraḥ saḥ smākam vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ bhaviṣyati iti
yathā āhuḥ akhyāti vādinaḥ
yeṣām api viparīta khyātiḥ teṣām api ajñāna vāsana nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ iti
mā evam jñāna hetūnām ajñāta rūpa kārya saṃbandhānām cukṣuḥ ādīnām darśanāt

original: cetanavyavahārāṇāṃ tvabuddhipūrvakāṇāmapratīteḥ buddhipūrvakatve tu vivekāgraha upayujyate,
analyzed: cetana vyavahārāṇām tu abuddhi pūrvakāṇām apratīteḥ buddhi pūrvaka tve tu viveka āgrahaḥ upayujyate
na vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: yadyavivekagraho 'pi tatparipanthī vidyata iti kuto 'nyataranibandhano vyavahāraḥ?
analyzed: yadi aviveka grahaḥ tad paripanthī vidyate iti kutas nyatara nibandhanaḥ vyavahāraḥ
tasmāt samāropaḥ eva bheda agrahaḥ iti
tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitam rajatāt iva jñānam purovarti vastu viṣayam
rajata arthinaḥ tatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt

original: yad yadarthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tadvijñānaṃ tadviṣayam,
analyzed: yat yad arthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tad vijñānam tad viṣayam
yathā ubhaya siddham samīcīna rajata vijñānam
tathā ca etat
tasmāt yathā
yat ca uktam anavabhāsam āmā śuktiḥ anālambanam iti

original: tatra kiṃ śuktikātvasya rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvaṃ sādhyate,
analyzed: tatra kim śuktikā tvasya rajatam iti jñānam prati anālambana tvam sādhyate
āhosvit dravya mātrasya sita bhāsvarasya purovartinaḥ
tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddhasādhanam
uttarasmin an avabhāsanam asiddham
idam iti purovartinaḥ dravyasya aṅgulyāḥ nirdeśāt
dṛṣṭam ca duṣṭānām api kāraṇānām autsargika kārya pratibandhena kārya antara utpādaka tvam
tat yathā vetra bījānām dāva agni dagdhānām kadalī prakāṇḍa janaka tvam
bhasmaka duṣṭasya ca audaryasya tejasaḥ bahutara anna pāna pācaka tvam
na idam rajatam iti ca pratyakṣa bādhaka pratyayāt apahṛta viṣayam
pratyaya tvena vibhramāṇām yathārtha tva anumānam nā udetum arhati
yathā ca pramāṇa ābhāsa vyabhicāre pi pramāṇe āśvāsaḥ
tathā pramāṇataḥ rtha pratipattau iti atra upapāditam
diś mātram atra darśitam
prapañcaḥ tu tattva samīkṣāyām asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ iti uparamyate

original: tadevamātmani mithyājñānaṃ vyākhyāya śarīrādiṣvekādaśasu mithyājñānaṃ bhāṣya eva darśitam /
analyzed: tat evam ātmani mithyājñānam vyākhyāya śarīra ādiṣu ekādaśasu mithyājñānam bhāṣye eva darśitam
tat tu spaṣṭa tvāt asmābhiḥ na vyutpāditam iti āśayavān āha śeṣam iti

original: tatra śarīrādiṣu manaḥparyanteṣu yathāyogaṃ mithyājñānaṃ duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam ityantena bhāṣyeṇoktam /
analyzed: tatra śarīra ādiṣu manaḥ paryanteṣu yathāyogam mithyājñānam duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam ityantena bhāṣyeṇa uktam

original: pravṛttyādiṣu śṛṅgagrāhikayoktaṃ pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet ityantena bhāṣyeṇa /
analyzed: pravṛtti ādiṣu śṛṅga grāhikayā uktam pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet ityantena bhāṣyeṇa

original: evaṃ mithyājñānasya svarūpaṃ darśayitvā mithyājñānadoṣapravṛttitajanmaduḥkhānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo doṣādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ coktam etasmāt ityādinā  #
analyzed: evam mithyājñānasya svarūpam darśayitvā mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛtti tad janma duḥkhānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ doṣa ādīnām svarūpam ca uktam etasmāt ityādinā
tāpaḥ ityantena bhāṣyeṇa
saṃprati mithyājñāna ādi ucchedāt apavargaḥ iti vakṣyati
tat ca ayuktam
sati api tad ucchede saṃsāra tādavasthyāt
na hi ānya ucchede nyasya ucchedaḥ

original: tathā ca nāpavarga iti vakṣyamāṇamarthamupapādayitumaktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
analyzed: tathā ca na apavargaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam artham upapādayitum aktam bhāṣyakṛtā
mithyājñāna ādayaḥ ityādi

original: tad vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭa--ta hame duḥkhādaya iti bhāṣyakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ vārttikakṛtaḥ evaṃ sūtrakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: tat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭata duḥkha ādayaḥ iti bhāṣyakāra ukta kramāt viparīta krama abhidhānam vārttikakṛtaḥ evam sūtrakāra ukta kramāt viparīta krama abhidhānam
bhāṣyakṛtaḥ

original: tad duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānapūrvakatvena mithyājñānasya duḥkhādipūrvakatvenānāditvaṃ darśayitum /
analyzed: tat duḥkha ādīnām mithyājñāna pūrvaka tvena mithyājñānasya duḥkha ādi pūrvaka tvena anādi tvam darśayitum
pṛcchatikaḥ punar iti

original: yadyeta eva saṃsārastarhi sūtrakāraḥ prameyasūtre kasmād duḥkhādibhyaḥ pṛthak pretyabhāvaṃ saṃsārāparanāmānamupādatte?
analyzed: yadi ete eva saṃsāraḥ tarhi sūtrakāraḥ prameya sūtre kasmāt duḥkha ādibhyaḥ pṛthak pretyabhāvam saṃsāra apara nāmānam upādatte
tasmāt ebhyaḥ nyaḥ eva saṃsāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram duḥkha ādīnām iti
na eṣām svarūpam api tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ
krama vyatikrama tātparyam āha sa ca anādiḥ iti
atra hetum āha pūrva apara iti
duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣāḥ viṣaya tvena tāvat mithyājñānasya kāraṇam

original: evamasati janmani mithyājñānasyānutpattaraviṣayo 'pi janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: evam asati janmani mithyājñānasya anutpattaḥ aviṣayaḥ pi janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam

original: evaṃ vinā pravṛttiṃ janmābhāvāt janmadvādeṇa pravṛtterapi mithyājñānakāraṇatvam /
analyzed: evam vinā pravṛttim janma abhāvāt janma dvādeṇa pravṛtteḥ api mithyājñāna kāraṇa tvam
pravṛtti dvāreṇa ca doṣāṇām
tathā mithyā jñānāt deṣāḥ
doṣebhyaḥ pravṛttiḥ
pravṛtteḥ janma
janmanaḥ duḥkham
yadi api pravṛttiḥ eva sākṣā duḥkha hetuḥ
tathā api anāyatanasya tasya anutpatteḥ antarā janma karoti
atha sā eva duḥkham iti
anādi tvāt ca na anyonya āśrayam cakrakam vā bīja aṅkura santānayoḥ iva iti
saṃprati bīja apāye iva tad ja anya aṅkura pravāha nivṛttiḥ mithyājñāna apāye tad janya doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha mithyājñāna ādi pravāha nivṛttiḥ

original: kāraṇanivṛttau kāryanivṛtteriti kathanaparaṃ bhāṣyam anubhāṣyākṣipati--yadā tu tattvajñānāditi /
analyzed: kāraṇa nivṛttau kārya nivṛtteḥ iti kathana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati yadā tu tattva jñānāt iti
apāyaḥ tattva jñānāt mithyājñānasya svarūpataḥ vā
viṣayataḥ
vā phalataḥ vā syāt
na tāvat svarūpataḥ

original: tasyāśutaravināśinaḥ saṃskārād vā jñānāntarād vā apāyasya tattvajñānasādhāraṇyena tasyāpi bādhyatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tasya āśutara vināśinaḥ saṃskārāt vā jñāna antarāt vā apāyasya tattva jñāna sādhāraṇyena tasya api bādhya tva prasaṅgāt
na api viṣayataḥ

original: na hi śuktikājñānaṃ rajatajñānasya rajataviṣayatāmapahartumutsahate jātaṃ hi tad rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtya /
analyzed: na hi śuktikā jñānam rajata jñānasya rajata viṣaya tām apahartum utsahate jātam hi tat rajatam viṣayīkṛtya
yathā āhuḥ
gṛhītvā artham gatāḥ caurāḥ kaḥ tān ācchettum arhati
iti
na api phalam apaharati
upadarśitaḥ hi tena arthaḥ
pravartitaḥ ca tatra puyaṣaḥ
tat idam uktam katham apāyaḥ iti
uttaram samāna viṣayaḥ iti

original: yasminneva hi purovartini dravye pūrveṇa rajatatvamāsañjitaṃ tatraivottaraṃ tadviruddhaṃ śuktikātvaṃ dharmamupanayati /
analyzed: yasmin eva hi purovartini dravye pūrveṇa rajata tvam āsañjitam tatra eva uttaram tad viruddham śuktikā tvam dharmam upanayati

original: tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvamādarśayattajjanitāṃ pravṛttiṃ vighaṭayat phalamasyāpaharatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvam ādarśayat tad janitām pravṛttim vighaṭayat phalam asya apaharati iti bhāvaḥ
na tu samāna viṣaya tā mātreṇa virodhaḥ
mā bhūt ekasmin ātmani nitya tva vibhu tva jñānayoḥ virodhaḥ iti atas āha yasmāt iti
tatva mithyātva kathanena mithas
janam sūcayati
nitya tva vibhu tva jñānayoḥ tu samāna viṣayayoḥ api aviruddha dharma upasthāpaka tayā tattva jñāna tvāt iti arthaḥ
kasmāt virodhaḥ iti atas āha vastunaḥ iti

original: parasparābhāvadharmiṇorekatra samavāye nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ nānātvaṃ kvacidapītyadvaitaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: paraspara abhāva dharmiṇoḥ ekatra samavāye na idam svābhāvikam nānātvam kvacid api iti advaita prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
atra deśayati katham punar iti
prathamam utpannam mithyājñānam anupajāta virodhi
tena apahṛta viṣayam paśrvāttanam tattva jñānam udetum eva nā utsahate
prāk eva tu mithyājñānam bādhitum iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram mithyājñānasya iti
tatra hi prathamam upajātena anupajāta virodhinā jñānena uttaram bādhyate
yatra pūrva apekṣam uttaram upajāyate
tat khalu pūrva virodhe na jāyeta
a jātam sat katham pūrvam bādheta
yathā pratyakṣa ādi viruddham anumānam
iha tu dve api jñāne doṣa upahata anupahata indriya artha sannikarṣa janmanī paraspara anapekṣe
tatra pūrvam anupajāta virodhi tvāt ki bādhatām
anāgatasya aprāpta tvena bādhitum aśakya tvāt
sva kāraṇa balāt āsādyamāna janmanaḥ ca utpatti virodhasya ca aśakyātvāt
tat evam utpannam uttaram upajāta virodhi tayā pūrva bādhā ātmakam san na an upakṛdya pūrvam utpattum arhati iti bādhate

original: tattu na pūrveṇa nāpyanyena kenaciditi bhāvatyarthasahāyam /
analyzed: tat tu na pūrveṇa na api anyena kenacid iti
artha asahāyam ca mithyājñānam
tat anena bādhya tva abādhya tve mithyājñāna tattva jñānayoḥ upalakṣyete
tat idam anyaiḥ api uktam
pūrvāt para balīyaḥ tvam tatra nāma pratīyatām
anyonya nirapekṣāṇām yatra janma dhiyām bhavet
iti
tathā ca anupajāta virodhi tvam atra bādhya tve hetuḥ
upajāta virodhi tvam ca bādhaka tve iti
yat upalakṣaṇa artham sa sahāya tva abhidhānam tad jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati kasmāt
uttaram tayātvena iti
anena abādhya tvam tattva jñānasya uktam iti
na kevalam abādhyatvam
dṛḍha mūla tvam api tattva jñānasya iti āha pramāṇa antara anugrahāt ca
antara śabdaḥ viśeṣa vacanaḥ
ātma ādi tattva jñānam hi phalam pramāṇa viśeṣaiḥ āgama anumāna pratyakṣaiḥ anugṛhyate

original: tasmād dṛḍhamūlatvāt tadapi tattvajñānaṃ mithyājñānaṃ nivartayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dṛḍha mūla tvāt tat api tattva jñānam mithyājñānam nivartayati iti arthaḥ
etat eva vibhajate āgama iti
etat eva sphorayati yadā hi iti

original: āgamamayena hi jñānena prameyaṃ gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāyavijñānenānumānāparanāmnā
analyzed: āgama mayena hi jñānena prameyam gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāya vijñānena anumāna apara nāmnā
vyavasthāpya bhāvayataḥ yadā ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt yoga ja dharma sahāyāt utpadyate tattva viṣayaḥ

original: tatra trayāṇāmapi pramāṇānāṃ pratisandhānam astīti dṛḍhamūlatvāt tena mithyājñānaṃ bādhyate //
analyzed: tatra trayāṇām api pramāṇānām pratisandhānam asti iti dṛḍha mūla tvāt tena mithyājñānam bādhyate
viṣayam bhāvayati iti vyācaṣṭa samāhitaḥ iti

original: samāhitatvena cetaso dhāraṇāṃ darśayati--ananyamanā iti pratyāhāram,
analyzed: samāhita tvena cetasaḥ dhāraṇām darśayati an anya manāḥ iti pratyāhāram
cetasaḥ tattva viṣaya buddhi dhārā vipacyamāna tvam dhyānasya
tattva jñānasya sphuṭa abha tva ārambha avasthā
tasyāḥ vivekaḥ mithya jñāna vāsanāyāḥ
pūrvam hi mithyājñāna vāsanā tattva jñāna vāsanāyāḥ balavatī āsīt
atha abhyāsa vaśāt tulya balā bhavat
athā iyam eva balīyasī tattva jñāna vāsanā saṃbhinnā mithyājñāna vāsanayā saha anuvartate

original: saṃprati tu tattvajñānavāsanayā atyantabalīyasya samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt mithyājñānavāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattvajñānavāsanā tasyāmityarthaḥ
analyzed: saṃprati tu tattva jñāna vāsanayā atyanta balīyasya sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt mithyājñāna vāsanāyāḥ bhavati viviktā tattva jñāna vāsanā tasyām iti arthaḥ
nanu anena krameṇa nivartatām mithyājñānam

original: nivṛttaṃ taṃ tattvasākṣātkārasamaye 'pi kasmāt punaḥ svavāsanāvaśānna jāyate?
analyzed: nivṛttam tam tattva sākṣātkāra samaye kasmāt punar sva vāsanā vaśāt na jāyate

original: na khalu mithyājñānavāsanā anādikālapravṛttā ādimatā tattvajñānena tatsaṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitumityata āha--nivṛtte ceti /
analyzed: na khalu mithyājñāna vāsanā anādi kāla pravṛttā ādimatā tattva jñānena tad saṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitum iti atas āha nivṛtte ca iti

original: tāvadeva puṃsāṃ buddhayo 'sthirā bhrāmyanti svocitaṃ ca saṃskārajātamātanvate,
analyzed: tāvat eva puṃsām buddhayaḥ sthirāḥ bhrāmyanti sva ucitam ca saṃskāra jātam ātanvate
na yāvat bhūtam artham sākṣātkurvanti
atha sākṣātkṛtya tatra sthira padāḥ bhavanti
kṣiṇvanti ca sa vāsanān mithyā pratyayān
bhūta arthaṃpakṣapātaḥ hi buddheḥ svabhāvaḥ
yat āhuḥ bāhyāḥ api
nirūpa plava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ
na bādhaḥ yatnavat tve pi buddheḥ tad pakṣapātataḥ
pra vai iti
tasmāt mithyājñānasya na punar utpādaḥ iti
uktam eva artham smṛti dāḍhrayāya pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti
uktam smārayitum uttaram saha iti
bhavatu mithyājñānasya nivṛttiḥ sa vāsanasya
tatas pi kim iti atas āha mithyājñāna iti
atra pṛcchati ye tāvat iti
uttaram teṣām api iti
vairāgya svarūpam pṛcchati ki punar iti
rāga abhāvaḥ hi vairāgyam

original: na ca tasmādeva rāgādīnāmabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tasmāt eva rāga ādīnām abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram bhoga anabhiṣvaṅga lakṣaṇam iti uktam
viṣaya doṣa paribhāvanā paripākāt khalu viṣaya parityāga icchā bhavati

original: tayā virodhiguṇena viṣayatṛṣṇā ca tatparipanthini vidveṣaśca tadadhikaraṇāśrverṣyādayo nivartante /
analyzed: tayā virodhi guṇena viṣaya tṛṣṇā ca tad paripanthini vidveṣaḥ ca tad adhikaraṇa aśru īrṣyā ādayaḥ nivartante
asaktiḥ viṣaya parityāga icchā
vaśi tayā ca svayam upanateṣu viṣayeṣu mādhyasthya darśanam
doṣa abhāve kim bhavati iti atas āha doṣa abhāve iti
pṛcchati kā punar iyam iti

original: yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇam syāt
tatas janma nivṛttyai tad nivṛttiḥ arthyeta

original: na punarasau kṣaṇikā sato āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate /
analyzed: na punar asau kṣaṇikā satī āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate
atas kimartham nivartyate iti bhāvaḥ
vidita abhiprāyaḥ uttaram āha dharma adharmaḥ
kasmāt punar upacāraḥ iti atas āha janma sādhana tvāt
etat vibhajatena asmin iti
upacāre prayojanam darśayitvā nimittam āha dharma adharmayoḥ tu iti

original: vartamānānāgatayoraviśeṣeṇa doṣāpāyāt nivṛttirūkteti bhrāntyā deśayati--yau tāvadanāgatāviti /
analyzed: vartamāna anāgatayoḥ aviśeṣeṇa doṣa apāyāt nivṛttiḥ ūktā iti bhrāntyā deśayati yau tāvat anāgatau iti
pariharati na
anāgatayoḥ iti
anāgata abhiprāyam etat iti arthaḥ
yadi evam vartamānayoḥ kutas prakṣaya
iti atas āha vartamānayoḥ iti
astu pravṛtteḥ abhāvaḥ
tatas kim iti atas āha pravṛtti abhāvaḥ iti
uktam vivekam iha api yojayati atra api iti
vartamāna nivṛtti hetu pṛcchati atha iti
uttaram saṃskāra iti
śrutiḥ
tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimokṣye saṃpatsye
chāndogyaḥ iti
kim janma abhāve sidhyati iti atas āha janma abhāve iti
atra eva vṛddha saṃmatim āha etat ca tat āhuḥ iti
tat etat ca iti yojanā

original: syādetat, mahāpralaye 'pi mithyājñānādinā duḥkhāntenāsti viyoga iti atrāpi muktiprasaṅga ityata āha--so 'yaṃ mithyājñānādineti /
analyzed: syāt etat mahāpralaye mithyājñāna ādinā duḥkhāntena asti viyogaḥ iti atra api mukti prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha saḥ yam mithyājñāna ādinā iti
sarvatas iti tṛtīyā arthe tasiḥ sarveṇa iti
na ca pralaya avasthāyām sarveṇa viyogaḥ
karma avidyā vāsanayoḥ an avināśāt
muktau tu tayoḥ api vināśaḥ
karma vāsanā ca sarva kāryāṇām utpādikā avasthāpikā ca

original: tannivṛttau śarīrādivat tattvajñānasaṃskārasyāpi pralaya ityaśeṣaviśeṣaguṇavimukto mukta ityucyata iti saddhim //
analyzed: tad nivṛttau śarīra ādi vat tattva jñāna saṃskārasya api pralayaḥ iti aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa vimuktaḥ muktaḥ iti ucyate iti
stād etat
tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna apāyaḥ iti uktam
kim punar tattva jñānam iti atas uktam bhāṣyakṛtā a tattva jñāḥ nu tu iti
tat anubhāṣya sarveṣām jñānānām bhāṣya uktānām anugatam ekam svarūpataḥ tu iti
codayati kasmāt iti

original: no khlvayaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ samācāro yad duḥkhabhiyā sukhaparityāga iti,
analyzed: no khlu ayam prekṣāvatām samācāraḥ yat duḥkha bhiyā sukha parityāgaḥ iti

original: api tu sukhaṃ duḥkhād vivicya upādadate duḥkhaṃ ca varjayanti /
analyzed: api tu sukham duḥkhāt vivicya upādadate duḥkham ca varjayanti

original: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
analyzed: na hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ na upyante
bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyante iti
uttaram viveka hānasya iti
yadi api sukha duḥkhe bhinne

original: tathāpyanityatvakṛtakatvavat parasparānuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasyopādānaṃ duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanaṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api anitya tva kṛtaka tva vat paraspara anuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasya upādānam duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanam śakyam iti arthaḥ
kaḥ punar ayam anuṣaṅgaḥ yatas viveka hānam aśakyam iti atas āha anuṣaṅgaḥ dhinā abhāvaḥ
tad svarūpam āha yatra ekam sukham vā duḥkham vā
tatra itarat duḥkham vā sukham vā
tat anena anitya tva kṛtaka tvayoḥ iva sukha duḥkhayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ darśitaḥ

original: na cāvinābhāvo vinā saṃbandhāditi tatsiddhaye saṃbandhavikalpānāha--samānanimittatā vā anuṣaṅgo 'vinābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: na ca avinābhāvaḥ vinā saṃbandhāt iti tad siddhaye saṃbandha vikalpa ānāha samāna nimitta tā vā anuṣaṅgaḥ vinābhāvaḥ
vā śabdaḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa saṃbandha antara apekṣayā
na tu pūrva apekṣayā
atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā
na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā
na tu pūrva apekṣayā
atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā
na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā tayoḥ asādhāraṇyāt iti
mantavyam
tayoḥ avinābhāva siddhi artham saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā
aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā
aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna upalabhya tā vā
manaḥ gocara tvam ubhayoḥ
tatas ca siddhaḥ na vinābhāva apara nāmā anuṣaṅgaḥ iti

original: yatraikaṃ tatretaraditi vā yatra yasminnimitte satīti vā yatrādhāra iti vā yatropalabdhisādhane satīti vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: yatra ekam tatra itarat iti vā yatra yasmin nimitte sati iti vā yatra ādhāre iti vā yatra upalabdhi sādhane sati iti vyākhyeyam
itiḥ sūtra samāptim sūcayati
pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni
tat evam pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānasya niḥśreyasa saṃbandhaḥ uktaḥ parīkṣitaḥ ca
tatra etat syāt

original: svapadebhyaḥ pramāṇādayaḥ padārthāstattvato jñātā yathāyathaṃ mithyājñānādinivṛttikrameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante,
analyzed: sva padebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ tattvataḥ jñātāḥ yathāyatham mithyājñāna ādi nivṛtti krameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante
kṛtam uparitanena prabandhena iti
atas uktam bhāṣyakṛtā a tri vadhā ca asya iti
na nāmadheya mātrāt pramāṇa ādīnām tattva jñānam bhavati

original: api tu lakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇābhyām ityasti prabandhasyottarasyopayoga iti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
analyzed: api tu lakṣaṇa parīkṣaṇābhyām iti asti prabandhasya uttarasya upayogaḥ iti bhāṣya arthaḥ
tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati pravṛtteḥ iti
yadi puruṣa kalpanā mātrāt traividhyam
atha ānantyam eva kasmāt na bhavati
sarvatra tasya sulabha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram arthasya tathābhāvāt
arthasya prayojanasya sākṣāt

original: śāstrakāryasya tattvajñānalakṣaṇasya tathaiva trividhayaiva śāstrapravṛttyā bhāvāt /
analyzed: śāstra kāryasya tattva jñāna lakṣaṇasya tathā eva trividhayā eva śāstra pravṛttyā bhāvāt
tathā hi lakṣaṇam nāma vyatireki hetu vacanam
tat hi samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchidya lakṣyam vyavasthāpayati

original: na cāsya dharmidarśanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatā sidhyatīti tadupadarśanāya nāmadheyamātreṇa dharmiṇāmuddeśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asya dharmi darśanam antareṇa pakṣa dharma tā sidhyati iti tad upadarśanāya nāmadheya mātreṇa dharmiṇām uddeśaḥ
yadi api ca prati lakṣaṇam uddiṣṭāḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ
tathā api śāstra abhisaṃbandha parāt api vākyāt samadhigamyante iti uddeśaḥ pi uktaḥ

original: na cāparīkṣito heturvyatirekī catūrūpo bhavatīti parīkṣāpyavaśyaṃ kartavyā /
analyzed: na ca aparīkṣitaḥ hetuḥ vyatirekī catur rūpaḥ bhavati iti parīkṣā api avaśyam kartavyā
tasmāt tattva jñānasya arthasya tathābhāvāt traividhyam iti
tat etat vibhajatena amī padārthāḥ iti
kim tu iti
arthaḥ tattva jñānam tathābhūtam
yena arthena hetunā śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ tredhā bhavati
uddeśa svarūpa pratipādana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati nāmadheyena iti
pariharati mātra grahaṇa sāmarthyāt iti
yadi api pramāṇaṇa ādi śabdāḥ api kāraka śabdāḥ eva
tathā api uddeśa samaye tad arthānām sat api kāraka tvam avivakṣitam
api tu prātipadika artha mātram

original: ghrāṇādisūtre 1.1.12 tu lakṣaṇapare kārakatvaṃ vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇatvāyogāditi adoṣaḥ /
analyzed: ghrāṇa ādi sūtre tu lakṣaṇa pare kāraka tvam vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇa tva ayogāt iti adoṣaḥ

original: atra ca yadyapi sūtrakāreṇa saṃśayapramāṇaprameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na prayojanādiṣu,
analyzed: atra ca yadi api sūtrakāreṇa saṃśaya pramāṇa prameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na prayojana ādiṣu

original: tathāpi tatkaraṇādeva prayojanādiparīkṣāpi sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhetyuktam /
analyzed: tathā api tad karaṇāt eva prayojana ādi parīkṣā api sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhā iti uktam
atas eva bhāṣyakāraḥ sarvatra parīkṣām anvavartayat iti
syāt etat
vibhāga param etat sūtram iti vakṣyati
na ca vibhāgaḥ nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavaccheda artham ekam kiñcid upasaṃgrāhakam antareṇa
na ca pramāṇa tvāt anyat atra upasaṃgrāhakam
na ca idam alakṣitam upasaṃgṛhṇāti
na ca etat sūtram asya lakṣaṇam
vibhāga paratvāt iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa param bhāṣyam tatra uddiṣṭasya iti
tasya arthaḥ yadi api vibhāga param etat sūtram

original: tathāpi pramāṇapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇatvamapi lakṣayatīti /
analyzed: tathā api pramāṇa pada samabhivyāhṛtam sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇa tvam api lakṣayati iti
tathā hi pramīyate nena iti asya vākyasya arthe pramāṇa pada prayogaḥ

original: pramā ca smṛteranyaḥ arthāvyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmād vibhāgaparādapi
analyzed: pramā ca smṛteḥ anyaḥ artha avyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmāt vibhāga parāt api
sūtrāt pratīyamānam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam apekṣitam saṃgṛhītam iti pramāṇa tva upagṛhītānām
pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇānām yuktaḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: tathā ca vibhāgaparatvena sākṣāt sāmānyalakṣaṇānabhidhānād vibhaktasya lakṣaṇamucyata ityuktam tacceha /
analyzed: tathā ca vibhāga para tvena sākṣāt sāmānya lakṣaṇa anabhidhānāt vibhaktasya lakṣaṇam ucyate iti uktam tat ca iha
viśeṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa ityādi
tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe uddiṣṭasya iti
lakṣaṇa alakṣaṇa mātra vivakṣayā lakṣitasya alakṣitasya iti uktam
tat ca chale sāmānyatas

original: pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣata iti gamayitavyam //
analyzed: pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ iti gamayitavyam
atra bhāṣyam atha uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam iti
tasya arthaḥ ucyate nena iti vacanam sūtram vibhāgasya
atha iti trividha pravṛtti vyutpādana anantaram viviktānām pratipādanam vibhāga vacanam

original: na ca vivekaḥ svarūpa upayujyata ityata āha--athoddiṣṭavibhāgadvāreṇeti /
analyzed: na ca vivekaḥ svarūpe upayujyate iti atas āha atha uddiṣṭa vibhāga dvāreṇa iti
na atra vibhāga mātram vivakṣitam
api tu tad dvāreṇa nyunā adhika saṃkhyā vyavacchedaḥ tattva jñāna aṅgam iti arthaḥ
a vyākhyāne hetum āha sūtra iti
codayati uddiṣṭasya vibhāga ānarthakyam vyāghātāt
trividhā ca asya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ iti asya ānarthakyam
anartham artha viparyayam kāyati kīrtayati iti anarthakaḥ
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam
kasmāt vyāghātāt
vyāghātam eva sphorayati trividhā ca asya śāstrī asya iti
pariharati na uddiṣṭā iti
parasparam vibhaktāḥ nāmadheya mātreṇa uddiśyante iti uddeśe antarbhāvaḥ
tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati
sāmānyena uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam viśeṣeṇa uddeśaḥ iti
vibhāga prayojanam pṛcchati kim punar iti
uttaram niyamaḥ
tat vibhajate yadi iti
punar codayati lakṣaṇataḥ iti

original: pramāṇalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto yat catvāryeva lakṣayati tadavagamyate na nyūnānyadhikāni vā pramāṇanītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ yat catvāri eva lakṣayati tat avagamyate na nyūnāni adhikāni vā pramāṇani iti arthaḥ
pariharati lakṣaṇasya iti
ākṣepam
parihāram vibhajatena
lakṣaṇasya iti
anya param api vākyam tat eva artha labhyam svīkaroti

original: na ca pratyakṣādīnāṃ samānāsamānajātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamyādyabhāva upayujyate /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa ādīnām samāna asamāna jātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamī ādi abhāvaḥ upayujyate
lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttasya kvacid akaraṇam na tad abhāve pramāṇam
sataḥ pi anupayogena akaraṇa āpatteḥ
tat etat āha anya asaṃbhavasya iti
vibhāga uddeśasya punar ananya para tvāt anya abhāvi niścayaḥ bhavati iti

akṣasya akṣasya iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya tātparyam āha ayam ca sūtra vivakṣāyām iti

original: akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti vigṛhyāvyayībhāve kṛte sarvendriyāvarodho bhavati /
analyzed: akṣam akṣam prati vartate iti vigṛhya avyayībhāve kṛte sarva indriya avarodhaḥ bhavati
nanu yadiḥ idṛśaḥ vigrahaḥ

original: kasmāt punarbhāṣyakāreṇa akṣasyākṣasyeti vigṛhyata ityata āha--anyathā tu vastunirdeśa iti /
analyzed: kasmāt punar bhāṣyakāreṇa akṣasya akṣasya iti vigṛhyate iti atas āha anyathā tu vastunirdeśaḥ iti
artha mātram anena pratipādyate
na punar samāse iti arthaḥ

original: atha kasmāt samāsa eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyata ityata āha--samāse hi akṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
analyzed: atha kasmāt samāse eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyate iti atas āha samāse hi akṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti
yadi sūtra gatasya pratyakṣa padasya avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ

original: anyatra punarasya kaḥ samāsa iti pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
analyzed: anyatra punar asya kaḥ samāsaḥ iti pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti
uttaram pra ādi samāse iti

original: tathā hi, prāptāpannālaṃpūrvagatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgatāpratiṣedhādabhidhayaliṅgopādānāt pratyakṣo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣābuddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamityabhidheyaliṅgatā  #
analyzed: tathā hi prāpta āpanna alaṃpūrva gati samāseṣu para vat liṅga tā pratiṣedhāt abhidhaya liṅga upādānāt pratyakṣaḥ rthaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣam jñānam iti abhidheya liṅga tā  /
siddhā bhavati

original: kvacit pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
analyzed: kvacid pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti
sūtra vivakṣayā avyayībhāvaḥ iti uktam
tatra śaṅkate
kasmāt punar sūtra vivakṣayā iti ucyate
yāvatā sarvatra eva kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati iti
tatra idam upatiṣṭhate samāse hi avyayībhāva samāse hi
sarvatra pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti
vyutpatti nimitta mātram ca idam pratyakṣa śabdasya
na tu pravṛtti nimittam
tasmāt na indriya gataiḥ guṇa sāmānya ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
pravṛtti hetuḥ tu artha sākṣātkāri jñāna janaka tvam

original: tannimittaḥ khalvayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdastatra tatra laukikaparīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: tad nimittaḥ khalu ayam pratyakṣa śabdaḥ tatra tatra laukika parīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate

original: yathā mayūraśabdo mayūratvasāmānyanibandhanaḥ kāsucideva patatrivyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ,
analyzed: yathā mayūra śabdaḥ mayūra tva sāmānya nibandhanaḥ kāsucid eva patatri vyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ
mahyām rauti iti anvākhyāyate

original: tadidaṃ pratyakṣamuddhiṣṭamapi sat pramāṇatadābhāsasaṃkīrṇamiti tadvivekāya lakṣaṇamupayujyate /
analyzed: tat idam pratyakṣam uddhiṣṭam api sat pramāṇa tad ābhāsa saṃkīrṇam iti tad vivekāya lakṣaṇam upayujyate
yadi tu uddeśa padam tat vivecayet
kṛtam tarhi lakṣaṇa praṇayanena
vigraha vākya gatā ca vṛttiḥ bhāṣyakṛtā vyākhyātā
vṛttiḥ tu sannikarṣaḥ jñānam vā
vṛttiḥ iti hi vyāpāraḥ
sa tu vyāpāraḥ ucyate

original: yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye cāramabhāvī dharmabhedaḥ phalotpādānukūlo 'pekṣyate /
analyzed: yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye ca ārama bhāvī dharma bhedaḥ phala utpāda anukūlaḥ upekṣyate
yathā paṭe janayitavye tantubhiḥ carama bhāvinaḥ saṃyoga bhedāḥ
svarge vā janayitavye yāgena apūrvam ātma dharmaḥ

original: tathehāpi indriyādinā pramāṇena pramāyāṃ phale pravṛttena tadutpādanānukūlaḥ sannikarṣo jñānaṃ vā caramabhāvī dharmabhedo 'pekṣyata iti bhavati  #
analyzed: tathā iha api indriya ādinā pramāṇena pramāyām phale pravṛttena tad utpādana anukūlaḥ sannikarṣaḥ jñānam vā carama bhāvī dharma bhedaḥ upekṣyate iti bhavati
vyāpāraḥ
saḥ eva vṛttiḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: vyavasthāṃ darśayati--yadā sannikarṣo vyāpāra indriyādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā savikalpakaṃ vā sākṣātkāravadvijñānaṃ pramitiḥ
analyzed: vyavasthām darśayati yadā sannikarṣaḥ vyāpāraḥ indriya ādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanam vā sa vikalpakam vā sākṣātkāravat vijñānam pramitiḥ
ubhayasya api indriya vyāpārāt sannikarṣa apara abhidhāna anutpatteḥ

original: na cāntarālikena nirvikalpakenendriyavyāpāraviccheda iti pratyakṣavyākhyānāvasare nivedayiṣyate /
analyzed: na ca antarālikena nirvikalpakena indriya vyāpāra vicchedaḥ iti pratyakṣa vyākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyate

original: yadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā vyāpāra indriyādīnāṃ tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam /
analyzed: yadā jñānam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā vyāpāraḥ indriya ādīnām tadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ phalam

original: tatropādeyamidaṃ salilamiti buddhiranāgatopādānaviśiṣṭaṃ salilamālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī,
analyzed: tatra upādeyam idam salilam iti buddhiḥ anāgata upādāna viśiṣṭam salilam ālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī
salila mātra sākṣātkāraḥ tu syāt
na ca tanmātram asya phalam
api tu upādeya tā
sā ca parokṣā
anāgata tvāt
tasmāt upādīyate anena iti upādānam upādānam ca asau buddhiḥ ca iti upādāna buddhiḥ
tatra toya ālocanam atha toya vikaltaḥ
atha tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa cara pipāsā upaśamana hetu bhāvasya smṛti bīja saṃskāra udbodhaḥ
atha tasya smaraṇam
atha liṅga parāmarśaḥ tad jātīyam ca idam iti
tat idam liṅga parāmarśa vijñānam sākṣātkāra vat
liṅge vinaśyat avastha vyāpti smaraṇa sahakāri dṛśyamānasya salilasya pipāsā upaśamana hetutayā anumāna mukhena upādāna buddhiḥ ūcyate
anumāya khalu ayam tathābhāvam tat upāditsarn ihamānaḥ tat upādatte

original: na ca vyāptismṛtivicchinnamālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā na liṅgaparāmarśajñānaheturiti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca vyāpti smṛti vicchinnam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā na liṅga parāmarśa jñāna hetuḥ iti vācyam

original: tadudbodhitasaṃskāradvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīmasato 'pi kāraṇatvāt /
analyzed: tad udbodhita saṃskāra dvāreṇa ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīm asataḥ pi kāraṇa tvāt
na khalu kṛṣi karma śasya adhigati samaye samasti
na ca yāga ādikam svarga ādi utpāda samaye
na ca trivṛt kaṣāya pānam vireka samaye
āntarālika kārya paramparayā tu tad sādhāna tvam sarvatra samānam
syāt etat
kā punar iyam pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ toyasya
na tāvat mīmāṃsaka vat atīndriyā śaktiḥ yusmābhiḥ abhyupeyate

original: kiṃ tu kāraṇānāṃ svarūpaṃ vā sahakārisākalyaṃ vā /
analyzed: kim tu kāraṇānām svarūpam vā sahakāri sākalyam vā
tatra svarūpam hetūnām pratyakṣam eva
sahakāriṇā pratyakṣa apratyakṣāṇām sākalyam kārya samutpāda eka vyakti

original: janīyam, na tu tat toyarūpadarśanamātrāt śakyānumānam /
analyzed: janīyam na tu tat toya rūpa darśana mātrāt śakya anumānam

original: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadanumānasya gocara iti? atrocyate /
analyzed: tat kim aparam avaśiṣyate yat anumānasya gocaraḥ iti atra ucyate
na vayam atīndriyam sāmarthyam ātiṣṭhāmahe
nā api sahakāri sākalya anumānam ācakṣmahe
kim tu sva rūpasya kārya saṃbadhi tām
na ca iyam svarūpam eva
ihasthasya iva nārikela dvīpāt āgatasya api vahni darśana mātrāt grāhaka tva avagama prasaṅgāt
tasmāt kārya upahitam svarūpam anumeyam

original: idameva cāsya kāryopadhānaṃ yat kāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāva ānantaryaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: idam eva ca asya kārya upadhānam yat kārya utpādāt pūrvam avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ ānantarya niyamaḥ

original: na ca tajjātīyasya dṛṣṭacarasya tathābhāvadarśane 'pi dṛśyamānasya toyasya tad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati yena tatra smaryeta /
analyzed: na ca tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa carasya tathābhāva darśane dṛśyamānasya toyasya tat dṛṣṭam bhavati yena tatra smaryeta
na khalu ujjayinyām upalabdhasya saudhasya pāṭaliputre smaranti abhrāntāḥ
upādānena hānam vyākhyātam
na ca upekṣā anupādāna tayā hāna pakṣe nikṣiptā
ahāna tayā upādāna pakṣa niḥśrepa prasaṅgāt
upādāna prayatna aprasava hetutayā na upādānam iti ced

original: kimiyaṃ hānaprayatnamapi prasūte yato hānaṃ syāt?
analyzed: kim iyam hāna prayatnam api prasūte yatas hānam syāt

original: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhistṛtīyā lokaprasiddheti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt yā na ubhaya prayatna prasava hetuḥ sā upekṣā buddhiḥ tṛtīyā loka prasiddhā iti siddham
pratyakṣa pada vyutpattim darśayitvā anumāna ādi padeṣu avi vyutpatti gati diśati evam anumāna ādiṣu api iti
tatra idam anumāna da vyutpatti bhāṣyam
mitena liṅgena liṅginaḥ rthasya paścānmānam anumānam iti
mitiḥ mānam
tathā ca liṅga darśana udbodhita saṃskāra jā smṛtiḥ vyavacchinnā
tasyāḥ miteḥ anya tvena loka siddha tvāt
mitena iti ajñāna sandeha viparyāsāḥ liṅga viṣayāḥ vyudastāḥ bhavanti
tathā api mitena arthasya jñānam śābde pi asti iti atas uktam liṅgena iti
a pakṣa dharmataḥ nivartayati liṅginaḥ iti
tathā api dharmiṇaḥ pratyakṣa gocara tvāt kṛtam anumānena iti atas uktam arthasya iti
arthyate sādhyate iti arthaḥ
na ca sva rūpeṇa arthyate
kim tu jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ
paścāt iti anu śabdasya vyākhyā
tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati mitena iti
kasmāt ayuktam iti atas āha phala abhāvāt iti
etat vibhajate etasmin iti

original: anumānajñānasya phalāvasthāyāmevārtho mita iti meyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate,
analyzed: anumāna jñānasya phala avasthāyām eva arthaḥ mitaḥ iti meyam na avaśiṣyate
yatra etat siddham sat pramāṇam bhavet iti arthaḥ

original: tatra phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣamāsthāya yata ityadhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte---naiṣa doṣa iti /
analyzed: tatra phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam āsthāya yatas iti adhyāhṛtya sāmadhattena eṣa doṣaḥ iti
anadhyāhāreṇa api adoṣaḥ iti samādhāna antaram āha bhavatu vā iti
pūrva uktam doṣam smārayatti nanu ca iti
pariharati na doṣaḥ iti
atha kasmāt hāna ādi viṣayam pramāṇam ucyate

original: na svagocaraṃ pratītyata āha--sarva ca pramāṇamiti /
analyzed: na sva gocaram prati iti atas āha sarva ca pramāṇam iti
yadi api vahni jñānasya anumānasya sataḥ heya tva ādikam viṣayaḥ
tatra eva vyāpārāt
anyathā pramāṇa phalayoḥ vibhinna viṣaya tvena vipratipattyā pramāṇa phala bhāva ayogāt

original: na hi panasaviṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi panasa viṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvaḥ bhavati

original: tathāpi phalāntarānapekṣamutpattāveva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api phala antara anapekṣam utpattau eva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ
tatra tu na tat pramāṇam
phala antara ajanaka tvāt api tu phalam eva iti arthaḥ
viṣaya antaram prati tu pramāṇam iti āha viṣaya antaram iti
codayati yadi iti

original: bhāvasādhanaścet pramāṇaśabdaḥ phalamasyārtho na tu phalaṃ svaviṣaye karaṇam,
analyzed: bhāva sādhanaḥ ced pramāṇa śabdaḥ phalam asya arthaḥ na tu phalam sva viṣaye karaṇam
tad vyāpārasya tad janakena eva kṛta tvāt
na ca sva viṣayāt anyat viṣaya antaram asya saṃbhavati
atiprasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
pariharati uktam phalam iti
yadi api yatra phalam saḥ sya autpattikaḥ viṣayaḥ

original: tathāpi yatrānena pramāṇena satā hānādibuddhayo janayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: tathā api yatra anena pramāṇena satā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ janayitavyāḥ
saḥ pi vyāpāreṇa viṣayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
phala tve eva hetum āha jñātaḥ iti
parokṣa artha avagāhi tayā heya ādi buddhayaḥ pratyakṣa phalam na bhavanti
bhavanti tu anumānasya iti
niyama vādinām matam apanyasya dūṣayati kecid tu iti
aniyamam rocyamānaḥ āha aubhayam tu iti
anumāna śabda vat phalena nirvacanīya tvam upamāna śabdasya iti manvānaḥ ākṣipati sāmīpya iti
samādhattena asti vyāghātaḥ iti
na iyam upamāna śabdasya phalena nirūktiḥ

original: api tu pramāṇena nirūktiriti na vayāghāta ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: api tu pramāṇena nirūktiḥ iti na vayāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ
śabda viṣayā pratipattiḥ śābdam pramāṇam
yat khalu caitra
gām badhāna iti vākyam idam iti anusandhāna ātmakam smārtam vijñānam upajāyate
tat padārtha smaraṇa sahakāri viśiṣṭa artha viṣayam vijñānam prasūte
tat śābdra pramāṇam
pramāṇam uktvā phalam asya āha phalam tat eva

original: yadā hyetat pramāṇaṃ tadā vākyārthavijñānaṃ phalam /
analyzed: yadā hi etat pramāṇam tadā vākya artha vijñānam phalam

original: yadānumānavad vākyārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānopādānādibuddhayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: yadā anumāna vat vākya artha vijñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna upādāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti arthaḥ

original: atra pratyakṣādīnāṃ kramoddeśaprayojanaṃ prati ekadeśimatamupanyasyati---kecit tviti /
analyzed: atra pratyakṣa ādīnām krama uddeśa prayojanam prati eka deśi matam upanyasyati kecid tu iti

original: pratyakṣaparā hi pramāṇāntarajanyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa parāḥ hi pramāṇa antara janyāḥ pramitayaḥ iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam
yadi api kiñcid anumānam anumāna ādi pūrvakam api
tathā api prāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakam
upamānam tu pratyakṣa pūrvakam api śabda pūrvakam eva iti asya anumānāt apakarṣaḥ
smaraṇa sahakāri tā ca anumāna sādṛśyam upamānasya asti iti anumāna anantaram uddeśaḥ
alpa jñāna adhīnam ca bahu jñānam iti alpa viṣaya pratyakṣa ādi uddeśebhyaḥ paraḥ bahu viṣaya śabda uddeśaḥ iti
tat etat ekadeśi matam ekadeśi antara matena dūṣayati tat ca ayuktam iti apare iti
ākliṣṭaḥ hi prathamam mahā viṣayam eva duravadhāraṇa tvāt nirūpayati
alpa viṣayam tu kliṣṭaḥ śaknoti nirūpayitum

original: ato mahāviṣayatvaṃ prāthamya eva heturna caramatva ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas mahā viṣaya tvam prāthamye eva hetuḥ na carama tve iti arthaḥ
anantara matam dūṣayati etat ca iti
etāvatā krama mātram bhavet
na tu tad viśeṣa niyamaḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃprati vimarśa pūrvakam sva abhibhata krama niyama hetum avadhārayan eva pūrva ekadeśi matam apākaroti tasmāt anyaḥ iti
vimarśa nimittam vipratipattim āha pratyakṣam pūrvam prādhānyāt iti ekaḥ
mahā viṣaya tvāt ca ādau śabda upadeśaḥ iti aparaḥ
tatra mahā viṣaya tvam anaikāntikam san āgamasya eva pūrva upadeśam gamayati iti āha aubhayam iti
pṛcchati katham iti
uttaram pratyakṣaiḥ api iti
mahā viṣaya tva lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa dharma darśana nimittam saṃdeham āha tatra iti
sva abhimatena hetunām krama viśeṣa niyamam avadhārayati pratyakṣasya iti iti
yadi api pramiteḥ pratyakṣa para tvena pratyakṣasya prādhānyam

original: tathāpi śāstre vyutpādyatvenānumānasyāpi tadastīti sādhāraṇatayā na heturiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api śāstre vyutpādya tvena anumānasya api tat asti iti sādhāraṇa tayā na hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ
syāt etat
vyavasthita viṣayam pratyakṣam na anumāna viṣaye pravartate
na ca anumānam agṛhīta saṃbandham udeti
na ca saṃbandha grahaḥ saṃbandhi graham antareṇa

original: na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate /
analyzed: na ca anumāna viṣaye sāmānya rūpe saṃbandhini pravartate
anumāna antareṇa tu grahaṇe navasthā
tasmāt kāraṇa bhāvāt na anumānam asti
etena śabda upamāne api parāste
tayoḥ api saṃbandha saṃvedana adhīna janma tvāt

original: tasmāt nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti vibhāgavacanamanupapannamiti śaṅkāmapanetuṃ vimarśapūrvakaṃ vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ---kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇānīti
analyzed: tasmāt na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti vibhāga vacanam anupapannam iti śaṅkām apanetum vimarśa pūrvakam vicārayati sma bhārūya kāraḥ kim punar pramāṇāni iti
tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya a vyākhyāne kāraṇam āha kim punar etāni iti
sā ca iyam pramitiḥ pratyakṣa parā iti bhāṣyam
tat anubhāṣya hetum āha sā iyam iti
ākāṅkṣā bhāva pratipādanāya pratīti svarūpam kramam ca āha yathā ayam iti
āhitaḥ utpāditaḥ pratyayaḥ niścayaḥ yasya
saṃsarga upadhānam prati sa tathā
sandigdhena hi niścayāya pravartitavyam eva
niścitaḥ tu viniścayāya pramāṇa antare pravartamānaḥ tat abhyarhitataram manyate
dhūma aṅga tvena iti
aṅga tvam vyāpaka tvam
vyāpyam punar vyāpti kriyāyām karma tvena pradhānam

original: tadanena dhūmavyāpakatvopadhānena dhūmād gamyamāno bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam /
analyzed: tat anena dhūma vyāpaka tva upadhānena dhūmāt gamyamānaḥ bahniḥ parokṣaḥ iti darśitam
anupahita prakāśa satu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahita vahni svarūpa prakāśaḥ
sa hi sākṣātkāraḥ iti
tāvat ayam pramātā sākāṅkṣaḥ yāvat upadhāna vyavahitam sva rūpam upalabhate

original: upadhānānapekṣastu pratyakṣeṇāvyavahitaṃ sākṣād varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣo bhavati /
analyzed: upadhāna anapekṣaḥ tu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahitam sākṣāt viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati
dhūma aṅga tvena dhūma viśeṣaṇa tvena iti kecid
tat tu prakṛta anupayogi tayā ayuktam iti
upasaṃharati atas pradhānam iti
saḥ yam guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ bheda āśrayaḥ vyavasthāyām na asti
vyavasthitānām pratyekam eka tvāt

original: tasmād vyavasthāyāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo na cintya iti /
analyzed: tasmāt vyavasthāyām guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ na cintyaḥ iti
itiḥ sūtra samāptau
iti nyāyatrisūtrītātparyaṭīkā
indriya ārya sannikarṣa utpannu jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa viśeṣa lakṣaṇānām artha ākṣipta sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāga uddeśa hetu tvena tad anantara abhidhānam iti āha atha vibhaktānām iti

original: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ityādi sūtram /
analyzed: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ityādi sūtram
asya tātparyam āha sūtra arthaḥ sūtra prayojanam
samāna jātīyam anumāna ādi
asamāna jātīyam pratyakṣa ābhāsa prameya ādi
tebhyaḥ viśeṣaka tvam viśeṣaḥ
tat asya sūtrasya prayojanam

original: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ tadrūpaṃ na śakroti grahītum,
analyzed: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam tad rūpam na śakroti grahītum
saḥ nena lakṣaṇena bodhyate
evaṃlakṣaṇakam pratyakṣam iti
tasmāt siddha vivikta pratyakṣa mātra anuvādena lakṣaṇa vidhāna param idam sūtram

original: itastvavagatalakṣaṇaḥ tenaiva vivicya pratyakṣatattvaṃ gṛhṇātīti samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedaḥ sūtrārtha ukta iti /
analyzed: itas tu avagata lakṣaṇaḥ tena eva vivicya pratyakṣa tattvam gṛhṇāti iti samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ sūtra arthaḥ uktaḥ iti

original: atra ca yaha ityadhyāhṛtya yattadonityābhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣamiti pramāṇavāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam /
analyzed: atra ca iti adhyāhṛtya tat pratyakṣam iti pramāṇa vāci yojanīyam

original: evaṃ ca jñānapramāṇyapakṣe 'pi yat tadviśeṣyajñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ liṅgaparāmarśo
analyzed: evam ca jñāna pramāṇya pakṣe yat tat viśeṣya jñānam pratyakṣa phalam
vā tat api indriya artha sannikarṣa ūtu anna tva ādi upeta tvena bhavati pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam iti na avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇasya iti
sūtra padārtham pṛcchati atha iti
uttaram indriya iti
sannikarṣa grahaṇa labhyam prakāra bhedam parisaṃcaṣṭe sannikarṣaḥ punar iti
punar śabdena saṃyoga samavāya pada upādānāt vyavacchinatti
saṃyoga pada upādāne hi na samavāyaḥ labhyate
samavāya pada upādāne vā na saṃyogaḥ
sannikarṣa pada upādāne tu abhimata lābhaḥ
artha grahaṇena arthyamāṇa tayā jñeya svarūpa yogyatā darśitā

original: na cāsāvaṇvākāśādīnāmastīti satyapi saṃyogādau nāsāvarthasannikarṣa iti tadvyudāsaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asau aṇu ākāśa ādīnām asti iti sati api saṃyoga ādau na asau artha sannikarṣaḥ iti tad vyudāsaḥ
utpanna grahaṇena ca sannikarṣasya utpādaka tvam sūcitam
tatas sati api artha svarūpa yogya tve saṃyukta saṃyoga ādeḥ anutpādakasya sannikarṣasya vyudāsaḥ

original: anyathā kuḍyādisaṃyuktenendriyeṇa kuḍyādivyavahitasya tatsaṃyuktasya ghaṭādeḥ tatsamavetasya ca rūpāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā kuḍya ādi saṃyuktena indriyeṇa kuḍya ādi vyavahitasya tad saṃyuktasya ghaṭa ādeḥ tad samavetasya ca rūpa ādeḥ api grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ

original: na caitāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ samavāyaśceti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā trividhaḥ eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ ca iti sāṃpratam
svatantra vyāghātāt anubhava vyāghātāt ca

original: ye hi dravyaguṇakarmāśrayaṃ sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśsayamarthānataraṃ rocayante,
analyzed: ye hi dravya guṇa karma āśrayam sāmānya atiriktam sādṛśsayam artha anataram rocayante

original: teṣāṃ kathaṃ rūpādibhedānāmanyonyasya sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavet ?
analyzed: teṣām katham rūpa ādi bhedānām anyonyasya sādṛśyam pratyakṣam bhavet
na hi tat indriyeṇa saṃyuktam
na api indriya saṃyukta samavetam
tasmāt caturthaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ
itarathā svatantra vyāghātaḥ
anubhava vyāghātaḥ ca
anubhūyante hi rūpa gandha tva ādayaḥ sāmānya viśeṣāḥ anugatāḥ

original: tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu parasparavyāvṛttimatīṣu ete nānubhūyeran asati sannikarṣāntare /
analyzed: tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu paraspara vyāvṛttimatīṣu ete na anubhūyeran asati sannikarṣa antare
yadi tu vaiyātyāt āhuḥ na anubhūyante eva iti

original: tadā prativaktavyaṃ kutastyo 'yamanantāsu rūpagandhādivyaktiṣu rūpamiti vā gandha iti vā vyapadeśabhedaḥ?
analyzed: tadā prativaktavyam kutastyaḥ yam anantāsu rūpa gandha ādi vyaktiṣu rūpam iti vā gandhaḥ iti vā vyapadeśa bhedaḥ
cākṣuṣa tva ādi upādhi nibandhanaḥ iti ced na
an anusaṃhita upādheḥ ūpahita pratyaya ayogāt
na khalu an anusaṃhita daṇḍaḥ caitram daṇḍī iti vyapadiśati
na ca indriyāṇi atīndriyāṇi indriya darśana viṣaya bhāvam anubhavanti

original: tasmādastīndriyeṇa rūpatvādisāmānyānubhavo yannibandhanāḥ kāsucideva kecideva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśebhedā iti siddhaṃ sannikarṣāntaram /
analyzed: tasmāt asti indriyeṇa rūpa tva ādi sāmānya anubhavaḥ yad nibandhanāḥ kāsucid eva kecid eva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśa bhedāḥ iti siddham sannikarṣa antaram

original: viśeṣaṇabhāvena ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaṃ samavetaviśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇam ca saṃgṛhītam

original: yasyendriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśaṃ tatra darśayati--tatra cakṣuriti /
analyzed: yasya indriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśam tatra darśayati tatra cakṣuḥ iti
śabdaḥ sya ākāśa guṇa tvam
karṇaśaṣkulī avacchinnasya nabhaḥ bhāgasya śrotra tvam
ādyasya eva śabdasya saṃyoga vibhāga yoni ja tvam

original: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyate /
analyzed: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāyaḥ ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataram upapādayiṣyate

original: avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātijātimantau ca mithaḥ saṃbaddhāvanubhūtete /
analyzed: avayava avayavinau guṇa guṇinau kriyā a kriyāvantau jāti jātimantau ca mithas saṃbaddhau anubhūtete
na anyathā tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti ca
śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti ca
paṭaḥ spandate iti ca
paṭaḥ dravyam iti ca buddhi vyapadeśau syātām

original: śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ na tu saṃbandhijñānamiti cet?
analyzed: śuklaḥ paṭaḥ ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya jñānam na tu saṃbandhi jñānam iti ced
kim punar idam sāmānādhikaraṇyam
tādātmyam iti ced na
dvitīya buddhi vyapadeśayoḥ paunaruktyāt
apaunarūktyam ca abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ
yat anyatarat upalabhya anyat bubhutsante
na ca ekam vastu dvi ātmakam iti yuktam
bheda adhiṣṭhānasya tad nāntarīyakasya dvi tvasya eka ātmani virodhena asaṃbhavāt

original: tasmād bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete,
analyzed: tasmāt bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete
asaṃbandhe gauḥ aśvaḥ iti vat tad anupapatteḥ
saṃbandhe kuṇḍe dadhi iti vat vaiyadhikaraṇya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na
śabda vṛtti bhedena saṃbandha abhede pi sāmānādhikaraṇya vaiyadhikaraṇya vyavasthāpanāt

original: na hi jātu dadhiśabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍaśabdo vā dadhni /
analyzed: na hi jātu dadhi śabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍa śabdaḥ vā dadhni

original: vartante tu surabhimadharaśuklādiśabdāḥ svābhidheyaṃ nimittīkṛtya paṭādiṣu,
analyzed: vartante tu surabhim adhara śukla ādi śabdāḥ sva abhidheyam nimittīkṛtya paṭa ādiṣu

original: evaṃ paṭādiśabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
analyzed: evam paṭa ādi śabdāḥ api jāti ādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam
tena sāmānādhikaraṇye pi pravṛtti nimittānām na aikātmyam parasparam
na api dravyeṇa
kim tu taiḥ tainvitam ekam dravyam pratīyate

original: śabdānāṃ tu tatraikasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tadvācyānāmaikātmyabhramaḥ /
analyzed: śabdānām tu tatra ekasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tad vācyānām aikātmya bhramaḥ

original: ayutasiddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat na sphuṭataro vivekaprakāśaḥ /
analyzed: ayuta siddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhi iti vat na sphuṭataraḥ viveka prakāśaḥ
tat evam asti saṃbaddha anubhavaḥ
na ca asau saṃbaddha anubhavam vinā iti saṃbandhaḥ nubhūyate
sa ca ayuta siddhi ādi saṃpattyā samavāyaḥ
na ca asya anyaḥ samavāyaḥ
avasthānāt
na ca indriyeṇa asya saṃyogaḥ adravya tvāt
na ca a saṃbaddhasya grahaṇam
indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tva samarthanāt
tasmāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pariśiṣyate
nanu ayam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ nyatra saṃbandha antara pūvrakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat kim atra saṃbandha antaram kalpyatām
tathā ca anavasthā iti uktam
na ca indriya a saṃvabaddhasya grahaṇam

original: tasmād vinā saṃbandhāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eṣitavya iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt vinā saṃbandha antaram viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eṣitavyaḥ iti siddham

original: evamabhāve 'pi yadindriyasaṃyuktaṃ vā yadvendriyasamavetu yathā bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti vā nāstyakāre 'nudāttasvara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya
analyzed: evam abhāve pi yat indriya saṃyuktam vā yat vā indriya samavetu yathā bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vā na asti akāre nudātta svaraḥ iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya
samavetasya viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca indriya pratyāsattyā grahaṇam

original: na ca bhūtalādirūpameva ghaṭābhāvo nārthāntaramiti sāṃpratam,
analyzed: na ca bhū tala ādi rūpam eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ na artha antaram iti sāṃpratam
sati api ghaṭa ādau bhū talasya bhāvāt

original: na ca kaivalyaṃ tasya dharmo ghaṭabhāvavirodhī ghaṭābhāvādanyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca kaivalyam tasya dharmaḥ ghaṭa bhāva virodhī ghaṭa abhāvāt anyaḥ

original: na ca dṛśye ghaṭādau bhūtalopalambhaḥ kaivalyamabhāvavyavahāraheturiti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca dṛśye ghaṭa ādau bhū tala upalambhaḥ kaivalyam abhāva vyavahāra hetuḥ iti yuktam

original: evaṃ hi ghaṭasaṃsṛṣṭabhūtalagraho 'pi kaivalyamiti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayet /
analyzed: evam hi ghaṭa saṃsṛṣṭa bhū tala grahaḥ pi kaivalyam iti ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāram pravartayet
na hi adṛśyaḥ ghaṭaḥ tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ

original: dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kimaparāddhamupalabhyābhāvena yena tadapākaraṇāyopalambhābhāvo 'bhyupeyate?
analyzed: dṛśye n upalabhyamāne iti tu viśeṣaṇe kim aparāddham upalabhya abhāvena yena tad apākaraṇāya upalambha abhāvaḥ bhyupeyate
tasmāt sat iva asat api tattvam abhyupeyam
tat ca pratyakṣam akṣa vyāpāre sati tad pratyayāt

original: na ca pratiyogismaraṇavyavahita indriyārthasannikarṣo nālamabhāvadhiyamupajanayitumiti sāṃpratamityagra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca pratiyogi smaraṇa vyavahitaḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ na alam abhāva dhiyam upajanayitum iti sāṃpratam iti agra darśayiṣyāmaḥ
sa vikalpakaḥ sa pratyakṣa tva siddhau yathā śabda smaraṇa pūrva gṛhīta piṇḍa anusandhāna ādayaḥ na indriya vyāpāram vyavadadhati iti
na ca śabda smaraṇa ādīnām anuyogi tā
bhū tala vikalpam prati aṅga tvāt
sva aṅgam a vyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt
ghaṭasya tu pratiyogitā iti sāṃpratam
kasya punar pratiyogī ghaṭaḥ
tad abhāvasya iti ced bhavatu

original: ghaṭābhāvānubhavasya tu ghaṭasmaraṇaṃ heturiti na pratiyogi,
analyzed: ghaṭa abhāva anubhavasya tu ghaṭa smaraṇam hetuḥ iti na pratiyogi
kim tu anuyogī eva

original: nanu svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ veśmādyarthaṃ smaranneva bahirnitaśrcaitro yadā pṛcchyate kenacit--vayasya,
analyzed: nanu svarūpa mātram dṛṣṭam veśma ādi artham smaran eva bahis nitas caitraḥ yadā pṛcchyate kenacid vayasya

original: tava gṛhe tadā kimāsīt maitra iti ?
analyzed: tava gṛhe tadā kim āsīt maitraḥ iti

original: sa caitraḥ pratiyogismaraṇavirahāt pūrvamapratipannamaitrābhāvo 'pi tatpraśnajanitamaitrasmṛtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātva tadabhāvamavagamyāha,
analyzed: sa caitraḥ pratiyogi smaraṇa virahāt pūrvam apratipanna maitra abhāvaḥ pi tad praśna janita maitra smṛtiḥ kṣaṇam dhyātvā tad abhāvam avagamya āha
mitra
tatra na āsīt maitraḥ iti
tadīyam asati indriya artha sannikarṣe bhāva buddhiḥ bhavantī pratyakṣa ādi atiriktam abhāva ākhyam pramāṇa vyavasthāpayati iti

original: naitat, saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇalakṣaṇena manaḥsannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇābhāvaṃ maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tadabhāvasya tadānīmanumānāt
analyzed: na etat saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇena manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇa abhāvam maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tad abhāvasya tadānīm anumānāt
tathā hi tat geham tadā maitra abhāva vat
jñāna arhasya maitrasya ajñāne gehasya jñāyamāna tvāt

original: yad yasya jñānārhasyājñāne jñāyate tat tadabhā vavat /
analyzed: yat yasya jñāna arhasya ajñāne jñāyate tat tad abhāḥ vavat
yathā ghaṭa bhāva vat bhū talam
tathā ca geham
tasmāt tathā

original: na ca yat kadācidānumānikaṃ tenenidrayagamyena na bhavitavyam,
analyzed: na ca yat kadācid ānumānikam na bhavitavyam
pramāṇa saṃplava vyavasthāpanāt
tat viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāvasya indriya prameya tā iti
saṃyoga samavāya pada parihāreṇa sannikarṣa pada upādānasya prayojanam āha saḥ yam sannikarṣa śabdaḥ iti

original: tadanena prabandhena indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tat anena prabandhena indriyasya arthena sannikarṣāt yat utpadyate jñānam tat pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
saṃprati na tarhi iti codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yadi indriya artha iti
pratyakṣa jñāna kāraṇa abhidhāna pravṛtteḥ tad ekadeśam vadan akuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt iti arthaḥ
kāraṇa antarāṇi darśayati tat yathā iti
viṣaya saṃyoti cakṣuḥ ālokaḥ ca
tad stham rūpam

original: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇālokacakṣuṣī dravyaṃ darśayata iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇa āloka cakṣuṣī dravyam darśayataḥ iti sthitiḥ
mahat tvam vā aneka dravyavat tvam vā
aneka dravyāḥ avayavāḥ
tadvat tvam avayavinaḥ mahataḥ eva na dvi aṇukasya

original: tasmādanyonyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyavattvayoriti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti /
analyzed: tasmāt anyonya nirapekṣa tvam mahattva aneka dravyavat tvayoḥ iti vikalpaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ iti

original: satyapyevaṃlakṣaṇakatve cukṣuravayavinastaijasasya na cākṣuṣatvamityata uktam--upalabdhikalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
analyzed: sati api evaṃlakṣaṇaka tve cukṣuḥ avayavinaḥ taijasasya na cākṣuṣa tvam iti atas uktam upalabdhi kalaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti
dharma adharma nimittaḥ saṃskāraḥ upalabdhi phalaḥ
na ca asau cakṣuṣi
tasya adṛṣṭa vaśena anudbhūta rūpa sparśa tvāt iti arthaḥ
pariharati na vaktavyāni iti

original: pratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto hi sūtrakāraḥ tadeva brūyāt yadasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ hi sūtrakāraḥ tat eva brūyāt yat asya asādhāraṇam kāraṇam
na tu sat api sādhāraṇam asya kāraṇam
na hi tat tasya lakṣaṇam ativyāpteḥ iti arthaḥ
tat anena na idam ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
asādhāraṇam kāraṇam ced pratyakṣa lakṣaṇāya upādeyam hanta
anyat api asya asādhāraṇam asti kāraṇam iti tat api upādeyam iti codayati indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tarhi iti
tat anena manasaḥ tarhi ityasya bhāṣyasya arthaḥ uktaḥ veditavyaḥ
pariharati na
anena eva indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa eva
tasya aindriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya ukta tvāt
tad ukti sādhyam yat tat tena eva kṛtam
tat sādhyam tu indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ na śaknoti sādhayitum
na ca sukha ādi jñāne mānase asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ
indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tu sarva vyāpakaḥ
vakṣyati hi manasaḥ indriya tvam
sukha ādeḥ ca artha tvam siddham eva iti
saṃprati vyāpaka tvam abhyupetya parīhāra antaram āha aindriya artha iti

original: yadyapīndriyamanaḥsannikarṣe 'pīndriyam asti pratyakṣajñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśādindriyajñānamiti,
analyzed: yadi api indriya manaḥ sannikarṣe pi indriyam asti pratyakṣa jñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśāt indriya jñānam iti

original: tathāpi manasā vyapadeśāmāvāt manasastatrāviśeṣakatvam indriyārthasannikarṣe tūbhayamapi viśeṣakam,
analyzed: tathā api manasā vyapadeśa amāvāt manasaḥ tatra a viśeṣaka tvam indriya artha sannikarṣe tu ubhayam api viśeṣakam
ubhābhyām pratyakṣa jñānasya vyapadeśāt iti ayam asya indriya manaḥ sannikarṣāt viśeṣaḥ iti
codayati yadā tu iti
tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣam vyāvartayati

original: yu/jānasya hi yogino yadātmamanaḥsayogādātmani buddhayo bhavanti tāḥ khalvātmanā vyapadiśyante ātmabuddhaya iti /
analyzed: yujānasya hi yoginaḥ yadā ātma manaḥ sayogāt ātmani buddhayaḥ bhavanti tāḥ khalu ātmanā vyapadiśyante ātma buddhayaḥ iti
manasā ca vyapadiśyante manaḥ buddhayaḥ iti
tasmāt ubhābhyām vyapadeśāt ubhayoḥ viśeṣaka tvam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa vat ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati yat ca iti
caḥ va dhāraṇe
yat eva asādhāraṇam tat vyapadeśa bhāj bhavati
kāraṇa tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate iti arthaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yathā cukṣuṣā indriyatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣamiti,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yathā cukṣuṣā indriya tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣam iti
tathā manasā api indriya tvena vyapadiśyate jñānam mānasam iti

original: evaṃ yathā rūpeṇārthena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ rūpajñānamiti,
analyzed: evam yathā rūpeṇa arthena vyapadiśyate jñānam rūpa jñānam iti
tathā ātmanā api arthena vyapadiśyate ātma jñānam iti
tatra ca asādhāraṇa tvam eva tayoḥ
yatra tu indriya antaram eva asādhāraṇam

original: liṅgādi vā tatra cātmā nārtho 'pi tu pramātaiva /
analyzed: liṅga ādi vā tatra ca ātmā tu pramātā eva

original: yathā rūpādijñāne 'numānādijñāne vā na tatra jñānaṃ mānasamiti vā ātmajñānamiti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ,
analyzed: yathā rūpa ādi jñāne numāna ādi jñāne vā na tatra jñānam mānasam iti vā ātma jñānam iti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ
tayoḥ sādhāraṇyāt
ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tu indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ na tu indriya artha sannikarṣasya eṣa saṃgrāhakaḥ vyāpaka tvāt iti
eka deśinaḥ parīhāram upanyasyati indriya manaḥ saṃyogasya vā agrahaṇam bhede bhedāt

original: yadā hi nāgarayoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihitamanaso vikasitaniḥspandanayanotpalāḥ saudhamālāgavākṣakairavanipatiṃ sabalavāhanamaticiraparāvṛttaṃ  #
analyzed: yadā hi nāgara yoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihita manasaḥ vikasita niḥspanda nayana utpalāḥ saudha mālā gavākṣa kaiḥ avanipatim sa bala vāhanam ati cira parāvṛttam
gopureṇa niviśamānam ālokayanti

original: tadā khlvāsāmekenaivendriyamanaḥsaṃyogena kramavadanekendriyārthasannikarṣasahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstikāśvīyādipratyakṣajñānāni jāyante
analyzed: tadā khlu āsām ekena eva indriya manaḥ saṃyogena kramavat aneka indriya artha sannikarṣa sahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstika āśvīya ādi pratyakṣa jñānāni jāyante
tat idam āha yasmāt iti
codayati yadi iti

original: yadā hi mandaṃ gacchati gavi dūrataḥ saṃyuktasamavāyenendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa śuklo gaurityajñāsīt,
analyzed: yadā hi mandam gacchati gavi dūratas saṃyukta samavāyena indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa śuklaḥ gauḥ iti ajñāsīt

original: atha pratyāsīdan gacchatītyapi vijānāti tenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyena sannikarṣeṇa,
analyzed: atha pratyāsīdan gacchati iti api vijānāti tena eva saṃyukta samavāyena sannikarṣeṇa

original: tena pratyakṣajñānasya śukla iti ca gacchatīti ca bhede 'pi indriyārthasannikarṣo na bhidyate /
analyzed: tena pratyakṣa jñānasya śuklaḥ iti ca gacchati iti ca bhede pi indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ na bhidyate
tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣe tulya tvāt indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ api tatra vaktavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati na vaktavyaḥ
kutas ukta uttara tvāt iti
tat vibhajate uktā iti

original: nanu bhavatūktamuttaraṃ bhede 'bhedādityasyākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ ityata āha--anabhyupagamācca /
analyzed: nanu bhavatu uktam uttaram bhede bhedāt iti asya ākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ iti atas āha anabhyupagamāt ca
eka deśi matam etat asmābhiḥ na abhyupeyate
tasmāt na samādheyam iti arthaḥ

original: tat kimidānīṃ bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti bhāṣyam anupapannameva?
analyzed: tat kim idānīm bhidyamānasya pratyakṣa jñānasya na ayam bhidyate iti samāna tvāt na uktaḥ iti bhāṣyam anupapannam eva
na iti āha aindriya manaḥ saṃyogasya ca agrahaṇam samāna tvāt
pṛcchatikena iti
uttaram ātma manaḥ iti
punar pṛcchati kim punar samāna tvam
uttaram vyapadeśa abhāvaḥ iti uktam
tena bhāṣyasya ayam arthaḥ

original: pratyakṣajñānasya rūpajñānasya rūpajñānamiti vā cakṣurvijñānamiti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iva ayam indriyamanaḥsaṃyogo  #
analyzed: pratyakṣa jñānasya rūpa jñānasya rūpa jñānam iti vā cakṣuḥ vijñānam iti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ iva ayam indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ
na bhidyate
evam hi sa bhidyate
yadi sva saṃbandhi vācakena vyapadeśena svam anyatas vyāvartyate
na viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭam jñānam api anyatas vyāvartayet

original: na tvasti indriyamanaḥsannikarṣādhārābhyāmindriyamanobhyāṃ pratyekamasya vyapadeśo yathendriyārthasannikarṣādhārābhyāṃ indriyārthābhyāṃ vyapadeśo  #
analyzed: na tu asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya manobhyām pratyekam asya vyapadeśaḥ yathā indriya artha sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya arthābhyām vyapadeśaḥ
rūpa jñānam iti cakṣuḥ jñānam iti vā
tasmāt vyapadeśa abhāvaḥ ātma manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa sāmyam indriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya
tasmāt samāna tvāt na uktaḥ iti
prākara antaram samāna tve darśayati atīndriya ādhāra tā vā iti

original: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati yathā dhūmo vahneḥ na cātīndriyadvayādhārasannikarṣastathā prasiddho yathendriyārthasannikarṣo 'rthasya saṃbandhina  #
analyzed: lakṣaṇam hi prasiddham bhavati yathā dhūmaḥ vahneḥ na ca atīndriya dvaya ādhāra sannikarṣaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ yathā indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ rthasya saṃbandhinaḥ
eka snaya prasiddha tvāt
indriya manasoḥ tu dvayoḥ atīndriya tvāt
ātmā tu yadi api
jānasya śarīra ādi atiriktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ
tathā api asmat ādīnām na tathā iti atīndriyaḥ uktaḥ

original: tadanenātīndriyādhāratvaṃ svarūpeṇoktvā tadevaṃ viṣayāvṛttitvamanovṛttitvābhyām atīndriyādhāratvaṃ sāmānyamāha--viṣayāvṛttitvaṃ veti /
analyzed: tat anena atīndriya ādhāra tvam svarūpeṇa uktvā tat evam viṣaya āvṛtti tva manaḥ vṛtti tvābhyām atīndriya ādhāra tvam sāmānyam āha viṣaya āvṛtti tvam vā iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti samāna tvāt iti bhāṣya uktaḥ hetuḥ
caritārtha tvāt iti sva uktaḥ
ākṣipati indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti ayuktam iti
sāntara grahaṇāt iti hetum vibhajate viprakṛṣṭa iti
nanu na arthaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ

original: cakṣuṣastatra prāpterityata āha--na tu cakṣuṣa iti /
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ tatra prāpteḥ iti atas āha na tu cakṣuṣaḥ iti
kasmāt iti atas āha bhūta viśeṣasya iti
bāhyaḥ bhūta viśeṣaḥ ālokaḥ

original: tasya prasāda indriyāvyavadhāyakatvam kuḍyādibhyo viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kācābhrapaṭalādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti /
analyzed: tasya prasādaḥ indriya a vyavadhāyaka tvam kuḍya ādibhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kāca abhra paṭala ādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti
syāt etat
asti kṛṣṇasāra lakṣaṇaḥ bhū viśeṣaḥ prasanna andhasya api
atas tasya api rūpa upalabdhiḥ syāt iti atas āha tad tṛṣṇā pūrvakā iti
rūpa upabhoga tṛṣṇā hi tat sādhanam kṛṣṇa sāram api viṣayīkaroti

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati--bhūtaviśeṣaḥ karmāpekṣo rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti cakṣurityucyate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati bhūta viśeṣaḥ karma apekṣaḥ rūpam caṣṭe iti cakṣuḥ iti ucyate

original: karmakṣāyāt tu prasannāndhasya na rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: karma kṣāyāt tu prasanna andhasya na rūpam caṣṭe iti na cakṣuḥ
astu golakam eva cakṣuḥ kim etāvatā api iti āha na ca iti
vicchinnam hi golakam arthāt anubhūyate iti arthaḥ
tat evam vastunaḥ sāntarasya grahaṇam aprāpyakāri tve hetuḥ uktam

original: kecit tu sāntaramiti grahaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ hentu bruvate,
analyzed: kecid tu sa antaram iti grahaṇa viśeṣaṇam hetu bruvate
tad matam upanyasyati apare tu iti

original: sādhyaviparyayādasya vyatirekaṃ darśayati--na hi prāpyakāriṣviti pakṣadharmatāmāha--dṛṣṭaṃ tviti /
analyzed: sādhya viparyayāt asya vyatirekam darśayati na hi prāpya kāriṣu iti pakṣa dharmatām āha dṛṣṭam tu iti
yat ca uktam aprāpyakāri tve sādhanam pṛthutara grahaṇāt iti
tat vibhajate pṛthutarā iti
dvi āśrayaḥ hi saṃyogaḥ lpam eva saṃyoginam anurudhyate
na mahāntam
na jātu ratha ādi saṃyogāḥ nabhaḥ vyaśnuvate

original: mā bhūt sarvatra rathādīnāṃ tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ copalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: mā bhūt sarvatra ratha ādīnām tad saṃyoga ādīnām ca upalabdhiḥ

original: tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭravanādergolakena vyāptaṃ tāvanmātrasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tena rāṣṭra vana ādeḥ golakena vyāptam tāvanmātrasya grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ
hetu antaram āha diś iti
asya api vyatireka mukhena gamaka tvam darśayati yadi prāpyakāri iti
aparam api hetum āha sannikṛṣṭa iti

original: yadyapi gatikṣaṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ spāśrayasya deśāntaravibhāgasaṃyogopajananaṃ prati kṣipratayā na viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api gati kṣaṇānām pratyekam deśa antara vibhāga saṃyoga upajananam prati kṣipra tayā na viśeṣaḥ

original: svāśrayapratyāsattau cāviśeṣaḥ tathāpyā cāpādānavibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīyadeśaprāpterantarālavartī yāvān gatikṣaṇapracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūto gatiriha  #
analyzed: sva āśraya pratyāsattau ca aviśeṣaḥ ca apādāna vibhāgāt ca prāpanīya deśa prāpteḥ antarāla vartī yāvān gati kṣaṇa pracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūtaḥ gatiḥ iha
vivakṣitaḥ

original: tasya sāntaratvaṃ mandatvaṃ vilambaḥ nairantaryaṃ tu pāṭavaṃ kṣipratā /
analyzed: tasya sāntara tvam manda tvam vilambaḥ nairantaryam tu pāṭavam kṣipra tā

original: tāmimāṃ gatimabhindad nairantaryeṇa kurvadapi sannikṛṣṭamāśu prāpnoti /
analyzed: tām imām gatim abhindat nairantaryeṇa kurvat api sat nikṛṣṭam āśu prāpnoti
na viprakṛṣṭena tulya kālam
kim tu viprakṛṣṭam cireṇa iti
yathā uktam diś rāgena

original: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
analyzed: sāntara grahaṇam na syāt prāptau jñāne dhikasya ca
bahis varti tvāt indriyasya upapannam sāntara grahaṇam iti ced
atas uktam
adhiṣṭhānāt bahis na akṣam kim tu adhiṣṭhāna deśe eva indriyam
kutas
tat cikitsā ādi yogataḥ
sati api ca bahirbhāve na śaktiḥ viṣaya īkṣaṇe

original: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyedapyunmīlya nimīlanāt //
analyzed: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyet api unmīlya nimīlanāt

original: yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlitanayano 'pi rūpaṃ paśyet,
analyzed: yadi ca syāt unmīlya rūpam paśyet
unmīlanāt asti bahis indriyam iti

original: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntaragrahaṇāditi hetuṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--yat tāvaditi /
analyzed: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntara grahaṇāt iti hetum vikalpya dūṣayati yat tāvat iti
sāntara tā khalu aprāpti sāhacaryāt
aprāptim lakṣayati hetvarthasya pratijñārthena akṣipra tvāt a medena
tat uktam na pratijñā arthāt bhidyate iti
hetu pratijñā pada vācya tvena bhedam upacarya ākṣepya ākṣepaka bhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tasya vyavadhāyaka tvāt iti prasāda svabhāvasya kuḍya ādeḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yat tu prasādasvabhāvaṃ tejaḥ tanna gṛhyate,
analyzed: yat tu prasāda svabhāvam tejaḥ tat na gṛhyate

original: kiṃ tu tasya rūpamātraṃ visphāritākṣaṇa dṛśyate /
