analyzed: kim tu tasya rūpa mātram visphārita akṣaṇa dṛśyate
tad āśrayam ca dravyam sādhayiṣyate
na ca guṇaḥ dravyasya antaram
mā bhūt gandha ādibhiḥ antaram dravyasya

original: mā na bhūtāṃ ca nirantare dravye,
analyzed: mā na bhūtām ca nirantare dravye
sva guṇābhyām antarita tvāt

original: na cāpātajanmālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā dravyānumānaṃ pratīkṣate yena rūpajñānānumitaṃ dravyam indriyarthayordravyayorantaraṃ syāt /
analyzed: na ca āpāta janma ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ vā dravya anumānam pratīkṣate yena rūpa jñāna anumitam dravyam indriya arthayoḥ dravyayoḥ antaram syāt

original: api ca rūpamātramagṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantraṃ gandhādivad gṛhyamāṇaṃ kathamantarā svāśrayamanumāpayet,
analyzed: api ca rūpa mātram agṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantram gandha ādi vat gṛhyamāṇam katham antarā sva āśrayam anumāpayet
ākāśa ādīnām āśrayāṇam agrahaṇāt

original: tasmād viṣaktāvayavatejodravyāpratyakṣatvasamāropamātreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tvanyathāsiddhatvadūṣaṇaṃ pāramārthikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt viṣakta avayava tejaḥ dravya apratyakṣa tva samāropa mātreṇa dūṣaṇam vakṣyamāṇam tu anyathāsiddha tva dūṣaṇam pāramārthikam draṣṭavyam
atha abhāvaḥ ntara śabda vācyaḥ iti
na asmākam mūrta dravya abhāvāt anyat ākāśam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: dūṣayati--sa svatantraśrcakṣurviṣayo na bhavati indriyaṃ cārthaṃ cāntarā abhāvo grāhyaḥ,
analyzed: dūṣayati sa svatantraḥ cakṣuḥ viṣayaḥ na bhavati indriyam ca artham ca antarā abhāvaḥ grāhyaḥ
tena saha arthasya grahaṇam sāntaragrahaṇam

original: na cendriyārthayormadhyate kasyacit saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇamasti,
analyzed: na ca indriya arthayoḥ kasyacid saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇam asti
yad tantraḥ yama bhāvaḥ gṛhyeta iti bhāvaḥ
syāt etat

original: mā bhūdāntarālikaṃ saṃyuktaṃ vā samavetaṃ vā viśeṣyaṃ gṛhyamāṇameva tu rūpādiviśeṣyamiti /
analyzed: mā bhūt āntarālikam saṃyuktam vā samavetam vā viśeṣyam gṛhyamāṇam eva tu rūpa ādi viśeṣyam iti
tad tantraḥ yama bhāvaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena rirūpayiṣyate
tatas ca sa antara grahaṇam upapatsyate iti atas āha tena saha upalabdhau iti

original: pratīyate hi tvagādibhiḥ apīndriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhirauṣṇyābhavaviśeṣaṇa śiṣirataraṃ pāthaḥ /
analyzed: pratīyate hi tvac ādibhiḥ api indriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhiḥ auṣṇya ābhava viśeṣaṇa śiṣirataram pāthaḥ
na ca indriyāṇām atra aprāpyakāri tā
tasmāt anaikāntikam
anvaya abhyupagamena etat uktam
anvaya abhāve tu viruddham iti bhāvaḥ
na ca taijasam rūpam antaram
yena sa antara grahaṇam syāt iti āha na ca anyā gatiḥ ati
yathā ca etat tathā upapāditam adhastāt

original: ye tu sāntara iti grahaṇamiti hetumāhuḥ,
analyzed: ye tu sa antare iti grahaṇam iti hetum āhuḥ
tān prati dūṣaṇam āha yaiḥ api iti
anyathā asiddha tve hetum āha śarīra iti
śarīra avacchinnāḥ khalu ātmānaḥ śarīra āyatanāḥ śarīram eva ātmānam abhimanyānāḥ arthān anubhavanti

original: tatra ya eva śarīrāsaṃbaddha ityanubhūyate tameva sāntara iti manyate /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ eva śarīra asaṃbaddhaḥ iti anubhūyate tam eva sāntaraḥ iti manyate
indriya saṃbandhaḥ bhavatu
mā vā bhūt

original: śarīrasaṃbandhena tasya sparśādau na sāntaratvābhimāna ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śarīra saṃbandhena tasya sparśa ādau na sāntara tva abhimānaḥ iti arthaḥ
hetu antaram dūṣayati yat api iti
saṃbandha mātreṇa iti
mātra grahaṇam saṃbandha catuṣṭaya vyāpti artham
tat yathā indriyeṇa arthasya saṃbandhaḥ
indriya avayavaiḥ arthasya
artha avayavaiḥ indrayasya
indriya avayavaiḥ artha avayavānām

original: na caitat niryatā vinā pṛthvagratāṃ bhavatīti pṛthvagratā sūcitā /
analyzed: na ca etat niryatā vinā pṛthu agra tām bhavati iti pṛthu agra tā sūcitā

original: yathā vartideśe piṇḍitamapi tejaḥ prasarpat prāsādodaraṃ vyāpnoti /
analyzed: yathā varti deśe piṇḍitam api tejaḥ prasarpat prāsāda udaram vyāpnoti
tat kasya hetoḥ
pṛthu agra tvāt iti
svabhāvataḥ prasarat api na sva parimāṇa anuvidhāyinam pratyayam ādhatte
kim tu viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyinam
viṣaya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇāḥ hi pratyayāḥ na indriya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇāḥ
tat idam uktam viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyī pratyayaḥ iti
aparam api hetum dūṣayati yat punar iti

original: dehamarthaṃ cāntarāvasthitasya pṛthivyādeḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogālpīyastvaṃ bhūyastvaṃ cāpekṣamāṇasyeti /
analyzed: deham artham ca antara avasthitasya pṛthivī ādeḥ saṃyukta saṃyoga alpīyaḥ tvam bhūyaḥ tvam ca apekṣamāṇasya iti
khagānām ca upari upari saṃcaratām dūra antika bhāvaḥ bahula tama āloka avayava bhāgānām saṃyukta saṃyoga alpa tva bhūyaḥ tvābhyām avagantavyaḥ

original: sa ca tādṛgālokāvayavī pratyakṣo 'nyathā na rūpamātreṇa tadanumānaṃ śakyamityuktam /
analyzed: sa ca tādṛś āloka avayavī pratyakṣaḥ nyathā na rūpa mātreṇa tat anumānam śakyam iti uktam

original: na ca khagānāmuparyupari saṃcaratāṃ dūrantikapratyayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca khagānām upari upari saṃcaratām dūra antika pratyayaḥ syāt

original: na ca patati patatriṇīha prāpto neheti bhavet /
analyzed: na ca patati patatriṇi iha prāptaḥ na iha iti bhavet
tasmāt anyathā asiddhiḥ eva saha antareṇa grahaṇāt iti vat atra api dūṣaṇam iti draṣṭavyam
aparam api hetum dūṣayati yat punar iti
yugapad grahaṇam asiddham
tad abhimānaḥ tu anyathā asiddhaḥ

original: acintyo hi tejaso lādhavātiśayena vegātiśayo yadudayagiriśikharam ārohatyeva mārtaṇḍamaṇḍale bhavanodareṣvāloka ityabhimāno laukikānām /
analyzed: acintyaḥ hi tejasaḥ lādhava atiśayena vega atiśayaḥ yat udayagiri śikharam ārohati eva mārtaṇḍa maṇḍale bhavana udareṣu ālokaḥ iti abhimānaḥ laukikānām

original: tādṛśaṃ cākṣuṣamapi teja iti krameṇāpi gacchad yugapattatra tatra lakṣyate /
analyzed: tādṛśam cākṣuṣam api tejaḥ iti krameṇa api gacchat yugapad tatra tatra lakṣyate

original: na caikasmādeva karmaṇo yugapad durāntikasaṃyogā bhavantīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ekasmāt eva karmaṇaḥ yugapad durāntika saṃyogāḥ bhavanti iti yuktam
tat hi sva kārye janayitavye sva āśraya pratyāsattim apekṣate

original: anyathā madhurāsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattaṃ yojayet /
analyzed: anyathā madhurā sthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattam yojayet

original: vegākhyasaṃskārajamapi karmana sahasā śaramantarāladeśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati /
analyzed: vega ākhya saṃskāra jam api sahasā śaram antarāla deśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati
tasmāt mithyā eva yaugapadya abhimānaḥ iti
codayati katham punar iti
asti hi śākhā candramasoḥ grahaṇe yaugapadya abhimānaḥ

original: na cāyamasati bādhake mithyeti vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ayam asati bādhake mithyā iti vaktum śakyaḥ
saḥ yam abādhitaḥ bodhaḥ vabodhayati aprāpya kāri tām cakṣuṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati idam iti
indriyam yadi a gatvā anāgatam artham gṛhṇīyāt

original: kimasya kuḍyakaṭādyāvaraṇamapakuryāt yena tadāvṛtaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: kim asya kuḍya kaṭa ādi āvaraṇam apakuryāt yena tat āvṛtam na gṛhṇīyāt

original: gatau tu sparśavatā prasādarahitena saivāsya pratibaddheti na prāpnoti viṣayam,
analyzed: gatau tu sparśavatā prasāda rahitena sā eva asya pratibaddhā iti na prāpnoti viṣayam
a prāptam ca na gṛhṇāti
prāyogaḥ tu
cakṣuḥ śrotre prāpya sva viṣaye kāryam kurutaḥ
janaka tve sati tad aprāptau ajanaka tvāt

original: yajjanakaṃ sad yadaprāptau yanna janayati tat tatprāptāveva tajjanayati,
analyzed: yat janakam sat yat aprāptau yat na janayati tat tad prāptau eva tat janayati

original: yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāro mṛdo 'prāptāvakurvan kumbhaṃ tatprāptāveva karoti /
analyzed: yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāraḥ mṛdoḥ prāptau akurvan kumbham tad prāptau eva karoti
tathā ca etat
tasmāt tathā iti
yukti antaram āha dūra antika anuvidhānam iti
dūre na upalabhyate
antike ca upalabhyate
aprāpteḥ aviśeṣeṇa dūre pi upalambhaḥ syāt
anupalambhe vā antike pi na syāt

original: prāptau tu dūraṃ gacchat prakṣīṇaṃ sat prāptamarthaṃ na gṛhṇāti ataijasam,
analyzed: prāptau tu dūram gacchat prakṣīṇam sat prāptam artham na gṛhṇāti a taijasam
taijasam api abhibhūtam na gṛhṇāti
yathā ulkā prakāśam madhyandine
an abhibhūtam tu mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam gṛhṇāti eva iti
codayati viṣayībhāvāt iti

original: yogyo hi tādṛśa indriyakṣaṇaḥ svakāraṇādupajātaḥ pariṇato vārthakṣaṇaśrca,
analyzed: yogyaḥ hi tādṛśaḥ indriya kṣaṇaḥ sva kāraṇāt upajātaḥ pariṇataḥ vā artha kṣaṇaḥ ca
yayoḥ aprāptayoḥ eva grahaṇa grāhya bhāvaḥ
vyavahita viprakṛṣṭau ca na tau tādṛśau
tat kim apratīyamāna prāpti kalpanayā iti arthaḥ
pariharati tat ca na evam iti
niṣatsyete hi kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāmau bhāvānām

original: tena sthemabhājāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpayogyatā vā mahattvādirviṣayībhāvaḥ sahakārisākalyaṃ vā jñānopajananaṃ prati pariśiṣyate /
analyzed: tena sthema bhājām bhāvānām svarūpa yogyatā vā mahat tva ādiḥ viṣayībhāvaḥ sahakāri sākalyam vā jñāna upajananam prati pariśiṣyate
tatra svarūpa yogya tā mātram ced āsthīyeta

original: tadā yadevāvyavahitaṃ sannihitaṃ sad ajanayad vijñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭamapi vyavahitamapi tadeveti tathaiva tena jñānaṃ janayitavyam /
analyzed: tadā yat eva avyavahitam sannihitam sat ajanayat vijñānam viprakṛṣṭam api vyavahitam api tat eva iti tathā eva tena jñānam janayitavyam
asti hi tasya tadā api svarūpa yogya tā iti
sahakāri sākalyam tu prāptiḥ eva

original: tasmāt na saṃbandhamantareṇa viṣayībhāva iti sūktam /
analyzed: tasmāt na saṃbandham antareṇa viṣayībhāvaḥ iti su uktam
sandigdhaḥ pṛcchati atha prāpya kāri tve iti
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: kulālādau prāpyakāriṇi dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca na karotīti,
analyzed: kulāla ādau prāpyakāriṇi dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ vyavahitaḥ ca na karoti iti

original: tasmāt aprāpyakāriṇi cācaskāntādau dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca lauhaṃ maṇirākarṣati,
analyzed: tasmāt aprāpyakāriṇi ca acaskānta ādau dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ vyavahitaḥ ca lauham maṇiḥ ākarṣati

original: tasmāt tatra pramāṇaṃ vaktavyamiti uttaram--indriyatvameva pramāṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt tatra pramāṇam vaktavyam iti uttaram indriya tvam eva pramāṇam
tat eva pañca avayava upapannam āha prāpyakāri iti

original: yadi tu kaśrcit dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvam ubhdāvayet tvagādīnāmaprāpyakāritvāditi,
analyzed: yadi tu kaśrcid dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam tvac ādīnām aprāpya kāri tvāt iti
tu pratyāha atha punar na kiñcid iti
pṛcchati atha iti
yogyatayā eva hi kāraṇāni sva kāryam kurvanti
prāptiḥ tu svarūpa yogyatā prayuktām vyāptim upajīvati
na tu asyāḥ svābhāvikam vyāpaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ
uttaramsaḥ pi iti
sahakāri sākalyam tāvat na prāpteḥ atiricyate iti uktam
kevalam svarūpa yogyatā vaktavyā

original: sa ca vyastānāmapyastīti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyo 'pi kāryotpādaprasaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vyastānām api asti iti yatra tatra kārya utpāda prasaṅkaḥ
ayaskānta maṇeḥ api cakṣuṣaḥ iva vṛtti bhedaḥ eṣitavyaḥ
anyathā vyavadhāna viprakarṣayoḥ api lauha ākarṣaṇa prasaṅgāt
na ca vyavadhāna viprakarṣa abhāva sahitaḥ lauham ākarṣati
vyavadhāna viprakarṣayoḥ tu tad abhāva abhāvaḥ na ākarṣati saṃpratam

original: prāptereva tatra tatra kāryotpādaṃ prati upayogasya viditasvāt /
analyzed: prāpteḥ eva tatra tatra kārya utpādam prati upayogasya vidita svāt
yogyatā mātrasya ca upādheḥ apākṛta tvāt
yathā ca dravya atiriktaḥ tad dharmaḥ prāptiḥ tathā agre nivedayiṣyate
tasmāt sarvam avadātam
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
yat api kṛṣṇa sāra anugraha upaghātābhyām darśana adarśanāt iti tatra ucyate
tat adhiṣṭhānam indriyam iti adhiṣṭhāna anugraha upaghātābhyām tasya anugraha upadhātau
yathā kūṣmāṇḍa latā secana chedanābhyām tad phalasya anugraha upaghātau

original: ata eva bahirnisṛtāpyacchinnamūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinnamūleti siddham //
analyzed: atas eva bahis nisṛtā api acchinna mūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinna mūlā iti siddham
pṛcchati atha jñāna iti

original: pratyakṣasamākhyātalakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata evaitajjñānameveti loke sākṣātkārijñānahetoḥ pratyakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa samākhyāta lakṣaṇa anuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyate eva etat jñānam eva iti loke sākṣātkāri jñāna hetoḥ pratyakṣa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram sukha ādi vyudāsa artham
tat eva hi lakṣaṇavāyam ucyate
lakṣya anurodhena tu lakṣaṇa vyavasthāpane anyonya āśraya tvam agatiḥ vā iti bhāvaḥ
sukha ādīnām vijñāna abhinna hetu ja tvena vijñāna tvāt aśakyam vyāvartanam iti ced na
abhinna hetu ja tva asiddhaḥ

original: na khalu yaiva candanasparśajñānasyotpattau sāmagrī saiva sukhasyāpīti /
analyzed: na khalu yā eva candana sparśa jñānasya utpattau sāmagrī sā eva sukhasya api iti

original: asti hi śītārtasyāpi candanendriyasaṃyogāt śītasparśajñānam iti tadvadevāsya sukhamapi bhavet /
analyzed: asti hi śīta ārtasya api candana indriya saṃyogāt śīta sparśa jñānam iti tadvat eva asya sukham api bhavet
avāntara sāmagrī bhede pi indriya artha manaskāra ja tvāt jñāna jātīya tvam iti ced na
kiñcid kāraṇā bhede pi kārya bhedasya an ākasmika tva upapatteḥ
tad artha tvāt ca kāraṇa bheda anusaraṇa prayāsasya
na ca upādāna abhedāt abhedaḥ iti yuktam
bhinnānām api jñānānām eka samanantara pratyaya upādāna tvasya bhavabhdiḥ abhyupagata tvāt

original: api copādānābhedaśrca kutaśrcit kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ?
analyzed: api ca upādāna abhedaḥ ca kutaśrcid kāraṇa bhedāt kārya bhedaḥ ca iti kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: ata evāsmākamabhede apyupādānasya piṭharasyauṣṇyāparākhyasya ca vahinasaṃyogasya
analyzed: atas eva asmākam abhede api upādānasya piṭharasya auṣṇya apara ākhyasya ca

original: pūrvarūpādipradhvaṃsānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedād bhinnajātīyā jāyante gandharūparasasparśā iti siddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva rūpa ādi pradhvaṃsānām kāraṇānām bhedāt bhinna jātīyāḥ jāyante gandha rūpa rasa sparśāḥ iti siddhāntaḥ
tasmāt artha pravaṇebhyaḥ jñānebhyaḥ tad apravaṇa tayā bhinna jātīyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ yathāsva muna kūla vedanīya tva ādibhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ anyonyam api
bhedavantaḥ tīvra saṃvega tayā pramitsā anapekṣa mānasa pratyakṣa pravedanīyāḥ iti ramaṇīyam
syāt etat
asati api indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātrāt eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ svapna antike darśanāt

original: yatrāpīndriyārthasannikarṣastatrāpi jñānamastīti tadeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kluptasāmarthyāt /
analyzed: yatra api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tatra api jñānam asti iti tat eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ kāraṇam klupta sāmarthyāt
indriya artha sannikarṣasya tu jñāna mātra upayogāt anyathā asiddhau bhāva abhāvau iti
tat ayuktam
svapnāntike sukha duḥkha utpādasya asiddheḥ tad jñānasya artha jñānasya iva mithyātvāt
yathā hi tatra kāminī smṛti viṣaryāsaḥ eva

original: sukhaduḥkhabuddhyutpāda eva cātra dharmādharmopayogo na tu susaduḥkhotpāde /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha buddhi utpāde eva ca atra dharma adharma upayogaḥ na tu su sa duḥkha utpāde

original: na cāsatīndriyārthasannikarṣe jñānamanyanmanorathādi vā tādṛśaṃ sukhabhedaṃ vidhatte yādṛśo viṣayopabhogajanmā /
analyzed: na ca asati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñānam anyat manoratha ādi vā tādṛśam sukha bhedam vidhatte yādṛśaḥ viṣaya upabhoga janmā
sati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātram eva tasya hetuḥ
jñāna hetuḥ tu sukha bhedasya anutpādāt iti api uktam eva
viṣaya sākṣātkāraḥ tad utpāda hetuḥ na viṣaya jñāna mātram iti ced

original: hantar, iśvarasyāpyasti tatrabhavato yogarddhisaṃpannānāṃ ca mahādhiyāṃ samastavastusākṣātmāra iti teṣāmapi sukhaduḥkhotpādapracayaḥ prasajyet,
analyzed: hantar iśvarasya api asti tatrabhavataḥ yoga ṛddhi saṃpannānām ca mahā dhiyām samasta vastu sākṣāt māraḥ iti teṣām api sukha duḥkha utpāda pracayaḥ prasajyet
asatyām pratipakṣa dhāraṇāyām
tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ api sukha duḥkha utpāda hetuḥ eṣitavyaḥ

original: sa ca satyapyarthasākṣātkāre nāsti siddhānāmiti na teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca sati api artha sākṣātkāre na asti siddhānām iti na teṣām sukha duḥkha utpādaḥ

original: api ca caramabhāvi kāraṇaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvabhāvināmakaraṇatvāpādane tantvādīnāmapi paṭādīn pratyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: api ca carama bhāvi kāraṇam gṛhītvā pūrva bhāvinām akaraṇa tva āpādane tantu ādīnām api paṭa ādīn prati akāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: saṃyogabhedādeva tādṛśapaṭātpatteḥ tantvādīnāṃ ca saṃyogabheda evopayogāt /
analyzed: saṃyoga bhedāt eva tādṛśa paṭa ātpatteḥ tantu ādīnām ca saṃyoga bhedaḥ eva upayogāt
tad sahitasya tu tad kāraṇa tvam sannikarṣasya api ālocana sahitasya iti samānam
yathā āhuḥ padārtha vidaḥ stragādi abhiprata viṣaya sānnidhye sati iṣṭa upalabdhi indriya artha sannikarṣa dharma ādi apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ
saṃyogāt yat anugraha abhiṣvaṅga nayana ādi prasāda janakam at padyate tat sukham iti
tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam iti
iha dvayī pratyakṣa jātiḥ avikalpikā savikalpikā ca iti

original: tatrobhayyapi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītāpi svaśabdenopāttā,
analyzed: tatra ubhayī api indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyabhicāri iti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītā api sva śabdena upāttā
tatra vipratipatteḥ
tatra avikalpikāyāḥ padam a vyapadeśyam iti
sa vikalpikāyāḥ ca vyavasāya ātmakam iti
tatra vyapadeśaḥ viśeṣaṇam upalakṣaṇam vā nāma jāti ādi
tat karma vyapadeśyam viśeṣyam iti yāvat

original: tadyathā ḍittho 'yaṃ gaurayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ kamaṇḍalumānayaṃ gacchatyayamiti sarvaṃ hi savikalpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vastuṣu pravartate
analyzed: tat yathā ḍitthaḥ yam gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ yam kamaṇḍalum ān ayam gacchati ayam iti sarvam hi sa vikalpakam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena vastuṣu pravartate
a vidyamānam vyapadeśyam yasmin tat avyapadeśyam jāti ādi svarūpa avagāhi

original: na tu jātyādīnāṃ mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvagāhīti yāvat //
analyzed: na tu jāti ādīnām mithas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi iti yāvat

original: tatra nāmarahitamavikalpakaṃ nāstīti ye vipratipadyante tanmatamapacikīrṣurūpanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadarthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdāḥ /
analyzed: tatra nāma rahitam avikalpakam na asti iti ye vipratipadyante tad matam apacikīrṣuḥ upanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadartham vai nāmadheya śabdāḥ
sarve ṛthāḥ sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra nāma dhayā anvitāḥ

original: nāsti so 'rtho yaḥ kadācit kvacit kathañcit nāmadheyena viyujyate /
analyzed: na asti saḥ rthaḥ yaḥ kadācid kvacid kathañcid nāmadheyena viyujyate
tat anena nāmadheya tādātmyam arthānām pratijānīte
atra hetum āha taiḥ artha saṃpratyayaḥ iti

original: arthā hi pratīyamānāṃ nāmadheyairūpetāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagamyante gaurityartho 'śva ityartha iti /
analyzed: arthāḥ hi pratīyamānām nāmadheyaiḥ ūpetāḥ tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena avagamyante gauḥ iti arthaḥ śvas iti arthaḥ iti
na ca upāya tayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam ghaṭate
na hi cakṣuḥ ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyam rūpa ādi anubhavati
na api jñāyamānaḥ upāyaḥ upeya sāmānādhikaraṇam anubhavati

original: na hi bhavati dhūmo 'yaṃ vahinariti kiṃ tu dhūmo 'yaṃ dhūmatvāt vahinamāniti /
analyzed: na hi bhavati dhūmaḥ yam vahinaḥ iti kim tu dhūmaḥ yam dhūma tvāt

original: api cāśabdopāye 'numeyādau na śabdasaṃbhedenādhigamo bhavet, asti tu /
analyzed: api ca a śabda upāye nu meya ādau na śabda saṃbhedena adhigamaḥ bhavet asti tu

original: tasmāt tairnāmadheyaiḥ saha samānādhikaraṇasyārthasya pratyayo yata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt taiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ saha samāna adhikaraṇasya arthasya pratyayaḥ yatas iti
tasmāt nāmadheya ātmānaḥ arthāḥ

original: kiṃ ca gavādiṣu ṣaḍjādiṣu ca śabdāpakarṣe 'rthapratyayāpakarṣāt tadutkarṣe tvarthapratyayotkarṣāt
analyzed: kim ca go ādiṣu ṣaḍja ādiṣu ca śabda apakarṣe rtha pratyaya apakarṣāt tad utkarṣe tu artha pratyaya utkarṣāt
pratyayasya ca pratyetavya utkarṣa adhīna utkarṣa tvāt nāmadheya utkarṣeṇa arthasya utkarṣaḥ arthasya
tādatmyam gamayati

original: tadidaṃ samaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam samaḥ prayojanam saṃpratyayaḥ iti samadhikaḥ pratyayaḥ iti arthaḥ
asti artha saṃpratyayaḥ nāmadheya sāmānādhikaraṇyena
na tu etāvatā nāmadheya ātma tā sidhyati

original: asti hi purovartidravyasāmānādhikaraṇyena rajatapratyayo na caitāvatā śuktī rajatātmikā bhavatītyata āha---arthasaṃpratyayācca vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: asti hi purovarti dravya sāmānādhikaraṇyena rajata pratyayaḥ na ca etāvatā śuktī rajata ātmikā bhavati iti atas āha artha saṃpratyayāt ca vyavahāraḥ
pramāṇam sat nāmadheya tādatmyam sādhayati arthānām iti arthaḥ
tat evam sāmānyatas rthānām nāmadheya tādātmyam vyutpādya prakṛte yojanayati tatra idam indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam

original: viṣayajñānaṃ rūpamiti vā rasa iti vā evaṃ rūpādyarthasāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati /
analyzed: viṣaya jñānam rūpam iti vā rasaḥ iti vā evam rūpa ādi artha sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati
bhavatu kim etāvatā api iti atas āha rūpa rasa śabdāḥ ca viṣaya nāmadheyam
kim etāvatā api iti atas āhatena vyapadiśyate jñānam

original: uktamapi vyapadeśaṃ savyākhyānamāha--rūpamiti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti /
analyzed: uktam api vyapadeśam sa vyākhyānam āha rūpam iti jānīte rasaḥ iti jānīte iti

original: tathā cārthānāṃ nāmadheyātmakatvāt tadgocaramālocanamapi nāmadheyagocaramityarthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānaṃ śābdaṃ prasajyata iti /
analyzed: tathā ca arthānām nāmadheya ātmaka tvāt tad gocaram ālocanam api nāmadheya gocaram iti arthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānam śābdam prasajyate iti
na śabda pramāṇaka tayā śābdam
api tu śabde jātam śābdam
śabdaḥ ca atra viṣaya tvena janakaḥ ṛtha tādātmyāt
tathā ca na avikalpakam śabda rahitam asti iti tātparyārthaḥ
tathā ca āhuḥ

original: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
analyzed: na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte
anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate
bālaka mūka ādīnām api jñānam śabda anuvyādha vat eva anādi śabda bhāvanā vaśāt
yat avocat
ādyaḥ karaṇa vinyāsaḥ prāṇasya ūrdhvam samīraṇam
sthānānām abhighātaḥ ca na vinā śabda bhāvanām
iti
tat asya nirākaraṇam lakṣaṇa gatena ālocanā jñāna avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena sūcitam

original: iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacanārhamapi subhāṣitarucitayā tadvilambamasahamāno bhāṣyakāro
analyzed: iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacana arham api subhāṣita ruci tayā tad vilambam asahamānaḥ bhāṣyakāraḥ
lakṣaṇa avasare eva āha
atas eva āha avyapadeśyam iti iti
tena sūcite pi arthe avyapadeśya padam cojayati yat idam anuma yukte śabda artha saṃbandhe rtha jñānam
na tat nāmadheya śabdena vyapadiśyate
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdātmakatvaṃ rūpādīnāmabhidhīyānaṃ śabdabrahmātmakatvaṃ vocyeta śreyamāṇagaurityādipadabhedātmakatvaṃ vā?
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabda ātmaka tvam rūpa ādīnām abhidhīyānam śabdabrahma ātmaka tvam vā ucyeta śreyamāṇa gauḥ ityādi pada bheda ātmaka tvam vā
na tāvat ā adya
kalpaḥ

original: na salvasmadādisamastadarśanapathātivṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpādīnāmasti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītiḥ laukikānām /
analyzed: na salu asmat ādi samasta darśana patha ativṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpa ādīnām asti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ laukikānām

original: śrūyamāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmyaprasādhane anupayuktaśabdasaṃbandhasya bālamūkādeḥ rūpādijñāneṣu nāsti śrūyamāṇaśabdagandho 'pi,
analyzed: śrūyamāṇa śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmya prasādhane anupayukta śabda saṃbandhasya bāla mūka ādeḥ rūpa ādi jñāneṣu na asti
prāk eva tu tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: na ca teṣāmapi prāgbhavīyaśabdabhāvanānugamena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: na ca teṣām api prāgbhavīya śabda bhāvanā anugamena tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti sāṃpratam

original: na khalu rūpādyātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpādivaiśadyaināvaiśadyaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na khalu rūpa ādi ātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpa ādi vaiśadyaina a vaiśadyam saṃbhavati
yugapad vaiśadya avaiśadya rūpa viruddha dharma yogena bheda prasaṅgāt
veśadye tu śabdaiḥ vyavaharet
na tu saṃbandha grahaṇa apekṣeta

original: na ca tādātmyādanyad vācakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yatra saṃbandhagrahāpekṣā bhavet /
analyzed: na ca tādātmyāt anyat vācaka tvam śabdānām yatra saṃbandha graha apekṣā bhavet
na ca tādātmye kalpita bhedānām vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ
tathā sati na sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo bhedakalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaprathā ceti /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ bheda kalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇya prathā ca iti
tasmāt avyutpannānām asti śabda rahitam rūpa ādiṣu nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam iti
na kevalam abyutpannānām
vyutpannānām api asti iti āha gṛhīte ca śabda artha saṃbandhe iti

original: ārddhekta eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirāsāya saṃbandhagrahaṇasvarūpamāha--asthārthasya sāsnādimadrūpasya ayaṃ gakarādyokāro nāmadheyamiti /
analyzed: eva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirāsāya saṃbandha grahaṇa svarūpam āha astha arthasya sāsnādimat rūpasya ayam gakara ādi okāraḥ nāmadheyam iti
iti karaṇaḥ jñāna parāmarśa pradhānaḥ

original: tathā ca yo ḍittho nānādeśakālāvasthāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍabhedaḥ so 'yamiti sannihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca yaḥ ḍitthaḥ nānā deśa kāla avasthā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍa bhedaḥ saḥ yam iti sannihita deśa kālaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na tvayaṃ piṇḍo ḍitthaśabda iti pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: na tu ayam piṇḍaḥ ḍittha śabdaḥ iti pratyayaḥ

original: autsargikaṃ hi śabdānāmarthaparatvaṃ kvacit punarityādibhiḥ śabdaistadapodyate /
analyzed: autsargikam hi śabdānām artha paratvam kvacid punar ityādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ tat apodyate
yatra api saṃbandha pratipādanam abhedena ayam ḍitthaḥ iti

original: tatrāpi śabdo vācyatvaparo na svarūpaparaḥ yathā gaurvāhīka iti lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogaparaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api śabdaḥ vācyatva paraḥ na svarūpa paraḥ yathā gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yoga paraḥ

original: na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya gotvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca tad mātreṇa vāhīkasya go tvam bhavati

original: tasmād bhinnayoreva śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhagrahāt tanmūlatvācca śabdavyavahārasya na śabdapuraḥsaramapi jñānaṃ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyamātmano
analyzed: tasmāt bhinnayoḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandha grahāt tad mūla tvāt ca śabda vyavahārasya na śabda puraḥsaram api jñānam śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam ātmanaḥ

original: yattu śabdānupāye 'pi jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ bhavati tadgṛhītasaṅketasya prathamamindriyārthasannikarṣādālocanena
analyzed: yat tu śabda anupāye jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvam bhavati tat gṛhīta saṅketasya prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocanena
śabda saṃsarga rahitena ālocite ṛtha mātra itasya artha bhedasya śabda bhedena saṃbandhāt śabda viṣayaḥ
saṃskāraḥ prabodhyate
prabuddhaḥ śabda smṛtim janayati

original: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyā api śabdapuraḥsarā jāyante /
analyzed: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabda anupāyāḥ api śabda puraḥsarāḥ jāyante
yathā āhuḥ
yat saṃjñā smaraṇam tatra na tat api anya hetukam

original: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñām smārayitum kṣamaḥ

original: tasmād vyutpannasyāpi nāmadheyasmaraṇāya pūrvameṣitavyo vinaiva nāmadheyamarthapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vyutpannasya api nāmadheya smaraṇāya pūrvam eṣitavyaḥ vinā eva nāmadheyam artha pratyayaḥ

original: tadidam uktam--gṛhīte 'pi śabdārthasaṃbandhe asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyamiti /
analyzed: tat idam uktam gṛhīte pi śabda artha saṃbandhe asya arthasya ayam śabdaḥ nāmadheyam iti

original: yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate nāmadheyarahito nāmadheyasmaraṇāt pūrvamavikalpena tadā pūrvasmād avyutpannāvasthāyām arthajñānāt na viśiṣyate iti
analyzed: yadā tu saḥ rthaḥ gṛhyate nāmadheya rahitaḥ nāmadheya smaraṇāt pūrvam avikalpena tadā pūrvasmāt avyutpanna avasthāyām artha jñānāt na viśiṣyate iti

original: yato na viśiṣyate tasmāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati /
analyzed: yatas na viśiṣyate tasmāt tad artha jñānam tādṛś eva bhavati

original: nanu parapratipādanādilakṣaṇavyavahārāya svarūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yadarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tadavagacchāmo 'rthavyapadeśākāramiti
analyzed: nanu para pratipādana ādi lakṣaṇa vyavahārāya sva rūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yat artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tat avagacchāmaḥ rtha vyapadeśa ākāram iti
katham ca arthākāram bhavati
yadi artha vyapadeśayoḥ na abhedaḥ

original: tasmāt punarapi tādātmyaṃ prasaktamityata āha--tasya tviti /
analyzed: tasmāt punar api tādātmyam prasaktam iti atas āha tasya tu iti

original: arthākārameva tu jñānamarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: artha ākāram eva tu jñānam artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ
pratīyamānam pareṇa
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: tadevamarthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate pratīyamānatayā,
analyzed: tat evam artha jñāna kāle sa na samākhyā śabdaḥ vyāpriyate pratīyamāna tayā

original: vyavahārakāle tu parapratyāyanakāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇatayā /
analyzed: vyavahāra kāle tu para pratyāyana kāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇa tayā

original: tadanena gopālāvipālādīnāṃ saṃjñāniveśanaṃ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahārotkarṣahetuḥ
analyzed: tat anena gopāla avipāla ādīnām saṃjñā niveśanam tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahāra utkarṣa hetuḥ
na artha utkarṣa hetuḥ iti api sūcitam bhavati
tasmāt avikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena asya eva avikalpakasya śabda anuvyādha rahita tā sūcitā iti āśayavān upasaṃharati tatmāt iti
tat etat bhāṣyam vārttikakāraḥ tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe itat ca indriya artha iti
viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyi jñānam iti śabda ātma tām apāroti

original: cākṣuṣaṃ hi rūpajñānaṃ rūpa eva niyataṃ na śabde pravartate /
analyzed: cākṣuṣam hi rūpa jñānam rūpe eva niyatam na śabde pravartate

original: evaṃ śrautramapi śabda eva niyataṃ na rūpādau pravartate /
analyzed: evam śrautram api śabdaḥ eva niyatam na rūpa ādau pravartate
yadi punar idam śabda ātmakam rūpa ādi bhavet
śrotra jam jñānam śabda grāhi iti rūpa ādau api pravarteta
a pravartamānam vā vidhurayati rūpa ādīnām śabda ātma tām
api ca śrūyamāṇa śabda ātma tve rūpa ādīnām
teṣām api śravaṇa grāhya tvam iti andhaḥ pi rūpu gṛhṇīyāt

original: asti hi tasya śrotraṃ ca śabdajñānaṃ ca /
analyzed: asti hi tasya śrotram ca śabda jñānam ca
evam badhiraḥ u pi śabdam gṛhṇīyāt

original: asti hi tasya locanaṃ ca rūpajñānaṃ ca /
analyzed: asti hi tasya locanam ca rūpa jñānam ca

original: aśabdo 'bhāva iti ca vivakṣitaviparītāpattiḥ śabdābhāvasyārthasya śabdatvāt,
analyzed: aśabdaḥ bhāvaḥ iti ca vivakṣita viparīta āpattiḥ śabda abhāvasya arthasya śabda tvāt

original: aśabdatve vā sa evāsyārthaḥ śabdād bhinnaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: aśabda tve vā saḥ evā asya arthaḥ śabdāt bhinnaḥ prasajyate
evam abhāvaḥ pi arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ syāt
tathā ca na abhāvaḥ
śabdasya sattvāt
tathā ca artha anuvidhāyi vijñānam na bhavet
asti ca
tasmāt na śabda ātmānaḥ rthāḥ iti
tad utpatti kāle iti prāthamyena śabda anuvyādham vyāvartayati
eka deśi vyākhyānam āha apare tu iti

original: indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yadindriyagātijñānaṃ tadapi pratyakṣalakṣaṇopetamiti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata iti tannivāraṇāya avyapadeśyapadam
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yat indriya gāti jñānam tat api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa upetam iti pratyakṣam prasajyate iti tad nivāraṇāya avyapadeśya padam
apadeśaḥ hetuvacanam
tat eva tad ābhāsebhyaḥ viśiṣṭam vyapadeśaḥ
tasya kāryam hetu pratyāyana dvārā anumeya jñānam vyapadeśyam
na vyapadeśyam avyapadeśyam aliṅga ubhdavam iti anumānam vyāvartitam iti arthaḥ
tad ekadeśi matam dūṣayatitat ca na evam iti
nanu indriya gati jñānam api indriya artha sannikarṣāt liṅgāt utpannam iti atas āha na hi anumeyasya iti na etat indrayā artha sannikārṣāt upajāyate
kim tu tad jñānāt

original: ata evātīte 'pi dhūmādau liṅge tatsmaraṇamātrādevānumeyajñāna bhavati /
analyzed: atas eva atīte dhūma ādau liṅge tad smaraṇa mātrāt eva anumeya jñāna bhavati

original: na ca sannikarṣapadasya mukhyatve saṃbhavati jñānalakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sannikarṣa padasya mukhya tve saṃbhavati jñāna lakṣaṇā yuktā iti bhāvaḥ
upasaṃharati atas iti
imam ca vārttika grantham a budhyamānāḥ indriya gati jñāna nivṛtti artham indriya viṣayeṣu iti padam sūtre dhyāharanti iti

original: kramaprāptasyāvyabhicāripadasya tātparyaṃ brūvāṇo bhāṣyasyāpi tātparyamāha--grīṣme marīcaya itīti /
analyzed: krama prāptasya avyabhicāri padasya tātparyam brūvāṇaḥ bhāṣyasya api tātparyam āha grīṣme marīcayaḥ iti iti

original: yadyapi sāmānyalakṣaṇenaiva vyabhicāriṇo nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tadapekṣaṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇam,
analyzed: yadi api sāmānya lakṣaṇena eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tad apekṣam ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇam
anyathā anumāna ādi padeṣu api abhicādi padam upādeyam syāt
tathā api siddhe sati ārambhaḥ niyama arthaḥ
dvayī hi pramāṇānām gatiḥ
kiñcid sattā mātreṇa pramā sādhanam yathā pratyakṣam
na hi cakṣuḥ ādīnām grahaṇam upayujyate
api tu sattā eva
tu sva jñānena pramā sādhanāni

original: na khalvagṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ vā śabdo vā āgamasahitaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā yathāviṣayam ādadhāti pramām /
analyzed: na khalu agṛhītam liṅgam vā śabdaḥ vā āgama sahitam sādṛśyam vā yathā viṣayam ādadhāti pramām
tatra anumānasya pramā upajananāt prāk eva artha avyabhicāra grahaṇam apekṣate na anyathā
tatas pramā sidhyati iti

original: śabdādau tu yadyapi pramopajananaṃ prati nārthāvyabhicāragrahāpekṣā,
analyzed: śabda ādau tu yadi api pramā upajananam prati nā artha avyabhicāra graha apekṣā
tathā api śakyam atirohita artha mantra madhya patitasya drāk iti eva pratīyamāna arthasya api
sṛṇyā iva jarbharī turpharītū
iti evamādeḥ mantrasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā sāmānyatas rtha avyabhicāri tvam grahītum
autsargikam hi śabdānām artha para tvam
atas eva nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa sahāyāḥ tatas rtham avadhārayanti

original: evaṃ yathā mudgastambastathā mudgaparṇīti āptavākyaśravaṇādeva mudgastambasādṛśyajñānasyānupajanitaphalasyāpi śakyaṃ tadarthāvyabhicāritvaṃ  #
analyzed: evam yathā mudga stambaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti āpta vākya śravaṇāt eva mudga stamba sādṛśya jñānasya anupajanita phalasya api śakyam tad artha avyabhicāri tvam
niśrcetum

original: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasyātyantaparokṣasvarūpolambha eva tāvat pramopajananāt prāg durlabhaḥ,
analyzed: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasya atyanta parokṣa sva rūpa ulambhaḥ eva tāvat pramā upajananāt prāk durlabhaḥ
tu tasya artha avyabhicāri tvam

original: yadyapi ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃvedanaṃ manasā sulabham,
analyzed: yadi api ca saṃvedana prāmāṇya pakṣe tat saṃvedanam manasā sulabham
tathā api na tanmātram pramāṇam

original: api tu asādhāraṇendriyārthasannikarṣasahāyamiti tatsahāyasya tasya parokṣatvameva /
analyzed: api tu asādhāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣa sahāyam iti tad sahāyasya tasya parokṣa tvam eva
tena pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phala avyabhicāreṇa eva avyabhicāra jñānam

original: na svarūpataḥ ityetat pramāṇāntarebhyo vyāvṛttamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣasya rūpamādarśayitumavyabhicāripadopādānam /
analyzed: na svarūpataḥ iti etat pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam asādhāraṇam pratyakṣasya rūpam ādarśayitum avyabhicāri pada upādānam
atha vā pratyakṣa avyabhicāraḥ eva anumāna ādi avyabhicāre kāraṇam

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'vyabhicaritapratyakṣagṛhītapakṣadharmatākaṃ tarkasahāyapratyakṣagṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ cānumānaṃ vyabhicāratīti /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ vyabhicarita pratyakṣa gṛhīta pakṣa dharmatākam tarka sahāya pratyakṣa gṛhīta avinābhāvam ca anumānam vyabhicārati iti
yat tu bādhita viṣayam sat pratipakṣitam ca anumānam

original: tadapi yadyapi prathamaṃ vyāptigrahaṇadoṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam,
analyzed: tat api yadi api prathamam vyāpti grahaṇa doṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam
tathā api khaṇḍana uttara kālam saḥ pi pratīyate

original: tathā ca vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi vyabhicārīti /
analyzed: tathā ca vyāpti grāhi pratyakṣam tatra api vyabhicāri iti

original: evamāgamo 'pi sākṣāt kvacit pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakastadvyabhicāreṇaiva vyabhicarati /
analyzed: evam āgamaḥ pi sākṣāt kvacid pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakaḥ tad vyabhicāreṇa eva vyabhicarati
āgama vyabhicāreṇa eva upamāna vyabhicāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāvyabhicāre pramāṇānāmavyabhicāro 'stīti pratyakṣasyaiva viśeṣaṇamavyabhicāripadaṃ cakāra,
analyzed: tat evam pratyakṣa avyabhicāre pramāṇānām avyabhicāraḥ sti iti pratyakṣasya eva viśeṣaṇam avyabhicāri padam cakāra
na itareṣām pramāṇānām
na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ tad mūlam pratyakṣam avyabhicāri
tāni ca vyabhicārīṇi iti
saḥ yam viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ pratyakṣasya
yathā āha mīmāṃsā vārttikakāraḥ
pratyakṣa avyabhicāreṇa sva lakṣaṇa balena ca
prasiddha avyabhicāri tvāt na anumānam parīkṣyate
iti

original: tasmāt suṣṭhūkaṃ grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam,
analyzed: tasmāt suṣṭhūkam grīṣme marīcayaḥ iti bhāṣyam
tad pratiṣedha artham idam ucyate avyabhicāri iti
pṛcchati kim idam iti
uttaram yad a tasmin iti
etat ca upapāditam dvitīya sūtre
punar dūṣayati tat ca na evam iti
pṛcchati kasmāt
uttaram arthasya iti
tat eva sphorayati yat tat iti
atra ca na nirvikalmakam bhrāntam
kim tu savikalpakam iti āha tān tu marīcīn iti

original: indriyeṇālocya marīcīn uccāvacamuccalato nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatropaghātadoṣād viparyeti,
analyzed: indriyeṇa ālocya marīcīn uccāvacam uccalataḥ nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatra upaghāta doṣāt viparyeti
sa vikalpakaḥ sya pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ jāyate iti
tasmāt vijñānasya vyabhicāraḥ na arthasya iti
yathā āhuḥ nirukta kārāḥ
na eṣa sthāṇoḥ aparādhaḥ yat enam andhe na paśyati
puruṣa aparādhaḥ sa bhavati iti
avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñānam api vyudastam

original: no khalu saṃśayajñānaṃ vikalpyamānavastugocaraṃ tadrūpaṃ vastu prāpayati /
analyzed: no khalu saṃśaya jñānam vikalpyamāna vastu gocaram tad rūpam vastu prāpayati
aprāpayat ca upadarśitam katham saṃvādam
asaṃvādakam ca katham avyabhicāri
tasmāt avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñāne niraste sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avadodha artham upādīyamānam vyavasāya ātmaka padam saṃśaya jñāna pratyakṣa tā apākaraṇam anvācinoti
tat yathā edha āhartum araṇyam gaccha
śākam api āneṣyasi iti śāka ānayanam anvācīyate

original: na ca tadevāsya preṣiturvi dhitsitam, tathehāpi /
analyzed: na ca tat eva asya preṣituḥ vi dhitsitam tathā iha api
vyavasāya ātmaka padam sākṣāt sa vikalpakasya vācakam

original: tathā hi vyavasāyo viniśrcayo vikalpa ityanarthāntaram /
analyzed: tathā hi vyavasāyaḥ viniśrcayaḥ vikalpaḥ iti anarthāntaram

original: sa evātmā rūpaṃ yasya tat savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: saḥ eva ātmā rūpam yasya tat sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam

original: tadetadatisphaṭatvāt śiṣyairgamyata eveti bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātamapi asmābhiḥ,
analyzed: tat etat ati sphaṭa tvāt śiṣyaiḥ gamyate eva iti bhāṣya vārttikakārābhyām a vyākhyātam api asmābhiḥ
trilocana guru unnīta mārga anugamana unmukhaiḥ
yathānyāyam yathāvastu vyākhyātam idam īdṛśam
syāt etat
na vyavasāya ātmakam pratayakṣam bhavitum arhati
abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam hi tat

original: na cendriyārthābhyāṃ labdhajanma vijñānamarthāvabhāsaṃ śakyamabhilāpena yojanayitum /
analyzed: na ca indriya arthābhyām labdha janma vijñānam artha avabhāsam śakyam abhilāpena yojanayitum
na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi
artha ātmanaḥ vā
tathā sati avyutpannasya api vyutpanna vat vyavahāraḥ syāt iti uktam
na ca abhilāpaḥ saṃvedana dharmaḥ
artheṣu tad niyojanāt
tasmāt arthāt upajāyamānam jñānam artham eva ādarśayet na abhilāpam

original: na hi rūpāt jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rasasahitametadādarśayati /
analyzed: na hi rūpāt jāyamānam pratyakṣam rasa sahitam etat ādarśayati
tasmāt abhilāpa saṃsarga anapekṣam abhilāpa saṃsargiṇam ādarśayat vikalpa vijñānam vikalpa vāsanā utthāpitam aniyata artha grāhi
mānasam ātmīyam utprekṣā lakṣaṇam vyāpāram tiraskṛtya anubhava prabhava tayā anubhava vyāpāram
darśanu puraskṛtya pravartamānam anubhava tayā abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ
tat siddham etat
yad artha sāmarthya labdha janma
na tat śabda kalpanā anugatam
yathā nirvikalpakam
vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ iti prasaṅga sādhana viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ
śabda kalpanā anugata tvasya hi pratiṣedhyasya viruddham tad ananugata tvam
tena artha sāmarthya ja tvam vyāptam
tasya upalabdhiḥ tad ananugata tvam utthāpayantī tad anugata tvam virūṇaddhi iti
atha eṣām pratyayānām pratyakṣam abhi lāpa anugata tvam aśakya apahnavam
hanta bhoḥ
na artha sāmarthya ja tvam iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ

original: tathā hi yadabhilāpakalpanānugataṃ na tadarthasāmarthyajaṃ yatheśvarapradhānādivikalpavijñānam /
analyzed: tathā hi yat abhilāpa kalpanā anugatam na tat artha sāmarthya jam yathā īśvara pradhāna ādi vikalpa vijñānam

original: tathā caite vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca ete vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ

original: niṣedhyamarthasāmarthyajatvaṃ tadabhilāpakalpanānanugatatvena vyāptaṃ tadviruddhaṃ ca sadanugatatvamiti /
analyzed: niṣedhyam artha sāmarthya ja tvam tad abhilāpa kalpanā ananugata tvena vyāptam tad viruddham ca sat anugata tvam iti
na ca sandigdha vyatireki tā

original: arthasāmarthyena hi tadutpadyamānamartharūpam anukuryād na śabdarūpam /
analyzed: artha sāmarthyena hi tat utpadyamānam artha rūpam anukuryāt na śabda rūpam

original: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi tadātmāno vetyuktam /
analyzed: na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi tad ātmānaḥ vā iti uktam
asaṃbaddha rūpa anukāre tu vijñānasya sarva rūpa anukāreṇa sarva sarvajñā tā āpattiḥ ati
saṅketa vaśāt śabdānām artha saṃbandhena artha upalabdhau tad smaraṇāt tad saṃsṛṣṭa vedanam iti ced

original: yatra tarhi te kṛtasaṅketāḥ tadeva smārayedetān /
analyzed: yatra tarhi te kṛta saṅketāḥ tat eva smārayet etān

original: tatraiva ca te kṛtasaṅketā yadanugataṃ sāmānyam /
analyzed: tatra eva ca te kṛta saṅketāḥ yat anugatam sāmānyam
na ca tat dṛṣṭam
kim tu sva lakṣaṇam darśana gocaraḥ
tat eva hi paramārtha sat vijñānasya kāraṇam
na tu sāmānyam
sarva sāmārthyaya hitam hi tat alīka tvāt

original: tasmād yad dṣṭaṃ na tena śabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt yat dṛṣṭam na tena śabdānām saṃbandhaḥ
yena ca saṃbandhaḥ na tat dṛṣṭam

original: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabdavācyatve darśanādiva vahinaruṣṇa iti vākyādapi pratīyeta /
analyzed: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabda vācya tve darśanāt iva vahi naruṣṇaḥ iti vākyāt api pratīyeta

original: tathā ca śabdādapi tasmin pratīte śītāpanopanaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca śabdāt api tasmin pratīte śīta āpanopana prasaṅgaḥ
sāmānya viṣayau liṅga śabdau vastu bhūta sāmānyavat ca sva lakṣaṇam

original: tādṛśaṃ ca taddarśanasya kāraṇamiti nirvikalpakena prathamākṣatannipātajanmanā jātimadvastuvedanāt tatropalabdhacarasaṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam
analyzed: tādṛśam ca tad darśanasya kāraṇam iti nirvikalpakena prathama akṣa tannipāta janmanā jātimat vastu vedanāt tatra upalabdha cara saṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam

original: tathā ca tacchabdābhidheyajātiviśiṣṭadravyāvagāhīndriyārthasannikarṣajanmā vikalpapratyayo gaurayamityevamākāro jāyata iti cet? yathāhuḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca tad śabda abhidheya jāti viśiṣṭa dravya avagāhi indriya artha sannikarṣa janmā vikalpa pratyayaḥ gauḥ ayam iti evam ākāraḥ jāyate iti ced yathā āhuḥ
nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ
grahaṇam vā pratyakṣa
tathā tatas param punar vastu dharmaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yayā
buddhyā avasīyate sā api pratyakṣa tvena saṃmatā
ślaḥ vā pratyakṣaḥ iti
tat na piṇḍa vivekena jāti ādeḥ avikalpakena agrahaṇāt

original: na hi jātijātibhantau vā kriyākriyāvantau va guṇaguṇinau vā tatsamavāyo vā vivekena cakāsati /
analyzed: na hi vā kriyā a kriyāvantau guṇa guṇinau vā tad samavāyaḥ vā vivekena

original: na ca vivekenāpratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mitho yojayituṃ kṣīrodakavadatadvedinā /
analyzed: na ca vivekena apratibhāsamānaḥ śakyāḥ mithas yojayitum kṣīrodaka vat a tad vedinā
tasmāt ekam avibhāgam sva lakṣaṇam anādi vikalpa vāsanā samāropita jāti ādi bhedam tathā vikalpyate iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ
api ca paramārtha sat vastu dvaya vedane pi kutas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ
na hi aṅgulyau eka vijñāna viṣayau mithas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvam āpadyete
viśeṣaṇa khalu upakārakam
upakāryam ca viśeṣyam
na anyathā tayoḥ tabhdāvaḥ
na ca eka vijñāna samārūḍhayoḥ jñāpya jñāpaka bhāvaḥ vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā saṃbhavī
samāna kālayoḥ tayoḥ ūbhayoḥ api paurvāparya niyamāt

original: api ca vastuniveśe jātyādīnāmupādhīnāmekasya vastunaḥ sattvaṃ ca dravyatvaṃ ca pārthivatvaṃ
analyzed: api ca vastu niveśe jāti ādīnām upādhīnām ekasya vastunaḥ sattvam ca dravya tvam ca pārthiva tvam

original: ca vṛkṣatvaṃ ca śiṃśapātvaṃ copādhaya iti dūrādekopādhiviśiṣṭasya grahe sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ca vṛkṣa tvam ca śiṃśapā tvam ca upādhayaḥ iti dūrāt eka upādhi viśiṣṭasya grahe sarva upādhi viśiṣṭa graha prasaṅgaḥ
tathā hi ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ upakāra garbhaḥ bhavati

original: patanadharmaṇo hi badarasyottarasya kuṇḍamadharaṃ pratayāsannamapatanadharmakaṃ badaraṃ vidadhadādhāraḥ /
analyzed: patana dharmaṇaḥ hi badarasya uttarasya kuṇḍam adharam pratayā āsannam apatana dharmakam badaram vidadhat ādhāraḥ
tadvat iha api dravyeṇa jāti ādīnām upādhīnām upakartavyam
na ca śakti antaraiḥ ūpakaroti
śakti antara pakāre pi anavasthā pātāt

original: tasmāt svabhāva eva svakāraṇādhīnajanmā dravyasya sa tādṛśo yena bahūnāmupādhīnāmupakarotīti vācyam /
analyzed: tasmāt svabhāvaḥ eva sva kāraṇa adhīna janmā dravyasya sa tādṛśaḥ yena bahūnām upādhīnām upakaroti iti vācyam

original: tathā ca sattvopakārasamartheṃ tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatvādyupakārasamartho
analyzed: tathā ca sattva upakāra samarthā tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravya tva ādi upakāra samarthā

original: 'pi sa evāsya svabhāva iti tatsvabhāvāvacchinnāḥ sattvavikalpakena paramārthasaddravyāvagāhinā
analyzed: saḥ eva asya svabhāvaḥ iti tad svabhāva avacchinnāḥ sattva vikalpakena paramārtha sat dravya avagāhinā

original: sarva eva dravyatvapārthivatvavṛkṣatvaśiśapātvādayo viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpāntarāṇāmānarthakyam /

yat āha

iti

original: asmākaṃ tu anādivikalpavāsanopādānā vikalpā yacca gṛhṇanti,

analyzed: yat ca tayoḥ ūbhayoḥ api anya nivṛtti rūpa tayā avastu tvāt na paramārtha sat vastu gāhante

original: pāramparyeṇa tu vastupratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaśca na visaṃvādayanti lokam /

original: api cālocite vastunīndriyeṇa tadanantarotpannaṃ śabdasmaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramindriyamarthaśrca na savikalpikāmapi dhiyamupajanayitumarhataḥ
analyzed: api ca ālocite vastuni indriyeṇa tad anantara utpannam śabda smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram indriyam arthaḥ ca na sa vikalpikām api dhiyam upajanayitum arhataḥ
yathā āha
artha upayoge pi punar smārtam śabda anuyojanam
akṣa dhīḥ yadi apekṣeta saḥ rthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet

original: na ca yadevālocanamajījanadindriyaṃ tadeva smaraṇasahakāri vikalpapratyayamādhatte /

na ca smṛtiḥ vyavadhāyikā
sva aṅgam a vyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt

sa paśrcāt api
iti na u khalu atītam bhavati gocaraḥ kṣasya
na ca agocare sahasreṇa api upāyaiḥ etat pravartitum arhati
na ca smṛtiḥ atīta viṣayā ananubhūta pūrvam vartamānam gocarayitum arhati

iti
tat evam nāma jāti guṇa karma kalpanāḥ pratyakṣa tvena parāstāḥ
dravya kalpanā api daṇḍī iti

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /

gṛhītvā saṅkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā

original: jātiguṇakriyāvatāṃ caitanna saṃbhavatyeva rūpavivekasaṃbandhayorapratibhāsanena ghaṭanāyogāt kṣīrodakavadatadvedinetyuktam /
analyzed: jāti guṇa kriyāvatām ca etat na saṃbhavati eva rūpa viveka saṃbandhayoḥ apratibhāsanena ghaṭanā ayogāt kṣīrodaka vat a tad vedinā iti uktam

atra ucyate

tatra brūmaḥ
syāt virodhaḥ yadi sva lakṣaṇam eva arthaḥ
na tu etat asti
upapādayiṣyati hi paramārtha santam jāti ādimantam artham sthema bhājam abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam

original: tena tajjanitaṃ jñānamarthasāmarthyajaṃ cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /

tathā ca prasaṅga sādhanasya sandigdha vyatireki tā

original: na ca dravyādyabhinnaṃ jātyādi bhinnaṃ kalpayanto vikalpā nārthasāmarthyajanmāna iti sāṃpratat /

dravyāt api hi bhedaḥ sādhayiṣyate teṣām

original: yathā ca bhede 'pi teṣāṃ tadvācakānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tathopapāditamadhastāt /
analyzed: yathā ca bhede teṣām tad vācakānām sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā upapāditam adhastāt

original: na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍittho 'yamityabhedakalpanādarthasya vikalpānāmanarthajatvamiti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍitthaḥ yam iti abheda kalpanāt arthasya vikalpānām anartha ja tvam iti yuktam
uktam etat avyapadeśya pada vyākhyāna avasare yathā na śabda abhedena arthayoḥ eka indriya jñāna saṃsargi tā
kim tu prathamam ālocitaḥ rthaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān saṅketa grahaṇ samaya vartinīm ātmanaḥ
avasthām smārayan tad kāla bhāvinam śabdam api smārayati avarjanīya tayā
na tu indriya ja vikalpa utpādam prati asti upayogaḥ kaścid śabda smaraṇasya
anyathā bāla mūka ādīnām nā indriya jaḥ syāt vikalpaḥ śabda smaraṇa abhāvāt
saṅketa samaya varti avasthā smaraṇam tu upayujyate
vastunaḥ tadānīntana idānīntana avasthā bhedavataḥ ekasya indriya jena vikalpena a kalanāt

original: śabdastu saṃpātāyāto na niveśayatyātmānam indriyaje vikalpe /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu saṃpātāya ātaḥ na niveśayati ātmānam indriya je vikalpe
yathā āha
devadatta ādi śabdana hṛdaya sthena yaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate //
analyzed: cakṣuṣā api saḥ eva ayam piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate
anena hi piṇḍasya pūrva apara avasthā vartinīm ekatām indiya ja vikalpa gocara tvena darśayati
na tu śabda niveśanam api
tathā

original: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
analyzed: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇā api pratyakṣa tvam na bādhate
saṃjñinaḥ
kutas
sā taṭa avasthā na rūpa ācchādana kṣamā
na artha indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatte iti arthaḥ

original: na ca prāgavasthāsmaraṇasāpekṣatayā nendriyārthasannikarṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpasyeti sāṃpratam /

original: na hi nājījanat kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti na samavahitakṣityādisahakārigrāmamapyasyājanakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi nā ajījanat kuśūla stham bījam aṅkuram iti na samavahita kṣiti ādi sahakāri grāmam api asya ajanakam bhavati

original: na ca janakatvājanakatvalakṣaṇo viruddhadharmasaṃsargo bhedaheturityupapādayiṣyate kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge //
analyzed: na ca janaka tva ajanaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ bheda hetuḥ iti upapādayiṣyate kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge
syāt etat
atīta avasthā na indriya gocaraḥ tasya vartamāna arthe niyamāt

original: na ca vartamāno 'rthaḥ smaraṇagocaraḥ smaraṇasyānubhavajanitasaṃskārodbodhajanmanaḥ pūrvānubhavagocaraṃ prati niyamāt /
analyzed: na ca vartamānaḥ rthaḥ smaraṇa gocaraḥ smaraṇasya anubhava janita saṃskāra udbodha janmanaḥ pūrva anubhava gocaram prati niyamāt
tasmāt bhinna viṣaya tayā na indriya sahakāri tā smaraṇasya

original: na hi rūpaviṣayāḥ sahasramapi nayanapradīpādayaḥ śabdaviṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritāmāpadyanta iti /
analyzed: na hi rūpa viṣayāḥ sahasram api nayana pradīpa ādayaḥ śabda viṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāri tām āpadyante iti

original: tat kiṃ bhavatāṃ yatra gandhajñānānantaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ rūpajñānaṃ jāyate tatra gandhajñānam na samanantarapratyayaḥ?
analyzed: tat kim bhavatām yatra gandha jñāna anantaram cākṣuṣam rūpa jñānam jāyate tatra gandha jñānam na samanantara pratyayaḥ

original: tatrāpi hi cakṣūrūpaviṣayaṃ na gandhaviṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitumarhati,
analyzed: tatra api hi cakṣuḥ rūpa viṣayam na gandha viṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitum arhati
bhinna viṣaya tvāt eva
atha anvaya vyatireka nibandhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na samāna viṣaya tvam anuvidhīyate iti ucya itra
tat asmākam api samānam
nanu atīta avasthā viśiṣṭa tvam asya na indriya sannikṛṣṭam iti katham pratyakṣam
tat kim yat indriya saṃbaddham tat pratyakṣam

original: tathā satyākāśaparamāṇvādayo 'pi tatsaṃyuktā iti te 'pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran /
analyzed: tathā sati ākāśa paramāṇu ādayaḥ pi tad saṃyuktāḥ iti te pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran
tasmāt yat eva indriya jasya jñānasya gocaraḥ tat pratyakṣam
na tu indriya saṃbaddham
nanu asaṃbaddham indriyam katham tatra jñānam janayati
tat ca jñānam katham pratyakṣam
pratyakṣam ced
katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti lakṣaṇam pratyakṣam vyāpnoti
asya eva pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇena a vyānāt
mā bhūt arthasya pūrva kāla varti tā indriya gocaraḥ
tathā api smaraṇa sahakāriṇā saṃskāra sahakāriṇā indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa upajanitam tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam na bhavati
tathā ca na avyāpakam asya lakṣaṇam
nanu pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam katham ekam
viṣaya bhedāt pārokṣya apārokṣya lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargāt ca
tathā hi tat iti pārokṣyam
idam iti ca sākṣātkāraḥ
na ca viruddha dharma saṃsarge pi ekatvam
trailākyasya eka tva prasaṅgāt
viṣaya bhedaḥ ca pūrva deśa kāla apara deśa kāla saṃbandhayoḥ ekasya virodhāt

original: yathā hyekasmin padmarāgamaṇau gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyate,
analyzed: yathā hi ekasmin padmarāga maṇau gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāvaḥ vyavacchidyate

original: yadi punarnaṃ vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvo na paricchidyeta,
analyzed: yadi punar nam vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvaḥ na paricchidyeta
tasya sva abhāva vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt

original: tadabhāvāvinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāgādaya iti te 'pi sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti /
analyzed: tad abhāva avinābhāvinaḥ ca puṣparāga ādayaḥ iti te sarve bhavanti
yadi punar na vyavacchidyaran

original: sa eva puṣparāgādyatmeti tadavinābhāvī padmarāgābhāvaḥ padmarāgaśrca syāditi durghaṭamāpadyeta /
analyzed: saḥ eva tad avinābhāvī padmarāga abhāvaḥ padmarāgaḥ ca syāt iti durghaṭam āpadyeta
evam tasya eva pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāva vyavaccheda krameṇa apara deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ
tathā ca na pada deśa kāla saṃbandha svabhāvaḥ
tathā api yadi asau tad deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anya svabhāvaḥ bhavet
tathā sati saḥ eva bhavet
na bhavet ca iti durghaṭam āpadyeta

original: tasmāt pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhādanyo 'paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti siddho viṣayabheda iti //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anyaḥ para deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ iti siddhaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ iti
atra ucyate
yadi parokṣya apārokṣya dharma bhedāt pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam bhidyeta
hanta bhoḥ
tat iti api vikalpaḥ bhidyeta
saḥ pi hi parokṣaḥ ca a parokṣaḥ ca vikalpaḥ ca a vikalpaḥ ca
arthe parokṣaḥ vikalpaḥ ca sva ātmani tu a vikalpaḥ parokṣaḥ ca

original: tasmād viṣayabhodāt virodha iti cet---na tvihāpi tadekaṃ jñānaṃ tasyaivaikasya vastunaḥ pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhe parokṣamaparokṣaṃ vā paradeśakālasaṃbandha  #
analyzed: tasmāt viṣaya bhodāt virodhaḥ iti ced na tu iha api tat ekam jñānam tasya eva ekasya vastunaḥ pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe parokṣam aparokṣam vā para deśa kāla saṃbandha
iti kaḥ virodhaḥ
yaḥ pi kāla deśa saṃbandha bhedena viṣaya bhedaḥ uktaḥ
saḥ pi ayuktaḥ

original: yato yuktaṃ yat padmarāgasvarūpagrahe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti,
analyzed: yatas yuktam yat padmarāga svarūpa grahe tad abhāvaḥ vyavacchidyate iti
sva abhāva vyavaccheda ātmaka tvena bhāvānām tad avyavacchede svarūpa agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt
kasmāt punar puṣparāga ādayaḥ vyavacchidyante
padmarāga abhāva avinābhāvāt iti ced
atha etad abhāva avinābhāva jñānam kutastyam

original: tayoḥ kadācidapi tādā tmyenānupalambhāditi cet---yatra tarhi tādātmyamupalabhyate na tatra tadabhāvāvinābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tayoḥ kadācid api tādā tmyena anupalambhāt iti ca iti atra tarhi tādātmyam upalabhyate na tatra tad abhāva avinābhāvaḥ

original: tathā ca pūrvāparadeśakālasaṃbaddhastādātmyenānubhūyamāna indriyajena vikalpena padmarāgo na bhinno bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tathā ca pūrva apara deśa kāla saṃbaddhaḥ tādātmyena anubhūyamānaḥ indriya jena vikalpena padmarāgaḥ na bhinnaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tasmāt parvāparadeśakālau tatsaṃndhau vā kāmaṃ bhidyeyātāṃ parasparābhāvāvinābhāvāt,
analyzed: tasmāt parva apara deśa kālau tad saṃndhau vā kāmam bhidyeyātām paraspara abhāva avinābhāvāt
tayoḥ ekadā api tādātmyena apratibhāsanāt
na tu tad āliḍri gata svabhāvaḥ padmarāga maṇi
tasya tābhyām anya tvāt
na ca anyasya bhedaḥ nyasya bhedam āpādayati
atiprasaṅgāt

original: na cendriyārthasannikarṣābhāve 'pi pūrvāparāvasthāparāmarśātmano vikalpasya bhāvādanindriyajayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
analyzed: na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāve pi pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśa ātmanaḥ vikalpasya bhāvāt anindriya jaya tvam iti sāṃpratam

original: tathā satyavikalpakamapi kāmāturasya kāminīṃ bhāvayataḥ tadviṣayamindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi dṛṣṭamiti nīlādyanubhāvātmāno 'pi avikalpakā  #
analyzed: tathā sati avikalpakam api kāma āturasya kāminīm bhāvayataḥ tad viṣayam indriya artha sannikarṣam vinā api dṛṣṭam iti nīla ādi anubhāva ātmānaḥ avikalpakāḥ
an indriya jāḥ prasajyeran

original: yadi tu nīlādyanubhavānāṃ kāminyanubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣaṃ brūyāta,
analyzed: yadi tu nīla ādi anubhavānām kāminī anubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣam brūyāta

original: tadā asmākamapi anindriyajebhyo vikalpebhya utprekṣāvyāpārebhyo 'stīndriyajānāṃ darśanavyāpārāṇāṃ bhedaḥ /
analyzed: tadā asmākam api an indriya jebhyaḥ vikalpebhyaḥ utprekṣā vyāpārebhyaḥ sti indriya jānām darśana vyāpārāṇām bhedaḥ

original: na ca vikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpakopādhiriti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca vikalpa gataḥ darśana vyāpāraḥ nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpaka upādhiḥ iti yuktam

original: sarvā eva hīndriyajā buddhayo vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyo 'mahamikayā parasparānapekṣā ekamarthamavagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva hi indriya jāḥ buddhayaḥ vikalpikāḥ avikalpikāḥ vā dhārā vāhinyaḥ mahamikayā paraspara anapekṣāḥ ekam artham avagāhamānāḥ udayante vyayante ca
na tu amūṣām anyonyam anugamya anugantṛ tām īkṣāmahe

original: tasmāt indriyārthasannikarṣalabdhajanmāno vikalpā darśanavyāpārā nānya iti yuktamutpaśyamaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa labdha janmānaḥ vikalpāḥ darśana vyāpārāḥ na anye iti yuktam utpaśyamaḥ

original: na ca śabdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve satyapi pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca śabda pratyakṣayoḥ vastu gocara tve sati api pratyaya abhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedena pārokṣya apārokṣya bheda upapatteḥ
na ca vahina saṃyoga janmā śīta apanodaḥ vahina jñānāt
bhavitum arhati

original: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭatadgrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eka upādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhi antara viśiṣṭa tad graha prasaṅgaḥ
svabhāvaḥ hi dravyasya upādhibhiḥ viśiṣyate

original: na tūpādhayo va tairviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu upādhayaḥ taiḥ viśiṣṭa tvam vā tasya svabhāvaḥ

original: na ca yat svabhāvasaṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca yat svabhāva saṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ
tathā satya saṃbandhi tvam eva
na hi tat eva tena saṃbadhyate

original: api ca rūpajñānaṃ viṣayagrahaṇadharma nānāparamāṇuviṣayaṃ na paramāṇusvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: api ca rūpa jñānam viṣaya grahaṇa dharma nānā paramāṇu viṣayam na paramāṇu svabhāvaḥ

original: tatsvabhāvatve vā teṣāṃ sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaireva te paramāṇavo viditāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: tad svabhāva tve vā teṣām sarvān prati aviśeṣāt sarvaiḥ eva te paramāṇavaḥ viditāḥ syuḥ

original: na cāsaṃbaddhā eva svajñānena rūpaparamāṇavo viṣayāstasyeti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca asaṃbaddhāḥ eva sva jñānena rūpa paramāṇavaḥ viṣayāḥ tasya iti vācyam
asaṃbaddhasya viṣaya tve tiprasaṅgāt

original: svabhāva evārthajñānabhedayoḥ saṃbandho yadartho viṣayo jñānaṃ ca viṣayīti cet?
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ evā artha jñāna bhedayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ yad arthaḥ viṣayaḥ jñānam ca viṣayi iti ced

original: hantopādhyupādhimatorapi svabhāva eva saṃbandho 'stu tathāpi vijñānārthavanna svarūpābhedaḥ /
analyzed: hanta upādhi upādhimatoḥ api svabhāvaḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ u stu tathā api vijñāna artha vat na svarūpa abhedaḥ
kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāma nirākaraṇe tu svabhāva atiriktam saṃbandham upapādayiṣyāmaḥ
tasmāt na eka upādhi anvita grahaṇe sakala upādhi anvita pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ
yat ca eka vijñāna gocarayoḥ na viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ iti
tatra brūmaḥ
bhinna jñāna gocara tve na asau
na hi viśeṣaṇa jñānam viśeṣya aviṣayam viśeṣyam avacchettum arhati
evam viśeṣya jñānam api viśeṣaṇa aviṣayam kena sva viṣayam avacchindyāt
tayoḥ paraspara vārttā anabhijña tvāt
tābhyām vāsanā
tatas mānasa pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ākaraḥ utpadyate

original: na tvasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vāstava iti cet?
analyzed: na tu asti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vāstavaḥ iti ced
astu tāvat vāstava avāstava cintā
kariṣyate hi iyam upariṣṭāt
yaḥ tu bhavatām asya mānasa tve prayāsaḥ
sa varam indriya ja tve eva bhavatu

original: tathā sati darśanavyāpāratvamasya sākṣāt samarthitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā sati darśana vyāpāra tvam asya sākṣāt samarthitam bhavati
itarathā hi nirvikalpaka upadhānam kalpyeta
nanu avicārakam indriya jñānam katham viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ādi sakalam saṃkalayet

original: hanta bhoḥ kiṃ mānasamapi jñānaṃ saṃkalayitumarhati?
analyzed: hanta bhoḥ kim mānasam api jñānam saṃkalayitum arhati
saṃkalayati manasaḥ tad kāraṇasya sarva viṣaya tvāt iti ced
yadi pūrvakam vijñānam manaḥ
katham tasya sarva viṣaya tā

original: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayamapi acetanatayā na vicārakam /
analyzed: asmākam tu manaḥ sarva viṣayam api acetana tayā na vicārakam

original: tasmādātmaiva sakalajñānatajjanitavāsanādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca /
analyzed: tasmāt ātmā eva sakala jñāna tad janita vāsanā ādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca
yathā āha

original: ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate /
analyzed: ātmani eva sthitam jñānam sa hi boddhā atra gamyate

original: smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate //
analyzed: smaraṇe ca asya sāmarthyam sandhāna ādau ca vidyate

original: ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 122 sa salvindriyārthasannikarṣādālocya jātimantaṃ saṃmugdhamartham udbuddhasaṃskārasamupajātapūrvapiṇḍānusmṛtisahāyaḥ  #
analyzed: vā pratyakṣa sa salu indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocya jātimantam saṃmugdham artham udbuddha saṃskāra samupajāta pūrva piṇḍa anusmṛti sahāyaḥ
prāk eva cakṣuṣā vikalpayati
gauḥ ayam iti
yathā āha

original: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddheḥ kartā cātma sacetanaḥ /
analyzed: karaṇam ca indriyam buddheḥ kartā ca ātma sa cetanaḥ
sa ca smṛti samartha tvāt sarva arthān kalpayiṣyati
tena eka vijñāna vedya tve yadi api jñāpya jñāpaka bhāva rūpaḥ upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ na asti
tathā api
tad artha ālocanā anugata smaraṇayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi vijñānam pratyutpādaka tvam eva upakāraka tvam asti

original: arthau hi rūparūpibhāvena sthitāvapi nāpātajanmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau,
analyzed: arthau hi rūpa rūpi bhāvena sthitau api na āpāta janmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau
api tu svarūpa mātreṇa
na hi yāvat asti tāvat grahītavyam
tena tad eka deśa grahe pi nā apramāṇa tā

original: savikalpakaṃ tūktasāmagrījanma jātyādirūpatayā dravyaṃ ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścājjāyamānamapīndriyārthasannikarṣaprabhavatayā pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeva
analyzed: sa vikalpakam tu ukta sāmagrī janma jāti ādi rūpatayā dravyam ca rūpi tayā kalpayat paścāt jāyamānam api indriya artha sannikarṣa prabhava tayā pratyakṣam bhavati eva
akramasya api ca kramavat sahakāri bheda samavadhāna vaśāt krameṇa kārya karaṇam upapādayiṣyate

original: tat siddhametad vivādādhyāsitā vikalpāḥ svagocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāritve sati indriyārthasannikarṣajatvāt /
analyzed: tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ sva gocare pratyakṣāḥ avyabhicāri tve sati indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvāt

original: yo ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣo yathālocanam,
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣaḥ yathālocanam
tathā ca etat
tasmāt tathā iti
tasmāt sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha artham vyavasāya ātmaka padam iti siddham
tat asya sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthasya anvācīyamānaḥ vyavacchedaḥ
tad vyavacchedya pratipādana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣya anvācīyamānam eva vyavasāya ātmaka padasya artham āha dūrāt cakṣuṣā iti
na ca etat mantavyam iti bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuḥ codayati na saṃśayasya iti

original: nanu satīndriyārthasannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamanindriyajamityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: nanu sati indriya artha sannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūmaḥ iti vā reṇuḥ iti vā jñānam utpadyamānam katham anindriya jam iti atas āha na hi iti
kasmāt mānasaḥ iti atas āha saṃśītiḥ iti

original: saṃpūrvo hi śīḍ bhāvapratyayānto viśeṣāpekṣe vimarśe vartate sa caikādhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mitho viruddhau dharmāvāropayan anyatarannāvadhārayati
analyzed: sam pūrvaḥ hi bhāva pratyaya antaḥ viśeṣa apekṣe vimarśe vartate sa ca eka adhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mithas viruddhau dharmau āropayan anyatarat na avadhārayati
tathā ca adhikaraṇa mātra samarpaṇam indriya ja vyāpāraḥ
manasā tu smaraṇa sahakāriṇā eva puruṣaḥ saṃśete

original: ata eva visphāritākṣāḥ saudāminīsaṃpātāt sakṛdālocya kañcit samānadharmavantaṃ dharmiṇaṃ samandhakāre sandigdhe,
analyzed: atas eva visphārita akṣāḥ saudāminī saṃpātāt sakṛt ālocya kañcid samāna dharmavantam dharmiṇam samandhakāre sandigdhe

original: tasmānmānasa evaiṣa saṃśayo na tvindriyaja ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt mānasaḥ eva eṣa saṃśayaḥ na tu indriya jaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tadetat pariharan na caitadityādi bhāṣyaṃ vcācaṣṭe---tacca naivam /
analyzed: tat etat pariharan na ca etat ityādi bhāṣyam ācaṣṭa itat ca na evam
kasmāt saṃśayasya iti ubhayam tu iti
tu śabdaḥ manaḥ mātra nimitta tvam vyavacchinatti
tat anena cakṣuṣā hi ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
paśyan samāna dharmāṇam dharmiṇam na avadhārayati
viśeṣataḥ sandigdhe tasmin iti arthaḥ

original: indriyeṇopalabdhaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ sannikarṣapūrvakatvāduparladheḥ manasopalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥsahāyenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: indriyeṇa upalabdham sannikṛṣṭam sannikarṣa pūrvaka tvāt uparladheḥ manasā upalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥ sahāyena iti arthaḥ

original: atra bhāṣyaṃ yacca tadindrayānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣapekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: atra bhāṣyam yat ca tat indrayāna avadhāraṇa pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam tad viśeṣa apekṣam vimarśa mātram saṃśayaḥ
na parvam iti
anavadhāraṇa śabdaḥ yam saṃśaya jñāna vācakaḥ sva kāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣe prayuktaḥ upacāreṇa
uparata indriya vyāpārasya hi saṃśaya jñāna darśanāt
sati api indriya vyāpāre saṃśayaḥ na indriya jaḥ iti codakaḥ bhimanyate
tat anayoḥ saṃśaya jñānayoḥ madhye yat tat indriya avadhāraṇa pūrvakam indriya artha sannikarṣa pūrvakam manasā anavadharaṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ
na pūrvam

original: yaduparatendriyavyāpārasya saṃśayajñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā hṛdi sthitaṃ śaṅkiturityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat uparata indriya vyāpārasya saṃśaya jñānam dṛṣṭānta tayā hṛdi sthitam śaṅkituḥ iti arthaḥ
tat etat bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe tatra yat indriya artha iti
indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ ca asau anavadhāraṇam ca iti karmadhārayaḥ
tad pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu smaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramasya kāraṇaṃ nendriyamityata āha--tasya hīti /
analyzed: nanu smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram asya kāraṇam na indriyam iti atas āha tasya hi iti

original: upapāditametadadhastāt yathā smaraṇaṃ nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadhatta iti /
analyzed: upapāditam etat adhastāt yathā smaraṇam na indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatte iti
pūrvam tu iti
dṛṣṭa anta tayā pūrva tvam

original: syādetat, mana evendriyānapekṣaṃ bāhye pravartate ityabhyupeyam,

original: anyathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaṃ nirnimittaṃ syāt /

na api anumāna ādiṣu antarbhavati
liṅga ādi abhāvāt

original: yadi ca ghaṭādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena,

jānāmi iti eva syāt

original: tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayo mānasa ityāśaṅkyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca sarvaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ mānasaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha bhāṣyakāraḥ
sarvatra ca pratyakṣa viṣaye iti
yadi api ayam īdṛśaḥ mānasaḥ tathā api andha badhira ādīnām abhāvāt tat pūrvam vyavasāya utpattau cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaṇīyam
anyathā andha badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tathā ca saṃśayajñānotpāde apīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃśaya jñāna utpāde api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ upekṣaṇīyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tat idam tasya hi ityādinā vārttikena vyākhyātam
avyāpaka tvena lakṣaṇa ākṣepa param bhāṣyam ātma ādiṣu iti āti
tat vyācaṣṭe indriya artha iti
codayati katham punar iti
pariharati indriya iti
mā bhūt indriya sūtre pāṭhaḥ
tat hi bāhya indriya lakṣaṇam

original: āntaraṃ ca mana ityata āha--pṛthak ceti /
analyzed: āntaram ca manaḥ iti atas āha pṛthak ca iti
na ca sukha ādau pramāṇa antaram asti
tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt saddhim pratyakṣa tvam iti āha pratyakṣāḥ ca iti
nanu nā ete prameyāḥ sva saṃvedana siddha tvāt

original: tat kimatra prameyārthena pramāṇena ityata āha---na ca teṣāmiti nanūktaṃ svasaṃvedanatayā na pramākarmabhāva eṣāmityata āha--na cānyā gatiriti
analyzed: tat kim atra prameya arthena pramāṇena iti atas āha na ca teṣām iti nanu uktam sva saṃvedana tayā na pramā karma bhāvaḥ eṣām iti atas āha na ca anyā gatiḥ iti
saṃvedana tvena hi teṣām sva saṃvedana tā
na ca ete saṃvedanam iti uktam adhastāt iti bhāvaḥ
ākṣepan upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
bhāṣye ca ātma ādiṣu sukha ādiṣu iti nitya anitya abhiprāyam varga dvayam
ātma sukha duḥkha tva ādayaḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ ca sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ iti
tat idam uktam dignāgena

original: na sukhādi prameyaṃ vā mano vāstvindriyāntaram /

na ca tat saṃbhavati
ghrāṇa ādi sūtreṇa vibhāga pareṇa niṣedhāt iti bhāvaḥ

tat vyācikhyāsuḥ gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ ca evam iti
ākṣeptuḥ uttaram indriya artha iti
samādhātā āha na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
ākṣeptuḥ anuśaya bījam udghāṭya dūṣayati yat tu sūtre iti
na idam vibhāga param ghrāṇa ādi sūtram
api tu lakṣaṇa param
tatra ca indriyam api manaḥ na lakṣitam
vaidharmyāt iti arthaḥ
vaidharmyam āha vaidharmyam iti
tatra pramāṇayati sarva viṣayam tu iti
vaidharmya antaram dūṣayati bhautika iti
kāryasya hi viśeṣau bhautika tva abhautika tve
bhūta kāryam bhautikam
yat bhūta kāryam na bhavati tat abhautikam
bhūta kārya tva pratiṣedhaḥ ca tad anya kārya tvam gamayati
viśeṣa niṣedhasya viśeṣa antara abhyanujñāna hetu tvāt
itarathā tu akāryam eva ucyeta
na tu abhautikam iti
tasmāt akāryasya manasaḥ bhautika tvam kārya dharmaḥ viruddham iti arthaḥ

original: api ca vaidharmyāt manovat śrotramapi na vaktavyamityāha--śrotre ceti /
analyzed: api ca vaidharmyāt manaḥ vat śrotram api na vaktavyam iti āha śrotre ca iti
śaṅkate svārthaḥ iti
bhūtāni hi ghrāṇa ādīni śrotra antāni
manaḥ tu na bhūtam iti vaidharmyam iti arthaḥ

original: darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāro yathā svārthiko na kaśrcidapi pratyaya ityarthaḥ /

ākṣepa hetum anubhāṣata iyat purar iti
dūṣayati na na asti iti

original: tadadena sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /

original: yaccāparaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ghrāṇādibhyo manasa uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tadapi siṃhāvalokanena dūṣayati---saguṇānāmiti /

original: ghrāṇādīni yathā svasvaguṇena gandhādinā bāhyaṃ gandhādi bodhayanti ,

original: bhūtatvābhūtatvalakṣaṇaṃ vaidharmyaṃ na bhautikatvābhautikatvagrahaṇena śakyaṃ vaktumityavadhāraṇābhiprāyaḥ /

original: tadevaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ samarthya vāsubandhavaṃ tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati--apare punariti /

original: tataśca yatra tu dṛṣṭamātra eva vahnerūparamāduparato dhūmaḥ tatrānyataśrca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmādasati vyapadeśake vahnau /

original: na hi jñānavyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati /

tatas iti sarvanāmnaḥ sannihīta viśeṣya apekṣa tvāt

original: anyathā abhidhānāparyavasānād yasya tad vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśasaṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eveti sidhyatyeva viśeṣaṇatvam /
analyzed: anyathā abhidhāna aparyavasānāt yasya tat vyapadiṣyate iti vyapadeśa saṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyate eva iti sidhyati eva viśeṣaṇa tvam
abhyupetya tvad avadhāraṇa mātre pi adoṣaḥ iti manyamānena ap bhakṣaḥ iti udāhṛtam
anya vyavacchede api hi tat eva anyat vyavacchidyeta yat virodhi
na punar anya mātram
yathā āhuḥ
niyamaḥ tad virodhāt ca kalpate na avirodhinaḥ
iti
syat etat
tatas iti ucyamāne yatas tatas syāt

original: tathā cānumānādyapi liṅgajñānādestata upajāyate iti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeteti tannivṛttyarthamarthāditi vaktavyam /
analyzed: tathā ca anumāna ādi api liṅga jñāna ādeḥ tatas upajāyate iti pratyakṣam prasajyeta iti tad nivṛtti artham arthāt iti vaktavyam
na hi tad arthāt jāyate
api tu pratyakṣam eva
iti atas āha

original: yasya tad vyapadiśyate ityapekṣya tataḥśabdasāmarthyenānumānādivyudāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tat vyapadiśyate iti apekṣya tatas śabda sāmarthyena anumāna ādi vyudāsaḥ pratyuktaḥ
yat ca tatas śabdasya vyāvartya antaram uktam
tat api dūṣayati yat punar etat iti
yadi yasya vyāpadiśyate jñānam

original: tat pratyakṣaṃ tato ghaṭa ityapi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeta,
analyzed: tat pratyakṣam tatas ghaṭaḥ iti api jñānam pratyakṣam prasajyeta
tat api hi ghaṭasya vyapadiśyate
na tu tatas ghaṭāt bhavati

original: tasya vicārāsahatayā paramārthasattvābhāvena saṃvṛtisato vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
analyzed: tasya vicāra asaha tayā paramārtha sattva abhāvena saṃvṛti sataḥ vijñānam prati kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt
tena tad nirākaraṇāya tatas iti uktam
tat etat na budhyāmahe katham apakṣiptam iti
śaṅkate yadi iti

original: rūpādiparamāṇava eva nirantarotpādāḥ paramārthasanto bhinnāḥ svavijñānasyāvikalpakasya janakāḥ /
analyzed: rūpa ādi paramāṇavaḥ eva nirantara utpādāḥ paramārtha santaḥ bhinnāḥ sva vijñānasya avikalpakasya janakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu nānātvaṃ svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tāneva rūpādīn ekodakāharaṇādikriyākāriṇo bhedina  #
analyzed: teṣām tu nānātvam svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpaka pṛṣṭha bhāvinī ghaṭaḥ iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tān eva rūpa ādīn eka udaka āharaṇa ādi kriyā kāriṇaḥ bhedinaḥ
iva darśayantī saṃvṛtiḥ iti ucyate
nirākaroti na hi rūpa ādibhyaḥ iti
anuśaya bījam udghāṭayati atha api iti

original: nirākaroti--manomodaketi bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kimetāvatāpītyata āha--sarvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: nirākaroti manomodaka iti bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kim etāvatā api iti atas āha sarvam ca iti

original: yatsaṃvṛtitvena bhavatāmabhimataṃ yaccāvikalpakaṃ tatsarvaṃ svaviṣayād bhavati /
analyzed: yat saṃvṛti tvena bhavatām abhimatam yat ca avikalpakam tat sarvam sva viṣayāt bhavati
tasmāt tatograhaṇam saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham anarthakam
mā bhūt saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham

original: mithyājñānanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati---nanu ca mithyājñānamatasmādapi bhavati /
analyzed: mithyājñāna nivṛtti artham bhaviṣyati iti codayati nanu ca mithyājñānam atasmāt api bhavati

original: yathā purovarti dravyamidamiti vyapadiśyate rajatamiti na,
analyzed: yathā purovarti dravyam idam iti vyapadiśyate rajatam iti na
na tu śuktiḥ iti

original: tena yadyapi sāmānyarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam,
analyzed: tena yadi api sāmānya rūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam
tatas ca tabhdavati

original: tathāpi yena viśeṣaṇarūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatastabhdavati iti atasmādapītyuktam /
analyzed: tathā api yena viśeṣaṇa rūpeṇa tasya iti

original: tasmāt tata eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam,
analyzed: tasmāt tatas eva tat pratyakṣam
na ca evam mithyājñānam
tat hi bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: pariharati--na hyatasmāt āropitādrūpāt tatrāsataḥ tat mithyajñānaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: pariharati na hi a tasmāt āropitāt rūpāt tatra asataḥ tat mithyajñānam bhavati
kim tu tatas bhavati

original: yasya sāmānyarūpasya vyapadiśyata idamiti tata eva /
analyzed: yasya sāmānya rūpasya vyapadiśyate idam iti tatas eva
samāropitam tu tajatamasya viṣayaḥ dṛśyamāna ākāra tayā
tat idam uktam a tasmin tat bhavati iti
evam ca lakṣya pada mātra avaśeṣāt lakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ iti āha tatas grahaṇam iti
tathā ca ativyāptiḥ iti āha tathā ca iti
abhyupetya atas dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadi api etat iti

original: yato bhavati jñānaṃ sa grāhyo 'rthaḥ kāraṇam,
analyzed: yatas bhavati jñānam sa grāhyaḥ rthaḥ kāraṇam
grāhakam ca vijñānam kāryam

original: tayorayugapabhdāvāt vartamānābhaṃ jñānamatīte mithyeti na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ ayugapad bhdāvāt vartamāna ābham jñānam atīte mithyā iti na pratyakṣam syāt
tad samāna kālayoḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt
tatas rthāt iti na asti iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate na āśā utpādau iti

original: kṣaṇikatvād bhāvānāṃ kāraṇasaya nāśaḥ kāryasyotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ,
analyzed: kṣaṇika tvāt bhāvānām nāśaḥ kāryasya utpādaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tathā api kāraṇasya grāhya tā bhinna kālasya api
sva sadṛśa jñāna janakam eva tasya grāhya tvam
na anyat yathā āha

original: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhya tām viduḥ
hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam
pra vai iti
na ca etāvatā mithyātvam
artha āhitasya nīla ākārasya vartamāna tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
nirākaroti tat ca na iti
pūrva apara kāla kalā vikala lakṣaṇā kṣaṇikatā na kvacid api
vidyut jāla ādeḥ api āśu vināśinaḥ dvitra ādi kṣaṇa avasthānāt iti arthaḥ
pūrva uktaḥ ca anuyogaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva iti āha vinaṣṭaḥ ca iti
an ahaṅkāra āspadam asāta ādi rūpam vijñānāt bhinnam nīla ādi anubhūyate
na tu vijñāna ātmakam
tathā ca yadi viccheda grahaḥ mithyā

original: tathā sati jñānametasmin mithyeti kathaṃ pratyakṣam,
analyzed: tathā sati jñānam etasmin mithyā iti katham pratyakṣam
samyak jñāna bhedasya tathā bhāvāt
na ca arthāḥ hita ākāra vedanam artha vedanam
bhākta tva prasaṅgāt

original: na ca gauṇamukhyalakṣaṇā girāṃ gatayo jñāneṣuśakyā niyojayitum bhinnaprasthānatvāt /
analyzed: na ca gauṇa mukhya lakṣaṇāḥ girām gatayaḥ jñāneṣu śakyāḥ niyojayitum bhinna prasthāna tvāt

original: tasmāt nirākāraṃ jñānamātmano bhinnaṃ gocarayatīti vācyam /
analyzed: tasmāt nirākāram jñānam ātmanaḥ bhinnam gocarayati iti vācyam

original: sa cet kāraṇaṃ vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣateti tathā ca vartamānābhamavartamānaṃ gocarayati mithyātvamapratyakṣatvaṃ ca syāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sa ced kāraṇam vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣa tā iti tathā ca vartamāna ābham avartamānam gocarayati mithyātvam apratyakṣa tvam ca syāt iti bhāvaḥ
yaugapadye pi na asti udāharaṇam
sarvasya kṣaṇika tva pakṣa nikṣepāt iti codayati tulyam iti ced
nirākaroti tat ca iti
saṃprati dignāgasya lakṣaṇam upanyasyati aparaḥ iti
dūṣayitum kalpanā svarūpam pṛcchati atha kā iyam iti

original: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭo 'rtha ucyate ḍittha iti /

jāti śabdeṣu jātyāḥ gauḥ ayam iti
guṇa śabdeṣu guṇena śuklaḥ iti
kriyā śabdeṣu kriyayā pācakaḥ iti

original: seyaṃ kalpanā yatra jñāne nāstyarthataḥ svarūpato vā tatkalpanayā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: sā iyam kalpanā yatra jñāne na asti arthataḥ svarūpataḥ vā tat kalpanayā apoḍham pratyakṣam

original: tadidamāha--yat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataśrca na jātyādibhirvyapadiśyate /
analyzed: tat idam āhayat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataḥ ca na jāti ādibhiḥ vyapadiśyate
avyabhicārāya viṣaya kāraṇa tvam āha viṣaya svarūpa anuvidhāyi iti
jñāna tām asya darśayati ātma saṃvedya sva saṃvedanāt eva tasya kalpanā rahita tvam api

pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣena eva sidhyati
iti
tat pratyakṣam iti

atha na iti
vikalpa yonayaḥ hi śabdāḥ tad gocaram abhiniviśanate
yat vikalpāḥ gṛhṇānti
yat ca adhyavasyati tat ubhayam api anya vyāvṛtti rūpam avastu

original: tasmānna avikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadgocaraṃ vā paramārthasad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāścetyayamabhisandhiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na avikalpakam jñānam tad gocaram vā paramārtha sad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāḥ ca iti ayam abhisandhiḥ
api ca asya avācya tve bhavat abhyupagata prāmāṇya āgama virodhaḥ iti āha anitya ādi iti
śaṅkate atha iti
svam asādharaṇam rūpam vyāvṛttam iti yāvat
