original: na hi yathā samyagjñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yenādhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanāpoḍhamiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: na hi yathā samyak jñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇam kṛtam kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yena adhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanā apoḍham iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadi svarūpato nābhidhīyetānabhidheyaṃ tarhi vastu prasajyeta /
analyzed: nanu yadi svarūpataḥ na abhidhīyeta anabhidheyam tarhi vastu prasajyeta

original: tathā cāvāstavaḥ syāt śābdo vyavahāra ityata āha--sarvasya ceti /
analyzed: tathā ca avāstavaḥ syāt śābdaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti atas āha sarvasya ca iti
tatra tadvat vastu adhikṛtya uktam dvau ākārau iti
sāmānyena eva ākāreṇa abhidhīyate sāmānya anvitam iti arthaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ iti
manuṣya tva jātimān iti arthaḥ
viśeṣam ākāram abhipretya svarūpataḥ na vyapadeśyam iti uktam
na tu sarvathā iti bhāvaḥ
prakṛte yojayati evam iti
āśaṅkya pūrva uktam atiprasaṅgam samārayati yadi ca iti

original: athāścakarṇādivadavyutpannaḥ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate--atheti /
analyzed: atha aścakarṇa ādi vat avyutpannaḥ kalpanā apoḍha śabdaḥ pratyakṣa svarūpasya vācakaḥ iti śaṅkate atha iti
nirākaroti evam api iti

original: bhavatu kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ avyutpanno mā vā bhūt,
analyzed: bhavatu kalpanā apoḍha śabdaḥ avyutpannaḥ mā vā bhūt
avācyam tu pratyakṣam eṣitavyam
anyathā vikalpasya pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt
tathā ca vyāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ
jaimini pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam dūṣayati sat saṃprayogaḥ iti
yathāśrutasya ativyāptiḥ saṃśabdena api prayogasya samīcīna tā pratipādyate
sā ca mithyāpratyaye tulyā
vyatyaye pi buddhyā boddhasya upasthāpanāt
tat iti bodhyam parāmṛśati

original: asti ca mithyājñāne 'pi bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
analyzed: asti ca mithyā jñāne bodhyena saṃbandhaḥ indriyāṇām
bodhyam hi purovarti dravyam

original: atha yathā bodhyaṃ tādṛśo nāsti saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
analyzed: atha yathā bodhyam tādṛśaḥ nā asti saṃbandhaḥ indriyāṇām
rajata tvasya prakārasya asannidhānāt
hanta avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ
pratyabhijñāyām tad tā prakārasya
indriyeṇa asaṃbandhāt

original: api ca prābhākare darśane anumānādijñānamātmani pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet,
analyzed: api ca prābhākare darśane anumāna ādi jñānam ātmani pratyakṣam na bhavet
na hi tat sat saṃprayoga jam
tasmāt etat api paribhāvanīyam sūribhiḥ iti
vārṣagaṇyasya api lakṣaṇam ayuktam iti āha śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ iti
pañcānām khalu indriyāṇām artha ākāreṇa pariṇatānām ālocana mātram vṛttiḥ iṣyate
sā ca saṃśaya ādi vyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam iti
tat siddham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti etat eva lakṣaṇam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam samāptam

original: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
analyzed: atha tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca
pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa anantaram anumāna lakṣaṇa param sūtram paṭhati atha tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti

original: atrānumānamiti sidvavat pramāṇāviśeṣarūpalakṣyānuvāda eva nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityaprāmāṇyamanumānasya sudūdaṃ pratikṣipati /
analyzed: atra anumānam iti sidva vat pramāṇa aviśeṣa rūpa lakṣya anuvādaḥ eva na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti aprāmāṇyam anumānasya sudūdam pratikṣipati

original: dṛṣṭaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavijñānavyaktisādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā vidadhīta /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya vijñāna vyakti sādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnām prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā vidadhīta

original: dṛṣṭasādharmyaṃ cānumānam eveti kathaṃ tenaiva tasyāprāmāṇyam?
analyzed: dṛṣṭa sādharmyam ca anumānam eva iti katham tena eva tasya aprāmāṇyam

original: api cānumānamapramāṇamiti vākyaprayogo 'jñaṃ vipratipannaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā puruṣaṃ pratyarthaṃvān /
analyzed: api ca anumānam apramāṇam iti vākya prayogaḥ jñam vipratipannam sandigdham vā puruṣam prati arthaṃvān

original: na ca parapuruṣavartino dehadharmā api sandehājñānaviparyāsā gauratvādivat pratyakṣamīkṣante /
analyzed: na ca para puruṣa vartinaḥ deha dharmāḥ api sandeha ajñāna viparyāsāḥ gaura tva ādi vat pratyakṣam īkṣante
na ca tad va vacanāt prattīyante
vacanasya api pratyakṣāt anyasya aprāmāṇya upagamāt
puruṣa viśeṣam an adhikṛtya tu vacanam anarthaṅkam prayu

original: jāno nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadanavadheyavacanaḥ syāt /
analyzed: jāno na ayam laukikaḥ na parīkṣakaḥ iti unmatta vat anavadheya vacanaḥ syāt
pariśiṣṭam tu parīkṣā parvaṇi nivedayiṣyate
tasmāt akāmena api pramāṇam anumānam upetavyam iti
lakṣyam pramāṇa bhedam anumānam anūdya tad pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam vidhatte
atha iti ānantarye uktam pratyakṣam anumānasya hetuḥ
atha idānīm anumānam hetumat vyutpādyate iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇa sūtra tātparyam āha anumāna iti
tat eva sphuṭayati anena iti
samāna jātīyāni pramāṇa tayā pratyakṣa ādīni
asamāna jātīyāni ca anumāna ābhāsa ādīni
yathā kṣaṇika tva ādiṣu sādhyeṣu sattva ādīni
syāt etat ati vyāpakam etat tad pūrvakatvam
tat iti hi pratyakṣam parāmṛśati ānantaryāt
tathā ca pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam anumānasya iva āgama smṛti saṃśaya viparyāsānām api asti iti tāni api anumānam prasajyeran

original: anumānādipūrvakaṃ cānumānaṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakamiti nānumānaṃ syāt,
analyzed: anumāna ādi pūrvakam ca anumānam na pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti na anumānam syāt
anumāna lakṣaṇena avyāta tvāt
tasmāt avyāpti ativyāptibhyām alakṣaṇam etat iti atas āha tad pūrvakam iti
tad pūrvakam iti āvṛtyā vigraha traya pradarśanam

original: tatra prathame vigrahe tānītyanantaraṃ sūtram uvallaṅghya vibhāgasūtragatāḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogyatvāt /
analyzed: tatra prathame vigrahe tāni iti anantaram sūtram vibhāga sūtra gatāḥ pratyakṣa ādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogya tvāt
yathā āhuḥ
yasya yena artha saṃbandhaḥ dūra sthasya api tasya saḥ
iti tat anena lakṣaṇasya avyāptiḥ parihṛtā
tat idam āha yadā tāni iti
nanu edam pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti bhāṣya virodhaḥ iti atas āha pāramparyeṇa iti
pāramparyeṇa hi pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam uktam bhāṣyakṛtā
tasmāt na virodhaḥ iti
ativyāpti nirāsāya dvitīyam vigraham vivṛṇoti yadā api iti

original: te iti vigrahe anantarasūtragatameva pratyakṣapadaṃ saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: te iti vigrahe anantara sūtra gatam eva pratyakṣa padam saṃbadhyate

original: yathā ca dve pratyakṣe pūrve yasya pratyakṣasya liṅgaparāmarśajñānasya pratyakṣaphalasya /

analyzed: tena tad avayava dvaidhībhāva mukhena vṛkṣa viṣayām api dvaidhībhāva kriyām janayati iti na vaiyadhikaraṇyam karaṇa phalayoḥ
evam yadi api liṅga viṣayam pratyakṣa phala tayā liṅga jñānam
tad anubaddhasya tasya mānasa pratyakṣa gocara tvāt
liṅga nirūpaṇam antareṇa tad anirūpaṇāt

original: na tu liṅgajñānaṃ liṅginaṃ vinā na nirūpyate /
analyzed: na tu liṅga jñānam liṅginam vinā na nirūpyate

original: tasmāt pratipattayanubandhitayā viṣayo na liṅgajñānasya liṅgī,
analyzed: tasmāt pratipattaya nubandhi tayā viṣayaḥ na liṅga jñānasya liṅgī

na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ
svābhāvika saṃbandha śāli tvāt liṅ sya liṅgini

pratipādya tayā ca

uttaraḥ tu prāmāṇyasya iti vivekaḥ

original: sthitau tu bhedo darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ceti /
analyzed: sthitau tu bhedaḥ darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ca iti

original: tadevaṃ tāni te iti vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādya tāni taditi vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādayati---yadā punariti /
analyzed: tat evam tāni te iti vigraha dvayam paraspara apekṣam upapādya tāni tat iti vigraha dvayam paraspara apekṣam upapādayati yadā punar iti

original: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanaṃ ca anantaraliṅgadarśanaṃ ca tatsmṛtiśceti vigrahaḥ /

atra api sarva sandeheṣu idam upatiṣṭhate
vyākhyānataḥ viśaiṣa pratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadi pramāṇaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ tarhi parāmarśajñānaviṣayīkṛta evārtho viṣayīkartavyo nānyaḥ /

original: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇaviṣaya eveti kṛtamanumānenetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
analyzed: sa ca pratyakṣa pramāṇa viṣayaḥ eva iti kṛtam anumānena iti āśayavān pṛcchati kim punar iti
taiḥ viśiṣṭena liṅga parāmarśena iti arthaḥ
uttaram śeṣaḥ rthaḥ

original: pratyakṣapramitāt liṅgādanyo liṅgī tadviṣayatvaṃ ca liṅgaparāmarśasyoktamiti /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pramitāt liṅgāt anyaḥ liṅgī tad viṣaya tvam ca liṅga parāmarśasya uktam iti
pṛcchati anumānam iti atra kim kārakam
anumīyate nena iti karaṇa kārakam eva yuktam

original: na tvanumitiranumānaṃ pramāṇavyāpāratvenātannimittatvāt karaṇakārakādanyatvād atatpūrvakatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu anumitiḥ anumānam pramāṇa vyāpāra tvena a tad nimitta tvāt karaṇa kārakāt anya tvāt a tad pūrvaka tvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ
uttarambhāvaḥ karaṇam vā
nanu uktam na bhāvaḥ kārakam iti atas āha yadā iti
na dravya ādīnām eva kāraka tvam
api tu vyāpārasya api
anyathā karma nāmadheyeṣu udbhida ādi śabdeṣu na kāraṇa vibhaktiḥ śrūyeta
udbhidā yajeta darśa maurṇamāsābhyām yajeta ityādi

original: saṃbhavati hi tasyāpi siddhasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nimittatvam /
analyzed: saṃbhavati hi tasya api siddhasya phala bhāvanāyām nimitta tvam
evam vahni pramāyāḥ siddhāyāḥ saṃbhavati hāna ādi buddhi nimitta bhāvaḥ

original: etasmiśca kalpe tatpūrvakamityatra tadā hānādisaṃbandhāvadhāraṇasamaye prathamaṃ vahnitvasya liṅgasya darśanam,
analyzed: etasmin ca kalpe tad pūrvakam iti atra tadā hāna ādi saṃbandha avadhāraṇa samaye prathamam vahni tvasya liṅgasya darśanam
atha ānumānikam dvitīyam
atha saṃbandhasya smṛtiḥ iti trayam ekīkṛtya parāmarṣṭavyam

original: tatpūrvako hi tathā cāyamanumīyamāno vahniriti liṅgaparāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: tad pūrvakaḥ hi tathā ca ayam anumīyamānaḥ vahniḥ iti liṅga parāmarśaḥ
tasmāt dāha pāka ādi kāri tvāt upādeyaḥ vahniḥ iti jñānam anumānasya phalam
tatas ca tad pūrvaka tvam api siddham bhavati iti bhāvaḥ
karaṇa kāraka pakṣe phalam āha yadā karaṇam iti
atra vimṛśati liṅga iti
tad pūrvaka tva anumiti nimitta tva samāna dharma darśanāt saṃśayaḥ
atra ācārya deśīya matam āha eke tāvat iti
satsu api itareṣu smṛteḥ abhāvāt anumiteḥ anutpādanena smṛtiḥ eva anumānam
itare tu tad anugrāhakāḥ iti arthaḥ
mata antaram āha apare iti
satsu api itareṣu liṅga parāmarśam vinā anumiti anutpādāt
liṅga parāmarśaḥ eva anumānam itaraiḥ anugṛhītaḥ iti arthaḥ
sva matam āha vayam tu iti
anvaya vyatirekābhyām aśakyaḥ guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ vivektum
tayoḥ sarvatra tulya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tat kimidānīṃ nāstyeva guṇapradhānabhāva ityata āha---pradhāneti /
analyzed: tat kim idānīm na asti eva guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ iti atas āha pradhāna iti

original: nānvayavyatirekāvatra prabhavato na tu nyāyāntaramiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na anvaya vyatirekau atra prabhavataḥ na tu nyāya antaram iti bhāvaḥ
pṛcchati kaḥ punar atra iti
uttaram āha ānantarya iti
na iha asti tirohitam kiñcid
ativyāpti codayati yadi iti
nanu bhavatu pratyakṣa dvaya pūrvakaḥ saṃskāraḥ numānam
tena api śeṣaḥ rthaḥ iti atas āha smṛti hetuḥ na anumiti hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
viśiṣṭa jñānam vijñānam viśaṣaḥ ca smṛteḥ anya tvam
na hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam smṛtiḥ
tasyāḥ saṃskāra mātra prabhava tayā anyasmāt anutpatteḥ
tena ca jñānena sva kāraṇam viśeṣitam
pratyakṣa sūtre yatas iti adhyāhārāt
tasmāt iha api sva kāraṇa viśeṣakam smṛteḥ anyat vijñānam adhikṛtam

original: na ca saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣapūrvo 'pi tādṛśajñānakāraṇamiti na tasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca saṃskāraḥ tādṛśa jñāna kāraṇam iti na tasya prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ
nirṇaye nivārayati nirṇaye iti

original: vibhāgasūtrākṣiptapramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇapūrvakaṃ viśeṣapramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ nānupajanitaphale 'pramāṇe nirṇayamātre pravartitumarhati,

janita phalaḥ tu nirṇayaḥ pramāṇam eva iti bhāvaḥ

svārthikaḥ pratyayaḥ
trividham iti sūtra avayavam artha gaurava ādarāt vārttikakāraḥ udbhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe trividham iti iti
anvaya vyatirekiṇam lakṣayati tatra iti

original: anvayimātrāt vyatirekimātrācca vyāvṛtto 'nvayavyatirekī darśanīya iti hetutrayasādhāraṇe abādhitaviṣayatvātsatpratipakṣatve satī api heturūpe  #

na darśite

pratyakṣa tvāt iti hetuḥ ātmani nitye sti iti atas uktam bāhya karaṇa iti

original: tathā cāyaṃ nityebhya ākāśādibhyo ghaṭādiṣu cānityeṣvanvita iti bhavatyanvayavyatirekī /

original: tena hetoryato vipakṣānnivṛttiḥ sa eva nāstīti kuto nivartatām,

original: yasyābhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi na saṃbhavati nirūpākhyasya tasya bhāvādhikaraṇatvaśaṅketi subhāṣitam /

original: tat kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvau na parasparābhāvātmānau yadekaniṣedhenānyavidhiḥ syāt?

original: satyam, yatraikatara etayorniṣidhyate vidhīyate vā tatra taditaravidharniṣedho vāvaśyaṃ bhavet /

na ca atra nirūpa ākhyaḥ hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ niṣidhyate

original: nanu nirūpākhyo niṣedhādhikaraṇamiti ca vacaḥ svacaritaviruddham /

kaḥ tarhi na nirūpākhye hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ iti asya vacanasya arthaḥ

original: atha nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasya bhavadbhāṣitasya ko 'rthaḥ?

original: ahṛdayavācāṃ khalayahṛdayā eva prativāco bhavanti bhavanti /

original: svābhāvikarūpasaṃpannaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tattvajñānarūphalāya kalpate na kalpitarūpasaṃpadā,

original: tasmādanupākhye vipakṣe hetorvyatirekanivṛttau vā vyatireke vā hetupravṛttau vā sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataivocitā /

na ca etāvatā hetoḥ agamaka tvam
na hi vyatirekaḥ sti iti eva gamakaḥ bhavati
mā bhūt asādhāraṇasya api gamaka tvam

original: vipakṣasaṃbhave tu tatrāpi hetuvṛttiśaṅkānirākaraṇāya vyatirekagrahaṇam upāsanīyamiti sarvamavadātam //

sva mate tu abhidheyaḥ viśeṣaḥ prameya tvāt sāmānya vat

original: paramāṇvākāśādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavadityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ,

original: tamimaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ hetvavayavalakṣaṇavyākhyānāvasare vārttikakṛd upapādayiṣyatīti nehopapāditaḥ /

original: tadevaṃ trividhamityavacchidya vyutpādya saṃprati pūrvavadityādinā ekavākyatayā vyācaṣṭa---atha vā trividhamiti /

udāharaṇam āha audāharaṇam iti

original: tathāpi yādṛśaṃ na vyabhicarati tatra nipuṇena pratipatrā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tathā api yādṛśam na vyabhicarati tatra nipuṇena pratipatrā bhavitavyam

original: anyathā dhūmamātramapi vahnisattāṃ vyabhicaratīti na dhūmaviśeṣo gamako bhavet /
analyzed: anyathā dhūma mātram api vahni sattām vyabhicarati iti na dhūma viśeṣaḥ gamakaḥ bhavet
rasāt rūpa anumāne tu vaināśikānām āpāditam kāraṇāt kārya anumānam asmābhiḥ

original: api cāntyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭo jāyate tatrāpi śakyaṃ kāraṇāt kāryānumānam /
analyzed: api ca antya tantu saṃyoga anantaram paṭaḥ jāyate tatra api śakyam kāraṇāt kārya anumānam

original: yadā khalvayamanyata evodbuddhasaṃskāro vyāptismṛtimān aviraleṣvitareṣu tantuṣu antyatantāvutpannāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyasannikarṣāt prathamameva  #
analyzed: yadā khalu ayam anyatas eva udbuddha saṃskāraḥ vyāpti smṛtimān aviraleṣu itareṣu tantuṣu antya tantau utpannāyām kriyāyām indriya sannikarṣāt prathamam eva
parāmṛśati tathā ca iyam iti
tadā eva kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
atha yadā vibhāgāt pūrva saṃyoga vināśaḥ

original: tadā parāmarśāt tasmādavaśyaṃbhāvipaṭaviśiṣṭeyaṃ kriyetyanumānotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
analyzed: tadā parāmarśāt tasmāt avaśyaṃbhāvi paṭa viśiṣṭā iyam kriyā iti anumāna utpādaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
atha antyasya tantoḥ tantu saṃyogaḥ
atha paṭa utpādaḥ
tatra rūpa ādi utpādaḥ

original: atha pratyakṣadarśanam ityanumānotpādasya parastāccaturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam /
analyzed: atha pratyakṣa darśanam iti anumāna utpādasya parastāt caturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam
yadi tu kriyā utpāda anantaram ālocanam iṣyate

original: tathāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe pratyakṣasya utpāda iti nānavasaramanumānam /
analyzed: tathā api tṛtīye kṣaṇe pratyakṣasya utpādaḥ iti na anavasaram anumānam

original: api ca badhiro murajamukhamabhihatya svapāṇinābhighātādeva śabdakāraṇāt tatkāryaṃ śabdaṃ niḥśaṅkamanumimīte /
analyzed: api ca badhiraḥ muraja mukham abhihatya sva pāṇinā abhighātāt eva śabda kāraṇāt tad kāryam śabdam niḥśaṅkam anumimīte
evam anyāni api kāraṇāt kārya anumānāni
śeṣavat udāharaṇam āha nadyāḥ iti
codayati katham punar iti
pariharati na iti
anumīyate nena iti anumānam nadīpūraḥ

original: na tu vṛṣṭiranumīyamānā pūraviśeṣāt nātītā śakyānumātum,
analyzed: na tu vṛṣṭiḥ anumīyamānā pūra viśeṣāt na atītā śakyā anumātum
anumāna samaye tad atyayasya aśakya niścaya tvāt
nā api vartamānā tad atyayasya api tadānīm saṃbhavāt
evam bhaviṣyanti api sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena sandigdhā eva
tasmāt trekālyasya aśakya niścaya tvāt anupapannam anumānam iti atas āha bhaviṣyati iti

original: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrvakālatā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena /
analyzed: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrva kāla tā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena
tena atīta ādi sandehaḥ kṣatim āvahati
yaḥ kaścid iti yogya abhiprāyam

original: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tato niścayavyāpta ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tatas niścaya vyāptaḥ iti arthaḥ
sāmānyatodṛṣṭa udāharaṇam bhāṣyakārīyam duḥkha bodham
śeṣavat udāharaṇa antargatam ca

original: atrāpi kāryeṇa saviturdeśāntaraprāptyā tatkāraṇasya vrajyāyā anumānāt /
analyzed: atrā api kāryeṇa savituḥ deśa antara prāptyā tad kāraṇasya vrajyāyāḥ anumānāt
na ca etāvatā anumānasya traividhyam bhavati
udāharaṇa mātrasya ānantyena ānantya prasaṅgāt
tasmāt bhāṣyakāra vyākhyānam a rocayamānaḥ vārttikakṛt anyathā vyākhyāya udāharaṇa antaram āha sāmānyatodṛṣṭam nāma iti

original: sādhyadharmāvinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhanadharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇo dharmo gamyate gamakatvena /
analyzed: sādhya dharma avinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhana dharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇaḥ dharmaḥ gamyate gamaka tvena
hetu viśiṣṭaḥ hi dharmaḥ gamakaḥ
jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ ca gamyaḥ
yathā āhuḥ

original: sa eva cobhayātmāṣa gamyo gamaka iṣyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca ubhaya ātmā āṣa gamyaḥ gamakaḥ iṣyate
asiddhena eka deśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ
iti
avinābhāvi tvam svabhāva pratibaddha tvam sarveṣām eva hetūnām sāmānyam

original: sāmānyenāvinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmirūpamanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānam /
analyzed: sāmānyena avinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnam dṛṣṭam dharmi rūpam anumānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam anumānam
tṛtīyāyāḥ tasiḥ

original: tadetat pūrvavaccheṣavatorapi prāpakamapi tatpadasannidhānāt gobalīvardanyāyena te parityajyānyatra niviśate /
analyzed: tat etat pūrvavat śeṣavatoḥ api prāpakam api tad pada sannidhānāt go balīvarda nyāyena te parityajya anyatra niviśate
tat idam uktam akārya kāraṇa bhṛtena iti
udāharaṇam āha yathā balākayā iti
bhāṣya kāra iyam udāharaṇam upanyasya ākṣipati apare punar iti
tat iti gatimān iti
parāmṛśati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt iti
karmaṇaḥ hi mahā tva rūpa viśeṣa eka artha samavāyaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ pratyakṣa upalabdhi yogya tā
samādhatte enā eva idam iti

original: deśāntaraprāptimānādityaḥ dravyatve sati kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve ca prāṅmukhopalabhyatve
analyzed: deśa antara prāptimān ādityaḥ dravya tve sati kṣaya vṛddhi pratyaya aviṣaya tve ca prāc mukha upalabhya tve

original: ca tadabhimukhadeśasaṃbandhād anutpannapādavihārasya parivṛtya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāt maṇyādivat,
analyzed: ca tad abhimukha deśa saṃbandhāt anutpanna pādavihārasya parivṛtya tad pratyaya viṣaya tvāt maṇi ādi vat
tad pratyaya viṣaya tvāt iti ucyamāne puras sthitena sthāṇunā vyabhicāraḥ

original: so 'pi hi pratyabhijñāviṣayo bhavati tatraiva sthitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ u pi hi pratyabhijñā viṣayaḥ bhavati tatra eva sthitaḥ
tad nivṛtti artham parivṛtya iti uktam
tathā api guṇa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
tad nivṛtti artham dravya tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam
tathā api pradīpa ādibhiḥ āśutara vināśibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
tad nivṛtti artham kṣaya vṛddhi pratyaya aviṣaya tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam
tathā api pṛṣṭhatas vasthitayā sthūṇayā vyabhicāraḥ
tad nivṛtti artham prāc mukha upalabhya tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam
upalabhya tā ca upalabdhi karma tā
sā ca iha atītā vivakṣitā
anyathā pūrva apara jaladhi velā avagāhinā tuhina śailena vyabhicāraḥ
yadi api ayam api
tathā api tadā nara antarasya upalabhyaḥ

original: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tvastācalacūḍāvalambi na prācyāṃ kasyacidupalambhagocara iti vaiṣamyam,
analyzed: mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam tu asta acala cūḍā avalambi na prācyām kasyacid upalambha gocaraḥ iti vaiṣamyam

original: tathāpi yadi draṣṭaiva puro 'vasthitasya paścimābhimukhasaya prāsādasya svayumupanipatya pṛṣṭato bhavati,
analyzed: tathā api yadi draṣṭā eva puras vasthitasya paścima abhimukhasaya prāsādasya svayum upanipatya pṛṣṭatas bhavati
tadā ukta lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ asti vyabhicāraḥ
tad nivṛtti artham anutpanna pāda vihārasya iti viśeṣaṇam
tad abhimukha deśa saṃbandhāt iti lyap lope pañcamī
sva abhimukha deśam uddiśya anutpannaḥ pāda vihāraḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ

original: tamuddiśya khalvayaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tam uddiśya khalu ayam padbhyām saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭatas bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: anyathāsiddhatayā aṅgulyā nirdeśasya dikpratyakṣatvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandha ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: anyathā asiddha tayā aṅgulyāḥ nirdeśasya diś pratyakṣa tvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: apratyakṣāyāṃ diśi digdeśasaṃbandhiṣvityetadeva kuta ityata āha---ādityeneti /

tad vibhajane prācī iti ayam iti

original: tat punaridaṃ pratyakṣam ā codayāt ā cāstamayād deśāntaraṃ sañcaraṇaṃ mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasya anākalitadravyatve satītyādidaṇḍakānumānānāmindriyavyāpārāntaramupajāyamānatvāt
analyzed: tat punar idam pratyakṣam ā ca udayāt ā ca astamayāt deśa antaram sañcaraṇam mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalasya an ākalita dravya tve sati ityādi daṇḍaka anumānānām indriya vyāpāra antaram upajāyamāna tvāt
tatra mā bhūvan ākāśa diś ādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ
tathā api paritas viniṣpatat ati viśadam ayukha jāla madhya vartinaḥ heli maṇḍalasya te eva

original: mayukhabhāgabhedāḥ pratyakṣadeśā iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa savitṛmaṇḍalena
analyzed: pratyakṣa deśāḥ iti teṣām pratyakṣāṇām pratyakṣeṇa savitṛ maṇḍalena
saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ pratyakṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti yuktam

original: idaṃ tvatisphuṭatayā nābhidhāya śiṣyavyutpādanāyākṣuṇṇaṃ mārgāntaraṃ darśitamiti mantavyam /
analyzed: idam tu ati sphuṭa tayā na abhidhāya śiṣya vyutpādanāya ākṣuṇṇam mārga antaram darśitam iti mantavyam
tat evam rūpeṇa sparśa anumānam

original: śiṃśapātvena śrutena vṛkṣatvānu mānamityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam //
analyzed: śiṃśapā tvena śrutena vṛkṣa tva anu mānam ityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītam veditavyam
sva matena vyākhyā antaram āha athavā trividham iti
tat hi bhajate prasiddham iti
pakṣa eka deśe sat api siddham
pakṣa vyāpakam tu prakarṣeṇa siddham iti arthaḥ

original: yadyapi avinābhāvaḥ pañcasu caturṣu vā rūpeṣu liṅgasya samāpyate ityavinābhāvenaiva sarvāṇiliṅgarūpāṇi saṃgṛhyante,

original: tathāpīha prasiddhasacchabdābhyāṃ dvayoḥ saṃgrahe gobalīvardanyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣavyatirekāsatpratipakṣatvābādhitaviṣayatvāni saṃgṛhṇāti
analyzed: tathā api iha prasiddha sat śabdābhyām dvayoḥ saṃgrahe go balīvarda nyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣa vyatireka asat pratipakṣa tva abādhita viṣaya tvāni saṃgṛhṇāti

original: atrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā rūpāṇāṃ liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atra api yathāsaṃbhavam caturṇām pañcānām vā rūpāṇām liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ
tat anena prabandhena anumāna vādinām svarūpa saṃkhyā phala vipratipattayaḥ nirākṛtāḥ
tatra tad pūrvakam iti svarūpa vipratipattiḥ
anumānam iti samākhyā nirvacana sāmarthyāt phala vipratipattiḥ
trividham iti nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavacchedena saṃkhyā vipratipattiḥ nirākṛtā
saṃprati āntargaṇika bheda ānantyena ānantyāt anumānasya aśakya lakṣaṇam iti yadi kaścid anumanyeta

original: tannirākaraṇāya traividhyamanumānasya ucyate iti trividhapadasyatātparyāntaramāha--atha veti /
analyzed: tad nirākaraṇāya traividhyam anumānasya ucyate iti trividha padasya tātparya antaram āha atha vā iti
trividha tvena yatas niyatam atas śakya lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti sapakṣe sat eva
anitya smat ādi pratna nāntarīyaka tvāt iti sapakṣe sat asat
tat etat anvaya vyatireki dvividham
evam anvayī api dvedhā
tatra sapakṣe sat eva

original: yathā paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi /
analyzed: yathā paramāṇu ādayaḥ kasyacid pratyakṣāḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti

original: tathā sapakṣe sadasad yathā tatraiva sādhye sattvād ghaṭādivaditi /
analyzed: tathā sapakṣe sadasat yathā tatra eva sādhye sattvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti

pratipannaḥ sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ ca iti puruṣa bhedaḥ

yatra iti

yathāpūrvam pratyakṣa bhūtayoḥ iti pramāṇa mātra upalakṣaṇam

original: evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi anyataradharmadarśanena sādhanadharmadarśanenānyatarasya sādhyadharmasyānumānamanumiti darśanamiti bhavati kriyātulyatā
analyzed: evam sādhya dharmiṇi anyatara dharma darśanena sādhana dharma darśanena anyatarasya sādhya dharmasya anumānam anumiti darśanam iti bhavati kriyā tulya tā
tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe atha vā iti

original: atra dignāgena dhūmādagnirūpadharmāntarānumānam agnideśayoḥ saṃbandhānumānaṃ ca dūṣayitvā agniviśiṣṭadeśānumānaṃ samarthitam /
analyzed: atra dignāgena dhūmāt agni rūpa dharma antara anumānam agni deśayoḥ saṃbandha anumānam ca dūṣayitvā agni viśiṣṭa deśa anumānam samarthitam
tathā ca āha
kecid dharma antaram meyam liṅgasya avyabhicārataḥ
saṃbandham kecid icchanti siddha tvāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ

original: liṅga dharme prasiddhaṃ cet kimanyat tena mīyate /
analyzed: liṅga dharme prasiddham ced kim anyat tena mīyate
atha dharmiṇi tasya eva kimartham na anumeya tā

original: saṃbandhe 'pi dvayaṃ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati /
analyzed: saṃbandhe dvayam na asti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati
avācyaḥ nugṛhīta tvāt na ca asau liṅga saṃgataḥ
na hi saṃbandha dharma tayā liṅgam pratīyate
api tu deśa saṃgatam iti arthaḥ iti
tatra liṅgasya avyabhicāraḥ tu dharmeṇa anyatra dṛśyate
tatra prasiddham tad yuktam dharmiṇam gamayiṣyati iti

original: tatra dignāgadūṣitān kalpān anyāṃśca vikalpān dignāgasamarthitaṃ ca kalpamupanyasya dūṣayati---anye punariti dharmadharmibhāvānupapatteriti
analyzed: tatra dignāga dūṣitān kalpān anyān ca vikalpān dignāga samarthitam ca kalpam upanyasya dūṣayati anye punar iti dharma dharmi bhāva anupapatteḥ iti
dharmeṇa hi dharmi pratipattavyaḥ
anyathā atiprasakteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
deśasya ca svarūpeṇa iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate atha api idam iti
nirākaroti tat ca na evam iti
yaḥ kaścid vā deśaḥ gnimān sādhyaḥ
dhūmavān vā deśa bhedaḥ
tatra pūrvasvin kalpe nirākaraṇam āha a tad dharmāt iti

original: yaḥ kaścidagnimattayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasyāvaśyaṃ dhūmo dharma ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid agnimat tayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasya avaśyam dhūmaḥ dharmaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca etat sādhyam siddha tvāt iti āha na ca agneḥ iti
dvitīyam kalpam āśaḍte ayam iti
nirākaroti na
tasya iti
śaṅkām vibhajate deśa iti
nirākaraṇam vibhajatena hi ayam iti

original: na hyayamevaṃvādī dignāgo dhūmādhāraṃ deśaviśeṣaṃ paśyati /
analyzed: na hi ayam evaṃvādī dignāgaḥ dhūma ādhāram deśa viśeṣam paśyati

original: na hyasya mate parvato nāma kaścidavayavī yadādhāro dhūma upalabhyeta,
analyzed: na hi asya mate parvataḥ nāma kaścid avayavī yat ādhāraḥ dhūmaḥ upalabhyeta

original: kiṃ tu paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmā atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ /
analyzed: kim tu paramāṇavaḥ parama sūkṣmāḥ atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ
evam dhūmaḥ pi tādṛśaḥ eva
yathā vakṣyati iti
yeṣām api deśa bhedaḥ vayavī darśana arhaḥ
teṣām api viyat vartinīm dhūma lekhām abhraṃlihām upalabhya anupalabdha deśānām na anumāna saṃbhavaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate avinābhāvena iti
tat eva vibhajate atha api iti
nirākaroti tat na iti
vikalpayati agni dhūmayoḥ iti
kārya kāraṇa bhāvam ālambate astu iti
dūṣayati tat na iti
dhūmena hi vahniḥ anumīyate
na ca kārya sattā nimitta kāraṇa sattāyāḥ vyāptā

original: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ,
analyzed: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ
tadā tatra vā kuvindaḥ
na api asamavāyi kāraṇa sattayā

original: na hi yadā yadā saṃyogastadā karma /
analyzed: na hi yadā yadā saṃyogaḥ tadā karma
tasmāt samavāyi kāraṇa avinābhāvaḥ kāryasya vaktavyaḥ
tatra idam dūṣaṇam a tad vṛtti tvāt iti
eka artha samavāyam avinābhāvam dūṣayati na ekā iti
eka artha samavāyaḥ iti hi dvedhā
ekasya arthasya samavāyaḥ
ekasmin vā arthe samavāyaḥ iti
tatra prathamam kalpam dūṣayati tābhyām iti

original: yadi hi vahnimābhyāmeko 'rthaḥ kaścit ārabhyeta tato 'sau tayoḥ samaveyāt,
analyzed: yadi hi vahnim ābhyām ekaḥ rthaḥ kaścid ārabhyeta tatas sau tayoḥ samaveyāt
na tu etat asti iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam kalpam dūṣayati na ca tau iti
tat kim asaṃbaddhau eva vahni dhūmau
tathā ca pratīti virodha
iti atas āha saṃbandha mātram iti
saṃyogaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat eva tahra
yat avadhāryatām iti atas āha tat api iti
pṛcchati katham iti
uttaram yadi tāvat iti
kurute prayogam
asti saṃbandhaḥ gni dhūmayoḥ dhūmāt iti
dūṣayati tat na apratīta tvāt
tat anena anaikāntika tvam darśayati
saṃbandha antaram āśaṅkate rūpa sparśa vat iti

original: na hi bauddharāddhānte dravyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti yatra rūpasparśai samavetau,
analyzed: na hi bauddha rāddhānte dravyam nāma kiñcid asti yatra rūpa sparśaiḥ samavetau
kim tu eka sāmagrī adhīna tayā niyata sāhacaryau
tathā vahni dhūmau api iti arthaḥ
dūṣayati na ubhayoḥ iti
ubhaya saha ācarya nirākaraṇena yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti api parākṛtam
tasya api sāhacarya viśeṣa tvāt iti āha yatra dhūmaḥ iti
gati antara abhāvāt upasaṃharati na ca iti
śaṅkate lokaḥ iti
nirākaroti na asti iti

original: yatra tāvat parvatanitambavartinī dhūmalekhā santatamudgacchantī dṛśyate,
analyzed: yatra tāvat parvata nitamba vartinī dhūma lekhā santatam udgacchantī dṛśyate

original: tatrāsau deśa eva tadviśiṣṭo 'numīyate iti lokaprasiddhameveti kimatra vaktavyam /
analyzed: tatra asau deśaḥ eva tad viśiṣṭaḥ numīyate iti loka prasiddham eva iti kim atra vaktavyam

original: yatra tu bhūyiṣṭhatāyā tasya dhūmasya dūratvena deśo na dṛśyate,
analyzed: yatra tu tasya dhūmasya dūra tvena deśaḥ na dṛśyate
dhūmaḥ eva tu amraṃlihaḥ limpan iva abhra maṇḍalam avalokyate

original: tatra deśānumānaprayāsālasatayā dṛśyamāno dhūmaviśeṣa evāgnimattayā sādhyate dhūmatvaikārthasamavāyibhiḥ tadgataiḥ saṃtatyerdhvagamanādibhirityāha--dhūmaviśeṣeṇa  #
analyzed: tatra deśa anumāna prayāsa alasa tayā dṛśyamānaḥ dhūma viśeṣaḥ eva agnimat tayā sādhyate dhūma tva eka artha samavāyibhiḥ tad gataiḥ saṃtatya ūrdhva gamana ādibhiḥ iti āha dhūma viśeṣeṇa
iti
viśiṣyate tena iti viśeṣaḥ saṃtati ūrdhvagamana ādiḥ

original: tena dhūmamātrād vahnivyabhicāriṇo vahnyavinābhāvī dhūmo viśeṣyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena dhūma mātrāt vahni vyabhicāriṇaḥ vahni avinābhāvī dhūmaḥ viśeṣyate iti arthaḥ
śeṣam atirohita artham
śeṣavat nāma pariśeṣaḥ

original: dravyatvakarmatvayoḥ śabde nirākāryatvena upayuktatvāt tābhyāmanyad guṇatvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: dravya tva karma tvayoḥ śabde nirākārya tvena upayukta tvāt tābhyām anyat guṇa tvam śeṣaḥ
sa yasya asti anumānasya pratipādya tayā
tat śeṣavat
tatra na dravyam śabdaḥ eka dravya tvāt
dvividham eva hi dravyam
adravyam aneka dravyam ca
adravyam paramāṇu ādi
aneka dravyam ca ghaṭa ādi
śabdaḥ tu eka dravyaḥ
tasmāt na dravyam rūpa ādi vat
na karma śabda antara hetu tvāt iti
tat etat bhāṣyam ākṣipati karma iti
pariharati na iti
anyam asya artham darśayati samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvāt iti
yat samāna jātīya ārambhakam na tat karma
yathā rūpa ādayaḥ iti
kārya tvāt tāvat śabdaḥ samavāyi kāraṇavān
tatra ca pṛthivī ādi niṣedhāt nabhaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam
na ca eṣa nabhaḥ vyāpakaḥ sarvatra upalambha prasaṅgāt
tasmāt avyāpakaḥ
karṇa śaṣkulī upasannihitam ca nabhaḥ śrotram
tālu ādi saṃyoga upadhānena ca nabhaḥ pradeśe śabdaḥ samavetaḥ
prāpya kāri ca śrotram

original: na ca vaktṛvaktrāvaruddhaṃ nabhaḥpradeśaṃ tat prāpnoti /
analyzed: na ca vaktṛ vaktra avaruddham nabhaḥ pradeśam tat prāpnoti

original: na cādravyaṃ śabdo gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: na ca adravyam śabdaḥ gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate

original: tasmād vīcītaraṅgarītyā svadeśānantaradeśe śabdāntarārambhaṇaparamparayā śrotradeśotpannaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ sajātīyārambhakatvāditi
analyzed: tasmāt vīcī taraṅga rītyā sva deśa anantara deśe śabda antara ārambhaṇa paramparayā śrotra deśa utpannam śabdam gṛhṇāti iti siddham sajātīya ārambhaka tvāt iti
idam tu pariśeṣasya udāharaṇam na ādaraṇīyam
vyatirekiṇaḥ hi nāma antaram idam pariśeṣaḥ iti

original: eṣa punaranvayavyatirekī dravyakarmānyatve sati sadādyabhedasya sapakṣe rūpādau sattvād,
analyzed: eṣa punar anvaya vyatirekī dravya karma anya tve sati sat ādi abhedasya sapakṣe rūpa ādau sattvāt
vipakṣe sāmānya ādau abhāvāt
tasmāt ātmatantra tā sādhanam icchā ādīnām pariśeṣa udāharaṇam draṣṭavayam
tat ca anantaram eva vakṣyati iti
sāmānyatodṛṣṭam nāma ityādi bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati sāmānyatas iti
katham tarhi anumānam atra pravartate iti
nitya parokṣeṇa saha kasyacid saṃbandha adarśanāt iti arthaḥ
vyāhatam ca iti
sa khalu atyanta aparidṛṣṭaḥ svarūpataḥ vā sādhyeta
dṛṣṭa dharmi viśeṣaṇa tayā vā

original: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe nānupalabdha iti vyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe na anupalabdhaḥ iti vyāghātaḥ
uttarasmin sandigdhaḥ iti

original: viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśayo nātyantānupalabdhapūrvadharmavattayā kvacid bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ hi saṃśayaḥ na atyanta anupalabdha pūrva dharmavat tayā kvacid bhavitum arhati

original: na khalu saptamarasavattayā kecid dravye saṃśerata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu saptama rasavat tayā kecid dravye saṃśerate iti bhāvaḥ
samādhattena viśeṣaṇa bhūtasya iti

original: na tāvat svarūpeṇānumīyate yena nānupalabdha iti vyāhanyeta,
analyzed: na tāvat sva rūpeṇa anumīyate yena na anupalabdhaḥ iti vyāhanyeta
kim tu dṛṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣaṇa tayā
na ca evam sarva anumāna aviśeṣaḥ
sādhya dharmiṇī asya asmat ādibhiḥ kadācid api pratyakṣeṇa anupalambhāt

original: tajjātīyena tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇordṛṣṭena pratyakṣato vā mānāntarād vā sādhanadharmasya svābhāvikapratibandhagrahasaṃbhādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad jātīyena tu dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ dṛṣṭena pratyakṣataḥ vā māna antarāt vā sādhana dharmasya svābhāvika pratibandha graha saṃbhāt iti arthaḥ
udāharaṇam āha yathā icchā ādibhiḥ ātmā

original: tadevaṃ vibhajate--icchādayaḥ khalu dharmiṇo bhavanti mānasapratyakṣadṛṣṭāḥ,
analyzed: tat evam vibhajate icchā ādayaḥ khalu dharmiṇaḥ bhavanti mānasa pratyakṣa dṛṣṭāḥ
teṣām ātmā viśeṣaṇam
kutas guṇa bhūtaḥ vacchedaka tayā yatas
tasmāt ātma viśiṣṭāḥ icchā ādayaḥ sādhyāḥ iti uktam bhavati
sādhana dharmam tad vartinam darśayati icchā ādīnām guṇa tvam iti
nanu uktam anupalabdha careṇa sādhya dharmeṇa na saṃdeha viṣaya tvam

original: anupalabdhacaraścātmeti kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭā icchādayo nyāyaviṣayā iti śaṅkāmurīkṛtyata prayogaṃ sūcayati--paratantrā iti /
analyzed: anupalabdha caraḥ ca ātmā iti katham tad viśiṣṭāḥ icchā ādayaḥ nyāya viṣayāḥ iti prayogam sūcayati paratantrāḥ iti
mā tatra saitsīt ātma pāratantryam
pāratantrya mātram tu siddham iti arthaḥ
tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya pāratantrya mātra viṣaya tā
na pāratantryam icchā ādīnām anumeya ātma vādīnām kadācid api asmat ādi pratyakṣa gocaraḥ
parasya tad āśrayasya nitya parokṣa tvāt iti
tat evam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāhṛtya pariśepa udāharaṇam pāramārthikam praśna pūrvakam ādarśayati pāratantrya iti

original: icchādīno hi bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatve guṇatvameva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātmapāratantrye pramāṇam /
analyzed: icchā dīnaḥ hi bādhakaiḥ apanīte dravya aṣṭaka guṇa tve guṇa tvam eva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātma pāratantrye pramāṇam
yadi api ca ayam sva rūpeṇa ātmā na prasiddhaḥ

original: tathāpi dravyāṣṭakavyatirekādiśabdairadūraviprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ dharmiṇi ca nyāyapravṛttyaṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitumiti niravadyam
analyzed: tathā api dravya aṣṭaka vyatireka ādi śabdaiḥ adūra viprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭum dharmiṇi ca nyāya pravṛtti aṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitum iti niravadyam

original: atra bhāṣyaṃ vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti saddhi iti,
analyzed: atra bhāṣyam vibhāga vacanāt eva trividham iti sat hi iti
tasya arthaḥ

original: trividham iti vibhāgavacanādeva trividhe pūrvavadādau siddhe kimarthaṃ pūrvavadādyupādānaṃ sūtreṇeti /
analyzed: trividham iti vibhāga vacanāt eva trividhe pūrvavat ādau siddhe kimartham pūrvavat ādi upādānam sūtreṇa iti
tatra samādhānam trividha vacanam trividhasya pūrvavat ādeḥ vacanam uktiḥ

original: mahataḥ trividhasya mahāviṣayasya atītānāgatavartamānaviṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa
analyzed: mahataḥ trividhasya mahā viṣayasya atīta anāgata vartamāna viṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa
tad pūrvakam iti etāvatā eva upadeśe param vākya lāghavam manyamānasya anyasmin vākya lāghave

original: 'nādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atraiva nidarśanam--tathā cāyam /
analyzed: na ādaraḥ sūtrakārasya iti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atra eva nidarśanam tathā ca ayam

original: asya samācāraḥ---itthaṃbhūtena vakyavikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛtta iti yojanā //
analyzed: asya samācāraḥ itthaṃbhūtena vakya vikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛttaḥ iti yojanā

original: evaṃ tāvat lakṣaṇabhedānumānaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣād darśitam /
analyzed: evam tāvat lakṣaṇa bheda anumānam bhinnam pratyakṣāt darśitam

original: bhāṣyakārastu viṣayabhedādapi bhedamāha---sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ tu viṣaya bhedāt api bhedam āha sat viṣayam ca pratyakṣam sat asat viṣayam ca anumānam
caḥ viṣaya bhedam samuccinoti
sat iti vartamānam
asat iti atīta anāgate
pratyakṣam hi laukikam vartamāna viṣayam eva
anumānam tu traikālya viṣayam

original: yadyapi pratyakṣamapyatītānāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhyaniṣedhayorniṣedhe pravartamānamasadviṣayaṃ tathāpi na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate ityetāvatā  #
analyzed: yadi api pratyakṣam api atīta anāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhya niṣedhayoḥ niṣedhe pravartamānam asat viṣayam tathā api na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate iti etāvatā
sat viṣayam uktam

original: anumānaṃ tu tayorapi pravartate ityetāvatā asadviṣayamuktam /
analyzed: anumānam tu tayoḥ api pravartate iti etāvatā asat viṣayam uktam
tat etat ākṣipati sat viṣayam ca iti

original: na hyanupalabdhasāmānye iti sāmānyata upalabdho viśeṣataścānirṇīto dharmo nyāyapravṛttāvadhikriyate /
analyzed: na hi anupalabdha sāmānye iti sāmānyatas upalabdhaḥ viśeṣataḥ ca anirṇītaḥ dharmaḥ nyāya pravṛttau adhikriyate
na tu anupalabdha sāmānye iti arthaḥ
na ca asataḥ svatantrasya sāmānyena darśanam asti iti
dvitīyam kalpam āśaṅkate atha iti
etat dūṣayitum dharma traividhyam āha dharmāḥ iti
tat vibhajate tatra iti
pṛcchati katham punar iti
yadi hi svatantraḥ samavāyaḥ
na tarhi kasyacid viśeṣaṇam

original: tathā ca na viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhyeteti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca na viśeṣaṇa tayā gṛhyeta iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram samavāya antara abhāvāt
na viśeṣaṇa tvam svātantryeṇa nirākurmaḥ
kim tu vṛttim asya iti arthaḥ

original: kasmāt punarasya na samavāyāntaramabhyupeyata ityata āha---atheti /
analyzed: kasmāt punar asya na samavāya antaram abhyupeyate iti atas āha atha iti
pṛcchati kim idam iti
anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ hi nāma tarkaḥ
na eṣa pramāṇam antareṇa nirṇayāya paryāptaḥ iti arthaḥ
uttaram na saṃdehaḥ
kim tu asti eva nyāyaḥ
tam āha pañca iti
ayam pañca padārtha vṛtti śabdaḥ bahuvrīhiṇā paramāṇau vartate
ṣaṣṭhī samāsena tu samavāye
na ca kathañcid śabda abheda mātram anumāna aṅgam

original: mā bhūd gośabdasāmyena vāgādīnām api viṣāṇitvamityaparitoṣāt nyāyāntaramāha--anāśritaḥ samavāya iti /
analyzed: mā bhūt go śabda sāmyena vāc ādīnām api viṣāṇi tvam iti aparitoṣāt nyāya antaram āha anāśritaḥ samavāyaḥ iti
iha buddhi nimitta tvam kāraṇa tvam
saṃyogena anaikāntaḥ mā bhūt iti atas uktam vyāpaka tve sati iti
sati upalabdhi kāraṇa antara samavadhāne sarvatra upalabhya tā vyāpaka tvam

original: tacceha pratyayakāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye cāvilakṣaṇamiti /
analyzed: tat ca iha pratyaya kāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye ca avilakṣaṇam iti
nyāya itikartavya tā bhūtam tarkam pṛcchati yadi punar iti uttaram kāryam iti
uktam anavasthā prasaṅgam avatārayitum anādhāra tva prasaṅgaḥ uktaḥ
syāt etat

original: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāganāśritaṃ kāryaṃ paścāt samavaiṣyati,
analyzed: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāk anāśritam kāryam paścāt samavaiṣyati

original: turīsaṃyuktebhya iva tantubhya utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyā ityata āha--samavāyaśceti /
analyzed: turī saṃyuktebhyaḥ iva tantubhyaḥ utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyāḥ iti atas āha samavāyaḥ ca iti
anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ pūrva uktaḥ iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate prāpti tvāt iti

original: pramāṇavattvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttirna śakyā anavasthābhiyā parityaktumityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇavat tvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttiḥ na śakyā anavasthā bhiyā parityaktum iti arthaḥ
vimarśa pūrvakam śaṅkām nirākaroti kim iyam iti

original: saṃyoge prāptitvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasyopādheḥ tatprayojakasya vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyoge prāpti tvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasya upādheḥ tad prayojakasya vidyamāna tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: atha prāptidharmo 'pi kasmāt na bhavatītyata āha---yadi punariyamiti /
analyzed: atha prāpti dharmaḥ u pi kasmāt na bhavati iti atas āha yadi punar iyam iti

original: nanviyamanavasthā kasmād bījāṅgurādiṣvivehāpi nābhyupeyate ityata āha---na caināmanavasthāmiti /
analyzed: nanu iyam anavasthā kasmāt bīja aṅgurā ādiṣu iva iha api na abhyupeyate iti atas āha na ca enām anavasthām iti
an idaṃprathameṣu anādi tvāt śakyā pratipādayitum anavasthā pramāṇena
na tu idaṃprathameṣu ādimattvena tasya aśakya niścaya tvāt
tat idam uktam pramāṇa abhāvāt iti
śāstra virodhaḥ ca samavāya antara abhyupagamaḥ iti āha samavāyaḥ ca iti

original: tattvamekatvaṃ samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātamiti śāstramāha,
analyzed: tattvam eka tvam samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātam iti śāstram āha
tad anekatvam upapādayatā bādhyeta iti arthaḥ
codayati saṃbandhi nivṛttau iti
tathā ca vinaśyati

original: vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yo dṛśyate sa tato 'nya utpanna iti siddhaṃ samavāyasya nānātvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yaḥ dṛśyate sa tatas nyaḥ utpannaḥ iti siddham samavāyasya nānātvam iti arthaḥ
pariharati na na asti iti
khyāti rūpa labdhiḥ
kasmāt akṛtaka tvāt
akṛtaka tvam eva kutas iti atas āha akṛtakaḥ iti

original: kārya svāpādānena akṛtakasaṃbandhavad ādhāravattvāditi vyatirekī hetuḥ /
analyzed: kārya sva apādānena akṛtaka saṃbandhavat ādhāravat tvāt iti vyatirekī hetuḥ
vyatireka avyabhicāram āha yadi ayam iti
utpadyamānaḥ khalu ayam samavāyaḥ sahakāryeṇa
na kāryasya

original: na hi sahotpannau rūpasparśau mithaḥ saṃbadhyete /
analyzed: na hi saha utpannau rūpa sparśau mithas saṃbadhyete
eka artha samavāyaḥ tu tayoḥ
saḥ pi samavāye na asti
san api asau na kāryam ādhāravat karoti
tasmāt saha utpāde kāryam anādhāram syāt iti
śaṅkate atha iti

original: kāryāt pūrvamutpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścādutpadyamānaṃ kāryamupādānādhārakaṃ kariṣyati kāryahetubalādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kāryāt pūrvam utpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścāt utpadyamānam kāryam upādāna ādhārakam kariṣyati kārya hetu balāt iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti tathā api iti

original: tribhyo hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: tribhyaḥ hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryam bhāva rūpam jāyate
kārya kāraṇa samavāyasya ca kārya kāraṇe samavāyi kāraṇe vaktavye

original: kāryāt prāg jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryaṃ kāraṇam /
analyzed: kāryāt prāk jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryam kāraṇam
na ca nimitta kāraṇa mātrāt asya janma iti sāṃpratam
bhāva utpādasya sarvatra kāraṇa traya pūrvaka tva niyamāt

original: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāvat na kāryāt prāg utpāda iti suṣṭhūktam--tathāpi kasyeti vācyamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyi asamavāyi kāraṇa abhāvat na kāryāt prāk utpādaḥ iti suṣṭhu uktam tathā api kasya iti vācyam iti
śaṅkate atha iti
dūṣayati kārya iti

original: na ca paṭaturīsaṃyogavat samavāyasya paścāt kāryakāraṇasamavāya iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca paṭa turī saṃyoga vat samavāyasya paścāt kārya kāraṇa samavāyaḥ iti yuktam

original: saṃyogajasya saṃyogasya kāraṇatrayasaṃbhavād asya tu samavāyāntaramantareṇa kāraṇatrayāyogāt /
analyzed: saṃyoga jasya saṃyogasya kāraṇa traya saṃbhavāt asya tu samavāya antaram antareṇa kāraṇa traya ayogāt
anyathā anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: tataśca na jñāyate kimabhipretyata asadviṣayamityuktamityākṣepa iti /
analyzed: tatas ca na jñāyate asat viṣayam iti uktam iti ākṣepaḥ iti
samādhatte tatra pratiṣidhyamānā iti
atīta anāgate saṃprati pratiṣidhyamāne tad viṣayam anumānam asat viṣayam uktam
tad niṣedhaḥ tu bhavatu pratyakṣa gocaraḥ
tathā api siddhaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
atra ca eṣa dharma traividhya kramaḥ dvedhā tāvat
vidhīyamānaḥ pratiṣiśyamānaḥ ca
vidhīyamānaḥ pi dvedhā
paratantraḥ svatantraḥ ca iti
svatantrasya ca dharma tvam viśeṣaṇa tva mātra vivakṣayā draṣṭavyam
nanu vidhīyamānaḥ api asan pratyakṣaḥ ca kvacid
yathā vyāpriyamāṇe kulāle jāyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ

original: visphāritākṣo hi tadā ghaṭo bhavatīti pratyeti /
analyzed: visphārita akṣaḥ hi tadā ghaṭaḥ bhavati iti pratyeti
na ca asau tadā san
sataḥ bhavanam prati a kartṛka tvāt
gamana vat iti śaṅkate bhavati iti
nirākaroti na
jāyamānā iti
jāyamānasya arthasya vidhi viṣayasya sattayā asattayā vā anabhyupagamāt
niṣedha viṣaya tayā tu tasya asattvam abhyupeyate eva iti
kaḥ tarhi bhavati śabdasya arthaḥ iti atas āha bhavati iti

original: dhaṭo jāyata iti tu laukikaḥ prayogo ghaṭaśabdaṃ ghaṭārtheṣu tadavayaveṣūpacarya teṣāṃ ca siddhatayā kartṛtvādupapādanīya iti /
analyzed: dhaṭaḥ jāyate iti tu laukikaḥ prayogaḥ ghaṭa śabdam ghaṭa artheṣu tad avayaveṣu upacarya teṣām ca siddha tayā kartṛ tvāt upapādanīyaḥ iti
upasaṃharati evam tāvat iti
sva lakṣaṇam samādhāya pareṣām anumāna lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati apare tu iti
tasya artham āha asya arthaḥ iti
dūṣayati atra iti

original: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ samāsaṃ vikalpya dūṣyati--nāntarīyakārtha iti ceti /
analyzed: yathāsaṃbhavam samāsam vikalpya dūṣyati nāntarīyaka arthaḥ iti ca iti
na tu sāmānyam
sattva ādibhiḥ anitya tva anāntarīyakaiḥ tad nāntarīyaka kṛtaka tva dharmaiḥ anitya tva anumānam syāt
na ca śakyam
teṣām ākāśa ādiṣu nityeṣu vyabhicārāt iti arthaḥ
tathā api asamarthaḥ samāsaḥ iti
pūrvam artha atireka mātram dūṣaṇam uktam
saṃprati tu artha atirekeṇa hetunā viśeṣaṇa samāsa anupapattiḥ iti apaunarūktyam
viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa bahulam

original: ityatra viśeṣaṇapadopādādamātreṇa vā viśeṣyapadopādānamātreṇa vā anyatarasyārthāt
analyzed: iti atra viśeṣaṇa pada upādāda mātreṇa vā viśeṣya pada upādāna mātreṇa vā anyatarasya arthāt

original: prāpterūbhayapadopādānasyaitat prayojanam---yatrobhayoḥ pratyekaṃ vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tvavyabhicāraḥ,
analyzed: prāpteḥ ūbhaya pada upādānasya etat prayojanam yatra ubhayoḥ pratyekam vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tu avyabhicāraḥ
tatra samāsaḥ yathā syāt iti
sa ca atra na asti iti samāsa anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
sāmarthyam prayojana abhisaṃbandhaḥ
codayati eka pada iti
pariharati atra api iti
pradhānam vyaktiḥ viśeṣya tvāt aṅgam jātiḥ viśeṣaṇa tvāt
pṛthivī iti ukte bhavati saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃ pṛthivītvaṃ sāmānyamasya vivakṣitaṃ yathā paśunā yajeta iti,
analyzed: kim pṛthivī tvam sāmānyam asya vivakṣitam yathā paśunā yajeta iti
kim vā tad viśeṣyam dravyam
graham saṃmārṣṭi iti
atra idam upatiṣṭhate dravyam iti
tat hi pṛthivī tvāt sāmānya viśeṣāt pṛthivī vyavacchinatti

original: evaṃ dravyamityapyukte dravyatvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vyaktirveti vimarśe pṛthivītyetadupatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: evam dravyam iti api ukte dravya tvam vā sāmānyam vyaktiḥ vā iti vimarśe pṛthivī iti etat upatiṣṭhate

original: na dravyatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃ tu pṛthivī /
analyzed: na dravya tvam sāmānyam kim tu pṛthivī
na ca dravya tva pṛthivī tvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam asti
na hi bhavati pṛthivī tvam dravya tvam iti
tasmāt sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbhavāt pradhāna eka vyakti lābhaḥ
iha tu arthaḥ nāntarīyaka tvam vyabhicarati
nāntarīyaka tvam tu na artham

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo nāntarīyakaśca syāt na cārtha iti,
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ nāntarīyakaḥ ca syāt na ca arthaḥ iti
nāntarīyaka śabda vācyasya anabhidheya tva asaṃbhavāt
vastu vacana tve pi artha śabdasya lakṣya asaṃbhavāt aviṣayam lakṣaṇam

original: na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcidasti vastu yannāntarīyakaṃ saddheturbhavati /
analyzed: na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcid asti vastu yat nāntarīyakam sat hetuḥ bhavati
yathā āha

original: sarvo 'yamanumānānumeyabhāvo buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharmibhāvena na bahiḥ sadasattvamapekṣate iti /
analyzed: sarvaḥ yam anumāna anumeya bhāvaḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi bhāvena na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti
a vyāpakam ca

original: na hi vastveva nāntarīyakamasato 'pi nāntarīyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na hi vastu eva nāntarīyakam asataḥ u pi nāntarīyaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram āha tad vidaḥ iti ca iti
nāntarīyaka darśanam iti ucyamāne śabda sāmarthyāt eva labhyate nāntarīyaka tva viśiṣṭa artha darśanam iti
sati saṃbhave śabda artha parityāga abhāvāt

original: atastrirūpaliṅgadarśanasya siddheḥ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadavarodhāya tadvida ityupādīyate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas trirūpa liṅga darśanasya siddheḥ kim aparam avaśiṣyate yat avarodhāya tad vidaḥ iti upādīyate iti arthaḥ
etat eva vyatireka mukhena nirūpayati na hi iti
etad lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇam lakṣaṇa antare api atidiśati etena iti
pṛcchatikaḥ iti
na hi asmin lakṣaṇe tad vidaḥ iti asti
tena tat atiricyate iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram yathā iti
teṣām udāharaṇam dūṣayati udāharaṇam iti

original: tadanena dignāgasya lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā anyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam //
analyzed: tat anena dignāgasya lakṣaṇam dūṣayitvā anyeṣām lakṣaṇam dūṣitam

original: saṃprati dignāgasya svakīyalakṣaṇaprapañcārthaṃ vākyam anumeye 'tha tattulya ityādyupanyasya dūṣayati--apare tviti /
analyzed: saṃprati dignāgasya svakīya lakṣaṇa prapañca artham vākyam anumeye tha tad tulye ityādi upanyasya dūṣayati apare tu iti
anantara lakṣaṇa kāram apekṣya aparaḥ iti uktam
codayati anumeyaḥ iti

original: na hi yo 'numeye saṃścāsaṃśca sa śakyaḥ sanniti vaktum
analyzed: na hi yaḥ numeye san ca asan ca sa śakyaḥ san iti vaktum
iti arthaḥ
samādhattena aprasaṅge iti

original: yadyevaṃ syātad yo vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣāvṛttiriti hetureva syāt na savyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam syāt tat yaḥ vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣa āvṛttiḥ iti hetuḥ eva syāt na savyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ
punar codayati na kartavyaḥ iti
kutas avadhāraṇāt nivṛtteḥ

original: anumeye sadbhāva evetyavadhāraṇenānumeye sadbhāvasya niyatatvāt kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anumeye sadbhāve eva iti avadhāraṇena anumeye sadbhāvasya niyata tvāt kutas pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
evam nirākartum yathāsaṃbhavam vikalpayati anumeye iti
tatra pūrva kalpasya tātparyam vikalpayati kim punar anena iti
asaṃbhavaḥ atyanta asaṃbhavaḥ nirākriyate

original: yathā nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva nātyantaṃ na bhavatīti gamyate,
analyzed: yathā nīlam sarojam bhavati eva na atyantam na bhavati iti gamyate
na tu nīlam eva sarojam na anīlam iti
na api sarojam eva nīlam na anyat iti
atha saṃbhavaḥ iti
anvaya paraḥ na vyatireka paraḥ iti arthaḥ
etat vikalpa dvayam dūṣayati ubhayathā ca iti
dūṣaṇa antaram ca āha na ca eka deśa vṛttiḥ iti
na hi atyanta ayoga vyavacchedena ayogaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ bhavati
nā api saṃbhava mātra vidhānena asaṃbhavaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ bhavati
tatas ca yoga avyavacchedāt eka deśa vṛttiḥ anumāna ābhāsaḥ na vyavacchinnaḥ iti arthaḥ
syāt etat
viśeṣya saṃgataḥ yam eva kāraḥ numeyaḥ eva saṃbhavati
yathā pārthaḥ eva dhanuḥ dharaḥ iti
na ca ayam anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ vinā evakāram labhyate
tasmāt na vyartham avadhāraṇam iti atas āha auttara pada bādhā ca

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'numeya evāsti tattulye ceti /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ numeyaḥ eva asti tad tulye ca iti
tasmāt tad tulyaḥ iti asya bādhā
cakāraḥ na eka deśa vṛttiḥ nirākṛtaḥ iti dūṣaṇam samuccinoti

original: anumeya eva sadbhāva iti pakṣaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāva eveti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati---athottaramiti /
analyzed: anumeye eva sadbhāvaḥ iti pakṣam yathāsaṃbhavam dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāve eva iti dvitīyam pakṣam dūṣayitum upanyasyati atha uttaram iti
tasya prayojanam daśayati tasya

original: sadbhāva eveti kila viśeṣaṇasaṃgatamavadhāraṇamayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati /
analyzed: sadbhāve eva iti kila viśeṣaṇa saṃgatam avadhāraṇam ayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati
tathā ca vyāptiḥ asya arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: dūṣayati---tathāpyanumeyamavadhāritaṃ saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: dūṣayati tathā api anumeyam avadhāritam saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ
hetum āhayataḥ evakāra karaṇam tatas nyatra avadhāraṇam iti
mā vadhāri sadbhāvaḥ vadhāryatām ca anumeyam
kim etāvatā api iti atas āha saṃbhava vyāptyā ca iti

original: anumeyaṃ khalvavadhāritaṃ saddhetusaṃbhavaṃ parityajya nānyatra vartate,
analyzed: anumeyam khalu avadhāritam sat hetu saṃbhavam parityajya na anyatra vartate
tatas ca anumeyam hetu saṃbhava vyāptyā avadhāritam bhavati

original: hetusaṃbhavastvanavadhāritaḥ sarvatraiva tattulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hetu saṃbhavaḥ tu anavadhāritaḥ sarvatra eva tad tulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ
sa ca kaścid tad tulya vipakṣau vyāpnoti
kaścid tad eka deśa vṛttiḥ

original: tadasya hetusaṃbhavasya vipakṣe 'pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktamasati nāstīti /
analyzed: tat asya hetu saṃbhavasya vipakṣe pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktam asati na asti iti

original: tattulye tu prasaktamapratiṣiddhamanumatameveti tattulye sadbhāva iti vyarthamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tad tulye tu prasaktam apratiṣiddham anumatam eva iti tad tulye sadbhāve iti vyartham iti arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: tulyahetu sadbhāvasiddhāvapi tattulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvo bhavatvityetadarthaṃ tattulye sadbhāva
analyzed: tulya hetu sadbhāva siddhau api tad tulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvaḥ bhavatu iti etad artham tad tulye sadbhāva
iti vacanam iti atas āha tad tulye ca iti

original: yadi punarvyāptirvivakṣyeta kṛtakatve sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi punar vyāptiḥ vivakṣyeta kṛtaka tve sādhye prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam na hetuḥ syāt
na hi ayam sapakṣa vyāpakaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
deśayati atha tad tulye iti
dūṣayitum vikalpayati kim punar atra iti
pūrvasya virodhāt bādhanam
uttarasya paunarūktyāt iti

original: pūrvapadena saha virodhe nidarśanamāha---na hi bhavatīti /
analyzed: pūrva padena saha virodhe nidarśanam āha na hi bhavati iti

original: anumeye sadbhāva ityanenānumeye vṛttau hetārlabdhāyāṃ tattulya eva sadbhāva iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ vipakṣamātrād vṛtti vyavacchinatti,
analyzed: anumeye sadbhāve iti anena anumeye vṛttau hetāḥ labdhāyām tad tulyaḥ eva sadbhāvaḥ iti samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam vipakṣa mātrāt vṛtti vyavacchinatti
na tu anumeyāt

original: naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: naram ca nārāyaṇam eva ca ādau svatas sutau dvau babhūva
iti yathā iti ced atas āha tathā iha api iti

original: samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇe hi tattulyena yathānyayogavyavacchedenaivakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathānumeyenāpi saṃbadhyeta /
analyzed: samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇe hi tad tulyena yathā anya yoga vyavacchedena evakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathā anumeyena api saṃbadhyeta
tathā ca anumeya eka deśa vṛttiḥ api hetuḥ syāt

original: na khalu naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameveti nipāto nārāyaṇena sahānyayogavyavacchedena saṃbadhyate,
analyzed: na khalu naram ca nārāyaṇam eva iti nipātaḥ nārāyaṇena saha anya yoga vyavacchedena saṃbadhyate
nareṇa ca ayoga vyavacchedena iti bhāvaḥ
atha avadhāraṇasya a vaicitryeṇa saṃbandham icchatā anumeye yathā yoga vyavacchedaḥ

original: tathā tattulye 'yogavyavacchedena saṃbandha ucyeteti śaṅkate---atha tattulya iti /
analyzed: tathā tad tulye yoga vyavacchedena saṃbandhaḥ ucyeta iti śaṅkate atha tad tulye iti
nirākaroti tad tulyaḥ iti
tat eva vistārayati saḥ iti
te tava darśane iti arthaḥ

original: na ca yasyānumeye sadbhāva evetyanūdya tattulya eva sattvamiti vidhātuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na ca yasya anumeye sadbhāvaḥ evā iti anūdya tad tulye eva sattvam iti vidhātum śakyam
na hi anumānam śakyam viśeṣṭum

original: tathā sati tadviśeṣaṇāya prayatnāntarāsthāne sati vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tathā sati tad viśeṣaṇāya prayatna antara asthāne sati vākya bheda prasaṅgāt
yathā
yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārttim ārcchet aindram pañca śarāvam odanam nirvapet

original: ityatra hi yadyapi svarūpeṇārteraśakyapratipattitvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ mṛgyate,
analyzed: iti atra hi yadi api sva rūpeṇa ārteḥ aśakya pratipatti tvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇam mṛgyate

original: tathāpi na śakyaṃ havirūbhayatvena viśeṣṭuṃ vinā prayatnāntarāditi vākyabhedabhiyā pratīyamānamapi ubhayatvamavivakṣitam,
analyzed: tathā api na śakyam haviḥ ubhaya tvena viśeṣṭum vinā prayatna antarāt iti vākya bheda bhiyā pratīyamānam api ubhaya tvam avivakṣitam
evamātrā api anumeyaḥ iti avivakṣitam

original: atha tadvivakṣayaiva vākyabhedamabhyupetya paścād vākyaikavākyatayā abhimatārthasiddhirāsthīyate /
analyzed: atha tad vivakṣayā eva vākya bhedam abhyupetya paścāt vākya eka vākya tayā abhimata artha siddhiḥ āsthīyate
na ca virodhāt vākyayoḥ eka vākya tā virahaḥ
tad tulyaḥ eva iti anya yoga vyavacchedasya vipakṣa mātra viṣaya tvena api upapattau virodha asiddheḥ
tasmāt anya apoha artha tvāt padānām virodhaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāva ityatrānumeya eva nānanumeye,
analyzed: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāvaḥ iti atra anumeye eva na ananumeye
sadbhāvaḥ eva na asadbhāvaḥ iti padārthaḥ
tathā ca tad tulya vipakṣayoḥ hetu abhāvaḥ darśitaḥ

original: evaṃ tattulye sadbhāva ityatrāpi tattulya eva nātattulye,
analyzed: evam tad tulye sadbhāve iti atra api tad tulye eva na a tattulye
sadbhāvaḥ eva na asadbhāvaḥ iti padārthaḥ
tathā ca anumeye sadbhāvaḥ iti uktam bhavati
na ca anumeya tad tulya padārthayoḥ paraspara parihāravatoḥ samuccaya saṃbhavaḥ
dvayoḥ api vipakṣa vyāvṛtti mātra paratvāt paraspara samuccaya sadbhāvaḥ iti ced na
vṛkṣaḥ gauḥ iti anayoḥ api hasti ādi nivṛtti mātra paratvena abhinna arthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt
tasmāt virodhāt samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam na yuktam iti
na ca samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam dignāgaḥ mene
yat evam ūce vaiśeṣika lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇa avasare

original: yadi rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ tato na dravyaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi rūpam eva cākṣuṣam tatas na dravyam cākṣuṣam syāt
tathā ca mahat anekra dravya samavāyāt rūpāt ca upalabdhiḥ
vai su iti dravya cākṣuṣa tva abhidhānam vyāhanyeta iti

original: atra hi rūpavaddravyasahitaṃ rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ na gandharasādīti śakyaṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: atra hi rūpavat dravya sahitam rūpam eva cākṣuṣam na gandha rasa ādi iti śakyam samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam
tasmāt samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇa abhidhānam kīrteḥ svātantryeṇa
tat ca ayuktam iti kṛtam vistareṇa
asati na astitā iti dūṣayati asati iti
kasmāt yat asat tat tuccham svayam eva na asti

original: tanna saditi śakyaṃ vyavahartum asaditi vā /
analyzed: tat na sat iti śakyam vyavahartum asat iti vā

original: bhavatu, tathāpi kasmāt tasmānna hetoḥ vyāvṛttirbhavatītyata āha---na hyasaditi /
analyzed: bhavatu tathā api kasmāt tasmāt na hetoḥ vyāvṛttiḥ bhavati iti atas āha na hi asat iti
yathā ca etat tathā anvayi hetu upapādana avasare smābhiḥ ūktam

original: svarūpeṇa dūṣayitvā etadgatamavadhāraṇaṃ dūṣayiṣyannanūdya vikalpayati--kimavadhāryata iti /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa dūṣayitvā etad gatam avadhāraṇam dūṣayiṣyan anūdya vikalpayati kim avadhāryate iti
prathamam kalpam dūṣayati yadi tāvat iti

original: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad tulyaḥ eva sadbhāvaḥ iti anena gamyate iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam kalpam dūṣayati yadi tāvat iti

original: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad tulyaḥ eva sadbhāvaḥ iti anena gamyate iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam kalpam dūṣayati atha punar iti
gauḥ ayam viṣāṇī tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ vipakṣaḥ eva na asti
pakṣa sapakṣa vyāpaka tvāt
na tu na asti eva
vipakṣa eka deśe mahiṣa ādau vṛtteḥ

original: ato vipakṣa eva nāsti ityayamapi hetuḥ syāditi /
analyzed: atas vipakṣaḥ eva na asti iti ayam api hetuḥ syāt iti
tat evam avayava artham dūṣayitvā samudārya artham dūṣayitum upanyasyati yat api eka dvipada paryudāsena iti
tatra eka pada paryudāsena trayaḥ pakṣāḥ
dvipada paryudāsena api trayaḥ iti paṭkam
tad paryudāsena saptikā parigrahaḥ

original: yathānumeye sadbhāva ityucyamāne yasya tattulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ so 'pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi /
analyzed: yathā anumeye sadbhāve iti ucyamāne yasya tad tulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ saḥ u pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti

original: tattulye astītyucyamāne vipakṣavṛtterapakṣadharmasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt,
analyzed: tad tulye asti iti ucyamāne vipakṣa vṛtteḥ apakṣa dharmasya ca hetu tvam syāt
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt sāmānya vat iti

original: nāstitāsatītyucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmastattulye ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'sattvāt /
analyzed: nāstitā asatī iti ucyamāne pakṣa dharmaḥ tad tulye ca na asti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ sattvāt
anumeye tad tulye ca iti ucyamāne
anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti vipakṣa vṛttiḥ hetuḥ syāt

original: anumeye 'styasati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvādityayaṃ tattulyavṛttihīno 'pi hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: anumeye sti asati ca na asti iti etāvati ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimat tve sati śrāvaṇa tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ syāt

original: tattulye 'sti asati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakatvādityayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: tad tulye sti asati ca na asti iti etāvati ucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ayam apakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ syāt
tat etat sarvam mā bhūt iti samudāya upādāna prayojanam
tat etat dūṣayati etat api iti
sapakṣa vyāpti avyāptibhyām dvi rūpa yuktasya anvayinaḥ dvi tvam
saṃprati sāṃkhyīyam anumāna lāṇam dūṣayati etena iti
saṃbandhaḥ vinābhāvaḥ sādhanasya sādhyena
tasmāt pratyakṣāt dṛḍhatara pramāṇa avadhāritāt

original: tathāpi yatrāvinābhūte liṅge bhavata ekasmin dharmiṇi virūddhāvyabhicāriṇī,
analyzed: tathā api yatra avinābhūte liṅge bhavataḥ ekasmin dharmiṇi virūddha avyabhicāriṇī
tayoḥ api hetu tvam prasajyeta iti atas uktam ekasmāt iti
śeṣasya anumeyasya siddhiḥ
anupapanna tva mātra sāmyena uktam mā etena na prayuktam iti
anupapatti pṛcchati katham iti
yathāsaṃbhavam anupapattim āha na hi iti

original: yadi pratyakṣaśabdo jñānavacanaḥ jñānaṃ caikatvena viśiṣyate,
analyzed: yadi pratyakṣa śabdaḥ jñāna vacanaḥ jñānam ca eka tvena viśiṣyate
tadā etat dūṣaṇam
atha saṃbandha viśeṣaṇam ekasmāt iti
pratyakṣa śabdaḥ ca jñāye na tu jñāne
tat etat upanyasya dūṣayati atha api saṃbandhāt iti
śaṅkate atha iti
saṃbandhasya pratyakṣa tā uktā pūrvam
na tu anumāna kāle iti arthaḥ
dūṣayati tathā api upalabdha saṃbandhasya pūrvam anumāna kāle ca anupalabdha liṅgasya anumānam prasajyeta iti
syāt etat
saṃbadhyate iti vyutpattyā saṃbandhaḥ liṅgam
tena avinābhūtāt hetoḥ pratyakṣāt ekasmāt anumeya siddhiḥ iti

original: tathā ca gṛhītāvinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣādityupapannamityata āha---na cānyā gatirasti /
analyzed: tathā ca gṛhīta avinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣāt iti upapannam iti atas āha na ca anyā gatiḥ asti
atra api vyākhyāne ekasmāt iti vyartham
tathā hi anvaya vyatireka mātra saṃpattiḥ avinābhāvaḥ iti ucyate
sarva rūpa saṃpattiḥ vā

original: tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūd viruddhāvyabhicārī,
analyzed: tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūt viruddha avyabhicārī
bādhita viṣayaḥ tu hetuḥ syāt

original: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarvarūpasaṃpanno heturviruddhāvyabhicārī saṃbhavatītyekasmāditi atiricyate /
analyzed: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarva rūpa saṃpannaḥ hetuḥ viruddha avyabhicārī saṃbhavati iti ekasmāt iti atiricyate
tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na ca anyā gatiḥ asti iti
avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇa doṣam āha rūpeṇa ca iti
na tāvat anayoḥ tādātmyam
bhinna indriya grāhya tvāt minna buddhi bodhya tvāt ca
na ca a tad ātmanoḥ anayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kaścid upalabhyate

original: na ca pratikṣaṇapariṇāmavāde kuṇḍavadarādīnāmapi kaścidasti saṃbandha ityapi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: na ca prati kṣaṇa pariṇāma vāde kuṇḍa vadara ādīnām api kaścid asti saṃbandhaḥ iti api draṣṭavyam
śaṅkate atha iti
nirākaroti saḥ pi iti

original: na hi sāṃkhyānāṃ bauddhānāṃ vā rāddhānte 'sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyo nām /
analyzed: na hi sāṃkhyānām bauddhānām vā rāddhānte sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ nām
na api tad āśrayaḥ dravyam
na api tad āśrayaḥ dravyam
atas sva darśana vyāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ
yadi ucyeta prādhānika tvāt rūpa ādīnām pradhānam ekam āśrayaḥ

original: tathā ca yatra rūpaṃ tatra sparśa ityata āha--yatra rūpamiti /
analyzed: tathā ca yatra rūpam tatra sparśaḥ iti atas āha yatra rūpam iti
kutas na kvacid ati
na hi pradhānam ādhāraḥ kāryāṇām
api tu pradhāna ātmaka tvam eṣām iṣyate
tathā ca yatra tatra iti anupapattiḥ
na ca tādātmyam iti api uktam

original: na ca bhedābhedāvekatra saṃbhavato virodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca bheda abhedau ekatra saṃbhavataḥ virodhāt iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate paraspara iti

original: yathā hyāsandikāṅgāni bhinnānyanauttarādharyavyavasthitānyapi parasparāśrayatayā na patanti,
analyzed: yathā hi āsandika aṅgāni bhinnāni anauttarādharya vyavasthitāni api paraspara āśraya tayā na patanti
evam rūpa sparśau api paraspara āśrayau iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti paraspara ādhāra bhāve pi anyatra āsandikā aṅga ādau
na asau rūpa sparśayoḥ

original: kutaḥ? na rūpaṃ sparśo rūpe iti /
analyzed: kutas na rūpam sparśaḥ rūpe iti
paraspara saṃyoga bheda pratibaddha guru tvāni āsandika aṅgāni apatanti sthitāni paraspara ādhāra tvena apadiśyante
rūpa sparśa ādīnām tu sthitiḥ na paraspara hetukā
api tu bhoga apavarga lakṣaṇa puruṣa artha hetukā iti bhāvaḥ
etena sāṅkhānām saptavidhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratyuktaḥ
śeṣam su bodham
prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam
vibhāga sūtre anumāna anantaram upamānasya uddeśāt yathoddeśam ca lakṣaṇāt anumāna lakṣaṇa anantaram upamāna lakṣaṇam āha atha upamānam iti bhāṣyam
sūtram paṭhati prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam
atra api yatas iti adhyāhāryam
siddhiḥ sādhanam
tat etat bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyātam
prajñātena prasiddhena
gavā sādharmyāt sāmānyāt gavayasya

original: sādharmyaṃ ca sāmānyamabhidadhatā na sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāma padārthāntaramastītyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sādharmyam ca sāmānyam abhidadhatā na sāmānya atiriktam sādṛśyam nāma padārtha antaram asti iti uktam bhavati

original: sādharmyaṃ cāprasiddhaṃ na sādhyasāghanāyālamiti sādharmyaprasiddhirapi draṣṭavyā /
analyzed: sādharmyam ca aprasiddham na sādhya sāghanāya alam iti sādharmya prasiddhiḥ api draṣṭavyā

original: sā ca yathā gaustathā gavaya ityāptavākyāt /
analyzed: sā ca yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti āpta vākyāt
tat idam uktam yathā gauḥ iti
sādhya sādhana pada vyākhyānam prajñāpanīyasya gavaya śabda vācya tayā pratyakṣa dṛśyamāna go sādṛśyasya gavaya tva sāmānya viśeṣavataḥ piṇḍasya prajñāpanam upamānam

original: piṇḍasya hi gavayaśabdavācyatāṃ puruṣo 'tideśavākyasmaraṇasahakāriṇaḥ pratayakṣād gavayagatād gosādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti pramāṇasya  #
analyzed: piṇḍasya hi gavaya śabda vācya tām puruṣaḥ atideśa vākya smaraṇa sahakāriṇaḥ gavaya gatāt go sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyate iti pramāṇasya
vyāpāraḥ prajñāpanam uktam iti

original: tatra vārttikakāraḥ prathamaṃ tāvat sūtratātparyamāha---sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat /
analyzed: tatra vārttikakāraḥ prathamam tāvat sūtra tātparyam āha sūtra arthaḥ pūrvavat
sādhya sādhanam iti ucyamāne pratyakṣa ādi sādhaneṣu sukha duḥkha sādhaneṣu prasaṅgaḥ
atas uktam prasiddha sādharmyāt iti
yadi api prasiddha sārmyam upamānam iti ucyamāne pramāṇa viśeṣa abhidhāyi upamāna pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt karaṇatva lābhaḥ
tathā api tad ābhāsa nirākaraṇāya sādhya sādhana pada upādānam
tena upamāna ābhāsam apākṛtam bhavati iti
avayava artham vibhajate prasiddhā iti
vārttikakāreṇa bahuvrīhi dvaya saṃbhavaḥ darśitaḥ
na tu tṛtīyā samāsaḥ bhāṣya kārīyaḥ nirastaḥ

original: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñitayā gavayapratipattiḥ phalaṃ sādhyasādhanapadavācyamuktā,
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñi tayā gavaya pratipattiḥ phalam sādhya sādhana pada vācyam uktā
ākṣipta prayojya vyāpāra tvāt
prayojaka vyāpārasya prajñāpanasya paścāt niṣkṛṣya abhidhānam kṛtam samākhyā saṃbandha pratipatti patti rūpa māna arthaḥ iti
etat eva sādhya sādhana padārtha tayā vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe samākhyā saṃbandha pratipatti rūpa māna arthaḥ phalam
sādhya śabdena samākhyā saṃbandhaḥ ucyate
tasya sādhanam siddhiḥ pratipattiḥ iti
nanu pratipadyatām ayam go sādṛśya yuktam gavayam
samākhyā saṃbandha pratipattiḥ tu kutastyā

original: na hi yo yatsadṛśaṃ yaṃ pratipadyate,
analyzed: na hi yaḥ yad sadṛśam yam pratipadyate

original: sa tasya samākhyāmapyavagacchati ityāśayavān pṛcchati---kimuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sa tasya samākhyām api avagacchati iti āśayavān pṛcchati kim uktam bhavati
uttaram āgama iti
āgama anubhava āhitāt saṃskārāt smṛtiḥ
etat uktam bhavati
na kevalam sārūpya jñānam samākhyā saṃbandha pratipatti hetuḥ
api tu āgama artha smṛti apekṣam iti
nanu asati āgama anubhave kutas smṛtiḥ iti atas āha yadā hi anena iti
prasiddha sādharmyāt iti atra prasiddhiḥ ūbhayī śruta mayī pratyakṣa mayī ca
śruta mayī yathā gauḥ evam gavayaḥ iti

original: pratyakṣamayī ca yathā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'yamīdṛśaḥ piṇḍa iti /
analyzed: pratyakṣa mayī ca yathā go sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ yam īdṛśaḥ piṇḍaḥ iti
tatra pratyakṣa mayī prasiddhiḥ āgama āhita smṛti apekṣā samākhyā saṃbandha pratipatti hetuḥ

original: yadyapi yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityetasmādapi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdaḥ samākhyeti śakyamavagantum,
analyzed: yadi api yathā gauḥ evam gavayaḥ iti etasmāt api go sadṛśasya gavaya śabdaḥ samākhyā iti śakyam avagantum
na khalu pratyakṣe eva saṃjñā karma
samāna jātīya vyavacchinne hi tat bhāvati
tat ca yadi māna antareṇa api tathā avagamyate
kaḥ tatra saṃjñā karma nivārayet

original: gosādṛśyena copalakṣitaḥ piṇḍo ya iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyo ghaṭādibhyo 'samānajātiyebhyo mahiṣādibhyaśca samānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinno  #
analyzed: go sādṛśyena ca upalakṣitaḥ piṇḍaḥ yaḥ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyaḥ ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ samāna jātiyebhyaḥ mahiṣa ādibhyaḥ ca samāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ
vagantum gavayaḥ

original: tathāpi yāvadayamasau gavaya iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñāṃ na niveśayati,
analyzed: tathā api yāvat ayam asau gavayaḥ iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñām na niveśayati

original: tāvadayaṃ pariplutamatiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśaṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra gavayasaṃjñā pratipatsya iti pramotsuka evodīkṣate /
analyzed: tāvat ayam paripluta matiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśam piṇḍam yatra gavaya saṃjñā pratipatsye iti pramā utsukaḥ evā udīkṣate

original: na cāsau vākyamātrasahāyo 'pratyakṣīkṛtagosadṛśagavayatvajātimatpiṇḍo 'sau gavayākhya iti pratipattumarhati /
analyzed: na ca asau vākya mātra sahāyaḥ pratyakṣīkṛta go sadṛśa gavaya tva jātimat piṇḍaḥ sau gavaya ākhyaḥ iti pratipattum arhati
na ca vākyam vinā
tasmāt āgama pratyakṣābhyām anyat eva idam āgama smṛti sahitam sādṛśya jñānam upamāna ākhyam pramāṇam āstheyam
nanu yadā udīcyena krama ilakam

original: dhik karabhamatidīrghavakragrīvaṃ pralamboṣṭhaṃ kaṭhoratīkṣṇakaṇṭakāśinaṃ kutsitāvayavasanniveśamapasadaṃ paśūnāmiti,
analyzed: dhik karabham ati dīrgha vakra grīvam pralamba uṣṭham kaṭhora tīkṣṇa kaṇṭaka āśinam kutsita avayava sanniveśam apasadam paśūnām iti

original: tadupaśrutya dākṣiṇātya uttarāpathaṃ gatastādṛśaṃ vastūpalabhya nūnamasau karabha iti pratyeti,
analyzed: tat upaśrutya dākṣiṇātyaḥ uttarāpatham gataḥ tādṛśam vastu upalabhya nūnam asau karabhaḥ iti pratyeti
tat katamat eteṣu pramāṇam
na tāvat upamānam sādharmya abhāvāt
na api pañcamam pramāṇam upagamyate

original: yadyucyeta nindāparaṃ vākyaṃ karabhasya tādṛśatve na pramāṇam,
analyzed: yadi ucyeta nindā param vākyam karabhasya tādṛśa tve na pramāṇam
na hi anya parāt śabdāt anyasya avagamaḥ iti

original: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyaṃ tatra kā gatiḥ?
analyzed: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyam tatra kā gatiḥ

original: atha tatrāpi tādṛk karabha āgamāvagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate,
analyzed: atha tatra api tādṛś karabhaḥ āgama avagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate

original: karabhaśabdavācyatā tu tasya tatpūrvaṃ tādṛkvarabhaparatve apyāgamasya prayogamātrādavagatā anumānāt /

original: tasmādakāmenāpi tvayā asatyā eva kriyāyā vya/
analyzed: tasmāt akāmena api tvayā asatyāḥ eva kriyāyāḥ
jaka tvam anugrāhaka tvam ca aṅgīkartavyam
tat ca etat ubhayam api citram iti arthaḥ
api ca sā asatī ced kriyā abhivyanakti

original: tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt na kiñcidapūrvaṃ nābhivyaktamiti /
analyzed: tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabha tvāt na kiñcid apūrvam na abhivyaktam iti
kriyā vilopaḥ prayatna vilopaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atra śabdaṃ pramāṇāntaramasahamāno dignāgaḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ vikalpyākṣipati---āptopadeśa iti /
analyzed: atra śabdam pramāṇa antaram asahamānaḥ dignāgaḥ tad lakṣaṇam vikalpya ākṣipati āpta upadeśaḥ iti
anyasmāt anyasya niścayaḥ na tāvat asaṃbandhāt atiprasaṅgāt
na ca śabdaḥ artha ātmā
na api artha kāryaḥ
vinā api artham puruṣa vivakṣā mātrāt eva tad utpādāt
tasmāt na sākṣāt śabdāt artha niścayaḥ
vivakṣā kāri antayā tu vivakṣām gamayet
sā ca artha abhiprāya pūrvā
abhiprāyaḥ ca kaścid manaḥ mātra yoniḥ
aparaḥ tu pramāṇa mūlaḥ
tatra yaḥ pramāṇa niścitam artham vivakṣati
yathāvivakṣam ca uccārayati saḥ āptaḥ

original: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇaṃ vivakṣā anumīyate /
analyzed: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇam vivakṣā anumīyate
tasyāḥ ca kāraṇam artha jñānam
tatas ca artha jñānasya artha kārya tvāt iti pramāṇa gatiḥ
tatra āpta upadeśaḥ iti atra upadeśa kriyayā upadeṣṭāraḥ upasthāpitāḥ

original: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakā dṛṣṭā ityāptagrahaṇena teṣāmavisaṃvāditvam /
analyzed: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti āpta grahaṇena teṣām avisaṃvādi tvam
tatas ca upadeśāt artha viniścayaḥ bhavatu iti etad artham yadi ucyeta iti āha yadi āptānām iti
upadeṣṭaṇām iti arthaḥ
imam kalpam dūṣayati tad anumānāt
avisaṃvādi tvam upadeṣṭuḥ ānumānikam
tādṛśasya vacanam artha viniścaye anumānam eva

original: tathā hi yad yannirdeṣasattvīyaṃ vacanaṃ tatsarvamarthavat,
analyzed: tathā hi yat yat nirdeṣa sattvīyam vacanam tat sarvam arthavat
yathā buddhasya kṣaṇika nairātmya ādi viṣayaḥ upadeśaḥ
tathā ca ayam vivāda adhyāsitaḥ upadeśaḥ iti

āpta vākya avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā
iti
dvitīyam kalpam ātiṣṭhate atha arthasya tathābhāvaḥ

original: atra hi upadiśyata ityupadeśa iti vyutpattyā artha ucyate /
analyzed: atra hi upadiśyate iti upadeśaḥ iti vyutpattyā arthaḥ ucyate

original: āptaḥ prāpta upadeśo yasmāt sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: āptaḥ prāptaḥ upadeśaḥ yasmāt sa tathā uktaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati yasmāt śabdādavagamyārthaṃ pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tamevārtha sa āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yasmāt śabdāt avagamya artham pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tam eva artha saḥ āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam

original: evaṃ ca yathā śabdena yo 'rtho darśitaḥ,
analyzed: evam ca yathā śabdena yaḥ rthaḥ darśitaḥ
tasya āptyā tathātā darśitā bhavati
tat idam uktam atha arthasya tathābhāvaḥ iti
dūṣayati saḥ pi iti
tat eva sphuṭayati yadā hi iti

original: āptyā hi tathātvaṃ viniścanvan arthasya nāpratipannatayā niścetumarhati /
analyzed: āptyā hi tathātvam viniścanvan arthasya na a pratipanna tayā niścetum arhati
pratipattiḥ ca prāyeṇa pratyakṣeṇa iti pratyakṣataḥ iti uktam
tam imam ākṣema apākaroti tat na iti
na āpta tva sahāyaḥ śabdaḥ rtham bodhayati iti sūtra arthaḥ
nā api śabda artha prāptyā śabda artha tathātvam iti
kaḥ tarhi iti atas āha api tu iti
indriya saṃbaddha asaṃbaddheṣu iti dṛrūṭa dṛṣṭeṣu iti arthaḥ
yathā uktam sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedāt iti
etat uktam bhavati
na āpta tva hetukam avisaṃvādi tvam anena sūtreṇa āgama artha tayā pratipādyate
na api artha tathātvam āgama artha tayā pratipādyate
na api āgamaḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām na bhidyate
kim tu upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti uktam
upadeśaḥ iti ca kāraka padam
upadiśyate jñāpyate prayojanavān arthaḥ nena iti
tathā api vātika ādi upadeśaḥ api śabdaḥ syāt iti atas uktam āpta iti
tena upadeśa padāt eva āgamasya vākya artha pratipattiḥ phalam uktam

original: tadidamuktam---yā śabdollekhena padārthasmaraṇāvāntaravyāpārāt śabdādevārthaṃ pratyemītyanenollekhena pratipattiḥ sāgamasyārthaḥ phalamiti
analyzed: tat idam uktam yā śabda ullekhena padārtha smaraṇa avāntara vyāpārāt śabdāt eva artham pratyemi iti anena ullekhena pratipattiḥ sa āgamasya arthaḥ phalam iti

original: āptatvaṃ ca na vākyārthaṃ pratyāyayati api tvāgamasyāvyabhicāritām /
analyzed: āpta tvam ca na vākya artham pratyāyayati api tu āgamasya avyabhicāri tām

original: na ca yataḥ prāmāṇyamavagamyate tataḥ prameyamapi /
analyzed: na ca yatas prāmāṇyam avagamyate tatas prameyam api

original: tathā ca sati prāmāṇyajñānahetoranumānādeva pratyakṣādiprameyāvagatiriti pratyakṣādīnāmapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca sati prāmāṇya jñāna hetoḥ anumānāt eva pratyakṣa ādi prameya avagatiḥ iti pratyakṣa ādīnām apramāṇya prasaṅgaḥ
tathā asati kasya anumānam api prāmāṇyam avadhārayet
na ca āpta vākyam kāryam sat vaktṛ jñāna anumāna dvāreṇa arthe pi anumānam eva
na tu arthasya pratyāyakam iti sāṃpratam
yadi hi na artham pratyāyayet jñāna mātram anumāpayet
tathā ca na artha viśeṣa siddhiḥ
na ca jñānasya arthāt anyaḥ sti kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: tasmāt vaktṛjñānaviśeṣaṇāya pūrvaṃ śabdādeva kevalād vākyārthajñānam eṣitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt vaktṛ jñāna viśeṣaṇāya pūrvam śabdāt eva kevalāt vākya artha jñānam eṣitavyam

original: evaṃ ca kṛtaṃ vaktṛjñānānumānenārthapratipattyarthena kevalaṃ prāmāṇyajñānāya tadupayoga iti /
analyzed: evam ca kṛtam vaktṛ jñāna anumānena artha pratipatti arthena kevalam prāmāṇya jñānāya tad upayogaḥ iti

original: na cāvinābhāva eva saṃbandho yena śabdārthayorasaṃbandhena gamyagamakatvaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: na ca avinābhāvaḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ yena śabda arthayoḥ asaṃbandhena gamya gamaka tvam na syāt
asti hi sāṅketikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ nayoḥ iti vakṣyate
na ca avinābhāvaḥ eva pratyāyana aṅgam
cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ nīla ādi bheda vyabhicāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tad pratipādakāḥ iti uktam
tasmāt padāni kṛta saṃketāni sva arthān smārayanti
ākāṅkṣā yogya tā āsatti sadhrīcīnāni adṛṣṭa pūrvam vākya artham bodhayanti

original: na saṃgatigrahaṇamapi pratīkṣanta iti dūre 'numānād bhavanti /

yathā ca etat
tathā uddeśe leśataḥ uktam

tasmāt sarvam avadātam
sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt

original: sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyamāha---niyamārtham /
analyzed: sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyam āha niyama artham
tat vibhajate anekadhā iti
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt iti bhāṣya matena vyācaṣṭe pratyakṣa iti
āpta praṇīta tva liṅga anumita prāmāṇya śabda eka viṣaya svarga yāga ādi saṃbandha ādīnām anumāna viṣaya tā
yathā āha bhāṣyakāraḥ
yasya amutra pratīyate saḥ dṛṣṭārthaḥ iti
pramāṇam arthasya anumānāt iti
tena dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ yasya āgamasya sa tathā
evam itaraḥ pi iti
tat evam bhāṣya matena vyākhyāya sva matena vyācaṣṭe vaktṛ bhedena iti
dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ yena sam dṛṣṭa arthaḥ pravaktā
evam adṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ numitaḥ yena sa tathā

anumita arthāḥ asmat ādayaḥ eva iti
evam api śabda dvaividhya sādhane mā bhūt apakṣa dharga tā iti pravaktṛ padena pūrayati dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha pravaktṛka tvāt iti
adṛṣṭa arthaḥ pravaktā yasya āgamasya sa tathā uktaḥ

original: asyārthamāha na vigrahaṃ karoti pratyakṣata iti /

saḥ iti

iha prameyam heya upādeya bhāvena avasthitam mumukṣuṇā pratipitsitam
