analyzed: tat anena vārttikena anumānāt ca pratipattavyaḥ iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam icchāyāḥ ātma liṅga tva kathana param bhāṣyam yad jātīyasya iti
yad jātīyasya iti vyapti smṛti kathanam
tad jātīyam paśyan iti pakṣa dharma upanayaḥ
tasmāt ayam sukha hetuḥ iti anumāya ādātum icchati
sā iyam icchā īdṛśī vyāpti grahaṇa tad smaraṇa pakṣa dharmatā grahaṇa anumāna icchā ādīnām eka kartṛ tvam sūcayati
bhede pratisandhāna abhāvena tad anupapatteḥ
tat idam uktam ekasya iti

original: yaścāsāveko 'nubhavitā ca smartā cānumātā caiṣitā ca sa ātmā /
analyzed: yaḥ ca asau ekaḥ nubhavitā ca smartā ca anumātā ca eṣitā ca saḥ ātmā
na ca śarīram eva bhavitum arhati
tasya api bālya kaumāra yauvana vārddhaka bhedena anyatvāt

original: nendriyam, indriyāntaragṛhīta indriyāntareṇāpratisandhānaprasaṅgāt yamaham asprākṣaṃ ta paśyāmīti /
analyzed: na indriyam indriya antara gṛhītaḥ indriya antareṇa a pratisandhāna prasaṅgāt yam aham asprākṣam ta paśyāmi iti
na api manaḥ manasaḥ
karaṇa tvena eva anumānāt
vakṣyati hi etat sarvam jñātuḥ jñāna sādhana upapatteḥ
iti atra sūtre
syāt etat

original: asatyapi ātmani jñātari satyapi ca buddhyādīnāṃ bhede,
analyzed: asati api ātmani jñātari sati api ca buddhi ādīnām bhede
tad santāna abhedena pratisandhāna vyavasthā upapatsyate iti atas āha niyata viṣaye iti
niyata viṣayaḥ iti buddhi bhedasya pratisandhānam apākaroti
mātra grahaṇena ca saṃtānam saṃtāni vyatiriktam apākaroti

original: tadabhyupagame vā sa evātmeti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
analyzed: tad abhyupagame vā saḥ evā ātmā iti siddham naḥ samīhitam
tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vārttikakāraḥ tātparyam asya āha yad jātīyasya iti
tatra vicāram ārabhate tatra iti
pūrvapakṣam āha katham icchā ādi iti
pariharati smṛtya iti

original: nanvekaviṣayāṇāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ nānākartṛkatve ko virodha ityata āha---na hīti /
analyzed: nanu eka viṣayāṇām smṛti ādīnām nānā kartṛka tve kaḥ virodhaḥ iti atas āha na hi iti
nānā viṣaya tve udāharaṇam āha na hi bhavati yat rūpam iti
nānā nimitta tve udāharaṇam āha nā api bhavati iti

original: yad yasmāt nimittāt tvagindriyāt sparśamahamasparkṣaṃ tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ paśyāmīti /
analyzed: yat yasmāt nimittāt tvac indriyāt sparśam aham asparkṣam tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣaḥ rūpam paśyāmi iti

original: nānākartṛtva udāharaṇamāha---na hi bhavati devadatta iti /
analyzed: nānā kartṛ tve udāharaṇam āha na hi bhavati devadattaḥ iti
tat etat kila pratisandhānam kartṛ bhedāt devadatta yajñadatta ādeḥ vyatireka balena eka kartṛkatvam sādhayati iti uktam
tat etat anupapannam
bhinna kartṛka tvāt vyatirekasya upādhi saṃbhavena svābhāvika pratibandha vijñāna vaikalyāt
asti hi devadatta yajñadatta vijñānānām bhinna kartṛka tvam akārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ca

original: tatra kimakāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatireka uta bhinnakartṛkatvāditi sandigdhavyatirekatvādasādhanāṅgaṃ pratisandhānamityāśayavāṃścodayati---kāryakāraṇabhāvāditi
analyzed: tatra kim akārya kāraṇa bhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatirekaḥ uta bhinna kartṛka tvāt iti sandigdha vyatireka tvāt asādhana aṅgam pratisandhānam iti āśayavān codayati kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt iti
tat idam uktam tat idam pratisandhānam anyathā bhavat iti
gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ pariharati na nānātvasya iti
codakaḥ āha akāryā iti
gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ eva parihāra vādī āha tat ayuktam iti
anaikāntika tvam sandigdha vyatireki tā
codakaḥ āha tulyam bhavataḥ pi iti
siddhāntī gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ eva āha abhyupagamāt iti
ca udake āhanā sādhanāt iti
asiddhārtha tā anyathā asiddhārtha tā
hetoḥ hetuvacanasya iti arthaḥ
saṃprati samādhātā sva abhiprāyam āviṣkaroti na
hetu artha aparijñānāt
tat eva vibhajatena bhavatā iti

original: kaḥ punarasau hetuviśeṣa ityata āha---viśeṣitaṃ caitatpratisaṃdhānam /
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau hetu viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha viśeṣitam ca etat pratisaṃdhānam

original: tat kathayati--- smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayorekaviṣayatvena pratisaṃndhānam yajjātīyaṃ candanavanitādi sukhahetuṃ pratītaṃ smarāmi tajjātīyamimu  #
analyzed: tat kathayati smṛtyā saha pūrva apara pratyayayoḥ eka viṣaya tvena pratisaṃndhānam yad jātīyam candana vanitā ādi sukha hetum pratītam smarāmi tad jātīyam imu
pratyemi iti pratisandhānam

original: tadanena śālibījāṅgurasya paramparayā śālibījāntarajananalakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamād vyavacchinatti //
analyzed: tat anena śāli bīja aṅgurasya paramparayā śāli bīja antara janana lakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt vyavacchinatti
nanu iyam pūrva apara pratyaya saṃhitā smṛtiḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt eva upapatsyate
kṛtam ekena kartrā iti atas āha sā ca smṛtiḥ bhavat pakṣe nu upapannā
pṛcchati kasmāt

original: uttaram---anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt /
analyzed: uttaram anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt

original: na hi bhavati yenaiva cakṣuṣā ghaṭamadrākṣam,
analyzed: na hi bhavati yena eva cakṣuṣā ghaṭam adrākṣam
tena eva tvac indriyeṇa tam spṛśāmi iti

original: nimittabhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamuktvā viṣayabhede 'pyāha---na hyanyena svabhāvena ghaṭatvādinānubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣatvādinā smaraṇam /
analyzed: nimitta bhede pratisaṃdhāna abhāvam uktvā viṣaya bhede pi āha na hi anyena svabhāvena ghaṭa tva ādinā anubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣa tva ādinā smaraṇam

original: na hi bhavati yamahaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so 'yaṃ vṛkṣa iti /
analyzed: na hi bhavati yam aham ghaṭam adrākṣam saḥ yam vṛkṣe iti

original: kartṛbhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamāha---na hyanyena devadattena anubhūtamanyo yajñadattaḥ smarati /
analyzed: kartṛ bhede pratisaṃdhāna abhāvam āha na hi anyena devadattena anubhūtam anyaḥ yajñadattaḥ smarati

original: na hi bhavati yo 'haṃ devadatto 'drākṣaṃ so 'haṃ yajñadattaḥ paśyāmīti /
analyzed: na hi bhavati yaḥ ham devadattaḥ drākṣam saḥ ham yajñadattaḥ paśyāmi iti

original: na cedaṃ satyapi bhede kāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca idam sati api bhede kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt pratisaṃdhānam bhavitum arhati

original: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayorghaṭakapālayorvā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ ghaṭa kapālayoḥ vā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānam bhavati

original: ye tantavaḥ sa eva paṭa iti vā yo ghaṭākṣaṇaḥ sa eva kapālakṣaṇa iti vā /
analyzed: ye tantavaḥ saḥ eva paṭaḥ iti vā yaḥ ghaṭa akṣaṇaḥ saḥ eva kapāla kṣaṇaḥ iti vā

original: vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmagṛhītabhedānāṃ pratisaṃdhānahetubhāvaḥ sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet?
analyzed: vastutas kārya kāraṇa bhūtānām agṛhīta bhedānām pratisaṃdhāna hetu bhāvaḥ sa bhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāt iti ced

original: tanna, āmalakaphalasyaikasyāpanayane tatraiva sthāne āmalakāntarāvasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam /
analyzed: tat naḥ āmalaka phalasya ekasya apanayane tatra eva sthāne āmalaka antara avasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam
na ca tayoḥ āmalakayoḥ asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ smṛtyā sahaikaviṣayatvaṃ kartari kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ na karmaṇīti cet?
analyzed: pūrva apara pratyayayoḥ smṛtyā saha eka viṣaya tvam kartari kārya kāraṇa bhāva nibandhanam na karmaṇi iti ced

original: hanta, nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāve 'pyasti vijñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti tannibandhanaṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ pūrvavadeva prasajyeta /
analyzed: hanta nairātmya sākṣātkāra sātmībhāve pi asti vijñānānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti tad nibandhanam pratisaṃdhānam pūrva vat eva prasajyeta

original: saiva cātmadṛṣṭirdeṣāṇāṃ nidānaṃ paramiti vyartho nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāvaprayāsaḥ /
analyzed: sā eva ca ātma dṛṣṭiḥ deṣāṇām nidānam param iti vyarthaḥ nairātmya sākṣātkāra sātmībhāva prayāsaḥ

original: athāsadapi pratisaṃdhānaṃ kāryavaśādāharati tathāgato naṭa iva rāmatvamātmanaḥ,
analyzed: atha asat api pratisaṃdhānam kārya vaśāt āharati tathāgataḥ naṭaḥ iva rāma tvam ātmanaḥ
yadi tat kārya kāraṇa bhāva nibandhanam
katham asat
katham āhāryam
atha kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pi avastu san kalpanā mātra nibandhanaḥ

original: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śālibījasyotpādaṃ vāstavaṃ na niyantumarhati,
analyzed: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śāli bījasya utpādam vāstavam na niyantum arhati
na jātu kalpita vahni bhāvaḥ māṇavakaḥ dahana pākayoḥ upayujyate

original: na ca pratyayānāṃ bhedāgrahāt pratisaṃdhānamiti sāṃpratam,
analyzed: na ca pratyayānām bheda agrahāt pratisaṃdhānam iti sāṃpratam
pravṛtti vijñānānām rūpa ādi viṣayāṇām bhedena pṛthagjanaiḥ api pratiyamāna tvāt
ālayavijñānasya ca pravṛtti vijñāna atiriktasya anupalabdheḥ

original: ahamiti ca sattvadṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtāvasati bādhake sthiravastuviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: aham iti ca sattva dṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇika tva nirākṛtau asati bādhake sthira vastu viṣaya tvāt

original: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ ekaviṣayatvalakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasyānekakartṛkatvād vyatireko nirūpādhirekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati
analyzed: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrva apara pratyayayoḥ eka viṣaya tva lakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasya aneka kartṛka tvāt vyatirekaḥ nirūpādhiḥ eka kartṛkatvam sādhayati

original: sa caikaḥ kartā śarīrendriyabuddhibhyo bhinna ātmeti siddham //
analyzed: sa ca ekaḥ kartā śarīra indriya buddhibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ ātmā iti siddham
tat anena āśayena aktam asti ca smṛtiḥ ukta rūpa

original: tasmād yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ nyāyyamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānam nyāyyam iti
sa ca kartṛ ekatva pakṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
āśayam avidvān punar paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate bhavān iti
paraḥ eva eka granthena āha katham iti
katham na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: syādetat, yogicittamapi sarvajñasya cetasa ālambanapratyaya iti /
analyzed: syāt etat yogi cittam api sarvajñasya cetasaḥ ālambana pratyayaḥ iti
tasya api yogi cittena pratisandhānam syāt iti atas āha yat kāya iti
etat uktam bhavati
upādāna upādeya bhāvena avasthitaḥ citta pravāhaḥ santānaḥ
na ca yogi cittam upādānam sarvajñasya cetasaḥ
ālambana pratyayaḥ hi tat iti
kāya grahaṇam ca eka santāna upalakṣaṇa param
tena janmāntare pi smṛtiḥ ūpapannā iti

original: tamimamasmadabhiprāyānabhijñaṃ paramanyathāpi bodhayituṃ vibhavāma iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛtyanupapattimāha---na,
analyzed: tam imam asmad abhiprāya anabhijñam param anyathā api bodhayitum vibhavāmaḥ iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛti anupapattim āhana
asthira tvāt buddhīnām

original: na hyajātānanvayadhyastayorasti kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvotpanno 'nubhavaḥ kāñcana vāsanāmādhāya dhvaṃsate,
analyzed: na hi ajāta ananvaya dhyastayoḥ asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti pūrva utpannaḥ nubhavaḥ kāñcana vāsanām ādhāya dhvaṃsate
yayā kāla antare smṛtiḥ ādhīyate iti abhyupagantavyam

original: na cāsthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitumityātmā sthiro 'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitum iti ātmā sthiraḥ bhyupeyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yukti antaram āha asaṃbandhāt ca iti
na ca buddhīnām asamāna kālānām asti saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
punar paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate śakti iti

original: nāsmākaṃ kṣaṇikavastuvādināmasti tajjagati yadavasthitaṃ vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti
analyzed: na asmākam kṣaṇika vastu vādinām asti tat jagati yat avasthitam vāsakena vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam iti
bhāvaḥ nanu tathā api asamāna kālayatā saṃbandha rahitam aśakyam vāsayitum iti grahaṇaka vākya vivaraṇa vyājena apākaroti atha api iti
pūrvacittam pravṛtti vijñānam yat tat ṣaḍvidham
pañca rūpa ādi jñānāni avikalpakāni
ṣaṣṭham ca vikalpa vijñānam

original: tena saha jātaḥ samānakālaḥ cenāviśeṣaḥ tadālayavijñānamityucyate /
analyzed: tena saha jātaḥ samāna kālaḥ cenā viśeṣaḥ tat ālayavijñānam iti ucyate
sā ca na śaktāt tad jñānāt atiricyate
tena kathañcid
bheda vivakṣayā śakti viśiṣṭam iti ucyate
siddhāntavādī āha atra uktam iti

original: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānāṃ sarvajanapratītisiddhā stharatā kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇena /
analyzed: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānām sarva jana pratīti siddhā sthara tā kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirākaraṇena

original: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastrādeḥ mṛgamadādinā vāsyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nāsthire 'saṃbaddhe ca bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastra ādeḥ mṛgamada ādinā vāsya tvam dṛṣṭam iti na asthire saṃbaddhe ca bhavitum arhati iti arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: asthirayorapi jñānayoḥ samānakālatayā asti saṃbandha iti kasmāt anyataracittavāsitamanyataraccittaṃ smṛtiṃ nādhatte ityata āha---yaścāsāviti
analyzed: asthirayoḥ api jñānayoḥ samāna kāla tayā asti saṃbandhaḥ iti kasmāt anyatara citta vāsitam anyatarat cittam smṛtim na ādhatte iti atas āha yaḥ ca asau iti
vakṣyamāṇa apekṣā u piśabdaḥ
nanu vartamāne cetasi mā kārṣaḥ udupakāram
anāgate tu kariṣyati iti atas āha na api iti
pṛcchati katham iti
uttaram vartamānam tāvat iti
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
itas pi asati ātmani vijñāna mātrāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvena smṛtiḥ na utpadyate iti āha etasmāt ca iti
kasmāt bhāvasya bhavitṛ apekṣa tvāt
bhāvaḥ utpattimān dharmaḥ
bhavitā dharmaḥ
pākaḥ viklittiḥ saṃyoga bhedaḥ
sa ca taṇḍula avayava samavetaḥ u pi avayava avayavinoḥ abheda upacārāt taṇḍulānām iti uktam
gatiḥ parispandaḥ devadatte kartari iti
siddhāntī kṣaṇika vādinam utthāpya akṣaṇika tva abhri pāyeṇa dūṣayati anādhārā eva iti
pūrvapakṣī kṣaṇika tva abhiprāyeṇa āha kārya iti
siddhāntavādi akṣaṇika tva abhiprāyeṇa pariharati tat ca na iti
samāna kālayoḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
yathā kuṇḍa vadarayoḥ

original: sthirameva hi kuṇḍaṃ sthirasyaiva vadarasya gurutvena patato gurutvaṃ pratibadhnadadhaḥpatanaṃ nivārayadādhāro bhavati /
analyzed: sthiram eva hi kuṇḍam sthirasya eva vadarasya guru tvena patataḥ guru tvam pratibadhnat adhas patanam nivārayat ādhāraḥ bhavati
yadi ucyeta na smṛtiḥ bhāvaḥ
kim tu bhavitrī utpattiḥ asyāḥ bhāvaḥ

original: na tu bhaviturbhavitrantarāpekṣā yuktā anavasthāpātāditi āśaṅkate---athāpīdamiti /
analyzed: na tu bhavituḥ bhavitṛ antara apekṣā yuktā anavasthā pātāt iti āśaṅkate atha api idam iti
nirākaroti tat ca na iti
virodhāt iti vivṛṇoti yadi iti
kasmāt vyāhatam iti atas āha svarūpam ca iti
caḥ hetu artha
svarūpam utpatteḥ ūcyamānam svatantram bādhate yatas
tasmāt virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
anabhyupagamāt iti vivṛṇoti na hi bhavantaḥ iti
virodhāt iti sphorayati vyatiriktām ca iti
tantram śāstram
śaṅkate atha iti

original: tathā ca na virodho nāpyanabhyupaga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca na virodhaḥ na api anabhyupagaḥ iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti kim kva iti
abhidhāna svarūpam āha autpattitirati
api ca utpatteḥ bhāva tve pi na smṛtiḥ na bhāvaḥ
bhāva tvasya kārya mātra anubandhi tvāt smṛteḥ ca kārya tvāt
na ca anavasthā
nitye vyavasthānāt

original: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmaika nityaḥ pariśiṣyate ityāśayavānāha---yadā cotpattiriti /
analyzed: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmā eka nityaḥ pariśiṣyate iti āśayavān āha yadā ca utpattiḥ iti
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tat siddham etat smṛtiḥ pūrva apara pratyayābhyām eka kartṛkā
tābhyām saha eka viṣaya tvena pratisandhīyamāna tvāt

original: yā punarnābhyāmekakartṛkā sā nābhyāṃ tathā pratisandhīyate,
analyzed: yā punar nābhyām eka kartṛkā sā nābhyām tathā pratisandhīyate
yathā devadattasya smṛtiḥ na yajñadatta pratyayābhyām
na ca iyam tathā
tasmāt tathā iti

original: tadevaṃ vyatirekisamarthanaṃ kṛtvā anvayavyatirekiṇamatrārthe pramāṇayati---atha veti /
analyzed: tat evam vyatireki samarthanam kṛtvā anvaya vyatirekiṇam atra arthe pramāṇayati atha vā iti
aneka grahaṇam aneka nibhitta pratiṣedha śaṅkā nivṛtti artham yena mayā rūpa ādayaḥ nū bhūtāḥ

original: tenaiva gandha upalabhyate iti khalu mayeti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānaṃ tasmād bharatamatābhyāsenābhinaye
analyzed: tena eva gandhaḥ upalabhyate iti khalu mayā iti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānam tasmāt bharata mata abhyāsena abhinaye
ye kṛta saṅketāḥ teṣām
yat ca uktam paraiḥ
nartakī bhrū latā ākṣepaḥ na hi ekaḥ paramārthikaḥ
paramāṇu samūha tvāt eka tvam tasya kalpitam
iti
tatra āha bhrū kṣepasya eka tvāt
na bhrūḥ tu avayavi dravyam ekam
tad gatam ca recitakam api kriyā ekā eva
bhavatu vā paramāṇu samūhaḥ eva bhrū kṣepaḥ
tathā api samūhasya samūhibhyaḥ na anya tvāt paramāṇavaḥ eva
teṣām ca pratyekam eka tā ca aneka bharata mata nipuṇa pratipattṛ sādhāraṇa tā ca

original: asti ca teṣāmapi svagocarāvikalpotpādanadvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayeti pratisandhānahetubhāva iti yatkiñcidetadekatvaṃ tasya kalpitamiti /
analyzed: asti ca teṣām api sva gocara avikalpa utpādana dvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayā iti pratisandhāna hetu bhāvaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat ekatvam tasya kalpitam iti

original: tadevaṃ pratisandhānadvāreṇecchādīnāmātmaliṅgatvamuktvā saṃprati guṇatayā liṅgatā vārttikakṛd āha---atha veti /
analyzed: tat evam pratisandhāna dvāreṇa icchā ādīnām ātma liṅga tvam uktvā saṃprati guṇa tayā liṅga tā vārttikakṛt āha atha vā iti
guṇa tvena icchā ādīnām pāratantryam rūpa ādi vat sādhanīyam
tat ca anitya tvena eva sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyebhyaḥ vyāvartakena siddham

original: na hyanityo bhāvo dravyāt svatantro bhavati /
analyzed: na hi anityaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyāt svatantraḥ bhavati

original: tasmād guṇatvaprasādhakādeva hetoḥ pāratantryasiddheḥ kṛtaṃ guṇatvena pāratantryasādhakeneti
analyzed: tasmāt guṇa tva prasādhakāt eva hetoḥ pāratantrya siddheḥ kṛtam guṇa tvena pāratantrya sādhakena iti

original: hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tadapi pūrvamuktamiti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇatvamapi sādhayati /
analyzed: hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tat api pūrvam uktam iti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇa tvam api sādhayati
na ca etat anityasya pāratantryam dravyeṇa sidhyati
dravya va karmaṇoḥ api anityayoḥ pāratantryāt

original: tasmādanityatvasiddhena dravyapāratantryeṇa dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyatirecayati---na dravyaṃ karma vā icchādayaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt anitya tva siddhena dravya pāratantryeṇa dravya karmabhyām vyatirecayati na dravyam karma vā icchā ādayaḥ
vyāpaka dravya samavāyāt śabda vat ityādi
yadi api anitya tvena dravya samavāya mātram sidhyati

original: tathāpi dravyakalpanamātreṇaivopapattau tadavayayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tad dravyamanavayavaṃ tāvat siddham /
analyzed: tathā api dravya kalpana mātreṇa eva upapattau tad avayava yava kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvena tat dravyam anavayavam tāvat siddham
an avayavam ca dravyam dvedhā
vyāpakam aṇu ca
na tāvat aṇu
tatra icchā ādīnām upalabdheḥ

original: kvacidanyatarakarmaṇā kvacit svabhāvataḥ tatsaṃyogopapattau tadgatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt siddhamasya vyāpakatvam /
analyzed: kvacid anyatara karmaṇā kvacid svabhāvataḥ tad saṃyoga upapattau tad gati kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt siddham asya vyāpaka tvam
tat etat ādi grahaṇa vyākhyānam

original: tadanayā vakroktyā nityatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ cātmano darśitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat anayā vakroktyā nitya tvam parama mahā tvam ca ātmanaḥ darśitam bhavati

original: etacca sāmānyatodṛṣṭamanumānaṃ sūtrayatā sarvaṃ darśitamityāha---sāmānyata iti /
analyzed: etat ca sāmānyatodṛṣṭam anumānam sūtrayatā sarvam darśitam iti āha sāmānyatas iti

original: yat tatpūrvaṃ hṛdi sthitamicchādīnāṃ dravyapāratantrye sādhye 'nityatvahetukānumānam taduddhāṭayati,
analyzed: yat tat pūrvam hṛdi sthitam icchā ādīnām dravya pāratantrye sādhye nitya tva hetuka anumānam tat uddhāṭayati
kārya tvam api hetum samuccinoti etena iti
nanu astu dravya pāratantryam tathā api śarīra pāratantryam astu

sarva puruṣa sādhāraṇya prasaṅgāt ca na pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ

tatra icchā ādayaḥ
sa ca ātmā iti siddham iti āha tad pratiṣedhāt iti

original: ātmānaṃ lakṣayitvātmano duḥkhanidānānāmindriyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa
analyzed: ātmānam lakṣayitvā ātmanaḥ duḥkha nidānānām indriya ādīnām sarveṣām sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa

original: ca śarīramāśritya tannidānatvamiti tadevāsya duḥkhamūlakāraṇamityanantaraṃ śarīraṃ
analyzed: ca śarīram āśritya tad nidāna tvam iti tat eva asya duḥkha mūla kāraṇam iti anantaram śarīram
lakṣayitum sūtram ceṣṭā ityādi
tad avatārāya bhāṣyam tasya iti

bhogaḥ sukha duḥkha saṃvid

tat anena sarvasya anartha saṃbhārasya parama nidānam śarīram
atas tat eva indriya ādibhyaḥ pūrvam lakṣaṇīyam iti uktam

original: atra ceṣṭāśrayatvenendriyāśrayatvenārthāśrayatvena ca pratyekaṃ samānajātīyebhya ātmendriyādibhyo 'samānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇasaṃśayādibhyaḥ  #
analyzed: atra ceṣṭā āśraya tvena indriya āśraya tvena artha āśraya tvena ca pratyekam samāna jātīyebhyaḥ ātma indriya ādibhyaḥ samāna jātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇa saṃśaya ādibhyaḥ
śarīram vyavacchidyate
katham ceṣṭā āśrayaḥ iti bhāṣyam

ceṣṭā vyāpāraḥ

original: sa cātivyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca na lakṣaṇam,

api tu viśiṣṭaḥ vyāpāraḥ

yadi api ca idṛśaḥ vyāpāraḥ sti

original: tathāpi mūrtāntarāprayoge satīti viśeṣaṇāt na vyabhicāraḥ,

original: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tadvyāpārasya darśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tad vyāpārasya darśanāt iti bhāvaḥ
katham indriya āśrayaḥ iti bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe katham iti

original: yadyapi gandhādayo viṣayā na svarūpeṇa śarīramāśrayante tathāpi yadeṣāṃ sukhādyupalambhahetutvaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ tadarthamāśrayante ityarthaḥ

tat anena yasmin ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
codayati katham punar iti

original: atra prathame pakṣe ceṣṭāśabdo vyāpāraviśeṣe spandādivanmukhyārthaḥ /

original: tadetat---lokastāvadityādinā tathā cāyaṃ ceṣṭāśabda ityantena darśitam /

original: evaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa svamatena ca pratyekaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvādi śarīrasya lakṣaṇamiti varṇayitvā samastamevedaṃ śarīralakṣaṇamiti ye varṇayāṃbabhūvuḥ,

tad matam nirākaroti yaiḥ api iti
yadi ādyam padam lakṣaṇam ceṣṭā āśrayaḥ iti
tadā ghaṭena vyabhicāraḥ
indriya saṃyogi iti arthaḥ
tathā api tena eva ghaṭa ādinā vyabhicāraḥ
prāpya kāri tvena indriyāṇām ghaṭa ādīnām api indriya saṃyogi tvāt
atas āha artha āśrayaḥ iti
evam api vyabhicāraḥ tad avastha
eva ghaṭa ādīnām api rūpa ādi artha samavāyena artha āśraya tvāt
atha samavāya abhiprāyeṇa āśraya tvam

original: ghrāṇasya pārthivatvena samavāyo na viruddha iti cet---na,

yadi nāsikā agram eva ghrāṇam

pratyakṣa apratyakṣa vṛtteḥ vāyu vanaspati saṃyoga vat apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt dehasya

original: api ca yadā ceṣṭendriyārthasya samavāyena śarīratvam,

original: hanta bho indriyasamavāyikāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etadastīti teṣāmapi śarīratvaprasaṅga ityāha---samasteti /
analyzed: hanta bho indriya samavāyi kāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etat asti iti teṣām api śarīra tva prasaṅgaḥ iti āha samasta iti
syāt etat

original: cakṣurādayastu unmīlanānmūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ tu unmīlanāt mūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ

original: śrotraṃ tu ceṣṭādhāra eva na bhavati /

indriyasya upanāyaka tvena artha ādibhyaḥ viśeṣāt indriyāṇām artha ādibhyaḥ pūrvam lakṣaṇam

original: na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇamakṛte sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyamiti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamamindriyāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ nirvedopayuktamāha---bhogasādhanānīti /
analyzed: na ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇam akṛte sāmānya lakṣaṇe śakyam iti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamam indriyāṇām sāmānya lakṣaṇam nirveda upayuktam āha bhoga sādhanāni iti

original: anena yaccharīrasaṃyuktaṃ satkārakadoṣavyatiriktaṃ sākṣātpratītisādhanaṃ tadindriyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /

original: pāramparyeṇa ca bhogasādhanatvaṃ ghrāṇādīnām sākṣānmanasa eva tatsādhanatvāt,

atra indriyāṇi iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ ghrāṇa ādīni iti arthaḥ
teṣām pañcānām pañca eva lakṣaṇāni iti kathayati lakṣaṇa sūtrāṇi iti
āpātataḥ sūtram

lakṣaṇam hi vidheyam

original: atra ca ghrāṇādiśabdāḥ paṅkajādipadavadavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya kvacit,

original: avayavārthage 'pi ca gandhādyupalabdhisādhane sannikarṣādau ghrāṇādiśabdāprayogāt avayavārthānvitaṃ ghrāṇatvādyeva ghrāṇādiśabdapravṛttinimittam

original: na ca sannikarṣeṇa gandhopalabdhisādhanena ca vyabhicāraḥ,

original: bhūtebhya iti sūtrāvayavatātparyavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ bhūtebhya itīti /

original: uttaram---bhūtaguṇaviśeṣagrahaṇasādhanatvam ghrāṇenaiva hi pṛthivyā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandhaḥ sa gṛhyate,

na rasanā ādinā

original: evaṃ rasanenaivāpāṃ yo mādhuryaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate,
analyzed: evam rasanena eva apām yaḥ mādhuryam guṇa viśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate
na ghrāṇa ādinā
evam cakṣuṣā eva śukla bhāsvaram rūpam tejasaḥ
evam pāka jaḥ vāyoḥ

original: evaṃ śrotreṇaiva śabdo nabhasa iti hi niyamaḥ //
analyzed: evam śrotreṇa eva śabdaḥ nabhasaḥ iti hi niyamaḥ
atra ca prayogaḥ
gandha upalabdhiḥ karaṇa sādhyā kriyā tvāt chidi kriyā vat iti
evam sā tad anya kriyā kāraṇa atirikta karaṇa niṣpādyā
tad anvaya vyatireka an anuvidhāne sati kārya tvāt
yā yad kriyā karaṇa anvaya tireka an anuvidhāne sati kāryā
sa sarvā
yathā paṭa ādi kriyā ghaṭa ādi kriyā karaṇa cakra daṇḍa ādi atirikta vema ādi karaṇa niṣpādyā
tathā ca iyam
tasmāt tathā iti
tat ca karaṇam cakṣuḥ ādi atiriktam ghrāṇam
tat dravyam
saṃyoga ādhāra tvāt ghaṭa di vat
tat ca pārthivam

original: dravyatve sati rūpādiṣu madhye gandhasyaiva vya/
analyzed: dravya tve sati rūpa ādiṣu madhye gandhasya eva
jaka tvāt pārthiva antara vat
evam rasana ādiṣu api yojyam
tat idam uktam yad jātīyam indriyam pārthivam pārthasīyam vā bhavati

original: tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthaso vā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandho vā madhura eva vā rasabhedaḥ,
analyzed: tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthasaḥ vā yaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ gandhaḥ vā madhuraḥ eva vā rasa bhedaḥ
tena hi pṛthivī ap ādibhyaḥ
āpaḥ vā pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ vyavacchidyante iti
itaretara bhūta vyavaccheda hetuḥ sa tena eva indriyeṇa gṛhyate na anyena iti

original: na caive rasanā apāmiva pṛthivyā api rasabhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti pārthivī bhavati /
analyzed: na caive rasanā apām iva pṛthivyāḥ api rasa bhedam gṛhṇāti iti pārthivī bhavati
tathātve tayā gandhaḥ u pi upalabhyeta
tena tena eva indriyeṇa iti niyamaḥ guṇa viśeṣam avadhārayati
na tu indriyam imi

original: atra ca karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃyogopādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā bhūtebhya iti pa/
analyzed: atra ca karṇa śaṣkulī saṃyoga upādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedam vivakṣitvā bhūtebhyaḥ iti pa
yamī arthaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ
anena khalu āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi iti yat āhuḥ sāṃkhyāḥ
tat nirākṛtam
nirākaraṇa hetum āha aikātmye iti śliṣṭam padam
sāṃkhyānām kila rāddhānte kāraṇa ātmakam kāryam
tat ca kāraṇam indriyāṇām ahaṅkāraḥ eva iti aikātmyam eka kāraṇaka tvam
tathā ca aikātmyam eka tvam ghrāṇa ādīnām iti aniyamaḥ syāt iti
tat etat vibhajate yadi punar iti
śaṅkate eka iti
vibhajate atha iti
ekaḥ pākyaḥ ekaḥ agni saṃyogaḥ ekam ca uṣṇyam iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti na brūmaḥ iti
yadi api auṣṇyam nimittam sādhāraṇam

original: tathāpi gandhādyutpattau pūrvagandhādidhvaṃsānāṃ nimittānāṃ bhedādutpannaṃ bhedādutpannaṃ kāryanānātvamiti /
analyzed: tathā api gandha ādi utpattau pūrva gandha ādi dhvaṃsānām nimittānām bhedāt utpannam bhedāt utpannam kārya nānātvam iti

original: tadidamuktaṃ ye pūrve rūpādayaḥ teṣāṃ svagato viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam uktam ye pūrve rūpa ādayaḥ teṣām svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atha rūpatvādisāmānyameva kasmāt svagato viśeṣo na bhavatītyata āha---evaṃ ca kṛtveti /
analyzed: atha rūpa tva ādi sāmānyam eva kasmāt svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti atas āha evam ca kṛtvā iti
rūpa tva ādi sāmānyānām tādavasthye na pakvataratama ādi bhedaḥ

original: pradhvaṃsānāṃ tu stokabhūyastvaṃ niḥśeṣatve nopadyate iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: pradhvaṃsānām tu stoka bhūyaḥ tvam niḥśeṣa tve na upadyate iti bhāvaḥ
punar āśaṅkate ekam karma iti
nirākaroti na iti
samavāyi kāraṇam sva āśraya pratyāsatti vā apekṣate iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate yadi tarhi iti
lakṣaṇa hāniḥ tathā ca lakṣaṇa hāniḥ iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti na iti
carama bhāvi nimitta antaram bhāva rūpam iti arthaḥ
saṃyoga abhāvam tu uttara saṃyoga jananāya apekṣate eva
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
indriya prakṛti tvam tu bhūta lakṣaṇam veditavyam
gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ
krama prāptam artha lakṣaṇam avatārayati bhāṣyakāraḥ hame tu iti
tuśabdena artha mātrāt
yeṣām indriya viṣaya tvena bhāvyamānānām niḥśreyasa sādhaka tvam
mithyā jñāna viṣayīkṛtānām tu saṃsāra nimitta tā
te ime iti arthaḥ
gandha arthāḥ
atra ca uddeśa krama smāritāḥ arthāḥ lakṣya tayā pratipattavyāḥ
teṣām lakṣaṇam tad arthāḥ iti
tat iti anantara lakṣitāni indriyāṇi parāmṛśati
teṣām indriyāṇām arthāḥ
indriyaiḥ aryamāṇa tvam arthānām lakṣaṇam

original: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛdbhāvena pravibhāgābhidhānaṃ pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
analyzed: etāvatā eva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛd bhāvena pravibhāga abhidhānam pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti
pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi ca guṇāḥ ca dharmāḥ saṃkhyā karma ādayaḥ
pravibhāge pi etāvatā avagate gana dha ādi abhidhānam suhṛd bhāvena indriya viṣaya niyama jñāpana artham
pṛthivī ādīnām iti bhāṣyam na ṣaṣṭhī samāsa jñāpana artham
api tu artha abhidhāna mātram
yathāviniyogam iti

original: yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvanilānteṣu gandhādayaḥ sparśāntāḥ catustridvyekaniyamena viniyuktāḥ /
analyzed: yathākramam pṛthivī ādiṣu anila anteṣu gandha ādayaḥ sparśa antāḥ catur tri dvi eka niyamena viniyuktāḥ
śabdaḥ ca ākāśe eva iti arthaḥ
tad arthāḥ iti lakṣaṇa padam vyācaṣṭe indriyāṇām iti

original: yena krameṇa ghrāṇādaya indriyasūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ceha gandhādaya,
analyzed: yena krameṇa ghrāṇa ādayaḥ indriya sūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ca iha gandha ādayaḥ
tad anatikrameṇa iti arthaḥ

original: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityatrānekasamāsapratibhāsanāt saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā dvandvasamāsamavadhārayati---pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
analyzed: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti atra aneka samāsa pratibhāsanāt saṃśayam kṛtvā dvandva samāsam avadhārayati pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti
ṣaṣṭhī samāsena abhinna artha tvāt saptamī samāsasya iti asau na darśitaḥ

original: nanu kaṇṭhekāla itivad vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā yebhyo gandhādibhyaḥ, te tathā /
analyzed: nanu kaṇṭhe kālaḥ iti vat vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati pṛthivī ādīnām guṇāḥ yebhyaḥ gandha ādibhyaḥ te tathā
tathā hi paramāṇu gatāḥ gandha ādayaḥ vayavini gandha ādi ārabhante

original: nabhogataśca śabdo nabhasi samānajātīyaṃ śabdamityata āha---na cānyatheti /
analyzed: nabhaḥ gataḥ ca śabdaḥ nabhasi samāna jātīyam śabdam iti atas āha na ca anyathā iti
jñāpaka vaśāt kvacid vyadhikaraṇānām bahuvrīhiḥ
jñāpaka kṛtam ca na sarvatra

original: na ca gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇahetutvapratipādanaṃ kvacit nirvedādāvupayujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca gandha ādīnām pṛthivī ādi guṇa hetutva pratipādanam kvacid nirveda ādau upayujyate iti bhāvaḥ
anya samāsaḥ karmadhāraya ādiḥ
dvandvam avadhāritam ākṣipati na dvandve iti
samādhattena
ubhayasya api iti
pṛthivī ādi grahaṇena iti
yadi ādi śabdena vāyu ādayaḥ gṛhyeran
tad arthāḥ iti lakṣaṇam avyāpakam syāt
teṣām bāhya indriya artha tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
guṇa grahaṇena sarve iti āśrita anāśrita tva abhiprāyam
guṇa śabdasya dharma vacana tvāt
viśeṣaḥ tu rekhā uparekhā ādiḥ na tu antyaḥ
tasya atīndriya tvāt
eteṣām ca yathāyogam mithyājñāna samyak jñāna viṣayāṇām rāga vairāgya hetu tvam ūhanīyam
codayati gandha iti
pariharati na kartavyam laghu sūtram
gandha ādīnām pṛthak abhidhānam kartavyam iti arthaḥ
niyamam āha aindriyāṇi iti
tatra iti aniyateṣu madhye
pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi dvi indriya grāhyāṇi
śeṣaḥ ca guṇa rāśiḥ saṃkhyā ādiḥ viśeṣa antaḥ dvi indriya agrāhyaḥ iti arthaḥ
tathā sarva indriya grāhyā eti arthaḥ
atra bauddham utthāpayati darśana sparśanābhyām iti
tasya paryanuyogam āha saḥ iti

original: svasaṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāddhālambanaḥ,
analyzed: sva saṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāt ha ālambanaḥ
pratyayaḥ rūpa ādi viśiṣṭaḥ yathā anubhūyate
evam rūpa ādi atirikta ghaṭa ādi viśiṣṭaḥ nubhūyate iti arthaḥ
atra paraḥ āha rūpa ādibhyaḥ tathā sanniviṣṭebhyaḥ iti
tathā iti ākāram nirdiśati
sanniveśaḥ vyavasthānam

original: rūpādiparamāṇava eva tena tenākāreṇa utpannā ekayodakāharaṇakriyayā vyavacchinnā ghaṭa ityucyante /
analyzed: rūpa ādi paramāṇavaḥ eva tena tena ākāreṇa utpannāḥ ekayā udaka āharaṇa kriyayā vyavacchinnāḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ucyante
anurajana ādikayā tu rūpa ādi vyapadeśaḥ

original: yathāha ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya evaikārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapadiśyante iti /
analyzed: yathā āha ghaṭaḥ iti api ca rūpa ādayaḥ eva eka artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ tathā vyapadiśyante iti
nirākaroti na
ākāra arthā iti
tathā arthasya yathā padārthena nitya abhisambandhāt yathā ghaṭaḥ
tathā sanniviṣṭāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ gamyate
tena ghaṭa ākāreṇa ghaṭa sādṛśyena iti ayam arthaḥ
tathā ca dūṣaṇam iti
dūṣaṇa antaram āha rūpa ādi mātre ca iti
na tāvat rūpa ādi kṣaṇe ekaḥ ghaṭaḥ
kṣaṇa antare tad prayoga abhāva prasaṅgāt
tasmāt
rūpa ādi mātram avivakṣita bhedam tathā sati etat dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate saṃsthāna bhedāt iti
yathā saṃsthānām rūpa ādayaḥ rthāḥ anubhūyante
tathā sanniviṣṭebhyaḥ ghaṭa ādi pratyayāḥ iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti na etat iti
anya tve tat eva avayavi iti saṃjñā bheda mātram
ananyatve vyartha abhidhānam
śaṅkate ghaṭa ādi pratyayāḥ iti
eka aneka vicāra asaha tvāt asantaḥ eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ na ādi vikalpa vāsanā janita vikalpa pratyaya pratibhāsinaḥ
śabda śabdena vikalpam upalakṣayati śabda vāsanā vaśāt iti
nirākaroti tat ayuktam iti
bījam mithyā pratyayasya samyak pratyaya viṣayaḥ rthaḥ
tasya kvacid abhyupagame bhimata artha hānam iti arthaḥ

original: yastu bhinnalokamaryādatayā brūte ādimān mithyāpratyayaḥ samyagjñānaṃ nimittīkaroti,
analyzed: yaḥ tu bhinna loka maryāda tayā brūte ādimāt mithyā pratyayaḥ samyak jñānam nimittīkaroti
ayam punar anādi
kṛtam atra samyak jñānena iti
tam prati aham iti ā pratyayāḥ ca ete iti
rūpa ādi a vyatireke avayavinaḥ iti arthaḥ
paraḥ tu avyatireke pramāṇam āha na asti iti
na hi māṃsa toya atiriktaḥ kaṃścid yūṣaḥ nāma
nā api paṅktiḥ nāma
dūṣayati na ayam hetuḥ iti
ye ghaṭa ādi bhāvam āpannāḥ bhavatām darśane iti
kāme ṣṭa dravyakaḥ ṇuḥ a śabdaḥ rūpadhātuḥ a rūpadhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ iti traidhātukam jagat
tatra kāmadhātu svarūpam uktam
kāme kāmadhātau
aṣṭa dravyakaḥ ṇuḥ
rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ iti catvāri dravyāṇi
pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyavaḥ iti catvāri
dravya śabdaḥ vastu vacanaḥ
tena aṣṭa dravyakaḥ ṇuḥ iti āgamaḥ
saḥ yam rūpa ādi atirikta pṛthivī ādi anabhyupagame bādhyeta
atha vaiyātyāt ucyate pṛthivī ādīnām iti
tatas ca sāṃvṛta tvena aṣṭa saṃkhyā siddheḥ na āgama virodhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram tathā api iti
mā bhūvan vastutaḥ
ubhaye pi sāṃvṛtāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti atas āha saṃhanyamānasya iti
yaḥ hi yad tantraḥ sa tad abhāvam abhyupagamya aśakya abhyupagamaḥ

original: na khalu saṃyujyamānānāmabhāve saṃyogaḥ śakyābhyupagama ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu saṃyujyamānānām abhāve saṃyogaḥ śakya abhyupagamaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca saṃvṛtiḥ
sā hi para rūpam sva rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇoti
saṃhanyamāna abhāve ca na saṃghātaḥ

original: nāpi saṃhanyamānā iti kimanayā svarūpeṇāvriyeteti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na api saṃhanyamānāḥ iti kim anayā sva rūpeṇa āvriyeta iti bhāvaḥ

original: tadevaṃ tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād ityasya vyāghātadoṣaṃ darśayitvā svasāmarthyālocane na vivakṣitaliṅgābhidhāyitā,
analyzed: tat evam tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt iti asya vyāghāta doṣam darśayitvā sva sāmarthya ālocane na vivakṣita liṅga abhidhāyi tā
kim tu asaṃbaddha artha tā hetuvacanasya iti āha tad agrahe iti
evam kila atra abhimatam
pṛthivī ādayaḥ rūpa ādibhyaḥ bhinnā
rūpa ādi agrahe pṛthivī ādi buddhi abhāvāt iti

original: tannṛ tadettatadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvādityanena na śakyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: tat nṛ tad et tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt iti anena na śakyam vaktum
tat agrahaḥ iti atra tad śabdaḥ pradhāna parāmarśī

original: pṛthivyādayaśca dharmitayā pradhānamiti ta eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādayaḥ ca dharmi tayā pradhānam iti te eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ
tathā ca pṛthivī ādi agrahe pṛthivī ādi buddhi abhāvāt iti syāt

original: tathā ca pratijñātasteṣāṃ rūpādyabhedo na sidhyedityasaṃbaddham /
analyzed: tathā ca pratijñātaḥ teṣām rūpa ādi abhedaḥ na sidhyet iti asaṃbaddham
atha rūpa ādayaḥ pakṣīkriyante
tathā api rūpa ādi agrahe rūpa ādi buddhi aya bhāvāt iti syāt
tathā api na pratijñāta artha siddhiḥ iti asaṃbaddha artham iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ śabdāntareṇāpi pratijñāprayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅga ityāha---evaṃ rūpādimātramiti /
analyzed: evam śabda antareṇa api pratijñā prayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti āha evam rūpa ādi mātram iti
pratijñā doṣam āha sarvatra ca iti
nānātva eka artha saṃbandha niyatāyāḥ bahutva saṃkhyāyāḥ abheda eka artha niyata ekatva saṃkhyayā sāmānādhikaraṇya virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat etat anaikāntikam iti codayati nanu iti
nirākaroti tat na
anabhyupagamāt iti
samānam dharma sādhanam
yamāḥ pañca
niyamāḥ ca pañca
brahmacāri gṛhastha vānaprastha yatīnām aviśeṣeṇa eva daśa dharma sādhanam
teṣām dharma sādhana tvam ekam cāturāśramyam iti prakṛti gatā vibhaktiḥ āha
āśrama prakṛti gatā tu vibhaktiḥ prakṛti artha samavetām eva bahu tva saṃkhyām āha

original: samānārthānāmapi prakṛtīnāṃ rūpabhedena tatparasya pratyayasya sāmarthyabhedāt /
analyzed: samāna arthānām api prakṛtīnām rūpa bhedena tad parasya pratyayasya sāmarthya bhedāt

original: yathāptoyaśabdayostulyārthatve 'pi toyaśabdāt parā vibhaktistoyānīti toyasamavetāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmāha /
analyzed: yathā ap toya śabdayoḥ tulya ārtha tve toya śabdāt parā vibhaktiḥ toyāni iti toya samavetām eva bahu tva saṃkhyām āha
āpaḥ iti na toya gatām
api tu tad saṃbaddha gatām
tad saṃbaddhāḥ ca tad avayavāḥ

original: tadgatarūpādayo vā bahava ityekasyāmapi pāthaḥkaṇikāyāṃ bahuvacanopapattirāpa iti /
analyzed: tad gata rūpa ādayaḥ vā bahavaḥ iti ekasyām api pāthaḥ kaṇikāyām bahuvacana upapattiḥ āpaḥ iti

original: na ca sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi lokasyāvinivṛtternaivamiti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca lokasya avinivṛtteḥ nā evam iti sāmpratam
lokaḥ hi dṛṣṭa vyavahāra mātra prayojanaḥ na vivecayati
parīkṣakāḥ tu tad anusāriṇaḥ vivecayanti eva
anyathā hi pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇa praṇayana vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ
etena dārāḥ ṣaṇṇagarī ityādayaḥ pi vyākhyātāḥ
ṣāṅguṇyam iti ṣaṇṇām guṇānām ekam rāja praya yojana sādhaka tvam
vaiśeṣikam iti atra api viśeṣāṇām samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaka tvam ekam acyate iti gamayitavyam
hetu deṣam āha asiddhaḥ pi iti
sphaṭikasya dhavalam rūpam
tat ca nīlī dravya anuṣaṅgāt abhibhūtam na pratīyate
sphaṭikaḥ ca pratīyate

original: na ca nīlasya sphaṭikalakṣaṇasyotpattiriti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate /
analyzed: na ca nīlasya sphaṭika lakṣaṇasya utpattiḥ iti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate
tasmāt asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha yaḥ pi ayam iti
utpanna pāka jānām taile sartiṣi vā bhṛṣṭa māṃsa piṇḍa avayavānām
dravya antareṇa toyena saṃpṛktānām pāka ja utpattau satyām
na ca asau sahasā iti
atas uktam kāla viśeṣa anugrahe sati iti
sa ca saṃyoga bhedaḥ eva toya māṃsayoḥ
na tu avayavī vijātīyayoḥ an āmbhaka tvāt

original: nāpi yūṣajātīyaṃ toyasaṃyogi dravyaṃ kṣīrajātīyamiveti yuktam /
analyzed: nā api yūṣa jātīyam toya saṃyogi dravyam kṣīra jātīyam iva iti yuktam
toya virahe kāṭhinī api kṣīra buddhi vyapadeśayoḥ tādavasthyat

original: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣabuddhivyapadeśāviti saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoryūṣa iti nyāyyam /
analyzed: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣa buddhi vyapadeśau iti saṃyoga bhedaḥ eva toya māṃsayoḥ yūṣaḥ iti nyāyyam
sa ca anubhava siddhaḥ saṃyogi vyatiriktaḥ
evam bahu tva saṃkhyā saṃkhyeya atirikta anubhava siddhā eva iti
evam tatra tatra vyākhyeyam
an ādi anteṣu an ārabdha avayaviṣu iti draṣṭavyam

original: na ca parakīya sādhanadoṣodabhāvanamātrāt svapakṣasiddhiriti siddhāntinaṃ sādhanaṃ pṛcchati---atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntare dravye kiṃ pramāṇamiti
analyzed: na ca parakīya sādhana doṣa udabhāvana mātrāt sva pakṣa siddhiḥ iti siddhāntinam sādhanam pṛcchati atha rūpa ādibhyaḥ rtha antare dravye kim pramāṇam iti

original: yato 'yaṃ paro rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaraṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa vidvānapi svasiddhāntābhyāsāhitavyāmohāpasmāro na tathā vyavaharati,
analyzed: yatas yam paraḥ rūpa ādibhyaḥ rtha antaram dravyam pratyakṣeṇa vidvān api sva siddhānta abhyāsa āhita vyāmoha apasmāraḥ na tathā vyavaharati
atas nena anumānena sa vyavahāryate

original: asti hi sarveṣāmeva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluritivat candanasya rūpādaya iti vyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: asti hi sarveṣām eva laukika parīkṣakāṇām brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ iti vat candanasya rūpa ādayaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ
tatra ca paraḥ rūpa ādi upalambham abhyupagacchati candana upalambham api

original: anyathā tadbuddhyabhāvādityetāvanmātre vaktavye kathamāha tadagraha iti?
analyzed: anyathā tad buddhi abhāvāt iti etāvat mātre vaktavye katham āha tad agrahe iti
tena avagacchāmaḥ rūpa ādi grahe sya candana buddhiḥ abhimatā iti
na ca asau manaḥ mātra yoniḥ smārtī iti nyāyyam
upapāditam etasyāḥ savikalpikāyāḥ indriya janya tvam vyavasāya ātmaka pada vyākhyāna avasare
dravya bādhaka pramāṇāni ca parīkṣā parvaṇi nirākariṣyante
tasmāt siddham upalabhya tvam candanasya
saḥ yam candanaḥ vivāda gocarebhyaḥ rūpa ādibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ
svayam upalabhyasya ca samastaiḥ ūpalabhyaiḥ vyapadiśyamāna tvāt
pradhānam api sāṃkhyaiḥ vyapadiśyate
pradhānasya rūpa ādayaḥ iti
tad nivṛtti artham upalabhyasya iti
pradhānam tu kālpanikam na upalabhyam

original: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānamityasti sāṃkhyānāṃ vyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api rūpa ādīnām mūla kāraṇam pradhānam iti asti sāṃkhyānām vyapadeśaḥ
atas uktam upalabhyaiḥ iti

original: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāmanyonyaṃ vyapadeśyavyapadeśakabhāva upapatsyata ityuktam---samastairiti /
analyzed: tathā api rūpa ādīnām paraspara bhinnānām anyonyam vyapadeśya vyapadeśaka bhāvaḥ upapatsyate iti uktam samastaiḥ iti
atas samastebhyaḥ vyapadeśakebhyaḥ candanam bhinnam bhavati

original: upalabhyasyopalabhyeneti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇeti vacanaṃ rūpāvagamasamaye 'numeyebhyo rasādibhya ekāntato vyapadeśaṃ vyāvartayitum,
analyzed: upalabhyasya upalabhyena iti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇa iti vacanam rūpa avagama samaye rasa ādibhyaḥ ekāntataḥ vyapadeśam vyāvartayitum
na tu asya anumāne upayogaḥ iti
asya anaikāntika tvam udbhāvya nirākaroti senā vana ādibhiḥ iti
saṃkhyāyām asattvam āśaṅkya nirākaroti tat asattvam iti ced iti

original: vidhīyamānaṃ pratiṣidhyamānamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ niṣedhasya vidhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā niṣedhyamekatvam aṅgīkāryam,
analyzed: vidhīyamānam pratiṣidhyamānam iti yathāsaṃkhyam niṣedhasya vidhi adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā niṣedhyam ekatvam aṅgīkāryam
tat ca saṃkhyā iti arthaḥ
nanu santu amī pratyayāḥ
te tu dravya mātra nibandhanāḥ bhaviṣyanti
kṛtam saṃkhyā iti atas āha viśiṣṭāḥ ca iti
na dravya atirikta nimitta pratyākhyānena iti arthaḥ
prayoga antaram āha tad pratyaya viṣaya nimitta pratyaya vyatirekeṇa iti
ghaṭa pratyayasya viṣayaḥ ca
nimittam ca
ghaṭa pratyayaḥ ca tad vyatirekeṇa iti
tad viśiṣṭa saṃkhyā ādi pratyayasya nimitta antara ākāṅkṣi tvāt
tat kimartham at uktam utpattau iti

original: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivad ghaṭādiviṣayanimittavyatirekabhāja ityatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: carmaṇi dvīpinam hanti iti vat ghaṭa ādi viṣaya nimitta vyatireka bhājaḥ iti atra api pratyaya grahaṇam kartavyam
codayati mahat puṣpitā iti
na saṃkhyāyāḥ guṇasya parimāṇa puṣpa yoga sambhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati na eṣa iti
sthāna śabdena tiṣṭhati iti vyutpattyā saṃkhyā ucyate

original: sā yeṣāmasti te gajavājipadātiprabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekaṃ mahāntaḥ /
analyzed: sā yeṣām asti te gaja vāji padāti prabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekam mahāntaḥ
tatra te kvacid śatam eva

original: kvacit punaḥ svajātīyasthānyaṅgāntarasannidhāne satyupacitāḥ sahasraṃ bhavanti /
analyzed: kvacid punar sva jātīya sthāni aṅga antara sannidhāne sati upacitāḥ sahasram bhavanti
tena bahu tva saṃkhyā upacaya upakaraṇā tad ekārtha samaveta mahat tva upacārāt mahatī senā iti ucyate

original: na caitāvatā yatra śataṃ gajādayaḥ yatra ca sahasraṃ tayoḥ senayormahattvāviśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: na ca etāvatā yatra śatam gaja ādayaḥ yatra ca sahasram tayoḥ senayoḥ mahat tva aviśeṣaḥ
upacaya apacaya upakaraṇa tvena viśeṣita tvāt
evam puṣpita vana ādayaḥ api draṣṭavyāḥ

original: pratyayabhedād dravyādibhyaḥ saṃkhyāyā bhedamuktvā vyapadeśādabhedādapyāha---ata eveti //
analyzed: pratyaya bhedāt dravya ādibhyaḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ bhedam uktvā vyapadeśāt abhedāt api āha atas eva iti
sthaṇu śabdena api iti

original: mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvāt na parvasu khadiraśca sthāṇuśca samavetau /
analyzed: mūrtānām samāna deśa tva abhāvāt na parvasu khadiraḥ ca sthāṇuḥ ca samavetau
na ca avasthita saṃyogebhyaḥ tarū vināśa apekṣebhyaḥ sthāṇoḥ uru utpattiḥ iti yuktam

original: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyogapracayo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ sa tāvānutpannamātra eva tajjanakaḥ,
analyzed: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyoga pracayaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam sa tāvān utpanna mātraḥ eva tad janakaḥ
tasya kṣepa ayogāt

original: tasmāt parvaṇāṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣa eva sthāṇuriti gamayitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt parvaṇām saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ eva sthāṇuḥ iti gamayitavyam
atha avasthita saṃyogānām dravya vināśa apekṣāṇām janaka tvam
tatas saṃyoga pracaya padena sthaṇu tva sāmānya viśeṣa vat dravyam upalakṣaṇīyam
tat ca khādira taroḥ bhinnam iti
pratimāyāḥ mahārajata mayyāḥ avayavinyāḥ śarīram saṃsthānam eva
evam śilāputrakasya avayavinaḥ saṃsthānam eva śarīram
śaṅkate guṇa samudāya iti
a tādātmyena agrahaṇam vyatirekeṇa agrahaṇam pṛthak śabdaḥ u pi a tādātmyam eva brūte
dūṣayati agrahaṇasya iti
satām api vastūnām anupalambhaḥ yathā mūla kīla udaka ādīnām pramāṇa abhāvena
śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām ca anupalambhaḥ grāhya abhāvena
tasmāt vyatireka agrahaṇa mātram hetuḥ anekāntaḥ iti
śaṅkate grāhya abhāvāt iti ced
grāhya abhāve sati a grahaṇāt iti hetuḥ
na tu agrahaṇa mātram iti arthaḥ
dūṣayati pratijñā arthena iti
pratijñā arthasya asattvena
tad viśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ asiddhaḥ iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate grahaṇa iti
grahaṇam pramāṇam
nirākaroti na pramāṇa abhāva mātrāt vyatireka pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yastu yogyapramāṇābhāvāditi viśeṣayet taṃ pratyāha---yaśca tadagraha iti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu yogya pramāṇa abhāvāt iti viśeṣayet tam pratyāha yaḥ ca tad agrahe iti
asiddha tā
darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha pratisandhānam eva rūpa ādi vyatirikta dravya grahaṇam
atas guṇa samudāya vyatirekeṇa agrahaṇāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti
ekatra anyatve
pramāṇānām upapatteḥ
ekatra ananyatve ca anupapatteḥ iti
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
buddhiḥ rūpa labdhiḥ jñānam iti anarthāntaram

original: ātmādīnāṃ buddhihetūnāṃ lakṣaṇasyānantaraṃ hetumatī buddhirlakṣaṇīyetyāha vārttikakāraḥ---atha buddheravasaraprāptāyā iti /
analyzed: ātma ādīnām buddhi hetūnām lakṣaṇasya anantaram hetumatī buddhiḥ lakṣaṇīyā iti āha vārttikakāraḥ atha buddheḥ avasara prāptāyāḥ iti
lakṣaṇam tāvat prakṛta tvāt apadeṣṭavyam eva
tad apadeśa dvāreṇa anyat api kiñcid sūcanīyam
atas eva uktam sūtram iti
anyat ca sāṃkhya mata nirākaraṇam
yathā uktam bhāṣyakāreṇa acetanasya karaṇasya buddheḥ iti
iva kāreṇa na idam pratyākhyāna param

original: api tu lakṣaṇaparādayamapyarthaḥ pratīyamāno 'pekṣitaśca nopekṣaṇīya ityuktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: api tu lakṣaṇa parāt ayam api arthaḥ pratīyamāna upekṣitaḥ ca na upekṣaṇīyaḥ iti uktam bhavati
pṛcchati katham iti
samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedakam hi lakṣaṇam avyabhicāri tayā

original: paryāyaśabdāśca saṃketamātrādhīnapravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti?
analyzed: paryāya śabdāḥ ca saṃketa mātra adhīna pravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti
tasmāt na ete lakṣaṇam iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram vyavaccheda iti
nanu vyabhicāra sambhavena vyavacchedaka tvam ayuktam iti atas āha etaiḥ ca iti
saṃketaḥ hi dvedhā
sarvajanīnaḥ yathā gauḥ iti go jātīyasya vāyakaḥ
prādeśikaḥ ca yathā caitraḥ iti puruṣa bhedasya
tatra sarvajanīnaḥ śaknoti vyavaccheda buddhi bhāvayitum
tad vivakṣayā eva uktam etaiḥ ca iti
upapatti sāmarthyāt iti bhāṣya avayavam vyācaṣṭe paryāya iti
acetanasya ityādi bhāṣyam
tat vyācaṣṭe iyaḥ āhuḥ buddheḥ iti
buddhiḥ kila traiguṇya vikāraḥ
traiguṇyam kevalam indriya praṇālikayā arthākāreṇa pariṇamate
citi śāktiḥ ca apariṇāminī nitya caitanya svabhāvā
tasyāḥ sannidhānāt ayaskānta maṇi kalpā buddhiḥ tad pratibimba udgrāhi tayā caitanya rūpa tām āpannā iva artha ākāra pariṇata artham cetayate
tena yaḥ sau nīla ākāraḥ pariṇāmaḥ buddheḥ
sa jñāna lakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ iti ucyate
ātma pratibimbasya tu buddhi saṃkrāntasya yaḥ buddhi ākāra nīla sambandhaḥ
saḥ ātmanaḥ vyāpāraḥ iva artha upalabdhiḥ ātmanaḥ vṛttiḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: tadidaṃ buddhitattvaṃ jaḍaprakṛtitayā indumaṇḍalam iva svayamaprakāśaṃ caitanyamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalacchāyāpattyā prakāśate,
analyzed: tat idam buddhi tattvam jaḍa prakṛti tayā indu maṇḍalam iva svayam aprakāśam caitanya mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala chāyā āpattyā prakāśate
prakāśayati ca arthān iti
tad nirākaraṇāya paryāya upanyāsaḥ
na ātma vṛtteḥ ūpa abdheḥ anyā asti buddhiḥ
nā api buddhi vṛttiḥ jñānam anyat iti
ayam abhisandhiḥ
na tāvat buddheḥ ātmāt chāyā āpattiḥ indau iva mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala tejaḥ saṃkrāntiḥ pāramārthikī
citeḥ apariṇāmi tayā saṃkrama ayogāt
tasmāt bhrāntiḥ
sā ca na tāvat buddheḥ
tasyāḥ a caitanyāt
na api ātmanaḥ
tasya avṛttika tvāt
tathātve vā pariṇāma āpatteḥ

original: tasmāt kṛpaṇadhanamivātmacaitanyaṃ na svaparopakārīti buddheḥ svābhāvikaṃ caitanyamāstheyam /
analyzed: tasmāt kṛpaṇa dhanam iva ātma caitanyam na sva para upakāri iti buddheḥ svābhāvikam caitanyam āstheyam
tathā ca ubhaya caitanye dūṣaṇam uktam
pratyaya vyavasthayā yat eka kartṛ tva anumāna tat na syāt iti arthaḥ
atha dvayoḥ cetanayoḥ ekā vṛttiḥ bheda agrahaḥ vā
tena eka kartṛkatva abhimānaḥ iti atas āha buddhi vṛtti aviśiṣṭāyām iti
buddhiḥ jñāna sādhanam iti
budhyate nena iti vyutpattyā manaḥ ucyate

original: gandhādiviṣayatayā sukhaduḥkhaviṣayatayā ceyaṃ buddhirbhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpata iti //15 //
analyzed: gandha ādi viṣaya tayā sukha duḥkha viṣaya tayā ca iyam buddhiḥ bhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpate iti
yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam

original: bhāṣyakāraḥ kramaprāptaṃ manolakṣaṇasūtramavatārayan utsūtramanyānyapi lakṣaṇāni āha---smṛtītyādi /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ krama prāptam manaḥ lakṣaṇa sūtram avatārayan utsūtram anyāni api lakṣaṇāni āha smṛti ityādi
sukha ādi pratyakṣam iti ādi śabdena viṣayatayā icchā ādayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ
icchā ādayaḥ iti atra ādi śabdena kāryatayā sukha ādayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ
smṛti ityādi bhāṣyasya vārttikakāraḥ tātparyam āha smṛti iti
anindriya ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yasmāt iti
indriya gata rūpa ādi nivṛtti artha yuktam indriya saṃyogi iti

original: tathāpi ākāśādīnāmapi manastvaṃ māṃ bhūdityata uktam---sahakārīti /
analyzed: tathā api ākāśa ādīnām api manaḥ tvam mām bhūt iti atas uktam sahakāri iti

tathā api ātmanaḥ mā bhūt iti atas uktam avyāpi iti

cakṣuḥ ādibhyaḥ n utpattau satyām kriyā tvāt

original: atra ca ya ātmano viśeṣaguṇāste sarve indriyajanmāno yathā gandhādipratyayāḥ,

original: evaṃ ca saṃskārādiṣu na karaṇatvaprasaṅga iti /

analyzed: yadā tasya eva manaḥ saṃyuktasya indriyasya krameṇa nīla ādayaḥ rthāḥ sambadhyante tadā tad kramāt krama

original: bubhutsākramaṃ gṛhītvā siddhānte 'pi manaḥparityāgo mā bhūditi bhiyā uktam---satyāṃ bubhutsāyāmayugapadgrahaṇa iti /

original: na hi kiñcitkaraṇaṃ sambaddhamapi saditi syāt /

original: na ca karturapyayaṃ kramakāritādharmaḥ sa hyanekakaraṇādhiṣṭhānena yugapannānākāryāṇi karoti /

tasmāt anekasya dharmaḥ caritārthaḥ

original: evaṃ śabdagato 'neko 'pi dharmaḥ samānatayaiva dravyatvādisandehahetuḥ triṣu,
analyzed: evam śabda gataḥ na ekaḥ pi dharmaḥ samāna tayā eva dravya tva ādi sandeha hetuḥ triṣu
saṃyoga ja tvam sādhāraṇam sattva ādinā nirbhaksya
nirguṇa tvam guṇa karmaṇāḥ
evam kṣaṇika tvam dravya guṇa karmaṇām iti samāna dharma upapattyā gatārtham iti arthaḥ
pṛcchati atha iti
bhāṣyakṛt vyākhyayā uttaram asādhāraṇaḥ iti
punar pṛcchati katham iti
samāsa pada śabdena tad eka deśaḥ neka śabdaḥ lakṣyate samāsa gatena aneka śabdena iti arthaḥ
uttaram samānā iti
etat uktam bhavati
yatas na ekasmāt samāna asamāna jātīyāt eṣa sva āśrayam vyāvartayati
atas neka apādānaka vyāvṛtti hetuka tvāt lakṣaṇa yānena iti ucyate

original: tadanena samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekamiti bhāṣyaṃ tasmād viśeṣa ityadhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tat anena samāna jātīyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam iti bhāṣyam tasmāt viśeṣaḥ iti adhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam
adhyāhṛta viśeṣa pada vivaraṇam viśeṣakaḥ dharmaḥ iti
saṃbandha sāmānya vivakṣayā tu ṣaṣṭhī tasya anekasya iti
lakṣaṇā bīja antaram āhatasya ca anekasya iti
nivartya nivartaka saṃbandhena aneka śabdena lakṣyate iti arthaḥ
tat anena vinā eva adhyāhāram samāna jātīyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam
tasya dharme nivartaka tayā iti vyākhyātam
na tu atra samāsa bhrāntiḥ kartavyā
darśayiṣyati hi bahuvrīhim iha eva vārttikakāraḥ

original: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇābījadvayopanyāsena asādhāraṇo dharma iti grahaṇakavākyaṃ vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tat evam lakṣaṇā bīja dvaya upanyāsena asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti grahaṇaka vākyam vyākhyātam
prakāra antareṇa aneka dharma padam vyācaṣṭe ekām aneka iti

original: ekaṃ cāneka ca tadubhayamanekaṃ tasyānekasya pratyayaheturdharmo 'nekadharmaḥ bhedābhedapratyayaheturityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ekam ca aneka ca tat ubhayam anekam tasya anekasya pratyaya hetuḥ dharmaḥ neka dharmaḥ bheda abheda pratyaya hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
vibhāga ja tvam vibhāga jānām śabdānām anyonyasya abheda pratyaya hetuḥ
tad itarebhyaḥ ca bheda pratyaya hetuḥ

original: tadidamāha---yato vibhāgajatvāt eṣa pratyayo bhavatīdaṃ vibhāgajaṃ śabdajātam ekam /
analyzed: tat idam āhayataḥ vibhāga ja tvāt eṣa pratyayaḥ bhavati idam vibhāga jam śabda jātam ekam
idam ca tatas anekam bhinnam

original: tatra ya eva ekapratyayahetuḥ dharmo 'bhedaḥ sa eva anekapratyayaheturviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ eva eka pratyaya hetuḥ dharmaḥ bhedaḥ saḥ eva aneka pratyaya hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ
jāti abhiprāyam ca ekavacanam
sat ādiḥ hi dharmaḥ
sāmānya ādibhyaḥ ca śabdam nirbhajati

original: tadidamāha---yataḥ sadādereṣa pratyayo bhavatīdamekaṃ yataśca vibhāgajatvādepa pratyayo bhavatīdamanekamiti,
analyzed: tat idam āha yatas sat ādeḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ bhavati idam ekam yatas ca vibhāga ja tvāt epa pratyayaḥ bhavati idam anekam iti
tasmāt siddham ekam ca anekam ca
anekam iti tad pratyaya hetuḥ upacāreṇa anekaḥ iti
tat diś udbhāṣyam vyākhyānam
atra udāharaṇam āha yathā iti
dravya tva ādi koṭi traya viṣaya saṃśaya pradarśana artham uktam sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyebhyaḥ iti
sat anityam dravyavat kāryām kāraṇam sāmānya viśeṣa vat iti dravya guṇa karmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ
tena anena sat ādinā nirbhaktasya pṛthakkṛtasya iti arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: yad yena sahacaritaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat kkacid dṛśyamānaṃ tat smārayat tadviyaruddhenāpi ca saṃbandhānaniścāyayat saṃśayaheturbhavati,
analyzed: yat yena sahacaritam dṛṣṭam tat kkacid dṛśyamānam tat smārayat ca saṃbandhān aniścāyayat saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati
yathā samānaḥ dharmaḥ

original: asādhāraṇastu dharmo vibhāgajatvaṃ narte śabdāt kkacit pṛthivyādau vā utkṣepaṇādau vā gandhādau vā dṛṣṭa iti kathra smārayet,
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ tu dharmaḥ vibhāga ja tvam na ṛte śabdāt kkacid pṛthivī ādau vā utkṣepaṇa ādau vā gandha ādau vā dṛṣṭaḥ iti kathra smārayet

original: asmārayad vā kathaṃ tatra saṃśayaṃ janayet?
analyzed: asmārayat vā katham tatra saṃśayam janayet

original: tasmāt ko 'yaṃ bhavedityayo dharmāditi jijñāsāmātramutpādayet na tvayaṃ vāyaṃ veti saṃśayamityata āha---na hīti /
analyzed: tasmāt kaḥ yam bhavet iti ayaḥ dharmāt iti jijñāsā mātram utpādayet na tu ayam vā ayam vā iti saṃśayam iti atas āha na hi iti
kasmāt na dṛṣṭam iti atas āha sarvatra asaṃbhavāt
na hi dravya ādeḥ vibhāgataḥ janma saṃbhavati
tad anvaya vyatireka ananuvidhānāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanvata evoktaṃ na saṃśayaheturityataḥ āha---vibhāgajatvaṃ saṃśarye karoti sarvato vyāvṛtteriti /
analyzed: nanu atas eva uktam na saṃśaya hetuḥ iti atas āha vibhāga ja tvam saṃśarye karoti sarvatas vyāvṛtteḥ iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: yadyapi vibhāgajatvaṃ na dravyādau kvacid dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: yadi api vibhāga ja tvam na dravya ādau kvacid dṛṣṭam

original: tathāpi tadvyatirekaḥ pratyekaṃ dravyādau dṛṣṭa iti vibhāgajatvena sadādyaviśeṣavān śabdo dravyakarmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇaḥ,
analyzed: tathā api tad vyatirekaḥ pratyekam dravya ādau dṛṣṭaḥ iti vibhāga ja tvena sat ādya viśeṣavān śabdaḥ dravya karmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kim guṇaḥ
guṇa karmabhyām vyāvartamānaḥ kim dravyam

original: guṇadravyābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ karmeti vyatirekamukhena tattat smārayan asādhāraṇo dharmo bhavati saṃśayakāraṇamiti /
analyzed: guṇa dravyābhyām vyāvartamānaḥ kim karma iti vyatireka mukhena tat tat smārayan asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ bhavati saṃśaya kāraṇam iti
deśayati nanu ca iti
ayam abhisandhiḥ
vaṃśe pāṭyamāne vaṃśa dalayoḥ kriyā
tatas tayoḥ mithas vibhāgaḥ
tatas vaṃśa dala avaruddha nabhaḥ bhāga vibhāgaḥ
saḥ yam vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ na vaṃśa dala karma jaḥ
avayava kriyā hi tad avayava avaruddha nabhaḥ bhāga vibhāga janikā dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga apratidvandvi vibhāga janaka tvena vyāptā vikasat kamala kuṅmala daleṣu
dṛṣṭā

original: na hi tatra tatra mukulitād vikāsi kamalamanyat,
analyzed: na hi tatra tatra mukulitāt vikāsi kamalam anyat
ākuñcita prasārita aṅguli kara tala vat tattvena pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt
vaṃśa dala kriyā api ced tādṛśī
nūnam anayā api dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga a pratidvandvi vibhāga janikayā bhavitavyam

original: tathā ca dravyaṃ kāryamapi na naśyet /
analyzed: tathā ca dravyam kāryam api na naśyet
tasmāt na anayā vaṃśa dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ janayitavyaḥ
na ca anyat asya kāraṇam saṃbhavati
tasmāt vaṃśa dala kriyā janitaḥ dalayoḥ vibhāgaḥ kārya eka artha samavetaḥ tad avaruddha ākāśa pradeśa vibhāgasya asamavāyi kāraṇam eṣitavyaḥ
hetuḥ iti siddham bhavati iti
pariharati an abhyupagata vibhāga ja vibhāgasya etat vibhāga ja tvam evam saṃśaya kāraṇam bhavati

original: anabhyupagamabījaṃ ca kutaḥ punarevadevamavagataṃ padmapatrāvayavakriyā vibhāgadvayajaniketi,
analyzed: anabhyupagama bījam ca kutas punar eva evam avagatam padma patra avayava kriyā vibhāga dvaya janikā iti
vibhāga dvaya krama kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ced
hanta vaṃśa dala vibhāgayoḥ api tulyam
nanu uktam dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga a pratidvandvi vibhāga janakam syāt karma
tatas ca dravya nāśaḥ na bhavet iti

original: athaṃ viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavatīti vaṃśadaladvayakriyaiva vibhāgadvayajanikā,
analyzed: viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti vaṃśa dala dvaya kriyā eva vibhāga dvaya janikā
tad avayava ākāśa vibhāgaḥ tu avayava vibhāga janmā
yadi tu padma patra avayava kriyā ubhaya janikā bhavet
vaṃśa dala kriyā eva dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvinam vibhāgam janayet iti
na ca anyataratra vibhāga dvaya yaugapadya niścayaḥ krama pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ca tulyaḥ
tasmāt padma patra avayava kriyā vibhāga janaka tva saṃdehāt aśakya viniścayaḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ

original: kriyāvailakṣaṇyāt tu svahetuvailakṣaṇyajanmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ syāt,
analyzed: kriyā vailakṣaṇyāt tu sva hetu vailakṣaṇya janmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyam syāt
yat ekaḥ dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvī apratidvandvī ca itaraḥ

original: tathāpi caitadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kriyāyā abhyupetavyam yadekā vibhāgamekaṃ janayati /
analyzed: tathā api ca etat vailakṣaṇyam kriyāyāḥ abhyupetavyam yat ekā vibhāgam ekam janayati
anyā tu vibhāga dvayam iti
tasmāt etad udāharaṇa balena na vibhāga ja vibhāga siddhiḥ
yaḥ tu aṅguli karma anantaram aṅguli taru vibhāgaḥ hasta taru vibhāgaḥ
śarīra taru vibhagāḥ ca daśyate
tatra aṅguli taru vibhāgam aṅguli āśrayā kriyā karotu
hasta taru vibhāgam tu na śaktāḥ janayitum
tasyāḥ sva āśraya samavāyāt
sva āśraya samaveta kārya janane ca kriyāyāḥ sāmarthya avadhāraṇāt

original: tasmāt hastāditaruvibhāgaḥ kriyato 'saṃbhavannaṅgulyāditaruvibhāgameva kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkarotīti vibhāgajavibhāgasiddhiṃ
analyzed: tasmāt hasta ādi taru vibhāgaḥ saṃbhavan aṅguli ādi taru vibhāgam eva kārya ekārtha samavāya lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkaroti iti vibhāga ja vibhāga siddhim
tam pratyāhayaḥ punar iti
astu vā vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: tathāpi vibhāgajatvamīdṛśamasādhāraṇamevetyata āha---astu vā tasya abhyupagatavibhāgasya api vibhāgajatvamasādhāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭam /
analyzed: tathā api vibhāga ja tvam īdṛśam asādhāraṇam eva iti atas āha astu vā tasya abhyupagata vibhāgasya api vibhāga ja tvam asādhāraṇam viśiṣṭam
tat eva deśayati vibhāga jā iti

original: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabdotpattau vaṃśadalayormitho vibhāgo nimittakāraṇam /
analyzed: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabda utpattau vaṃśa dalayoḥ mithas vibhāgaḥ nimitta kāraṇam
vaṃśa dala avaruddha ākāśa vibhāgaḥ tu asya asamavāyi kāraṇam
na tu bherī ākāśa saṃyoga vat vaṃśa dala ākāśa saṃyogaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam bhavitum arhati
tathā hi prayogaḥ
yaḥ yam vaṃśa dala vibhāga nimittaḥ śabdaḥ
sa nimitta samāna jātīya asamavāyi kāraṇa janyaḥ
tad asādhāraṇa nimitta janya śabda tvāt
yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ yad asādhāraṇa nimitta janmā
sa sarvaḥ tad jātīya asamavāyi kāraṇa janyaḥ
yathā bherī daṇḍa saṃyoga nimittaḥ śabdaḥ bherī ākāśa saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇakaḥ
tathā ca ayam
tasmāt tathā iti
tat evam vaṃśa dala vibhāga labdha janmanā vaṃśa dala ākāśa vibhāgena asamavāyi kāraṇena janitaḥ śabdaḥ
tat evam vibhāga ja vibhāga asamavāyi kāraṇaka tvam śabdasya
tat api yadi api aṅguli ākāśa vibhāga ja hasta ākāśa vibhāga asamavāyi kāraṇe kāya ākāśa vibhāge sti

original: tathāpi kāraṇamātravibhāgajavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇakatvāditi hetuḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa vibhāgajatvāt ityanena sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api kāraṇa mātra vibhāga ja vibhāga asamavāyi kāraṇaka tvāt iti hetuḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa vibhāga ja tvāt iti anena sūcitaḥ
na ca aṅguli ākāśa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ kāya ākāśa vibhāgaḥ evam
sa hi kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ
na tu kāraṇa mātra vibhāga pūrvakaḥ
tat idam uktam vibhāga ja vibhāga asamavāyi kāraṇakaḥ śabdaḥ na anyaḥ padārthaḥ iti
nanu sahacaritaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ smārayan viśeṣa saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati

original: na tu yo vyāvṛttaḥ tena sahāsyāsāhacaryāditi śaṅakāmapanetuṃ bhāṣyakārīyamuttaramāha---tulyajātīyeṣvitiṃ /
analyzed: na tu yaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ tena saha asya asāhacaryāt iti śaṅakām apanetum bhāṣya kārīyam uttaram āha tulya jātīyeṣu iti
yadi api vyatireka mukhena asādhāraṇaḥ śaktaḥ smārayitum
tathā api bhāṣya uktam api uktam

original: yat khalu sadādirūpasaṃpannaṃ viśeṣavat tatsamānajātīyebhyo 'samānajātīyabhyaśca vyāvṛttam,
analyzed: yat khalu sat ādi rūpa saṃpannam viśeṣavat tat samāna jātīyebhyaḥ samāna jātīyabhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam
yathā pṛthivī dravyam

original: abādibhyaśca dravyāntarebhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyaśca vijātīyebhyo gandhavattvena vyāvṛttaṃ dravyajātīyam /
analyzed: ap ādibhyaḥ ca dravya antarebhyām guṇa karmabhyaḥ ca vijātīyebhyaḥ gandhavat tvena vyāvṛttam dravya jātīyam
evam rūpa tvena rūpam guṇaḥ
utkṣepaṇa tvena utkṣepaṇam karma

original: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sadādirūpasaṃpanno vibhāgajatvena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo viśiṣyate /
analyzed: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sat ādi rūpa saṃpannaḥ vibhāga ja tvena samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ viśiṣyate

original: tasmād bhavati dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti saṃśaya iti /
analyzed: tasmāt bhavati dravyam guṇaḥ karma vā iti saṃśayaḥ iti
pūrva vyākhyānataḥ neka śabdena asādhāraṇa dharmaḥ lakṣyate iti uktam

original: saṃprati samānaśabdaparyālocanayāpyanekapadamasādhāraṇe vartate lakṣaṇayaivetyāha---samānadharmasya saṃśayakāraṇatvena upayogād veti /
analyzed: saṃprati samāna śabda paryālocanayā api aneka padam asādhāraṇe vartate lakṣaṇayā eva iti āha samāna dharmasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tvena upayogāt vā iti

original: samānaṃ hi pratigogitayā asamānaṃ buddhau sannidhāpayati /
analyzed: samānam hi pratigogitayā asamānam buddhau sannidhāpayati

original: tatra dvayasyāpi samānaśabdena śrutyarthābhyāmupāttasya samānasya dharmasyāsamānasya ca,
analyzed: tatra dvayasya api samāna śabdena śruti arthābhyām upāttasya samānasya dharmasya asamānasya ca
samānasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tvena upayogāt iti yojanā
pṛcchati kasmāt iti

original: asmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: asmad āyatte śabda prayoge kim iti avācakam prayokṣyāmahe iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram na evam iti
asādhāraṇaḥ hi dharmaḥ vyatireka mukhena saṃśaya hetuḥ
sa ca anekasmāt vyāvṛttyā sidhyati

original: sā ca lākṣaṇikānekapadādhīnā nāsamānapadāt labhyata iti prayojanavallākṣaṇikapadopādānam /
analyzed: sā ca lākṣaṇikā aneka pada adhīnā na asamāna padāt labhyate iti prayojanavat lākṣaṇika pada upādānam

original: lakṣaṇaiva ceyam anekasmādvyāvṛtto dharmo 'nekadharma iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti /
analyzed: lakṣaṇā eva ca iyam anekasmāt vyāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ neka dharmaḥ iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti
abhyuccaya mātram āha lāghavam vā iti
asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya kāraṇa tve vyāvṛttiḥ prayojikā iti manvānaḥ codayati yadi aneka iti
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
vyabhicāra avyabhicārau hi saṃśaya nirṇayayoḥ prayojakau
na anvaya vyatireka mātram iti arthaḥ
codayati yadi tarhi iti
sapakṣa asapakṣa sādhāraṇyam hi hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ
sa ced saṃśayasya kāraṇam
hanta
samāna dharma upapattiḥ eva sarvatra saṃśaya kāraṇam iti kṛtam aneka grahaṇena iti arthaḥ
pariharati satyam iti
sapakṣa asapakṣa sādhāraṇyam hi hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ
sa ca saṃśayasya prayojakaḥ
tathā api ekasya anvayaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ parasya vyatirekaḥ iti etāvatā ubhaya upādānam iti arthaḥ
evam aneka dharma upapatteḥ iti sva mate vyākhyāya para mata vyākhyānam dūṣayitum upanyasyati na
iti

original: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavadityekaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī hetuḥ1 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi cāyamaparaḥ pañcarūpopapanno  #
analyzed: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti ekaḥ pañca rūpa upapannaḥ vyabhicārī hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ca ayam aparaḥ pañca rūpa upapannaḥ
vyabhicārī hetuḥ iti
tat etat dūṣayati tat ayuktam iti
na hi avyabhicāriṇau pañca rūpa upapannau iti arthaḥ

original: na cāyaṃ prativādinaḥ prayogo 'pi yuktaḥ iti /
analyzed: na ca ayam prativādinaḥ yuktaḥ iti
viruddha śabdasya arthaḥ viruddha arthaḥ iti
svarūpam anayoḥ viruddham paraspara abhāvavat iti arthaḥ

saṃśayasya hi viśeṣa adarśanam janakam

sa ced tvad mate nivartakāt utpadyata
avyabhicāri hetu janitāt viśeṣa darśanāt na asya nivṛttiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ

original: na ca yadā nivartakatvamasyāsti tadā janakamapītyāha---na hi viśeṣadarśane satīti //
analyzed: na ca yadā nivartaka tvam asya asti tadā janakam api iti āha na hi viśeṣa darśane sati iti
syāt etat

original: pratyakṣameva sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityevamākāraṃ pratyabhijñāsamājñātaṃ śabdasya sthemānamākalayat,
analyzed: pratyakṣam eva saḥ eva ayam gakāraḥ iti evam ākāram pratyabhijñā samājñātam śabdasya sthemānam ākalayat
tāvatkālam sthiram ca enam kaḥ paścāt nāśayiṣyati

original: iti nityatvaṃ paricchetsyatītyata āha---nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: iti nitya tvam paricchetsyati iti atas āhana ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ

original: tadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ saṃśayasya nivartakaṃ yadananyathāsiddham,
analyzed: tat eva hi pratyakṣam saṃśayasya nivartakam yat ananyathāsiddham
yathā auṣṇya grāhi vahneḥ

original: idaṃ tu sādṛśyenāpi saṃbhavāt svayaṃ sandigdhaṃ sanna saṃśayocchedāyālamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: idam tu sādṛśyena api saṃbhavāt svayam sandigdham sat na saṃśaya ucchedāya alam iti arthaḥ
mā bhūt pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ
bhavati tu āgamasya
no khalu kṣaṇikaḥ śabdaḥ rtha pratyāyane samarthaḥ
tasya anvaya vyatireka kāla anavasthāyino śakya samaya tvena artha pratipatteḥ anupapatteḥ
tasmāt yadi api sākṣāt nityaḥ ham iti āgamaḥ na abhidhatte
tathā api vidita saṃgateḥ artha pratyayam kurvan ātmanaḥ nitya tām ākṣipan nitya tā viṣayaḥ bhavati
yathā āhuḥ
nityaḥ tu syāt darśanasya parārtha tvāt
iti atas āhana āgama viṣayaḥ
yadi api varṇa vyaktayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ

original: tathāpi svasvasāmānyaviśeṣagatvādyupahitā gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānāḥ śakyasaṃketā iti na nityatāmākṣipatyāgama ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api sva sva sāmānya viśeṣa ga tva ādi upahitāḥ gavādi vyaktayaḥ iva go tva ādi upadhānāḥ śakya saṃketāḥ iti na nitya tām ākṣipati āgamaḥ iti arthaḥ
bhavatu kim naḥ bādhyate iti

original: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇasadasadbhāvasandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācidapyucchettumasmadādīnāmityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇa sat asat bhāva sandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācid api ucchettum asmat ādīnām iti arthaḥ
katham na bādhyate iti

original: sandigdhanityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham /
analyzed: sandigdha nitya anitya bhāve śabde kṛtaka tvam dṛṣṭam iti na anitya tvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham
tathā ca na buddhi ādīnām anitya tvam sādhayitum arhati iti arthaḥ
sarvam iti
kṛtaka tva prayatna nāntarīyaka tva pratyaya bheda bhedi tva ādi iti arthaḥ
sarvam ca anumānam iti
yadi ca pañca rūpaḥ pi hetuḥ
saṃśaya kāraṇam sarvam eva anumānam iti sarvam apramāṇam syāt iti arthaḥ
vaināśikāḥ prāhuḥ nitya asaṃbhavāt iti
na bādhā parijñānāt iti
bādhā viṣaya aparijñānāt iti arthaḥ

original: sautrāntikamate hi rūpaṃ sapratighamiṣyate mūrtaṃ ca,
analyzed: sautrāntika mate hi rūpam sa pratigham iṣyate mūrtam ca

original: nitya eveti vā anitya eveti vā abhilāpo nopapadyeta,
analyzed: nityaḥ eva iti vā anityaḥ eva iti vā abhilāpaḥ na upapadyeta

original: sthāṇureveti vā puruṣa eveti vā abhilāpaḥ /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ eva iti vā puruṣaḥ eva iti vā abhilāpaḥ
codayati na evam bhaviṣyati iti
mā bhūt abhilāpaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati vyāhatam iti
saḥ eva eka granthena āha nanu ca iti
tat evam pañca rūpayoḥ hetvoḥ ekatra samavāya abhāvaḥ uktaḥ
yadi punar asat pratipakṣa rūpa rahitayoḥ ekatra saṃbhavaḥ ṅgīkriyate

nirākaroti tathā api iti
militayoḥ tu asādhāraṇa tvam
tādṛśaḥ anyatra adarśanāt iti arthaḥ
tat kim idānīm sat pratipakṣa tayā kṛtaka tvam asādhanam eva śabda anitya tve

original: tathā ca bahu vyāhataṃ bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati---yadā punarevaṃbhūtāviti /
analyzed: tathā ca bahu vyāhatam bhavati iti āśayavān pṛcchati yadā punar evaṃbhūtau iti
uttaram tadā tayoḥ iti

original: nanu kṛtakatvasya sādhyatvāt śrāvaṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt prathamabhāvinā nityatvānumānena
analyzed: nanu kṛtaka tvasya sādhya tvāt śrāvaṇa tvasya ca siddha tvāt prathama bhāvinā nitya tva anumānena
siddhāṅgakena apahṛta viṣayam carama bhāvi sādhyaṅgakam anitya tva anumānam eva bādhyatām iti atas
āha yatnaḥ ca kriyamāṇaḥ iti

original: siddhamapi śravaṇatvamanumānasikatādyanityadharmasādhāraṇatayā savyabhicāraṃ sannityatvasya sādhanaṃ na bhavitumarhatoti /
analyzed: siddham api śravaṇa tvam anumāna sikatā ādi anitya dharma sādhāraṇa tayā savyabhicāram sat nitya tvasya sādhanam na bhavitum arhati iti
kṛtaka tvasya tu pāñcarupyam
nitya tvasya ca pramāṇa bādhanam upapādayiṣyate iti arthaḥ
vipratipatteḥ iti asya vyākhyānam vipratipatteḥ iti
yadi api viruddhā pratipattiḥ jñānam vipratipattiḥ

original: tathāpi tasyā vādiprativādigatāyā atyantaparokṣatvāt saṃśayakāraṇatvānupapatteḥ svakāryaṃ pravādaṃ lakṣayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api tasyāḥ vādi prativādi gatāyāḥ atyanta parokṣa tvāt saṃśaya kāraṇa tva anupapatteḥ sva kāryam pravādam lakṣayati iti arthaḥ

original: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhyavyavasthāyā anupalabdhavyavasthāyāśca pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhi avyavasthāyāḥ anupalabdha vyavasthāyāḥ ca pṛthak saṃśaya kāraṇa tvam

original: matvā samānadharmopapatterityanena gatārthatāṃ pariharannāha sma---purvaḥ samāno 'nekaścetyādi /
analyzed: matvā samāna dharma upapatteḥ iti anena gatārtha tām pariharan āha sma purvaḥ samānaḥ na ekaḥ ca ityādi
tat upanyasya vārttikakāraḥ dūṣayati tatra iti
no khalu samāna aneka dharma upalabdhau satyām

original: satyāṃ ca viśeṣasmṛtau sādhakabādhakapramāṇāsadbhāve saṃśayo bhavatītyuktam /

viśeṣam api dūṣayati samānaḥ iti
nanu yadi na asita bhedaḥ

original: tat kimidānī sarveṣāṃ jñātṛsthatvāviśeṣaṇa trayāṇāmapi saṃśayakāraṇānāṃ samānānekavipratipattīnāmabhedaḥ,

tathā ca pṛthak upādāna vaiyarthyam iti atas āha samāna aneka dharmayoḥ iti
punar codayati samāna dharmaḥ sarvaḥ eva ayam iti
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: na vayaṃ sarvatra sādhāraṇamapajānīmahe anvayavyatirekavyabhicāravaktṛgatatvabhedamātramādriyamāṇāḥ kāraṇabhedena trividhaṃ saṃśayamācakṣmahe  #

original: api caitayoḥ pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatve 'tiprasaṅgāt niścayapūrvaṃ na pravarteta lokaḥ,

original: na cānabhyāsadaśānne upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthayāṃ saṃśaya iti vācyam,

original: sāmagrībhedena bhede trevidhyaṃ saṃśayasya sāmagrīniveśikāraṇabhedena tu pañcavidhaḥ,
