atha iti
kaḥ ca asau viśeṣaḥ ca iti kiṃviśeṣaḥ anupalabdha pūrvaḥ

original: upalabdhapūrvāyāṃ vyaktau saṃśaye tadgatā viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tajjātīyavyaktyantarasaṃśaye tvanyagatāste sāmānyadvāreṇopalabdhā eveti---sāmānyapratyakṣāditi
analyzed: upalabdha pūrvāyām vyaktau saṃśaye tad gatāḥ viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tad jātīya vyakti antara saṃśaye tu anya gatāḥ te sāmānya dvāreṇa upalabdhāḥ eva iti sāmānya pratyakṣāt iti
samānyavān eva sāmānyaḥ
yathā sāmānyaḥ yam dharma setuḥ nṛpāṇām
iti sāmānyaḥ ca asau pratyakṣaḥ ca iti dharmī tathā uktaḥ
bauddha abhimatam saṃśaya lakṣaṇam upanyasyati anye tu iti
nigūḍha abhiprāyaḥ dūṣayati taiḥ api iti
avidita abhiprāyaḥ śaṅkate dharmī ced iti
dūṣaṇa vādī sva abhiprāyam uddhāṭayati yadi tāvat iti

original: bauddhānāṃ hi rāddhānte na rūpādidharmāśrayaḥ kaścidasti dharmī /
analyzed: bauddhānām hi rāddhānte na rūpa ādi dharma āśrayaḥ kaścid asti dharmī
tatas ca siddhānta vyākopaḥ

original: yadi tvāha bhavatu rāddhāntavyākopo na hi śāstrāśrayo vāda iti,
analyzed: yadi tu āha bhavatu rāddhānta vyākopaḥ na hi śāstra āśrayaḥ vādaḥ iti
tatra api doṣa antaram āha dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca iti
atha api asmad diśā iti
samāna aneka dharma pada vat bahuvrīhiḥ iti arthaḥ
sāmānya śabdaḥ tu bhavitari dṛṣṭaḥ yathā
sāmānya artha samutthāne vibhāgaḥ tu samaḥ smṛtaḥ
iti bhāvaḥ
vyartham ca abhidhānam iti

original: sāmānyaviśeṣatadvadabhyupagame 'pi tadvato 'śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti gamyeta,
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣa tadvat abhyupagame śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣāḥ iti gamyeta

original: na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti viruddhārthamabhidhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣāḥ iti viruddha artham abhidhānam syāt iti arthaḥ
vaiśeṣika lakṣaṇe hi viśeṣa apratyakṣāt iti anena sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvaḥ darśitaḥ
iha tu asau vaktavyaḥ
tasmāt nyūnam bauddha lakṣaṇam iti āha aupalabdhi ityādi
yadi ca sādharmya darśanāt iti anena anvaya mātra vyabhicāraḥ bhimataḥ bauddhena tatas neka dharma darśanāt iti vaktavyam iti
tat evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam ekam
trīṇi ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni iti sthitam
tat etāni catvāri lakṣaṇāni
jīkṛtya vicārayati samāna iti

original: yadi tāvat saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tataḥ saṃśayatvenopagṛhītānāṃ trayāṇāṃ parasparavyavacchedakamātraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: yadi tāvat saṃśaya sāmānya lakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni tatas saṃśaya tvena upagṛhītānām trayāṇām paraspara vyavacchedaka mātram lakṣaṇam
tatas samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ iti etāvat mātram vaktavyam
kṛtam atra śeṣeṇa
tad mātrāt eva paraspara vyavaccheda siddheḥ
tasmāt paraspara vyavacchedam an a prekṣya saṃśaya kāraṇa kathana param etat sūtram

original: tathā cānyānyapi saṃśayakāraṇāni santīti tānyapi vaktavyāni /
analyzed: tathā ca anyāni api saṃśaya kāraṇāni santi iti tāni api vaktavyāni
yadā khalu ayam ātmanaḥ śama ādau saṃśete
kim aham candana vanitā ādi sannidhāne rajye virajye vā iti

original: so 'yamasyātmanaḥ sannikarṣajanmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya śamāderviṣayasyeti samādhatte---astu tāvaditi /
analyzed: saḥ yamasya ātmanaḥ sannikarṣa janmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya śama ādeḥ viṣayasya iti samādhatte astu tāvat iti
yadi api tāvat mātreṇa samāna jātīya vyavaccheda siddhiḥ
tathā api vijātīya nirṇaya ādi vyavacchedāya sāmānya lakṣaṇam anuvartanīyam

original: tathā ca pratipattigauravaṃ syāditi tallāghavāya śeṣāpekṣā yuktā /
analyzed: tathā ca pratipatti gauravam syāt iti tad lāghavāya śeṣa apekṣā yuktā
ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa ādayaḥ tu atyanta sādhāraṇāḥ vijātīya vyavacchedāya api na alam iti na upattāḥ iti bhāvaḥ
evam saṃśaya kāraṇa avadhāraṇāt arthāt saṃśaya bheda avadhāraṇam iti uktam
saṃprati kāraṇa viśeṣaṇa tvena saṃśaya svarūpam eva ucyate iti aha svarūpa nirdeśaḥ vā iti

original: vipratipanno 'pi puruṣaḥ saṃdigdhavat pratipādya evati manvānaścodayati---saṃśayavaditi /
analyzed: vipratipannaḥ pi puruṣaḥ saṃdigdha vat pratipādyaḥ eva iti manvānaḥ codayati saṃśaya vat iti
vipratipannaḥ na śiṣyaḥ

original: kiṃ tu jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ śiṣyato nītvā sandigdha eva pratipādya ityabhiprāyeṇa pariharati---satyamiti //23 //
analyzed: kim tu jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām śiṣyataḥ nītvā sandigdhaḥ eva pratipādyaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa pariharati satyam iti
yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
uddeśa krama prāptasya prayojanasya lakṣaṇam yamanam
atra artha śabdaḥ gauṇa mukhya prayojana avarodha arthaḥ
tatra mukhyam sukha duḥkha āpita parihārau
gauṇam tu tad sādhanam
atra bhāṣyam yam artham ityādi
atra adhikṛtya ityasya vyākhyānam vyavasāya niniścitya iti arthaḥ
samādhanau ca sukha duḥkha āpti parihārau arthaḥ

original: na ca sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārau svarūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttigocarāviti tadupāyapravṛttyaiva cetanapravṛttigocarāviti darśayati---tadāptihānopāyamanutiṣṭhatīti
analyzed: na ca sukha duḥkha prāpti parihārau sva rūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛtti gocarau iti tad upāya pravṛttyā eva cetana pravṛtti gocarau iti darśayati tad āpti hāna upāyam anutiṣṭhati iti
pravṛtti hetu tvāt iti
yadi api sukha duḥkha āpti hāne tad upāyāḥ ca santi
tathā api sāmānyena jñāyamānāni icchā ādi upahāra mukhena pravṛtti hetavaḥ
nanu sūtre dhikṛtya iti asti
bhāṣye ca vyavasāya iti

original: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha---vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāra ityādi /
analyzed: tat kutas na virodhaḥ iti atas āha vyavasāyaḥ ṛthasya adhikāraḥ ityādi
tat etat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe iyam artham adhikṛtya iti
vyavasāya iti
pṛcchati kasya iti sukha daḥkha āpti parihārayoḥ vyavasāyaḥ tatra eva pravartayet
na ca anayoḥ pravṛtti yogya tā
na ca anya niścayaḥ nyatra pravartayati
atiprasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram sukha duḥkha sādhanānām iti
tatas ca pratīti pravṛttyoḥ saṃpratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ
sarva vyāpi tām asya darśayati anena prayojanena iti
vitaṇḍāyāḥ api prayojanam uktam prathama sūtre
codyamānasya pravarttamānasya iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate yadi iti
lokyate nena iti lokaḥ pramāṇam
tad anvitaḥ tad utpannaḥ
na ca pramāṇam īdṛśam
anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
ati doṣaḥ yam iti

original: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇopapannatā na cānavasthā,
analyzed: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇa upapanna tā na ca anavasthā
tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate

original: na ca prasiddhataratayā na prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam,
analyzed: na ca prasiddhatara tayā na prayojanam lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam
katham asya prayuktau sādhana tvam
kva ca prayojayati
katham ca vyāpakam iti sarvasya parīkṣaka pravedanīya tvāt
atha anyaḥ iti
a prāmāṇikaḥ laukikaḥ iti
yathā vaṭe vaṭe vaiśravaṇaḥ
iti
nirākaroti tat na budhyāmahe iti
prayojanasya prāmāṇika tvāt iti arthaḥ
yat api uktam nyāyasya aṅgam prayojanam na bhavati
tasmāt na vaktavyam iti
tat na yuktam

original: yā khalu niṣprayojaneti na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgamityapi,
analyzed: yā khalu niṣprayojanā iti na brūmaḥ prayojanam nyāyasya aṅgam iti api

original: mukhyaṃ prayojanameva hi tanna syād yadṛte puruṣādanyārthamiti /
analyzed: mukhyam prayojanam eva hi tat na syāt yat ṛte puruṣāt anya artham iti

original: prayojanavāṃstu nyāyo niṣprayojanāṃ tadgatāṃ cintāmaṅgī karoti,
analyzed: prayojanavān tu nyāyaḥ niṣprayojanām tad gatām cintām aṅgī karoti
phalavat sannidhau aphalam tat aṅgam iti nyāyāt

original: tasmādanaṅgamapi prayojanaṃ parīkṣāyā mūlaṃ svarga iva setikartavyatākasya yāgādyanuṣṭhānasyeti siddham //24 //
analyzed: tasmāt anaṅgam api prayojanam parīkṣāyāḥ mūlam svargaḥ iva sa itikartavya tākasya yāga ādi anuṣṭhānasya iti siddham

original: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: laukika parīkṣa dāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ
krama prāptam dṛṣṭāntam lakṣayati laukintaḥ
śeṣam lakṣaṇam
sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvi tvena āryate tathā sādhya vaidharmyāt a tad dharma bhāvi tvena āryate yaḥ saḥ rthaḥ tasmin
tathā ca na ativyāptiḥ
udāharaṇa sūtrāt ca īdṛśa viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ
loka sāmānyam kim tat iti atas āha naisargikam iti
śāstra pariśīlana labdha janmā buddhi atiśayaḥ vainayikaḥ
tad rahitāḥ laukikāḥ pratipādyāḥ iti tāvat

original: tadviparītāḥ tadubhayaṃsapannāśca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakā iti yāvat kathābahutvācca bahuvayanam /
analyzed: tad viparītāḥ tad ubhayaṃsapannāḥ ca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakāḥ iti yāvat kathā bahutvāt ca bahu vayanam
tat anena vādi prativādinau darśitau
tayoḥ buddhi sāmyam vyācaṣṭe yathā yam artham iti
lakṣaṇa prayojanam āha dṛṣṭānta virodhena iti
dṛṣṭāntasya virodhaḥ viruddha tvam sādhya vikala tva ādi
pratipakṣāḥ iti pratipakṣa sādhanāni
samādhiḥ abhūta dośa āropasya pratiṣedhaḥ

original: lakṣitaśca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇalakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam /
analyzed: lakṣitaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇa lakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam
atra vārttikakāraḥ laukika parīkṣaka svarūpam avivakṣitam iti manvānaḥ āha buddhi sāmya iti
avivakṣāyāḥ prayojanam anvaya vyatirekābhyām āha evam ca iti
pareṣā dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa kṣepam upanyasya dūṣayati saḥ yam dṛṣṭānte iti
dṛṣṭāntasya prayojanam āha dṛṣṭāntaḥ sārūpya vyutpatti arthaḥ
yathā ākṣeptrā uktam tat tat akṣaram anūdya dūṣayati asiddha sādhana arthaḥ vā iti

original: na khalvasiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasyāvinābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate ityarthaḥ//25 //
analyzed: na khalu asiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasya avinābhāvaḥ dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate

original: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ siddhāntasāmānyalakṣaṇamapaṭhitvaiva tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---atha siddhāntaḥ ityādinā /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ siddhānta sāmānya lakṣaṇam a paṭhitvā eva tātparyam vyācaṣṭe atha siddhāntaḥ ityādinā

original: tatra idamitthaṃbhūtamiti vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---idamiti sāmānyata iti /
analyzed: tatra idam itthaṃbhūtam iti vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe idam iti sāmānyatas iti

original: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiritthaṃbhāvavyastheti sāmānyopakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇato viśeṣaparyantatāparisamāptiḥ saṃsthitirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāva vyasthā iti sāmānya upakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇataḥ viśeṣa paryanta tā parisamāptiḥ saṃsthitiḥ iti arthaḥ
atra eva arthe sūtram iti āha vārttikakāraḥ asya arthasya iti
tantra antaḥ
sūtra artham ākṣipati kim punar iti
lakṣaṇa artha ca iti
sāmānya lakṣaṇa artham

original: na khalu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa śakyo vibhāga ityuktam//26 //
analyzed: na khalu sāmānya lakṣaṇam antareṇa śakyaḥ vibhāga
sarva tantra prati tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti arthāntara bhāvāt
samādhatte enā anārṣam iti
tantrī ante vyutpādyante prameyāṇi anena iti tantram pramāṇam

original: tadevādhikaraṇam āśrayo jñāpakatvena yeṣāmarthānāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
analyzed: tat eva adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ jñāpaka tvena yeṣām arthānām te tathā uktāḥ
a śāstritaḥ apramāṇikaḥ iti arthaḥ
ābhimānikam ca prāmāṇika tvam
tena siddhānta bhedinām arthānām sarveṣām na prāmāṇika tva prasaṅgaḥ
tat evam bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyāya sāmānya lakṣaṇam paṭhitam
evam vyākhyāna pūrvakam eva vibhāga sūtram paṭhati tantra artha saṃsthitiḥ iti
tantra grahanena ca sarva tantra prati tantrayoḥ upādānam
ubhayoḥ api tantra tvāt
tat idam uktam tantra bhedāt tu iti
anavadhārita artha parigrahe iti

original: sākṣācchāstre nopātto yathā manasa indriyabhāva iti //27 //
analyzed: sākṣāt śāstre na upāttaḥ yathā manasaḥ indriya bhāvaḥ iti
sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ tantre dhi kṛtaḥ rthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ
sarvantaḥ yadi api ghrāṇa ādiṣu bhautika tva abhautika tva ādayaḥ vipratipattayaḥ
tathā api indriya tve na asti vipratipattiḥ iti
tat etat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe sarveṣām iti
atra codayati na dṛṣṭāntāt iti
pariharati bhidyate iti
na ca evam sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ
tasya sarvaiḥ eva niścita tvāt iti
anumāna āgamayoḥ iti
saṃbandha grahaṇa āśrayau anumāna āgamau

original: yatra ca saṃbandhagrahaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ //28 //
analyzed: yatra ca saṃbandha grahaḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ
samāna tantra siddhaḥ para tantra asiddhaḥ
samāna tantra siddhaḥ para tantra asiddhaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ
samā antaḥ samāna śabdaḥ eka paryāyaḥ
naiyāyikānām hi samānam tantram nyāya śāstram
paratantram ca sāṃkhya ādi śāstram

original: cetanā ātmanaḥ niratiśayā apariṇāmino na kenacid dharmeṇopajanāpāyadharmeṇa yujyante /
analyzed: cetanāḥ ātmanaḥ niratiśayāḥ apariṇāminaḥ na kenacid dharmeṇa upajana apāya dharmeṇa yujyante

original: prākṛteṣu ca dehādiṣu tatkāraṇeṣu mahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātrabhūtasūkṣmeṣu viśeṣo 'tiśaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prākṛteṣu ca deha ādiṣu tad kāraṇeṣu mahat ahaṅkāra pañca tanmātra bhūta sūkṣmeṣu viśeṣaḥ atiśayaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat etat sūtram vārttikakṛt vyācaṣṭe sāmānyena iti
yogānām eva
sāṃkhyānām eva iti niyamaḥ
yad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhiḥ saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ

original: yat---ntaḥ//30// yasyārthasya sādhyasya vā hetorvā siddhau iti viṣayasaptamī,
analyzed: yasya arthasya sādhyasya vā hetoḥ vā siddhau iti viṣaya saptamī
na tu nimitta saptamī
dvayoḥ jñāyamānayoḥ nimitta naimittika bhāva ayogāt
tena yasmin arthe jñāyamāne tad anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ rthāḥ tad antarbhāvinaḥ gamyante
saḥ rthaḥ sākṣāt adhikriyamāṇaḥ tad anuṣaṅgiṇām ca ādhāraḥ tad āśraya tvāt tad siddheḥ

original: sa pakṣo vā bhavatu heturvā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: sa pakṣaḥ vā bhavatu hetuḥ vā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ
pakṣaḥ tāvat yathā vivāda adhyāsitam upalabdhimat kāraṇam utpattimat tvāt tastra ādi vat iti

original: atra hi pṛthivyādigatenotpattimattena upalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ tadgataṃ sādhyamānaṃ svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyupetameva sidhyati,
analyzed: atra hi pṛthivī ādi gatena utpattimat tena upalabdhimat pūrvakatvam tad gatam sādhyamānam sva siddhi antargata anuṣaṅgi sarvajña tva ādi upetam eva sidhyati
na anyathā iha upalabdhimat pūrvakatvasya siddhiḥ iti
bhāṣye hetu pratisandhānam sidhyat anuṣaṅgi artha antara anvitam
tat etat sarva avarodha artham vārttikakṛt āha vākya artha iti
hetuḥ īdṛśaḥ pakṣaḥ ca vākya arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: pūrvo 'rtho yaḥ sākṣāddhikṛtaḥ tasya siddhāvantargata iti bhāṣyārthaḥ//30 //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ rthaḥ yaḥ sākṣāt hi kṛtaḥ tasya siddhau antargataḥ iti
atha abhyupagama siddhānta sūtram apantaḥ
tat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe aparīkṣitaḥ sūtritaḥ iti
sūtritasya prāyeṇa parīkṣā saṃbandhāt
manasaḥ hi indri tvena āsūtritasya api indriya tva abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇa adhikaraṇaḥ yatas
tasmāt ayam abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ
sūtram ca evam cojanīyam
asūtrita abhyupagamāt hetoḥ yatas tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam kriyate
tasmāt viśeṣa parīkṣaṇāt jñāyate asūtritam api abhyupagatam sūtrakāreṇa
saḥ yamasya abhyupagamaḥ bhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti

original: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāravyākhyānaṃ dūṣayati---śāstrānabhyupagata iti /
analyzed: evam sva matena sūtram vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāra vyākhyānam dūṣayati śāstra anabhyupagataḥ iti
pramāṇīkṛtena śāstreṇa ananujñātaḥ pramāṇa anadhīnaḥ iti arthaḥ
pramāṇa tāntra abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti hi siddhānta sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: na ca pramāṇānadhīnābhyupagamastadanvetīti nāyamīdṛśo 'bhyupagamasiddhānto bhavitumarhatīti hṛdi nidhāyāyuktāpi darśitā /
analyzed: na ca pramāṇa anadhīna abhyupagamaḥ tat anveti iti na ayam īdṛśaḥ bhyupagama siddhāntaḥ bhavitum arhati iti hṛdi nidhāya ayuktā api darśitā

original: ajñaṃ pratyasadācāratvāt pramāṇikaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyaśakyatvāt buddhimato 'vajñānasyāyuktatvāt aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ajñam prati asat ācāra tvāt pramāṇikam ca puruṣam prati aśakya tvāt buddhimataḥ ayukta tvāt aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ
sarvaḥ eva ayam pakṣaḥ iti
sarva tantra prati tantra siddhāntau tāvat sākṣāt abhyupagamyamānau sva mukhena eva pakṣa tayā abhidhīyete
adhikaraṇa abhyupagamau ca sākṣāt anabhyupagamyamānau api arthāt abhyupagantavyau iti arthāpattyā pakṣau iti arthaḥ
nanu yadi upapannaḥ pramāṇa tayā abhyupagamaḥ siddhāntaḥ

original: tarhi siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ prāmāṇikatvena viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitā bhāvāḥ prasajyerannityata āha---tatpratyayāt /
analyzed: tarhi siddhānta bhedinām arthānām prāmāṇika tvena viruddha dharma samāliṅgitāḥ bhāvāḥ prasajyeran iti atas āha tad pratyayāt
tasya pramāṇa upapanna karma tvasya pratyayāt abhimānāt iti arthaḥ
pakṣaḥ iti
vyaktīkaraṇe iti asmāt vyutpannam

original: karmatayā vyajyamānatayā vā upādānaṃ svārthasya pakṣa iti padam /
analyzed: karmatayā vyajyamāna tayā vā upādānam svārthasya pakṣaḥ iti padam
upādīyate nena iti vyutpattyā
kriyā sādhane iti pradhāna kriyā sādhane

original: kriyāviśeṣayukta iti avāntaravyāpārayukte tena hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ vaicitryaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa yukte iti avāntara vyāpāra yukte tena hi pradhāna kriyāyām kārakāṇām vaicitryam bhavati iti
yaḥ ca asau nyāyasya abhyupagamaḥ iti
yāvat abhyupagatam nyāyyasya sādhanam nyāyaḥ iti
tau abhyupagatam bhavati prameya sādhanam pramāṇam iti

original: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tadāśrayo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
analyzed: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tad āśrayaḥ bhyupagataḥ bhavati
tasmāt ubhayathā api sarva tantra siddhānta anapahnavaḥ iti arthaḥ
atha saṃgrahaḥ pakṣa śabdena iti

original: yathā daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍasaṃbandhopahitasīmānaḥ samānāsamānajātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante,
analyzed: yathā daṇḍi śabdena daṇḍa saṃbandha upahita sīmānaḥ samāna asamāna jātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante

original: tathā pakṣaśabdenāpītyarthaḥ ayaṃ tu kalpaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntāvyāpakatvakathanenaivārthādapākṛta iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tathā pakṣa śabdena api iti arthaḥ ayam tu kalpaḥ sarva tantra siddhānta avyāpaka tva kathanena eva arthāt apākṛtaḥ iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ
pakṣa śabdaḥ hi vyajyamāna tva upādhi nibandhana pravṛttiḥ

original: na ca vyajyamānatvamasti nisargavyakte sarvatantrasiddhānta iti bhāva /
analyzed: na ca vyajyamāna tvam asti nisarga vyakte sarva tantra siddhānte iti bhāva
vākya artha pratipattau iti

original: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojananiṣedho 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojana niṣedhaḥ rthaḥ
tasmāt tad viparīta rātri bhojana vidhiḥ arthāpattiḥ loka siddhā

original: sā ca na yathā pramāṇāntarulaṃ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
analyzed: sā ca na yathā tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate
tat anena prabandhena bhadanta dignāga uditāni dūṣaṇāni
pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ
prativāḥ vārttikakāraḥ sūtra tātparyam āha avayavānām iti
nanu avayava sāmānya lakṣaṇam antareṇa aśakyaḥ vibhāga uddeśaḥ
tad viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca
na ca idam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāga paratvāt iti atas āha sūtram
vibhāga param api etat arthāt avayava sāmānya lakṣaṇam sūcayati iti sūtram

original: anyaparādapi vākyāt pratīyamāno 'rtho 'pekṣita svīkriyata eveti śābdāḥ /
analyzed: anya parāt api vākyāt pratīyamānaḥ svīkriyate eva iti śābdāḥ
tatra avayava padāt eva sāmānya lakṣaṇam avagamyate
avayava tvena eka vākya tā darśitā
sā ca padānām parasparam asaṃpratyāyi tā apekṣita saṃbandha yogya artha pratyayena bhavati

original: tasmāt tathāvidhārthapratyāyanameva pratijñādīnāmavayavasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ siddhamiti sūtramityanena darśitaṃ vārttikakṛtā iti /
analyzed: tasmāt tathāvidha artha pratyāyanam eva pratijñā ādīnām avayava sāmānya lakṣaṇam siddham iti sūtram iti anena darśitam vārttikakṛtā iti
vibhāga uddeśa tātparyam āha vibhāga iti
tri avayava grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham
dvi avayavam iti api draṣṭavyam
atra bhāṣyam tatra apratīyamānaḥ iti
sāmānyena avagata dharmiṇi viśeṣaṇa agnimat tva ādinā sandigdhe
agnimat tva ādi tattva avadhāraṇam pratyayaḥ
tasya arthaḥ prayojanam hāna upādāna upekṣa buddhayaḥ

original: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyayasādhanānusaraṇadvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśayatattvajñānayorviśeṣagatā na tu svarūpagatā,
analyzed: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyaya sādhana anusaraṇa dvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśaya tattva jñānayoḥ viśeṣa gatā na tu svarūpa gatā
saṃśaya anantarayā jijñāsayā saṃśayasya vyavadhānāt
śakyam prameyam
tasmin prāptiḥ śakta tā pramāṇānām pramātuḥ ca
sā ca svarūpa sahakāribhyām dvedhā
tām imām bhāṣyakāraḥ nayā vacaḥ bhaṅgyā darśayati prakātaḥ pramāṇāni iti
pratijñā ādi vat iti
vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntāḥ
pratipakṣepa varṇanam iti
yadi śabdaḥ nityaḥ syāt

original: na syāt kṛtaka iti anityatvasya nityatvaṃ pratipakṣaḥ /
analyzed: na syāt kṛtakaḥ iti anitya tvasya nitya tvam pratipakṣaḥ
tasmin hetu abhāva upavarṇanam na ca ayam akṛtakaḥ iti
tad upavarṇana pratiṣedhe sati tattva jñāna abhyanujñāna artham
tattvam jñāyate nena iti tattva jñānam pramāṇam
tad abhyanujñāna artham saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ tarka apara nāmā

original: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇābhyanujñānadvāreṇa itikartavyatābhūtena saṃśaṃya iti /
analyzed: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇa abhyanujñāna dvāreṇa itikartavya tā bhūtena saṃśaṃyaḥ iti

original: tadetad bhāṣyajātaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ vārttikakṛd vyācaṣṭe---kathaṃ punariti /
analyzed: tat etat bhāṣya jātam praśna pūrvakam vārttikakṛt vyācaṣṭe katham punar iti
na punar jijñāsā ādayaḥ para pratipādakāḥ śabdāt avagatāḥ santaḥ
atha mā bhūvan para pratipādakāḥ

original: svapratipādakā eva kasmāt na bhavantītyata āha---niścitatvācceti /
analyzed: sva pratipādakāḥ eva kasmāt na bhavanti iti atas āha niścita tvāt ca iti
sādhanāt eva gamyate prāpyate
prāptam ca jñāyate iti arthaḥ
śakya prāptiḥ ca jñāyate iti arthaḥ

original: tat kiṃ sarvathaivānaṅgaṃ jijñāsādaya ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakatā,
analyzed: tat kim sarvathā eva anaṅgam jijñāsā ādayaḥ iti atas uktam bhāṣyaka tā
prakaraṇe tu jijñāsā ādayaḥ samarthāḥ iti
tat anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe prakaraṇe tu iti
prakaraṇam kathā pravṛttiḥ
tad utthāpakāḥ jijñāsā ādayaḥ vayavāḥ aṅgan iti arthaḥ

original: te ca jijñāsādaya utpannāḥ prakaraṇasyotthāpakāḥ svarūpeṇa,
analyzed: te ca jijñāsā ādayaḥ utpannāḥ prakaraṇasya utthāpakāḥ sva rūpeṇa

original: na punaḥ svajñānena yena śabdapratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe 'pyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ,
analyzed: na punar sva jñānena yena śabda pratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe pi aṅgam bhaveyuḥ
yathā pratijñā ādayaḥ sva jñānena sva arthān pratipādayantaḥ
tasmāt sarvathā eva vijñāsa ādi vācaka pada prayogaḥ narthakaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
atas eva āha para pratipādaka tvāt iti
tuśabdaḥ jijñāsā ādibhyaḥ vyavacchinatti
tri avayam api iti apinā dvi avayava niṣedham samuccinoti
upanaya nigamanayoḥ iti atra pratijñāyāḥ api iti
sādhya jñā parigṛhyate nena iti parigrahaḥ
sa ca vacanam ca iti parigraha vacanam
udāharaṇam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
tat ākṣipya vārttikakāraḥ samādhatte siddha tvāt iti
agnimān eva na a tadvān na asya agninā idānīm ayogaḥ

original: sa ca parvate 'gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo niyamo 'rthāt sidhyati /
analyzed: sa ca parvate gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ paraspara saṃbandha lakṣaṇaḥ niyamaḥ arthāt sidhyati
na tu sākṣāt ayoga vyavacchedaḥ eva sādhyaḥ
tasya nirdeśa nirdiśyate na iti pratijñā vākyam ucyate

original: atrānyayogavyavacchedaṃ vākyārthaṃ manvāno bhadantaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇamativyāptyavyāptibhyām ākṣipati---ubhayeti /
analyzed: atra anya yoga vyavacchedam vākya artham manvānaḥ bhadantaḥ pratijñā lakṣaṇam ativyāpti avyāptibhyām ākṣipati ubhaya iti

original: ubhayoravadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kimidamavadhāryate kiṃ cedamiti prasaktāvityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ avadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kim idam avadhāryate kim ca idam iti prasaktau iti arthaḥ
pratijñā avadhṛtā iti

original: yata evakaraṇaṃ na tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti hi śābdā iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yatas eva karaṇam na tatas nyatra avadhāraṇam iti hi śābdāḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vyatireki tvāt iti vyabhicārāt iti arthaḥ
samādhatte sarvasmin vākye iti
saṃsargaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti utsargaḥ
kvacid punar anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ pi iti
sāmānya śrutau niyamaḥ iti

original: yathendriyārthasannikarṣotpannamityukte jñānaṃ sukhādi ca sāmanyena prāptam /
analyzed: yathā indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti ukte jñānam sukha ādi ca sāmanyena prāptam
tatra jñāna grahaṇam na vidhāyakam
prāpta tvāt
atas sukha ādi vyavaccheda phalam vijñāyate
yadi tu asmad darśanam atikramya sarvatra avadhāṇam karoti
tatas sya loka virodhaḥ iti āha sarvatra ca iti

original: tat kri loke na kpacidavadhāraṇam ityata āha---yatra ceti /
analyzed: tat kri loke na kpacid avadhāraṇam iti atas āha yatra ca iti
codayati nanu ca iti
siddha pratipakṣaḥ sādhya śabdasya arthaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ
pariharati na sūtra artha iti
sarva sandeheṣu idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ rtha pratipattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
codakaḥ sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati atha punar iti
asādhya nirdeśaḥ siddha anirdeśaḥ
tasya nivṛttiḥ sādhya śabdāt avagamyate
na tu prajñāpanīyaḥ rthaḥ iti arthaḥ
pariharati asādhyam ca iti
bhavet etat yadi siddha mātram asādhyam syāt
api tu anupapadyamānam sādhana siddhiḥ yasya tat api asādhyam
tathā ca asiddhasya cākṣuṣa tva ādeḥ nivṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ
punar codayati atha punar iti
na kṛtaka tva ādi siddham na api anupapadyamāna sādhanam
na api kṛtaka tva ādi para aṅga tvena upāttam yena a prajñāpanīyam syāt iti arthaḥ
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti

original: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanam iti sūtrārthaḥ,
analyzed: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇaḥ viśiṣṭasya parigraha vacanam iti sūtra arthaḥ
na punar dharma mātra parigraha vacanam iti
abhyupagamya vyavacchedam śabda artham etat uktam
paramārthataḥ tu aniyamaḥ kvacid saṃsargaḥ
kvacid vyavacchedaḥ iti atas āha yat ca idam iti

original: ito 'pi nāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅga ityāha---sādhyanirdeśa iti ca pratijñāyāmiti /
analyzed: na asiddhayoḥ hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti āha sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti ca pratijñāyām iti
pramāṇa tantra khalu abhyupagamaḥ siddhāntaḥ
na ca cākṣuṣa tva ādiṣu pramāṇa mūla tā
tad abhimānaḥ pi bādhakāt apākṛtaḥ iti

original: nanu yadi sarvatantrasiddhāntātiriktānāṃ siddhāntāntarāṇāṃ sādhyatvaṃ tarhi sādhyenaiva caritārthatvād apārthakaṃ pṛthagabhidhānameteṣāmiti,
analyzed: nanu yadi sarva tantra siddhānta atiriktānām siddhānta antarāṇām sādhya tvam tarhi sādhyena eva caritārtha tvāt apārthakam pṛthak abhidhānam eteṣām iti
atas uktam avasthāyām iti
vimati avasthāyām
sarva tantre tu vimatiḥ aśakyā iti uktam
parihāra antaram āha jijñāsā ādi iti

original: dhibhāgasūtreṇa prakaraṇotthānahetavo vākyāvayavatayā nirākāryatvena jijñāsādayo buddhisthīkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: dhi bhāga sūtreṇa prakaraṇa utthāna hetavaḥ vākya avayavatayā nirākārya tvena jijñāsā ādayaḥ
tena yatra jijñāsā ādayaḥ sa sādhyaḥ

original: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇabādhiteṣu santi ta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca cākṣuṣa tva ādiṣu pramāṇa bādhiteṣu santi te iti arthaḥ
parihāra antaram āha arhati arthaḥ iti
aparam api parihāram āha karma karaṇayoḥ vā iti

original: evaṃ tāvad vyutpattyādyālocanayā sādhyaśabdasya na hetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityuktam /
analyzed: evam tāvat vyutpatti ādi ālocanayā sādhya śabdasya na hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam
saṃprati loke eva ati sphuṭāḥ tisrovidhāḥ arthānām
kṛtam atra sūkṣma anusaraṇena iti āha sādhya asiddha siddha bhedāt iti

original: anyatarāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgo mā bhūditi karmatayā te upādīyanta ityuktam /
analyzed: anyatara asiddhayoḥ hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ mā bhūt iti karma tayā te upādīyante iti uktam
ubhaya pakṣa iti pakṣa śabdaḥ varga vacanaḥ
saṃpratipannam ubhayoḥ vargayoḥ iti arthaḥ
parihāra antaram āha atha vā iti
avayavānām etat prakaraṇam
teṣām ca pradhāna eka artha pratyāyanena ekavākya tām āpannānām avayava bhāvaḥ
yad pratyāyana uddeśena te pravartante tat pradhānam
dharmī ca sisādhayiṣita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ

original: tathā ca na sākṣāt tatpratyāyanāya te vibhavantīti tadarthaṃ sādhane vyāpriyante /
analyzed: tathā ca na sākṣāt tad pratyāyanāya te vibhavanti iti tad artham sādhane vyāpriyante

original: tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ viṣayaśca /
analyzed: tena siṣādhayiṣita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī teṣām pradhānam viṣayaḥ ca

original: pradhānaṃ ca prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate iti sādhyaśabdena sa evocyate,
analyzed: pradhānam ca prathamam buddhau viparivartate iti sādhya śabdena saḥ eva ucyate
na tu hetu dṛṣṭāntau apradhāne iti arthaḥ

original: tadevamaduṣṭamasmallakṣaṇamiti yadasmallakṣaṇamanena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam,
analyzed: tat evam aduṣṭam asmad lakṣaṇam iti yat asmad lakṣaṇam anena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇam praṇītam
tat eva duṣṭam iti āha na ced ayam iti

original: nanu yatra sādhyapadam asti bhavatu tatreṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakam,
analyzed: nanu yatra sādhya padam asti bhavatu tatra iṣṭa grahaṇam anarthakam
na tu asmin tat asti iti katham iṣṭa grahaṇam anarthakatam iti atas āha karma grahaṇāt ca iti
mā bhūt sādhya padam
asti tu pakṣa padam

original: tadapi hi pacyamānaṃ vyajyamānaṃ sādhyamevāha---tacca karma,
analyzed: tat api hi pacyamānam vyajyamānam sādhyam evā āha tat ca karma
karma ca īpsitam iti prāptum iṣṭam iti arthaḥ
codayati atha api aniṣṭā iti

original: nanvaniṣṭaḥ pakṣa iti vipratiṣiddhamityata uktam---arthataḥ kileti /
analyzed: nanu aniṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham iti atas uktam arthataḥ kila iti
vastu vyavasthāpanāya pravṛttasya tādṛśam na iṣṭam iti arthaḥ
bauddha pakṣam upanyasyan eva madhye tad abhimatam kiñcid nirākaroti aśrāvaṇaḥ iti
kṛta vyākhyānam etat prathama sūtre
api tu anumānaḥ kāraṇataḥ vikārāt
iti evamādeḥ
na hi vyavaṅgayam vya
jakam kāraṇam anuvidhīyate

original: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭo mahān alpe vā alpa iti /
analyzed: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭaḥ mahān alpe vā alpaḥ iti

original: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabda iti /
analyzed: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabdaḥ iti
tasmāt kāraṇataḥ vikārāt kāryaḥ śabdaḥ
yathā mahadbhiḥ sthūla piṇḍaiḥ ārabdhaḥ vayavī mahān iti
tat anena pratyaya bheda bhedi tvam hetuḥ upalakṣitaḥ bhavati
ādi śabdena ca sataḥ śabdasya
abhivyaktau doṣāt
iti evamādayaḥ grāhyāḥ
doṣaḥ ca darbhedhī ādi vat upayuktānām ṛcām niriṣṭika tvena punar anupayogaḥ
kārya tve punar anya tvena na

original: yadyapyāgamo 'pi śabdānityatve 'sti yathā somaṃ rājānamasṛjata tatastreyo vedā asṛjyanta //
analyzed: yadi api āgamaḥ u pi śabda anitya tve sti yathā somam rājānam asṛjata tatas treyaḥ vedāḥ asṛjyanta
iti

original: tathāpi nāsadāsīnno sadāsīdāmnāya eva khalvayamagra āsīt //
analyzed: tathā api na asat āsīt na u sat āsīt āmnāyaḥ eva khalu ayam agre āsīt
iti nitya tve pi āgama darśanāt aniścayāt anumānasya eva atra prāmāṇyam
tathā ca anumāna virodhaḥ iti

original: prasiddhivirodhaṃ tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇavirodhād bhedena /
analyzed: prasiddhi virodham tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇa virodhāt bhedena
yam prasiddhi virodhaḥ iti
eka granthena āha prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣa ādīnām iti
acandraḥ śaśī iti
yadi candre śaśi śabda vācya tvam niṣidhyate
tadā loka vyavahāra avagata anvaya vyatireka prabhava anumāna virodhaḥ
atha vikalpa jñāna gocara tva niṣedhaḥ
tatas bhavatām sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa virodhaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu mānasapratyakṣavirodha iti sarvathā na pramāṇādanyā prasiddhiriti /
analyzed: asmākam tu mānasa pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti sarvathā na pramāṇāt anyā prasiddhiḥ iti
tat evam bauddha pakṣam upanyasya tad uktāni udāharaṇāni dūṣayitvā bauddha pakṣam upasaṃharati etad artha iti
tat etat dūṣayati etat ca iti

original: vastu hi yādṛśaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ tādṛśameva tat /
analyzed: vastu hi yādṛśam sva kāraṇāt utpannam tādṛśam eva tat

original: na tasyānyathābhāva iti na tatra doṣo niviśate /
analyzed: na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ iti na tatra doṣaḥ niviśate
tad viṣayāṇi padāni api pratyekam aduṣṭāni eva

original: yā punaḥ ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭamanyatrārthamanyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā paravipralambhāya vā pratijñādirūpeṇa vākyakriyā,
analyzed: yā punar ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭam anyatra artham anyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā para vipralambhāya vā pratijñā ādi rūpeṇa vākya kriyā
sā sva vacana virodha ādi śālinī duṣṭā
tad dvāreṇa puruṣaḥ nigṛhyate
na arthaḥ na padāni iti

original: svārthāpavādaḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ kartṛdoṣo bhramo vā vipralambho vā kriyāyāmupacaryate /
analyzed: sva artha apavādaḥ sva vacana virodhaḥ kartṛ doṣaḥ bhramaḥ vā vipralambhaḥ vā kriyāyām upacaryate

original: na ca kriyāyāṃ bhramo vā vipralambho vā,
analyzed: na ca kriyāyām bhramaḥ vā vipralambhaḥ vā

original: tayorabhiprāyabhedatayā puruṣadharmatvāt kriyāyā vastubādhanāt puruṣābhiprāyāvagatiriti kriyādvāreṇetyuktam //
analyzed: tayoḥ abhiprāya bheda tayā puruṣa dharma tvāt kriyāyāḥ vastu bādhanāt puruṣa abhiprāya avagatiḥ iti kriyā dvāreṇa iti uktam
codayati atha pratijñāyāḥ iti
tat etat atiprasaṅgena dūṣayati na etat yuktam hetu ādi iti
na punar dūṣaṇāni nyūna tā avayava āttara doṣa ākṣepa bhāva udbhāvanāni iti
trairūpya saṃpannaḥ hetuḥ pūrṇaḥ

original: sa triṣu rūpeṣvanyatamena rūpeṇa rahito nyūno 'siddho vā viruddho vā anaikāntiko vā bhavatīti so 'yaṃ nyūnatādoṣo hetoḥ /
analyzed: sa triṣu rūpeṣu anyatamena rūpeṇa rahitaḥ siddhaḥ vā viruddhaḥ vā anaikāntikaḥ vā bhavati iti saḥ yam nyūna tā doṣaḥ hetoḥ
avayava doṣaḥ ca pratijñā doṣaḥ sva vacana virodha ādiḥ
hetu doṣaḥ siddhātva ādiḥ evam udāharaṇa raṇa doṣaḥ sādhya vikala tva ādiḥ
tasya ākṣepaḥ upādānam svīkāraḥ iti yāvat
bhāvaḥ pratibhā ādiḥ

original: sa hi vādino vā prativādino vābhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi vādinaḥ vā prativādinaḥ vā abhiprāyaḥ
tasya udbhāvanāni
na hi saṃbhave sati upacāraḥ iti

original: pratijñāgatā hi doṣā yadi tadgatatvena udbhāvyamānā na vādino nigrahamāpādayeyuḥ,
analyzed: pratijñā gatāḥ hi doṣāḥ yadi tad gata tvena udbhāvyamānāḥ na vādinaḥ nigraham āpādayeyuḥ
tatas tatra niṣprayojana tvena asaṃbhavāt pakṣe eva upacaryeran

original: pārayanti tu pratijñāgatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahituṃ vādinamiti /
analyzed: pārayanti tu pratijñā gatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahitum vādinam iti
saḥ yam pratijñā doṣāṇām pratijñāyām saṃbhave iti
kasmāt punar mañca sthāḥ iti evam na prayu
jate iti atas ukta mlaukika prayukta vākya anvākhyānam
na anādiḥ loka prayogaḥ niyojyaḥ paryanuyojyaḥ vā iti arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: iṣṭagrahaṇamanakṣarārūḍhamapyabhiprāyavyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ tathā syādityevamarthaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādaya iti /
analyzed: iṣṭa grahaṇam anakṣara ārūḍham api abhiprāya vyāptam sādhyam tathā syāt iti evam artham yathā para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti
atra hi pārārthya mātram akṣara ārūḍham
na ca tanmātram asya sādhyam
api tu ātma pārārthyam

original: tacca noccārayati mā bhūdananvayo hetuḥ saṃghātatvāditi /
analyzed: tat ca na uccārayati mā bhūt ananvayaḥ hetuḥ saṃghāta tvāt iti
tasmāt tad avarodhāya iṣṭa grahaṇam iti āha atha iṣṭa grahaṇena iti
pariharati ayam api arthaḥ sādhanāt eva gamyate
pratijñā prayogāt eva gamyate
ayam abhisandhiḥ
vacana liṅgāḥ hi vaktṛ abhiprāyāḥ bhavanti
yat param ca vacanam sa vacana arthaḥ

original: tātparyaṃ cāsya kvacid vācye kvacillakṣya iti sarva evāsau vacanārthaḥ /
analyzed: tātparyam ca asya kvacid vācye kvacid lakṣye iti sarvaḥ eva asau vacana arthaḥ
yaḥ tu na evaṃvidhaḥ katham asau vacana arthaḥ
katham asau vādi abhiprāya vyāptaḥ iti avagantavyam
na ca kvacid api pakṣaḥ pratijñā pada vācyaḥ
tasya vākya artha tvena lakṣya tvāt eva iti
aniṣṭa nivṛttiḥ iṣṭā iti
tat sādhanam anviṣyamāṇam api tadānīm iṣṭam eva
tatra prayatna anupapatteḥ icchā pūrvaka tvāt tasya iti
atha saṃśayaḥ vicāraṇā iti

original: tataśca saṃśayaviṣaya iṣyamāṇo jijñāsyamānaśca sādhya eva bhavati,
analyzed: tatas ca saṃśaya viṣayaḥ iṣyamāṇaḥ jijñāsyamānaḥ ca sādhyaḥ eva bhavati
na sādhana ādiḥ iti arthaḥ
sthāna antarīyam ca bhadantasya lakṣaṇam
sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha artha anirākṛtaḥ
iti dūṣayati evena iti
atra api hi sādhya padāt ūrdhvam vṛthak akṣara catuṣṭayam iti
tathā pakṣaḥ yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ
iti atra api vasubandhu lakṣaṇe viruddha artha anirākṛta grahaṇam na kartavyam
etat uktam bhavati na kevalam asmākram etat viruddha artha anirākṛta padam anarthakam pratibhāti
samāna tīrthānām api tathā vibhāti
yatas taiḥ na upāttam iti

original: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭa iti /
analyzed: atas evam vaktavyam pakṣaḥ yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ iti
yadi api atra api prayojya prayojaka vyāpārayoḥ sādhayitum iti samānam

original: tathāpi tumunā ya eva sādhayitā vādī sa evaiṣitetyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā api tumunā yaḥ eva sādhayitā vādī saḥ eva eṣitā iti uktam bhavati

original: na punarvādino niyoktā sādhayitā vādī caiṣiteti /
analyzed: na punar vādinaḥ niyoktā sādhayitā vādī ca eṣitā iti
eṣitṛ tvam ca vādinaḥ dhruvam kṛtvā etat ucyate
yadā panuḥ eṣitṛ tvam api prayojake saṃcāryate
tadā svayam grahaṇena api apratīkāraḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ tattva bhāktayoḥ ca iti
siddhaḥ sādhyasya prayojakaḥ kartā

original: sa hi sidhyantaṃ sādhyaṃ vādī tasminniyaṃ sādhanā samavetā /
analyzed: sa hi sidhyantam sādhyam vādī tasmin iyam sādhanā samavetā

original: yastu tasyāpi prayojakastṛtīyasthānapatito na tasmin sādhanā samavaitīti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu tasya api prayojakaḥ tṛtīya sthāna patitaḥ na tasmin sādhanā samavaiti iti

original: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti kathañcidasya bhaktyā kartṛtvam,
analyzed: yaḥ kārayati sa karoti eva iti kathañcid asya bhaktyā kartṛ tvam
tat ca ayuktam sati mukhye kartari iti abhiprāyaḥ
ājasa tvam mukhya tvam
pūva abhiprāya sthitam artham udghāṭayati tumunaḥ ca iti
atra uktam bhāṣya kārīya abhyupagama siddhānta nirākaraṇa avasare pramāṇakam artham iti

original: yastāvat śāstrāviruddho 'rthaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa śāstrīya eva śāstrābhyupetapramāṇasiddhatvāt,
analyzed: yaḥ tāvat śāstra aviruddhaḥ rthaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ sa śāstrīyaḥ eva śāstra abhyupeta pramāṇa siddha tvāt
tam vyutpādayan na śāstram bādhate

original: yastu pramāṇīkṛtavaiśaṣikatantraḥ śabdanityatvaṃ sādhayati so 'navadheyavacanaḥ na hetvabhidhānaṃ yāvat pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ nīyate,
analyzed: yaḥ tu pramāṇīkṛta vaiśaṣika tantraḥ śabda nitya tvam sādhayati saḥ navadheya vacanaḥ na hetu abhidhānam yāvat pariṣad prativādibhyām nīyate
api tu pratijñā uccāraṇa anantaram eva nigṛhyate

original: yastu vaiśeṣikatantrādhyayanamātrād vaiśeṣikatvamātmano darśayitvā śabdanityatāṃ pratijānīte nāsau pramāṇīkṛtavaiśeṣikatantra iti na nigṛhyate  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu vaiśeṣika tantra adhyayana mātrāt vaiśeṣika tvam ātmanaḥ darśayitvā śabda nitya tām pratijānīte na asau pramāṇīkṛta vaiśeṣika tantraḥ iti na nigṛhyate  /
iti
yaḥ ca apramāṇakaḥ bhyupagamaḥ iti
abhyupagamyate iti abhyupagamaḥ
tad abhidhānam pratijñā iti vaktavyam iti
sādhya grahaṇāt tad grahaṇasya lāghavāt iti arthaḥ
yaḥ tu tatrabhavatā naiyāyikena iti pu kṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt apeta iti
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ
avāntara saṃgati pradarśayan pratijñā vacanasya sādhana aṅga tvam api darśayati hetoḥ avasara prāptasya iti
pratijñā anantaram hetu vacanasya avasaraḥ

original: tathā hi parapratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi para pratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ

original: tadeva ca pare bodhayitavyā yad bubhutsante /
analyzed: tat eva ca pare bodhayitavyāḥ yat bubhutsante
tathā sati anena apekṣita abhidhāyinā paraḥ bodhitaḥ bhavati

original: no khalvāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuravadheyavacano bhavati /
analyzed: no khalu āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān ācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuḥ avadheya vacanaḥ bhavati
anavadheya vacanaḥ ca katham pratipādakaḥ nāma

original: yathā ca māṭhara samidhamāhareti guruṇā preṣita eṣohamāharāmītyanuktvā tadarthaṃ tadaryaṃ yadāyaṃ dātrāya gṛhaṃ praviśati,
analyzed: yathā ca māṭhara samidham āhara iti guruṇā preṣitaḥ eṣā uham āharāmi iti an uktvā tad artham tad aryam yadā ayam dātrāya gṛham praviśati

original: tadāsmai kupyati guraḥ āḥ śiṣyāpasada chāndasavacara māṭhara māmavadhīrayasīti bruvāṇaḥ /
analyzed: tadā asmai kupyati guro āḥ śiṣya apasada chāndasa vacara māṭhara mām avadhīrayasi iti bruvāṇaḥ

original: evamanityaṃ śabdaṃ bubhutsamānāyānityaḥ śabda ityanuktvā yadeva kiściducyate kṛtakatvāditi vā,
analyzed: evam anityam śabdam bubhutsamānāya anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti an uktvā yat eva kiścid ucyate kṛtaka tvāt iti vā
yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti vā

original: kṛtakaśca śabda iti vā tat sarvamasyānapekṣitam āpātato 'saṃbaddhābhidhānabuddhyā,
analyzed: kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti vā tat sarvam asya an apekṣitam āpātataḥ saṃbaddha abhidhāna buddhyā
tathā ca anavahitaḥ na boddhum arhati iti

original: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvamanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭaḥ
kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti vacanam artha sāmarthyena eva apekṣita śabda anitya tva niścāyakam iti avadhānam atra iti ced na
paraspara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt
avadhāne hi sati atas rthe niścayaḥ
tasmāt ca avadhānam iti

original: na ca pariṣatprativādinau pramāṇīkṛtavādinau yadetad vacanaṃ saṃbandhāya pratīkṣete,
analyzed: na ca pariṣad prativādinau pramāṇīkṛta vādinau yat etat vacanam saṃbandhāya pratīkṣete
tathā ca sati na hetu ādi api apekṣetām
tad vacanāt eva tad artha niścayāt

original: anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukte kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ kṛtakatvāditi heturupa tiṣṭhate /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tu apekṣite ukte kutas iti apekṣāyām kṛtaka tvāt iti hetuḥ upa tiṣṭhate

original: so 'yaṃ pañcāvayavaprayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñānantarakāla evāvasaro hetoḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam pañca avayava prayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñā anantara kālaḥ eva avasaraḥ hetoḥ
tat evam hetoḥ avasara prāptasya sāmānya lakṣaṇa apadeśa dvāreṇa tad viśeṣa lakṣaṇa sūtram
śruti arthābhyām ubhaya lakṣaṇa sūcanāt sūtram
atra hetuḥ iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ

original: sa ca vibhāgoddeśe vākyāvayava iti vacanarūpaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vibhāga uddeśe vākya avayavaḥ iti vacana rūpaḥ

original: tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyasādhanamiti sādhyate 'neneti vyutpattyā yadyapi pārārthyāpannaṃ kṛtakatvādikamartham āha,
analyzed: tasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam sādhya sādhanam iti sādhyate nena iti vyutpattyā yadi api pārārthya āpannam kṛtaka tva ādikam artham āha
tathā api tasya vacana ātmaka hetu sāmānadhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ viṣayi kṛtaka tvāt iti ādikam vacanam upalakṣayati

original: yadi ca vacanaṃ heturityucyeta tatsādhyena samabhivyāhṛtaṃ pratijñā syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca vacanam hetuḥ iti ucyeta tat sādhyena samabhivyāhṛtam pratijñā syāt
atha vacanam iti etāvat ucyeta
tadā ativyāptiḥ syāt
upacāre tu na kvacid prasaṅgaḥ
upanayāt api sādhanam na para aṅgatayā gamyate

original: kiṃ tu prātipadikārthapradhānatayā svaniṣṭhamiti na tatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu prātipadika artha pradhāna tayā sva niṣṭham iti na tatra api prasaṅgaḥ
hetvābhāsāḥ ca na sādhanam iti sādhana padena eva nirākṛtāḥ
nyāya vākya avayava tvāt eva ca na śabde prasaṅgaḥ
tat evam samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaka tvam siddham sāmānya lakṣaṇasya
idam ca artham
śrautam tu viśeṣa lakṣaṇam
hetuḥ iti yadi api sāmānya padam
tathā api prakaraṇāt anvaya vyatireki hetu viśeṣa param draṣṭavyam
tena hetuḥ iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ
pariśiṣṭam tu lakṣaṇam
tat etat vyācaṣṭe udāharaṇena iti
sādharmya pada vyākhyānam sāmānyāt iti
sādhya sādhana pada vyākhyānam sādhyasya dharmasya iti

original: sādhyasyeti dharmimātre buddhirmā bhūdityata uktaṃ dharmasyeti /
analyzed: sādhyasya iti dharmi mātre buddhiḥ mā bhūt iti atas uktam dharmasya iti
dharma sahitasya dharmiṇaḥ iti arthaḥ
etat eva sphuṭayati sādhye pratisandhāya iti
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhyasya iti anena anvaya pakṣa dharma tve anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharma tvāni ca darśitāni
sādhya sādhanam iti atra ca sādhya grahaṇena abādhita viṣayatva asat pratipakṣa tve sūcite
tad viparītasya sādhana anarha tvāt iti
tat etat vārttikakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe udāharaṇena iti

original: yo dharmo dhūmādi---sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūta evodāharaṇe 'pīti /
analyzed: yaḥ dharmaḥ dhūma ādi sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūtaḥ eva udāharaṇe pi iti

original: udāhniyata ityudāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmī tasmin na punaḥ sa eva /
analyzed: udāhniyate iti udāharaṇam dṛṣṭānta dharmī tasmin na punar saḥ eva
kutas anya dharmasya iti
yadi tarhi na anyasya dharmaḥ nyatra vartate
katham tarhi samāna tā

original: sā hi tattvānyatvavirodhinītyata āha---kiṃ tu tattulyaḥ sa evetyucyate,
analyzed: sā hi tattva anyatva virodhinī iti atas āha kim tu tad tulyaḥ saḥ eva iti ucyate

original: yathā tāneva śalīn upayuṅkte tāneva tittirīnīti tadanena sāmānyād iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //
analyzed: yathā tān eva śalīn upayuṅkte tān eva tittirīn iti tat anena sāmānyāt iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
udāharaṇa grahaṇa prayojanam āha yadi punar iti

original: sādharmyamātratvaṃ hi viruddhe cāsādhāraṇe savyabhicāre cāstīti teṣāmapi vacanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: sādharmya mātra tvam hi viruddhe ca asādhāraṇe savyabhicāre ca asti iti teṣām api vacanam hetuḥ syāt
teṣām api yathāsvam sādhāraṇa tvāt iti aniṣṭam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi savyabhicāre 'pyudāraṇasādharmyamiti kathaṃ nivartyate ityata āha---udāharaṇeti /
analyzed: nanu tathā api savyabhicāre pi udāraṇa sādharmyam iti katham nivartyate iti atas āha audāharaṇa iti
viśiṣṭa vidhānasya śeṣa niṣedhaḥ rtha siddhaḥ iti arthaḥ
pakṣa antaram āha avadhāraṇena vā iti

original: sādharmyādityato viśeṣeṇa sarvasādharmyaprāptau udāharaṇasādharmyamapi prāptameveti vidhānānarthakyaṃ parisaṃkhyāyakaṃ sadavadhāraṇārthameva  #
analyzed: sādharmyāt iti atas viśeṣeṇa sarva sādharmya prāptau udāharaṇa sādharmyam api prāptam eva iti vidhāna ānarthakyam parisaṃkhyāyakam sat avadhāraṇa artham eva
bhavati

original: tadavadyotanāya ca evakāraḥ sādharmyameva ityatra sādhyapadaṃ yojanīyam /
analyzed: tad avadyotanāya ca eva kāraḥ sādharmyam eva iti atra sādhya padam yojanīyam
tena sādhya eka deśa asiddhim apākariṣyati
pṛcchati kasya punar iti
uttaram kasya anyasya iti
atra eva hetu dvayayā āha prakṛta tvāt pratyāsatteḥ ca
sādhyam khalu atra prakṛtam pradhānam
tad uddeśena avayavānām pravṛtteḥ

original: sādhyasādhanamiti ca padena sannidhāpitamiti tadeva dvitīyam avadhāraṇaṃ sphuṭīkaroti---atrāpi ceti /
analyzed: sādhya sādhanam iti ca padena sannidhāpitam iti tat eva dvitīyam avadhāraṇam sphuṭīkaroti atra api ca iti
sādhye pratisandhāya iti bhāṣya artham āha sādhya udāharaṇābhyām iti
dvau iti
sapakṣa vyāpaka avyāpakau iti arthaḥ
anaikāntikasya ca iti
sādhāraṇasya asādhāraṇasya ca iti arthaḥ
evam bhāvyamānena iti
paribhāvyamānena
na ati prasaktasya iti
parisakhyāyakam hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇam na vidhāyakam iti arthaḥ

original: etat kila hetulakṣaṇa bhadanto dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanaṃ yadi sārdhmyaṃ na vākyāṃśaḥ,
analyzed: etat kila hetu lakṣaṇa bhadantaḥ dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanam yadi sārdhmyam na vākya aṃśaḥ
na hi arthaḥ pañca avayava vākyasya avayavaḥ

original: yadi sādhanasādharmyayoratyantābhedo yadi vā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathāpi na pañcamī,
analyzed: yadi sādhana sādharmyayoḥ atyanta abhedaḥ yadi vā sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathā api na pañcamī
sādhana sāmānādhikaraṇyena prathamā prasaṅgāt
atyanta abhede ca ekatara pada aprayogāt
vākyam ced tatas pañcamī upapadyate
sādhanam hi sādharmyāt arthāt utthitam yatas
tad viśeṣyam syāt
na hi vākyam eva arthāt utthitam
api tu vivakṣā ādi api iti
na viśeṣyam kutas
sādhana tvāt asaṃbhavaḥ
artha samutthānām api jñāna vivakṣā ādīnām aprasaṅgaḥ
asādhana tvāt iti

original: na tatrāpi dvidhā doṣāt sākṣād vā sādhanaṃ pāramparyeṇa vā?
analyzed: na tatra api dvidhā doṣāt sākṣāt vā sādhanam pāramparyeṇa vā
yadi pāramparyeṇa

original: vaktṛjñānaṃ tarhi sākṣāt sādharmyasamutthaṃ pāramparyeṇa ca śrotuḥ sādhyavijñānasādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: vaktṛ jñānam tarhi sākṣāt sādharmya samuttham pāramparyeṇa ca śrotuḥ sādhya vijñāna sādhanam hetuḥ syāt
atha sākṣāt sādhanam

original: tarhi śrotṛjñānaṃ pāramparyeṇa sādharmyasamutthaṃ sākṣāt sādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: tarhi śrotṛ jñānam pāramparyeṇa sādharmya samuttham sākṣāt sādhanam hetuḥ syāt
prakṛte tu anya saṃbhavanaḥ
yadi tu pañca avayava vākyasya prakṛta tvāt jñāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ
tathā api anya saṃbhavaḥ
upanayasya api
sva lakṣaṇena bādhā ced na vikalpa ādi saṃbhavāt
tasmāt ṣaṣṭhī astu tatra api viśeṣaṇam anarthakam
sādharmyasya hetuḥ iti etāvat mātram vaktavyam iti
tadā idam dignāga dūṣaṇam upanyasyati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt ca iti
yadi artha ātmakam sādharmyam eva sādhanam ucyate tadā etat dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
yadi punar artha ātmakasya sādharmyasya artha ātmakam eva sādhanam sāmānyam ucyate
tatra āha atha punar iti
tat idam uktam bhadantena na pañcamī
anye tu etat anyathā vyācakṣate iti āha anye tu iti
viśeṣa atiriktam na sāmānyam nāma kiñcid asti
tasya kalpanā mātra tvāt bhedasya ca vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ
doṣa antaram āha sādhya sādhana iti

original: yadā hi sādhyasādhanaṃ nāmodāharaṇasādharmyādatiriktaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu śabdamātramavaśiṣyate,
analyzed: yadā hi sādhya sādhanam nāma udāharaṇa sādharmyāt atiriktam na asti kim tu śabda mātram avaśiṣyate
tadā udāharaṇa sādharmī anena abhidheya tvena viśeṣaṇīyam

original: tathā ca sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā ityanena virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti anena virodhaḥ
anena hi avayavaḥ śabda ātmakaḥ pratijñā lakṣyate
hetu ādi samudāya apekṣayā ca avayavaḥ bhavati
na ca abhidhāna abhidheya ātmakaḥ samudāyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti
tasmāt samudāya abhāvāt
na ubhayeṣām avayava tvam
tat idam uktam na vākya aṃśe iti

original: tadetallakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ parihṛtamiti na parihārāntaraṃ prayojayatītyāha---tatra tviti /
analyzed: tat etat lakṣaṇam vyācakṣāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ parihṛtam iti na parihāra antaram prayojayati iti āha tatra tu iti

original: uktaṃ yathā hetupadasannidhau sādhanapadaṃ hetupade pravartate,
analyzed: uktam yathā hetu pada sannidhau sādhana padam hetu pade pravartate
na ca upanaya prasaṅgaḥ
tasya prātipadika artha mātra pradhāna tvena hetu bhāva aprakāśaka tvāt iti
atra codayati sādharmyasya iti

kim vyatirekiṇā

original: ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyantaṃ ko nu vakreṇa sādhayet
analyzed: ṛju mārgeṇa sidhyantam kaḥ nu vakreṇa sādhayet
iti vācyam kāraṇa mātrasya tatas siddheḥ iti uktam
pariśeṣāt viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti ced
saḥ eva vyatirekī iti uktam
yadi hi pṛthivī ādi samavāyi kāraṇāḥ icchā ādayaḥ bhaveyuḥ
ghaṭa ādiṣu api prasajyeran
tasmāt ghaṭa ādiṣu icchā ādi kārya nivṛttyā dravya aṣṭaka atirikta kāraṇa nivṛttiḥ vyāptā dṛṣṭā iti icchā ādayaḥ
śarīre dṛśyamānāḥ vyāpikām sva nivṛttim nivartayantaḥ vyāpya dravya aṣṭaka atirikta kāraṇa abhāva nivṛtti mukhena
navamam dravyam sādhayanti
na ca eṣām buddhiḥ eva samavāyi kāraṇam
dravyasya eva samavāyi kāraṇa tva niyamāt buddheḥ ca adravya tvāt

original: yathā ca bhūtānāṃ pariṇatibhedo na kāraṇaṃ tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate /
analyzed: yathā ca bhūtānām pariṇati bhedaḥ na kāraṇam tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate

original: vyatirekamukhenāpi prāmādeḥ sātmakatvenānvayasiddhau na kevalavyatirekīti cet?
analyzed: vyatireka mukhena api prāma ādeḥ sātmaka tvena anvaya siddhau na kevala vyatirekī iti ced
na sva abhāva vikam sādhyena pratibandham anvaya vyatirekiṇi vyāsedhāmaḥ

original: kiṃ tu sapakṣābhāvena vidhimukhenāsya pratibandhaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu sapakṣa abhāvena vidhi mukhena asya pratibandham nirākurmaḥ
etāvatā eva ca anvayinaḥ bhidyate
na ca pakṣaḥ eva sapakṣaḥ
jijñāsita viśeṣasya jñāta viśeṣāt anya tvāt
śarīra ādiṣu ca satsu nairātmya niṣedhaḥ eva ātma sadbhāvaḥ
asat niṣedhasya sadbhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: sapakṣābhāvastu nairātmyenāpyavyapadeśya iti kathaṃ nairātmyaniṣedhena vyapadiśyatām?
analyzed: sapakṣa abhāvaḥ tu nairātmyena api avyapadeśyaḥ iti katham nairātmya niṣedhena vyapadiśyatām
asataḥ dhikaraṇa tva ayogāt iti uktam
etena paraiḥ yat uktam
sapakṣa avyatirekī ced bhavet hetuḥ atas nvayī
na anvaya vyatirekī ced anairātmyam na sātmakam
iti tat anena nirākṛtam
etat ca asmābhiḥ anvayi hetu samarthanena sphuṭīkṛtam
tasmāt sarvam avadātam

original: vipakṣavyatirekamātreṇa vyatirekiṇo gamakatvaṃ matvā codayati---yadi tarhīti /
analyzed: vipakṣa vyatireka mātreṇa vyatirekiṇaḥ gamaka tvam matvā codayati yadi tarhi iti
pariharati na
hetu artha aparijñānāt iti
na vaidharmya mātreṇa gamaka tvam
api tu avyabhicāriṇā
sa ca atra avyabhicāraḥ na asti iti arthaḥ

original: nanu mā bhūd gandhavattvaṃ heturvyatireka vyabhicārād anityādivannityādapyasya vyatirekāt,
analyzed: nanu mā bhūt gandhavat tvam hetuḥ vyatireka vyabhicārāt anitya ādi vat nityāt api asya vyatirekāt

original: tasya tu pakṣa eva kevalaṃ na tu sapakṣavipakṣau,
analyzed: tasya tu pakṣaḥ eva kevalam na tu sapakṣa vipakṣau

original: na tasaya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'stīti sa kasmāt na heturiti codayati---yaḥ punariti /
analyzed: na vyatireka vyabhicāraḥ sti iti sa kasmāt na hetuḥ iti codayati yaḥ punar iti
pariharati satyam iti
vyatireka dharmaḥ vyabhicāraḥ na asati vyatireke saṃbhavati
asataḥ dhikaraṇa tva ayogāt iti ukta tvāt iti
pratyudāharaṇa antaram darśayati etena iti
etena vipakṣa abhāvāt tatas vyāvṛtti abhāvena iti arthaḥ
codayati yaḥ pakṣa eka deśaḥ iti

original: yadi hi pakṣaikadeśavṛttirapi vipakṣābhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ,
analyzed: yadi hi pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ api vipakṣa abhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ

original: tarhi tasya pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapi sato vipakṣanivṛttirasti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta /
analyzed: tarhi tasya pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ api sataḥ vipakṣa nivṛttiḥ asti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta
asti khalu asya udāharaṇa vaidharmyam eva iti vyatireki hetu lakṣaṇam iti abhiprāyaḥ
pariharati ayam api na hetuḥ kasmāt
sūtra arthena apodita tvāt
tam sūtra pāṭha pūrvakam darśayati sūtra arthaḥ iti

original: atra ca yena pakṣaikadeśavṛttervyatirekyābhāsasya nirākaraṇaṃ tadavadhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: atra ca yena pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ vyatireki ābhāsasya nirākaraṇam tad avadhāraṇam prathamam darśitam
udāharaṇena eva vaidharmyam na anudāharaṇena pakṣeṇa api

original: asya tu pakṣeṇāpīti vyatirekyapi na hetuḥ,
analyzed: asya tu pakṣeṇa api iti vyatirekī api na hetuḥ
na punar vaidharmyam eva iti sūtra arthaḥ
tathā sati sa vyabhicāra mātrasya nivṛttiḥ syāt
na tu pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃprati vāsubandhavam hetu lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati hetuḥ vipakṣāt viśeṣaḥ iti anye
etat vyācaṣṭe anye tu iti
sādharmya mātra nirākaraṇe iti
yasya kasyacid sādharmyasya nirākaraṇe
vipakṣa sādharmya nirākaraṇe tāvat iṣṭasya saṃgrahaḥ
yadā tu sapakṣa ādi sādharmya nirākaraṇam
tadā aniṣṭasya viruddha ādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
iṣṭa aniṣṭa saṃgrahe iti
iṣṭa parityāgaḥ iti api draṣṭavyam
sa ca aneka bhedaḥ iti
sapakṣāt api viśeṣe sati vipakṣāt viśeṣaḥ
pakṣāt api viśeṣe sati vipakṣāt viśeṣaḥ
vipakṣa mātrāt vā viśeṣaḥ iti prakārāḥ

original: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoryathākramamasādhāraṇasya cāsiddhasya ca hetutvaprasaṅga iti /
analyzed: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoḥ yathākramam asādhāraṇasya ca asiddhasya ca hetu tva prasaṅgaḥ iti
tad nivṛtti artha vipakṣāt eva iti avadhāryate
dvitīyam avadhāraṇam avatārayitum āha avadhāraṇe ca iti
vipakṣāt eva iti anena avadhāraṇena viśeṣaḥ vadhāritaḥ
na vipakṣaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣe cāviśeṣe ca prasṛta iti vipakṣekadeśavṛtterapi pakṣasapakṣasādhāraṇasya hetutvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam viśeṣe ca aviśeṣe ca prasṛtaḥ iti vipakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ api pakṣa sapakṣa sādhāraṇasya hetu tva prasaṅgaḥ
tad nivṛtti artham dvitīyam avadhāraṇam viśeṣaḥ eva iti
upasaṃharati tat evam iti
tat eva davyāpaka tvena dūṣayati satyam ekaḥ iti
atra codayati vipakṣa eka deśa vṛtti pratiṣedhāt iti

original: viśeṣa evetyavadhāraṇena vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ gaurayaṃ viṣāṇitvāditi hetutvena pratiṣiddhaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇena vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ gauḥ ayam viṣāṇi tvāt iti hetu tvena pratiṣiddhaḥ
tasmāt etasmin avadhāraṇe sati eva vipakṣāt eva iti avadhāraṇīyam

original: tathā ca vipakṣādeva yo viśeṣa eva sa hetuḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca vipakṣāt eva yaḥ viśeṣaḥ eva sa hetuḥ

original: sapakṣāttu yo viśeṣa eva sa na heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sapakṣāt tu yaḥ viśeṣaḥ eva sa na hetuḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: yathā ca aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāt iti sapakṣād viśeṣa eveti hetutvena pratiṣiddho bhavati /
analyzed: yathā ca aśvaḥ yam viṣāṇi tvāt iti sapakṣāt viśeṣaḥ eva iti hetu tvena pratiṣiddhaḥ bhavati

original: yastu sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnanāntarīyakatvādiḥ sa sapakṣād viśeṣa eva na bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ tu sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ prayatna nāntarīyaka tva ādiḥ sa sapakṣāt viśeṣaḥ eva na bhavati
api tu sāmānyam api iti

original: yadi sapakṣādapi yo viśeṣaḥ sa sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādirhetuḥ,

original: evaṃ sati vipakṣādeveti avadhāraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati /

original: api tu yo viśeṣa eva sa heturiti prāpte vipakṣādeveti niyamyate,
analyzed: api tu yaḥ viśeṣaḥ eva sa hetuḥ iti prāpte vipakṣāt evā iti niyamyate

original: tena sāvadhāraṇasya viśeṣasya vipakṣavṛtterhetutvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati yathā aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇītvāditi /

yaḥ punar viśeṣaḥ ca aviśeṣaḥ ca sapakṣe hetuḥ

original: tasya hetutve 'pi na vipakṣādeveti bādhitaṃ bhavati /

original: yadyapi caivaṃ satyapi sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterhetutvaṃ na śrutam,
analyzed: yadi api ca evam sati api sapakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ hetu tvam na śrutam

tena ca aśrutena arthena arthavatī avadhāraṇe iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti evam ca iti
yathā tad tulya eka deśa vṛtteḥ avihitam api hetu tvam aniṣedha anumatam
evam pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ api iti saḥ pi hetuḥ syāt iti arthaḥ
punar pratyavatiṣṭhate na eṣa doṣaḥ iti

original: pakṣadharmatve sati viśeṣa eva vipakṣādeveti niyame kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prāptiḥ,
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tve sati viśeṣaḥ eva vipakṣāt eva iti niyame kutas pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ prāptiḥ
a pakṣa dharma tvāt tasya iti arthaḥ
pariharati yaḥ dharmaḥ pakṣasya iti anena iti
paraḥ āha kartavyataḥ iti
dūṣayitum avadhāraṇam vikalpayati kim punar iti

yathā nīlam sarojam bhavati eva iti

original: heturvipakṣād viśeṣa iti ca yadā sautrāntikapakṣamiti /

original: nanu ca nityo vipakṣa ityata āha---na hyasatīti /

original: na cāsyāpādānatvaṃ nāpyadhikaraṇatvaṃ yena pañcamī vā saptamī vā prayujyeteti āha---na cāsatīti /

atra ca eva kārāḥ trayaḥ pada antara anapekṣatvam sūcayanti

original: pakṣasyaiva dharma iti hetulakṣaṇe asādhāraṇa eva hetuḥ syāt /

original: samāna eva siddha iti tu hetulakṣaṇe aśvasya viṣāṇitve sādhye gotvādirhetuḥ syāt /

original: pakṣasya dharmo vipakṣe ca nāstītyatrāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāt /
