anye pade yayoḥ pakṣa dharma tva vipakṣa asattvayoḥ te tathā ukte
tatra dvevidhyam nirākriyate iti
san sajātīyā iti sarvathā iti

original: sajātīye dvedhā ceti padopādāne cānupādāne cetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sajātīye dvedhā ca iti pada upādāne ca anupādāne ca iti arthaḥ

original: sajātīya eva dvidhetyanenaiveti hetutadābhāsayorautsargike pakṣadharmatve sthita ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sajātīyaḥ eva dvidhā iti anena eva iti hetu tad ābhāsayoḥ autsargike pakṣa dharma tve sthitaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: śaṅkate---atha mā bhūditi sajātīya eva dvidheti nāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkate atha mā bhūt iti sajātīyaḥ eva dvidhā iti na avadhāraṇam iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti tathā api iti
san sajātīye dvidhā iti madhyama pade iti arthaḥ
tat evam sajātīye eva dvidhā iti avadhāraṇam dūṣitam
saṃprati dvitīyam avadhāraṇam śaṅkate atha punar iti
nirākaroti tathā api iti
tathā api pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ api hetuḥ prasaktaḥ

original: yadi ca tadatyaya eveti nāvadhāryeta tato 'naikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
analyzed: yadi ca tad atyayaḥ evā iti na avadhāryeta tatas na aikāntikaḥ pi hetuḥ syāt iti doṣaḥ
dignāgasya eva pradeśa antara hetu lakṣaṇam grāhya dharmaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ
tad aṃśena tasya eva pakṣasya aṃśena sādhya dharma sāmānyena
vyāptaḥ hetuḥ iti
tat etat hetu lakṣaṇam upanyasya asmin pūrva uktam doṣam atidiśati etena iti
atideśam eva sphuṭayati avyāpaka ādiḥ iti
yathāśruta lakṣaṇe pakṣa avyāpakasya hetu tvam

original: tadaṃśena vyāpta ityasya vivaraṇālocanena sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣācca vyāvṛttirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti asya vivaraṇa ālocanena sapakṣe sattvam vipakṣāt ca vyāvṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ
tathā ca pūrva ukta doṣa anuṣā aṅge iti arthaḥ
siṃhāvalokita nyāyena dūṣayati asān tad atyayaḥ iti iti
anyeṣām hetu lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati tādṛś iti
tat etat vyācaṣṭe itādṛśā iti
kilakāraḥ rucau
pakṣa dharmaḥ iti ca hetoḥ abhidhānam
tena tri lakṣaṇa pravibhāvita ātmā hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
dūṣayati tat tāvat iti
śrāvaṇa tva ādi api iti
sādhāraṇaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yastu tādṛśavinābhāvīti vipakṣe sattāpratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvaṃ gamyate eva,
analyzed: yaḥ tu tādṛśa vinābhāvi iti vipakṣe sattā pratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvam gamyate eva
viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā viṣaya tvāt iti manyeta
tam pratyāha bhavatu tāvat iti
eka deśa abhyanujñāne viśeṣa niṣedhasya upapatteḥ na samasta aśeṣa abhyanujñāne pramāṇam asti iti abhiprāyaḥ
codayati nanu upadarśana grahaṇāt iti
pariharati na tat labhyate iti
na hi cākṣuṣa tvam iti

original: vauddhānāṃ rūpatvādijāternityāyā abhāvād na cākṣuṣatvamanityatvena vinā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vauddhānām rūpa tva ādi jāteḥ nityāyāḥ abhāvāt na cākṣuṣa tvam anitya tvena vinā bhavati iti arthaḥ
yaḥ tu manyeta viśeṣa niṣadhasya śeṣa mātra abhyanujñā hetu tvena a gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tvāt pakṣa sattā abhyanujñānam

original: tathā copadarśanapadena pakṣe hetoḥ sattopadarśanaṃ bhavatīti taṃ pratyupetyāha---upetya veti /
analyzed: tathā ca upadarśana padena pakṣe hetoḥ sattā upadarśanam bhavati iti tam pratyupetya āha aupetya vā iti
su bodham
tat evam lakṣaṇam dūṣayitvā tad udāharaṇam dūṣayati yat tu idam iti
etasmin hetu lakṣaṇe iti arthaḥ

original: prayatnanāntarīyakatvaṃ prayatnakāraṇakatvaṃ tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā?
analyzed: prayatna nāntarīyaka tvam prayatna kāraṇaka tvam tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā
tatra prathame kalpe dūṣaṇam āha prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya iti
dvitīya kalpam āśaṅkya dūṣayati atha iti
prayatna grahaṇam apārthakam iti arthaḥ
bhāva pratyaya vācyam vikalpya dūṣayati yat ca idam iti
evam api upalabdheḥ eva iti
na hi boddha rāddhānte kiścid upalabhyamānam nityam asti
yena upalabdhiḥ viśeṣyeta iti abhiprāyaḥ
prayatna anantaram anyathā ca iti

original: yat tāvadupalabdhikarma tatsarvaṃ prayatnādeva puruṣavyāpādādevopalabhyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat tāvat upalabdhi karma tat sarvam prayatnāt eva puruṣa vyāpādāt eva upalabhyate na anyathā iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate atha iti
asmākam naiyāyikānām iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram tvayā eva iti
asmad darśanam ced āsthāya tvayā bauddhena ucyate
tat prayatna grahaṇena api anaikāntika tvam tad avastham eva iti arthaḥ
avyāpakam ca iti
na hi dava dahana abhighāta prasphuṭat veṇu dala vibhāga janmā smat ādi prayatna kāryaḥ iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate atha iti
varṇa ātmakam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti tatra api iti
pāramparyeṇa api prathamaḥ eva varṇaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ
na dvitīya ādayaḥ
ati pāramparya āśrayaṇe tu atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate atha yaḥ iti
viśeṣaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmi viśeṣaṇam
prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam sāmānyam ca hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti tathā api anye iti

original: na hi bhavatāmasmākamiva viśeṣātiriktamasti sāmānyaṃ vastu sad yo hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: na hi bhavatām asmākam iva viśeṣa atiriktam asti sāmānyam vastu sat yaḥ hetuḥ syāt

original: na ca kalpanāropitaṃ hetuḥ samyagjñānasya bhavitumarhati,
analyzed: na ca kalpanā āropitam hetuḥ samyak jñānasya bhavitum arhati
na ca atyanta asataḥ kalpanā api saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
tat evam udāharaṇam dūṣayitvā prasaṅgena pareṣām udāharaṇa vicāram dūṣayati yat api uktam iti
tat khalu asat sarva sāmarthya rahitam tad āśrita anāśrita bhāva abhāva dharmavat na bhavati iti arthaḥ
nityam tu kiścid bhavati iti
tasya dharma yogaḥ saṃbhavati eva
na tu asya api aprayatna ānantarīyaka tvam tu apratyaya abhidheyam hi janma
tat prayatnena da prayatnāt anyena vā viśeṣaṇīyam

original: yasya tu janmaiva nāsti tasya tadviśeṣaṇaṃ dūrotsāritamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tu janma eva na asti tasya tat viśeṣaṇam dūra utsāritam iti arthaḥ
etena abhāvaḥ iti
naiyāyika abhimataḥ pi abhāvaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: tasyāpi hi prāgasataḥ savakāraṇena samavāya iti janma nāstīti na tadviśeṣaṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya api hi prāk asataḥ sava kāraṇena samavāyaḥ iti janma na asti iti na tad viśeṣaṇa yogaḥ iti arthaḥ
prakṛtam upasaṃharati tat evam iti
sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam
hetau ukte na avyāptaḥ sau sādhya dharmeṇa hetu bhāve vyavatiṣṭhate
na ca vyāpti pradarśanam udāharaṇam antareṇa iti hetu lakṣaṇa anantaram krama prāptam udāharaṇa lakṣaṇam āha sādhya raṇam
sūtram iti udāharaṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam api anena sūcitam iti darśitam
asya tātparyam āha asya iti

original: dṛṣṭānto 'rtharūpo nodāharaṇasya vacanātmakasya svarūpato lakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ rtha rūpaḥ na udāharaṇasya vacana ātmakasya svarūpataḥ lakṣaṇam saṃbhavati

original: tasmāt svābhidhāyakavacanopalakṣakatvena lakṣaṇatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhajata ityabhisandhinoktam---udāharaṇopalakṣaṇamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt sva abhidhāyaka vacana upalakṣaka tvena lakṣaṇa tvam sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca bhajate iti abhisandhinā uktam udāharaṇa upalakṣaṇam iti

original: anena ca samānajātīyebhyaḥ pratijñādibhyaḥ asamānajātīyebhyaśca pramāṇādibhya udāharaṇaṃ vyavacchinnaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: anena ca samāna jātīyebhyaḥ pratijñā ādibhyaḥ asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ ca pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ udāharaṇam vyavacchinnam bhavati
sādhyena sādharmyam ityādi bhāṣyam
tasya arthaḥ
sādhyena dharmiṇā śabdena
sādharmyam dṛṣṭāntasya sthālī ādeḥ
kṛtaka tvam hetuḥ

original: kaddhyanityatvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthālpādau samānam /
analyzed: kad hi anitya tvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthā alpa ādau samānam
tasmāt prayojakāt

original: taddharmabhāvī tasyaiva sādhyasya śabdasya yo dharmo dharmāntaram,
analyzed: tad dharma bhāvī tasya eva sādhyasya śabdasya yaḥ dharmaḥ dharma antaram
yena viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ siṣādhayiṣitaḥ nitya tvena
tad anitya tvam tad dharmaḥ
saḥ eva bhāvaḥ tad bhāvaḥ
saḥ sya asti iti tad dharma bhāvī
sthālī ādiḥ anitya tva dharmavān iti yāvat
tena tādṛśā dṛṣṭāntena upalakṣitam tad viṣayam vacanam udāharaṇam iti

original: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrapadaṃ vyācakṣāṇa eva phalato bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---sādhyeti /
analyzed: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtra padam vyācakṣāṇaḥ eva phalatas bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe sādhyā iti
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti asya vyākhyānam sādhya sādharmyāt iti atra api yojayati atra api iti
sādhya śabdena eva kṛtaka tvam sādharmyam dṛṣṭāntasya
na asādhyena vipakṣeṇa ākāśa ādinā nityena
tatas hi kṛtaka tvam vyāvṛttam iti
tathā ca savyabhicāraḥ vyavacchinnaḥ bhavati
sādharmyam eva iti bhāga asiddhaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ
yasmāt sādhya sādharmyāt saddharma bhāvī bhavati
saḥ yam dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇam iti
yāvat vākyam na samāpyate
tāvat ardha ukte eva pṛcchati kim kutaścid iti

original: avadhāraṇadvayayoginaḥ sādhyasādharmyād dṛṣṭānto 'vaśyameva taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti gatārthaṃ taddharmabhāvītyetaditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: avadhāraṇa dvaya yoginaḥ sādhya sādharmyāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ vaśyam eva tad dharma bhāvī bhavati iti gata artham tad dharma bhāvi iti etat iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram na bhavati api iti

original: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrtatvādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na taddharmabhāvi bhavati,
analyzed: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrta tva ādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na tad dharma bhāvi bhavati
nityam na bhavati iti arthaḥ
sādhyena eva iti avadhāraṇena eva etat udāharaṇam pratyuktam iti
śiṣya upādhyāya śyaśyāma tva maitra tanaya tva ādayaḥ traupādhika saṃbandhāḥ udāhāryāḥ
hetu lakṣaṇe tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa apekṣam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti na ativyāptiḥ

original: atra ca sādhyasādharmyagrahaṇena sādhanavikalamanudāharaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atra ca sādhya sādharmya grahaṇena sādhana vikalam anudāharaṇam bhavati iti uktam bhavati
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt paramāṇu vat iti
tad dharma bhāvi iti anena ca sādhya vikalam parāstam
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt karma vat iti
etena ubhaya vikalam api parākṛtam
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti

original: pañcamyupādānena ca sādhyasādharmyaprayuktaṃ taddharmabhāvitvaṃ yatra vacane pradarśyate tadevodāharaṇaṃ nānyaditi darśitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pañcamī upādānena ca sādhya sādharmya prayuktam tad dharma bhāvi tvam yatra vacane pradarśyate tat eva udāharaṇam na anyat iti darśitam bhavati

original: prayojakatvaṃ ca sādhyasādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyāpyatvamiti yāvat /
analyzed: prayojaka tvam ca sādhya sādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ vyāpya tvam iti yāvat
prayojya tvam ca sādhya sādharmyasya vyāpaka tvam eva
tena apradarśita anvaya viparīta pradarśita anvayayoḥ anudāharaṇa tvam uktam bhavati iti
tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpattimat tvāt
paṭa vat iti

original: yo yo 'nityaḥ sa sarva utpattimān yathā ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ nityaḥ sa sarvaḥ utpattimān yathā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamapyanena sūcitamityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyā niruktiḥ kṛtā /
analyzed: samākhyā nirvacana sāmarthyāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam api anena sūcitam iti āśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyāḥ niruktiḥ kṛtā
tām vārttikakāraḥ darśayati udāhriyate nena iti
codayati nanu ca iti
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
vacanasya viśeṣaṇa tvena upalakṣaṇa tvena iti arthaḥ
abhidhīyamānaḥ iti ca abhidhāna upalakṣaṇa param
na abhidheya param
tad dharma bhāvi iti sūtra avayava vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam tasya dharmaḥ ityādi
atra ca uttaram iti guḍha abhiprāyam

original: tadetad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe---tasya dharma iti /
analyzed: tat etat bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe tasya dharmaḥ iti

original: tasya dharmastaddharma iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhitvena pṛthagvacanam /
analyzed: tasya dharmaḥ tad dharmaḥ iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhi tvena pṛthak vacanam
na ca dharmaḥ eva dharmasya
na api dharma antaram dharmasya
kim tu dharmiṇaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anena bhāṣyakārīyāmanupapattimuktvā vārttikakāraḥ svakīyāmapyāha---dharme ca sādhya iti /
analyzed: anena bhāṣya kārīyām anupapattim uktvā vārttikakāraḥ svakīyām api āha dharme ca sādhye iti
anena hetu udāharaṇa upanaya lakṣaṇaiḥ vyāghātaḥ uktaḥ
bhāṣyam sādhya sādharmyāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti
tat vyācaṣṭe tasya dharmiṇaḥ iti
tad dharma bhāvī bhavati iti
tat anupapannam
na hi kṛtaka tvāt sthālī ādeḥ anitya tvam bhavati
jāyate bījāt iva aṅkuraḥ iti atas uktam bhavati
tad viparyayāt vā viparītam
vaidharmya udāharaṇasya

original: anuvṛttena pūrayitvā savyākhyānaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati---sādhyavaidharmyādataddharmabhāvī ca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti /
analyzed: anuvṛttena pūrayitvā sa vyākhyānam sūtram paṭhati sādhya vaidharmyāt a tad dharma bhāvī ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti

original: sātmakatayā sādhyena jīvaccharīreṇa vaidhamyād ghaṭāderdṛṣṭāntasya sātmakatvasādharmyavirahāditi yāvat /
analyzed: sātmaka tayā sādhyena jīvat śarīreṇa vaidhamyāt ghaṭa ādeḥ dṛṣṭāntasya sātmaka tva sādharmya virahāt iti yāvat

original: yasya sādhyasya jīvaccharīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇādimattvaṃ taddharmaḥ /
analyzed: yasya sādhyasya jīvat śarīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇa ādimat tvam tad dharmaḥ
saḥ eva bhāvaḥ tad dharma bhāvaḥ
saḥ sya asti iti tad dharma bhāvī
na tad dharma bhāvī a tad dharma bhāvī
prāṇa ādi rahitaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ iti yāvat
etat uktam bhavati
yatra ghaṭa ādau sādhya dharma abhāva prayuktaḥ sādhana dharma abhāvaḥ
sa ghaṭa ādiḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tad viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ udāharaṇam iti
sūtra sthaḥ ca vā śabdaḥ samucceye veditavyaḥ
vyatireka viṣaya tvāt vaidharmya udāharaṇasya iti
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa anvaya vyatirekī
sādhana dharma abhāva prayukta tvam ca sādhya dharma abhāvasya uktam
tat ca ayuktam
anvaya vyatirekiṇi hetau sati api vaidharmye sādharmya udāharaṇam eva ucitam

original: tatra tatpūrvakatvād vaidharmyapratīteḥ ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyato 'rthasya vakreṇa sādhanāyogāt /
analyzed: tatra tad pūrvaka tvāt vaidharmya pratīteḥ ṛju mārgeṇa sidhyataḥ rthasya vakreṇa sādhana ayogāt
vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ ca yādṛśaḥ bhāvayoḥ
tad abhāvayoḥ tad viparītaḥ bodhyavyaḥ

original: anyathā sapakṣaikadeśavartī na hetuḥ syāditi manyamāno vārtikakāra āha---udāharaṇamavītahetāviti /
analyzed: anyathā sapakṣa eka deśa vartī na hetuḥ syāt iti manyamānaḥ vārtikakāraḥ āha audāharaṇam avīta hetau iti
tat ca asmābhiḥ sūtram yojayadbhiḥ uktam iti

original: atra ācāryadeśīyāṇām anārṣasūtrapāṭhadūṣaṇaṃ nāsmākamārṣasūtrapāṭhe 'stiti pratipipādayiṣurācāryadeśīyānāṃ pāṭhamabhiprāyaṃ cāha---anye tviti
analyzed: atra ācārya deśīyāṇām anārṣa sūtra pāṭha dūṣaṇam na asmākam ārṣa sūtra pāṭhe stiti pratipipādayiṣuḥ ācārya deśīyānām pāṭham abhiprāyam ca āha anye tu iti
ārṣe hi pāṭhe sāmānādhikaraṇyāt dṛṣṭāntasya artha rūpasya
śabda rūpeṇa udāharaṇena aikyam syāt
yadā tu dṛṣṭāntasya udāharaṇam iti pāṭhaḥ
tadā na ayam doṣaḥ
dūṣaṇam ca apareṣām
yathā na dṛṣṭāntasya udāharaṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyam
evam tad dharma bhāvi tvasya artha rūpasya
sva viṣaya vacana upalakṣaṇa tvena tu sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭānte tulyam
tasmāt ārṣam eva astu iti
ārṣe pi pāṭhe para uktam dūṣaṇam upanyasyati etasmin api iti
upahāse kilakāraḥ
ṇi antāt bhavateḥ tācchīlye ṇininā bhāvi iti vyutpannam
tathā ca tad dharma kāri tvam arthaḥ

original: na ca jñāpanādanyā kriyā saṃbhavatīti gamakatvam /
analyzed: na ca jñāpanāt anyā kriyā saṃbhavati iti gamaka tvam
tat ca sarveṣām avayavānām abhinnam iti sādhāraṇa tvāt na vaktavyam iti arthaḥ
tat etat abhyupagamena eva pariharati na ayam iti

original: anye tu taddharmabhāvītyetad vikalpya dūṣayantītyāha---anye tviti /
analyzed: anye tu tad dharma bhāvi iti etat vikalpya dūṣayanti iti āha anye tu iti
tatra prathama kalpe dūṣaṇam āhuḥ tat yadi iti
na ayam sūtra arthaḥ sarva avayava sādhāraṇyāt iti

original: tasmāt na kiñcidetat taddharmaṃ bhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti /
analyzed: tasmāt na kiñcid etat tad dharmam bhāvayitum śīlam asya iti
dvitīya kalpe dūṣaṇam āhuḥ daṇḍi nyāyaḥ tu iti
saṃbhave vyabhicāre ca syāt viśeṣaṇam arthavat
na saṃbhava mātre iti arthaḥ

original: tadidaṃ pareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍinyāyamālambya pariharati---na vaktavyamiti /
analyzed: tat idam pareṣām dūṣaṇam daṇḍi nyāyam ālambya pariharati na vaktavyam iti
saṃbhava vyabhicārābhyām samartham viśeṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
na bahuvrīhau iti
anya padārtha vivakṣayā eveniḥ āśrīyate

original: sā ca bahuvrīhiṇai labhyata iti kṛtamatreninetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sā ca labhyate iti
suhṛd bhāvena ced
atas eva āha atha avaśyam iti prayojana antaram bhāvī grahaṇasya anvācinoti santi iti

original: atra ca vasubandhunā pratijñādayastrayo 'vayavā durvihitā akṣapādalakṣaṇenetyuktam,
analyzed: atra ca vasubandhunā pratijñā ādayaḥ trayaḥ vayavāḥ durvihitāḥ akṣapāda lakṣaṇena iti uktam
tat dūṣayati tat etasmin iti

original: tadevamudāharaṇalakṣaṇamupapādya pareṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasya vyācaṣṭe---yathā siddha iti /
analyzed: tat evam udāharaṇa lakṣaṇam upapādya pareṣām lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasya vyācaṣṭe yathā siddhe iti

original: yathā ca sa eva sādhyo viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayabhedabheditveneti,
analyzed: yathā ca saḥ eva sādhyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ pratyaya bheda bhedi tvena iti
pratyayaḥ kāraṇam
tat etat sādhya sādhanavat tvam dṛṣṭāntasya bauddha rāddhānte vyāpakam
sthālī ādau dṛṣṭānte kṛtaka tva anitya tva rūpa sādhya sādhanavat tva vaikalyāt

original: prāgabhāvo hi sthālyāḥ kṛtakatvaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityatā rāddhānte bauddhānām /
analyzed: prāgabhāvaḥ hi sthālyāḥ kṛtaka tvam pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca anitya tā rāddhānte bauddhānām
na ca evam ubhayam sthālyām asti
tasyāḥ sva abhāva virodhi tvāt iti dūṣayati atra visphūrjatā api iti
etena iti avyāpaka tvena nidarśyate smin anena vā iti nidarśanam
sādhyena anugamaḥ hetoḥ sādhya abhāve ca na astitā
iti ca pratyuktam kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ sthālyām asaṃbhava darśanāt avyāpaka tvena

original: asmadrāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālyādau saṃbhavaḥ tathoktaṃ hetulakṣaṇasūtra iti /
analyzed: asmad rāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālī ādau saṃbhavaḥ tathā uktam hetu lakṣaṇa sūtre iti
bhāṣye paṇḍita rūpa vedanīyam iti praśasta paṇḍita vedanīyam iti arthaḥ

original: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
analyzed: udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ

original: svapratipattau vyāptismaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ na tatheti vā parāmarśajñānotpādādudāharaṇavacanasya
analyzed: sva pratipattau vyāpti smaraṇa anantaram tathā ca ayam na tathā iti vā parāmarśa jñāna utpādāt udāharaṇa vacanasya
ca vyāpti pratipādaka tvāt parāmarśa jñāne hetoḥ upanayasya udāharaṇa pūrvaka tva niyamāt
udāharaṇa anantaram upanayam lakṣayati udāyaḥ
apekṣā padam bhāṣyakṛt vyācaṣṭe udāharaṇa tantre iti
udāharaṇa vaśaḥ
vaśyataḥ iti vaśaḥ
vaśinaḥ udāharaṇasya vaśyaḥ iti arthaḥ
etat eva karmaṇaḥ bhāvam niṣkṛṣya vivṛṇot tivaśaḥ
sāmarthyam
vaśyena udāharaṇasya phalena upanayena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
tathātva atathātvayoḥ viṣayam vibhajate sādhya sādharmya yuktaḥ iti
nanu hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ apanayaḥ na sādhyasya

original: tathā cānupapannaḥ sādhyasyopasaṃhāra ityata uktam---sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamiti /
analyzed: tathā ca anupapannaḥ sādhyasya upasaṃhāraḥ iti atas uktam sādhyasya śabdasya utpatti dharmaka tvam iti
udāharaṇa siddha vyāptika hetumat tayā sādhyam upasaṃhriyate na sva rūpeṇa iti arthaḥ
atra api udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: tathā na tatheti sāmānyalakṣaṇāpekṣe viśeṣalakṣaṇe iti bodhyavyam //
analyzed: tathā na tathā iti sāmānya lakṣaṇa apekṣe viśeṣa lakṣaṇe iti

original: atra kecit āhuḥ hetuvacanādeva sodāharaṇāt sādhyasiddherasādhanāṅgamupanaya iti /
analyzed: atra kecid āhuḥ hetu vacanāt eva sodāharaṇāt sādhya siddheḥ asādhana aṅgam upanayaḥ iti
tat nirākartum āha vārttikakāraḥ yathā tathā iti pratibimbana artham
tat etat praśna pūrvakam vibhajate kim punar iti

original: tadanena vyutpannāvyutpannatayā pareṣāmaniyatapratipattisādhanatvāt svapratipattyanusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ /
analyzed: tat anena vyutpanna avyutpanna tayā pareṣām aniyata pratipatti sādhana tvāt sva pratipatti anusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ
vyāpti smaraṇa anantara utpanna liṅga parāmarśa pūrvakaḥ ca svayam anumeya artha pratyayaḥ iti tathā eva pare bodhyante
tathā ca parāmarśa jñāna hetoḥ upanayasya siddham arthavat tvam
na ca yathā liṅga parāmarśa jñāna anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam anumeya jñānasya
tathā dadhi bhakṣaṇa ādi anuvidhānam api
yena atiprasaṅgaḥ codyeta iti
prayojana antaram upanayasya āha sādhye vā saṃbhave iti
codayati nanu ca iti
yadi api sādhanatayā kṛtaka tvam uktam
pratijñā anantaram sādhanasya eva apekṣita tvat

original: tathāpi tannāsiddhaṃ tatra sādhanatvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti svasiddhimākṣipati sāmarthyāditi bhāva /
analyzed: tathā api tat na asiddham tatra sādhana tvena vyavatiṣṭhate iti sva siddhim ākṣipati sāmarthyāt iti bhāva
pariharati na uktaḥ iti

original: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti śābdāḥ /
analyzed: yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti śābdāḥ
sādhanatva paraḥ ca kṛtaka tvāt iti sāmarthyāt
ākṣepe tu udāharaṇam api na prayoktavyam

original: asyāpi sādhanasāmarthyādākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhanatvāyogāt tadvidhasyāpi prameyatvādeḥ
analyzed: asya api sādhana sāmarthyāt ākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhana tva ayogāt tadvidhasya api prameya tva ādeḥ
śabda nitya tva ādau sādhanatva bhrameṇa siddhe api tulyaḥ iti vyāpti pradarśana artha udāharaṇa prayoga vat hetoḥ
siddha tva pratipādanāya upanayasi api prayogaḥ iti ramaṇīyam
hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam
nigamana lakṣaṇa avatāra param bhāṣyam dvividhasya punar iti

original: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānāmapi hetūdāharaṇopanayānāṃ samānaṃ nigamanalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānām api hetu udāharaṇa upanayānām samānam nigamana lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
hetvanam tasmāt iti

original: hetvapadeśāt taddhetukam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam /
analyzed: hetu apadeśāt tad hetukam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam
yadi api ca siddha nirdeśaḥ nigamanam
sādhya nirdeśaḥ ca pratijñā
tathā api yasya eva pratijñāyām sādhya tvam āsīt

original: tasyaiva nigamane siddhatvamityavasthāvantamekamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā nigamanaṃ pratijñetyupacaryate /
analyzed: tasya eva nigamane siddha tvam iti avasthāvantam ekam āśritya samāna viṣaya tayā nigamanam pratijñā iti upacaryate
tathā ca punarvacanam api upapannam
tat etat bhāṣyakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe sādharmya uktaḥ iti
vyutpādayati nigamyante iti
sādharmya vaidharmyayoḥ pratijñātaḥ prabhṛti nigamana antam prayogam āha tatra iti

original: atra prathamasūtravadeva yathāsvamavayaveṣu pramāṇānāṃ paramanyāyaṃ stotuṃ saṃbhavamāha---avayavasamudāye ceti /
analyzed: atra prathama sūtra vat eva yathāsvam avayaveṣu pramāṇānām parama nyāyam stotum saṃbhavam āha avayava samudāye ca iti
āpta upadeśasya iti
sa id ava somya idam agre āsīt
ityādeḥ āpta upadeśasya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām pratisandhānāt
nanu kasmāt pratijñā eva āpta upadeśaḥ na bhavati
kṛtam asyāḥ āgama antara viṣaya tvena iti atas āha anṛṣeḥ ca iti
anumānam hetuḥ
syāt etat
dvitīyam liṅga darśanam hetuḥ
na ca tad anumānam
tṛtīyasya upanaya viṣayasya liṅga darśanasya tathā bhāvāt iti atas āha audāharaṇe iti
udāharaṇe dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi

original: sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhaṃ saṃdṛśya samyag dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ //
analyzed: sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratibandham saṃdṛśya samyak dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ
etat uktam bhavati yadi api trayāṇām api liṅga darśanānām sa smṛtīnām anumāna tvam

original: tathāpi tadekadeśe madhyame 'pi liṅgadarśane samudāyopacārādanumānavyapadeśa iti /
analyzed: tathā api tad eka deśe madhyame pi liṅga darśane samudāya upacārāt anumāna vyapadeśaḥ iti
pratyakṣa viṣayam udāharaṇam

original: kasmāt? dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhyadharmiṇyanumeyasya siddheḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhya dharmiṇī anumeyasya siddheḥ
yadi punar na mūlam pratyakṣam āsthīyeta
avyavasthayā na adṛṣṭam sidhyet iti bhāvaḥ
nigama prayojanam pratipādayati sarveṣām iti

original: pratijñādīnāmupanayāntānāmeko 'rthaḥ svabhāvapratibaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ vā anumeyaṃ vā,
analyzed: pratijñā ādīnām upanaya antānām ekaḥ rthaḥ svabhāva pratibaddham liṅgam vā anumeyam vā
tasya pratipattiḥ
tasyām sāmarthya pradarśanam nigamanam iti
tat anena ekārtha tvam darśitam
dvividham ca prayojanam
tatra avāntaram svabhāva pratibaddha liṅ pratītiḥ
paramam ca sādhya pratītiḥ iti
saṃprati vibhāge sākāṅkṣa tvam darśayati itaretara abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti
abhisaṃbandhena phalena ākāṅkṣām upalakṣayati asatyām iti
pradhānam hi pratijñā padam

original: taduttarakālaṃ hi sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ pratijñāmāśritya hetupadaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tad uttara kālam hi sādhana ākāṅkṣāyām pratijñām āśritya hetu padam pravartate
na punar prathamam eva hetu epekṣā iti hetu lakṣaṇe smābhiḥ upapāditam iti
hetu pada virahe ākāṅkṣām darśayati asati hetau iti
udāharaṇa abhāve pekṣām āha asati udāharaṇe iti
upanaya abhāve pi apekṣām āha aupanayam ca antareṇa iti
nigamana abhāve pi apekṣām āha nigamana abhāve ca iti

original: avayavānāṃ prātisvikaṃ prayojanamuktamapi śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati---atheti /
analyzed: avayavānām prātisvikam prayojanam uktam api śiṣya hita tayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati atha iti
pañca avayava pratipādana prayatnasya prayojanam darśayati na ca etasyām iti
katham punar prakramate iti āha a vyavasthāpya iti

original: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteravasara ityāha---vyavasthite hīti //
analyzed: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteḥ avasaraḥ iti āha vyavasthite hi iti
atra kecid āhuḥ nigamanam asādhana aṅgam
katham pratijñayā gatārtha tvāt iti

original: tanmatam apākartuṃ vārttikakāraḥ saprayojanaṃ nigamanaṃ darśayati---pratijñāviṣayasyārthasyeti /
analyzed: tad matam apākartum vārttikakāraḥ sa prayojanam nigamanam darśayati pratijñā viṣayasya arthasya iti

original: caturbhiḥ khalvavayavairhetostrīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite,
analyzed: caturbhiḥ khalu avayavaiḥ hetoḥ trīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite
na tu abādhita viṣayatva asat pratipakṣita tve

original: pañcasaṃ vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoravinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate /
analyzed: vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoḥ avinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate
tasmāt abādhita viṣaya tva asat pratipakṣita tva rūpa dvaya saṃsūcanāya nigamanam
tat idam uktam viparīta prasaṅga pratiṣedha artham iti
bādhane pratipakṣe vā sādhya viparīta prasaṅgaḥ syāt iti

original: so 'yaṃ pratijñāviṣayārthasya aśeṣapramāṇamūlāvayavopapattau satyāṃ pratijñeyasyārthasya siddhatayā punarvacanena nigamanena pratiṣidhyate
analyzed: saḥ yam pratijñā viṣaya arthasya aśeṣa pramāṇa mūla avayava upapattau satyām pratijñeyasya arthasya siddha tayā punarvacanena nigamanena pratiṣidhyate
na ca pratijñā vacanāt eva tad siddhiḥ
tasya sādhya para tvāt
na ca anya parāt api ākṣepāt siddhiḥ hetu ādi pada aprayoga vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
pratijñāte eva sarva ākṣepa saṃbhavāt
tasmāt rūpa dvaya pratipādana artham nigamanam

original: yathā ca trairūpyātiriktametadrūpadvayaṃ tathopapāditam asmābhiḥ prathamasūtre /
analyzed: yathā ca trairūpya atiriktam etat rūpa dvayam tathā upapāditam asmābhiḥ prathama sūtre
hetvābhāseṣu ca śeṣam darśayiṣyate iti

original: etasmin sūtrārthe parasya pratijñāyāṃ nigamanaṃ gatārthaṃ manyamānasya avakāśo nāstīti //
analyzed: etasmin sūtra arthe parasya pratijñāyām nigamanam gatārtham manyamānasya avakāśaḥ na asti iti

original: yastu manyeta na hetoravinābhāvasiddhimantareṇa siddhanirdeśo nigamanaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ tu manyeta na hetoḥ avinābhāva siddhim antareṇa siddha nirdeśaḥ nigamanam bhavati
na ca pāñcarūpyam vinā avinābhāva siddhiḥ
nigamanāt tu tad siddhau na siddha nirdeśaḥ nigamanam
api tu tat api sādhya nirdeśe eva iti
tam pratyupetya tad doṣa nirācikīrṣayā pareṣām vākyam upakṣipyate
pareṣām vākyam paṭhati upanaya nigamane tu iti
dūṣayati idam tāvat iti
yathāśruti hi nigamana upanayayoḥ abhedam sādhayati
artha gatam ca aviśeṣam hetum āha tat ca etat āloka tamasoḥ aikyam kākasya kārṣya ādi vat āpatitam
śaṅkate atha hetu upanayau iti
ca etat
pratijñā nigamane iti api draṣṭavyam
artha aviśeṣāt iti ca aviśiṣṭa artha tvāt iti unnetavyam
tathā ca saṃbandhaḥ iti śaṅkituḥ abhiprāyaḥ
atra api doṣam āha sa vipakṣa iti
punar śaṅkate atha eka prayojana tvena iti
nirākaroti tathā api iti
sidhyati eka prayojana tve sādhye hetoḥ avirodhaḥ
hetuḥ tu na pratijñā arthāt atiticyate iti arthaḥ
tat varṇitam iti
anyaḥ ca hetvarthaḥ nyaḥ ca upanaya arthaḥ iti etat varṇitam iti arthaḥ
etena upanaya nigamana prayojana abhidhānena ye tri avayavam vākyam āhuḥ
tad matam api parāstam iti āha pakṣa dharma tva iti

original: yacca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇaṃ vikalpyābhyadhāyi tat tāvadupanyasyati---yadapi yathā tatheti /
analyzed: yat ca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇam vikalpya abhyadhāyi tat tāvat upanyasyati yat api yathā tathā iti
sarva sāmānya yoge hi tat eva syāt
na tu tathā iti
anyathā śabdasya kṛtaka tvāt iti
na hi yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaḥ
tathā śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ
ghaṭa śabdayoḥ abheda prasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt sāmānyapratiṣedhe viśeṣapratiṣedhe ca kṛtakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pariśiṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmānya pratiṣedhe viśeṣa pratiṣedhe ca kṛtaka tvam sāmānyam pariśiṣyate
tasya ca yathā tathābhāvayoḥ abhāvāt kṛtaka tvāt iti eva syāt

original: tathā ca na hetorvyatireka upanayaḥ syādityāha---pariśeṣāditi /
analyzed: tathā ca na hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ upanayaḥ syāt iti āha pariśeṣāt iti
tat etat pareṣām dūṣaṇam nirākaroti tat api ayuktam iti
yathā tathā iti vākyam upamāna eka deśam upamānam upacārāt
upamānam arthaḥ yasya saḥ yam upamāna arthaḥ upanayaḥ
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt
tat ca upamānam na sarvathā sādhya sādhana bhāvam āśritya pravartate

original: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtakatvasya sthālīgatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālītvādyekārthasamavāyaḥ tamāśritya na pravartate /
analyzed: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtaka tvasya sthālī gatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālī tva ādi ekārtha samavāyaḥ tam āśritya na pravartate

original: tathā ca śabdasthālyoḥ abhedaprasaṅgād yathā tathetyeva na syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca śabda sthālyoḥ abheda prasaṅgāt yathā tathā iti eva na syāt
tasmāt sthālī stha prakāra antara vyudāsena kṛtaka tva sāmānya mātra sādhāraṇyena yathā tathā iti upamāna upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu evam api kṛtaka tva sāmānya mātram śabde syāt
na tu yathā tathābhāvaḥ

original: tathā ca na hetoratireka ityuktamityata āha---kṛtakatvasāmānyaṃ tviti /
analyzed: tathā ca na hetoḥ atirekaḥ iti uktam iti atas āha kṛtaka tva sāmānyam tu iti

original: na hi jātu śāvaleyasannidhau gotvasāmānyamātraṃ bhavati,
analyzed: na hi jātu śāvaleya sannidhau go tva sāmānya mātram bhavati
api tu viśeṣa sahitam
tathā ca yathā tathābhāvaḥ upapannaḥ iti arthaḥ
etena yat paraiḥ upanayasya dṛṣṭāntāt abhinna tvam varṇitam
tat api parāstam iti āha gatārtha tvāt iti
anena upamāna samāna tva varṇanena
etat eva vibhajate yat api uktam iti

original: vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāvyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhāra upanaya iti mahān bheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpti pradarśana viṣayaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭa avyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhya dharmiṇī upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti mahān bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etena nigamanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ samānābhidheyatve 'pi pratijñārthatvena pratyuktam,
analyzed: etena nigamanam pratijñāyāḥ samāna abhidheya tve pi pratijñā artha tvena pratyuktam
pratijñāyāḥ sādhya paratvāt nigamanasya ca viparīta śaṅkā nivṛtti paratvāt iti
prayojana bheda sāmānya mātra vivakṣayā etena iti uktam

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasminnanvayavyatirekiṇyeva vītāvītavākye pañcāvayave udāhṛte /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasmin anvaya vyatirekiṇi eva vīta avīta vākye pañca avayave udāhṛte

original: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syādekodāharaṇatayā dve api vākye parasparāpekṣe eveti,
analyzed: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syāt eka udāharaṇatayā dve api vākye paraspara apekṣe eva iti
tad nirākaraṇāya āhate ete iti
na punar anvayi vyatireki ca iti ekam
avijñāta tattve rthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ
atra bhāṣyam tarka lakṣaṇa avatāra param atas ūrdhvam iti
uddeśa krama anusāreṇa
a vitarkaḥ

original: //40// tarkapravṛttikramamāha---avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe iti yadyapi saṃśayasya paścādeva jijñāsā bhavati,
analyzed: tarka pravṛtti kramam āha avijñāyamāna tattve rthe iti yadi api saṃśayasya paścāt eva jijñāsā bhavati
tathā api jijñāsāyāḥ parastāt api saṃśayaḥ bhavati
sa ca atra vivakṣitaḥ
tarka pravṛtti aṅga tvāt

original: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅgāparanāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayorekataraniṣedhenaikataraḥ pramāṇaviṣayatayā abhyanujñātavya iti viṣayapratyāsattyā tarkapravṛttiṃ  #
analyzed: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅga apara nāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayoḥ ekatara niṣedhena ekataraḥ pramāṇa viṣaya tayā abhyanujñātavyaḥ iti viṣaya pratyāsattyā tarka pravṛttim
pratyaṅga tā saṃśayasya iti
kāraṇa upapattyā iti vyācaṣṭe saṃbhavati asmin kāraṇam pramāṇam iti
atra ca kāraṇam iti asya vyākhyānam pramāṇam iti
upapatti vyākhyānam saṃbhavati iti
anujñā vyākhyānam
evavam etat
na itarat iti
etat uktam bhavati

original: yasmin viṣaye pramāṇaṃ pravartitumudyataṃ tadviparyayāśaṅkāyāṃ na tāvat pramāṇaṃ pravartate,
analyzed: yasmin viṣaye pramāṇam pravartitum udyatam tad viparyaya āśaṅkāyām na tāvat pramāṇam pravartate
na yāvat aniṣṭi āpattyā viparyaya āśaṅkā apanīyate

original: tadapanaya eva ca svaviṣaye pramāṇasaṃbhava iti copapattiriti vyākhyāyate /
analyzed: tad apanayaḥ eva ca sva viṣaye pramāṇa saṃbhavaḥ iti ca upapattiḥ iti vyākhyāyate

original: tayā pramāṇasyopapattyā itikartavyatayā pramāṇaviṣayamabhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇāmapratyūhaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tayā pramāṇasya upapattyā itikartavya tayā pramāṇa viṣayam abhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇām apratyūham pravartate

original: na copapattirevāstu niścayahetuḥ kṛtaṃ pramāṇeneti vaktavyam /
analyzed: na ca upapattiḥ evā astu niścaya hetuḥ kṛtam pramāṇena iti vaktavyam
upapatteḥ svatantrāyāḥ āśraya asiddha tayā svatas niścaya ayogāt
tat upapāditam prathama sūtre iti
udāharaṇam āha nidarśanam iti

original: svakṛtasya karmaṇa ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇamityantena saṃsāro darśitaḥ /
analyzed: sva kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇam iti antena saṃsāraḥ darśitaḥ
uttara ityādinā upavargaḥ ityantena apavargaḥ

original: tena saṃsārāpavargāvicchantau vādiprativādinau prati ātmanityatvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: tena saṃsāra apavargau icchantau vādi prativādinau prati ātma nitya tva viṣayam pramāṇam

original: pravartamānamanena tarkeṇānugṛhyata iti pramāṇaviṣayaviparyayānanujñaiva ca pramāṇaviṣayābhyanujñā,
analyzed: pravartamānam anena tarkeṇa anugṛhyate iti pramāṇa viṣaya viparyaya ananujñā eva ca pramāṇa viṣaya abhyanujñā
aniṣṭa prasaktyā viparyayasya eva sākṣāt nivartanāt

original: ata evānte bhāṣyakāra upasaṃjahāra---yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati,
analyzed: atas eva ante bhāṣyakāraḥ upasaṃjahāra yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānam paśyati
tat na anujānāti iti
nanu yadi tarkaḥ evam etat
na itarat iti evam ākāraḥ

original: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tu tattvajñānameveteti deśayati---kathaṃ punariti /
analyzed: katham punar ayam tattva jñāna arthaḥ na tu tattva jñānam eva iti deśayati katham punar iti
pariharati anavadhāraṇāt iti
paryāyaiḥ niścayāt atyanta bhedaḥ uktaḥ
bhāvitāt cintitāt
atas eva prasannāt
pramāṇa sāmarthyāt iti svātantryam apākaroti
syāt etat yadi na tarkaḥ tattva niścaya sādhanam api tu pramāṇam eva

original: hanta bhoḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi vāde pramāṇatarkasādhanetyuktamityata āha---so 'yaṃ tarka iti /
analyzed: hanta bhoḥ kimartham tarhi vāde pramāṇa tarka sādhanā iti uktam iti atas āha saḥ yam tarkaḥ iti
vyakti abhiprāyeṇa pramāṇāni iti
pramāṇa viṣaya viparyaṃya āśaṅkā vighaṭitāni pramāṇāni pratisaṃdadhānaḥ iti arthaḥ
vārttikakāraḥ
sūtra tātparyam āha asya iti
samāna jātīyāt saṃśaya ādeḥ asamāna jātīyāt ca icchā ādeḥ vyavacchidyate
yadi api saṃśaya jijñāse api avijñāta tattve rthe pravartete

original: tathāpi na kāraṇopapattita iti tayorvyavaccheda iti /
analyzed: tathā api na kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti tayoḥ vyavacchedaḥ iti
tattvam vyācaṣṭe yathā iti
samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchinnam aviparītam rūpam tattvam iti arthaḥ
codayati kutas punar iti
na hi sāmānya jñāna vidhāyakam padam atra asti iti arthaḥ
pariharati avijñātā iti
viśeṣa niṣedhaḥ śeṣa abhyanujñā hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
vimṛśati avijñāta tattvaḥ iti samāsaḥ yam iti
avadhārayati ṣaṣṭhī vigraheṇa iti
yuktam upapannam
tṛtīyā vigraheṇa tu u napapannam iti arthaḥ
saṃśaya vādi āha viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt iti
yuktam iti pratijñā mātreṇa ucyate

original: na tvatra hetuḥ abhidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu atra hetuḥ abhidhīyate iti bhāvaḥ
yukta tve hetum āha yuktam artha grahaṇa sāmarthyāt iti
anyaḥ codayati artha grahaṇam antareṇa api iti

original: jñeyena hi jñānaṃ nirūpyate na jñātrā,
analyzed: jñeyena hi jñānam nirūpyate na jñātrā
tasya sādhāraṇyāt iti sāmarthyam iti arthaḥ
nigūḍha abhisandhiḥ pariharati evam api iti
tasya abhisandhi bhedam urarīkṛtya codayati mā bhūt samāsaḥ iti
uttaravādī āha bhavati evam iti

original: nādyāpi anena svābhiprāyo darśita iti mattvā punaścodayati---anukte 'pīti /
analyzed: na adya api anena sva abhiprāyaḥ darśitaḥ iti mattvā punar codayati an ukte pi iti
ukta parihāra pūrvam sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati atra uktam iti samasta anabhidhāna prasaṅgāt ca iti sva abhiprāya udghāṭanam
etat uktam bhavati

original: sāmarthyaprāptasyānabhidhāne 'tiprasaṅga iti na sāmarthyamāśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayo nirākaraṇīya iti tannirākaraṇārthamarthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti
analyzed: sāmarthya prāptasya anabhidhāne tiprasaṅgaḥ iti na sāmarthyam āśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayaḥ nirākaraṇīyaḥ iti tad nirākaraṇa artham artha grahaṇam kartavyam iti
atra codayati avijñāta tatve iti na vaktavyam iti

original: na hi tattve jñāte tattvajñānārthitā bhavati /
analyzed: na hi tattve jñāte tattva jñāna arthitā bhavati
tasmāt gamyate avijñāta tattvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
guḍha abhisandhiḥ uktam parihāram smārayati atra tāvat uktam iti
a vidita abhiprāyaḥ ca udakaḥ āha mā bhūt iti
astu ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti etāvat eva iti arthaḥ
uttaravādī sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati na

original: yadyapi nāsmākaṃ rāddhānte śuśrūṣādayo buddhidharmā buddhitattvasyaivābhāvāt,
analyzed: yadi api na asmākam rāddhānte śuśrūṣā ādayaḥ buddhi dharmāḥ buddhi tattvasya eva abhāvāt
tathā api ātma guṇāḥ api sāṃkhya abhiprāyeṇa buddhi guṇāḥ uktāḥ
etat uktam bhavati
yadi ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti etāvat ucyeta
yadi vā tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti etāvat mātram

original: tato vijñāte 'pi tattve ya ūhaḥ pūrvānubhūtaparicchedātmā jāyate punastattvajñānārthaṃ so 'pi tarkaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tatas vijñāte pi tattve yaḥ ūhaḥ pūrva anubhūta pariccheda ātmā jāyate punar tattva jñāna artham saḥ pi tarkaḥ syāt
tasmāt avijñāta tattvaḥ iti vaktavyam iti arthaḥ
yadi api kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti etasmāt ayam arthaḥ gamyate eva
tathā api kāraṇa upapatteḥ eva evaṃrūpa tvam na avijñāta tattva grahaṇam antareṇa bhavati

original: tathā hi adhigataparicchedātmāpyūhaḥ kāraṇasyopapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate,
analyzed: tathā hi adhigata pariccheda ātmā api ūhaḥ kāraṇasya upapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate
kāraṇa saṃbhave kāryasya abhāvāt
na tu asau avijñāta tattvaḥ iti tatas vyavacchedaḥ

original: tathā ca sati pramāṇamapi tarkaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca sati pramāṇam api tarkaḥ syāt
atas uktam kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti
ukte sati prayojana anusaraṇam
na tu iha lāghava ādaraḥ sūtrakārasya iti mantavyam
codayati ṣaṣṭhī abhidhānam iti
pariharati na vibhakti vyatyayāt iti
yathā anyatra kaṇabhujaḥ sūtre
vipratipannaḥ pṛcchati kasmāt
praṣṭā eva eka granthena āha yadi vyatyayena iti
pariharati na na yuktaḥ iti
sāmānyena adhigatasya viśeṣeṇa jñāpana artham

original: nityatvādayo viśeṣāḥ samavāyino vahnyādayaśca dhūmādisaṃyogina iti /
analyzed: nitya tva ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ samavāyinaḥ vahni ādayaḥ ca dhūma ādi saṃyoginaḥ iti
śeṣam sugamam
deśayati ūhaḥ saṃśaya nirṇayābhyām iti
kecid siddhānta ekadeśinaḥ anumānam tarkaḥ iti āhuḥ

original: anye tvanumānameva yuktyapekṣaṃ viparyaye 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāpekṣaṃ tarka iti varṇayanti /
analyzed: anye tu anumānam eva yukti apekṣam viparyaye niṣṭa prasaṅga apekṣam tarkaḥ iti varṇayanti
tatra prathamam codakam pratyāhayat tāvat iti
ākṣiptaḥ ākṣipta hṛdayaḥ
na tu tarka pratyaya svarūpam cetayate iti arthaḥ

original: viśeṣadarśanāditi viśeṣadarśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa,
analyzed: viśeṣa darśanāt iti viśeṣa darśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa
tad anujñāna mātra tvāt tarkasya iti arthaḥ
codakam nirākṛtya siddhānta ekadeśinam nirākaroti etena iti
yadi saṃśayāt pracyutaḥ nirṇayam ca a prāptaḥ

original: tarhi tasya svarūpaṃ vaktavyamiti pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
analyzed: tarhi tasya svarūpam vaktavyam iti pṛcchati kim punar iti
uttaram bhavet iti
pramāṇa viṣaya abhyanujñā iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam eka deśinam nirākaroti yaiḥ api iti
yuktiḥ iha pramāṇa upapattiḥ
tad janmā ca pratyayaḥ tarkaḥ eva
sa ca anumānam iti tvayā ucyate
asmābhiḥ tu tarkaḥ iti saṃjñā bheda mātram iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate atha iti
nirākaroti anumānam iti
prasaṅga upapatti atiriktāyāḥ yukteḥ anirūpaṇāt apekṣā arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ
na hi apekṣaṇīyam antareṇa apekṣā śakyā nirūpayitum iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadeva kiścit svaviṣayādhigame anumānamapekṣate saivāpekṣaṇīyā yuktiranumānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svaviṣayadhigame ceti //
analyzed: nanu yat eva kiścid sva viṣaya adhigame anumānam apekṣate sā eva apekṣaṇīyā yuktiḥ anumānasya bhaviṣyati iti atas āha sva viṣaya adhigame ca iti
śaṅkate atha iti
nirākaroti evam api iti
na vaktavyam yukti apekṣam iti
sarvasya anumānasya tathā bhāvena avyabhicāreṇa viśeṣaṇa ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
punar śaṅkate atha anumānasya iti
nirākaroti tatra api iti
evam api tarkaḥ na artha antaram sthāt

original: anumānabhedasya cedṛśasya pramāṇa evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anumāna bhedasya ca īdṛśasya pramāṇe eva antarbhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
uktam artha pramāṇayati bhavet iti
bhavet iti pratyayaḥ vadhāraṇa pratyayaḥ ca iti arthaḥ
codayati anumānam iti
viparyayaḥ niṣṭa prasaṅgaḥ vyatireki liṅgam
tat ca agṛhīta saṃbandhe liṅgiti na pravartate iti liṅga liṅgi saṃbandha smṛti apekṣa tvāt aprāṇa ādimattva prasaṅgāt iti vat anumānam eva iti arthaḥ
pariharati na tarka iti

original: yuktaṃ vyatirekiṇi jīvaccharīre dharmiṇi prāṇādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya darśanāt,
analyzed: yuktam vyatirekiṇi jīvat śarīre dharmiṇi prāṇa ādimattvasya sādhana dharmasya darśanāt
na tu yadi utpattimān ātmā abhaviṣyat

original: na saṃsārāpavargāvupapatsyetāmityatrātmani dharmiṇi sādhanadharma utpattirasti yaddarśanataḥ saṃskārodbodhe sati liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtirbhavedityarthaḥ
analyzed: na saṃsāra apavargau upapatsyetām iti atra ātmani dharmiṇi sādhana dharmaḥ utpattiḥ asti yad darśanataḥ saṃskāra udbodhe sati liṅga liṅgi saṃbandha smṛtiḥ bhavet iti arthaḥ
na kevalam prasaṅga sādhanam sādhya dharmiṇī asiddham
api tu anya gatam eva prasaṅga hetuḥ
na tu anumānam anya gatāt dharmāt pravartate
tasmāt anumānāt asya sphuṭaḥ bhedaḥ iti āha anumānam ca iti
bhāṣya vyākhyānam saḥ yam iti
vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇa nirṇayaḥ
na etat nirṇaya mātrasya lakṣaṇam
api tu parīkṣā prayojanasya
sa ca nirṇaya bhedaḥ vimarśa anantara utpanna tarka sahāya pramāṇa nibandhanaḥ tarka viṣayaḥ eva iti

original: nirṇayabhedalakṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakaṃ tatra tallakṣaṇamiti darśayituṃ bhāṣyakāro nirṇayalakṣaṇamavatārayati---etasmiśca tarkaviṣaye //
analyzed: nirṇaya bheda lakṣaṇam iti na avyāpakam tatra tat lakṣaṇam iti darśayitum bhāṣyakāraḥ nirṇaya lakṣaṇam avatārayati etasmin ca tarka viṣaye

original: vimṛ---yaḥ //42 // atra pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇayasādhanatvamityanupapattyā
analyzed: vimṛyaḥ atra pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇaya sādhanatvam iti anupapattyā

original: sādhanopālambhau vādasūtragatau lakṣaṇīyaviti tāveva tāvad bhāṣyakṛd vibhajate---sthāpanā sādhanam,
analyzed: sādhana upālambhau vāda sūtra gatau tau eva tāvat bhāṣyakṛt vibhajate sthāpanā sādhanam
pratiṣedhaḥ sādhanasya upālambhaḥ
lakṣaṇā nibandhanam saṃbandham āhatau sādhana upālambhau iti
yadi api upālambhaḥ na pratipakṣa āśritaḥ
tathā api tad uddeśena pravṛttaḥ tad āśritaḥ iti ucyate
mukhya pada upādāna ullaṅghanena lākṣaṇika pada upādāna labhyam prayojanam āha vyatiṣaktau iti
artha grahaṇa sāmarthya labhyam ekatara nirṇaya avasāna tvam āha anubandhena pravartamānau iti
etat ca vārttike sphuṭībhaviṣyati
tam eva sādhana upālambhayoḥ paraspara anubandham darśayati tayoḥ anyatarasya iti
yasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā avasthānam

original: tasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā yo 'rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā tasyāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā yaḥ rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vā tasya avadhāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: atra pakṣapratipakṣaprayogād vāde saṃśayo 'stīti vādabhrāntyā codayati---nedamiti /
analyzed: atra pakṣa pratipakṣa prayogāt vāde saṃśayaḥ sti iti vāda bhrāntyā codayati na idam iti
ekaḥ iti vādī
pratijñātam artham hetutaḥ sthāpayati

original: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vādyuktasya hetordūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
analyzed: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddham pratiṣedham vādi uktasya hetoḥ dūṣaṇam iti yāvat
uddharati dūṣaṇa ābhāsīkaroti

original: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādyuktasya hetoḥ sthāpanāhetutvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādi uktasya hetoḥ sthāpanā hetu tvam pratiṣidhyate
tasya eva vādinaḥ prativādi ukta dūṣaṇa pratiṣedha hetuḥ ca prativādinā eva uddhriyate

original: sa vādino vā prativādino vā heturvopālambho vā nivartate /
analyzed: sa vādinaḥ vā prativādinaḥ vā hetuḥ vā upālambhaḥ vā nivartate
tasmin nivṛtte yaḥ vatiṣṭhate ekaḥ
tena artha nirṇayaḥ
na dvābhyām
tasmāt ayuktam pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti

original: na tāvat saṃśayaviṣaye nirṇaye vādiprativādinau staḥ,
analyzed: na tāvat saṃśaya viṣaye nirṇaye vādi prativādinau staḥ
tayoḥ niścitayoḥ eva pravṛtteḥ
abhyupetya tu pariharati ubhābhyām iti

original: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādina upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādinaḥ upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ

original: evaṃ prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavo vādina upālambhasyāsaṃbhava iti /
analyzed: evam prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ vādinaḥ upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ iti
vimṛśya iti vimarśa kṛtvā iti
anupādeyaḥ api vimarśaḥ kārya tvāt kṛti vyāpyaḥ uktaḥ
vimṛśya iti pada upādānasya prayojanam āha saḥ yam iti
avadyotya niyamena
eka dharmi sthayoḥ iti asya vyatirekam āha yathā kriyā vat iti
viruddhayoḥ iti asya kāla bhedena vyatirekam āha eka dharmi sthayoḥ ca iti

original: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamapi tu parīkṣāviṣayasyetyāha---na cāyaṃ nirṇaya iti /
analyzed: na nirṇaya mātrasya idam lakṣaṇam api tu parīkṣā viṣayasya iti āha na ca ayam nirṇayaḥ iti
artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti etāvat mātram lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna pratyakṣe bhavati iti yojanā
hṛdi vyavasthitam abhyupagamam udghāṭayati śāstre vāde ca iti

original: na hi jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ svargādisaṃbandhanirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśo 'sti,
analyzed: na hi jyotiṣṭoma ādīnām svarga ādi saṃbandha nirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśaḥ sti
na api vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāsu vimarśaḥ
niścitayoḥ eva vādi prativādinoḥ tatra pravṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ
vārttikam saṃbandhaḥ rthaḥ ca pūrvavat
saṃbandhaḥ uddeśa krameṇa tarka ānantarya lakṣaṇaḥ
arthaḥ ca prayojanam
śeṣam bhāṣya vyākhyānena gatam

original: nanu bhavatu pakṣaśabdalakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayaṃ prati karaṇatvam,
analyzed: nanu bhavatu pakṣa śabda lakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayam prati karaṇa tvam

original: pratipakṣalakṣitasya tu taddūṣaṇasya na sākṣātsādhakatvamityata āha---pratipakṣācceti hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratipakṣa lakṣitasya tu tad dūṣaṇasya na sākṣāt sādhaka tvam iti atas āha pratipakṣāt ca iti hetu tvam pāramparyeṇa iti arthaḥ
pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti
sādhana dūṣaṇābhyām iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇam ācikṣipsuḥ vikalpayati kva punar ayam iti
atra pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva iti prathamaḥ kalpaḥ

original: tadā hi yata evakāraḥ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇamiti nirṇaye niyamo bhavet /
analyzed: tadā hi yatas eva kāraḥ tatas nyatra avadhāraṇam iti nirṇaye niyamaḥ bhavet
nirṇayaḥ eva iti dvitīyaḥ kalpaḥ
tadā hi pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti atra niyamaḥ
vimṛśya eva iti ca tṛtīyaḥ
tadā api nirṇaye niyamaḥ
tatra prathamam kalpam ākṣipati yadi vimṛśya iti

original: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣavimarśātilaṅghanenānyatra na pravartata iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nirṇayaphalaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa vimarśa atilaṅghanena anyatra na pravartate iti pratyakṣam pramāṇam nirṇaya phalam na syāt
na hi tatra pakṣa pratipakṣau

original: nāpi vimarśa iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na api vimarśaḥ iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam bādhyate iti arthaḥ
tṛtīya kalpam ākṣipati etena iti
vyāghātena iti arthaḥ
dvitīye kalpe dūṣaṇam āha atha pakṣa iti

original: tadā nirṇayasyāniyamāt pakṣapratipakṣau ca tadabhāvaśceti tadubhayam,
analyzed: tadā nirṇayasya aniyamāt pakṣa pratipakṣau ca tad abhāvaḥ ca iti tat ubhayam
tad āśrayaḥ nirṇayaḥ
tathā ca avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
prathamam kalpam ālambya samādhatte tarka viṣayaḥ iti
na nirṇaya mātrasya idam lakṣaṇam
api tu nirṇaya viśeṣasya iti arthaḥ

original: na nirṇaya iti na nirṇayamātra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na nirṇaye iti na nirṇaya mātre iti arthaḥ
atha nirṇayasya kim iti nirṇaya mātrasya iti arthaḥ
ekaśas ca pramāṇaiḥ iti pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ
saṃhatya ca pramāṇaiḥ iti sādhana dūṣaṇa samādhānaiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva vāde nirṇayo na tu vimarśaḥ /
analyzed: pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva vāde nirṇayaḥ na tu vimarśaḥ

original: śāstre tu nirṇaya eva na tu tatra śāstrātiriktaṃ sādhanāntaramāśrīyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: śāstre tu nirṇayaḥ eva na tu tatra śāstra atiriktam sādhana antaram āśrīyate iti arthaḥ
pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti

original: lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi yena yat lakṣyate tadavacchedakatayā tadapi buddhau sannidhīyate /
analyzed: lakṣaṇāyām hi yena yat lakṣyate tad avacchedaka tayā tat api buddhau sannidhīyate
tatas ca tena niyamaḥ bhavati lakṣyamāṇasya
yathā gaṅgāyām dhoṣaḥ iti
gaṅgā saṃbandhyā iva tīram ghoṣeṇa anvīyate
na tu akūpāra tīram api iti
codayati artha iti
pariharati na na iti
artha grahaṇe kriyamāṇe kālpanika tvam pratiṣidhyate
na ca akalpitam viruddha dharma vat iti ekatara nirṇayaḥ
na idam pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām ityādi codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti
ubhābhyām ityādi parihāra bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe ubhābhyām eva iti āha iti
pṛcchati etasmin iti
prathamam sādhanam
dvitīyam dūṣaṇam
tṛtīyam samādhānam
uttaram sarvatra

original: kadācit prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācit tṛtīye ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kadācid prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācid tṛtīye iti arthaḥ
avaśyam tu tṛtīyaḥ iti āha atha vā iti
ubhayatra kalpe praśnaḥ katham iti
uttaram ekaḥ tāvat iti

original: taṃ nivartyaṃ vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī svapakṣe sādhanaṃ bravīti /
analyzed: tam nivartyam vādinaḥ sādhanam dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī sva pakṣe sādhanam bravīti
prathamaḥ iti vādī
nirṇayaḥ numānam eva iti kecid
tathā hi tṛtīya liṅga darśanam pratyakṣa phalam nirṇayaḥ
tat eva ca anumānam atas nirṇayaḥ na anumānāt atiricyate iti arthaḥ
pariharati na liṅga liṅgiti
yadi nirṇaya mātram anumānam ucyeta
tadā na tasya sarvasya liṅga liṅgi saṃbandha smṛti apekṣa tvam iti
yadi tu liṅga parāmarśaḥ nirṇayaḥ
tasya ca asti liṅga liṅgi saṃbandha apekṣā iti tatra āha pramāṇa phala tvāt
sāmānya vyāptaḥ viśeṣaḥ sāmānya nivṛttyā nivartate
śiṃśapā tvam iva vṛkṣa tva nivṛttyā

original: na ca phale pramitirūpe nirṇaye pramākaraṇatvaṃ phalatve nāstīti nānumānatvaṃ tadviśeṣa
analyzed: na ca phale pramiti rūpe nirṇaye pramā karaṇa tvam phala tve nā asti iti nā anumāna tvam tad viśeṣa
iti arthaḥ

original: itaścānumānāt nirṇayo bhidyate ityāha--nirṇayaḥ svaviṣaya eveti na hi nirṇayo nirṇayatvena pratipattyanubandhibhūtād viṣayādanyatra,
analyzed: itas ca anumānāt nirṇayaḥ bhidyate iti āha nirṇayaḥ sva viṣaye eva iti na hi nirṇayaḥ nirṇaya tvena pratipatti anubandhi bhūtāt viṣayāt anyatra
anumānam tu tatra ca anyatra ca
yadā anumeyaḥ gniḥ eva heya tva ādibhiḥ paricchidyate gni jñānena anumānena

original: yadā tu dhūmajñānenāgniranumīyate tadānyatra ceti gamayitavyam /
analyzed: yadā tu dhūma jñānena agniḥ anumīyate tadā anyatra ca iti gamayitavyam
iti vācaspatimiśra viracitāyām nyāyavārttikatātparya ṭīkāyām prathama adhyāyasya prathama āhnikam

original: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //

analyzed: nitānta dakṣiṇa ślakṣṇa dhiyaḥ gṛhṇantu amatsarāḥ
vācaspati girām artha tattvāni vibudhāḥ iva

original: uddeśakramaprāptaṃ vādalakṣaṇaparaṃ sūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyam---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
analyzed: uddeśa krama prāptam vāda lakṣaṇa param sūtram avatārayitum bhāṣyam tisraḥ kathāḥ bhavanti iti
tat ayuktam
bṛhatkathā ādīnām tisṛṣu kathāsu
na ca sāmānya lakṣaṇa abhidhānam antareṇa viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ sti

original: vādādayaśca kathāviśeṣā ityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
analyzed: vāda ādayaḥ ca kathā viśeṣāḥ iti atas āha vārttikakāraḥ tisraḥ kathāḥ bhavanti iti
na ayam kathā mātra niyamaḥ yena bṛhat kathā ādīnām
a kathā tvam syāt

original: api tu yannānāpravaktṛke vicāre vasati tad vicāravastu /
analyzed: api tu yat nānā pravaktṛke vicāre vasati tat vicāra vastu
vicāra viṣayā vākya saṃdṛbdhiḥ kathā iti yāvat

original: tasyāḥ kathāyā eṣa niyamaḥ tisra eveti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ kathāyāḥ eṣa niyamaḥ tisraḥ eva iti

original: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkavicāraviṣayā vākyasaṃdṛbdhiḥ katheti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha
analyzed: tathā ca nānā pravaktṛka vicāra viṣayā vākya saṃdṛbdhiḥ kathā iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha
iti sūtra avayavena sūcitam iti etat api arthāt uktam bhavati iti draṣṭavyam
yat vastu vicāryate iti artha abhidhāna mātram
na tu vicāra vastu iti asya vivaraṇam
vāda ādiṣu adhikāriṇaḥ puruṣān āha tatra guru ādibhiḥ iti
vāda lakṣaṇasya ānantarye hetum āha tatra yathoddeśam iti
sūtram iti
sāmānya lakṣaṇam api anena sūcyate iti uktam bhavati
eka adhikaraṇa stha sau ityādi bhāṣyam praśna pūrvakam vyācaṣṭekau iti
vastu dharmau iti vibhajate vastu dharmau iti iti
dharma śabdaḥ viśeṣe
tad anavasāyāt vastunaḥ sāmānyatas vasāyaḥ uktaḥ bhavati
tat idam āha vastunaḥ sāmānyena iti
aviruddhau api evam na vicāram prayojayataḥ iti arthaḥ
anena tasya viśeṣaṇam
ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam
yadi api vitaṇḍāyām api pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ sti
tathā api pratipakṣa sādhanam na asti tasyāḥ sthāpanā hīna tvāt
yadi api ca jalpe pi pakṣa pratipakṣa sādhanam asti

original: tathāpi na pramāṇamūlairavayavaistarkeṇa ca sādhanopālambhāviti jalpavitaṇḍabhyāṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhagrahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api na pramāṇa mūlaiḥ avayavaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhana upālambhau iti jalpa vitaṇḍabhyām pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha grahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ
yathā ca etat tathā upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate
ākṣipati katham punar tarkeṇa iti
samādhattena brūmaḥ iti

original: tarkasyetikarttavyatārūpasya pramāṇānugrāhakatayā pramāṇamūlā avayavāstarkamūlā api bhavanti /
analyzed: tarkasya itikarttavya tā rūpasya pramāṇa anugrāhaka tayā pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ tarka mūlāḥ api bhavanti

original: tathā ca tarkasyāpi sādhanopālambhahetubhāvaḥ siddho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tarkasya api sādhana upālambha hetu bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
vikalpya ākṣipati sādhanam
upālambhaḥ ca asmin iti
param prati hi siddhay upālabdhī vivakṣite
na ca te pramāṇa tarkābhyām
tayoḥ sva pratipatti hetu tvāt
avayava arthasya avayava śabda arthasya iti arthaḥ
ubhayathā abhimata tve pi
karaṇa sādhana pakṣam kakṣīkṛtya tāvat samādhattena
anya artha tvāt iti
anya prayojana tvāt iti arthaḥ
yadā tu bhāva sādhanau tadā pṛcchati atha etau iti
vipratipannasya praśnaḥ
na pratipakṣa viṣayaḥ upālambhaḥ na api tad sādhana viṣayaḥ
tayoḥ vastunoḥ sva kāraṇāt utpannayoḥ sadā tad rūpa tvena puruṣa dharma upālambha anāspada tvāt iti ākṣepa arthaḥ
samādhatte evam etat iti

original: dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā karma,
analyzed: dharmī dharma viśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vā karma
tasya viṣayaḥ

original: tasya dharmiṇo vāstavaṃ tādṛśatvamatādṛśatvaṃ vā karaṇasya tu karmaiva viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tasya dharmiṇaḥ vāstavam tādṛśa tvam atādṛśa tvam vā karaṇasya tu karma eva viṣayaḥ
tatra ca karma karaṇe samarthe eva
na a samarthe
anya viṣaye tu puruṣaḥ te
jāno samarthīkaroti iti
saḥ yam puruṣasya aparādhaḥ na karma karaṇayoḥ

original: yathā ākāśe niśātamasiṃ vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasyāparādho nākāśasya śabde samarthasya,
analyzed: yathā ākāśe niśātam asim vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasya aparādhaḥ na ākāśasya śabde samarthasya
aseḥ vā niśātasya dāruṇi samarthasya
tasmāt aupacārikaḥ sādhanasya upālambhaḥ na mukhyaḥ
mukhyaḥ tu puruṣasya eva
vacana dvāreṇa tu udbhāvyate puruṣasya iti

original: vacana upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣadvāreṇānudbhāvanāditi siddham /
analyzed: vacane upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣa dvāreṇa anudbhāvanāt iti siddham

original: yathāyamarthaḥ sūtrapadebhyo labhyate tathā praśnapūrvakaṃ darśayati---kathaṃ punariti //
analyzed: yathā ayam arthaḥ sūtra padebhyaḥ labhyate tathā praśna pūrvakam darśayati katham punar iti
yat uktam pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha grahaṇam vādasya jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām viśeṣaṇa artham iti
tatra prakāram pṛcchati atha iti
praṣṭā eva āha nanu idam api iti
uttaram na samānam iti
niyamam āha pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha
eva vādaḥ
evakāreṇa
chala ādi sādhana upālambha tvam vādasya vyavacchidyate
tathā ca jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām vyavacchedaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: tarkānugṛhītapramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ paramārthato bhavantu mā bhūvan,
analyzed: tarka anugṛhīta pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ paramārthataḥ bhavantu mā bhūvan
vādi prativādinoḥ tu abhiprāyaḥ bhavatu pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ iti
etāvatā eva pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha tā vādasya vīta rāga kathā tvena tattva nirṇaya avasāna tvāt
jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu apramāṇa mūla tvam viduṣā api prativādinā chala ādibhiḥ pratyavastheyam
ekānta parājayāt
varam saṃśayaḥ stu iti icchatā vijigīṣuṇā

original: yathā cāsya śāstre vyutpādanaṃ nāsadṛśaṃ yathā caiṣa satāmācāraḥ,
analyzed: yathā ca asya śāstre vyutpādanam na a sadṛśam yathā ca eṣa satām ācāraḥ
tathā jalpa lakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ
jalpe nigraha tthāna viniyogāt
ityādi bhāṣyam
tat anupapannam

original: upālambhagrahaṇādeva vāde 'pi nigrahasthānasya labdhatvādityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---chalajātīti /
analyzed: upālambha grahaṇāt eva vāde pi nigrahasthānasya labdha tvāt iti atas āha vārttikakāraḥ chala jāti iti
asati upālambha grahaṇa
iti abhiprāyaḥ
codayati samasta iti
yadi upālambha grahaṇasya nigrahasthāna vidhānam prayojanam

original: hanta bho na jalpād vādasya viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: hanta bho na jalpāt vādasya viśeṣaḥ

prakaraṇasamā tu yathāprakaraṇam aniścāyakam

original: abhidhānaṃ prayogaḥ śabdasya dharmo bhavan dvidhābhidhīyate dvaividhyamāha---pradhānamiti so 'yam
analyzed: abhidhānam prayogaḥ śabdasya dharmaḥ bhavan dvidhā abhidhīyate dvaividhyam āha pradhānam iti saḥ yam

abhidheyaḥ gamyaḥ
sa ca kvacid vācyaḥ
kvacid bhāktaḥ iti arthaḥ
vākchalam eva upacāracchalam tat aviśeṣāt

original: parīkṣāparvaṇaḥ sannidhānāt tadarthaṃ lakṣaṇaparvaṇyapi yogyāyai sūtrakāraḥ channalakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣate---vākcha--t//15 //
analyzed: parīkṣā parvaṇaḥ sannidhānāt tad artham lakṣaṇa parvaṇi api yogyāyai sūtra kāraḥ channa lakṣaṇam

original: sthānyartho guṇaśabdo yo vastutaḥ sa eva pradhānaśabdaḥ sthānārtha iti kalpayitveti yojanā /
analyzed: sthānī arthaḥ guṇa śabdaḥ yaḥ vastutas saḥ eva pradhāna śabdaḥ sthāna arthaḥ iti kalpayitvā iti yojanā

original: yathā hi vākchavale navīnārtho navaśabdaḥ saṃkhyā bhede kalpitaḥ,
analyzed: yathā hi vāc chavale navīna arthaḥ nava śabdaḥ saṃkhyā bhede kalpitaḥ
tathā iha api iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
na tad artha antara bhāvāt
siddhāntasūtram na tat  /
tasya upacāra chale artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhasya artha antara kalpanātaḥ vāc chalāt iti arthaḥ
sūtra tātparyam āha vārttikakāraḥ aviśeṣāt iti asya iti
vidheyam vastu
mañcāḥ krośanti iti atra krośanam vidhīyate
mañcāḥ iti tu anūdyate
atas eva
guṇe tu anya artha kalpanā
iti mañcāḥ iti etat apradhānam anūdya tayā bhāktam
na tu krośanti iti
na vidhau paraḥ śabda arthaḥ
iti nyāyāt
tat iha vidhīyamānam krośanam eva vastu pratiṣidhyate
na eva mañcāḥ krośanti iti chala vākyena

original: navakambalo devadatta iti vākye tu devadattamanūdya navatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kambalo vidhīyate /
analyzed: nava kambalaḥ devadattaḥ iti vākye tu devadattam anūdya nava tva viśiṣṭaḥ kambalaḥ vidhīyate

original: tatra na vidheyasya vastunaḥ kambalasya sadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
analyzed: tatra na vidheyasya vastunaḥ kambalasya sadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: kiṃ tu tadekadeśasyānekatāyā iti mahān bheda iti siddhāntaḥ // 16 //
analyzed: kim tu tad eka deśasya anekatāyāḥ iti mahān bhedaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ
aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt eka chala prasaṅgaḥ
aviṅgaḥ kiñcid sādharmyāt tri tva abhāve dvi tvasya api abhyupagatasya abhāva prasaṅgaḥ
om iti brūvataḥ vastu tvena samasta bheda uccheda prasaṅgaḥ
bhāṣya vārttike ati rohita arthe
sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ

original: tathā sati chalasya samyagdūṣaṇasya ca jātitvaprasaṅgaḥ /

atas uktam sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti

api tu prayogāt iti

original: prayukte hetau tadābhāse vā yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sa jātiriti /
analyzed: prayukte hetau tad ābhāse vā yaḥ prasaṅgaḥ jāyate sa jātiḥ iti

original: jalpe hi vedaprāmāṇyaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ prati kuhetunā yadā nāstikairadhikṣipyate,

original: saduttaraṃ cāsya yadā sahasā na pratibhāti tadeśvarāṇāṃ janādhārāṇāṃ mā bhūd vedāprāmāṇyabuddhiriti jātyāpi pratyavastheyam /
analyzed: sat uttaram ca asya yadā sahasā na pratibhāti tadā īśvarāṇām janādhārāṇām mā bhūt veda a prāmāṇya buddhiḥ iti jātyā api pratyavastheyam

original: kvacit punarabuddhipūrvameva hetau hetvābhāse vā jātiprayogaḥ saṃbhavati /

original: apratipattimāha---ārambhaviṣaya iti lāghavāya vipratipattyapratipattī iti vaktavye kasmādasamāsakaraṇamityata āha---asamāsācceti /

vyācaṣṭe sva para artha uttara a saṃvittiḥ iti

original: dūṣyaṃ vā paroktaṃ sādhanaṃ vipratiṣedhahetuṃ vā na pratipadyate /

original: parīkṣāsādhyo hyarthastatra vyākhyānena lakṣaṇapadebhyaḥ sākṣādeva gamyata ityarthaḥ /

original: na hi sākṣāt sthāṇupuruṣāvupalabhamānaḥ samānaṃ cānayordharma kaścitsandigdha ityarthaḥ /

eka vṛtti tvāt ca iti
na hi yau eva āroha pariṇāhau sthāṇoḥ tau eva puruṣasya iti arthaḥ
vipratipatti avyavasthā adhyavasāyāt ca
vipratipattau ca saṃpratipatteḥ
avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthita tvāt ca avyavasthāyāḥ

tathā atyanta saṃśayaḥ tad dharma sātatya upapatteḥ
tathā atyanta saṃśayaḥ iti tad pada antareṇa samāna dharma upapatti ādeḥ viśeṣaṇam apaśyataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: NyS_2,1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyādeva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā //

original: yadi nirviśeṣaṇaṃ samānadharmopapattyādi saṃśayakāraṇamucyeta tataḥ paścādakaraṇātpūrvamapi na kuryādityasaṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ vā karaṇāttpaścādapi

analyzed: na tu asau nirviśeṣaṇaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇam iti na asaṃśayaḥ na atyanta saṃśaya

original: yadāpi sasādhanā tadāpi kimebhireva pratyakṣādibhirāho pramāṇāntareṇa /

original: tayaiva vyaktyā tu grahaṇe ātmani vṛttivirodhaḥ /

original: manastu yadyapi svajñānaṃ prati karaṇaṃ karma ca,

original: tasmāj jñeyatvaṃ jñānasādhanatvaṃ ca manaso na doṣamarhatīti /

tān pratyāha

original: NyS_2,1.19[a]: kvacin nivṛttidarśanād anivṛttidarśanāc ca kvacid anekāntaḥ //
analyzed: kvacid nivṛtti darśanāt anivṛtti darśanāt ca kvacid anekāntaḥ
kvacid taḥ sū
yathā ayam prasaṅgaḥ pramāṇānām anapekṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ

evam artham upādīyate prasaṅga
prameyāṇi api anapekṣāṇi eva setsyanti iti evamartham api upādeyaḥ

original: tadevaṃ pradīpadṛṣṭāntāśrayaṇena pramāṇābhāvaprasaṅgamuktvā sthālyādidṛṣṭāntopādāne tu pramāṇasyāpi pramāṇāntarāpekṣetpayāha /

yathā ca sthālī ādi rūpa grahaṇe iti

original: yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ sajātīyānapekṣastathā pramāṇāni sajātīyānapekṣāṇi na punaryathā sthālyādirūpaṃ pramāṇāpekṣaṃ tathā pramāṇānyapi pramāṇāpekṣāṇīti
analyzed: yathā pradīpa prakāśaḥ sajātīya anapekṣaḥ tathā pramāṇāni sajātīya anapekṣāṇi na punar yathā sthālī ādi rūpam pramāṇa apekṣam tathā pramāṇāni api pramāṇa apekṣāṇi iti

sthālī ādi rūpa prakāśane ca iti
kasmāt evam sthālī rūpa vat na pramāṇāni

original: tadanena pradīpadṛṣṭāntena nirapekṣatvaṃ na tu sthālyādidṛṣṭāntena sāpekṣatvamityatra niyamaheturnāstītyuktaṃ,
analyzed: tat anena pradīpa dṛṣṭāntena nirapekṣa tvam na tu sthālī ādi dṛṣṭāntena sāpekṣa tvam iti atra niyama hetuḥ na asti iti uktam

ayam ca pradīpa prakāśa dṛṣṭānta
iti

original: na hi pramāṇānāmeva pradīpo dṛṣṭānto na prameyāṇāmiti niyamaheturasti /

original: pūrveṇa tu pradīpadṛṣṭāntena nirapekṣatvameva na tu sthālīdṛṣṭāntena sāpekṣatvamityayaṃ niyamo nirākṛta iti na punaruktam /

original: prakāśakatvādinā tu hetunā saṃgṛhītaḥ pradīpadṛṣṭānto bhavatīti niyamaḥ śakyo vaktum /

original: na hi cakṣurādi pramāṇaṃ svagrahaṇe cakṣurādyantaramapekṣate,

original: viruddhaśca heturviṣayajñānamapi viṣayajñānena na gṛhyate kintu jñānaviṣayeṇa jñāneneti nātyantasajātīyamiti,

original: tadanenābhiprāyeṇa vārtikakṛtoktamanekānta ityayaṃ doṣo na bhavati /

original: na hīdṛśamanyatkāraṇamātmamanaḥ saṃyogo vā indriyamanaḥ- saṃyogo vā pratyakṣasyāsti,
analyzed: na hi īdṛśam anyat kāraṇam ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ vā indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ vā pratyakṣasya asti
pūrvasya sādhāraṇa tvāt uttarasya ca avyāpaka tvāt iti
samādhāna antaram āha
arthataḥ vā ityādinā manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ api kāraṇam iti antena
na ātma manasoḥ saṃnikarṣa abhāve pratyakṣa utpattiḥ
tat evam siddhānta sāram uktam na ātma manasoḥ ityādi sūtram a paṭhitvā eva bhāṣyakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe

iti

original: nasādharmyasyatyādi bhāṣyaṃ niyamaṃ niṣedhati na sādharmyasya kṛtsnabhāvameva vā 'lpabhāvameva vā āśrityātideśavākyaṃ pravarttate /

original: ityapi ca vākyaṃ yaṃ kaṃ cida guṇinaṃ kriyāṃ ca kāṃ cidākṣipya nirvṛṇuyāt /
analyzed: iti api ca vākyam yam kam cit guṇinam kriyām ca kām cit ākṣipya nirvṛṇuyāt

original: na ca viśeṣadarśane sati nākṣepa iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca viśeṣa darśane sati na ākṣepaḥ iti yuktam
eka vākya tāyām sattyām viśeṣa darśane anākṣepaḥ
an ākṣepe ca sati ekavākya tā iti anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ
tasmāt vākya artha pratipādana para samabhivyāhṛta pada kadamba smārita tvena aparyavasānam eva padārthānām ākāṅkṣā iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: tathā ca paṭo bhavatītyetāvanmātraṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ yaṃ kaṃ cid guṇamākṣipya nirvṛṇoti
analyzed: tathā ca paṭaḥ bhavati iti etāvat mātram nirākāṅkṣam yam kam cit guṇam ākṣipya nirvṛṇoti

original: raktaḥ paṭo bhavatītyatra tu raktapadasyāpi samabhivyāhārāt paṭādisaṃsargaparatvamiti
analyzed: raktaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati iti atra tu rakta padasya api samabhivyāhārāt paṭa ādi saṃsarga paratvam iti

original: paṭādi saṃsargamantareṇa raktattvamaparyavasyat paṭādayaśca raktatvasaṃsarga vinta
analyzed: paṭa ādi saṃsargam antareṇa rakta ttvam a paryavasyat paṭa ādayaḥ ca rakta tva saṃsarga
paryavasyantaḥ paraspara saṃbandhāḥ bhavanti iti sidhyati eka vākya tā

original: tasmātpadānyeva padārthasmaraṇadvāreṇa tatsaṃsargaṃ lakṣayanti vākyārthe pramāṇaṃ teṣāṃ cāpakṣadharmatayā na liṅgatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt padāni eva padārtha smaraṇa dvāreṇa tad saṃsargam lakṣayanti vākya arthe pramāṇam teṣām ca apakṣa dharma tayā na liṅga tvam
syāt etat

original: ayaṃ padakadambakaviśeṣaḥ smāritapadārthasaṃsargavān ākāṅkṣādimattve sati padakadambatvād gāmabhyājetipadāvalīvāditi nāpakṣadharmatā /
analyzed: ayam pada kadambaka viśeṣaḥ smārita padārtha saṃsargavān ākāṅkṣā ādimat tve sati pada kadamba tvāt gām abhyāja iti pada āvalī vāt iti na apakṣa dharma tā
mā evam
anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ

original: karmakārakaṃ hi paṭādanyadvastutaḥ siddhaṃ jñānalakṣaṇāya phalāya kalpate /
analyzed: karma kārakam hi paṭāt anyat vastutas siddham jñāna lakṣaṇāya phalāya kalpate

original: yathā 'gnimattā dhūmasya parvatasya vā 'gnisaṃyogaḥ na tvagnijñānajanakatvaṃ tadvattā /
analyzed: yathā gnimat tā dhūmasya parvatasya vā gni saṃyogaḥ na tu agni jñāna janaka tvam tadvat tā
phala vyaṅ nyam hi tat na an upajāte phale kalpate

original: tathā ca phalopajanane satyagnimattā tadvattāyāṃ tu karmaṇi phalopajananamityanyonyāśrayāpattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca phala upajanane sati agnimat tā tadvat tāyām tu karmaṇi phala upajananam iti anyonya āśraya āpattiḥ
na hi phala karmaṇoḥ aikyam

original: na hi vṛkṣa eva cchidā bhavati /
analyzed: na hi vṛkṣaḥ eva chidā bhavati

original: tadiha saṃsargavattvaṃ padānāṃ tajjñānajanakatvaṃ nānumānasādhyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tat iha saṃsargavat tvam padānām tad jñāna janaka tvam na anumāna sādhyam bhavitum arhati
na hi agni jñāna janaka tvam dhūmasya anumāna sādhyam iti uktam

original: smṛtijanakatvamapyeṣāṃ vākyārthapratyāyanāya kalpitaṃ na saṃbandhāntaraṃ vyanaktīti /
analyzed: smṛti janaka tvam api eṣām vākya artha pratyāyanāya kalpitam na saṃbandha antaram vyanakti iti
tat siddham etat na padāni vākya artha bodhe liṅgam apakṣa dharma tvāt manaḥ vat iti

original: api ca laukika evārthaḥ parīkṣakairanugamyate na tu svakṛtalakṣaṇānurodhenālaukikamāsthīyate /
analyzed: api ca laukikaḥ eva arthaḥ parīkṣakaiḥ anugamyate na tu sva kṛta lakṣaṇa anurodhena alaukikam āsthīyate

original: na ca kleśena kayā citpraṇāṅyā pakṣadharmatāṃ kalpayitvā lokaḥ padebhyo vākyārthamavagacchati api tu svatantrebhya eva tebhya iti siddhaḥ śabdasya  #
analyzed: na ca kleśena kayā cit praṇāṅyā pakṣa dharma tām kalpayitvā lokaḥ padebhyaḥ vākya artham avagacchati api tu svatantrebhyaḥ eva tebhyaḥ iti siddhaḥ śabdasya
pramāṇasya anumānāt bhedaḥ
āpta ukta tvam tu svarga ādi pratipādaka spaya āgamasya prāmāṇye liṅgam eva
na ca etāvatā tad arthaḥ ānumānikaḥ bhavati

original: na hi pravṛttisāmarthyānumitaprāmāṇyasya pratyakṣasya viṣayopa bhavatyānumānikaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pravṛtti sāmarthya anumita prāmāṇyasya pratyakṣasya bhavati ānumānikaḥ

original: arthaviṣayaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ prāmāṇyaviṣaye ca pravṛttisāmarthyāptoktatve iti /
analyzed: artha viṣayam hi pramāṇam prāmāṇya viṣaye ca pravṛtti sāmarthya āpta ukta tve iti

original: evaṃ vyavasthite abhyuccayamātratayā bhāṣyavārtikakārābhyāmāptoktatvāśrayatvānāśrayatve śabdānumānabhedahetutayopanyaste iti mantavyam /
analyzed: evam vyavasthite abhyuccaya mātra tayā bhāṣya vārtika kārābhyām āpta ukta tva āśraya tva anāśraya tve śabda anumāna bheda hetutayā upanyaste iti mantavyam
etena pravṛtti bheda kathanena a dvi pravṛtika tvam vyākhyātam nirākārya tayā

original: saṃbadhandhātpratipatteranumānaṃ śabda iti yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati /
analyzed: saṃba dhandhāt pratipatteḥ anumānam śabdaḥ iti yat uktam pūrvapakṣiṇā tat anubhāṣya dūṣayati
yat punar etat iti

original: asyedamiti ṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasyeti bhāṣyaṃ tasya vyākhyānaṃ vācyavācakabhāva iti /
analyzed: asya idam iti ṣaṣṭhī viśiṣṭasya iti bhāṣyam tasya vyākhyānam vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iti

original: svābhāviko hi śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhastathā syāt tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā pratyāyyapratyāyakabhāvo vā prāptilakṣaṇo vā,
analyzed: svābhāvikaḥ hi śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ tathā syāt tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ vā pratyāyya pratyāyaka bhāvaḥ vā prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ vā
tatra avyapadeśya padena pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa sthena tādātmyam apākṛtam
śabda arthayoḥ prāpti nirākaraṇa hetunā ca upariṣṭāt autpattikaḥ pratyāyya pratyāyaka bhāvaḥ nirākariṣyate
tena prāptim nirākaroti bhāṣyakāraḥ prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ tu iti

original: ekendriyagrāhyebhyohi prāptiḥ pratyakṣā yathā 'ṅgulyoḥ na tu śabdārthayorekendriyagrapāhyatā tasmāśānayoḥ prāptiḥ pratyakṣagamyā vāyuvanaspatyorivetyarthaḥ
analyzed: eka indriya grāhyebhyaḥ hi prāptiḥ pratyakṣā yathā ṅgulyoḥ na tu śabda arthayoḥ eka indriya grapā hya tā prāptiḥ pratyakṣa gamyā vāyu vanaspatyoḥ iva iti arthaḥ

original: nanu śabdasyārthaḥ samānendriyagrāhya eva tatkathaṃ nendriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdastasya viṣayabhāvamatītor 'tha ityata āha /
analyzed: nanu śabdasya arthaḥ samāna indriya grāhyaḥ eva tat katham na indriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdaḥ tasya viṣaya bhāvam atītoḥ thaḥ iti atas āha
asti ca atīndriya viṣaya mṛtaḥ pi iti

original: śabdagrāhakendriyamatipatita indriyamātramatipatiścātīndriyaḥ sa ca viṣayabhūtaśceti karmadhārayaḥ /

original: ata eva prayojanalakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇenoktaṃ vārttikakṛtā ... idaṃ sukhasādhanamiti vuddhā sukhāvāptaye yatate idaṃ duḥkhasādhana miti cāvagamya  #

original: katamo 'sāvāgama āptoktaḥ kiṃ śākyabhikṣukadigambarasaṃsāramocakādīnāmāgamāḥ kiṃ vā vedā iti /

original: tatra śākyādyāgamānāṃ buddharṣabhādayaḥ praṇetāra iti sphuṭataramasti smaraṇaṃ na tūktalakṣaṇa īśvarasteṣāṃ kartteti /

original: na caite śauddhodaniprabhṛtayaḥ tanubhuvanādīnāṃ kartāro yena sarvajñā iti niścīyeran

original: tadupāyānuṣṭhānena tu saṃbhāvyetaiṣāṃ sarvajñatā na ca sambhāvanāmātreṇa tatpraṇīteṣvāgameṣvāśvāsaḥ prekṣāvatāṃ bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tad upāya anuṣṭhānena tu saṃbhāvyeta eṣām sarvajña tā na ca sambhāvanā mātreṇa tad praṇīteṣu āgameṣu āśvāsaḥ prekṣāvatām bhavitum arhati

original: na caiteṣāmāgamā varṇāśramācāravyavasthāhetavaḥ no khalu niṣekādyāḥ kriyāḥ śmaśānāntāḥ prajānāmete vidadhati /

original: na hi pramāṇīkṛtabauddhādyāgamā api lokayātrāyāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇanirapekṣāgamamātreṇa pravarttante /
analyzed: na hi pramāṇīkṛta bauddha ādi āgamāḥ api lokayātrāyām śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa nirapekṣa āgama mātreṇa pravarttante

original: api tu te 'pi sāvṛtametaditi bruvāṇā lokayātrāyāṃ śrutyādīnevānusaranti /

tasmāt bhavatu vedeṣu jagat nirmātṛ kartṛka tva smṛtiḥ

original: mā vā bhūd eta eva tvīśvarapraṇītā iti paśyāmaḥ /

original: na cānya āgamo lokayātrāmudvahan mahājanaparigṛhīta īśvarapraṇītatayā smaryamāṇo dṛśyate /

na ca īśvaraḥ na upadiśan avasthātum arhati iti uktam
tat pā pariśeṣyāt vedāḥ eva sakala lokayātrām udvahantaḥ hita ahita prāpti parihāra upāyam upadiśanta
iśvara praṇītāḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ

original: tathā hyata eva traivarṇikairadyayāvatprayatnena gṛhyante dhāryante ca /

original: asti hi gaurgauriti prathānugame 'pi śuṅkakapilakapotikāsu goṣu dharmibhedāvagāhinī prathā /
analyzed: asti hi gauḥ gauḥ iti prathā anugame śuṅka kapila kapotikāsu goṣu dharmi bheda avagāhinī prathā

original: asti ca dharmamātrabhedāvagāhinī prathā dharmiṇamabhinnamākalayantī yathā śālaprānthuḥ
analyzed: asti ca dharma mātra bheda avagāhinī prathā dharmiṇam abhinnam ākalayantī yathā śāla prānthuḥ
vṛthula viśāla vakṣāḥ pralamba bhujaḥ nīlotpala dala śyāmaḥ siṃha āsyaḥ nava ambhoda dhvaniḥ gambhīra madhura ghoṣaḥ cakora īkṣaṇaḥ kṣatriya yuvā iti
sā iyam śuka śārikā manuṣyeṣu yugapad gakārān uccārayatsu tīvra mandra anunāsikā ādi gakāra avagāhinī

original: prathā kimekameva kṣatriyayuvānamiva gakāramanekadharmavantamālambate eko gakāro
analyzed: prathā kim ekam eva kṣatriya yuvānam iva gakāram aneka dharmavantam ālambate ekaḥ gakāraḥ

original: nānādharmeti kiṃ vā yatheyaṃ śuklā gauriyaṃ kapilā gauriti tathā tīvro 'yaṃ gakāro
analyzed: nānā dharmā iti kim vā yathā iyam śuklā gauḥ iyam kapilā gauḥ iti tathā tīvraḥ yam gakāraḥ

original: mando 'yaṃ gakāro 'nunāsiko 'yamiti bhavanta eva vidāṃpava kurvantu /
analyzed: mandaḥ yam gakāraḥ nunāsikaḥ yam iti bhavantaḥ eva vidāṃpava kurvantu

original: seyaṃ gottvamiva kapilādiyu goviśeṣeṣu gatvaṃ tīvramandādiśabdabhedeṣvālambamānā pratyabhijñā ca bhedaprathā copapatsyate /
analyzed: sā iyam go ttvam iva go viśeṣeṣu ga tvam tīvra manda ādi śabda bhedeṣu ālambamānā pratyabhijñā ca bheda prathā ca upapatsyate
api ca yugapad tīvra manda tva ādi lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargāt api gakārāṇām parasparataḥ tapana khadyota vat bhedam anumimīmahe

original: na cāyaṃ viruddhadharmasaṃsargo na gakārādiniveśī kiṃ tvāpādhikaḥ upādhayaśca bhidyanta eva na gakāra
analyzed: na ca ayam viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ na gakāra ādi niveśī kim tu āpādhikaḥ upādhayaḥ ca bhidyante eva na gakāra
iti sāṃpratam
gaka apara samavāyinaḥ pratīyamānasya asati bādhake aupādhika tva kalpanā yogāt
pratyabhijñānasya ca ga tva sāmānya ālambana tvena upaṣatteḥ

original: api caupādhikatvapakṣe tālvādisaṃyogadharmo vā tadabhighātapreritadhvanidharmo vā tīvrānunāsikatvādiḥ śabde samāroṣyata ityāstheyam /
analyzed: api ca aupādhika tva pakṣe tālu ādi saṃyoga dharmaḥ vā tad abhighāta prerita dhvani dharmaḥ vā tīvra anunāsika tva ādiḥ śabde samāroṣyate iti āstheyam
na ca āroṣyam a jānatām āropaḥ saṃbhavati

original: na ca dhvanīnāṃ tālvādisaṃyogavibhāgānāṃ vā dharmaḥ śrotreṇa śakyo grahītuṃ tadanyadharmavat /

original: na caite tadārnī pramāṇāntareṇopanīyante smṛtā vā yenāropyeran /
analyzed: na ca ete pramāṇa antareṇa upanīyante smṛtāḥ vā yena āropyeran

yena āropya agrahe pi bhramaḥ bhavati
na ca maṇḍūka vasā akta akṣāṇām iva anavagata asmṛta uramāṇām api prathama akṣa sannipātāt vaṃśeṣu uraga āropaḥ iti sāṃpratam
sarvāsām eva bhrāntīnām pramāṇa gṛhīta āropya āropa viṣaya grahaṇa puraḥsara tva niyamāt
tad anusāreṇa maṇḍūka vasāktākṣāṇām api vaṃśeṣu uraga bhramaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ

original: vaṃśānāṃ tāvadasti bhūyaḥ sārūpyamurageṇa tena caite tanmātreṇa rūpeṇa śaknuvanti gṛhītāḥ smārayitumuragam /
analyzed: vaṃśānām tāvat asti bhūyaḥ sārūpyam urageṇa tena ca ete tad mātreṇa rūpeṇa śaknuvanti gṛhītāḥ smārayitum uragam

original: evamapi yadanyeṣāṃbhramo na bhavati tatra sarpākāravyāvṛttavaṃśagraho hetuḥ maṇḍūkavasāñjanaṃ ca vaṃśākārapidhānamātrahetuḥ /
analyzed: evam api yat anyeṣām bhramaḥ na bhavati tatra sarpa ākāra vyāvṛtta vaṃśa grahaḥ hetuḥ maṇḍūka vasā añjanam ca vaṃśa ākāra pidhāna mātra hetuḥ

original: na ca prayamākṣasannipātādeva bhrama iti prāmāṇikaṃ kṣaṇabhedasya durjānatvāt /

original: na hi ciradhyastasyānapekṣitasmṛteḥ saṃketagrahasyāsti kaścidupayoga iti /

analyzed: saḥ eva tāvat adṛṣṭa caraḥ kalpanīyaḥ tasya ca aneka tvam iti saḥ yam varṇebhyoḥ tha pratyayaḥ bhavan anupapadyamānaḥ tad atiriktam sphoṭa anubhavam āyatate

original: asti hi bhinnaṣvepi varṇeṣu vākyamidamekaṃ padamiti cā sarvajanīno 'nubhavaḥ /

original: na cāsau bhinnavarṇālambano bhavitumarhati ekasya nānātvavirodhāt /

original: tacce pratyekameva dhvanayo 'bhivyañjayanti kevalaṃ pūrve dhvanayaḥ svarūpamābhāsayante caramastu vyaktam /

original: arthasya tu padagamyasyāpratyakṣasya mānāntareṇa grahaṇamastīti agrahaṇaṃ vā na tu sphuṭāsphuṭatvābhyāṃ yogaḥ /

original: api ca yasminnanuvartamāne yadvyāvartate tattasmādbhidyate yathā suvarṇākyaveṣvanuvartamāneṣu kaṭakamukuṭādayaḥ /

original: anuvartamāneṣu tu varṇeṣu vyāvartante padabhedāstasmātte 'pi varṇebhyo bhinnā iti tānpratyāha /

te vibhakti antāḥ padam

original: ta eva varṇā eva padaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sphoṭākhyamityarthaḥ /

idam atra ākūtam
na tāvat varṇa atiriktaḥ pada ātmā kaścid upalabhyate pratyakṣeṇa

original: padamiti tu vyapadeśastāneva varṇān bahūnapyekasmṛtisamārohitayā vā ekārthadhīhetutayā vā abhinnakārakāvasthāvattayā vālambate bhāktaḥ /
analyzed: padam iti tu vyapadeśaḥ tān eva varṇān bahūn api eka smṛti samārohi tayā vā ekārtha dhī hetutayā vā abhinna kāraka avasthāvat tayā vā ālambate bhāktaḥ
na ca evam anyonya saṃśrayaḥ

original: ekasmṛtibuddhisamārohiṇāṃ varṇānāmasatyarthavattayā 'vabodhe sujñānatvāt tanmātrasya ca svārthena saṃketagrahasyāpi sukaratvāt taduttarakālatvācca  #
analyzed: eka smṛti buddhi samārohiṇām varṇānām asati arthavat tayā vabodhe su jñāna tvāt tanmātrasya ca svārthena saṃketa grahasya api sukara tvāt tad uttara kāla tvāt ca
padam iti kāraka śabda pravṛtteḥ

original: itarathā sarveṣu kārakaśabdeṣu durvāramitaretarāśrayatvaṃ kāryopahitamaryādatvātkārakāṇāṃ tadanupātitvācca tacchabdānāṃ,

ca anu bhūta varṇa saṃkalana ātmikāyām smati buddhau aprathamānaḥ varṇa vibhāga upamardena na

original: iti vaktuṃ, nāpi nirbhāgasya sphuṭāsphuṭatve vā bhāgaviparyāsova vā yujyate,

original: na ca tadeva tadaiva tena gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavati /

original: tasmānna pratyakṣasya tadābhāsasya vā gocaraḥ padātmā /

original: na tāvatsattāmātreṇa padātmār 'thapratyayamādhatte mā dhānnityatvena nityamenam /

original: tacca svajñānamarthapratyayāt tathā ca satyarthapratyaye padapratyayaḥ padapratyaye ca satyarthapratyaya iti vyaktamanyonyāśrayatvam /

original: na ceyamarthadhīrvarṇebhyo nodetumarhati te hi pūrvamanubhūtāḥ pratyekam anubhūtatākramopasṛṣṭā ekabuddhisamārohiṇaḥ śaknuvantyarthadhiyamādhātum
analyzed: na ca iyam artha dhīḥ varṇebhyaḥ nā udetum arhati te hi pūrvam anubhūtāḥ pratyekam anubhūta tā krama upasṛṣṭāḥ eka buddhi samārohiṇaḥ śaknuvanti artha dhiyam ādhātum
na ca akrama anukrama viparīta kramāṇām aviśeṣaḥ varṇānām
pūrva anubhava sanniveśa anusāri tvāt smṛteḥ

original: abhede 'pi ca varṇānāṃ na hi hinetyādau padabheda upapatsyate vinā 'pi sphoṭakalpanām /

original: arthapratyayakārakatvaṃ ca na varṇamātrāṇāmapi tu kramanyūnātiriktatvādyupahitānām /

original: yadi na jātyā vinā vyaktiniyama iti jātirabhidheyā hanta bhoḥ sā 'pyākṛtyā niyantavpayetyākṛtirevābhidhīyatāmityāha /
analyzed: yadi na jātyā vinā vyakti niyamaḥ iti jātiḥ abhidheyā hanta bhoḥ sā pi ākṛtyā niyantavpayā iti ākṛtiḥ eva abhidhīyatām iti āha

original: tādṛśī ca vyaktisaṃsthānābhidhānānapekṣeṇāpi padena śakyā bodhayituṃ,
analyzed: tādṛśī ca vyakti saṃsthāna abhidhāna anapekṣeṇa api padena śakyā bodhayitum

original: api ca na rūpiśūnyā rūpāvagatiḥ rūpaṃ ca dravyasya jātiḥ tena rūpyamāṇatvād rūpi dravyam /

original: na ca yena yadrūpyate tadanavagame tadavagamaḥ /

original: tasmājjātyupalambho dravyopalambhaikadeśo na dravyopalambhamantareṇa kevalaḥ sambhavati /

original: na ca vācyamekopalambhagocaratve 'pi jātivyaktyorjātireva vācyā na vyaktiḥ

original: kāryavyaṅnyaṃ hikāraṇānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kārya eva nākārye /

original: sa khalvarthaḥ pratīto vā vyaktiṃ gamayed apratīto vā /

original: tatra svalakṣaṇena sarvato vyāvṛttena samarthena samastasāmarthyavirahiṇo 'nvayinā na kiñcidasti sārūpyam /
