original: tatsamayabhāvi tvavikalpakaṃ tattvaṃ gṛhṇadapi na vikalpe svaviṣayaṃ niveśayati /

evam vikalpa jñānam api samanantara utpanna nirvikalpaka vyāpāra pāramparye pi na sva lakṣaṇam gocarayitum arhati

anubhava vāsanā bhāveṣu bhevat api iyam gatiḥ na tu parokṣa abhāva avagāhiṣu avidyā vāsanā prabhaveṣu saṃbhavati

original: grahaṇādatiriktaḥ grāhyasya svākārasya vālīkasya vā bāhyādhyāropa iti cet /

original: tadevaṃ paravyākhyānaṃ daṣayitvā bhāṣyakārīyasya vyākhyānasya yuktatvamāha sthāneṣu tu yuktaḥ /

original: indriyeṣvekatvānekatvasaṃśayo yuktaḥ nānāsthānaṃ khalvekamavayavidravyaṃ dṛṣṭamanekaṃ ca bhinnabhājanagataṃ phalamiti /
analyzed: indriyeṣu ekatva anekatva saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ nānā sthānam khalu ekam avayavi dravyam dṛṣṭam anekam ca bhinna bhājana gatam phalam iti

original: tadidamuktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa bahūni dravyāṇi nānāsthānāni dṛśyante nānāsthānaśca sanneko 'vayavī ca /

original: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ svakāraṇādayaṃ bhāvo vinaśvaro jāyate 'vinaśvaro vā ?

original: vinaśvaraśced vināśaṃ prati na hetumapekṣeta na hi nīlaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ nīlatve hetumapekṣate tasyaiva tādrūpyat /

original: avinaśvaraścettathā 'pi nāsya hetuśatairapi śakyo vināśaḥ kartum /

original: na hi nīlamutpanne pītaṃ śilpiśatenāpi śakyaṃ kartum /
analyzed: na hi nīlam utpanne pītam śilpi śatena api śakyam kartum

original: api cāyaṃ vināśo bhāvaspaya kāraṇairāthīyamāno bhāvādbhinno 'bhinno vā jāyate /

original: abhinnatve bhāva evāsāviti vinaṣṭo bhāvaḥ prāgvadupalabdhyarthakriye kuryāt /

original: na ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāraṇabhede sati sambhavatyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ kāraṇa bhede sati sambhavati abhedaḥ

original: tantusaṃyogabhedebhyo hi po jāyate tantuvibhāgādvā tantuvināśādvā paṭābhāva iti kāraṇabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tantu saṃyoga bhedebhyaḥ hi paḥ jāyate tantu vibhāgāt vā tantu vināśāt vā paṭa abhāvaḥ iti kāraṇa bhedaḥ

original: bhāvādbhinnatve tu jāyatāmabhāvo bhāvasya kimāyātaṃ na hi kramelakotpādane pīlavo nivartante /
analyzed: bhāvāt bhinna tve tu jāyatām abhāvaḥ bhāvasya kim āyātam na hi kra melaka utpādane pīlavaḥ nivartante
abhāvena bhāvaḥ tirodhīyate iti ced
na tirodhānasya api bhāvāt abhede pūrvavat upalabdhi ādi prasaṅgaḥ

original: bhede 'pi tirodhānasyānyasyotpāde anyasya na kiṃ cidutpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ ceti bhāvatādavasthyātpūrvavadupalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: bhede pi tirodhānasya anyasya utpāde anyasya na kim cit utpannam vinaṣṭam ca iti bhāva tādavasthyāt pūrvavat upalabdhi ādi prasaṅgaḥ

original: api ca yadyeṣāṃ dhruvabhāvi na tatra teṣāṃ hetvantarāpekṣā yathā kṛpāṇasyāyomayatve /
analyzed: api ca yadi eṣām dhruva bhāvi na tatra teṣām hetu antara apekṣā yathā kṛpāṇasya ayaḥ maya tve

original: dhruvabhāvī ca kṛtakānāṃ bhāvānāṃva vināśa iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: dhruva bhāvī ca kṛtakānām vināśaḥ iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ

original: dhruvabhāvitā hi pratiṣidhyamānahetvantarāpekṣatvaviruddhatannirapekṣatvavyāptopalabdhā seha pratīyamānā nirapekṣatvamupasthāpayantī hetvantarāpekṣatāṃ  #
analyzed: dhruva bhāvitā hi pratiṣidhyamāna hetvantara apekṣa tva viruddha tad nirapekṣa tva vyāptā upalabdhā sā iha pratīyamānā nirapekṣa tvam upasthāpayantī hetvantara apekṣa tām
pratikṣipati

original: ye hi hetvantarāpekṣo na te dhruvabhāvino yathā vāsasi rāgādayaḥ kusumbhādisaṃyogasāpekṣā nāvaśyaṃ bhāvina iti /

original: tasmādabhāvasya sarvopākhyārahitasya kalpitasya kriyānupapanneti abhāvaṃ karotīti karoti kriyāyā abhāvena sambandhānupapatternañāsambandho  #

original: yathāha ... na tasya kiṃ cidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevala ... miti /

original: tādātmye ca vināśavadbhāvo 'pi dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣu varteteti sādhu kṣaṇikatvaṃ samarthitamatrabhavatā bhāvānāṃ nityatvamupapādayatā /

original: bhāvasamaye vā vināśo 'pi bhāvātmā 'stītyatyantābhāvo bhāvasya bhavediti suṣṭhavadātaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvānām /

original: na ca bhāva ekakṣaṇasthitidharmā nāśo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣviti sāmpratam /

original: hantodayānantaramevāpavṛjyeran nāpavṛjyante vināśārhā api paṭādayastantuvināśādvā tantuvibhāgādvā svakāraṇādhīnajanmano vinaṅkṣyanti /

original: nābhāvasyotpāde bhāvasyāparā nivṛttiḥ kiṃ tvabhāvotpāda eva tannivṛttiḥ kathamanyasyotpāde
analyzed: na abhāvasya utpāde bhāvasya aparā nivṛttiḥ kim tu abhāva utpāde eva tad nivṛttiḥ katham anyasya utpāde

original: yathā cotpādasya purastādakhilasāmarthyarahitasyāṅkuraprāgabhāvasyopakāraṃ kiṃ cidakurvanto 'pi bījādayo 'ṅkuramārabhante tadutpādasyaiva tatprāgabhāvanivṛttirūpatvāt
analyzed: yathā ca utpādasya purastāt akhila sāmarthya rahitasya aṅkura prāgabhāvasya upakāram kim cit akurvantaḥ pi bīja ādayaḥ ṅkuram ārabhante tad utpādasya eva tad prāgabhāva nivṛtti rūpa tvāt

original: evaṃ tadabhāvahetavo 'pi bhāvarūpe akiñcitkarā api tadabhāvamādadhati na cedbhāvarūpe
analyzed: evam tad abhāva hetavaḥ pi bhāva rūpe akiñcitkarāḥ api tad abhāvam ādadhati na ced bhāva rūpe

original: kiṃ citkṛtaṃ tadabhāvahetubhiratha bhāvaḥ prāgiva svābhāvasamaye kasmānna svarūpopalambhārthakriye karoti /
analyzed: kim cit kṛtam tad abhāva hetubhiḥ atha bhāvaḥ prāk iva sva abhāva samaye kasmāt na sva rūpa upalambha artha kriye karoti
atha utpādāt prāk iva utpannaḥ pi aṅkuraḥ kasmāt upalambha artha kriye karoti
utpatteḥ prāk aṅkuraḥ na āsīt tena na akārṣīt utpannaḥ tu asti tasmāt karoti iti ced

original: hanta bhāvo 'pi yadāsīttadā 'kārṣīttadānīṃ tu vinaṣṭa iti nāsti tena na karoti /
analyzed: hanta bhāvaḥ yadā āsīt tadā kārṣīt tadānīm tu vinaṣṭaḥ iti na asti tena na karoti

original: yathā ca bhāvotpāda eva tatprāgabhāvasya nāstitā evamabhāvotpāda eva bhāvasya nāstitā /
analyzed: yathā ca bhāva utpādaḥ eva tad prāgabhāvasya nāstitā evam abhāva utpādaḥ eva bhāvasya nāstitā

original: upajanāpāyadharmatayā bhāvābhedo vināśasya tato na sadasadrūpatayā dvairāśyaṃ viśvasyeti cet ko 'yamupajano yadi svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ sattāsamavāyo  #
analyzed: upajana apāya dharma tayā bhāva abhedaḥ vināśasya tatas na sat asat rūpa tayā dvairāśyam viśvasya iti ced kaḥ yam upajanaḥ yadi sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ sattā samavāyaḥ
vā saḥ bhāve na asti
atha sva rūpa pratilambhaḥ
tathā pi tāvanmātrasya sāmye pi avāntarabhedena dvairāśya upapattiḥ

original: tasmādyathā sattvasya sāmye 'pi dravyaguṇakarmāṇi tena tattvenānyonyaṃ bhidyante evaṃ prameyatvābhidheyatvakāraṇavattvenāviśeṣe 'pi tadbhiḥ  #
analyzed: tasmāt yathā sattvasya sāmye dravya guṇa karmāṇi tena tattvena anyonyam bhidyante evam prameya tva abhidheya tva kāraṇavat tvena aviśeṣe tadbhiḥ
saha asatām sattā tad viraha rūpa bhedāt bheda
iti siddham
yā pi dhruva bhāvitā vināśasya

original: tatra brūmaḥ dhruvabhāvitvena vināśasya hetvantarānapekṣatvaṃ bruvāṇo nāhetukatvaṃ vaktumarhati /

api ca dhruva bhāvi tvam asiddham anaikāntikam vā

original: idaṃ bhāvān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭāṃ kiṃ ghaṭasantānātsabhāgāt kapālasaṃtatirdhruvabhāvinī na vā /
analyzed: idam bhāvān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim ghaṭa santānāt sa bhāgāt kapāla saṃtatiḥ dhruva bhāvinī na vā

original: nna vināśo 'pi ghaṭasya dhruvabhāvī na khalu visabhāgakṣaṇotpādamantareṇa ghaṭavināśamīkṣāmahe māṃsacakṣuṣaḥ tathā cāsiddhā dhruvabhāvitā vināśasya
analyzed: vināśaḥ pi ghaṭasya dhruva bhāvī na khalu visa bhāga kṣaṇa utpādam antareṇa ghaṭa vināśam īkṣāmahe māṃsacakṣuṣaḥ tathā ca asiddhā dhruva bhāvi tā vināśasya

original: atha dhruvabhāvinī tasyāmeva tarhi visabhāgasaṃtatau dhruvabhāvinyāṃ mudgarādihetvapekṣetyanaikāntikaṃ

original: tadetadyaścākāraṇavināśedoṣaḥ sa cāparihārya ityanena vārttikena sūcitam/
analyzed: tat etat yaḥ ca akāraṇa vināśe doṣaḥ sa ca aparihāryaḥ iti anena vārttikena sūcitam

original: yadyapi kṣaṇikatvamapi pūrvamuktaṃ dūṣitaṃ ca tathā 'pi kṣaṇikābhidhānaṃ tavānyaparamanyatvameva tu tatra pradhānam /

analyzed: idānīm tu kṣaṇikatvam eva pradhāna tayā sādhyam iti etāvatā prakaraṇa bhedaḥ

original: pūrvāparabhāgavikalakālakalaikā jyotirvidyāsiddhā sarvāntya kālamiti saṃjñāmātraṃ na tu vāstavaṃ vāstavī ca kṣaṇikatā 'bhimateti /

atra ādi grehaṇena sattva kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ veditavyāḥ

original: tatra yatsattatsarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃśca vivādādhyāsitaḥ śabdādiriti svabhāvahetuḥ sattāmātrānubandhitvātkṣaṇikatvasya /
analyzed: tatra yat sat tat sarvam kṣaṇikam yathā ghaṭaḥ san ca vivāda adhyāsitaḥ śabda ādiḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ sattā mātra anubandhi tvāt kṣaṇika tvasya
katham punar sattā mātra anubandha siddhiḥ kṣaṇika tāyāḥ
ucyate sattvam nāma arthakriyā kāri tvam bhāvānām na anyat

original: na hyasti sambhavaḥ saṃśca bhāvo na cārthakriyāṃ karotīti /
analyzed: na hi asti sambhavaḥ san ca bhāvaḥ na ca arthakriyām karoti iti

original: tathā hi sa sarvajñasya vijñānasyālambanapratyayo bhavenna vā /
analyzed: tathā hi sa sarvajñasya vijñānasya ālambana pratyayaḥ bhavet na vā

original: na ced nāsti sarvajño vā na sarvajñaḥ tasyaivājñānād /
analyzed: na ced na asti sarvajñaḥ vā na sarvajñaḥ tasya eva ajñānāt
ālambana pratyayaḥ ced katham na arthakriyām karoti iti

original: na ca sattāsāmānyaṃ nāmāsti kiṃ cana /
analyzed: na ca sattā sāmānyam nāma asti kim cana
nā api tad samavāyaḥ yatas san iti ucyate

original: tatsadbhāve vā na bhāvatāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥpa santo bhaveyuḥ
analyzed: tad sadbhāve vā na bhāvatām sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ santaḥ bhaveyuḥ
teṣām sāmānya ādhāra tva an abhyupagamāt

original: pramāṇagrāhyatā 'pi pramāṇaviṣayatā pramāṇaṃ pratyālambanapratyayatvameva taccārthakriyākāritvānnānyaditi siddhamarthakriyākāritvameva sattvamiti
analyzed: pramāṇa grāhya tā pi pramāṇa viṣaya tā pramāṇam pratyālambana pratyaya tvam eva tat ca arthakriyā kāri tvāt na anyat iti siddham arthakriyā kāri tvam eva sattvam iti
tat ca krama akramābhyām vyāptam tṛtīya prakāra virahāt

original: tathā hi bhāvānāṃ tāsu tāsvarthakriyāsu kramākramau parasparaparihāravantau cakāstaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi bhāvānām tāsu tāsu arthakriyāsu kramākramau paraspara parihāravantau cakāstaḥ

original: tathā ca kramākramātmakaṃ prakārāntaramapi yadīdṛśābhyāmevānubhūtāvasitābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ karambitamaṅgīkriyate tato dṛśyamānayorapi kramākramayoḥ  #
analyzed: tathā ca kramākrama ātmakam prakāra antaram api yadi īdṛśābhyām eva anubhūta avasitābhyām kramākramābhyām karambitam aṅgīkriyate tatas dṛśyamānayoḥ api kramākramayoḥ
paraspara saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ

original: karambitāvena hi kramākramāvimāvapīti dṛśyamānaḥ kramo 'kramātmakaḥ akramaśca kramātmakaḥ pratibhāseta /
analyzed: hi krama akramau imau api iti dṛśyamānaḥ kramaḥ krama ātmakaḥ akramaḥ ca krama ātmakaḥ pratibhāseta
na ca tathā pratibhāsate

original: etena pratyakṣameva parasparaparihāravantau kramākramau paricchindatsarvatraivānayoḥ saṃkaraṃ pratikṣipati /
analyzed: etena pratyakṣam eva paraspara parihāravantau kramākramau paricchindat sarvatra eva anayoḥ saṃkaram pratikṣipati

original: yadi kva cidapyanayostādāmyaṃ bhavedihāpi tāveva kramākramāv iti saṃkīrṇau gṛhyeyātām /
analyzed: yadi kva cit api anayoḥ tādāmyam bhavet iha api tau eva krama akramau iti saṃkīrṇau gṛhyeyātām
tasmāt anayoḥ iha saṃkara anupalambha

original: eva deśāntare kālāntare ca saṃkaraṃ niṣedhati /
analyzed: eva deśa antare kāla antare ca saṃkaram niṣedhati
tādātmya niṣedhe ca dṛśya tva viśeṣaṇāt anupalabdheḥ

original: dṛśyamānastambhatādātmyena svayamadṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ dṛśyānāṃ ca plavaṅgādīnāmaviśeṣeṇā pratiṣedhāt /
analyzed: dṛśyamāna stambha tādātmyena svayam adṛśyānām piśāca ādīnām dṛśyānām ca plavaṅga ādīnām aviśeṣeṇa ā pratiṣedhāt
yathā āha viśeṣaṇam ca avācyam iti

original: anevaṃbhūtakramayaugapadyavyatirekavatī prakārāntare kramayaugapadye eva na bhavataḥ na hi śabdābhedena vastuno 'pyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: anevaṃbhūta krama yaugapadya vyatirekavatī prakāra antare krama yaugapadye eva na bhavataḥ na hi śabda abhedena vastunā u pi abhedaḥ
mā bhūt go śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena vāc ādīnām api viṣāṇi tva prasaṅgaḥ
syāt etat

original: mā bhūtāṃ kramayaugapadye astvanya eva kramākramābhidhānaḥ kramayaugapadyābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro yamāsthāya bhāvāḥ sthirā apyarthakriyāyāyāmupayokṣyante
analyzed: mā bhūtām krama yaugapadye astu anyaḥ eva kramākrama abhidhānaḥ krama yaugapadyābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ yam āsthāya bhāvāḥ sthirāḥ api arthakriyāyāyām upayokṣyante
na tu eṣām prakāra antara vat arthakriyā pi piśācāyamānā eva

original: tathā cet kiṃ naḥ chinnaṃ dṛśyamānāstvanubhūtāvasitāḥparasparavyāvṛttakramayaugapadyarūpaprakāradvayasamāliṅgitarūpā arthakriyā na prakārāntarādbhavitumīśate
analyzed: tathā ced kim naḥ chinnam dṛśyamānāḥ tu anubhūta avasitāḥ paraspara vyāvṛtta krama yaugapadya rūpa prakāra dvaya samāliṅgita rūpāḥ arthakriyāḥ na prakāra antarāt bhavitum īśate
na ca prakā para antaram api

original: tathā hi yatra yatprakārapratiṣedhena yaditaraprakāravyavasthāniyamastatra na prakārāntarasambhavaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi yatra yad prakāra pratiṣedhena yad itara prakāra vyavasthā niyamaḥ tatra na prakāra antara sambhavaḥ
yathā nīla prakāra pratiṣedhena a nīla prakāra vyavasthāyām pīte asti ca tayoḥ anyatara prakāra niṣedhe
nyatara vyavasthā niyamaḥ niṣidhyamāna prakāra a viṣayīkṛte sarvatra kārya kāraṇe iti viruddha upalabdhiḥ
niṣidhyamāna prakāra antara sambhava viruddhaḥ hi dvayoḥ anyatara niṣadhena anyatara vyavasthā niyama

original: iti prakārāntarāsambhavādbhāvānāmarthakriyā kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptā tau ca sthirānnivarttamānāvarthakriyāmapi
analyzed: iti prakāra antara asambhavāt bhāvānām arthakriyā krama akramābhyām vyāptā tau ca sthirāt nivarttamānau arthakriyām api
vyāvartayataḥ vṛkṣa tā iva nivartamānā śiṃśapā tvam ārāt dṛśyamānāt eka śilā mayāt bhūbhṛt kaṭakāt iti

original: tathā hi na tāvatāvadakṣaṇikaḥ krameṇārthākriyāṃ karttumarhati /
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvatāvat akṣaṇikaḥ krameṇa artha akriyām karttum arhati

original: svena hi rūpeṇa bhāvā arthakriyāyāmupayujyamānā dṛśyante /
analyzed: svena hi rūpeṇa bhāvāḥ arthakriyāyām upayujyamānāḥ dṛśyante

original: yadvastu yatkāryānvayavyatirikānuvihitabhāvābhāvaṃ tadvastu tatkāryaprasavasamarthaṃ rūpaṃ ca tasya kāryeṇānukṛtānvayavyatirekamiti rūpameva
analyzed: yat vastu yat kārya anvaya vyatirika anuvihita bhāva abhāvam tat vastu tat kārya prasava samartham rūpam ca tasya kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatirekam iti rūpam eva

original: tacca dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣviva prathame 'pi kṣaṇe saditi dvitīyādikṣaṇajanyakāryakalāpaṃ prathama eva kṣaṇe niṣpādayet,
analyzed: tat ca dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu iva prathame kṣaṇe sat iti dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa janya kārya kalāpam prathame eva kṣaṇe niṣpādayet
samarthasya kṣepa ayogāt iti na akṣaṇikasya kramavat vyāpāra tā prasajyate
syāt etat kramavat sahakāri yogāt krameṇa karoti iti
tat avuktam
vikalpa asaha tvāt

original: kimasya sahakāriṇaḥ kaṃ cidupakāramādadhati na vā,
analyzed: kim asya sahakāriṇaḥ kam cit upakāram ādadhati na vā
ādadhānāḥ vā bhāvāt bhinnam abhinnam vā

original: tatra bhinnopakārādhāne bhāve satyanutpattarupakāre ca satyutpatteḥ evaṃ kāryasyopakāra eva janako na janako bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tatra bhinna upakāra ādhāne bhāve sati anutpattaḥ upakāre ca sati utpatteḥ evam kāryasya upakāraḥ eva janakaḥ na janakaḥ bhāvaḥ
na ca upakāra sahakārī
eva kāryasya janakaḥ na upakāra mātram iti vācyam
upakārasya upakāra antara janane anavasthānāt
ajanane tu sahakāri bhāva abhāvāt

original: abhinnopakārādhāne ca bhāva eva janayet sa ca prāgapyāsīditi sahakārivaiyarthyam /
analyzed: abhinna upakāra ādhāne ca bhāvaḥ eva janayet sa ca prāk api āsīt iti sahakāri vaiyarthyam
anupakāraka tve vā sahakāriṇaḥ na bhāvena apekṣyeran iti utpanna mātra
eva bhāvaḥ kāryam utpādayet

original: yadi manyate anupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo yatastaiḥ saha bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ karoti /
analyzed: yadi manyate anupakārakāḥ api bhavanti sahakāriṇaḥ yatas taiḥ saha bhāvaḥ kāryam karoti
na cabhāvena na apekṣyante taiḥ vinā kāryasya anutpatteḥ iti

original: nanu svarūpeṇa cetkāryajanako bhāvaḥ na kasmānnemānantareṇa janayati tebhyaḥ prāgapi svarūpasadbhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu sva rūpeṇa ced kārya janakaḥ bhāvaḥ na kasmāt na imā anantareṇa janayati tebhyaḥ prāk api sva rūpa sadbhāvāt

original: sahakārirūpeṇa vā janakatve sahakāriṇa eva janakā na janako bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sahakāri rūpeṇa vā janaka tve sahakāriṇaḥ eva janakāḥ na janakaḥ bhāvaḥ
na ca ubhaya bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt artha kriyā bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekasmāt ca vyabhicārāt ubhaya adhīna tā iti sāṃpratam

original: bhāve satyanutpādātkāryasya vyabhicāreṇa caramabhāvinimittasahakārisamavadhāne sati bhāvādeva sahakārisamavadhānasyaiva caramabhāvino vyabhicāreṇa  #
analyzed: bhāve sati anutpādāt kāryasya vyabhicāreṇa carama bhāvi nimitta sahakāri samavadhāne sati bhāvāt eva sahakāri samavadhānasya eva carama bhāvinaḥ vyabhicāreṇa
kāraṇa tva avadhāraṇāt

original: etenaitannirastaṃ yadāhureke ... svahetorvilambakārī bhāvo jāta iti notpannamātraḥ karotīti ... /
analyzed: etena etat nirastam yat āhuḥ eke sva hetoḥ vilamba kārī bhāvaḥ jātaḥ iti na utpanna mātraḥ karoti iti

original: sā hi bilambakāritā asya svabhāvaḥ sahakārisamavadhānakāle 'pyasti na vā,
analyzed: sā hi bilamba kāri tā asya svabhāvaḥ sahakāri samavadhāna kāle pi asti na vā
asti ced tadā api na kuryāt

original: nāsti cet kathaṃ svabhāvanāśe bhāvo na naṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: na asti ced katham svabhāva nāśe bhāvaḥ na naṣṭaḥ

original: athāsya vilambakāritā na svabhāvaḥ kathamutpannamātro na kāryaṃ kuryāditi /
analyzed: atha asya vilamba kāri tā na svabhāvaḥ katham utpanna mātraḥ na kāryam kuryāt iti
tasmāt na krameṇa artha kriyāḥ bhāvanām
na api yaugapadyena

original: tasmādyāvatkārya tenākṣaṇikena prathame kṣaṇe sampāditaṃ tābatsarvaṃ dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣu sampādayet /
analyzed: tasmāt yāvat kārya tena akṣaṇikena prathame kṣaṇe sampāditam tāvat sarvam dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu sampādayet
tāvat kārya sampādana svarūpasya dvitīya ādiṣu api kṣaṇeṣu bhāvāt

original: na ca sampāditaṃ śakyasampādanamiti yada dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣu sampādayati tatprathamakṣaṇe sampāditādanyaditi kramā evāvarttanta iti tatra cokto  #
analyzed: na ca sampāditam śakya sampādanam iti dvitīya ādi kṣaṇeṣu sampādayati tat prathama kṣaṇe sampāditāt anyat iti kramāḥ eva āvarttante iti tatra ca uktaḥ
doṣaḥ
yugapad kṛta kṛtyasya vā dvitīya ādiṣu karttavya abhāvāt na arthakriyā sāmarthyam asti iti asattvena kṣaṇika tva āpattiḥ

original: tasmādakṣaṇike sattvavyāpakayoḥ kramākramayoranupalambhādvyāpakānupalabdhyā nivarttamānaṃ sattvamakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikatvena vyāpyata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ

analyzed: tasmāt ya thā ubhaya adhīna nirūpaṇā vyāptiḥ ayoga vyavacchedena vyāpake nirūpyate vyāpye bhāvaḥ eva vyāpakasya na abhāvaḥ iti vyāpye punar anya yoga vyavacchedena

original: eva bhāvo vyāpyasya nānyatreti evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pyubhayādhīnanirūpaṇo 'pi kāraṇe ayogavyavacchedena nirūpyate /
analyzed: eva bhāvaḥ vyāpyasya na anyatra iti evam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pi ubhaya adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ pi kāraṇe ayoga vyavacchedena nirūpyate

original: kāraṇa eva sati bhāvo nānyasminniti anubhavānusārānniścīyate /

original: na ca kāraṇataiva sattā kiṃ tu svarūpaṃ nīlāderanubhūtāvasitaṃ taddhi tenaiva rūpeṇa

original: pravarttanālakṣaṇatvaṃ tu teṣāmapyasti tasmādativyāpakatvānna lakṣaṇametadyuktaṃ yuktatve vā lakṣaṇasūtre mānādayo 'pi doṣavatpaṭhanīyā iti  #

evam ca iti

original: teṣāṃ vyūhāntare kasmādaṅkuro na bhavati bhavati tu sati teṣāṃ vyūhe tasmādvinaṣṭebhyo

original: na hyananvayavinaṣṭayoḥ śāliyavabījayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo 'sti yenaikasmācchālyaṅkuro nānyasmāditi /

kaḥ nu khalu abhāvānām asti a jānataḥ bhedaḥ iti

original: yadā tu kāraṇānāmabhedastadā kutastacchektīnāṃ bhedaḥ tathā ca kāryāṇi bhinnaśaktīni na syurityāha /
analyzed: yadā tu kāraṇānām abhedaḥ tadā kutas tad śektīnām bhedaḥ tathā ca kāryāṇi bhinna śaktīni na syuḥ iti āha
ananvitam ca kāryam sarvābhiḥ iti

original: yadapyasata utpādādabhāvasyopādānatvaṃ tadapi kāryāṇāṃ bhinnatvena bhinnaśaktikatvena ca prayuktam /

api ca prāgabhāvānām anādi tvena kārya utpādasya api anādi tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: bhāvarūpakāraṇasahakāritvaṃ tvabhāvasya na niṣidhyate asmadabhimatasyopākhyeyasya / ata
analyzed: bhāva rūpa kāraṇa sahakāri tvam tu abhāvasya na niṣidhyate asmad abhimatasya upākhyeyasya
eva pāka ja ādīnām rūpa ādīnām pūrva rūpa ādi dhvaṃsa nimitta tvam api upeyate
śrutiḥ tu pūrvapakṣa abhiprāyā

original: tathā ca siddhāntaśrutyantaraṃ sadeva somyedamagra āsīditi kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti /
analyzed: tathā ca siddhānta śruti antaram sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti katham asataḥ sat jāyeta iti
iti tu darśanam asat khyāti anirvacanīya khyāti nirākaraṇena apākṛtam
api ca śūnya tve khyātuḥ abhāvāt khyātṛ rebhāvaḥ

original: tasmānna śūnyatopādānastadvivarto vā viśvaprapañca iti siddham // 18 //
analyzed: tasmāt na śūnyatā upādānaḥ tad vivartaḥ vā viśva prapañcaḥ iti siddham
īśvaraḥ kāraṇam puruṣa karma āphalya darśanāt
atha aparaḥ āha iśvaraḥ kāraṇam puruṣa karma āphalya darśanāt

original: (sū. 19) mā mūdayaṃ nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ śūnyatopādāno 'pi tu brahmopādānobhaviṣyati,
analyzed: mā nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ tu
brahma eva hi prapañca rūpeṇa pariṇamate mṛttikā iva ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādi bhāvena
na ca evam nitya tva vyāghātaḥ
pariṇāme pi tattva avighātāt tad lakṣaṇa tvāt ca nitya tāyāḥ

original: yadāha 'yasmiṃstattvaṃ na vihanyate tadapi nitya'mityekaṃ darśanam /
analyzed: yat āha yasmin tattvam na vihanyate tat api nityam iti ekam darśanam
aparam ca brahma eva anirvacanīya anādya vidyā upadhānāt nāma rūpa prapañca bhedena vivarttate sukham iva ekam aneka maṇi kṛpāṇa ādi bhedāt na ekavidha pratibimba bhedena iti
tat etat darśana dvayam anena sūcitam
īśvaraḥ brahma īśanā yogāt
cetanā śaktiḥ kriyā śaktiḥ ca īśanā

original: sā cāsti brahmaṇīti brahmaśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ /
analyzed: sā ca asti brahmaṇi iti brahmaśvaraḥ kāraṇam jagataḥ
śrūyate hi tat aikṣata bahu syām prajāyeya ityādi
sā ca iyam śrutiḥ cetanasya jagat kāraṇatām āha

original: na cābhāvo vā pradhānaṃ vā paramāṇavo vā cetayante /
analyzed: na ca abhāvaḥ vā pradhānam vā paramāṇavaḥ vā cetayante
nanu jīvāḥ eva cetanāḥ tad karma nimittaḥ nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ bhaviṣyati
kṛtam atra bhagavatā īśvareṇa iti atas uktam puruṣa karma a phal darśanāt iti puruṣaḥ ced
niṣphalam karma ārabheda

original: niṣphalaṃ vidvān pravarttamānaḥ kathaṃ cetano nāmadva tasmātpurūṣakarmāphalyadarśanādīśvaraḥ kāraṇamityarthaḥ // 19 //
analyzed: niṣphalam vidvān pravarttamānaḥ katham cetanaḥ tasmāt purūṣa karma āphalya darśanāt īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ  /
na puruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ
tat etat darśana dvayam apākaroti
na puruṣa karma abhāvaḥ phala aniṣyateḥ sū

original: idamātrākūtam na tāvanmṛttikeva nāmarūpaprapañcarūpeṇa brahma pariṇamate /
analyzed: na tāvat mṛttikā iva nāma rūpa prapañca rūpeṇa brahma pariṇamate

original: taddhi sarvātmanā vā pariṇamate ekadeśena vā,
analyzed: tat hi sarva ātmanā vā pariṇamate eka deśena vā
tatra sarva ātmanā pariṇāme tattva vighātāt anitya tvam
eka deśena pariṇāme sāvayava tvāt tat eva anitya tvam
atha tatvena anugatasya pariṇāmaḥ tat ca brahma
na tarhi brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ
na ca nirbhāgasya ekasya sva samvedana pratyakṣasya viparīta jñāna gocara tva sambhavaḥ

original: sāmānyato grahe rūpaviśeṣāgrahe ca tadanyarūpāropeṇa vibhramo dṛṣṭaḥ śuktikādau,
analyzed: sāmānyatas grahe rūpa viśeṣa agrahe ca tad anya rūpa āropeṇa vibhramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śuktikā ādau

original: na tu jātu śuktirūpaṃ vidvāna rajatamiti viparyasyati /
analyzed: na tu jātu śukti rūpam vidvāna rajatam iti viparyasyati

original: na ca śarīrādisahabhāvena jñānasya tatra tatropalambhāccharīrādīnāṃ jñānaṃ vyāpyamiti yuktam /

original: svābhāvikasambandhaśālitā hi vyāpyatā sā copādhivirahe bhavati,

original: kāryaṃ jñānaṃ svakāraṇaṃ śarīrādinātivarttate nityaṃ tu tadativarttamānamapi sāhityopalambhaṃ na viruṇaddhi,

original: ya eva hi paṭo 'nena buddhimaddhetvenvayavyatirekānuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ sa eva tatkāryo na tu vipaṇivartī /

original: muktātmavat aiśvaraṃ jñānaṃ na sarvaviṣayam anityaṃ ca jñānatvāt asmadādijñānavadityanumānaṃ

siddham

original: buddhivadicchāprayatnāvapi tasya nityau sakartṛkatvasādhanāntargatau veditavyau jñānacikīrṣāprayatnasamavāyalakṣaṇatvāt kartṛtvasya,
analyzed: buddhi vat icchā prayatnau api tasya nityau sa kartṛka tva sādhana antargatau veditavyau jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāya lakṣaṇa tvāt kartṛ tvasya
teṣām ca paraspara avinābhāvāt anyatara siddhau itarayoḥ siddheḥ
tat evam utpattimat tvāt eva pakṣa dharmatā sahāyāt evambhūta īśvara siddhiḥ iti uktam
bhavatu vā tasmāt upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛkatva mātra siddhiḥ pariśeṣa anumānāt tu vyatireka siddheḥ viśeṣa siddhiḥ
tathā hi tanu bhuvana ādi abhijñaḥ karttā na anitya asarva viṣaya buddhimān
tad kartuḥ tad upādāna ādi anabhijña tva prasaṅgāt
na hi evaṃvidhaḥ tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā asmad ādiḥ
tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ ca ayam tasmāt tathā iti
na u khalu paramāṇu bhedān prati kṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca tasmāt tathā iti

original: nokhalu paramāṇubhedān pratikṣetrajñasamavāyinaśca karmāśayānanyaḥ śakto jñātumṛte tādṛśādīśvarāditi prapañcitamadhastāt /
analyzed: na u khalu paramāṇu bhedān prati kṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca karma āśayān anyaḥ śaktaḥ jñātum ṛte tādṛśāt īśvarāt iti prapañcitam adhastāt
para puruṣa samavetau api dharma adharmau adhiṣṭātum śaknoti sambandhāt

original: na hi sākṣātsaṃyogasamavāyāveva sambandhau saṃyuktasaṃyogisamavāyasyāpi tadbhāvāt /

original: saṃyuktāḥ khalvīśveraṇa paramāṇvādayaḥ taiśca kṣetrajñāḥ tatsamavetau dharmādharmāviti saṃyuktasamavāyova vā kṣetrajñeneśvarasya saṃyogāt ajasaṃyogasyāpyupapāditatvāt
analyzed: saṃyuktāḥ khalu īśveraṇa paramāṇu ādayaḥ taiḥ ca kṣetrajñāḥ tad samavetau dharma adharmau iti vā kṣetrajñena īśvarasya saṃyogāt aja saṃyogasya api upapādita tvāt

original: dharmādharmau paramāṇūnvā svadharmopagrahamantareṇāpi ceśvaraḥ svakāryābhimukhān kariṣyati viṣavidyāvidiva viṣaśakalaṃ kriyārambhābhimukham
analyzed: dharma adharmau paramāṇūn vā svadharma upagraham antareṇa api ca īśvaraḥ sva kārya abhimukhān kariṣyati viṣa vidyā vid iva viṣa śakalam kriyā ārambha abhimukham

original: tasmādanena tāratamyaṃ samarthayamānena kva cit samūhanivṛttirvācyāna cāsāvasamūhameka mantareṇetyeko 'bhyupeyataityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anena tāratamyam samarthayamānena kva cit samūha nivṛttiḥ vācyā na ca asau asamūham ekam antareṇa iti ekaḥ bhyupeyate iti arthaḥ
uktam artham avidvān śaṅkate
atha manyase iti

original: (477/5) rūpādīnāṃ samudāya iti catvāri vādravyāṇīti cāvāntaradarśanabhedavivakṣayā draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām samudāyaḥ iti catvāri vā adravyāṇi iti ca avāntara darśana bheda vivakṣayā draṣṭavyam
ukta artha darśanena uttaram
etasmin vai darśana

original: iti1 athānantaṃ samudāyaṃ pratipadyasa iti nirākṛtasyāpi punarāśaṅkā āgamavirodhamāpāyitum /

original: pramāṇādayaḥ khalvamī parasparānātmakatayā asaditi pratyayasya nañaśca gocarā ityanubhūyante
analyzed: pramāṇa ādayaḥ khalu amī paraspara anātmaka tayā asat iti pratyayasya nañaḥ ca gocarāḥ iti anubhūyante

original: atastadvācināṃ śabdānāṃ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tataḥ pramāṇādayo 'santaḥ anutpannapradhvastapaṭavat /
analyzed: atas tad vācinām śabdānām tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatas pramāṇa ādayaḥ santaḥ anutpanna pradhvasta paṭa vat

original: api cāmī bhāvā nityā anityā vā nityatve sarvasāmarthyarahitasyāsattvam /
analyzed: api ca amī bhāvāḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ vā nitya tve sarva sāmarthya rahitasya asattvam

original: na hi nityaṃ kva citkāryaupayujyate kramākramānupapatterityuktam /
analyzed: na hi nityam kva cit kāryā upayujyate kramākrama anupapatteḥ iti uktam

original: anityatve tu vināśasvabhāvāśced dvitīyādikṣaṇaiva prathamakṣaṇe 'pi na syuḥ /
analyzed: anitya tve tu vināśa svabhāvāḥ ced dvitīya ādi kṣaṇā eva prathama kṣaṇe na syuḥ
sattve vā anāmī vināśa svabhāvāḥ
a tad svabhāva tve vā kṣaṇa antare na vinaśyeyuḥ

original: no khalu nīlaṃ svakāraṇādupajātaṃ jātu kāraṇasahasrairapi śakyaṃ pītaṃ karttumiti vināśasvabhāvakatvamakāmenāpi anityānāmeṣitatyam /
analyzed: no khalu nīlam sva kāraṇāt upajātam jātu kāraṇa sahasraiḥ api śakyam pītam karttum iti vināśa svabhāvaka tvam akāmena api anityānām eṣitatyam

original: tasmādbhāvānāṃ śūnyataiva pāramārthikī kalpanayā tvavastusatyā santaivāvabhāsanta iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /

analyzed: hi dvitīya sūtre eva yathā sat vā nirvacanīyam vā na tu sat eva sat antarātmanā

original: atha vā svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ bhāvānāṃ yenāmī bhāvāḥ svabhāvādvyāvarttante /

original: agaurityasya gāṃ parihṛtyāśvādibhiḥ saṃbandhādgobhāvasiddherevamaśvādiṣvapīti svabhāvasiddherbhāvānāṃ nābhāva ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: agauḥ iti asya gām parihṛtya aśva ādibhiḥ saṃbandhāt go bhāva siddheḥ evam aśva ādiṣu api iti svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām na abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na svabhāvasiddheriti sūtramanūdya vārttikāraḥ svarūpamātreṇa vyākhyāyaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ tātparyamasya darśayati /
analyzed: na svabhāva siddheḥ iti sūtram anūdya vārttikāraḥ svarūpa mātreṇa vyākhyāyam praśna pūrvakam tātparyam asya darśayati

original: ( 479/5 ) kaścasvabhāvaityādinā siddho bhāva ityantena sūtrasya vyākhyānatrayaṃ bhāṣyakārīyaṃ vārttikakāro darśayati /

sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ samānaḥ nitya tva ādiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ( 480/2 ) asacchabdaḥ khalva bhāvaviśeṣaṇaṃ sadevābhidhatte śuklaguṇaviśiṣṭe paṭe varttate tathā cāsatpratyayābhidhānayorupapannaṃ bhāvavācinā  #
analyzed: asat śabdaḥ khalu bhāva viśeṣaṇam sat eva abhidhatte śukla guṇa viśiṣṭe paṭe varttate tathā ca asat pratyaya abhidhānayoḥ upapannam bhāva vācinā

original: bhāvaśca kaścinnityaḥ kaścidanityaḥ tatra nityasyārthakriyākāritvamupapāditaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅga eva /

original: anityo 'pi na vināśasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ kiṃ tu svakāraṇādayaṃ satsvabhāvo jātaḥ kāraṇāntarāttu vinaśyati /
analyzed: na vināśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ kiṃ tu sva kāraṇāt ayam sat svabhāvaḥ jātaḥ kāraṇa antarāt tu vinaśyati

original: yatūktaṃ nīlaṃ śakyaṃ na pītaṃ karttumiti /
analyzed: yatu uktam nīlam śakyam na pītam karttum iti

original: tatra brūmaḥ śakya eva nīlaḥ paṭaḥ pītaḥ karttum āmaśyāmo ghaṭo vahnisaṃyogādraktaḥ /
analyzed: tatra brūmaḥ śakyaḥ eva nīlaḥ paṭaḥ pītaḥ karttum āma śyāmaḥ ghaṭaḥ vahni saṃyogāt raktaḥ

original: atha nīlatvaṃ na pītatvaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ nanu bhāvo 'pi nābhāvaḥ karttuṃ śakya iti /
analyzed: atha nīla tvam na pīta tvam śakyam kartum nanu na abhāvaḥ karttum śakyaḥ iti

original: yathaiva kumbhādhikaraṇe śyāmaraktatve paryāyeṇa bhavataḥ evaṃ kapālādhikaraṇau kumbhabhāvābhāvāvityadoṣaḥ // 38 //
analyzed: yathā eva kumbha adhikaraṇe śyāma rakta tve paryāyeṇa bhavataḥ evam kapāla adhikaraṇau kumbha bhāva abhāvau iti adoṣaḥ  /
na svabhāva siddhiḥ āpekṣika tvāt
svabhāva siddheḥ iti yat uktam tat ākṣipati śūnyavādī
na svabhāva siddhiḥ āpekṣika tvāt sū

original: sarva evaṃ hi bhāvā bhinnasvabhāvā bhinnatvaṃ ca teṣāmanyāpekṣam /
analyzed: sarve evam hi bhāvāḥ bhinna svabhāvāḥ bhinna tvam ca teṣām anya apekṣam

original: tathā hi nīlaṃ bhinnaṃ pītādyapekṣayā na tu svabhāvataḥ evaṃ hrasvatvadīrghatvaparattvāparatvapitāputratvādayaḥ parasparāpekṣā draṣṭavyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi nīlam bhinnam pīta ādi apekṣayā na tu svabhāvataḥ evam hrasva tva dīrgha tva para ttva apara tva pitāputra tva ādayaḥ paraspara apekṣāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ

original: yacca parāpakṣaṃ tanna svābhāvikaṃ yathā japākusumāpekṣaṃ sphaṭikasya raktatvamityākṣepārthaḥ // 39 //
analyzed: yat ca para apakṣam tat na svābhāvikam yathā japā kusuma apekṣam sphaṭikasya rakta tvam iti ākṣepa arthaḥ

apekṣāyām anapekṣāyām ca iti

original: parimāṇabhedo hi dīrghatvaṃ hrasvatvaṃ ca sa ca bhāvānāmautpattikaḥ kevalaṃ tasyātiśayānatiśayau parasparagrahaṇādhīnau /
analyzed: parimāṇa bhedaḥ hi dīrgha tvam hrasva tvam ca sa ca bhāvānām autpattikaḥ kevalam tasya atiśaya anatiśayau paraspara grahaṇa adhīnau
tathā hi ikṣu yaṣṭeḥ veṇu yaṣṭitaḥ hrasva tvam pūrva saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam anatiśayaḥ
veṇu yaṣṭeḥ dīrgha tvam atiśayaḥ para saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam tat ca idam pratiyogi nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇam
na tu pratiyogi adhīna utpatti iti
na vastu dharmaḥ yam para apara apekṣaḥ

original: bhinnatvaṃ ca bhedaḥ sa ca vastuviśeṣaṇaṃ notpattau vastvantaramapekṣate kiṃ tu svanirūpaṇe /
analyzed: bhinna tvam ca bhedaḥ sa ca vastu viśeṣaṇam na utpattau vastu antaram apekṣate kim tu sva nirūpaṇe

original: evaṃ pitṛtvamapi vyavasthitā janakaśaktireva sā janyanirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇā na tu tadadhīnotpattiḥ /
analyzed: evam pitṛ tvam api vyavasthitā janaka śaktiḥ eva sā janya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇā na tu tad adhīna utpattiḥ
vipañcitam ca etat asmābhiḥ brahma tattva parīkṣāyām

original: paratvāparatvādayastvapekṣābuddhinimittatayā parāpekṣotpattikā api lokayātrāṃ vahanto na śakyāḥ pratyākhyātum /
analyzed: paratva aparatva ādayaḥ tu apekṣā buddhi nimitta tayā para apekṣā utpattikāḥ api lokayātrām vahantaḥ na śakyāḥ pratyākhyātum

original: na caitāvatā tadadhikaraṇaṃ bhāvo na nirapekṣa iti sarvamavadātam /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā tat adhikaraṇam bhāvaḥ na nirapekṣaḥ iti sarvam avadātam

original: syādetat apekṣāmātrameva dīrghatvādayo bhaviṣyanti kṛtameṣāṃ vastusvabhāvenetyata
analyzed: syāt etat apekṣā mātram eva dīrgha tva ādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti kṛtam eṣām vastu svabhāvena iti atas
āha
svabhāva siddhau ca asatyām iti
apekṣā sāmarthyam apekṣā prayojana yogaḥ

original: svayaṃvārtikakāro dūṣaṇānyāha sarvathā cāyaṃ vyāhata iti /
analyzed: svayam vārtika kāraḥ dūṣaṇāni āha sarvathā ca ayam vyāhataḥ iti
nigada vyākhyātam  /
saṃkhyā ekānta asiddhiḥ kāraṇa anupapatti upapattibhyām
uttara sūtra avatāra param bhāṣyam

original: athaite saṃkhyaikāntavādāḥ saṃkhyā ekānto yeṣu vādeṣu te tathoktāḥ /
analyzed: atha ete saṃkhyā ekāntavādāḥ saṃkhyā ekāntaḥ yeṣu vādeṣu te tathā uktāḥ
atha śūnyatā vāda anantaram te parīkṣyante iti arthaḥ

idam asya ākūtam

original: na tāvadayaṃ nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ prakāśādbhinnaḥ san prakāśitumarhati /
analyzed: na tāvat ayam nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ prakāśāt bhinnaḥ san prakāśitum arhati
jaḍasya svayam prakāśa asaṃbhavāt
na ca prakāśa yonagāt prakāśate iti yuktam
na khalu āntareṇa prakāśena asya kaścid yogaḥ saṃbhavati
viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ iti ced na
tatra akiñcitkarasya viṣayi tva asambhavāt

original: na cārthe jñānaṃ phapavalaṃ janayatīti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: na ca arthe jñānam phapavalam janayati iti sāṃpratam
atīta anāgatayoḥ arthayoḥ tad asaṃbhavāt
na ca na tayoḥ viṣaya bhāvaḥ

original: tasmāt jñānādbhinnasya nāmarūpaprapañcasya na prakāśasambhava iti jñānasyaivāyaṃ vivartta iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jñānāt bhinnasya nāma rūpa prapañcasya na prakāśa sambhavaḥ iti jñānasya eva ayam vivarttaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: na ca prakāśātmano ghaṭādaya evodayavyayadharmiṇaḥ parasparavyāvṛttāḥ santviti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: na ca prakāśa ātmanaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva udaya vyaya dharmiṇaḥ paraspara vyāvṛttāḥ santu iti sāṃpratam
tad vyāvṛtti grahe pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: sā hi yadyato vayāvartate tadubhayagrahe gṛhyate na ca vijñānāni vilakṣaṇāni svarūpamātrāvasthitāni
analyzed: sā hi yat yatas vayā āvartate tat ubhaya grahe gṛhyate na ca vijñānāni vilakṣaṇāni sva rūpa mātra avasthitāni
paraspara vārttā anabhijñāni jñāna antaram api grahītum utsahante prāk eva svasmāt vyāvartayitum

original: na ca niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikaraṇagrahaṇakāraṇako vyāvṛttigrahaḥ svakāraṇena samasamayotpādo bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa grahaṇa kāraṇakaḥ vyāvṛtti grahaḥ sva kāraṇena sama samaya utpādaḥ bhavitum arhati
tādṛśoḥ savyetara viṣāṇa vat kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt

original: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikaraṇe gṛhītvā paścānniṣedhaṃ gṛhṇātīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ekam vijñānam kṣaṇikam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhītvā paścāt niṣedham gṛhṇāti iti yuktam
kṣaṇikasya akramasya kramavat vyāpāra ayogāt

original: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikaraṇe gṛhṇāti atha jñānāntaraṃ niṣedhatīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ekam vijñānam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhṇāti atha jñāna antaram niṣedhati iti yuktam
caitra gṛhīte tasmin yaitrasya niṣedha jñāna prasaṅgāt

original: na ca jñānasvarūpagraha evāsya niṣedha graha iti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: na ca jñāna svarūpa grahaḥ eva asya niṣedha grahaḥ iti sāṃpratam

original: evaṃ hi sa bhavedyadi svarūpatadanyavyāvavṛttyorekatvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam hi sa bhavet yadi svarūpa tad anya vyāvavṛttyoḥ ekatvam bhavet

original: tatra vyāvṛttisvabhāvo vā bhāvo bhāvasvabhāva vā vyāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tatra vyāvṛtti svabhāvaḥ vā bhāvaḥ bhāva svabhāva vā vyāvṛttiḥ
tatra pūrvasmin kalpe vyāvṛtteḥ tuccha tvāt tad svabhāvāḥ bhava abhedāḥ tucchāḥ syuḥ
tatas ca vacaḥ bhaj nyantareṇa śūnyabāda prasaṅgaḥ

original: uttarasmiṃstu kalpe vidhirūpo bhāva eva vyāvṛttiriti vidhirūpatayā ca te vyāvarttanta iti na vyāvṛttā bhāvāḥ parasparaṃ paramārthataḥ tadidamuktaṃ  #
analyzed: uttarasmin tu kalpe vidhi rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti vidhi rūpa tayā ca te vyāvarttante iti na vyāvṛttāḥ bhāvāḥ parasparam paramārthataḥ tat idam uktam
sat aviśeṣāt iti

original: (482/1) anādyanirvacanīyāvidyānibandhanaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ bhedaṃ na vyāsedhāmaḥ /
analyzed: anādya nirvacanīya avidyā nibandhanam tu bhāvānām bhedam na vyāsedhāmaḥ

original: na ca jñāturapi jñānādbhedagrāhakamasti pramāṇamuktādeva viśeṣāt /
analyzed: na ca jñātuḥ api jñānāt bheda grāhakam asti pramāṇam uktāt eva viśeṣāt
tasmāt na jñeyānām parasparataḥ ca jñānāt ca bhedaḥ
nā api jñātuḥ jñānāt asita bhedaḥ
na api jñānānām anyonyasya

original: tasmātprakāśa eva svayaṃ prakāśaḥ kūṭasthanitya ānadaghano 'nādyavidyopadarśitavividhavicitranāmarūpaprapañco brahmetyadvaitasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt prakāśaḥ eva svayam prakāśaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ ānada ghanaḥ nādya vidyā upadarśita vividha vicitra nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ brahma iti advaita siddhiḥ
atas eva śrutayaḥ bhavanti
ekam eva advitīyam brahma na iha nānā asti kiñca na

original: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' ityevamādikāḥ /

original: karmānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ ca lokapaṅktyādi copalabhyate praśaṃsanti hi laukikā dhārmiko 'yaṃ sādhutama iti,

original: kiṃ prāptaṃ svargādiphalatve karmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇākāraṇatvācciranivṛtte tasmiṃstadutpatteḥ

na asya abhuṣmikam phalam svarga ādi
api tu anantara dṛśyamānam eva

original: tatrāpi duḥkhaphalatve upadeśavyāghātāl lokapaṅktilābhakhyātyādikameva phalaṃ tacca sukhahetutayā kathaṃ citsvargādipadenocyate /

original: dṛṣṭo hi sukhahetau svargapadaprayogo loke yathā candanaṃ svargaḥ sūkṣmāṇivāsāṃsi svarga iti prāptam /

original: svarga padasya tāvadarthavādato--- 'yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnaṃ na ca grastamanantaram /

original: na ca tadvācakatvenaiva candanādau tatprayogopapattāvanekārthatvakalpanāpa yuktā /

original: tathā ca svargakāma ityatra mukhyārthasaṃbhave nopacaritārthatā yuktā /

original: ya eva vedasya draṣṭrāro 'nuṣṭhātāraśca tadarthasya ta evetihāsādīnāṃ pravaktāraḥ prācetasakṛṣṇadvaiyāyanamanuprabhṛtayaḥ /

original: api ca vaidikāni karmāṇi smārtīmitikartavyatāmapekṣante smārtani ca vaidikāni mantrādīnīti sarvametadapramāṇye dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ nopapadyate
analyzed: api ca vaidikāni karmāṇi smārtīm itikartavya tām apekṣante smārtani ca vaidikāni mantra ādīni iti sarvam etat apramāṇye dharma śāstrāṇām na upapadyate

original: yadyapi ca manvādayo 'pi dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryaśālitayā anubhūyāpyupadiśantīti saṃbhavati tathāpi vedamūlakatvamevetihāsapurāṇādināṃ yuktam
analyzed: yadi api ca manu ādayaḥ dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya śāli tayā anubhūya api upadiśanti iti saṃbhavati tathā api veda mūlaka tvam eva itihāsa purāṇa ādinām yuktam
tathā hi

yaḥ kaścid kasya cit dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ

original: sa sarvo 'bhihito vede sarvajñānamayo hi saḥ ... ityādibhiḥ svavacanaprapañcairātmā baddhapā veda evārpitastairiti /

original: athāyamitihāsādigocaror 'thaḥ kasmātpratyakṣapratītena vedena nocyata iti tadanabhidhānādavagacchamo nūnamayamanabhimato vedānāṃ karturiti

original: atha yadyanādīnāmapi nivṛttiḥ hantānutpattidharmakāṇāmapi nivṛttiprasaṅga ityata āha /

original: satyaṃ vijñānamānandaṃ brahmeti śrutirānandacaitanyaśaktyabhiprāpayā bheda eva ca tadvattayā kathaṃ cit sāmānādhikaraṇyamupapadyate /

original: na ca prakṛṣṭaprakāśaḥ savitetyatra prakṛṣṭaprakāśayorabhedo 'prakāśasyāpi prakarṣasambhavāt /

original: sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātistu sattvasyaiva prakṛterasambhavādayuktā satkāryavādamūlatvātpradhānasadbhāvasya tannirākaraṇenaiva nirākaraṇam /

original: ata eva sarvasyaivamātmāśīḥ kṛmerapi mā na bhūvaṃ bhūyāsamiti /

original: sa khalvahinirlvayanīmivāhistato vyatiriktaṃ śarīrādi paśyanna tatra snihyati snehavirahānna
analyzed: sa khalu ahi nirlvayanīm iva ahiḥ tatas vyatiriktam śarīra ādi paśyan na tatra snihyati sneha virahāt na

atattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāram darśayitvā tattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāra nivṛttim āha
yaḥ tu duḥkham iti

original: tadevamuktena prakāreṇa mohatattvajñānayoḥ saṃsārāpavargahetubhāvo yasmāttasmānmokṣamāṇaiḥ pretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayatītyādipūrvopasaṃhāraḥ

original: āsevamānasyābhya syato bhāvayata iti paryāyakathanaṃ bhāvanādārḍhyepadarśanārtham /

artha gatim pariśodhya atra arthe sūtram paṭhati

original: kimuktaṃ bhavati paramāṇuriti paramatvaviśiṣṭo hyaṇuḥ paramāṇuḥ yataḥ kṣodīyo nāparamastīti yāvat /

original: atha bhinnaparimāṇāḥ paramāṇvavayavāstato nyūnaparimāṇā iti yāvat /

original: tato na paramāṇuḥ pratiṣidhyate paramāṇvavayavā eva paramāṇavaste cānavayavatvādakāryāḥ /

original: tvayā ca paramāṇvārabdhaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇuriti kṛtvā āropya vṛttitrikalpena pratiṣidhyata iti // 17 //

original: sāvayatve tu vṛttivikalpāttadabhāva iti śūnyataiva tattvaṃ bhāvānām /

original: stāmasya sārūpyasamutpattī manaskārendriyādibhistathāpi yamadhyavasyati so 'sya viṣayo 'rthaṃ cādhyavasyatīti artha evāsya viṣayo na manaskārādīticet
analyzed: stām asya sārūpya samutpattī manaskāra indriya ādibhiḥ tathā api yam adhyavasyati saḥ sya viṣayaḥ rtham ca adhyavasyati iti arthaḥ eva asya viṣayaḥ na manaskāra ādi iti ced
atha kaḥ yam adhyavasāyaḥ

original: na tāvadgrahaṇaṃ na khalu dvāvākārau gṛhyete nīlamityanubhavo na tu nīle iti /
analyzed: na tāvat grahaṇam na khalu dvau ākārau gṛhyete nīlam iti anubhavaḥ na tu nīle iti
sva ākārasya bāhya samāropaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ iti ced
sa kim gṛhyamāṇe bāhye uta a gṛhyamāṇe
na hi nīla dvayam prakāśate eti uktam
na ca āropa viṣayam a gṛhītvā āropyam āropayitum arhati iti

original: na hyananubhavan purovartati śuklabhāsvaraṃ rajatamāropayati tatra /
analyzed: na hi ananubhavan purovartati śukla bhāsvaram rajatam āropayati tatra

original: api cāgṛhyamāṇe bāhye pravṛttiniyamo na bhavet /
analyzed: api ca agṛhyamāṇe bāhye pravṛtti niyamaḥ na bhavet
itareṣām agṛhyamāṇa tvena aviśeṣāt teṣu api pravṛtti prasaṅgāt

original: na ca sākārajñānanaye bāhyasadbhāve pramāṇamasti agṛhyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: na ca sa ākāra jñāna naye bāhya sadbhāve pramāṇam asti agṛhyamāṇa tvāt
nanu nīla ādi ākārasya kādācitkatvam eva pramāṇam
tathā hi yadi asmin sati api kadā cid bhavet tad tad itara apekṣam

original: yathā satyapi sopāne vicchinnagamanaracanapratibhāsāḥ pratyayāḥ santānāntarāpekṣāstathā ca satyapyālayasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti
analyzed: yathā sati api sopāne vicchinna gamana racana pratibhāsāḥ pratyayāḥ santāna antara apekṣāḥ tathā ca sati api ālaya saṃtāne ṣaṭ api pravṛtti pratyayāḥ iti
vāsanā paripāka pratyaya kādācitka tvāt kadā cid utpādaḥ iti ced
nanu eka santāna patitānām ālaya jñānānām tad tad pravṛtti vijñāna janana śaktiḥ vāsanā tasyāḥ ca

original: kāryajananaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākaḥ tasya ca pratyayaḥ svasantānavarttī pūrvakṣaṇo
analyzed: kārya jananam pratyābhimukhyam paripākaḥ tasya ca pratyayaḥ sva santāna varttī pūrva kṣaṇaḥ
hetuḥ santāna antara apekṣā anabhyupagamāt

original: tathā ca sarve ālayasantānapatitāḥ paripākahetavo bhaveyuḥ
analyzed: tathā ca sarve ālaya santāna patitāḥ paripāka hetavaḥ bhaveyuḥ
na vā kaścid api aviśeṣāt
kṣaṇa bhedāt śakti bhedaḥ tasya kādācitka tvāt kārya kādācitka tvam iti ced

original: nanvekasyaiva nīlavijñānajananasāmarthyaṃ śaktiprabodhajananasāmarthya ca kṣaṇāntarasya tanna syāt /
analyzed: nanu ekasya eva nīla vijñāna janana sāmarthyam śakti prabodha janana sāmarthya ca kṣaṇa antarasya tat na syāt

original: ityālayasantānavatrinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapattiḥ /

original: svasantānamātrādhīnatve tu niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā
analyzed: sva santāna mātra adhīna tve tu niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddham sadātana tvam tasya upalabdhyā

original: tu kādācitkatvaṃ nivarttamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tu kādācitkatvam nivarttamānam hetu antara apekṣa tve vyavatiṣṭhate iti pratibandha siddhiḥ

original: na ca saṃtānāntaranimittāni pravṛttivijñānāni santatyantarāṇāmapi nityasannidhānādvijñānānāmadeśātmakatvena dūratvānupapattervyatiriktasyānabhyupagamāt

nā api kālataḥ viprakarṣa sambhavaḥ apūrva sattva prādurbhāva anabhyupagamāt
tat idam anumānam sautrāntikānām

original: nanūktam na kṣaṇbhedaḥ kāryabhedaheturiti kalpitasya santānasya sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇo
analyzed: nanu uktam na kṣaṇ bhedaḥ kārya bheda hetuḥ iti kalpitasya santānasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ

analyzed: nanu yadi kṣaṇa bhedaḥ śakti bheda hetuḥ tatas bhinānām kṣaṇānām na ekā syāt tathā ca ekena kena cit nīla jñāne janite tat nīla jñānam kṣaṇa antarāt na
syāt
yadi bhinnānām na ekam sāmarthyam
atha bāhya artha vādinaḥ u pi katham bhinnānām nīlotpala santānānām eka nīlotpala ākāra jñāna dhārā sāmarthyam
yadi ucyate anyat eva nīla vijñānam yat nīlotpala santāna antarāt

original: vayamapi brūmahe anyadeva nīlavijñānaṃ yat kṣaṇāntarāditi /
analyzed: vayam api brūmahe anyat eva nīla vijñānam yat kṣaṇa antarāt iti

original: tasmātkaścideva tādṛśaḥ svalakṣaṇabhedo jāyate yaḥ kaṃ cideva kāryabhedaṃ janayati na kāryāntaramiti /
analyzed: tasmāt kaścid eva tādṛśaḥ sva lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ jāyate yaḥ kam cit eva kārya bhedam janayati na kārya antaram iti
tasmāt sa ākārasya api jñānasya arthaḥ na gocaraḥ
na ca agocaraḥ śakyaḥ numātum iti

original: na ca pratyakṣavadanumānamapyarthagocaraṃ tasmātsādhūktaṃ vārttikakṛtā na cittavyatirekiṇo viṣayaḥ grāhyatvādvedanāvaditi /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa vat anumānam api artha gocaram tasmāt sādhu uktam vārttika kṛtā na citta vyatirekiṇaḥ viṣayaḥ grāhya tvāt vedanā vat iti
nīla ādayaḥ hi viṣayāḥ ubhaya vādi siddhāḥ teṣām citta bheda abhedayoḥ vipratipattiḥ

original: tatraiṣāṃ cittavyatirekaḥ parairabhyupagataḥ pratiṣidhyate yāvāṃśca pratiṣidhyate
analyzed: tatra eṣām citta vyatirekaḥ paraiḥ abhyupagataḥ pratiṣidhyate yāvān ca pratiṣidhyate
sarvaḥ nu upalabdheḥ iti grāhya tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ citta vpayatirekaḥ tad viruddhaḥ tad avyatirekaḥ tena
vyāptam grāhya tvam tasya upalabdhiḥ eva tad niṣedhyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti
atra tāvat etat vaktavyam

original: grāhyattvasyābhedena vyāptau satyāṃ bhedaṃ nivartayed na tvabhedenāsya vyāptiḥ /

original: tathā hi yadetannīlaṃ sthūlaṃ vicchinnamupalabhyate tasyāsya vicchedaḥ sthaulyaṃ ca na jñānasyātmā,
analyzed: tathā hi yat etat nīlam sthūlam vicchinnam upalabhyate tasya asya vicchedaḥ sthaulyam ca na jñānasya ātmā
nānā diś deśa vyāpi tā hi sthaulyam
na ca ekam a diś deśa ātmakam an avayavam vijñānam nānā diś deśa vyāpi sambhavati
yathā āha
tasmāt na arthe na vijñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ
ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt vahuṣu api na sambhavaḥ iti
evam artha vicchedaḥ pi na jñāna ātmakaḥ
tasya tathātve jñānam syāt
tasmāt ayam api na jñānam iti asān abhyupagantavyaḥ

original: na ca sadasatorekatvamityanātmā 'pi vijñāne prakāśataityanicchatā 'pi svīkarttavyam /
analyzed: na ca sat asatoḥ eka tvam iti anātmā pi vijñāne prakāśate eti an icchatā pi svīkarttavyam
tathā ca sat api prakāśiṣyate
nanu anātmni arthe kiṃñcitkaram vijñānam katham artha prakāśakam
atha akiñcitkaram jñānam sthaulye katham asya prakāśakam
svabhāvāt iti ced atra api asau na daṇḍa vāritaḥ

original: yaddhi yasya svabhāvaḥ tasya nānyāpekṣā yathā liṅgasya svasādhyasambandhe /
analyzed: yat hi yasya svabhāvaḥ tasya na anya apekṣā yathā liṅgasya sva sādhya sambandhe
svabhāvataḥ ca arthasya jñānam iti na tadīya tve anyat apekṣate

original: asambaddhatvātkathaṃ jñānamarthasyeti ced atha sambandha eva sambandhinoḥ katham /

sambandha antara kalpanāyām anavasthā

evam jñānam api sambandha antaram antareṇa arthasya iti samānam
na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: svakāraṇādutpannasya kasya cidvijñānasya kaścideva viṣayo nānyaḥ /

original: na svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogamarhanti evaṃ bhavataivaṃ mā bhavata evaṃ kasmānna bhavateti /

akiñcitkarasya rūpa vijñānasya katham rūpa viṣaya tā iti ced

original: kiṃ rūpavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ vivakṣitvedamucyate āho phalaṃ vivakṣitvā /

original: yadi pramāṇaṃ tato na tadakiñcitkaraṃ tatra hānopādānopekṣāprasavahetutvāt /

atha phalam tat ayuktam

original: evamarthaviṣayatvāya svābhāvikāya na jñānena kiṃ cidaparaṃ janayitavyam /

original: arthapratibaddhatvaṃ jñānasyārthaviṣayatvaṃ na hi jñānimanuvyavasāyajñānena nirūpyamāṇamarthanirūpaṇaṃ vinā śakyaṃ nirūpayitumityuktam /

original: tasmādabhedena grāhyasyāvyāpyatvādgrāhyatvaṃ viruddhavyāptaṃ na bhedaṃ nivartayitumarhatīti

original: na ca jñānamevātmanaḥ parasya ca prakāśa iti siddham /

tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitam vijñānam sva prakāśāt bhinnam prakāśamāna tvāt

original: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktaṃ na ca karma ca kriyā caikaṃ bhavatīti /

original: arthajñānopalambhayorekopalambhataiva nāsti kutaḥ punarasya niyama iti /

upanaya padena iti arthaḥ

iti tatra āha

original: ayamarthaḥ vikalpasamamuttaraṃ vadatā hi yathā satyutpattimattve ghaṭo na vibhāgajaḥ
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ vikalpa samam uttaram vadatā hi yathā sati utpattimat tve ghaṭaḥ na vibhāga jaḥ

original: iti vyavasthito vikalpaḥ evaṃ satyutpattimattve satyapi vibhāgajavacchabdo 'pi nityo
analyzed: iti vyavasthitaḥ vikalpaḥ evam sati utpattimat tve sati api vibhāga ja vat śabdaḥ api nityaḥ

original: tatra tāvadutpattidharmakatvaṃ yathā satyanityatve ghaṭādau dṛṣṭam ākāśādiṣu cāsatyanityatve
analyzed: tatra tāvat utpatti dharmaka tvam yathā sati anitya tve ghaṭa ādau dṛṣṭam ākāśa ādiṣu ca asati anitya tve

original: vibhāgajatvenāvibhāgajatvena vā svābhāvikasaṃbandho gṛhīto yenotpattimatkiṃ cidvibhāgajaṃ

original: tasmā dvikalpasamaṃ jātyuttaraṃ vadatā 'tinirbandhena vibhāgajatvena śabdasya nityatvaṃ
analyzed: tasmai dvi kalpa samam jāti uttaram vadatā tinirbandhena vibhāga ja tvena śabdasya nitya tvam
vaktavyam tatra idam upatiṣṭhate yathā utpatti dharmaka tvam anvaya vyatireki anitya tvam prati
na evam vibhāga ja tvam śabda nitya tvam prati anvaya vyatireki iti
tat hi asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: NyS_5,1.8: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvācca prāptyaprāptisamau //
analyzed: prāpya sādhyam a prāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā aviśiṣṭa tvāt aprāptyā asādhaka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau

śeṣam lakṣaṇam

original: api ca yena yasya prāptistena gaṅgā sāgaraṃ prāptā sāgareṇasaṅgatā sāgareṇābhinnā tadvadevābhinne /

ced sādhya sādhane na asti sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ

original: nanu prāptyaprāptisamayormilitayoḥ sādhanapratiṣedhasyaikatvāt kathaṃ prāptyaprāptisamau bhinnāvityata āha /

abheda vivakṣāyām tu ekam eva uttaram

original: yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ bahutvaṃ vivakṣitvā bahuvacanaprayogo vṛkṣā iti tadbahutvasaṃkhyāyāva ekatvaṃ vivakṣitvaikavacanam ekaṃ vanamiti /
analyzed: yathā vṛkṣāṇām bahu tvam vivakṣitvā bahuvacana prayogaḥ vṛkṣāḥ iti tad bahu tva saṃkhyāyāvaḥ eka tvam vivakṣitvā eka vacanam ekam vanam iti

original: udāharaṇena sādharmyaṃvaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānamiti jātisāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ manvāno deśayati /

na sūtra artha aparijñānāt iti

original: sūtre nodāharaṇasādharmyaṃ vivakṣitamapi tu yena kena cidvidyamānenāsādhyena sādharmyam /

original: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānācca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau //

dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau sū

original: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasyānapadeśātprasaṅgapasamaḥ sādhyasamo hi dṛṣṭānte sādhyavaddhetvādyavayavaṃ prasañjayati /

pañca avayava prayoga sādhya tām dṛṣṭāntasya gatasya anitya tvasya prasañjayati iti arthaḥ
prasaṅgasamaḥ tu dṛṣṭānta gatasya anitya tvasya pramāṇa mātra sādhyatām iti apaunaruktyam
bhāṣyam sādhanasya api
sādhanam pramāṇam vācyam iti

original: vārttikaṃ ghaṭa eva tāvadanitya ityatra ko heturiti /

atra kim pramāṇam iti arthaḥ

kiṃyā hetu guṇa yuktam ākāśam akriyam dṛṣṭam tasmāt anena pratidṛṣṭāntena kasmāt

original: kriyāhetuguṇayogo niṣkriyatvameva na sādhayatyātmana iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā hetu guṇa yogaḥ niṣkriya tvam eva na sādhayati ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadi punariyamanaikānitakadeśanā syāt kriyāhetuguṇayuktasyāpyakriyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśasyeti tad etatsaduttaraṃ syāt /

na tu evam etat iti jātiḥ
śaṅkate

nirākaroti
na tad samāna dharma upapatteḥ

original: yadi tathābhūta evākāśe kasmānna karotītyata āha yastvasāviti /
analyzed: yadi tathābhūte eva ākāśe kasmāt na karoti iti atas āha yaḥ tu asau iti

original: (537/1) yastu manyate kāryotpādaikyavyaṅnyameva kāraṇaṃ na dṛṣṭakāryakāraṇasādharmyavyaṅnyamapīti,

original: madīyasya ca dṛṣṭāntasyābhyupagamānna tvadīyo dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ /

original: athaivaṃ prayuṅkte yathā madīyo na dṛṣṭāntastathā tvadīya iti tathāpi vyāghātānna dṛṣṭānto madīyasyādṛṣṭāntatve sādhye pratidṛṣṭāntena hi tena  #

original: udāharaṇapuraḥsaraṃ bhāṣyakāro vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād
analyzed: udāharaṇa puraḥsaram bhāṣyakāraḥ vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt

nitya tvena hi śabdasya dharmeṇa anutpattyā pratyavastheyam

original: na cānutpannaḥ śabda iti nitya iti cānutpattidharmaka
analyzed: na ca anutpannaḥ śabdaḥ iti nityaḥ iti ca anutpatti dharmaka
iti ca sambhavati

original: utpannastṛtpattidharmā ca śabdaścāni tyaśceti nānutpattyā śakyaṃ pratyavasthātumityarthaḥ /
analyzed: utpannaḥ ca śabdaḥ ca ani tyaḥ ca iti na anutpattyā śakyam pratyavasthātum iti arthaḥ
kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yaduktaṃ kāraṇābhāvādanityatvasya kāryasyābhāve nityatvaṃ prāptamiti tatrāha vārtikakāraḥ /
analyzed: yat uktam kāraṇa abhāvāt anitya tvasya kāryasya abhāve nitya tvam prāptam iti tatra āha vārtikakāraḥ
jñāpakaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ na kāraka
iti

original: kārako hi heturnivartamānaḥ svakāryaṃ nivartayati na tujñāpakastadabhāve 'pi bhūmau ciranikhātānāṃ nidhyādīnāmanivṛtteriti /
analyzed: kārakaḥ hi hetuḥ nivartamānaḥ sva kāryam nivartayati na tu jñāpakaḥ tad abhāve bhūmau cira nikhātānām nidhi ādīnām anivṛtteḥ iti
tatas ca viśeṣaṇam anarthakam prāk utpatteḥ ati

original: (539/4) prāgasato hi sattāsambandha utpattiḥ prāgapi cedasāvabhyupagataḥ prāgiti viśeṣaṇamanarthakam /
analyzed: prāk asataḥ hi sattā sambandhaḥ utpattiḥ prāk api ced asau abhyupagataḥ prāk iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam
utpatteḥ abhāve sadā eva anutpatti dharmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: apare tu prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvādityukte arthāpattisamaiveyaṃ jātiriti matvā 'syā
analyzed: apare tu prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt iti ukte arthāpatti samā evā iyam jātiḥ iti matvā syā

original: uttaramāhuḥ yadaivaṃmucyeta prayatnānantarīyakatvādanityaḥ śabda iti tadarthādaprayatnānantarīyakatve
analyzed: uttaram āhuḥ yadā evam mucyeta prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tad arthāt aprayatna ānantarīyaka tve
nitya tvam uktam bhavati iti arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samā evā iyam jātiḥ iti abhimānaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte ta evāsyāṃ jātāvuttaraṃ bruvate nāyaṃ niyama iti /
analyzed: evam kṛte te eva asyām jātau uttaram bruvate na ayam niyamaḥ iti
tat etat pareṣām matam dūṣayati
etat tu iti
śaṅkate
jāti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt na iyam jātiḥ iti ced

original: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānaṃ jātiḥ na cānutpattisamāyāḥ sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā 'sti kena cidityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ na ca anutpatti samāyāḥ sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā sti kena cid iti arthaḥ
nirākaroti
na anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sārūpyāt iti

original: yathā 'nutpannāstantavo na paṭasya kāraṇaṃ tathā śabdotpatteḥ prāganutpannaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ
analyzed: yathā nu tpannāḥ tantavaḥ na paṭasya kāraṇam tathā śabda utpatteḥ prāk anutpannam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam
na anitya tvasya kāraṇam iti sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam iti asti sāmānya lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ

original: etāvatā cārthāpattisamāyā anutpattisamāto bhedo darśitaḥ ihānutpannairahetubhiḥ sāmyena kāryapratiṣedhāt arthāpattisamāyāṃ vākyārthaviparītāropeṇa  #
analyzed: etāvatā ca arthāpatti samāyāḥ anutpatti samātaḥ bhedaḥ darśitaḥ iha anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sāmyena kārya pratiṣedhāt arthāpatti samāyām vākya artha viparīta āropeṇa
pratiṣedhāt iti
sāmānya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ aindriyaka tve samāne nitya anitya sādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya hetoḥ ghaṭaḥ iti

original: yathā hi viśeṣadarśanaṃ niścayasya kāraṇamastīti niścayotpattireva sādharmyadarśanamātramasti saṃśayasya kāraṇamiti saṃśayenāpi bhavitavyamityarthaḥ
analyzed: yathā hi viśeṣa darśanam niścayasya kāraṇam asti iti niścaya utpattiḥ eva sādharmya darśana mātram asti saṃśayasya kāraṇam iti saṃśayena api bhavitavyam iti arthaḥ
sūtra artha prayojanam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām sphuṭīkaroti
saṃśaya samā sādharmya samāyāḥ iti

original: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye tyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ
asya pratyākhyāna sūtram

original: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyāduśrayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ (sū. 15)
analyzed: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt uśra yathā vā saṃśaye tyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ

original: na sāmānyadarśanamātraṃ saṃśayasya kāraṇamapi tu viśeṣādarśanasahitaṃ viśeṣadarśane tu tadrahitaṃ na kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: na sāmānya darśana mātram saṃśayasya kāraṇam api tu viśeṣa adarśana sahitam viśeṣa darśane tu tad rahitam na kāraṇam iti sūtra arthaḥ
ubhayathā vā iti
sādharmya viśeṣa darśanābhyām iti arthaḥ
nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya iti
nityam saṃśaya kāraṇa tva anabhyupagamāt sādharmyasya iti arthaḥ
ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat ubhaya sādharmyāt iti
ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti api draṣṭavyam

original: etadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ ubhayena nityena cānityena ceti /
analyzed: etat vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ ubhayena nityena ca anityena ca iti

original: dvitīyaśca nityasādharmyātpratipakṣaṃ pravartayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavaditi /

original: atha dvitīyasādhanapravṛttau prathamasya sādhanasya kiṃ bhavatītyata āha /
analyzed: atha dvitīya sādhana pravṛttau prathamasya sādhanasya kim bhavati iti atas āha

original: evaṃ ca sati prayatnāṃnantarīyakatvāditi heturanityasādharmyeṇocyamāno na prakaraṇamativartate /

original: mā 'tivarttiṣṭa prakaraṇaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha /
analyzed: mā tivarttiṣṭa prakaraṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha
prakaraṇa anativṛtteḥ nirṇaya anativarttanam
nirṇaya aniṣpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
evam ānitya sādhana vādinam pratyuttaram darśayitvā nitya sādhana vādinam pratyāha
samānam ca etat nitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamāna
iti

original: tadevaṃ sādharmyeṇa prakaraṇasamadvayamuktaṃ tathā vaidharmyeṇa prakaraṇasamadvayaṃ nityānityasādhanavādināveva pratyāha /
analyzed: tat evam sādharmyeṇa prakaraṇasama dvayam uktam tathā vaidharmyeṇa prakaraṇasama dvayam nitya anitya sādhana vādinau eva pratyāha
samānam ca etat iti
ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti

na ubhaya pakṣa sādharmyāt tad bheda upapattiḥ iti

original: prakaraṇasame hi svapakṣaniścayena mayā vādipakṣasādhanaṃ dūṣaṇīyamiti buddhyā pravarttate /
analyzed: prakaraṇasame hi sva pakṣa niścayena mayā vādi pakṣa sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti buddhyā pravarttate

na tu pratipakṣa niścayena iti viśeṣaḥ
iha tu sāmya mātra āpādanam na sādhanena

original: kiṃ tu dūṣaṇairityetāvatā samārthaḥ prayogaḥ sama iti boddhavyam // 16 //

original: dvayoḥ sādhanayostadānīmagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣayoḥ ko 'yamabhimānaḥ prativādino yanmayāsvapakṣasādhanenaiva vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇīyamiti /
analyzed: dvayoḥ sādhanayoḥ tadānīm agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣayoḥ kaḥ yam abhimānaḥ prativādinaḥ yat mayā asva pakṣa sādhanena eva vādinaḥ sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti
samāna balayoḥ ced ayam ātmīyāt sādhanāt sva pakṣa siddhipam icchati atas nicchan api vādinā api sādhanāt siddhim abhyupagamayitavyaḥ
anyathā sva sādhanāt sādhya siddhim upajīvya vyaktam iyam rājaṅkula sthitiḥ iti
evam vyavasthite sūtra bhāṣye yojayitavye
pratipakṣāt pratipakṣa sādhanāt prakaraṇasya prakriyamāṇasya sādhyasya iti yāvat

original: siddheḥ samānāt svasādhanāt pratiṣedhasya prativādisādhanasya svasādhyasiddhidvāreṇa parakīyasādhanapratiṣedhasyānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: siddheḥ samānāt sva sādhanāt pratiṣedhasya prativādi sādhanasya sva sādhya siddhi dvāreṇa parakīya sādhana pratiṣedhasya anupapattiḥ
kasmāt pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti atas uktam pratipakṣa upapatteḥ

original: phalataḥ parakīyasādhanasya samānātsvasādhanātprakriyāsiddhiṃ svasādhyasiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣātprakriyāsiddhiruktā bhavati prativādinā /
analyzed: phalataḥ parakīya sādhanasya samānāt sva sādhanāt prakriyā siddhim sva sādhya siddhim bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati prativādinā

original: nanvevaṃ prakaraṇasamāvhayo hetvābhāso nodbhāvanīyaḥ prativādinā jātyuttaraprasaṅgādityata āha /
analyzed: nanu evam hetvābhāsaḥ na udbhāvanīyaḥ prativādinā jātyuttara prasaṅgāt iti atas āha
tattva anavadhāraṇāt ca prakriyā siddhiḥ

original: svasādhyanirṇayena parasādhyavighaṭanabuddhyā prativādinā sādhanaṃ prayujyamānaṃ prakaraṇasamajātyuttaraṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sva sādhya nirṇayena para sādhya vighaṭana buddhyā prativādinā sādhanam prayujyamānam prakaraṇa sama jāti uttaram bhavati

original: satpratipakṣatayā vādinaḥ sādhanamaniścāyakaṃ karomīti buddhyā pratipakṣasādhanaṃ prayuñjāno na jātivādī saduttaravāditvāt /
analyzed: sat pratipakṣa tayā vādinaḥ sādhanam aniścāyakam karomi iti buddhyā pratipakṣa sādhanam prayuñjānaḥ na jātivādī sat uttaravādi tvāt

uktā uttaraḥ iti

na ca viruddha avyabhicārī sambhavati

original: avyabhicāro hyavinābhāvaḥ sa ca pañcarūpasampattiścatūrūpasampattirvā na viruddhāvyabhicāriṇi sāstītyarthaḥ // 17 //
analyzed: avyabhicāraḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ sa ca pañca rūpa sampattiḥ catur rūpa sampattiḥ vā na viruddha avyabhicāriṇi sā asti iti arthaḥ

original: anityasādharmyādanityaṃ śabdaṃ bruvāṇo bhavānanakṣaraṃ nityasādharmyānnityatvaṃ śabdasya brūtaityarthaḥ /

original: tadeva khalvanuktaṃ vacanāllabhyate yatkalpanamanteraṇa vacanārtho na ghaṭate yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅktaityukte rātrau bhuṅkta iti
analyzed: tat eva khalu anuktam vacanāt labhyate vacana arthaḥ na ghaṭate yathā pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte eti ukte rātrau bhuṅkte iti

original: tadetatsūtraṃ bhāṣyamatena tāvad vyācaṣṭe pratidṛṣṭāntasya yodharmastaṃ yadā svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānātīti /
