tat etat bhāṣya vyākhyānam upanyasya vārttikakāraḥ dūṣayati

original: etattu na budhyāmahe kadhamatra pratijñā hīyata iti /
analyzed: etat tu na budhyāmahe kadham atra pratijñā hīyate iti
anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt

original: ghaṭavaditi sādhane prayukte prativādinā cānaikāntikatve sāmānyenodbhāvite tṛtīyasthānapatito vādyāha /
analyzed: ghaṭa vat iti sādhane prayukte prativādinā ca anaikāntika tve sāmānyena udbhāvite tṛtīya sthāna patitaḥ vādī āha
astu tarhi sāmānya vat ghaṭa ādiḥ nitya
iti

original: tathā satyaindriyakatvamanaikāntikaṃ na bhavati nityamātrāgāmitvād ghaṭādīnāmapi
analyzed: tathā sati aindriyaka tvam anaikāntikam na bhavati nitya mātra āgāmi tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām api
nityatā abhyupagamāt iti āśayena tathā sākṣāt anaikāntika doṣa udvāram akṣara ārūḍham anukvā
sva dṛṣṭānte nitya tām pratipadyate
nitya tā pratipatteḥ ca asiddha tā dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ bhavati sādhya vikala tā iti arthaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣeṇa hetudoṣeṇa vā viruddhatvena ghaṭādīnāmapi nityatvābhyupagamenaindrinayakatvasya
analyzed: saḥ yam dṛṣṭānta doṣeṇa hetu doṣeṇa vā viruddha tvena ghaṭa ādīnām api nitya tva abhyupagamena aindrinayaka tvasya

original: hetoḥ sādhyānityatvaviruddhena nityatvena vyāptatvād nigraho vādino na pratijñāhāniḥ /
analyzed: hetoḥ sādhya anitya tva viruddhena nitya tvena vyāpta tvāt nigrahaḥ vādinaḥ na pratijñāhāniḥ

original: na khalvanenāstu śabdo nitya itipratijñā parityaktā kiṃ tvastu ghaṭo 'pi nitya ityuktam /
analyzed: na khalu anena astu śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti pratijñā parityaktā kim tu astu ghaṭaḥ nityaḥ iti uktam

original: yadi dṛṣṭāntaparityāgena pratijñātārthasyāsiddheḥ pratijñāhānirityucyate tataḥ sarva eva doṣaḥ pratijñāhāniḥ sarvasmādeva doṣātpratijñāhānerupapatteḥ
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñāta arthasya asiddheḥ pratijñāhāniḥ iti ucyate tatas sarvaḥ eva doṣaḥ pratijñāhāniḥ sarvasmāt eva doṣāt pratijñāhāneḥ upapatteḥ

original: tasmātkathaṃ cid dṛṣṭāntaparityāgena pratijñāhānirupacaritavnayā ca cāsau pradhānaṃ pratijñāhāniṃ vinā bhavitumarhatītyāha /
analyzed: tasmāt katham cit dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñāhāniḥ upacaritavnayā ca ca asau pradhānam pratijñāhānim vinā bhavitum arhati iti āha
dṛṣṭāntam ca jahat iti

original: (552/3) tadevaṃ bhāṣyakarīyaṃ vyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena vyācikhyāsuḥ pṛcchati /
analyzed: tat evam bhāṣyakarī iyam vyākhyānam dūṣayitvā sva matena vyācikhyāsuḥ pṛcchati
katham tarhi iti
dṛṣṭaḥ ca asau ante nigamane vyavasthitaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭāntau pakṣa pratipakṣau ucyete
etat uktam bhavati

original: pratidṛṣṭāntasya pratipakṣasya sāmānyasya yo dharmo nityatvaṃ taṃ svapakṣe śabde 'bhyanujānāti /
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntasya pratipakṣasya sāmānyasya yaḥ dharmaḥ nitya tvam tam sva pakṣe śabde bhyanujānāti
udāharaṇam āha
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti

original: dvitīyapakṣavāditi sāmānyena pratayavasthitaidamāha tṛtīyapakṣe sthito vādī yadi sāmānyamaindripayakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo 'pyevaṃ bhavatviti /
analyzed: dvitīya pakṣa vād iti sāmānyena tṛtīya pakṣe sthitaḥ vādī yadi sāmānyam aindripayakam nityam śabdaḥ pi evam bhavatu iti
pratijñāhāniḥ

original: atra cānaikāntikatvena pratyavasthitaityupalakṣaṇaṃ yena kena citgnakāreṇa svapratijñātārthānirvāhaṃ paśyan pratijñārthañjahatpratijñāhānimāpnotīti  #
analyzed: atra ca anaikāntika tvena pratyavasthitaḥ eti upalakṣaṇam yena kena cit gnakāreṇa sva pratijñāta artha anirvāham paśyan pratijñā arthan jahat pratijñā hānim āpnoti iti
parama arthaḥ

original: yadapyucyate svayameva ghaṭamanityamaindriyakamudāhṛtya ghaṭasyaindriyakatvaṃ paśyan kathamanunmataḥ san
analyzed: yat api ucyate svayam eva ghaṭam anityam aindriyakam udāhṛtya ghaṭasya aindriyaka tvam paśyan katham anunmataḥ san
sāmānyasya nityasya aindriyaka tva darśana mātrāt śabde nitya ttvam abhyupagacchet kintu ubhayatra darśanāt saṃśayittaḥ

original: syāt tatra sarvaṃ nitya miti sāṃkhyīyarāddhāntāvaṣṭambhenāpi svapakṣanirvāhaṃ paśyato
analyzed: syāt tatra sarvam nityam iti sāṃkhyīya rāddhānta avaṣṭambhena api sva pakṣa nirvāham paśyataḥ
na aikāntika tva uddhārāya prekṣāvataḥ pi pravṛtti sambhavāt
na ca ātyantikam prekṣāvat tvam iha grāhyam

original: tasmādyathā jaḍaṃ prati vicāro nāstyevaṃ prāmāṇikamapi prati nigrahāvatātāro nāstīti madhyamo jano nigrāhyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā jaḍam prati vicāraḥ na asti evam prāmāṇikam api prati nigraha avatātāraḥ na asti iti madhyamaḥ janaḥ nigrāhyaḥ
tasya ca sambhavanti evam pramādāḥ iti
śaṅkate
prasaṅga vidhānāt iti ced

original: nirākaroti tacca na ata eva tatprāpteḥ /
analyzed: nirākaroti tat ca na atas eva tad prāpteḥ

original: hetudoṣamuddidhīrṣuḥ prasañjayannabhyupagacchatyeva na hi sāṅkhyīyaṃ rāddhāntamanabhyupagacchannanaikāntikatvamuddhartumarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hetu doṣam uddidhīrṣuḥ prasañjayan abhyupagacchati eva na hi sāṅkhyīyam rāddhāntam an abhyupagacchan anaikāntika tvam uddhartum arhati iti bhāvaḥ
tat anena para matam nirākṛta prāyam api sākṣāt nirākarttum upanyasyati
hetu doṣeṇa anaikāntika tva lakṣaṇena caritārtha tvāt na pratijñāhāniḥ nigrahasthānam iti anye
yat āha kīrtiḥ
tasmāt aindriyaka tvasya nitya anitya pakṣa vṛtteḥ vyabhicārāt asādhana aṅgasya upādānāt nigrahaḥ na pratipakṣa dharmasya abhyanujñānāt iti
nirākaroti
na anaikāntika doṣa parihāreṇa vipratipatteḥ tad upapatteḥ

original: yadā hi sāṃkhyapakṣāvalambanena śabdanityatvamabhyupa iti tadā pratijñāhāniḥ na viruddho heturnāpyanaikāntiko vipakṣābhāvāt kevalaṃ pratijñātārthahānamevāsya
analyzed: yadā hi sāṃkhya pakṣa avalambanena śabda nitya tvam abhyupa iti tadā pratijñāhāniḥ na viruddhaḥ hetuḥ na api anaikāntikaḥ vipakṣa abhāvāt kevalam pratijñāta artha hānam eva asya
vipratipatteḥ sva sādhya viruddha pratipatteḥ iti sarvam avadātam
pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharma vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram

original: etadvyācaṣṭe pratijñāto mīmāṃsakaṃ prati vaiśeṣikeṇānityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya sādhanamainrdiyakatvāddhaṭavaditi
analyzed: etat vyācaṣṭe pratijñātaḥ mīmāṃsakam prati vaiśeṣikeṇa anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya sādhanam ainrdiyaka tvāt dhaṭa vat iti

original: evamuktasya pratiṣedho mīmāṃsakena kriyate pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ tamāha
analyzed: evam uktasya pratiṣedhaḥ mīmāṃsakena kriyate pratidṛṣṭāntena hetu vyabhicāraḥ tam āha
sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam iti

original: tasminpratiṣedhe mīmāṃsakena kṛte dharmavavikalpāttathā nirddenaśa iti yāvannocayate tāvadardhokta eva dharmavikalpādityanūdya vyācaṣṭe /
analyzed: tasmin pratiṣedhe mīmāṃsakena kṛte iti yāvat na ucayate tāvat ardha uktaḥ eva dharma vikalpāt iti anūdya vyācaṣṭe
dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭāntayoḥ dhaṭa sāmānyayoḥ sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam tad yoge tad dharma bhedāt

original: sāmānya maindriyakaṃ sarvagatamaindriyakastvasarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāttadarthaṃ
analyzed: sāmānyam aindriyakam sarva gatam aindriyakaḥ tu asarva gataḥ ghaṭaḥ iti dharma vikalpāt tad artham

original: prati jñātārthasiddhyarthaṃ śabdasyāsarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ pratipādayituṃ nirddeśaḥ
analyzed: prati jñāta artha siddhi artham śabdasya a sarvagata tvam mīmāṃsakānām pratipādayitum nirddeśaḥ
tasya hi śabdasya a sarvagata tvam asiddham
praśna pūrvakam nirddeśa svarūpam āha katham
yathā ghaṭaḥ sarva gataḥ nityaḥ iti evam śabdaḥ api a sarva gataḥ nitya
iti

original: idaṃ hi pratijñāvākyam anityaḥ śabda itivadasarvagataḥ śabda iti mīmāṃsakaṃ vipratipannaṃ
analyzed: idam hi pratijñā vākyam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vat asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti mīmāṃsakam vipratipannam

original: prati nirddeśānna tu kṛtakatvāditivadudāharaṇasādharmyādasya hetulakṣaṇamasti sādhyanirdeśaḥ
analyzed: prati nirddeśāt na tu kṛtaka tvāt iti vat udāharaṇa sādharmyāt asya hetu lakṣaṇam asti sādhya nirdeśaḥ
pratijñā iti tu pratijñā lakṣaṇa yogāt pratijñāntaram eva yadi api asya manasi viparivartate

original: asarvatatvaṃ sādhayitvā mayā asarvagatatve satīti aindriyakatvaṃ heturviśeṣaṇīya
analyzed: sādhayitvā mayā asarvagata tve sati iti aindriyaka tvam hetuḥ viśeṣaṇīya

original: iti tathāpyetadanena na kṛtaṃ kiṃ tvasarvagataḥ śabdo ghaṭavadityuktvaiva virataḥ
analyzed: iti tathā api etat anena na kṛtam kim tu asarvagataḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat iti uktvā eva virataḥ

original: parārthānumāne ca vacanagatā guṇadoṣā vicāryante na tu vacanānapekṣaṃ vastu,
analyzed: parārtha anumāne ca vacana gatāḥ guṇa doṣāḥ vicāryante na tu vacana anapekṣam vastu
tat idam āha

original: asarvagataḥ śabda iti dvitīyā pratijñā heturahitā /
analyzed: asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti dvitīyā pratijñā hetu rahitā
asya praśna pūrvakam nigrahasthāna tvam āha tat katham iti
anarthakam niṣprayojanam iṣṭārtha siddheḥ abhāvāt iti

original: vārttikaṃ tatrānityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāpa prathamā /
analyzed: vārttikam tatra anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāpa prathamā

original: asyāṃ sāmānyenaindriyakeṇa hetoranaikāntikatvātpratihato vādī prativādinā asarvagataḥ śabdo 'nitya
analyzed: asyām sāmānyena aindriyakeṇa hetoḥ anaikāntika tvāt pratihataḥ vādī prativādinā a sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ nitya
iti pratijñāntaram pūrva pratijñā siddhi artham karoti iti anuṣajyate
pṛcchati katham iti
uttaram
sādhana sāmarthya aprajñānāt
anityaḥ śabda

original: aindriyakatvād ghaṭavadityetāvavaduktvā nirākāṅkṣo vādī na tvasarvagatatve satīti
analyzed: aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti etāva vat uktvā nirākāṅkṣaḥ vādī na tu asarvagata tve sati iti

original: sādhanaṃ viśeṣitavān na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādhanamatrārthe 'samarthaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tu samarthaṃ
analyzed: sādhanam viśeṣitavān na ca aviśiṣṭam sādhanam atra arthe samartham viśiṣṭam tu samartham
tasya sāmarthyam a parijñāya a viśiṣṭe tat āropya a viśiṣṭa sādhanam prayuktavān

original: tatra nirākāṅkṣo vādī savyabhicārahetuprayogādeva parājīyate na tu pratijñāntaraprayogāt /
analyzed: tatra nirākāṅkṣaḥ vādī savyabhicāra hetu prayogāt eva parājīyate na tu pratijñā antara prayogāt

original: yadi tu vādinyaparyavasitavāda eva madhye prativādinā hetoranaikāntikatve udbhāvite tamevahetumasarvagatatve satīti viśeṣṭuṃ mīmāṃsake prati  #
analyzed: yadi tu vādini aparyavasita vāde eva madhye prativādinā hetoḥ anaikāntika tve udbhāvite tam eva hetum asarvagata tve sati iti viśeṣṭum mīmāṃsake prati
śabdasya a sarva gata tvam

original: asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñāya ca na hetuṃ bravīti tadānaikāntikatvoddhārāya pratijñāntarakaraṇānnānaikāntikatvena parājīyate api tu pratijñāntarādeva,
analyzed: asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāya ca na hetum bravīti tadā anaikāntika tva uddhārāya pratijñā antara karaṇāt na anaikāntika tvena parājīyate api tu pratijñā antarāt eva
na hi pratijñā pratijñāntaram sādhayitum arhati iti
saḥ yam pratijñām mātrasya asādhaka tva apratipattyā sādhakasya eva vā sādhaka tva pratipattyā parājīyate

original: tadetadāha na ca pratijñā pratijñāntaraṃ sādhayati /
analyzed: tat etat āha na ca pratijñā pratijñāntaram sādhayati

original: tena pratijñā yatrārthe samārthā tadaparijñānātpañcāvayavasādhye ca sāmarthyāropaṇādaparijñānāditi
analyzed: tena pratijñā yatra arthe sama arthā tad aparijñānāt pañca avayava sādhye ca sāmarthya āropaṇāt aparijñānāt iti
śliṣṭa nirddeśaḥ prasajya pratiṣedha paryudāsau vivakṣitau tena ajñānāt viparīta jñānāt ca
pratijñāntaram nigrahasthānam iti

original: yatpunarucyate paraiḥ atyantāsambaddhametad yatpratijñā pratijñāsādhanāyeti yo hi
analyzed: yat punar ucyate paraiḥ atyanta asambaddham etat yat pratijñā pratijñā sādhanāya iti yaḥ hi

original: prāk pratijñāmuktvā hetūdāharaṇādikaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti sa kathaṃ cidanukramaṃ sādhanasya
analyzed: prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu udāharaṇa ādikam vaktum jānāti sa katham cit anukramam sādhanasya

original: jānātyeva jānan kathamavi kalāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pratijñāmeva pratijñānasādhanāyopādadīteti /
analyzed: jānāti eva jānan katham avi kalā antaḥkaraṇaḥ pratijñām eva pratijñāna sādhanāya upādadīta iti
tatra brūmaḥ

original: nāyaṃ pratijñayā pratijñā sādhanīyeti buddhyā pravṛttaḥ kiṃ tvasarvagatatvaṃ śabdasya
analyzed: na ayam pratijñayā pratijñā sādhanīyā iti buddhyā pravṛttaḥ kim tu asarvagata tvam śabdasya
mīmāṃsakam prati sādhayitvā tena aindriyaka tvam viśiṣya anaikāntika tvam uddharaṇīyam iti

original: manorathena pravṛttaḥ pratijñāṃ kṛtavān asarvagataḥ śabda iti /
analyzed: manorathena pravṛttaḥ pratijñām kṛtavān a sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: athāsya prativādyavaṣṭambhātpariṣaddarśanādvā stambhitatve sādhanāpratibhanayā tūṣṇīṃ bhavataḥ prekṣāvato 'pi pratijñāntaraṃ bhavati nigrahasthānam
analyzed: atha asya prativādi avaṣṭambhāt pariṣad darśanāt vā stambhita tve sādhana a pratibhanayā tūṣṇīm bhavataḥ prekṣāvataḥ pi pratijñāntaram bhavati nigrahasthānam
ayam ca vikala antaḥkaraṇasya nigrahaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api ukta
eva tat abhyupagamya apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāt iti vadadbhiḥ saḥ yam īdṛśaḥ sat pralāpaḥ

original: bhavadbhiḥ śāstre nibandhanīyona tvasmābhiriti vyaktamiyaṃ rājakulasthitiriti sarvaṃ caturasam // 3 //
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ śāstre nibandhanīyaḥ na tu asmābhiḥ iti vyaktam iyam rāja kula sthitiḥ iti sarvam caturasam
pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ
atra pratijñā hetvoḥ iti pratiyogi dvaya mātra upalakṣaṇa param
tena dṛṣṭānta ādayaḥ pi pratiyoginaḥ unneyāḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ vākyagatānāṃ padārthānāṃ mitho vyāghātaḥ pratīyate pramāṇāntaraṃ
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yeṣām vākya gatānām padārthānām mithas vyāghātaḥ pratīyate pramāṇa antaram

original: ca virodhakaṃ sa virodho nāma nigrahasthānam1 lakṣyasthitaspaya pratijñāgrahaṇasyāpyupalakṣaṇārthatvāt /
analyzed: ca virodhakam sa virodhaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam pratijñā grahaṇasya api upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt

original: nacaivaṃ bhāṇḍālekhyanyāyaḥ ekadeśenāvyāpakena samudāyasaṃgrahe sa hi bhavati,
analyzed: na ca evam bhāṇḍa ālekhya nyāyaḥ eka deśena avyāpakena samudāya saṃgrahe sa hi bhavati

original: na tu vyāpakena saṃgrahe vyāpakaṃ cānavayavena idaṃpratiyogimithunayorvirodhaḥ
analyzed: na tu vyāpakena saṃgrahe vyāpakam ca anavayavena idam pratiyogi mithunayoḥ virodhaḥ
atas yathāśruti tāvidh sūtram vyācaṣṭe vārtikakāraḥ
yatra pratijñā hetunā virudhyate iti

original: dvayorvirodhe yasya pramāṇāntarānugrahastena tadbādhyata iti tena tadvirudhyataityucyate /
analyzed: dvayoḥ virodhe yasya pramāṇa antara anugrahaḥ tena tat bādhyate iti tena tat virudhyate iti ucyate
yatra pratijñayā hetuḥ virudhyate tat udāharati
yathā guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam bhedena agrahaṇāt iti

original: atra hi bhedenāgrahaṇādityanena grahaṇapratiṣedhena grāhyābhāva upalakṣyate /
analyzed: atra hi bhedena agrahaṇāt iti anena grahaṇa pratiṣedhena grāhya abhāvaḥ upalakṣyate
tena evam hetu arthaḥ bhavati guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam avyatirekāt iti
saḥ yam pratijñā hetu padayoḥ vyāpti smaraṇa anapekṣa
eva paraspara vyāghātaḥ stitā asti padayoḥ eva

original: na caivaṃvidhaḥ śabde nityatvakṛtakatvayoryena kṛtakatvavadviruddho 'yaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhaḥ śabde nitya tva kṛtaka tvayoḥ yena kṛtaka tva vat viruddhaḥ yam hetvābhāsaḥ syāt
tatra hi kṛtaka tvasya nitya tvena vyāpti smaraṇa apekṣa

original: eva virodhaḥ pratīyate na tvayaṃ tathā astināstivatsvabhāvavirodhāt /
analyzed: eva virodhaḥ pratīyate na tu ayam tathā asti nāsti vat svabhāva virodhāt

original: yadyapyayamasiddho 'pi hetustathā 'pyasyāsiddhirbādhakaṃ pramāṇāntaramanusṛtya pratipattavyā pratijñāvirodhastūccāraṇamātrādeva prathamata  #
analyzed: yadi api ayam asiddhaḥ pi hetuḥ tathā pi asya asiddhiḥ bādhakam pramāṇa antaram anusṛtya pratipattavyā pratijñāvirodhaḥ tu uccāraṇa mātrāt eva prathamatas
eva gamyate iti

original: tenaiva dūṣitenāsiddhiḥ paścāttanī na dūṣaṇatvāya kalpate bhasmīkṛte dahanavat /
analyzed: tena eva dūṣitena asiddhiḥ paścāttanī na dūṣaṇa tvāya kalpate bhasmīkṛte dahana vat

original: pratijñāhetuvirodhamātreṇa ca nigrahasiddheḥ suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa pratijñāyā balavattāsmaraṇam /
analyzed: pratijñā hetu virodha mātreṇa ca nigraha siddheḥ suhṛd bhāva mātreṇa pratijñāyāḥ balavat tā smaraṇam
pratijñāyāḥ ca atra balavat tvam pramāṇa antara anugrahāt

original: tathā hi darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthapratisaṃdhānādrūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ sidhyatīti tadanugṛhītā pratijñaiva hetvarthaṃ bādhata iti /
analyzed: tathā hi darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha pratisaṃdhānāt rūpa ādi vyatiriktam dravyam sidhyati iti tad anugṛhītā pratijñā eva hetvartham bādhate iti
etena eva iti
lakṣaṇena

original: śramaṇā garbhiṃṇīti śramaṇā brahmacāriṇī nāntarvatnī bhavitumarhati jitendrayasyopasthasaṃyamo hi brahmacaryaṃ,
analyzed: śramaṇā garbhiṃṇī iti śramaṇā brahmacāriṇī na antarvatnī bhavitum arhati jita indra yasya upastha saṃyamaḥ hi brahmacaryam

original: na--cāsādhanāṅgasya pratijñāyā vacanādeva nigṛhīta iti kṛtaṃ virodhodbhāvanena niṣpāditakriye karmaṇi aviśeṣābhidhāyino dūṣaṇasya dūṣaṇanyāyātipātāditi  #
analyzed: na ca asādhana aṅgasya pratijñāyāḥ vacanāt eva nigṛhītaḥ iti kṛtam virodha udbhāvanena niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ dūṣaṇasya dūṣaṇa nyāya atipātāt iti
sāṃpratam
pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvasya prathame eva adhyāye darśita tvāt

original: hetuvirodho 'pi yatra hetunā pramāṇāntareṇānugṛhītena pratijñā bādhyate /
analyzed: hetu virodhaḥ pi yatra hetunā pramāṇa antareṇa anugṛhītena pratijñā bādhyate

original: yathā sarvaṃ pṛthagiti pratijñā na kiṃ cidekamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā sarvam pṛthak iti pratijñā na kim cit ekam iti arthaḥ
hetuḥ samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti eka samuccaye ghaṭa ādi prayogāt iti arthaḥ

original: nāstyekamekasamuccayaśceti vacanaṃ mitho virudhyate vinaiva vyāptyanusmaraṇamiti /
analyzed: na asti ekam eka samuccayaḥ ca iti vacanam mithas virudhyate vinā eva vyāpti anusmaraṇam iti
na ca sarva nāstitva vādinaḥ
sti iti vaktavyam asati hetau sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt

original: na ca kalpitasya hetoḥ sādhanāṅgateti tatra tatra niveditam /
analyzed: na ca kalpitasya hetoḥ sādhana aṅga tā iti tatra tatra niveditam

original: atra caikasamuccayasya pramāṇānugrahānnaikaṃ kiṃ ciditi pratijñā hetunā bādhyate /
analyzed: atra ca eka samuccayasya pramāṇa anugrahāt na ekam kim cit iti pratijñā hetunā bādhyate
etena lakṣaṇena pratijñāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ pi vaktavyaḥ

original: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād yatprameyaṃ tannityaṃ yathākāśamiti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt yat prameyam tat nityam yathā ākāśam iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yadyapyatra vastuto heturanaikāntikastathā 'pi dṛṣṭāntasya pratijñāvirodhenaiva nigṛhyate virodhasya vākye prathamamavagateḥ /
analyzed: yadi api atra vastutas hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntasya pratijñā virodhena eva nigṛhyate virodhasya vākye prathamam avagateḥ
anityam ghaṭa ādi unnīya anaikāntika tva pratipatteḥ tad ja dhanya tvāt iti
hetoḥ ca dṛṣṭānta ādibhiḥ virodhaḥ etena vaktavya
iti anuṣajyate yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt anaindriya dvyaṇuka vat iti

original: atrāpyaindriyakatvānaindriyakatvayāḥ śabdato virodhaḥ pratīyate sādhanavaikalyaṃ tu vastusvabhāvālocanayeti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: atra api aindriyaka tva anaindriyaka tvayāḥ śabdataḥ virodhaḥ pratīyate sādhana vaikalyam tu vastu svabhāva ālocanayā iti viśeṣaḥ
evam upanayena virodhaḥ na aindriyakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti

original: atrāpi vastusvabhāvālocanayā 'naindriyakatvāsiddhiḥ pratīyate śabdatastu virodha iti /
analyzed: atrā api vastu svabhāva ālocanayā nā aindriyaka tva asiddhiḥ pratīyate śabdataḥ tu virodhaḥ iti
pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca pratijñā hetvoḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: (554/1) yadyapi bādhitaviṣayaṃ hetvābhāsāntargataṃ tathāpīhāpyastīti virodhahetvābhāsayoratra nigrahasthānayoḥ samāveśo 'stu na kva cidviṣaye  #
analyzed: yadi api bādhita viṣayam hetvābhāsa antargatam tathā api iha api asti iti virodha hetvābhāsayoḥ atra nigrahasthānayoḥ samāveśaḥ u stu na kva cit viṣaye
samāveśāt ānarthakyam
viṣaya antare samāveśa abhāvāt arthavat tvāt
darśitam ca anantaram eva bhinna viṣaya tvam iti

original: tadevaṃ sādhanavādino virodhaṃ nigrahasthānamabhidhāyottaravādino 'pi nigrahasthānamanenaiva saṃgṛhītamityāha parapakṣasiddhena gotavādineti
analyzed: tat evam sādhanavādinaḥ virodham nigrahasthānam abhidhāya uttaravādinaḥ nigrahasthānam anena eva saṃgṛhītam iti āha parapakṣa siddhena gotavādinā iti

original: yadā hi bauddhena prābhākaraṃ prati sādhyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāditi /
analyzed: yadā hi bauddhena prābhākaram prati sādhyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt iti

original: yadyanityatvaṃ na bhavecchrāvaṇatvaṃ na syāditi prābhākaro 'naikāntikatvamudbhāvayati
analyzed: yadi anitya tvam na bhavet śrāvaṇa tvam na syāt iti prābhākaraḥ na aikāntika tvam udbhāvayati

original: śrāvaṇaṃ śabdatvaṃ nityaṃ ceti tadāsyānaikāntikatvodbhāvanaṃ svakīyaśabdatvanirākaraṇaviruddhamiti /
analyzed: śrāvaṇam śabda tvam nityam ca iti tadā asya anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam svakīya śabda tva nirākaraṇa viruddham iti

original: parapakṣasiddhaṃ gotvādyapīdṛśa eva viṣaye viruddhe draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: para pakṣa siddham go tva ādi api īdṛśe eva viṣaye viruddhe draṣṭavyam
siddhānta viruddham ca sādhanam viruddham iti āha
sva pakṣa anapekṣam ca

original: nanu yadyanaikāntikodbhāvanamapi viruddhaṃ kastarhyanaikāntikatvāpādanasya viṣaya ityat āha /
analyzed: nanu yadi anaikāntika udbhāvanam api viruddham kaḥ tarhi anaikāntika tva āpādanasya viṣayaḥ āha
ubhaya pakṣa sampratipannaḥ tu iti
deśayati
dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ iti

original: avayavāntaraṃ hi pratijñāhetpavādibhya udāharaṇe tena hetvābhāsoktyā tasya saṅgrahaḥ/
analyzed: avayava antaram hi udāharaṇe tena hetvābhāsa uktyā tasya saṅgrahaḥ

original: pāramparyeṇa tūdāharaṇābhāsasya hetudūṣakatvena sarvameva hetudūṣakamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: pāramparyeṇa tu udāharaṇa ābhāsasya hetu dūṣaka tvena sarvam eva hetu dūṣakam iti bhāvaḥ
pariharati hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt iti
hetvābhāsāḥ iti atra hetu śabdaḥ svārtham a parityajya dṛṣṭāntam upalakṣayati
upalakṣaṇe hetuḥ uktaḥ
hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt hetvābhāsa pradhānaka tvāt
dṛṣṭānta ābhāsena api hetuḥ eva dūṣyate yatas
na ca etāvatā pratijñā ādi doṣa upalakṣaṇa prasaṅgaḥ

original: na hi yatra yatra nimittamasti tatsarvamupalakṣaṇīyaṃ,
analyzed: na hi yatra yatra nimittam asti tat sarvam upalakṣaṇīyam

original: kiṃ tu yadupalakṣyate tatrāvaśyaṃ nimittaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim tu yat upalakṣyate tatra avaśyam nimittam vaktavyam

original: na ca sūtrakārasya sarvatra lāghavādaro dṛḍha
analyzed: na ca sūtrakārasya sarvatra lāghava ādaraḥ dṛḍha
iti uktam
tasmāt sarvam ramaṇīyam
pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ

original: aindriyakatvasya hetoranaikāntiṅkatvodbhāvanena śabdānityatvapakṣe pratikṣipte vādī prativādinaṃ brūyādanaikāntikatvamuddidhīrṣuḥ kaḥ punarāhānityaḥ  #
analyzed: aindriyaka tvasya hetoḥ anaikāntiṅka tva udbhāvanena śabda anitya tva pakṣe pratikṣipte vādī prativādinam brūyāt anaikāntika tvam uddidhīrṣuḥ kaḥ punar āha anityaḥ
śabdaḥ iti

original: yadyahamanityaḥ śabda iti pratijñātamapahvotuṃ śaknoti tadā na sāmānyena nityena me heturanaikāntiko bhavatīti buddhyā 'hnupate so 'yamevaṃvādī  #
analyzed: yadi aham anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñātam apahvotum śaknoti tadā na sāmānyena nityena me hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati iti buddhyā hnupate saḥ yam evaṃvādī
na śakyaḥ na aikāntika tvena jetum
apahvavasya apahnava tva āvedane na aikāntika tva uddhārāt tasmāt anaikāntikasya anaikāntika tva sthāpanāya apahnavasya apahnava tvam udbhāvanīyam
tatra kim apajnava tvam udbhāvya anaikāntika tvam vyavasthāpya nigṛhyatām uta apahnavāt eva iti
saṃśaye pahnava tva udbhāvanena eva pūrva apara parāhate nirgṛhyate na anaikāntika tvena tad pūrvaka tvāt anaikāntika tva sthāpanasya

original: tasmādyaduktaṃ kīrtinā kimidānīṃ hetvābhāsāduttarapratijñāsaṃnyāsāpekṣayā tasya prativādino hetvābhāsa evādyaṃ nigrahasthānamiti tadapyapāst
analyzed: tasmāt yat uktam kīrtinā kim idānīm hetvābhāsāt uttara pratijñā saṃnyāsa apekṣayā tasya prativādinaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ eva ādyam nigrahasthānam iti tat api apāst
pratijñā saṃnyāsasya eva pūrva bhāvi tvāt

original: yadapi tenoktaṃ pakṣapratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavatastūṣṇīṃbhāvo nāma nigrahasthānaṃ pralapataśca pralapitaṃ nāmetyādyapi vācyaṃ syāditi /
analyzed: yat api tena uktam pakṣa pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavataḥ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam pralapataḥ ca pralapitam nāma ityādi api vācyam syāt iti
tat api asāṃpratam

original: na hi tūṣṇīmbhāvena pralapitādibhirvā śakyamanaikāntikatvamuddhartuṃ yathā pratijñārthāpahnavena,
analyzed: na hi tūṣṇīmbhāvena pralapita ādibhiḥ vā śakyam anaikāntika tvam uddhartum yathā pratijñā artha apahnavena
na ca ete hetu ābhasa udbhāvanasya purastāttanāḥ tasmāt etat api anirūpita abhidhānāt yat kiñcid iti

original: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣamicchato hetvantaram //
analyzed: aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetvantaram

original: vyākhyātuṃ nidarśanamāha nidarśanamekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ bhūtabhautikendriyamekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt /
analyzed: vyākhyātum nidarśanam āha nidarśanam eka prakṛti idam vyaktam bhūta bhautika indriyam eka prakṛtīnām vikārāṇām parimāṇāt

original: tadyathā ekamṛtpūrvā ghaṭaśarāvodañjanādayaḥ parimitā dṛṣṭāḥ yāvān prakṛtervyūhaḥ saṃsthānaṃ tāvānvikāra iti /
analyzed: tat yathā eka mṛd pūrvāḥ ghaṭa śarāva udañjana ādayaḥ parimitāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yāvān prakṛteḥ vyūhaḥ saṃsthānam tāvān vikāraḥ iti
na ca etat udāharaṇam sādhana vikalam iti āha dṛṣṭam ca iti
upanayam āha asti ca idam iti
nigamanam āha tad eka prakṛtīnām iti
asya parimita tvasya hetoḥ vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam prativādinaḥ

original: nānāprakṛtīnāṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāmekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇamiti /
analyzed: nānā prakṛtīnām ghaṭa rucaka ādīnām eka prakṛtīnām ca ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām dṛṣṭam parimāṇam iti

original: evaṃ pratyasthite prativādini vādī paścātparimitatvaṃ hetuṃ viśinaṣṭi ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ parimāṇadarśanāditi /
analyzed: evam pratyasthite prativādini vādī paścāt parimita tvam hetum viśinaṣṭi eka prakṛti samanvaye sati śarāva ādi vikārāṇām parimāṇa darśanāt iti
prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ
eka svabhāva samanvaye sati iti arthaḥ
eka prakṛti samanyavam sphuṭayati

original: sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ gṛhyate /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi idam sarvam vyaktam parimitam gṛhyate
tathā hi

original: metradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhabuddhirbhavati tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhabuddhiḥ caitrasya tāmavindato raṇaraṇakavato moho vibhādaḥ /
analyzed: metra dāreṣu narmadāyām maitrasya sukha buddhiḥ bhavati tad sapatnīnām ca duḥkha buddhiḥ caitrasya tām avindataḥ raṇaraṇakavataḥ mohaḥ vibhādaḥ
narmadayā bhāva antarāṇi vyākhyātāni

original: tadevaṃ yatraikasvabhāvasamanvaye sati parimāṇaṃ tatraikaprakṛtitvameva tadyathaikamṛtpiṇḍasvabhāveṣu ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādiṣu /
analyzed: tat evam yatra eka svabhāva samanvaye sati parimāṇam tatra eka prakṛti tvam eva tat yathā eka mṛd piṇḍa svabhāveṣu ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādiṣu
ghaṭa rucaka ādayaḥ tu na eka svabhāvāḥ mārda sauvarṇa ādīnām svabhāvānām bhedāt

original: nidarśyātra sūtraṃ yojayati tadidamaviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddha iti /
analyzed: nidarśya atra sūtram yojayati tat idam aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe iti
asya nigrahasthāna tvam āha
sati ca hetu antara bhāve iti

original: api ca yadi hetvantaravacane viśvamekaprakṛti sādhyate tadā nidarśanaṃ nāsti sarvasya pakṣe nikṣepāt /
analyzed: api ca yadi hetu antara vacane viśvam eka prakṛti sādhyate tadā nidarśanam na asti sarvasya pakṣe nikṣepāt
atha nidarśana siddhi artham kim cit pakṣāt vyatiricyate tatas tena eva anaikāntika tvam
anvitānām parimitānām bhinna prakṛtika tvāt iti āha
hetu antara vacane sati yadi hetu artha nidarśana
iti

original: hetuḥ sādhanam arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tau hetvarthau nidarśayati vyāpyavyāpakabhāveneti /
analyzed: hetuḥ sādhanam arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tau hetvarthau nidarśayati vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvena iti
nidarśanaḥ

original: nidarśanaḥ hetvarthayornidarśano hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa yadyupādīyate tato nedaṃ vyaktamekaprakṛti bhavati dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛtyantaropādānāt
analyzed: nidarśanaḥ hetu arthayoḥ nidarśanaḥ hetu artha nidarśanaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa yadi upādīyate tatas na idam vyaktam eka prakṛti bhavati dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛti antara upādānāt
vārttikam sādhana antara upādāne pūrvasya iti

original: dattottarāvasara eva vādini yadi prativādī hetvarthaṃ vyabhicārayati vādīca tṛtīyapadake sthito hetuṃ viśeṣayati tadā sādhanāntaropādānānnigṛhyatāmutānaikāntikasādhanopādānāt
analyzed: datta uttara avasare eva vādini yadi prativādī hetu artham vyabhicārayati tṛtīya padake sthitaḥ hetum viśeṣayati tadā sādhana antara upādānāt nigṛhyatām uta anaikāntika sādhana upādānāt
na tāvat anaikāntika sādhanāt asya nigrahaḥ samāhita tvāt iti
tasmāt hetu antara vacanāt eva nigṛhyate pūrvasya vastutas samarthasya a sāmarthya khyāpanāt
sāmarthye vā hetu antara ānarthakyam iti sūktam
prakṛtāt arthāt apratisaṃbaddha artham arthāntaram

original: vyācaṣṭe yathoktalakṣaṇe pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahe sati vāde jalpe vitaṇḍāyāmityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyācaṣṭe yathā ukta lakṣaṇe pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahe sati vāde jalpe vitaṇḍāyām iti arthaḥ

original: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ vādī sādhanaṃ brūyād nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvāditi /
analyzed: hetutaḥ sādhya siddhau prakṛtāyām vādī sādhanam brūyāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ sparśa tvāt iti

original: atrāntare sūkhādibhirvyabhicāreṇa hetorasāmarthyaṃ paśyana tatpracchādanārthaṃ prasaktānuprasaktyā taṃ tamarthamupanyasyannarthāntareṇa nigṛhyate
analyzed: atra antare sūkha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāreṇa hetoḥ asāmarthyam tad pracchādana artham prasakta anuprasaktyā tam tam artham upanyasyan artha antareṇa nigṛhyate
abhidheyasya kriyā antara yogāt kriyā viśeṣasya yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ bhidyamāna rūpaḥ

original: śabdo nāmeti yathā vṛkṣastiṣṭhati vṛkṣaṃ chinatti vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ paśyati vṛkṣāyodakamāsiñcatītyādi /
analyzed: śabdaḥ nāma iti yathā vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati vṛkṣam chinatti vṛkṣeṇa candramasam paśyati vṛkṣāya udakam āsiñcati ityādi

original: yadyucyeta arthaśabdavadayamasmākaṃ samayo yadanena kramaviśeṣeṇārthaḥ pratyetavyo nānyeneti atastatheva pratīyate na kramāntareṇetyata āha

vṛddhaḥ babhūva

original: tataḥ prabhṛtyananusṛtamūlaśabdānāmayaṃ vācakatvabhramo 'pabhraṃśe vartate na vṛddhatarasyobhayavedino
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti an anusṛta mūla śabdānām ayam vācaka tva bhramaḥ upabhraṃśe vartate na

original: mūlaśabdānusāriṇasī padarthapratipattiridānīntanānāṃ tvapabhraṃśādeva ata evānavākhyānamapi prayojanavat /

asati asmin vācaka apabhraṃśa vibhāge jñāna anabhāvāt sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti niyama vidheḥ na

original: mlecchitavai nāpabhāṣitavai iti niṣedhasya ca viṣayasaṃśayena duradhigamatvena dharmānuṣṭhānasyāśakyatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: mlecchitavai na apabhāṣitavai iti niṣedhasya ca viṣaya saṃśayena duradhigama tvena dharma anuṣṭhānasya aśakya tva prasaṅgāt

original: yatrārthe yasya śabdasya bhagavateśvareṇa saṅketaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tatra sādhurasādhuranyatra yathā ya evāsvaśabdo daridre sādhuḥ sa evāsādhurvājini
analyzed: yatra arthe yasya śabdasya bhagavatā īśvareṇa saṅketaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tatra sādhuḥ asādhuḥ anyatra yathā yaḥ eva asva śabdaḥ daridre sādhuḥ saḥ eva asādhuḥ vājini

original: yathā nakuladaṃṣṭāgraspṛṣṭā yā kā cidoṣadhirasau sarpaviṣaṃ hanti evamīśvareṇa kṛtasaṅketaḥ śabdaḥ sādhurdharmaupayujyate nānya iti /
analyzed: yathā nakula daṃṣṭa agra spṛṣṭā yā kā cit oṣadhiḥ asau sarpa viṣam hanti evam īśvareṇa kṛta saṅketaḥ śabdaḥ sādhuḥ dharmā upayujyate na anyaḥ iti

original: yavavarāhādiśabdānāmāryamlecchayorarthavivāde vaidikādvākyaśeṣādāryasaṃmator 'tho grahītavyo na mlecchasaṃmataḥ tatra vaidikavākyaśeṣavirodhāt
analyzed: yava varāha ādi śabdānām ārya mlecchayoḥ artha vivāde vaidikāt vākyaśeṣāt ārya saṃmatoḥ thaḥ grahītavyaḥ na mleccha saṃmataḥ tatra vaidika vākyaśeṣa virodhāt

original: yeṣāṃ tu śabdānāmāryeṣu na dṛṣṭacaraḥ prayogaḥ kevalairmlecchairevārthabhede prayujyante yathā pikanematāmarasādayaḥ vede tu prayuktāsteṣāṃ  #
analyzed: yeṣām tu śabdānām āryeṣu na dṛṣṭa caraḥ prayogaḥ kevalaiḥ mlecchaiḥ eva artha bhede prayujyante yathā pika nema tāmarasa ādayaḥ vede tu prayuktāḥ teṣām

original: tadevaṃ vyavasthite nyāyamīmāṃsāpariśīlanavikalānāṃ bāhyatarāḥ pralāpā upekṣaṇīyāḥ tasmātsuṣṭhūktaṃ prayogāpetaśabdavaditi /

original: tatra kathametatsādhyaṃ sidhyatīti jijñāsā tatraikenaiva sādhanena sādhyasiddheḥ sādhanāntarābhidhānamanarthakamiti /
analyzed: tatra katham etat sādhyam sidhyati iti jijñāsā tatra ekena eva sādhanena sādhya siddheḥ sādhana antara abhidhānam anarthakam iti

original: yatra tu prativādinaḥ pariṣado vā jijñāsā bhavati kati sādhanānisaṃbhavantyasminsādhya
analyzed: yatra tu prativādinaḥ pariṣadaḥ vā jijñāsā bhavati kati sādhanāni saṃbhavanti asmin sādhya

original: yadi niścayo dārḍhyaṃ tadekasmādeva pramāṇādbhavati aniścāyakasyāpramāṇatvāt /

original: atha sāmānyaviśeṣatadvatāṃ grahaṇaṃ na tadanumānasahasrairapi teṣāṃ sāmānyavaddravyamātraviṣayatvāt /

original: yadi jijñāsāyāṃ sityāṃ pravartate pratipādayati jñeyaṃ nāsya kaścidaparādha iti /

original: yastvārabhya na nirvāhayet saduttaraṃ tu brūyāt tasya syāt khalīkāramātrasamāmarthyakṛtaṃ na tu tattvavāditvavihatirityarthaḥ /

tam evam bhadanta ākṣepam samādhatte na uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt iti

original: dūṣyaviṣayaṃ hi dūṣaṇam asati dūṣyābhidhāne na śakyaṃ vaktum /

original: tadidamuktaṃ tadidaṃ vyāhatamucyate noccārayati uttaraṃ ca bravītīti /

cit uttaram vaktavyam
uttara vāda parasya uttaram āśraya abhāve na yuktam iti tad āśraya mātram anuvaditavyam tad antareṇa aśakya abhidhāna tvāt uttarasya iti

nanu apratibhāyāḥ nigrahasthāna tva vidhānena ananubhāṣaṇasya api viditam tasya tad viśeṣa tvāt

original: na khalu nānubhāṣataityetāvataiva nigṛhyate api tvananubhāṣamāṇo dūṣyaṃ na budhyate abudhyamānaśca tatrottaraṃ na pratipadyate tato 'pratibhayā  #
analyzed: na khalu na anubhāṣate eti etāvatā eva nigṛhyate api tu an anubhāṣamāṇaḥ dūṣyam na budhyate a budhyamānaḥ ca tatra uttaram na pratipadyate pratibhayā

original: tadevamananubhāṣaṇamapratibhāviśeṣa iti apratibhāyā vihitaṃ nigrahasthānatvaṃ tadviśeṣe 'pi vihitaṃ bhavati /

original: yathā gavi sāsnādimattvaṃ vihitaṃ śābaleye 'pi vihitaṃ bhavati na punastatra sāsnādimatvavidhānāya pṛthag yatnāntaramārabhante /
analyzed: yathā gavi sāsnādimat tvam vihitam śābaleye vihitam bhavati na punar tatra sāsnādima tva vidhānāya pṛthak yatna antaram ārabhante
atra brūmaḥ
na tāvat uttarā pratipatti sāmānya viśeṣaḥ nanubhāṣaṇam puṃsām sāmaryya vaicitryāt

original: kaściddūnaṣyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca vidannapi nānubhāṣituṃ pārayati bahuvacanakuṇṭhatvāt /

original: kaściddūṣaṇaviṣayaṃ vedānubhāṣate ca uttarapratipattivikalastu syātso 'yamapratibhayā nigṛhyate nānanubhāṣaṇena tatra sāmarthyāt /
analyzed: kaścid dūṣaṇa viṣayam veda anubhāṣate ca uttara pratipatti vikalaḥ tu syāt saḥ yama pratibhayā nigṛhyate na ananubhāṣaṇena tatra sāmarthyāt

original: kaścitpunardūṣyameva na jānāti so 'jñānena nigṛhyate na cājñāne 'nanubhāṣaṇamavaśyaṃbhāvi dhāraṇāvator 'yānirūpaṇe vādyudīritākṣarasvarūpamātrapāṭhasambhavenānubhāṣaṇopapatteḥ
analyzed: kaścid punar dūṣyam eva na jānāti saḥ jñānena nigṛhyate na ca ajñāne nanubhāṣaṇam avaśyaṃbhāvi dhāraṇāvatoḥ yā a nirūpaṇe vādi udīrita akṣara sva rūpa mātra pāṭha sambhavena anubhāṣaṇa upapatteḥ

original: apratibhā tvavaśyaṃ bhevad na hyasti sambhavo dūṣyaṃ na vedāsya dūṣaṇaṃ tu vedeti /
analyzed: apratibhā tu avaśyam bhevat na hi asti sambhavaḥ dūṣyam na veda asya dūṣaṇam tu veda iti

original: tathāpi svarūpatastāvadbhedaḥ na hi yadeva dūṣaṇaviṣayamajñānamapratibhā tadeva dūṣyaviṣayamajñānaṃ

uddyota kara gavīnām atijaratīnām samuddharaṇāt

original: pratyakṣāptāgamamayamahānyāyamūlā manojñā ṭīkāvīrudbhavatu kṛtināṃ nandrinī ṣaṭhpadānām
analyzed: pratyakṣa āpta āgama maya mahā nyāya mūlā manojñā ṭīkā vīrudh bhavatu kṛtinām nandrinī ṣaṭhpadānām

original: // 3 // krūrāḥ kṛto 'ñjalirayaṃ balireṣa dattaḥ kāyo mayā praharatātra yathābhilāṣam /
analyzed: krūrāḥ kṛtaḥ ñjaliḥ ayam baliḥ eṣa dattaḥ kāyaḥ mayā praharata atra yathābhilāṣam

original: abhyarthaye vitathavāṅmayapāṃśuvarṣair- mā māvilīkuruta kīrtinadīḥ pareṣām // 3 //
analyzed: abhyarthaye vitatha vāc maya pāṃśu varṣaiḥ mā mā āvilīkuruta kīrti nadīḥ pareṣām  /
iti miśra śrī vācaspati viracitāyām nyāyavārtikatātparya ṭīkāyām pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
samāptaḥ ca ayam granthaḥ
